[03] tattha ^b^purāya^eb^nti ayaṃ tāpaso vattasampanno ca brahmacariyavā ca, so panesa dīghāyukatāya nibbānasaṅkhāte magge abhirato guṇavuddhiyā ca vuddho. tasmā yāva esa amhe nātikkamati, na abhibhavitvā imamhā ṭhānā cāveti, tāvadeva tvaṃ gantvā tassa devalokagamanāni maggāni āvara, yathā idha nāgacchati, evaṃ karohīti attho.
[22] tāsampi hotu pariyāyo, tāpi yantu palobhanā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0154^ea^ ^b^kimeva tva^eb^nti kiṃ nāmetaṃ tvaṃ karosīti dīpeti. ^b^mameva tuvaṃ sikkhasī^eb^ti imasmiṃ sakaladevaloke mameva tuvaṃ ikkhasi, aññaṃ na passasīti adhippāyena vadati. ^b^sa^eb^-kāro panettha byañjanasandhikaro. ^b^isippalobhane gacchā^eb^ti kiṃkāraṇā maññeva evaṃ vadesīti adhippāyo ^a^V5.0148^ea^. ^b^pavarā cevā^eb^ti mayā uttaritarā ceva. ^b^asoke^eb^ti sokarahite. ^b^nandane^eb^ti nandijanake. ^b^pariyāyo^eb^ti gamanavāro.
[21] ``addhā hi saccaṃ bhaṇasi, santi aññāpi accharā.
[22] tādisiyo pavarā ceva, asoke nandane vane..
[21] ``na tā evaṃ pajānanti, pāricariyaṃ pumaṃ gatā.

[03] tattha ^b^pumaṃ gatā^eb^ti purisaṃ upasaṅkamantā samānā purisapalobhinipāricariyaṃ na jānanti. ^b^vaṇṇarūpenā^eb^ti sarīravaṇṇena ceva rūpasampattiyā ca. ^b^savasamānayissasī^eb^ti taṃ tāpasaṃ attano vasaṃ ānessasīti.
[03] taṃ sutvā alambusā dve gāthā abhāsi --
[22] vibhemi cetaṃ āsāduṃ, uggatejo hi brāhmaṇo..

[03] tattha ^b^na vāha^eb^nti na ve ahaṃ. ^b^vibhemī^eb^ti bhāyāmi. ^b^āsādu^eb^nti āsādituṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- nāhaṃ, deva, tayā pesitā na gamissāmi, apicāhaṃ taṃ isiṃ sīlabhedanatthāya allīyituṃ bhāyāmi, uggatejo hi soti. ^b^āsādiyā^eb^ti āsādetvā. ^b^mohasaṃsāra^eb^nti mohena saṃsāraṃ, mohena isiṃ palobhetvā saṃsāraṃ āpannā vaṭṭadukkhe patiṭṭhitā sattā gaṇanapathaṃ atikkantā ^a^V5.0149^ea^. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti tena kāraṇena. ^b^lomāni haṃsaye^eb^ti ahaṃ lomāni uṭṭhapemi, ``tassa kirāhaṃ sīlaṃ bhindissāmī''ti cintayamānāya me lomāni pahaṃsantīti vadati.
[22] aggiṭṭhaṃ parimajjantaṃ, isisiṅgaṃ upāgamī''ti.. -- imā abhisambuddhagāthā.

[03] tattha ^b^pakkāmī^eb^ti tena hi, devarāja, āvajjeyyāsi manti attano sayanagabbhaṃ pavisitvā alaṅkaritvā isisiṅgaṃ kilesena missituṃ icchantī pakkāmi, bhikkhave, sā accharā tassa assamaṃ gatāti. ^b^bimbijālakasañchanna^eb^nti rattaṅkuravanena sañchannaṃ. ^b^pātova pātarāsamhī^eb^ti, bhikkhave, pātarāsavelāya pātova pageyeva atipageva. ^b^udaṇhasamayaṃ patī^eb^ti sūriyuggamanavelāyameva. ^b^aggiṭṭha^eb^nti aggisālaṃ. rattiṃ padhānamanuyuñjitvā pātova nhatvā udakakiccaṃ katvā paṇṇasālāyaṃ thokaṃ jhānasukhena vītināmetvā nikkhamitvā aggisālaṃ sammajjantaṃ taṃ isisiṅgaṃ sā upāgami, itthivilāsaṃ dassentī tassa purato aṭṭhāsi.
[22] gamanā kāmanīyā te, harantiyeva me mano..
[22] vimaṭṭhā tuyhaṃ sussoṇī, akkhassa phalakaṃ yathā..
[22] āyatā ca visālā ca, nettā tava sudassanā..
[22] ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^vicittahatthābharaṇā^eb^ti vicittehi hatthābharaṇehi samannāgatā. ^b^hemacandanagandhinī^eb^ti suvaṇṇavaṇṇacandanagandhavilepanā. ^b^saññatūrū^eb^ti suvaṭṭitaghanaūru sampannaūrulakkhaṇā. ^b^vilaggā^eb^ti saṃkhittamajjhā. ^b^mudukā^eb^ti mudu sukhumālā. ^b^suddhā^eb^ti nimmalā. ^b^suppatiṭṭhitā^eb^ti samaṃ pathaviṃ phusantā ^a^V5.0151^ea^ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā. ^b^gamanā^eb^ti gacchamānā. ^b^kāmanīyā^eb^ti kantā kāmitabbayuttakā. ^b^harantiyeva me mano^eb^ti ete evarūpena paramena itthivilāsena caṅkamantiyā tava pādā mama cittaṃ harantiyeva. ^b^vimaṭṭhā^eb^ti visālā. ^b^sussoṇī^eb^ti sundarasoṇī. ^b^akkhassā^eb^ti sundaravaṇṇassa akkhassa suvaṇṇaphalakaṃ viya visālā te soṇīti vadati. ^b^uppalasseva kiñjakkhā^eb^ti nīluppalakaṇṇikā viya. ^b^kaṇhañjanassevā^eb^ti sukhumakaṇhalomacittattā evamāha.

[03] ``duvidhā''tigāthaṃ thane vaṇṇayanto āha. te hi dve hutvā ure jātā vaṇṭassa abhāvā ^b^avaṇṭā,^eb^ ure laggā eva hutvā suṭṭhu nikkhantattā ^a^M5.0167^ea^ ^b^sādhupaccudā,^eb^ payassa dhāraṇato ^b^payodharā, apatitā^eb^ti na patitā, amilātatāya vā alambanatāya vā na anto paviṭṭhāti apatitā, suvaṇṇaphalake ṭhapitasuvaṇṇamayavaṭṭālābuno aḍḍhena sadisatāya ^b^aḍḍhalābusamā thanā. eṇeyyakā yathā^eb^ti eṇīmigassa hi dīghā ca vaṭṭā ca gīvā sobhati yathā, evaṃ tava gīvā thokaṃ dīghā. ^b^kambutalābhāsā^eb^ti suvaṇṇāliṅgatalasannibhā gīvāti attho. ^b^paṇḍarāvaraṇā^eb^ti dantāvaraṇā. ^b^catutthamanasannibhā^eb^ti catutthamano vuccati catutthamanavatthubhūtā jivhā. abhirattabhāvena jivhāsadisaṃ te oṭṭhapariyosānanti vadati. ^b^uddhaggā^eb^ti heṭṭhimadantā. ^b^adhaggā^eb^ti uparimadantā. ^b^dumaggaparimajjitā^eb^ti ^a^P5.0157^ea^ dantakaṭṭhaparimajjitā parisuddhā. ^b^duvijā^eb^ti dvijā. ^b^nelasambhūtā^eb^ti niddosesu hanumaṃsapariyosānesu sambhūtā.

[03] ^b^apaṇḍarā^eb^ti kaṇhā. ^b^lohitantā^eb^ti rattapariyantā. ^b^jiñjūkaphalasannibhā^eb^ti rattaṭṭhāne jiñjukaphalasadisā. ^b^sudassanā^eb^ti passantānaṃ atittikarā pañcapasādasamannāgatā. ^b^nātidīghā^eb^ti pamāṇayuttā. ^b^susammaṭṭhā^eb^ti suṭṭhu sammaṭṭhā. ^b^kanakabyāsamocitā^eb^ti kanakabyā vuccati suvaṇṇaphaṇikā, tāya gandhatelaṃ ādāya paharitā suracitā. ^b^kasigorakkhā^eb^ti iminā kasiñca gorakkhañca nissāya jīvanakasatte dasseti. ^b^yā gatī^eb^ti yattakā nipphatti. ^b^parakkanta^eb^nti yattakaṃ isīnaṃ parakkantaṃ, vitthārīkatā imasmiṃ himavante yattakā isayo vasantīti attho. ^b^na te samasama^eb^nti tesu sabbesu ekampi rūpalīḷāvilāsādisamatāya tayā samānaṃ na passāmi. ^b^ko vā tva^eb^nti idaṃ tassā itthibhāvaṃ jānanto purisavohāravasena pucchati.
[03] evaṃ pādato paṭṭhāya yāva kesā attano vaṇṇaṃ bhāsante tāpase alambusā tuṇhī hutvā tassā kathāya yathānusandhiṃ gatāya tassa sammūḷhabhāvaṃ ñatvā gāthamāha --
[22] ehi taṃ upagūhissaṃ, ratīnaṃ kusalo bhavā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0168^ea^ ^b^kassapevaṃ gate satī^eb^ti kassapagotta evaṃ tava citte pavatte sati pañhakālo na hoti. ^b^sammā^eb^ti vayassa, piyavacanālapanametaṃ. ^b^ratīna^eb^nti pañcakāmaguṇaratīnaṃ.

[03] evaṃ vatvā alambusā cintesi -- ``nāyaṃ mayi ṭhitāya hatthapāsaṃ āgamissati, gacchantī viya bhavissāmī''ti. sā itthimāyākusalatāya tāpasaṃ anupasaṅkamitvā āgatamaggābhimukhī pāyāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[03] atha ^a^P5.0158^ea^ naṃ tāpaso gacchantiṃ disvā ``ayaṃ gacchatī''ti attano dandhaparakkamaṃ mandagamanaṃ chinditvā vegena dhāvitvā kesesu hatthena parāmasi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] cavitamhi brahmacariyā, yathā taṃ atha tositā..
[21] ``na ^a^M5.0169^ea^ juhe na jape mante, aggihuttaṃ pahāpitaṃ.
[22] ko nu me pāricariyāya, pubbe cittaṃ palobhayi..
[21] ``araññe me viharato, yo me tejā ha sambhutaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^ajjhappatto^eb^ti sampatto. ^b^tamudāvatta kalyāṇī^eb^ti taṃ kese parāmasitvā ṭhitaṃ isiṃ udāvattitvā nivattitvā kalyāṇadassanā sā suṭṭhu sobhanā. ^b^palissajī^eb^ti āliṅgi. ^b^cavitamhi brahmacariyā, yathā taṃ atha tositā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, tassa isino tāvadeva jhānaṃ antaradhāyi. tasmiṃ tamhā jhānā brahmacariyā cavite yathā taṃ sakkena patthitaṃ, tatheva ahosi. atha sakkassa patthanāya samiddhabhāvaṃ viditvā sā devakaññā tositā, tassa tena brahmacariyavināsena sañjanitapītipāmojjāti attho.

[03] ^b^manasā agamā^eb^ti sā taṃ āliṅgitvā ṭhitā ``aho vata sakko pallaṅkaṃ me peseyyā''ti evaṃ pavattena manasā indaṃ agamā. ^b^nandane vane^eb^ti nandijananasamatthatāya nandanavanasaṅkhāte tāvatiṃsabhavane vasantaṃ. ^b^devakuñjaro^eb^ti devaseṭṭho ^a^P5.0159^ea^. ^b^pahiṇī^eb^ti pesesi. ``pāhiṇī''tipi pāṭho. ^b^sopavāhana^eb^nti saparivāraṃ. ^b^sauttaracchadapaññāsa^eb^nti paññāsāya uttaracchadehi paṭicchāditaṃ. ^b^sahassapaṭiyatthata^eb^nti sahassadibbakojavatthataṃ. ^b^tamenaṃ tatthā^eb^ti taṃ isisiṅgaṃ tattha dibbapallaṅke nisinnā sā ure katvā dhāresi. ^b^tīṇi vassānī^eb^ti ekamuhuttaṃ viya manussagaṇanāya tīṇi vassāni taṃ ure nipajjāpetvā tattha nisinnā dhāresi.

[03] ^b^vimado^eb^ti ^a^V5.0154^ea^ nimmado vigatasaññabhāvo. so hi tīṇi saṃvaccharāni visañño sayitvā pacchā paṭiladdhasañño pabujjhi. tasmiṃ pabujjhamāne hatthādiphandanaṃ disvāva alambusā tassa pabujjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pallaṅkaṃ antaradhāpetvā sayampi antarahitā aṭṭhāsi. ^b^addasāsī^eb^ti so assamapadaṃ olokento ``kena nu khomhi sīlavināsaṃ pāpito''ti cintetvā mahantena saddena paridevamāno addasāsi. ^b^haritarukkhe^eb^ti aggiyāyanasaṅkhātaṃ aggisālaṃ samantā parivāretvā ṭhite haritapattarukkhe. ^b^navapattavana^eb^nti taruṇehi navapattehi sañchannaṃ vanaṃ. ^b^ruda^eb^nti paridevanto.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^M5.0170^ea^ ^b^juhe na jape mante^eb^ti ayamassa paridevanagāthā. ^b^pahāpita^eb^nti hāpitaṃ, ^b^pa^eb^-kāro upasaggamattaṃ. ^b^pāricariyāyā^eb^ti ko nu kilesapāricariyāya ito pubbe mama cittaṃ palobhayīti paridevati. ^b^yo me tejā ha sambhuta^eb^nti ^b^ha^eb^-kāro nipātamattaṃ. yo mama samaṇatejena sambhūtaṃ jhānaguṇaṃ nānāratanaparipuṇṇaṃ mahantaṃ mahaṇṇave nāvaṃ viya gaṇhi, vināsaṃ pāpesi, ko nāmesoti paridevatīti.
[03] taṃ sutvā alambusā cintesi -- ``sacāhaṃ na kathessāmi, ayaṃ me abhisapissati, handassa kathessāmī''ti. sā dissamānena kāyena ṭhatvā gāthamāha --
[22] avadhiṃ cittaṃ cittena, pamādo tvaṃ na bujjhasī''ti..
[03] so tassā kathaṃ sutvā pitarā dinnaovādaṃ saritvā ``pitu vacanaṃ akatvā mahāvināsaṃ pattomhī''ti paridevanto catasso gāthāyo abhāsi --
[22] iccānusāsi maṃ tāto, yathā maṃ anukampako..
[22] puna vā tādiso hessaṃ, maraṇaṃ me bhavissatī''ti..

[01] tattha ^b^imānī^eb^ti imāni vacanāni. ^b^kamalāsadisitthiyo^eb^ti kamalā vuccati nāripupphalatā, tāsaṃ pupphasadisā itthiyo. ^b^tāyo bujjhesi māṇavā^eb^ti māṇava tvaṃ tāyo jāneyyāsi, ñatvā dassanapathaṃ agantvā palāpeyyāsīti yāni evarūpāni vacanāni tadā maṃ tāto anusāsati, imāni kira tānīti. ^b^uregaṇḍāyo^eb^ti uramhi dvīhi gaṇḍehi samannāgatā. ^b^tāyo bujjhesi, māṇavā^eb^ti, māṇava, tāyo attano ^a^M5.0171^ea^ vasaṃ gate vināsaṃ pāpentīti tvaṃ jāneyyāsi. ^b^nāka^eb^nti nākariṃ. ^b^jhāyāmī^eb^ti pajjhāyāmi paridevāmi. ^b^dhiratthu jīvitena me^eb^ti dhiratthu garahitaṃ mama jīvitaṃ, jīvitena me ko attho. ^b^puna vā^eb^ti tathā karissāmi, yathā puna vā tādiso bhavissāmi, naṭṭhaṃ jhānaṃ uppādetvā vītarāgo bhavissāmi, maraṇaṃ vā me bhavissatīti.
[01] so kāmarāgaṃ pahāya puna jhānaṃ uppādesi. athassa samaṇatejaṃ disvā jhānassa ca uppāditabhāvaṃ ñatvā alambusā bhītā khamāpesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā dve gāthāyo abhāsi --
[21] ``mā me kujjha mahāvīra, mā me kujjha mahāise.
[27] mahā attho mayā ciṇṇo, tidasānaṃ yasassinaṃ.
[22] tayā pakampitaṃ āsi, sabbaṃ devapuraṃ tadā''ti..
[03] atha naṃ so ``khamāmi te, bhadde, yathāsukhaṃ gacchā''ti vissajjento gāthamāha --
[22] tvañca bhadde sukhī hohi, gaccha kaññe yathāsukha''nti..
[03] sā taṃ vanditvā teneva suvaṇṇapallaṅkena devapuraṃ gatā. tamatthaṃ ^a^P5.0161^ea^ pakāsento satthā tisso gāthāyo abhāsi --
[21] ``tassa ^a^V5.0156^ea^ pāde gahetvāna, katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ.
[22] patīto sumano vitto, devindo adadā vara''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^M5.0172^ea^ ^b^okkamivā^eb^ti dīpakaṃ viya. ``patīto''tiādīhi tuṭṭhākārova dassito ^b^adadā vara^eb^nti āgantvā vanditvā ṭhitāya tuṭṭho varaṃ adāsi.
[03] sā tassa santike varaṃ gaṇhantī osānagāthamāha --
[21] nisippalobhikā gacche, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare''ti..
[03] tassattho -- ``sakka devarāja, sace me tvaṃ varaṃ ado, puna isipalobhikāya na gaccheyyaṃ, mā maṃ etadatthāya pahiṇeyyāsi, etaṃ varaṃ vare yācāmī''ti.

[01] satthā tassa bhikkhuno imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. tadā alambusā purāṇadutiyikā ahosi, isisiṅgo ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu, pitā mahāisi pana ahameva ahosinti.

[03] ^b^ariyāvakāsosī^eb^ti ^a^V5.0157^ea^ idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uposathakammaṃ ārabbha kathesi. tadā hi satthā uposathike upāsake sampahaṃsetvā ``porāṇakapaṇḍitā mahatiṃ nāgasampattiṃ pahāya uposathavāsaṃ upavasiṃsuyevā''ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.

[03] atīte rājagahe magadharājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi. tadā bodhisatto tassa rañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti, ``duyyodhano''tissa nāmaṃ kariṃsu. so vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā āgantvā pitu sippaṃ dassesi. atha naṃ pitā rajje abhisiñcitvā isipabbajjaṃ ^a^P5.0162^ea^ pabbajitvā uyyāne vasi. bodhisatto divasassa tikkhattuṃ pitu santikaṃ agamāsi. tassa mahālābhasakkāro udapādi. so teneva palibodhena kasiṇaparikammamattampi kātuṃ asakkonto cintesi -- ``mahā me ^a^M5.0173^ea^ lābhasakkāro, na sakkā mayā idha vasantena imaṃ jaṭaṃ chindituṃ, puttassa me anārocetvāva aññattha gamissāmī''ti. so kañci ajānāpetvā uyyānā nikkhamitvā magadharaṭṭhaṃ atikkamitvā mahisakaraṭṭhe saṅkhapāladahato nāma nikkhantāya kaṇṇaveṇṇāya nadiyā nivattane candakapabbataṃ upanissāya paṇṇasālaṃ katvā tattha vasanto kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā jhānābhiññā nibbattetvā uñchācariyāya yāpesi. tamenaṃ saṅkhapālo nāma nāgarājā mahantena parivārena kaṇṇaveṇṇanadito nikkhamitvā antarantarā upasaṅkamati. so tassa dhammaṃ desesi. athassa putto pitaraṃ daṭṭhukāmo gataṭṭhānaṃ ajānanto anuvicārāpetvā ``asukaṭṭhāne nāma vasatī''ti ñatvā tassa dassanatthāya mahantena parivārena tattha gantvā ekamante khandhavāraṃ nivāsetvā katipayehi amaccehi saddhiṃ assamapadābhimukho pāyāsi.

[03] tasmiṃ khaṇe saṅkhapālo mahantena parivārena dhammaṃ suṇanto nisīdi. so taṃ rājānaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā isiṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. rājā pitaraṃ vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā nisīditvā pucchi -- ``bhante, katararājā nāmesa tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgato''ti. tāta, saṅkhapālanāgarājā nāmesoti. so tassa sampattiṃ nissāya nāgabhavane lobhaṃ katvā katipāhaṃ vasitvā pitu bhikkhāhāraṃ nibaddhaṃ dāpetvā attano nagarameva gantvā catūsu dvāresu dānasālāyo kāretvā sakalajambudīpaṃ saṅkhobhento dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā nāgabhavanaṃ patthetvā āyupariyosāne nāgabhavane nibbattitvā saṅkhapālanāgarājā ahosi ^a^P5.0163^ea^. so gacchante kāle tāya sampattiyā vippaṭisārī hutvā tato paṭṭhāya manussayoniṃ patthento ^a^V5.0158^ea^ uposathavāsaṃ vasi. athassa nāgabhavane vasantassa uposathavāso na sampajjati, sīlavināsaṃ pāpuṇāti. so tato paṭṭhāya nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā kaṇṇaveṇṇāya nadiyā avidūre mahāmaggassa ca ekapadikamaggassa ca antare ekaṃ vammikaṃ parikkhipitvā uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samādinnasīlo ``mama cammamaṃsādīhi atthikā cammamaṃsādīni harantū''ti attānaṃ dānamukhe vissajjetvā vammikamatthake nipanno samaṇadhammaṃ karonto cātuddase pannarase vasitvā pāṭipade nāgabhavanaṃ gacchati.

[03] tasmiṃ ^a^M5.0174^ea^ ekadivasaṃ evaṃ sīlaṃ samādiyitvā nipanne paccantagāmavāsino soḷasa janā ``maṃsaṃ āharissāmā''ti āvudhahatthā araññe vicarantā kiñci alabhitvā nikkhantā taṃ vammikamatthake nipannaṃ disvā ``mayaṃ ajja godhāpotakampi na labhimhā, imaṃ nāgarājānaṃ vadhitvā khādissāmā''ti cintetvā ``mahā kho panesa gayhamāno palāyeyya, yathānipannameva taṃ bhogesu sūlehi vijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā gaṇhissāmā''ti sūlāni ādāya upasaṅkamiṃsu. bodhisattassa sarīraṃ mahantaṃ ekadoṇikanāvappamāṇaṃ vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitasumanapupphadāmaṃ viya jiñjukaphalasannibhehi akkhīhi jayasumanapupphasadisena ca sīsena samannāgataṃ ativiya sobhati. so tesaṃ soḷasannaṃ janānaṃ padasaddena bhogantarato sīsaṃ nīharitvā rattakkhīni ummīletvā te sūlahatthe āgacchante disvā cintesi -- ``ajja mayhaṃ manoratho matthakaṃ pāpuṇissati, ahaṃ attānaṃ dānamukhe niyyādetvā vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā nipanno, ime mama sarīraṃ sattīhi koṭṭetvā chiddāvachiddaṃ karonte kodhavasena akkhīni ummīletvā na olokessāmī''ti attano sīlabhedabhayena daḷhaṃ adhiṭṭhāya ^a^P5.0164^ea^ sīsaṃ bhogantareyeva pavesetvā nipajji. atha naṃ te upagantvā naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā kaḍḍhantā bhūmiyaṃ pothetvā tikhiṇasūlehi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vijjhitvā sakaṇṭakakāḷavettayaṭṭhiyo pahāramukhehi pavesetvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kājenādāya mahāmaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu, mahāsatto sūlehi vijjhanato paṭṭhāya ekaṭṭhānepi kodhavasena akkhīni ummīletvā te na olokesi. tassa aṭṭhahi kājehi ādāya nīyamānassa sīsaṃ olambetvā bhūmiyaṃ pahari. atha naṃ ``sīsamassa olambatī''ti mahāmagge nipajjāpetvā taruṇasūlena nāsāpuṭaṃ vijjhitvā rajjukaṃ pavesetvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā kājakoṭiyaṃ laggitvā punapi ukkhipitvā maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.

[03] tasmiṃ khaṇe videharaṭṭhe mithilanagaravāsī āḷāro nāma kuṭumbiko pañca sakaṭasatāni ādāya sukhayānake nisīditvā gacchanto te bhojaputte bodhisattaṃ tathā gaṇhitvā gacchante disvā tesaṃ soḷasannampi soḷasahi vāhagoṇehi saddhiṃ pasataṃ pasataṃ suvaṇṇamāsake sabbesaṃ nivāsanapārupanāni ^a^V5.0159^ea^ bhariyānampi nesaṃ vatthābharaṇāni datvā vissajjāpesi. atha so nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā tattha papañcaṃ akatvā mahantena ^a^M5.0175^ea^ parivārena nikkhamitvā āḷāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nāgabhavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā taṃ ādāya nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā tīhi nāgakaññāsatehi saddhiṃ mahantamassa yasaṃ datvā dibbehi kāmehi santappesi. āḷāro nāgabhavane ekavassaṃ vasitvā dibbakāme paribhuñjitvā ``icchāmahaṃ, samma, pabbajitu''nti nāgarājassa kathetvā pabbajitaparikkhāre gahetvā nāgabhavanato himavantappadesaṃ gantvā pabbajitvā tattha ciraṃ vasitvā aparabhāge cārikaṃ caranto bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase bhikkhāya nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājadvāraṃ agamāsi. atha naṃ bārāṇasirājā disvā iriyāpathe pasīditvā pakkosāpetvā paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhojetvā ^a^P5.0165^ea^ aññatarasmiṃ nīce āsane nisinno vanditvā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] kathaṃ nu vittāni pahāya bhoge, pabbaji nikkhamma gharā sapaññā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ariyāvakāsosī^eb^ti niddosasundarasarīrāvakāsosi, abhirūposīti attho. ^b^pasannanetto^eb^ti pañcahi pasādehi yuttanetto. ^b^kulamhā^eb^ti khattiyakulā vā brāhmaṇakulā vā seṭṭhikulā vā pabbajitosīti maññāmi. ^b^kathaṃ nū^eb^ti kena kāraṇena kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā dhanañca upabhoge ca pahāya gharā nikkhamitvā pabbajitosi sapañña paṇḍitapurisāti pucchati.
[03] tato paraṃ tāpasassa ca rañño ca vacanappaṭivacanavasena gāthānaṃ sambandho veditabbo --
[22] disvāna puññāna mahāvipākaṃ, saddhāyahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja..
[21] ``na ^a^M5.0176^ea^ kāmakāmā na bhayā na dosā, vācaṃ musā pabbajitā bhaṇanti.
[22] akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, sutvāna me jāyihitippasādo..
[22] pavaḍḍhakāyaṃ uragaṃ mahantaṃ, ādāya gacchante pamodamāne..
[21] ``sohaṃ ^a^V5.0160^ea^ samāgamma janinda tehi, pahaṭṭhalomo avacamhi bhīto.
[22] kuhiṃ ayaṃ nīyati bhīmakāyo, nāgena kiṃ kāhatha bhojaputtā..
[21] ``nāgo ^a^P5.0166^ea^ ayaṃ nīyati bhojanatthā, pavaḍḍhakāyo urago mahanto.
[22] sāduñca thūlañca muduñca maṃsaṃ, na tvaṃ rasaññāsi videhaputta..
[21] ``ito mayaṃ gantvā sakaṃ niketaṃ, ādāya satthāni vikopayitvā.
[22] maṃsāni bhokkhāma pamodamānā, mayañhi ve sattavo pannagānaṃ..
[21] ``sace ayaṃ nīyati bhojanatthā, pavaḍḍhakāyo urago mahanto.
[22] dadāmi vo balibaddāni soḷasa, nāgaṃ imaṃ muñcatha bandhanasmā..
[21] ``addhā hi no bhakkho ayaṃ manāpo, bahū ca no uragā bhuttapubbā.
[22] karoma te taṃ vacanaṃ aḷāra, mittañca no hohi videhaputta..
[21] ``tadāssu ^a^M5.0177^ea^ te bandhanā mocayiṃsu, yaṃ natthuto paṭimokkassa pāse.
[22] mutto ca so bandhanā nāgarājā, pakkāmi pācīnamukho muhuttaṃ..
[21] ``gantvāna pācīnamukho muhuttaṃ, puṇṇehi nettehi palokayī maṃ.
[22] tadāssahaṃ piṭṭhito anvagacchiṃ, dasaṅguliṃ añjaliṃ paggahetvā..
[21] ``gaccheva kho tvaṃ taramānarūpo, mā taṃ amittā punaraggahesuṃ.
[22] dukkho hi luddehi punā samāgamo, adassanaṃ bhojaputtāna gaccha..
[21] ``agamāsi so rahadaṃ vippasannaṃ, nīlobhāsaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ sutitthaṃ.
[22] samotataṃ ^a^P5.0167^ea^ jambuhi vetasāhi, pāvekkhi nittiṇṇabhayo patīto..
[21] ``so taṃ pavissa nacirassa nāgo, dibbena me pāturahū janinda.
[22] upaṭṭhahī maṃ pitaraṃva putto, hadayaṅgamaṃ kaṇṇasukhaṃ bhaṇanto..
[21] ``tvaṃ ^a^V5.0161^ea^ mesi mātā ca pitā aḷāra, abbhantaro pāṇadado sahāyo.
[27] sakañca iddhiṃ paṭilābhakosmi, aḷāra passa me nivesanāni.

[03] tattha ^b^vimāna^eb^nti saṅkhapālanāgarañño anekasatanāṭakasampattisampannaṃ kañcanamaṇivimānaṃ. ^b^puññāna^eb^nti tena katapuññānaṃ mahantaṃ vipākaṃ disvā kammañca ^a^M5.0178^ea^ phalañca paralokañca saddahitvā pavattāya saddhāya ahaṃ pabbajito. ^b^na kāmakāmā^eb^ti na vatthukāmenapi bhayenapi dosenapi musā bhaṇanti. ^b^jāyihitī^eb^ti, bhante, tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā mayhampi pasādo somanassaṃ jāyissati. ^b^vāṇijja^eb^nti vāṇijjakammaṃ karissāmīti gacchanto. ^b^pathe addasāsimhī^eb^ti pañcannaṃ sakaṭasatānaṃ purato sukhayānake nisīditvā gacchanto mahāmagge janapadamanusse addasaṃ. ^b^pavaḍḍhakāya^eb^nti vaḍḍhitakāyaṃ. ^b^ādāyā^eb^ti aṭṭhahi kājehi gahetvā. ^b^avacamhī^eb^ti abhāsiṃ. ^b^bhīmakāyo^eb^ti bhayajanakakāyo. ^b^bhojaputtā^eb^ti luddaputtake piyasamudācārenālapati. ^b^videhaputtā^eb^ti videharaṭṭhavāsitāya āḷāraṃ ālapiṃsu. ^b^vikopayitvā^eb^ti chinditvā. ^b^mayañhi vo sattavo^eb^ti mayaṃ pana nāgānaṃ verino nāma. ^b^bhojanatthā^eb^ti bhojanatthāya. ^b^mittañca no hohī^eb^ti tvaṃ amhākaṃ mitto hohi, kataguṇaṃ jāna.

[03] ^b^tadāssu te^eb^ti, mahārāja, tehi bhojaputtehi evaṃ vutte ahaṃ tesaṃ soḷasa vāhagoṇe nivāsanapārupanāni pasataṃ pasataṃ suvaṇṇamāsake bhariyānañca nesaṃ vatthālaṅkāraṃ adāsiṃ, atha te saṅkhapālanāgarājānaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā attano kakkhaḷatāya sakaṇṭakakāḷavettalatāya koṭiyaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhituṃ ārabhiṃsu. athāhaṃ nāgarājānaṃ kilamantaṃ disvā akilamentova asinā tā latā chinditvā dārakānaṃ kaṇṇavedhato vaṭṭinīharaṇaniyāmena adukkhāpento saṇikaṃ nīhariṃ, tasmiṃ kāle te bhojaputtā yaṃ bandhanaṃ assa natthuto pavesetvā pāse paṭimokkaṃ, tasmā bandhanā taṃ ^a^P5.0168^ea^ uragaṃ mocayiṃsu. tassa nāsato saha pāsena taṃ rajjukaṃ nīhariṃsūti dīpeti. iti te uragaṃ vissajjetvā thokaṃ gantvā ``ayaṃ urago dubbalo, matakāle naṃ gahetvā gamissāmā''ti nilīyiṃsu.

[03] ^b^puṇṇehī^eb^ti sopi muhuttaṃ pācīnābhimukho gantvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi maṃ palokayi. ^b^tadāssaha^eb^nti tadā assa ahaṃ. ^b^gacchevā^eb^ti evaṃ taṃ avacanti vadati. ^b^rahada^eb^nti kaṇṇaveṇṇadahaṃ. ^b^samotata^eb^nti ubhayatīresu jamburukkhavetasarukkhehi otataṃ vitataṃ. ^b^nittiṇṇabhayo patīto^eb^ti so ^a^M5.0179^ea^ kira taṃ dahaṃ pavisanto āḷārassa nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā yāva naṅguṭṭhā otari, udake ^a^V5.0162^ea^ paviṭṭhaṭṭhānamevassa nibbhayaṃ ahosi, tasmā nittiṇṇabhayo patīto haṭṭhatuṭṭho pāvekkhīti. ^b^pavissā^eb^ti pavisitvā. ^b^dibbena me^eb^ti nāgabhavane pamādaṃ anāpajjitvā mayi kaṇṇaveṇṇatīraṃ anatikkanteyeva dibbena parivārena mama purato pāturahosi. ^b^upaṭṭhahī^eb^ti upāgami. ^b^abbhantaro^eb^ti hadayamaṃsasadiso. tvaṃ mama bahupakāro, sakkāraṃ te karissāmi. ^b^passa me nivesanānī^eb^ti mama nāgabhavanaṃ passa. ^b^masakkasāraṃ viyā^eb^ti masakkasāro vuccati osakkanaparisakkanābhāvena ghanasāratāya ca sinerupabbatarājā. ayaṃ tattha māpitaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ sandhāyevamāha.
[03] mahārāja! evaṃ vatvā so nāgarājā uttari attano nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇento gāthādvayamāha --
[21] ``taṃ bhūmibhāgehi upetarūpaṃ, asakkharā ceva mudū subhā ca.
[22] nīcattiṇā apparajā ca bhūmi, pāsādikā yattha jahanti sokaṃ..
[22] pakkā ca pesī ca phalā suphullā, niccotukā dhārayantī phalānī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^asakkharā^eb^ti yā tattha bhūmi pāsāṇasakkhararahitā mudu subhā kañcanarajatamaṇimayā sattaratanavālukākiṇṇā. ^b^nīcattiṇā^eb^ti indagopakapiṭṭhisadisavaṇṇehi nīcatiṇehi samannāgatā. ^b^apparajā^eb^ti paṃsurahitā. ^b^yattha jahanti soka^eb^nti yattha paviṭṭhamattāva nissokā honti. ^b^anāvakulā^eb^ti ^a^P5.0169^ea^ na avakulā akhāṇumā upari ukkulavikulabhāvarahitā vā samasaṇṭhitā. ^b^veḷuriyūpanīlā^eb^ti veḷuriyena upanīlā, tasmiṃ nāgabhavane veḷuriyamayā pasannasalilā nīlobhāsā anekavaṇṇakamaluppalasañchannā pokkharaṇīti attho. ^b^catuddisa^eb^nti tassā pokkharaṇiyā catūsu disāsu. ^b^pakkā cā^eb^ti tasmiṃ ambavane ambarukkhā pakkaphalā ca ^a^M5.0180^ea^ aḍḍhapakkaphalā ca taruṇaphalā ca phullitāyevāti attho. ^b^niccotukā^eb^ti channampi utūnaṃ anurūpehi pupphaphalehi samannāgatāti.
[21] tesaṃ vanānaṃ naradeva majjhe, nivesanaṃ bhassarasannikāsaṃ.
[22] sahassathambhaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, yatthassa bhariyā mahesī ahosi..
[21] ``ekā ca nārī taramānarūpā, ādāya veḷuriyamayaṃ mahagghaṃ.
[21] ``tato maṃ urago hatthe gahetvā, nisīdayī pāmukhāasanasmiṃ.
[22] idamāsanaṃ atra bhavaṃ nisīdatu, bhavañhi me aññataro garūnaṃ..
[21] ``aññā ca nārī taramānarūpā, ādāya vāriṃ upasaṅkamitvā.
[22] pādāni pakkhālayī me janinda, bhariyāva bhattū patino piyassa..
[21] ``aparā ^a^P5.0170^ea^ ^a^M5.0181^ea^ ca nārī taramānarūpā, paggayha sovaṇṇamayāya pātiyā.
[22] anekasūpaṃ vividhaṃ viyañjanaṃ, upanāmayī bhatta manuññarūpaṃ..
[21] ``turiyehi maṃ bhārata bhuttavantaṃ, upaṭṭhahuṃ bhattu mano viditvā.
[22] tatuttariṃ maṃ nipatī mahantaṃ, dibbehi kāmehi anappakehī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^nivesana^eb^nti pāsādo. ^b^bhassarasannikāsa^eb^nti pabhassaradassanaṃ. ^b^rajataggaḷa^eb^nti rajatadvārakavāṭaṃ. ^b^maṇīmayā^eb^ti evarūpā tattha kūṭāgārā ca gabbhā ca. ^b^paripūrā^eb^ti sampuṇṇā. ^b^so saṅkhapālo^eb^ti, mahārāja, ahaṃ evaṃ tasmiṃ nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇente taṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosiṃ, atha maṃ tattha netvā so saṅkhapālo hatthe gahetvā taramāno veḷuriyathambhehi sahassathambhaṃ pāsādaṃ āruyha yasmiṃ ṭhāne assa mahesī ahosi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ netīti dīpeti. ^b^ekā cā^eb^ti mayi pāsādaṃ abhiruḷhe ekā itthī aññehi maṇīhi jātimahantehi upetaṃ subhaṃ veḷuriyāsanaṃ tena nāgarājena avuttāva. ^b^abbhihāsī^eb^ti abhihari, attharīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^pāmukhāasanasmi^eb^nti pamukhāsanasmiṃ, uttamāsane nisīdāpesīti attho. ^b^garūna^eb^nti mātāpitūnaṃ ^a^V5.0164^ea^ me tvaṃ aññataroti evaṃ vatvā nisīdāpesi. ^b^vividhaṃ viyañjana^eb^nti vividhaṃ byañjanaṃ. ^b^bhatta manuññarūpa^eb^nti bhattaṃ manuññarūpaṃ. ^b^bhāratā^eb^ti rājānaṃ ālapati. ^b^bhuttavanta^eb^nti bhuttāviṃ katabhattakiccaṃ. ^b^upaṭṭhahu^eb^nti anekasatehi turiyehi gandhabbaṃ kurumānā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. ^b^bhattu mano viditvā^eb^ti attano patino cittaṃ jānitvā. ^b^tatuttari^eb^nti tato gandhabbakaraṇato uttariṃ. ^b^maṃ nipatī^eb^ti so nāgarājā maṃ upasaṅkami. ^b^mahantaṃ dibbehī^eb^ti mahantehi uḷārehi dibbehi kāmehi tehi ca anappakehi.
[22] aḷāra etāssu te kāmakārā, dadāmi te tā paricārayassū''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0182^ea^ ^b^sabbattamajjhā^eb^ti sabbā attamajjhā, pāṇinā gahitappamāṇamajjhāti attho. aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ``sumajjhā''ti pāṭho. ^b^padumuttarābhā^eb^ti ^a^P5.0171^ea^ padumavaṇṇauttarābhā, padumavaṇṇauttaracchaviyoti attho. ^b^paricārayassū^eb^ti tā attano pādaparicārikā karohīti vatvā tīhi itthisatehi saddhiṃ mahāsampattiṃ mayhaṃ adāsi.
[22] nāgassidaṃ kinti kathañca laddhaṃ, kathajjhagamāsi vimānaseṭṭhaṃ..
[21] ``adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^dibbarasānubhutvā^eb^ti dibbe kāmaguṇarase anubhavitvā. ^b^tadāssuha^eb^nti tadā assu ahaṃ. ^b^nāgassida^eb^nti bhadramukhassa saṅkhapālanāgarājassa idaṃ sampattijātaṃ ^b^kinti^eb^ kiṃ nāma kammaṃ katvā kathañca katvā laddhaṃ, kathametaṃ vimānaseṭṭhaṃ tvaṃ ajjhagamāsi, iti naṃ ahaṃ pucchiṃ. ^b^adhiccaladdha^eb^nti ahetunā laddhaṃ. ^b^pariṇāmajaṃ te^eb^ti kenaci tava atthāya pariṇāmitattā pariṇāmato jātaṃ. ^b^sayaṃkata^eb^nti kārake pakkosāpetvā ratanāni datvā kāritanti.
[21] ``nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkataṃ nāpi devehi dinnaṃ.
[22] sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ..
[21] ``kiṃ ^a^M5.0183^ea^ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko.
[22] akkhāhi me nāgarājetamatthaṃ, kathaṃ nu te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ..
[22] so ^a^P5.0172^ea^ ittaraṃ jīvitaṃ saṃviditvā, asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ..
[21] ``annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ.
[22] opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca..
[22] acchādanaṃ sayanamathannapānaṃ, sakkacca dānāni adamha tattha..
[21] ``taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko.
[27] teneva me laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, pahūtabhakkhaṃ bahuannapānaṃ.
[22] naccehi gītehi cupetarūpaṃ, ciraṭṭhitikaṃ na ca sassatāyaṃ..
[22] kimeva dāṭhāvudha kiṃ paṭicca, hatthattamāgacchi vanibbakānaṃ..
[21] ``bhayaṃ nu te anvagataṃ mahantaṃ, tejo nu te nānvagaṃ dantamūlaṃ.
[22] kimeva dāṭhāvudha kiṃ paṭicca, kilesamāpajji vanibbakānaṃ..
[21] ``na ^a^M5.0184^ea^ me bhayaṃ anvagataṃ mahantaṃ, tejo na sakkā mama tehi hantuṃ.
[22] athāgamuṃ soḷasa bhojaputtā, rajjuṃ gahetvāna daḷhañca pāsaṃ..
[21] ``bhetvāna ^a^P5.0173^ea^ nāsaṃ atikassa rajjuṃ, nayiṃsu maṃ samparigayha luddā.
[21] ``ekāyane taṃ pathe addasaṃsu, balena vaṇṇena cupetarūpaṃ.
[22] siriyā paññāya ca bhāvitosi, kiṃ patthayaṃ nāga tapo karosi..
[21] ``na puttahetū na dhanassa hetū, na āyuno cāpi aḷāra hetu.
[22] manussayoniṃ abhipatthayāno, tasmā parakkama tapo karomi..
[22] pucchāmi taṃ nāgarājetamatthaṃ, seyyo ito kena manussaloko..
[21] ``aḷāra ^a^M5.0185^ea^ nāññatra manussalokā, suddhīva saṃvijjati saṃyamo vā.
[22] ahañca laddhāna manussayoniṃ, kāhāmi jātimaraṇassa antaṃ..
[21] ``saṃvaccharo me vasato tavantike, annena pānena upaṭṭhitosmi.
[22] āmantayitvāna palemi nāga, cirappavuṭṭhosmi ahaṃ janinda..
[21] ``puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca, niccānusiṭṭhā upatiṭṭhathetaṃ.
[22] kaccinnu ^a^P5.0174^ea^ taṃ nābhisapittha koci, piyañhi me dassanaṃ tuyhaṃ aḷāra..
[21] ``yathāpi mātū ca pitū agāre, putto piyo paṭivihito vaseyya.
[22] tatopi mayhaṃ idhameva seyyo, cittañhi te nāga mayī pasannaṃ..
[21] ``maṇī ^a^V5.0167^ea^ mamaṃ vijjati lohitaṅko, dhanāharo maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ.
[22] ādāya tvaṃ gaccha sakaṃ niketaṃ, laddhā dhanaṃ taṃ maṇimossajassū''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^kiṃ te vata^eb^nti kiṃ tava vatasamādānaṃ. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti seṭṭhacariyaṃ. ^b^opānabhūta^eb^nti catumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇī viya dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjitabbavibhavaṃ. ^b^na ca sassatāya^eb^nti ciraṭṭhitikaṃ samānampi ce taṃ mayhaṃ sassataṃ na hotīti me katheti.

[03] ^b^appānubhāvā^eb^ti bhojaputte sandhāyāha. ^b^hantī^eb^ti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu sūlehi vijjhantā kiṃkāraṇā haniṃsu. ^b^kiṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti kiṃ sandhāya tvaṃ tadā tesaṃ hatthattaṃ āgacchi vasaṃ upagato. ^b^vanibbakāna^eb^nti bhojaputtā idha ``vanibbakā''ti vuttā. ^b^tejo nu te nānvagaṃ dantamūla^eb^nti kiṃ nu tava tejo ^a^M5.0186^ea^ bhojaputte disvā tadā bhayaṃ mahantaṃ anvagataṃ, udāhu visaṃ dantamūlaṃ na anvagataṃ. ^b^kilesa^eb^nti dukkhaṃ. ^b^vanibbakāna^eb^nti bhojaputtānaṃ santike, bhojaputte nissāyāti attho.

[03] ^b^tejo na sakkā mama tehi hantu^eb^nti mama visatejo aññassa tejena abhihantumpi na sakkā. ^b^sata^eb^nti buddhādīnaṃ. ^b^dhammānī^eb^ti sīlasamādhipaññākhantianuddayamettābhāvanāsaṅkhātāni dhammāni. ^b^sukittitānī^eb^ti suvaṇṇitāni sukathitāni. kinti katvā? ^b^samuddavelāva duraccayānī^eb^ti tehi samuddavelā viya sappurisehi jīvitatthampi duraccayānīti vaṇṇitāni, tasmā ahaṃ sīlabhedabhayena khantimettādisamannāgato hutvā mama kopassa sīlavelantaṃ atikkamituṃ na adāsinti āha.

[02] ``imissā pana saṅkhapāladhammadesanāya dasapi pāramiyo labbhanti. tadā hi mahāsattena sarīrassa pariccattabhāvo dānapāramī nāma hoti, tathārūpenāpi visatejena sīlassa abhinnatā sīlapāramī, nāgabhavanato nikkhamitvā samaṇadhammakaraṇaṃ nekkhammapāramī, `idañcidañca kātuṃ vaṭṭatī'ti saṃvidahanaṃ paññāpāramī, adhivāsanavīriyaṃ vīriyapāramī, adhivāsanakhanti khantipāramī, saccasamādānaṃ saccapāramī, `mama sīlaṃ na bhindissāmī'ti adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramī, anuddayabhāvo ^a^P5.0175^ea^ mettāpāramī, vedanāya majjhattabhāvo upekkhāpāramī''ti.

[03] ^b^athāgamu^eb^nti athekadivasaṃ vammikamatthake nipannaṃ disvā soḷasa bhojaputtā khararajjuñca daḷhapāsañca ^a^V5.0168^ea^ sūlāni ca gahetvā mama santikaṃ āgatā. ^b^bhetvānā^eb^ti mama sarīraṃ aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu bhinditvā sakaṇṭakakāḷavettalatā pavesetvā. ^b^nāsaṃ atikassa rajju^eb^nti thokaṃ gantvā sīsaṃ me olambantaṃ disvā mahāmagge nipajjāpetvā puna nāsampi me bhinditvā vaṭṭarajjuṃ atikassa āvunitvā kājakoṭiyaṃ laggetvā samantato pariggahetvā maṃ nayiṃsu.

[03] ^b^addasaṃsū^eb^ti, samma saṅkhapāla, te bhojaputtā ekāyane ekagamane jaṅghapadikamagge taṃ balena ca vaṇṇena ca upetarūpaṃ passiṃsu, tvaṃ pana issariyasobhaggasiriyā ca paññāya ca bhāvito vaḍḍhito, so tvaṃ evarūpo samānopi ^a^M5.0187^ea^ kimatthaṃ tapaṃ karosi, kimicchanto uposathavāsaṃ vasasi, sīlaṃ rakkhasi. ``addasāsi''ntipi pāṭho, ahaṃ ekāyane mahāmagge taṃ addasinti attho. ^b^abhipatthayāno^eb^ti patthento. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā manussayoniṃ patthemi, tasmā vīriyena parakkamitvā tapokammaṃ karomi.

[03] ^b^surosito^eb^ti suṭṭhu manulitto. ^b^ito^eb^ti imamhā nāgabhavanā manussaloko kena uttaritaro. ^b^suddhī^eb^ti maggaphalanibbānasaṅkhātā visuddhi. ^b^saṃyamo^eb^ti sīlaṃ. idaṃ so manussalokeyeva buddhapaccekabuddhānaṃ uppattiṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^kāhāmī^eb^ti attano appaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ karonto jātijarāmaraṇassantaṃ karissāmīti. evaṃ, mahārāja, so saṅkhapālo manussalokaṃ vaṇṇesi. ^b^saṃvaccharo me^eb^ti evaṃ, mahārāja, tasmiṃ manussalokaṃ vaṇṇente ahaṃ pabbajjāya sinehaṃ katvā etadavocaṃ. tattha ^b^upaṭṭhitosmī^eb^ti annapānena ceva dibbehi ca kāmaguṇehi pariciṇṇo mānito asmi. ^b^palemī^eb^ti paremi gacchāmi. ^b^cirappavuṭṭhosmī^eb^ti ahaṃ manussalokato cirappavuṭṭho asmi.

[03] ^b^nābhisapitthā^eb^ti kacci nu kho mama puttādīsu koci taṃ na akkosi na paribhāsīti pucchati. ``nābhisajjethā''tipi pāṭho, na kopesīti attho. ^b^paṭivihito^eb^ti paṭijaggito. ^b^maṇī mama^eb^nti sace, samma āḷāra, gacchasiyeva, evaṃ sante mama lohitaṅko dhanahārako sabbakāmadado maṇi saṃvijjati, taṃ uḷāraṃ maṇiratanaṃ ādāya tava gehaṃ gaccha, tattha imassānubhāvena yāvadicchakaṃ dhanaṃ laddhā puna imaṃ maṇiṃ ossajassu, ossajanto ca aññattha anossajitvā attano udakacāṭiyaṃ ossajeyyāsīti vatvā mayhaṃ maṇiratanaṃ upanesīti vadati.

[03] evaṃ vatvā āḷāro ``athāhaṃ, mahārāja, nāgarājānaṃ etadavocaṃ -- `samma, nāhaṃ dhanenatthiko, pabbajituṃ pana icchāmī'ti ^a^P5.0176^ea^ pabbajitaparikkhāraṃ yācitvā teneva saddhiṃ nāgabhavanā ^a^V5.0169^ea^ nikkhamitvā taṃ nivattetvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā pabbajitomhī''ti vatvā rañño dhammakathaṃ kathento gāthādvayamāha --
[22] ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, saddhāyahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja..
[21] ``dumapphalānīva ^a^M5.0188^ea^ patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuddhā ca sarīrabhedā.
[22] etampi disvā pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^saddhāyā^eb^ti kammañca phalañca nibbānañca saddahitvā. ^b^dumapphalānīva patantī^eb^ti yathā rukkhaphalāni pakkānipi apakkānipi patanti, tathā māṇavā daharā ca vuddhā ca patanti. ^b^apaṇṇaka^eb^nti aviraddhaṃ niyyānikaṃ. ^b^sāmaññameva seyyo^eb^ti pabbajjāva uttamāti pabbajjāya guṇaṃ disvā pabbajitomhi, mahārājāti.
[21] ``addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino.
[22] nāgañca sutvāna tavañcaḷāra, kāhāmi puññāni anappakānī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^ye bahuṭhānacintino^eb^ti ye bahūni kāraṇāni jānanti. ^b^nāgañcā^eb^ti tathā appamādavihārinaṃ nāgarājānañca tava ca vacanaṃ sutvā.
[21] ``addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino.
[22] nāgañca sutvāna mamañca rāja, karohi puññāni anappakānī''ti..

[03] evaṃ ^a^P5.0177^ea^ so rañño dhammaṃ desetvā tattheva cattāro vassānamāse vasitvā puna himavantaṃ gantvā yāvajīvaṃ cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmalokūpago ahosi. saṅkhapālopi yāvajīvaṃ uposathavāsaṃ vasitvā rājā ca dānādīni puññāni karitvā yathākammaṃ gatā.
[01] satthā ^a^V5.0170^ea^ imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi -- ``tadā pitā tāpaso kassapo ahosi, bārāṇasirājā ānando, āḷāro sāriputto, saṅkhapālanāgarājā pana ahameva ahosi''nti.

[03] ^b^āmantayāmi^eb^ ^a^M5.0189^ea^ ^b^nigama^eb^nti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto nekkhammapāramiṃ ārabbha kathesi. paccuppannavatthu ^b^mahānāradakassapajātaka^eb^sadisameva (jā0 2.22.1153 ādayo). atīte pana bārāṇasī sudassanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, tattha brahmadatto nāma rājā ajjhāvasi. bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti, dasamāsaccayena mātukucchito nikkhami. tassa pana puṇṇacandasassirikaṃ mukhaṃ ahosi, tenassa ``somakumāro''ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. so viññutaṃ patto sutavittako savanasīlo ahosi, tena naṃ ``sutasomo''ti sañjāniṃsu. so vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggahetvā āgato pitu santakaṃ setacchattaṃ labhitvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi, mahantaṃ issariyaṃ ahosi. tassa candādevippamukhāni soḷasa itthisahassāni ahesuṃ. so aparabhāge puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhanto gharāvāse anabhirato araññaṃ pavisitvā pabbajitukāmo ahosi.

[03] so ekadivasaṃ kappakaṃ āmantetvā ``yadā me, samma, sirasmiṃ palitaṃ passeyyāsi, tadā me āroceyyāsī''ti āha. kappako tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā aparabhāge palitaṃ disvā ārocetvā ``tena hi naṃ, samma kappaka, uddharitvā mama hatthe patiṭṭhapehī''ti vutte suvaṇṇasaṇḍāsena uddharitvā rañño hatthe ṭhapesi. taṃ disvā mahāsatto ``jarāya me sarīraṃ abhibhūta''nti bhīto taṃ palitaṃ gahetvāva pāsādā otaritvā mahājanassa ^a^P5.0178^ea^ dassanaṭṭhāne paññatte rājapallaṅke nisīditvā senāpatippamukhāni asītiamaccasahassāni purohitappamukhāni saṭṭhibrāhmaṇasahassāni aññe ca raṭṭhikajānapadanegamādayo bahū jane pakkosāpetvā ``sirasmiṃ me palitaṃ jātaṃ, ahaṃ mahallakosmi, mama pabbajitabhāvaṃ jānāthā''ti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] sirasmiṃ palitaṃ jātaṃ, pabbajjaṃ dāni rocaha''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^V5.0171^ea^ ^b^āmantayāmī^eb^ti jānāpemi. ^b^rocaha^eb^nti ``rocemi ahaṃ, tassa me, bhonto! pabbajitabhāvaṃ jānāthā''ti.
[03] taṃ ^a^M5.0190^ea^ sutvā tesu eko visāradappatto hutvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``abhuṃ me kathaṃ nu bhaṇasi, sallaṃ me deva urasi kappesi.
[22] sattasatā te bhariyā, kathaṃ nu te tā bhavissantī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^abhu^eb^nti avaḍḍhiṃ. ^b^urasi kappesī^eb^ti urasmiṃ sunisitadhotasattiṃ cāresi. ^b^sattasatā^eb^ti samajātikā khattiyakaññā sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^kathaṃ nu te tā bhavissantī^eb^ti tā tava bhariyā tayi pabbajite anāthā nippaccayā kathaṃ bhavissanti, etā anāthā katvā tumhākaṃ pabbajjā nāma na yuttāti.
[03] tattha ^b^paññāyihintī^eb^ti attano kammena paññāyissanti. ahaṃ etāsaṃ kiṃ homi, sabbāpetā daharā, yo añño rājā bhavissati, taṃ etā gamissantīti.

[03] amaccādayo bodhisattassa paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ asakkontā tassa mātu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. sā turitaturitā āgantvā ^a^P5.0179^ea^ ``saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, tāta, pabbajitukāmosī''ti vatvā dve gāthāyo abhāsi --
[21] ``dulladdhaṃ me āsi sutasoma, yassa te homahaṃ mātā.
[22] yaṃ me vilapantiyā, anapekkho pabbajasi deva..
[21] ``dulladdhaṃ me āsi sutasoma, yaṃ taṃ ahaṃ vijāyissaṃ.
[22] yaṃ me vilapantiyā, anapekkho pabbajasi devā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0172^ea^ ^a^M5.0191^ea^ ^b^dulladdha^eb^nti yaṃ etaṃ mayā labhantiyā puttaṃ jammaṃ laddhaṃ dulladdhaṃ. ^b^yaṃ me^eb^ti yena kāraṇena mayi nānappakārakaṃ vipalantiyā tvaṃ pabbajituṃ icchasi, tena kāraṇena tādisassa puttassa labhanaṃ mama dulladdhaṃ nāmāti.
[03] bodhisatto evaṃ paridevamānāyapi mātarā saddhiṃ kiñci na kathesi. sā roditvā kanditvā sayameva ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. athassa pitu ārocesuṃ. so āgantvā ekaṃ tāva gāthamāha --
[21] ``ko nāmeso dhammo, sutasoma kā ca nāma pabbajjā.
[22] yaṃ no amhe jiṇṇe, anapekkho pabbajasi devā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^yaṃ no amhe^eb^ti yaṃ tvaṃ amhākaṃ putto samāno amhe jiṇṇe paṭijaggitabbakāle appaṭijaggitvā papāte silaṃ pavaṭṭento viya chaḍḍetvā anapekkho pabbajasi, tena taṃ vadāmi ko nāmeso tava dhammoti adhippāyo.

[03] taṃ sutvā mahāsatto tuṇhī ahosi. atha naṃ pitā, ``tāta sutasoma, sacepi te mātāpitūsu sineho natthi, puttadhītaro te bahū taruṇā, tayā vinā vattituṃ na sakkhissanti, tesaṃ vuḍḍhippattakāle pabbajissasī''ti vatvā sattamaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] mañjū tepitaṃ apassantā, maññe dukkhaṃ nigacchantī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^mañjū^eb^ti madhuravacanā. ^b^nigacchantī^eb^ti nigacchissanti kāyikacetasikadukkhaṃ paṭilabhissantīti maññāmi.
[22] mañjūhi sabbehipi tumhehi, cirampi ṭhatvā vināsabhāvo''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0173^ea^ ^a^M5.0192^ea^ ^b^sabbehipi tumhehī^eb^ti, tāta, na kevalaṃ putteheva, atha kho tumhehipi aññehipi sabbasaṅkhārehi ciraṃ ṭhatvāpi dīghamaddhānaṃ ṭhatvāpi vināsabhāvova niyato. sakalasmimpi hi lokasannivāse ekasaṅkhāropi nicco nāma natthīti.

[03] evaṃ mahāsatto pitu dhammakathaṃ kathesi. so tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā tuṇhī ahosi. athassa sattasatānaṃ bhariyānaṃ ārocayiṃsu. tā ca pāsādā oruyha tassa santikaṃ gantvā gopphakesu gahetvā paridevamānā gāthamāhaṃsu --
[21] ``chinnaṃ nu tuyhaṃ hadayaṃ, adu te karuṇā ca natthi amhesu.
[22] yaṃ no vikandantiyo, anapekkho pabbajasi devā''ti..

[03] tassattho -- sāmi sutasoma, amhe vidhavā katvā gacchantassa appamattakassapi sinehassa abhāvena tava hadayaṃ amhesu chinnaṃ nu, udāhu karuṇāya abhāvena kāruññaṃ vā natthi, yaṃ no evaṃ vikandantiyo pahāya pabbajasīti.
[03] mahāsatto tāsaṃ pādamūle parivattitvā paridevamānānaṃ paridevanasaddaṃ sutvā anantaraṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``na ^a^P5.0181^ea^ ca mayhaṃ chinnaṃ hadayaṃ, atthi karuṇāpi mayhaṃ tumhesu.
[03] tattha ^b^saggañcā^eb^ti ahaṃ saggañca patthayanto yasmā ayaṃ pabbajjā nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇitā, tasmā pabbajissāmi, tumhe mā cintayitthāti tā assāsesi.
[03] athassa aggamahesiyā ārocesuṃ. sā garubhārā paripuṇṇagabbhāpi samānā āgantvā mahāsattaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā tisso gāthāyo abhāsi --
[21] ``dulladdhaṃ ^a^M5.0193^ea^ me āsi sutasoma, yassa te ahaṃ bhariyā.
[22] yaṃ me vilapantiyā, anapekkho pabbajasi deva..
[21] ``dulladdhaṃ ^a^V5.0174^ea^ me āsi sutasoma, yassa te ahaṃ bhariyā.
[22] yaṃ me kucchipaṭisandhiṃ, anapekkho pabbajasi deva..
[21] ``paripakko me gabbho, kucchigato yāva naṃ vijāyāmi.
[22] māhaṃ ekā vidhavā, pacchā dukkhāni addakkhi''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^yaṃ me^eb^ti yasmā mama vilapantiyā tvaṃ anapekkho pabbajasi, tasmā yaṃ mayā tava santikā aggamahesiṭṭhānaṃ laddhaṃ, taṃ dulladdhameva āsi. dutiyagāthāya yasmā maṃ tvaṃ kucchipaṭisandhiṃ pahāya anapekkho pabbajasi, tasmā yaṃ mayā tava bhariyattaṃ laddhaṃ, taṃ dulladdhaṃ meti attho. ^b^yāva na^eb^nti yāvāhaṃ taṃ gabbhaṃ vijāyāmi, tāva adhivāsehīti.
[21] ``paripakko te gabbho, kucchigato iṅgha tvaṃ vijāyassu.

[03] tattha ^b^putta^eb^nti, bhadde, tava gabbho paripakkoti jānāmi, tvaṃ pana vijāyamānā puttaṃ vijāyissasi, na dhītaraṃ, sā tvaṃ sotthinā vijāyassu puttaṃ, ahaṃ pana saddhiṃ tayā taṃ puttaṃ hitvā pabbajissāmiyevāti.

[03] sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontī ``ito dāni paṭṭhāya, deva, amhākaṃ sirī nāma natthī''ti ubhohi hatthehi hadayaṃ dhārayamānā assūni muñcantī mahāsaddena paridevi. atha naṃ samassāsento mahāsatto gāthamāha --
[21] ``mā ^a^M5.0194^ea^ tvaṃ cande rudi, mā soci vanatimiramattakkhi.

[03] tattha ^b^mā tvaṃ cande rudī^eb^ti, bhadde candādevi, tvaṃ mā rodi mā soci. ^b^vanatimiramattakkhī^eb^ti girikaṇṇikapupphasamānanette. pāḷiyaṃ pana ``koviḷāratambakkhī''ti likhitaṃ, tassā koviḷārapupphaṃ viya tambanetteti attho.

[03] sā ^a^V5.0175^ea^ tassa vacanaṃ sutvā ṭhātuṃ asakkontī pāsādaṃ āruyha rodamānā nisīdi. atha naṃ bodhisattassa jeṭṭhaputto disvā ``kiṃ nu kho me mātā rodantī nisinnā''ti taṃ pucchanto gāthamāha --
[21] ``ko taṃ amma kopesi, kiṃ rodasi pekkhasi ca maṃ bāḷhaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^kopesī^eb^ti, amma! ko nāma taṃ kopesi, ko te appiyaṃ akāsi. ^b^pekkhasi cā^eb^ti maṃ bāḷhaṃ pekkhantī kiṃkāraṇā rodasīti adhippāyo. ^b^kaṃ avajjhaṃ ghātemī^eb^ti aghātetabbampi kaṃ ghātemi attano ñātīnaṃ udikkhamānānaññeva, akkhāhi meti pucchati.
[21] ``na hi so sakkā hantuṃ, vijitāvī yo maṃ tāta kopesi.
[22] pitā ^a^P5.0183^ea^ te maṃ tāta avaca, anapekkho ahaṃ gamissāmī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^vijitāvī^eb^ti, tāta, yo maṃ imissā pathaviyā vijitāvī kopesi, appiyasamudācārena me hadaye kopañca sokañca pavesesi, so tayā hantuṃ na sakkā, mañhi, tāta, tava pitā ``ahaṃ rajjasiriñca tañca pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā pabbajissāmī''ti avaca, idaṃ me rodanakāraṇanti.
[03] so ^a^M5.0195^ea^ tassā vacanaṃ sutvā ``amma! kiṃ nāma tvaṃ kathesi, nanu evaṃ sante mayaṃ anāthā nāma bhavissāmā''ti paridevanto gāthamāha --
[21] ``yohaṃ pubbe niyyāmi, uyyānaṃ mattakuñjare ca yodhemi.
[22] sutasome pabbajite, kathaṃ nu dāni karissāmī''ti..

[03] tassattho -- yo ahaṃ pubbe catuājaññayuttaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ rathaṃ abhiruyha uyyānaṃ gacchāmi, mattakuñjare ca yodhemi, aññehi ca assakīḷādīhi kīḷāmi, svāhaṃ idāni sutasome pabbajite kathaṃ karissāmīti?

[03] athassa ^a^V5.0176^ea^ kaniṭṭhabhātā sattavassiko te ubhopi rodante disvā mātaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, ``amma! kiṃkāraṇā tumhe rodathā''ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā ``tena hi mā rodatha, ahaṃ tātassa pabbajituṃ na dassāmī''ti ubhopi te assāsetvā dhātiyā saddhiṃ pāsādā oruyha pitu santikaṃ gantvā, ``tāta, tvaṃ kira amhe akāmake pahāya `pabbajāmī'ti vadasi, ahaṃ te pabbajituṃ na dassāmī''ti pitaraṃ gīvāya daḷhaṃ gahetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``mātucca me rudantyā, jeṭṭhassa ca bhātuno akāmassa.
[22] hatthepi te gahessaṃ, na hi gacchasi no akāmāna''nti..

[03] mahāsatto cintesi -- ``ayaṃ me paripanthaṃ karoti, kena nu kho naṃ upāyena paṭikkamāpeyya''nti. tato dhātiṃ oloketvā, ``amma! dhāti handimaṃ maṇikkhandhapiḷandhanaṃ, taveso hotu ^a^P5.0184^ea^ hatthe, puttaṃ apanehi, mā me antarāyaṃ karī''ti sayaṃ puttaṃ hatthe gahetvā apanetuṃ asakkonto tassā lañjaṃ paṭijānetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``uṭṭhehi tvaṃ dhāti, imaṃ kumāraṃ ramehi aññattha.
[22] mā me paripanthamakāsi, saggaṃ mama patthayānassā''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^M5.0196^ea^ ^b^imaṃ kumāra^eb^nti, amma! dhāti tvaṃ uṭṭhehi, imaṃ kumāraṃ apanetvā āgantvā imaṃ maṇiṃ gahetvā aññattha naṃ abhiramehīti.
[01] sā lañjaṃ labhitvā kumāraṃ saññāpetvā ādāya aññattha gantvā paridevamānā gāthamāha --
[21] ``yaṃ nūnimaṃ dadeyyaṃ pabhaṅkaraṃ, ko nu me imināttho.
[22] sutasome pabbajite, kiṃ nu menaṃ karissāmī''ti..

[01] tassattho -- yaṃ nūna ahaṃ imaṃ lañjatthāya gahitaṃ pabhaṅkaraṃ suppabhāsaṃ maṇiṃ dadeyyaṃ, ko nu mayhaṃ sutasomanarinde pabbajite iminā attho, ^b^kiṃ nu menaṃ karissāmi,^eb^ ahaṃ tasmiṃ pabbajite imaṃ labhissāmi, labhantīpi ca kiṃ nu kho etaṃ karissāmi, passatha me kammanti.
[03] tato ^a^V5.0177^ea^ mahāsenagutto cintesi -- ``ayaṃ rājā ``gehe me dhanaṃ manda'nti saññaṃ karoti maññe, bahubhāvamassa kathessāmī''ti. so uṭṭhāya vanditvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``koso ca tuyhaṃ vipulo, koṭṭhāgārañca tuyhaṃ paripūraṃ.
[22] pathavī ca tuyhaṃ vijitā, ramassu mā pabbaji devā''ti..
[21] ``koso ca mayhaṃ vipulo, koṭṭhāgārañca mayhaṃ paripūraṃ.
[22] pathavī ca mayhaṃ vijitā, taṃ hitvā pabbajissāmī''ti..
[03] taṃ ^a^P5.0185^ea^ sutvā tasmiṃ apagate kulavaḍḍhanaseṭṭhi nāma uṭṭhāya vanditvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``mayhampi ^a^M5.0197^ea^ dhanaṃ pahūtaṃ, saṅkhyātuṃ nopi deva sakkomi.
[22] taṃ te dadāmi sabbampi, ramassu mā pabbaji devā''ti..
[21] ``jānāmi dhanaṃ pahūtaṃ, kulavaḍḍhana pūjito tayā casmi.

[03] taṃ sutvā kulavaḍḍhane apagate mahāsatto somadattaṃ kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ āmantetvā, ``tāta, ahaṃ pañjarapakkhitto vanakukkuṭo viya ukkaṇṭhito, maṃ gharāvāse anabhirati abhibhavati, ajjeva pabbajissāmi, tvaṃ imaṃ rajjaṃ paṭipajjā''ti rajjaṃ niyyādento gāthamāha --
[03] taṃ sutvā sopi pabbajitukāmo taṃ dīpento itaraṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``idañca ^a^V5.0178^ea^ tuyhaṃ rucitaṃ, sutasoma ajjeva dāni tvaṃ pabbaja.
[22] ahampi pabbajissāmi, na ussahe tayā vinā ahaṃ ṭhātu''nti..
[03] atha naṃ so paṭikkhipitvā upaḍḍhaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``na hi sakkā pabbajituṃ, nagare na hi paccati janapade cā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0186^ea^ ^b^na hi paccatī^eb^ti idāneva tāva mama pabbajjādhippāyaṃ sutvāva imasmiṃ dvādasayojanike sudassananagare ca sakalajanapade ca na paccati, koci uddhane aggiṃ na jāleti, amhesu pana dvīsu pabbajitesu anāthāva raṭṭhavāsino bhavissanti, tasmā na hi sakkā tayā pabbajituṃ, ahameva pabbajissāmīti.
[03] taṃ sutvā mahājano mahāsattassa pādamūle parivattitvā paridevanto upaḍḍhagāthamāha --
[03] tato mahāsatto ``alaṃ mā socayittha, ahaṃ cirampi ṭhatvā tumhehi vinā bhavissāmi, uppannasaṅkhāro hi nicco nāma natthī''ti mahājanassa dhammaṃ kathento āha --
[22] evaṃ suparittake jīvite, na ca pamajjituṃ kālo..

[03] tattha ^b^upanīyatidaṃ maññe^eb^ti, tāta, ``idaṃ jīvitaṃ upanīyatī''ti ahaṃ maññāmi. aññesu suttesu upasaṃharaṇattho upaniyyanattho, idha pana pariyādānattho. tasmā yathā parittaṃ udakaṃ ^a^V5.0179^ea^ rajakānaṃ khāracaṅkavāre pakkhittaṃ sīghaṃ pariyādiyati, tathā jīvitampi. evaṃ suparittake jīvite taṃ parittakaṃ āyusaṅkhāraṃ gahetvā vicarantānaṃ sattānaṃ na puññakiriyāya pamajjituṃ kālo, appamādova kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ayamettha attho. ^b^andhabālā pamajjantī^eb^ti ajarāmarā viya hutvā gūthakalale sūkarā viya hutvā kāmapaṅke nimujjantā ^a^P5.0187^ea^ pamajjanti. ^b^asurakāya^eb^nti kāḷakañjikāsurayoniñca vaḍḍhentīti attho.

[03] evaṃ mahāsatto mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā pubbakaṃ nāma pāsādaṃ āruyha sattamāya bhūmiyā ṭhito khaggena cūḷaṃ chinditvā ``ahaṃ tumhākaṃ kiñci na homi, attano rājānaṃ gaṇhathā''ti saveṭhanaṃ cūḷaṃ mahājanassa antare khipi. taṃ gahetvā mahājano bhūmiyaṃ parivaṭṭento parivaṭṭento paridevi. tasmiṃ ṭhāne mahantaṃ rajaggaṃ uṭṭhahi. paṭikkamitvā ṭhitajano taṃ oloketvā ``raññā cūḷaṃ chinditvā saveṭhanā cūḷā mahājanassa antare khittā bhavissati, tenāyaṃ pāsādassa avidūre rajavaṭṭi uggatā''ti paridevanto gāthamāha --
[22] maññe no kesā chinnā, yasassino dhammarājassā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ūhaññate^eb^ti uṭṭhahati. ^b^rajagga^eb^nti rajakkhandho. ^b^avidūre^eb^ti ito amhākaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato avidūre. ^b^pubbakamhī^eb^ti pubbakapāsādassa samīpe. ^b^maññe no^eb^ti amhākaṃ dhammarājassa kesā chinnā bhavissantīti maññāma.

[03] mahāsatto ^a^M5.0199^ea^ paricārikaṃ pesetvā pabbajitaparikkhāre āharāpetvā kappakena kesamassuṃ ohārāpetvā alaṅkāraṃ sayanapiṭṭhe pātetvā rattapaṭānaṃ dasāni chinditvā tāni kāsāyāni nivāsetvā mattikāpattaṃ vāmāṃsakūṭe laggetvā kattaradaṇḍaṃ ādāya mahātale aparāparaṃ caṅkamitvā pāsādā otaritvā antaravīthiṃ paṭipajji. gacchantaṃ pana naṃ na koci sañjāni. athassa sattasatā khattiyakaññā pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā taṃ adisvā ābharaṇabhaṇḍameva disvā otaritvā avasesānaṃ soḷasasahassānaṃ itthīnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā ``amhākaṃ piyasāmiko sutasomamahissaro pabbajito''ti mahāsaddena paridevamānāva bahi nikkhamiṃsu. tasmiṃ khaṇe mahājano ^a^P5.0188^ea^ tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ aññāsi, sakalanagaraṃ saṅkhubhitvā ``rājā kira no pabbajito''ti rājadvāre sannipati, mahājano ``idha rājā bhavissati, ettha bhavissatī''ti pāsādādīni rañño paribhogaṭṭhānāni gantvā rājānaṃ adisvā --

[03] tattha ^b^vītikiṇṇo^eb^ti sovaṇṇapupphehi ca nānāmālyehi ca samokiṇṇo. ^b^parikiṇṇo^eb^ti parivārito. ^b^itthāgārehī^eb^ti dāsiyo upādāya itthiyo itthāgārā nāma. ^b^ñātisaṅghenā^eb^ti amaccāpi idha ñātayo eva. ^b^kūṭāgāra^eb^nti sattaratanavicitto sayanakūṭāgāragabbho. ^b^asokavanikā^eb^ti asokavanabhūmi. ^b^sabbakālikā^eb^ti sabbakālaparibhogakkhamā niccapupphitā vā. ^b^uyyāna^eb^nti nandanavanacittalatāvanasadisaṃ uyyānaṃ ^a^M5.0201^ea^. ^b^sabbakālika^eb^nti chasupi utūsu uppajjanakapupphaphalasañchannaṃ. kaṇikāravanādīsu ^b^sabbakālika^eb^nti sabbakāle supupphitaphalitameva. ^b^sañchannā^eb^ti nānāvidhehi jalajathalajakusumehi suṭṭhu sañchannā. ^b^aṇḍajehi vītikiṇṇā^eb^ti sakuṇasaṅghehi okiṇṇā.
[03] evaṃ tesu tesu ṭhānesu paridevitvā mahājano puna rājaṅgaṇaṃ āgantvā --
[21] ``rājā ^a^V5.0182^ea^ vo kho pabbajito, sutasomo rajjaṃ imaṃ pahatvāna.

[25] gāthaṃ vatvā attano ghare vibhavaṃ pahāya puttadhītaro hatthesu gahetvā nikkhamitvā bodhisattasseva santikaṃ agamāsi, tathā mātāpitaro puttadārā soḷasasahassā ca nāṭakitthiyo. sakalanagaraṃ tucchaṃ viya ahosi, janapadavāsinopi tesaṃ pacchato pacchato gamiṃsu. bodhisatto dvādasayojanikaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā himavantābhimukho pāyāsi. athassa abhinikkhamanaṃ ñatvā sakko vissakammaṃ āmantetvā, ``tāta vissakamma, sutasomamahārājā abhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^P5.0191^ea^ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, samāgamo ca mahā bhavissati, gaccha himavantapadese gaṅgātīre tiṃsayojanāyāmaṃ pañcadasayojanavitthataṃ assamapadaṃ māpehī''ti pesesi. so tathā katvā tasmiṃ assamapade pabbajitaparikkhāre paṭiyādetvā ekapadikamaggaṃ māpetvā devalokameva gato.

[03] mahāsatto tena maggena gantvā taṃ assamapadaṃ pavisitvā paṭhamaṃ sayaṃ pabbajitvā pacchā sese pabbājesi, aparabhāge bahū pabbajiṃsu. tiṃsayojanikaṃ ṭhānaṃ paripūri. vissakammena pana assamamāpitaniyāmo ca bahūnaṃ pabbajitaniyāmo ca bodhisattassa assamapadasaṃvidahitaniyāmo ca ^b^hatthipālajātake^eb^ (jā0 1.15.337 ādayo) āgatanayeneva veditabbo. tattha mahāsatto yassa yasseva kāmavitakkādi micchāvitakko uppajjati, taṃ taṃ ākāsena upasaṅkamitvā ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā ovadanto gāthādvayamāha --
[22] mā vo kāmā haniṃsu, rammañhi sudassanaṃ nagaraṃ..
[21] ``mettacittañca bhāvetha, appamāṇaṃ divā ca ratto ca.

[03] tattha ^b^ratikīḷitānī^eb^ti kāmaratiyo ca kāyavācākhiḍḍāvasena pavattakīḷitāni ca. ^b^mā vo kāmā haniṃsū^eb^ti mā tumhe vatthukāmakilesakāmā haniṃsu. ^b^rammaṃ hī^eb^ti sudassananagaraṃ nāma ramaṇīyaṃ, taṃ mā anussarittha. ^b^mettacitta^eb^nti idaṃ desanāmattameva, so pana cattāropi brahmavihāre ^a^V5.0183^ea^ ācikkhi. ^b^appamāṇa^eb^nti appamāṇasattārammaṇaṃ. ^b^agacchitthā^eb^ti gamissatha. ^b^devapura^eb^nti brahmalokaṃ.
[03] sopi ^a^P5.0192^ea^ isigaṇo tassovāde ṭhatvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosīti sabbaṃ ^b^hatthipālajātake^eb^ āgatanayeneva kathetabbaṃ.

[03] satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā ``na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi tathāgato mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantoyevā''ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi ``tadā mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni ahesuṃ, candādevī rāhulamātā, jeṭṭhaputto sāriputto, kaniṭṭhaputto rāhulo, dhāti khujjuttarā, kulavaḍḍhanaseṭṭhi kassapo, mahāsenagutto moggallāno, somadattakumāro ānando, sesaparisā buddhaparisā, sutasomarājā pana ahameva ahosi''nti.

[03] ^b^uddayhate^eb^ ^a^V5.0184^ea^ ^a^P5.0193^ea^ ^a^M5.0203^ea^ ^b^janapado^eb^ti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ ārabba kathesi. kathento ca taṃ bhikkhuṃ ``kena ukkaṇṭhāpitosī''ti pucchitvā ``purāṇadutiyikāyā''ti vutte ``na esā kho, bhikkhu, idāneva tava anatthakārikā, pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya jhānā parihāyitvā mahāvināsaṃ patto''ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.

[03] atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto uggahitasippo isipabbajjaṃ pabbijitvā jhānābhiññā nibbattetvā himavantapadese vāsaṃ kappesi. alambusājātake vuttanayeneva taṃ paṭicca ekā migī gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā puttaṃ vijāyi, ``isisiṅgo''tvevassa nāmaṃ ahosi. atha naṃ pitā vayappattaṃ pabbājetvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ uggaṇhāpesi. so nacirasseva jhānābhiññā uppādetvā jhānasukhena kīḷi, ghoratapo paramadhitindriyo ahosi. tassa sīlatejena sakkassa bhavanaṃ kampi. sakko āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā ``upāyenassa sīlaṃ bhindissāmī''ti tīṇi saṃvaccharāni sakalakāsiraṭṭhe vuṭṭhiṃ nivāresi, raṭṭhaṃ aggidaḍḍhaṃ viya ahosi. sasse asampajjamāne dubbhikkhapīḷitā manussā sannipatitvā rājaṅgaṇe upakkosiṃsu. atha ne rājā vātapāne ṭhito ``kiṃ eta''nti pucchi. ``mahārāja, tīṇi ^a^P5.0194^ea^ saṃvaccharāni devassa avassantattā sakalaraṭṭhaṃ uddayhati, manussā dukkhitā, devaṃ vassāpehi, devā''ti. rājā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathaṃ upavasantopi vassaṃ vassāpetuṃ nāsakkhi.

[03] tasmiṃ kāle sakko aḍḍharattasamaye tassa sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā ekobhāsaṃ katvā vehāse aṭṭhāsi. rājā taṃ disvā ``kosi tva''nti pucchi. ``sakkohamasmī''ti. ``kenatthenāgatosī''ti? ``vassati te, mahārāja ^a^M5.0204^ea^, raṭṭhe devo''ti? ``na vassatī''ti. ``jānāsi panassa avassanakāraṇa''nti? ``na jānāmi, sakkā''ti. ``mahārāja, himavantapadese ^a^V5.0185^ea^ isisiṅgo nāma tāpaso paṭivasati ghoratapo paramadhitindriyo. so nibaddhaṃ deve vassante kujjhitvā ākāsaṃ olokesi, tasmā devo na vassatī''ti. ``idāni panettha kiṃ kātabba''nti? ``tassa tape bhinne devo vassissatī''ti. ``ko panassa tapaṃ bhindituṃ samattho''ti? ``dhītā te, mahārāja, niḷinikā samatthā, taṃ pakkosāpetvā `asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma gantvā tāpasassa tapaṃ bhindāhī'ti pesehī''ti. evaṃ so rājānaṃ anusāsitvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamāsi. rājā punadivase amaccehi saddhiṃ mantetvā dhītaraṃ pakkosāpetvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] ehi niḷinike gaccha, taṃ me brāhmaṇamānayā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^taṃ me^eb^ti taṃ mama anatthakāriṃ brāhmaṇaṃ attano vasaṃ ānehi, kilesarativasenassa sīlaṃ bhindāhīti.
[03] tattha ^b^dukkhakkhamā^eb^ti ahaṃ, mahārāja, dukkhassa khamā na homi, addhānampi na jānāmi, sāhaṃ kathaṃ gamissāmīti.
[21] ``phītaṃ janapadaṃ gantvā, hatthinā ca rathena ca.

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0186^ea^ ^b^dārusaṅghāṭayānenā^eb^ti, amma, niḷinike na tvaṃ padasā gamissasi, phītaṃ pana subhikkhaṃ khemaṃ attano janapadaṃ hatthivāhanehi ca rathavāhanehi ca ^a^M5.0205^ea^ gantvā tato parampi ajjhokāse paṭicchannena vayhādinā udakaṭṭhāne nāvāsaṅkhātena dārusaṅghāṭayānena gaccha. ^b^vaṇṇarūpenā^eb^ti evaṃ akilamamānā gantvā tava vaṇṇena ceva rūpasampadāya ca taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ attano vasaṃ ānayissasīti.

[03] evaṃ so dhītarā saddhiṃ akathetabbampi raṭṭhaparipālanaṃ nissāya kathesi. sāpi ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchi. athassā sabbaṃ dātabbayuttakaṃ datvā amaccehi saddhiṃ uyyojesi. amaccā taṃ ādāya paccantaṃ patvā tattha khandhāvāraṃ nivāsāpetvā rājadhītaraṃ ukkhipāpetvā vanacarakena desitena maggena himavantaṃ pavisitvā pubbaṇhasamaye tassa assamapadassa samīpaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. tasmiṃ khaṇe bodhisatto puttaṃ assamapade nivāsāpetvā sayaṃ phalāphalatthāya araññaṃ paviṭṭho hoti. vanacarako sayaṃ assamaṃ agantvā tassa pana dassanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā niḷinikāya taṃ dassento dve gāthā abhāsi --
[22] maññe no aggiṃ hāpeti, isisiṅgo mahiddhiko''ti..

[03] tattha kadalīsaṅkhātā dhajā paññāṇaṃ assāti ^b^kadalīdhajapaññāṇo. ābhujīparivārito^eb^ti bhujapattavanaparikkhitto. ^b^saṅkhāto^eb^ti eso aggi assa isisiṅgassa jhānena saṅkhāto paccakkhagato jalati. ^b^maññe no aggi^eb^nti aggiṃ no hāpeti juhati paricaratīti maññāmi.

[03] amaccāpi bodhisattassa araññaṃ paviṭṭhavelāya assamaṃ parivāretvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rājadhītaraṃ isivesaṃ gāhāpetvā ^a^P5.0196^ea^ suvaṇṇacīrakena nivāsanapārupanaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā tantubaddhaṃ cittageṇḍukaṃ gāhāpetvā assamapadaṃ pesetvā sayaṃ bahi rakkhantā aṭṭhaṃsu. sā tena geṇḍukena kīḷantī caṅkamakoṭiyaṃ otari. tasmiṃ khaṇe isisiṅgo paṇṇasāladvāre pāsāṇaphalake nisinno hoti. so taṃ āgacchantiṃ disvā bhītatasito uṭṭhāya paṇṇasālaṃ ^a^V5.0187^ea^ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi ^a^M5.0206^ea^. sāpissa paṇṇasāladvāraṃ gantvā kīḷiyeva. satthā tañca tato uttari ca atthaṃ pakāsento tisso gāthā abhāsi --

[03] tattha ^b^geṇḍukenassā^eb^ti assa isisiṅgassa assamadvāre geṇḍukena kīḷati. ^b^vidaṃsayantī^eb^ti dassentī. ^b^guyhaṃ pakāsitāni cā^eb^ti guyhañca rahassaṅgaṃ pakāsitāni ca pākaṭāni mukhahatthādīni. ^b^abravī^eb^ti so kira paṇṇasālāya ṭhatvā cintesi -- ``sacāyaṃ yakkho bhaveyya, paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā maṃ murumurāpetvā khādeyya, nāyaṃ yakkho, tāpaso bhavissatī''ti assamā nikkhamitvā pucchanto gāthamāha --
[21] ``ambho ko nāma so rukkho, yassa tevaṃgataṃ phalaṃ.
[22] dūrepi khittaṃ pacceti, na taṃ ohāya gacchatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^yassa tevaṃgataṃ phala^eb^nti yassa tava rukkhassa evaṃgatikaṃ manoramaṃ phalaṃ. ^b^ko nāma so rukkho^eb^ti citrageṇḍukassa adiṭṭhapubbattā ``rukkhaphalena tena bhavitabba''nti maññamāno evaṃ pucchati.
[27] bahavo tādisā rukkhā, yassa tevaṃgataṃ phalaṃ.
[22] dūrepi khittaṃ pacceti, na maṃ ohāya gacchatī''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^V5.0188^ea^ ^a^P5.0197^ea^ ^b^samīpe gandhamādane^eb^ti gandhamādanapabbate mama assamassa samīpe. ^b^yassa tevaṃgata^eb^nti yassa evaṃgataṃ, ^b^ta^eb^-kāro byañjanasandhikaroti.
[03] iti ^a^M5.0207^ea^ sā musāvādaṃ abhāsi. itaropi saddahitvā ``tāpaso eso''ti saññāya paṭisanthāraṃ karonto gāthamāha --
[21] ``etū bhavaṃ assamimaṃ adetu, pajjañca bhakkhañca paṭiccha dammi.
[22] idamāsanaṃ atra bhavaṃ nisīdatu, ito bhavaṃ mūlaphalāni bhuñjatū''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^assamima^eb^nti assamaṃ imaṃ bhavaṃ pavisatu. ^b^adetū^eb^ti yathāsannihitaṃ āhāraṃ paribhuñjatu. ^b^pajja^eb^nti pādabbhañjanaṃ. ^b^bhakkha^eb^nti madhuraphalāphalaṃ. ^b^paṭicchā^eb^ti paṭiggaṇha. ^b^idamāsana^eb^nti paviṭṭhakāle evamāha.

[03] tassā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā kaṭṭhattharaṇe nisīdantiyā suvaṇṇacīrake dvidhā gate sarīraṃ appaṭicchannaṃ ahosi. tāpaso mātugāmasarīrassa adiṭṭhapubbattā taṃ disvā ``vaṇṇo eso''ti saññāya evamāha --
[22] akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, kose nu te uttamaṅgaṃ paviṭṭha''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^supicchita^eb^nti dvinnaṃ ūrūnaṃ samāgamakāle suphusitaṃ sippipuṭamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ. subhalakkhaṇena hi asamannāgatāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvāṭadhātukaṃ hoti, samannāgatāya abbhunnataṃ sippipuṭamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ. ^b^kaṇharivappakāsatī^eb^ti ubhosu passesu kāḷakaṃ viya khāyati. ^b^kose nu te uttamaṅgaṃ paviṭṭha^eb^nti tava uttamaṅgaṃ liṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ na paññāyati, kiṃ nu taṃ tava sarīrasaṅkhāte kose paviṭṭhanti pucchati.
[21] ``ahaṃ vane mūlaphalesanaṃ caraṃ, āsādayiṃ acchaṃ sughorarūpaṃ.
[22] so ^a^P5.0198^ea^ maṃ patitvā sahasājjhapatto, panujja maṃ abbahi uttamaṅgaṃ..
[21] ``svāyaṃ ^a^V5.0189^ea^ ^a^M5.0208^ea^ vaṇo khajjati kaṇḍuvāyati, sabbañca kālaṃ na labhāmi sātaṃ.
[22] paho bhavaṃ kaṇḍumimaṃ vinetuṃ, kurutaṃ bhavaṃ yācito brāhmaṇattha''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^āsādayi^eb^nti ghaṭṭesiṃ, āgacchantaṃ disvā leḍḍunā paharinti attho. ^b^patitvā^eb^ti upadhāvitvā. ^b^sahasājjhappatto^eb^ti mamaṃ sahasā ajjhappatto sampatto. ^b^panujjā^eb^ti atha maṃ potetvā. ^b^abbahī^eb^ti mukhena mama uttamaṅgaṃ luñcitvā pakkāmi, tato paṭṭhāya imasmiṃ ṭhāne vaṇo jāto. ^b^svāya^eb^nti so ayaṃ tato paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ vaṇo khajjati ceva kaṇḍuvañca karoti, tappaccayā sāhaṃ sabbakālaṃ kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ na labhāmi. ^b^paho^eb^ti pahu samattho. ^b^brāhmaṇattha^eb^nti bhavaṃ mayā yācito imaṃ brāhmaṇassa atthaṃ karotu, idaṃ me dukkhaṃ harāhīti vadati.
[03] so tassā musāvādaṃ ``sabhāvo''ti saddahitvā ``sace te evaṃ sukhaṃ hoti, karissāmī''ti taṃ padesaṃ oloketvā anantaraṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``gambhīrarūpo te vaṇo salohito, apūtiko vaṇagandho mahā ca.
[22] karomi te kiñci kasāyayogaṃ, yathā bhavaṃ paramasukhī bhaveyyā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^salohito^eb^ti rattobhāso. ^b^apūtiko^eb^ti pūtimaṃsarahito. ^b^vaṇagandho^eb^ti thokaṃ duggandho. ^b^kasāyayoga^eb^nti ahaṃ keci rukkhakasāye gahetvā tava ekaṃ kasāyayogaṃ karomīti.
[21] ``na mantayogā na kasāyayogā, na osadhā brahmacāri kamanti.
[22] yaṃ te mudu tena vinehi kaṇḍuṃ, yathā ahaṃ paramasukhī bhaveyya''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0199^ea^ ^a^M5.0209^ea^ ^b^kamantī^eb^ti, bho brahmacāri, imasmiṃ mama vaṇe neva mantayogā, na kasāyayogā, na pupphaphalādīni osadhāni kamanti, anekavāraṃ katehipi tehi etassa phāsukabhāvo na bhūtapubbo. yaṃ pana te etaṃ mudu aṅgajātaṃ, tena ghaṭṭiyamānasseva tassa kaṇḍu na hoti, tasmā tena vinehi kaṇḍunti.

[03] so ^a^V5.0190^ea^ ``saccaṃ eso bhaṇatī''ti sallakkhetvā ``methunasaṃsaggena sīlaṃ bhijjati, jhānaṃ antaradhāyatī''ti ajānanto mātugāmassa adiṭṭhapubbattā methunadhammassa ca ajānanabhāvena ``bhesajja''nti vadantiyā tāya methunaṃ paṭisevi. tāvadevassa sīlaṃ bhijji, jhānaṃ parihāyi. so dve tayo vāre saṃsaggaṃ katvā kilanto hutvā nikkhamitvā saraṃ oruyha nhatvā paṭippassaddhadaratho āgantvā paṇṇasālāyaṃ nisīditvā punapi taṃ ``tāpaso''ti maññamāno vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchanto gāthamāha --
[21] ``ito nu bhoto katamena assamo, kacci bhavaṃ abhiramasi araññe.
[22] kacci nu te mūlaphalaṃ pahūtaṃ, kacci bhavantaṃ na vihiṃsanti vāḷā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^katamenā^eb^ti ito katamena disābhāgena bhoto assamo. ^b^bhava^eb^nti ālapanametaṃ.
[21] ``ito ujuṃ uttarāyaṃ disāyaṃ, khemā nadī himavatā pabhāvī.
[22] tassā tīre assamo mayha rammo, aho bhavaṃ assamaṃ mayhaṃ passe..
[21] ``ambā ca sālā tilakā ca jambuyo, uddālakā pāṭaliyo ca phullā.
[22] samantato kimpurisābhigītaṃ, aho bhavaṃ assamaṃ mayhaṃ passe..
[21] ``tālā ^a^M5.0210^ea^ ca mūlā ca phalā ca mettha, vaṇṇena gandhena upetarūpaṃ.
[22] taṃ ^a^P5.0200^ea^ bhūmibhāgehi upetarūpaṃ, aho bhavaṃ assamaṃ mayhaṃ passe..
[21] ``phalā ca mūlā ca pahūtamettha, vaṇṇena gandhena rasenupetā.
[22] āyanti ca luddakā taṃ padesaṃ, mā me tato mūlaphalaṃ ahāsu''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^uttarāya^eb^nti uttarāya. ^b^khemā^eb^ti evaṃnāmikā nadī. ^b^himavatā pabhāvī^eb^ti himavantato pavattati. ^b^aho^eb^ti patthanatthe nipāto. ^b^uddālakā^eb^ti vātaghātakā. ^b^kimpurisābhigīta^eb^nti samantato parivāretvā madhurasaddena gāyantehi kimpurisehi abhigītaṃ. ^b^tālā ca mūlā ca phalā ca metthā^eb^ti ettha mama assame pāsādikā tālarukkhā ca tesaññeva vaṇṇagandhādisampannā kandasaṅkhātā ^a^V5.0191^ea^ mūlā ca phalā ca. ^b^pahūtametthā^eb^ti nānārukkhaphalā ca rukkhavallimūlā ca pahūtā ettha. ^b^mā me tato^eb^ti taṃ mama assamapadaṃ sambahulā luddakā āgacchanti, mayā cettha āharitvā ṭhapitaṃ bahu madhurasamūlaphalāphalaṃ atthi, te mayi cirāyante mūlaphalāphalaṃ hareyyuṃ. te tato mama mūlaphalāphalaṃ mā hariṃsu, tasmā sacepi mayā saddhiṃ āgantukāmo, ehi, no ce, ahaṃ gamissāmīti āha.
[03] taṃ sutvā tāpaso yāva pitu āgamanā adhivāsāpetuṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``pitā mamaṃ mūlaphalesanaṃ gato, idāni āgacchati sāyakāle.
[22] ubhova gacchāmase assamaṃ taṃ, yāva pitā mūlaphalato etū''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^ubhova gacchāmase^eb^ti mama pitu ārocetvā ubhova gamissāma.

[03] tato ^a^M5.0211^ea^ sā cintesi -- ``ayaṃ tāva araññeva vaḍḍhitabhāvena mama itthibhāvaṃ na jānāti, pitā panassa maṃ disvāva jānitvā `tvaṃ idha kiṃ karosī'ti kājakoṭiyā paharitvā sīsampi me bhindeyya, tasmiṃ anāgateyeva mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭati, āgamanakammampi me niṭṭhita''nti. sā tassa āgamanūpāyaṃ ācikkhantī itaraṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``aññe ^a^P5.0201^ea^ bahū isayo sādhurūpā, rājīsayo anumagge vasanti.
[22] teyeva pucchesi mamassamaṃ taṃ, te taṃ nayissanti mamaṃ sakāse''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^rājīsayo^eb^ti, samma, mayā na sakkā cirāyituṃ, aññe pana sādhusabhāvā rājisayo ca brāhmaṇisayo ca anumagge mama assamamaggapasse vasanti, ahaṃ tesaṃ ācikkhitvā gamissāmi, tvaṃ te puccheyyāsi, te taṃ mama santikaṃ nayissantīti.

[03] evaṃ sā attano palāyanūpāyaṃ katvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā taṃ olokentameva ``tvaṃ nivattā''ti vatvā āgamanamaggeneva amaccānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. te taṃ gahetvā khandhāvāraṃ gantvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. sakkopi taṃ divasameva tussitvā sakalaraṭṭhe devaṃ vassāpesi, tato subhikkhaṃ janapadaṃ ahosi. isisiṅgatāpasassapi tāya pakkantamattāya eva kāye ḍāho uppajji. so kampanto paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā vākacīraṃ pārupitvā ^a^V5.0192^ea^ socanto nipajji. bodhisatto sāyaṃ āgantvā puttaṃ apassanto ``kahaṃ nu kho gato''ti kājaṃ otāretvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā taṃ nipannakaṃ disvā ``tāta, kiṃ karosī''ti piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto tisso gāthā abhāsi --
[21] ``na te kaṭṭhāni bhinnāni, na te udakamābhataṃ.
[22] aggīpi te na hāpito, kiṃ nu mandova jhāyasi..
[21] ``bhinnāni kaṭṭhāni huto ca aggi, tapanīpi te samitā brahmacārī.
[22] pīṭhañca mayhaṃ udakañca hoti, ramasi tuvaṃ brahmabhūto puratthā..
[22] na me tuvaṃ ālapasī mamajja, naṭṭhaṃ nu kiṃ cetasikañca dukkha''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0202^ea^ ^b^bhinnānī^eb^ti araññato uddhaṭāni. ^b^na hāpito^eb^ti na jalito. ^b^bhinnānī^eb^ti pubbe tayā mamāgamanavelāya kaṭṭhāni uddhaṭāneva honti. ^b^huto ca aggī^eb^ti aggi ca huto hoti. ^b^tapanī^eb^ti visibbanāggisaṅkhātā tapanīpi te samitāva sayameva saṃvidahitāva hoti. ^b^pīṭha^eb^nti mama āsanatthāya pīṭhañca paññattameva hoti. ^b^udakañcā^eb^ti pādadhovanaudakampi upaṭṭhāpitameva hoti. ^b^brahmabhūto^eb^ti tuvampi ito puratthā seṭṭhabhūto imasmiṃ assame abhiramasi. ^b^abhinnakaṭṭhosī^eb^ti so dāni ajja anuddhaṭakaṭṭhosi. ^b^asiddhabhojano^eb^ti na te kiñci amhākaṃ kandamūlaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā seditaṃ. ^b^mamajjā^eb^ti, mama putta, ajja na me tvaṃ ālapasi. ^b^naṭṭhaṃ nu ki^eb^nti kiṃ nu te naṭṭhaṃ vā, kiṃ cetasikaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, akkhāhi me nipannakāraṇanti pucchati.
[03] so pitu vacanaṃ sutvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ kathento āha --
[22] dve yamā gaṇḍā ure sujātā, suvaṇṇatindukanibhā pabhassarā..
[21] ``mukhañca ^a^V5.0193^ea^ tassa bhusadassaneyyaṃ, kaṇṇesu lambanti ca kuñcitaggā.
[22] te jotare carato māṇavassa, suttañca yaṃ saṃyamanaṃ jaṭānaṃ..
[21] ``aññā ^a^M5.0213^ea^ ca tassa saṃyamāni catasso, nīlā pītā lohitikā ca setā.
[22] tā piṃsare carato māṇavassa, tiriṭisaṅghāriva pāvusamhi..
[21] ``na mikhalaṃ muñjamayaṃ dhāreti, na santhare no pana pabbajassa.
[22] tā ^a^P5.0203^ea^ jotare jaghanantare vilaggā, sateratā vijjurivantalikkhe..
[22] aghaṭṭitā niccakīḷaṃ karonti, haṃ tāta kiṃrukkhaphalāni tāni..
[21] ``jaṭā ca tassa bhusadassaneyyā, parosataṃ vellitaggā sugandhā.
[22] dvedhā siro sādhu vibhattarūpo, aho nu kho mayha tathā jaṭāssu..
[21] ``yadā ca so pakirati tā jaṭāyo, vaṇṇena gandhena upetarūpā.
[22] nīluppalaṃ vātasameritaṃva, tatheva saṃvāti panassamo ayaṃ..
[21] ``paṅko ca tassa bhusadassaneyyo, netādiso yādiso mayhaṃ kāye.
[22] so vāyati erito mālutena, vanaṃ yathā aggagimhe suphullaṃ..
[21] ``nihanti so rukkhaphalaṃ pathabyā, sucittarūpaṃ ruciraṃ dassaneyyaṃ.
[22] khittañca tassa punarehi hatthaṃ, haṃ tāta kiṃrukkhaphalaṃ nu kho taṃ..
[21] ``dantā ^a^M5.0214^ea^ ca tassa bhusadassaneyyā, suddhā samā saṅkhavarūpapannā.
[22] mano pasādenti vivariyamānā, na hi nūna so sākamakhādi tehi..
[21] ``akakkasaṃ aggaḷitaṃ muhuṃ muduṃ, ujuṃ anuddhataṃ acapalamassa bhāsitaṃ.
[22] rudaṃ ^a^P5.0204^ea^ manuññaṃ karavīkasussaraṃ, hadayaṅgamaṃ rañjayateva me mano..
[03] icchāmi bho taṃ punadeva daṭṭhuṃ, mitto hi me māṇavohu puratthā..
[21] ``susandhi sabbattha vimaṭṭhimaṃ vaṇaṃ, puthū sujātaṃ kharapattasannibhaṃ.
[22] teneva maṃ uttariyāna māṇavo, vivaritaṃ ūruṃ jaghanena piḷayi..
[21] ``akakkasaṅgo na ca dīghalomo, nakhāssa dīghā api lohitaggā.
[22] mudūhi bāhāhi palissajanto, kalyāṇarūpo ramayaṃ upaṭṭhahi..
[22] hatthā mudū tehi maṃ samphusitvā, ito gato tena maṃ dahanti tāta..
[21] ``na ^a^M5.0215^ea^ nūna so khārividhaṃ ahāsi, na nūna so kaṭṭhāni sayaṃ abhañji.
[22] na nūna so hanti dume kuṭhāriyā, na hissa hatthesu khilāni atthi..
[21] ``accho ca kho tassa vaṇaṃ akāsi, so maṃbravi `sukhitaṃ maṃ karohi'.
[22] tāhaṃ ^a^P5.0205^ea^ kariṃ tena mamāsi sokhyaṃ, so cabravi `sukhitosmī'ti brahme..
[21] ``ayañca te māluvapaṇṇasanthatā, vikiṇṇarūpāva mayā ca tena ca.
[22] kilantarūpā udake ramitvā, punappunaṃ paṇṇakuṭiṃ vajāma..
[21] ``na majja mantā paṭibhanti tāta, na aggihuttaṃ napi yaññatantaṃ.
[22] na cāpi te mūlaphalāni bhuñje, yāva na passāmi taṃ brahmacāriṃ..
[21] ``addhā pajānāsi tuvampi tāta, yassaṃ disaṃ vasate brahmacārī.
[22] taṃ maṃ disaṃ pāpaya tāta khippaṃ, mā te ahaṃ amarimassamamhi..
[22] taṃ maṃ vanaṃ pāpaya tāta khippaṃ, purā te pāṇaṃ vijahāmi assame''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^idhāgamā^eb^ti, tāta, imaṃ assamapadaṃ āgato. ^b^sudassaneyyo^eb^ti suṭṭhu dassaneyyo. ^b^sutanū^eb^ti suṭṭhu tanuko nātikiso nātithūlo ^a^M5.0216^ea^. ^b^vinetī^eb^ti attano sarīrappabhāya assamapadaṃ ekobhāsaṃ viya vineti pūreti. ^b^sukaṇhakaṇhacchadanehi bhoto^eb^ti, tāta, tassa bhoto sukaṇhehi kaṇhacchadanehi bhamaravaṇṇehi kesehi sukaṇhasīsaṃ sumajjitamaṇimayaṃ viya khāyati. ^b^amassūjāto^eb^ti na tāvassa massu jāyati, taruṇoyeva. ^b^apurāṇavaṇṇī^eb^ti acirapabbajito. ^b^ādhārarūpañca panassa kaṇṭhe^eb^ti kaṇṭhe ca panassa amhākaṃ bhikkhābhājanaṭṭhapanaṃ pattādhārasadisaṃ piḷandhanaṃ atthīti muttāhāraṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^gaṇḍā^eb^ti thane sandhāyāha. ^b^ure sujātā^eb^ti uramhi sujātā. ``urato''tipi pāṭho. ^b^pabhassarā^eb^ti pabhāsampannā. ``pabhāsare''tipi pāṭho, obhāsantīti attho.

[03] ^b^bhusadassaneyya^eb^nti ativiya dassanīyaṃ. ^b^kuñcitaggā^eb^ti sīhakuṇḍalaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^suttañcā^eb^ti yaṃ tassa jaṭābandhanasuttaṃ, tampi jotati pabhaṃ muñcati. ^b^``saṃyamāni catasso''^eb^ti iminā maṇisuvaṇṇapavāḷarajatamayāni cattāri piḷandhanāni dasseti ^a^P5.0206^ea^. ^b^tā piṃsare^eb^ti tāni piḷandhanāni pāvusamhi pavuṭṭhe deve tiriṭisaṅghā viya viravanti. ^b^mikhala^eb^nti mekhalaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. idaṃ nivatthakañcanacīrakaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^na santhare^eb^ti na vāke. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- tāta, yathā mayaṃ tiṇamayaṃ vā vākamayaṃ vā cīrakaṃ dhārema, na tathā so, so pana suvaṇṇacīrakaṃ dhāretīti. ^b^akhīlakānī^eb^ti atacāni nippaṇṇāni. ^b^kaṭisamohitānī^eb^ti kaṭiyaṃ baddhāni. ^b^niccakīḷaṃ karontī^eb^ti aghaṭṭitānipi niccakālaṃ kīḷāyanti. ^b^haṃ, tātā^eb^ti hambho, tāta. ^b^kiṃ rukkhaphalāni tānī^eb^ti tāni tassa māṇavassa suttāruḷhāni kaṭiyaṃ baddhāni katararukkhaphalāni nāmāti maṇisaṅghāṭiṃ sandhāyāha.

[03] ^b^jaṭā^eb^ti jaṭāmaṇḍalākārena baddharatanamissakakesavaṭṭiyo sandhāyāha. ^b^vellitaggā^eb^ti kuñcitaggā. ^b^dvedhāsiro^eb^ti tassa sīsaṃ dvedhā katvā baddhānaṃ jaṭānaṃ vasena suṭṭhu vibhattarūpaṃ. ^b^tathā^eb^ti yathā tassa māṇavassa jaṭā, tathā tumhehi mama na baddhā, aho vata mamapi tathā assūti patthento āha. ^b^upetarūpā^eb^ti upetasabhāvā. ^b^vātasameritaṃvā^eb^ti ^a^M5.0217^ea^ yathā nāma nīluppalaṃ vātena samīritaṃ, tatheva ayaṃ imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe assamo saṃvāti. ^b^netādiso^eb^ti, tāta, yādiso ^a^V5.0196^ea^ mama kāye paṅko, netādiso tassa sarīre. so hi dassanīyo ceva sugandho ca. ^b^aggagimhe^eb^ti vasantasamaye.

[03] ^b^nihantī^eb^ti paharati. ^b^kiṃ rukkhaphalaṃ nu kho ta^eb^nti katararukkhassa nu kho taṃ phalaṃ. ^b^saṅkhavarūpapannā^eb^ti sudhotasaṅkhapaṭibhāgā. ^b^na hi nūna so sākamakhādi tehī^eb^ti na nūna so māṇavo mayaṃ viya tehi dantehi rukkhapaṇṇāni ceva mūlaphalāphalāni ca khādi. amhākañhi tāni khādantānaṃ sabalā paṇṇavaṇṇā dantāti dīpeti.

[03] ^b^akakkasa^eb^nti, tāta, tassa bhāsitaṃ apharusaṃ agaḷitaṃ, punappunaṃ vadantassāpi madhuratāya ^b^muhuṃ muduṃ,^eb^ apamussatāya ^b^ujuṃ,^eb^ avikkhittatāya ^b^anuddhaṭaṃ,^eb^ patiṭṭhitatāya ^b^acapalaṃ. ruda^eb^nti bhāsamānassa sarasaṅkhātaṃ rudampi manoharaṃ karavīkassa viya sussaraṃ sumadhuraṃ. ^b^rañjayatevā^eb^ti mama mano rañjatiyeva. ^b^bindussaro^eb^ti piṇḍitassaro. ^b^māṇavohū^eb^ti so hi māṇavo puratthā mama mitto ahu.

[03] ^b^susandhi sabbattha vimaṭṭhimaṃ vaṇa^eb^nti tāta tassa māṇavassa ūrūnaṃ antare ekaṃ vaṇaṃ atthi, taṃ susandhi suphusitaṃ sippipuṭamukhasadisaṃ, sabbattha vimaṭṭhaṃ samantato maṭṭhaṃ. ^b^puthū^eb^ti mahantaṃ. ^b^sujāta^eb^nti susaṇṭhitaṃ. ^b^kharapattasannibha^eb^nti ^a^P5.0207^ea^ supupphitapadumamakuḷasannibhaṃ. ^b^uttariyānā^eb^ti uttaritvā avattharitvā. ^b^piḷayī^eb^ti pīḷesi. ^b^tapantī^eb^ti tassa māṇavassa sarīrato niccharantā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaraṃsiyo jalanti obhāsanti virocanti ca. ^b^bāhā^eb^ti bāhāpissa mudū. ^b^añjanalomasādisā^eb^ti añjanasadisehi lomehi samannāgatā. ^b^vicitravaṭṭaṅgulikāssa sobhare^eb^ti hatthāpissa varalakkhaṇavicitrāhi pavālaṅkurasadisāhi vaṭṭaṅgulīhi samannāgatā sobhanti.

[03] ^b^akakkasaṅgo^eb^ti kacchupīḷakādirahitāṅgapaccaṅgo. ^b^ramayaṃ upaṭṭhahī^eb^ti maṃ ramayanto upaṭṭhahi paricari. ^b^tūlūpanibhā^eb^ti mudubhāvassa upamā. ^b^suvaṇṇakambutalavaṭṭasucchavī^eb^ti suvaṇṇamayaṃ ādāsatalaṃ viya vaṭṭā ca succhavi ca, parimaṇḍalatalā ceva sundaracchavi cāti attho. ^b^samphusitvā^eb^ti suṭṭhu phusitvā attano hatthasamphassaṃ mama sarīre pharāpetvā. ^b^ito gato^eb^ti mama ^a^M5.0218^ea^ olokentasseva ito gato. ^b^tena maṃ dahantī^eb^ti tena tassa hatthasamphassena idāni maṃ dahanti. tathā hi tassa gatakālato paṭṭhāya mama sarīre ḍāho uṭṭhito, tenamhi domanassappatto nipannoti.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^V5.0197^ea^ ^b^nūna so khārividha^eb^nti, tāta, nūna so māṇavo na khāribhāraṃ ukkhipitvā vicari. ^b^khilānī^eb^ti kilāni, ``ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^sokhya^eb^nti sukhaṃ. ^b^māluvapaṇṇasanthatā vikiṇṇarūpāvā^eb^ti, tāta, ayaṃ tava māluvapaṇṇasanthatā ajja mayā ca tena ca aññamaññaṃ parāmasanāliṅganavasena parivattantehi vikiṇṇā viya ākulabyākulā jātā. ^b^punappunaṃ paṇṇakuṭiṃ vajāmā^eb^ti, tāta, ahañca so ca abhiramitvā kilantarūpā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā udakaṃ pavisitvā ramitvā vigatadarathā punappunaṃ imameva kuṭiṃ pavisāmāti vadati.

[03] ^b^na majja mantā^eb^ti ajja mama tassa gatakālato paṭṭhāya neva mantā paṭibhanti na upaṭṭhahanti na ruccanti. ^b^na aggihuttaṃ napi yaññatanta^eb^nti mahābrahmuno ārādhanatthāya kattabbahomavidhūpanādiyaññakiriyāpi me na paṭibhāti na upaṭṭhāti na ruccati. ^b^na cāpi te^eb^ti tayā ābhatamūlaphalāphalānipi na bhuñjāmi. ^b^yassaṃ disa^eb^nti yassaṃ disāyaṃ. ^b^vana^eb^nti tassa māṇavassa assamaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitavananti.
[03] tassevaṃ vilapantassa taṃ vilāpaṃ sutvā mahāsatto ``ekāya itthiyā imassa sīlaṃ bhinnaṃ bhavissatī''ti ñatvā taṃ ovadanto cha gāthāyo abhāsi --
[21] ``bhavanti mittāni atho na honti, ñātīsu mittesu karonti pemaṃ.
[22] ayañca jammo kissa vā niviṭṭho, yo neva jānāti `kutomhi āgato'..
[21] ``sace tuvaṃ dakkhasi brahmacāriṃ, sace tuvaṃ sallape brahmacārinā.
[21] ``punapi ce dakkhasi brahmacāriṃ, punapi ce sallape brahmacārinā.
[22] na tāni sevetha naro sapañño, āsajja naṃ nassati brahmacārī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^imasmā^eb^ti imasmiṃ. ^b^ha^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^jotirase^eb^ti hūyamānassa jotino raṃsiobhāsite. ^b^sanantanamhī^eb^ti porāṇake. ^b^pāpuṇethā^eb^ti pāpuṇeyya. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- tāta, evarūpe vane vasanto yaṃ aratiṃ tvaṃ patto, etādisaṃ na pāpuṇeyya paṇḍito kulaputto, pattuṃ nārahatīti attho.

[03] ^b^``bhavantī''^eb^ti imaṃ gāthaṃ mahāsatto antogatameva bhāsati. ayamettha adhippāyo -- loke sattānaṃ mittāni nāma hontipi na hontipi tattha yesaṃ honti, te attano ñātīsu ca mittesu ca pemaṃ karonti. ^b^ayañca jammo^eb^ti migasiṅgo lāmako. ^b^kissa vā niviṭṭho^eb^ti kena nāma kāraṇena tasmiṃ mātugāme mittasaññāya niviṭṭho, so migiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattitvā araññe vaḍḍhitattā ``kutomhi āgato''ti attano āgataṭṭhānamattampi ^a^P5.0209^ea^ na jānāti, pageva ñātimitteti.

[03] ^b^punappuna^eb^nti, tāta, mittāni nāma punappunaṃ saṃvāsena saṃsevanena sandhīyanti ghaṭīyanti. ^b^sveva mitto^eb^ti so eva mitto ^b^asaṃgantu^eb^ asamāgacchantassa purisassa tena asamāgamasaṅkhātena asaṃvāsena ^b^jīrati^eb^ vinassati ^a^M5.0220^ea^. ^b^sace^eb^ti tasmā, tāta, sace tvaṃ punapi taṃ dakkhasi, tena vā sallapissasi, atha yathā nāma nipphannasassaṃ mahoghena harīyati, evaṃ imaṃ attano tapoguṇaṃ pahissasi hāressasīti attho. ^b^usmāgata^eb^nti samaṇatejaṃ.

[03] ^b^virūparūpenā^eb^ti vividharūpena. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- tāta, manussalokasmiñhi etāni yakkhinisaṅkhātāni bhūtāni vividharūpapaṭicchannena attano rūpena attano vasaṃ gate khādituṃ caranti, tāni sapañño naro na sevetha. tādisañhi bhūtaṃ āsajja naṃ patvā nassati brahmacārī, diṭṭhosi tāya yakkhiniyā na khāditoti puttaṃ ovadi.

[03] so pitu kathaṃ sutvā ``yakkhinī kira sā''ti bhīto cittaṃ nivattetvā ``tāta, etto na gamissāmi, khamatha me''ti khamāpesi. sopi naṃ samassāsetvā ``ehi tvaṃ, māṇava, mettaṃ bhāvehi, karuṇaṃ, muditaṃ, upekkha''nti brahmavihārabhāvanaṃ ācikkhi. so tathā paṭipajjitvā puna jhānābhiññā nibbattesi.

[03] satthā ^a^V5.0199^ea^ imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. tadā niḷinikā purāṇadutiyikā ahosi, isisiṅgo ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu, pitā pana ahameva ahosinti.

[03] ^b^nivesanaṃ kassanudaṃ sunandā^eb^ti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. so kirekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caranto ekaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ uttamarūpadharaṃ itthiṃ oloketvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā cittaṃ nivattetuṃ asakkonto vihārameva āgantvā tato paṭṭhāya sallaviddho viya rāgāturo bhantamigapaṭibhāgo kiso dhamanīsanthatagatto uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto anabhirato ekiriyāpathepi ^a^M5.0221^ea^ cittassādaṃ alabhanto ācariyavattādīni pahāya uddesaparipucchākammaṭṭhānānuyogarahito vihāsi. so sahāyabhikkhūhi ``pubbe tvaṃ, āvuso, santindriyo vippasannamukhavaṇṇo, idāni no tathā, kiṃ ^a^P5.0210^ea^ nu kho kāraṇa''nti puṭṭho, ``āvuso, anabhiratomhī''ti āha. atha naṃ te ``abhiramāvuso, sāsane, buddhuppādo nāma dullabho, tathā saddhammassavanaṃ manussapaṭilābho ca, so tvaṃ manussapaṭilābhaṃ paṭilabhitvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ patthayamāno assumukhaṃ ñātijanaṃ pahāya saddhāya pabbajitvā kiṃkāraṇā kilesavasaṃ yāsi, kilesā nāmete gaṇḍuppādakapāṇakaṃ upādāya sabbabālajanasādhāraṇā, ye tesaṃ vatthubhūtā, tepi appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo. aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā, maṃsapesūpamā kāmā, tiṇukkūpamā kāmā, aṅgārakāsūpamā kāmā, supinakūpamā kāmā, yācitakūpamā kāmā, rukkhaphalūpamā kāmā, asisūnūpamā kāmā, sattisūlūpamā kāmā, sappasirūpamā kāmā, aggikkhandhūpamā kāmā, tvaṃ nāma evarūpe buddhasāsane pabbajitvā evaṃ anatthakārakānaṃ kilesānaṃ vasaṃ gatosī''ti ovaditvā attano kathaṃ gāhāpetuṃ asakkontā satthu santikaṃ dhammasabhaṃ netvā ``kiṃ, bhikkhave, anicchamānakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ānayitthā''ti vutte, ``bhante, ayaṃ kira bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhito''ti āhaṃsu. satthā ``saccaṃ kirā''ti pucchitvā ``saccaṃ, bhante''ti vutte ``bhikkhu porāṇakapaṇḍitā rajjaṃ anusāsantāpi kilese uppanne tassa vasaṃ agantvā cittaṃ nivāretvā na ayuttakaṃ kariṃsū''ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.

[03] atīte ^a^V5.0200^ea^ siviraṭṭhe ariṭṭhapuranagare sivi nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbatti, ``sivikumāro''tvevassa nāmaṃ kariṃsu. senāpatissapi putto jāyi, ``abhipārako''tissa nāmaṃ kariṃsu. te ubhopi sahāyā hutvā abhivaḍḍhantā soḷasavassikā hutvā takkasilaṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgamiṃsu. rājā puttassa rajjaṃ adāsi. sopi abhipārakaṃ senāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi. tasmiṃyeva nagare tiriṭivacchassa nāma asītikoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino dhītā nibbatti uttamarūpadharā sobhaggappattā subhalakkhaṇena samannāgatā, tassā nāmaggahaṇadivase ``ummādantī''ti ^a^M5.0222^ea^ nāmaṃ kariṃsu. sā soḷasavassikakāle atikkantamānusavaṇṇā devaccharā viya abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā ahosi. ye ye puthujjanā taṃ passanti, te te sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā ^a^P5.0211^ea^ surāpānamadamattā viya kilesamadena mattā hutvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ samatthā nāma nāhesuṃ.
