[03] tassattho ^a^V5.0301^ea^ ^a^P5.0310^ea^ -- tañca tattha vijambhantaṃ apphoṭentaṃ rañño antepure vātapānāni vivaritvā itthiyo udikkhiṃsūti.

[03] athassa maddarājā katāaneñjakāraṇaṃ alaṅkatavaravāraṇaṃ pesesi. so samussitasetacchattaṃ hatthikkhandhaṃ āruyha ``pabhāvatiṃ ānethā''ti tampi pacchato nisīdāpetvā caturaṅginiyā senāya parivuto pācīnadvārena ^a^M5.0329^ea^ nikkhamitvā parasenaṃ oloketvā ``ahaṃ kusarājā, jīvitatthikā urena nipajjantū''ti tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā sattumaddanaṃ akāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] kusassa rañño devindo, adā verocanaṃ maṇiṃ..
[21] ``so taṃ vijjhitvā saṅgāmaṃ, laddhā verocanaṃ maṇiṃ.
[21] ``sabbeva te vasaṃ gatā, amittā vihatā tava.
[22] kāmaṃ karohi te tayā, muñca vā te hanassu vā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0302^ea^ ^b^vipalāyiṃsū^eb^ti satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontā vipallatthacittā bhijjiṃsu. ^b^kusasaddabhayaṭṭitā^eb^ti kusarañño saddaṃ nissāya jātena bhayena upaddutā mūḷhacittā. ^b^aññamaññassa chindantī^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ chindanti maddanti. ``bhindiṃsū''tipi pāṭho. ^b^tasmi^eb^nti evaṃ bodhisattassa saddasavaneneva saṅgāme bhinne tasmiṃ saṅgāmasīse taṃ mahāsattassa parakkamaṃ passitvā tuṭṭhahadayo sakko verocanaṃ nāma maṇikkhandhaṃ tassa adāsi. ^b^nagaraṃ pura^eb^nti nagarasaṅkhātaṃ puraṃ. ^b^bandhitvā^eb^ti tesaññeva uttari sāṭakena pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā. ^b^kāmaṃ karohi te tayā^eb^ti tvaṃ attano kāmaṃ icchaṃ ruciṃ karohi, ete hi tayā dāsā katāyevāti.
[21] ``tuyheva sattavo ete, na hi te mayha sattavo.
[22] tvaññeva no mahārāja, muñca vā te hanassu vā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^tvaññeva no^eb^ti, mahārāja, tvaṃyeva amhākaṃ issaroti.
[03] evaṃ ^a^V5.0303^ea^ vutte mahāsatto ``kiṃ imehi māritehi, mā tesaṃ āgamanaṃ niratthakaṃ hotu, pabhāvatiyā kaniṭṭhā satta maddarājadhītaro atthi, tā nesaṃ dāpessāmī''ti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[22] dadāhi nesaṃ ekekaṃ, hontu jāmātaro tavā''ti..
[22] tvaññeva no mahārāja, dehi nesaṃ yadicchasī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^tvaṃ no sabbesa^eb^nti, mahārāja kusanarinda, kiṃ vadesi, tvaññeva etesañca sattannaṃ rājūnaṃ mamañca imāsañca sabbesaṃ no issaro. ^b^yadicchasī^eb^ti yadi icchasi, yassa vā yaṃ dātuṃ icchasi, tassa taṃ dehīti.
[03] evaṃ vutte so tā sabbāpi alaṅkārāpetvā ekekassa rañño ekekaṃ adāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā pañca gāthāyo abhāsi --
[22] khattiyānaṃ tadā tesaṃ, rañño maddassa dhītaro..
[22] samaggā te tadā āsuṃ, phītaṃ dharaṇimāvasu''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^pīṇitā^eb^ti santappitā. ^b^pāyiṃsū^eb^ti idāni appamattā bhaveyyāthāti kusanarindena ovaditā agamaṃsu. ^b^agamāsī^eb^ti katipāhaṃ vasitvā ``amhākaṃ raṭṭhaṃ ^a^P5.0312^ea^ gamissāmā''ti sasuraṃ āpucchitvā gato. ^b^ekarathe yantā^eb^ti dvepi ekarathaṃ abhiruyha gacchantā. ^b^samānā vaṇṇarūpenā^eb^ti vaṇṇena ca rūpena ca samānā hutvā. ^b^nāññamaññātirocisu^eb^nti eko ekaṃ nātikkami. maṇiratanānubhāvena kira mahāsatto abhirūpo ahosi suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sobhaggappatto, so kira pubbe paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātanissandena buddhapaṭimākaraṇanissandena ca evaṃ tejavanto ahosi. ^b^saṃgacchī^eb^ti athassa mātā mahāsattassa āgamanaṃ sutvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahāsattassa bahuṃ paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya paccuggamanaṃ katvā samāgacchi. sopi mātarā saddhiṃyeva nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sattāhaṃ chaṇakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā alaṅkatapāsādatalaṃ abhiruhi. tepi ubho jayampatikā samaggā ahesuṃ, tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ samaggā sammodamānā phītaṃ dharaṇiṃ ajjhāvasiṃsūti.

[03] satthā ^a^V5.0304^ea^ imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. tadā mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni ahesuṃ, kaniṭṭho ānando, khujjā khujjuttarā, pabhāvatī rāhulamātā, parisā buddhaparisā, kusarājā pana ahameva ahosinti.

[03] ^b^devatā nusi gandhabbo^eb^ti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mātuposakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. vatthu ^b^sāmajātake^eb^ (jā0 2.22.296 ādayo) vatthusadisaṃ. tadā pana satthā ``mā, bhikkhave, imaṃ bhikkhuṃ ujjhāyittha, porāṇakapaṇḍitā sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ labhamānāpi taṃ aggahetvā mātāpitaro posiṃsuyevā''ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.

[03] atīte ^a^M5.0332^ea^ bārāṇasī brahmavaḍḍhanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. tattha manojo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. tattha aññataro asītikoṭivibhavo brāhmaṇamahāsālo aputtako ahosi. tassa brāhmaṇī teneva ``bhoti puttaṃ patthehī''ti vuttā patthesi. atha bodhisatto brahmalokā cavitvā tassā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, jātassa cassa ``soṇakumāro''ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. tassa padasā gamanakāle aññopi satto brahmalokā cavitvā tassāyeva kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, tassa jātassa ``nandakumāro''ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. tesaṃ uggahitavedānaṃ sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ pattānaṃ vayappattānaṃ rūpasampadaṃ disvā brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ āmantetvā ``bhoti puttaṃ soṇakumāraṃ gharabandhanena bandhissāmā''ti āha. sā ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā puttassa tamatthaṃ ācikkhi ^a^P5.0313^ea^. so ``alaṃ, amma, mayhaṃ gharāvāsena, ahaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tumhe paṭijaggitvā tumhākaṃ accayena himavantaṃ pavisitvā pabbajissāmī''ti āha. sā brāhmaṇassa etamatthaṃ ārocesi.

[03] te punappunaṃ kathentāpi tassa cittaṃ alabhitvā nandakumāraṃ āmantetvā ``tāta, tena hi tvaṃ kuṭumbaṃ paṭipajjāhī''ti vatvā ``nāhaṃ bhātarā chaḍḍitakheḷaṃ sīsena ukkhipāmi, ahampi tumhākaṃ accayena bhātarāva saddhiṃ pabbajissāmī''ti vutte tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ``ime dve evaṃ taruṇāva kāme pajahanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana mayaṃ, sabbeyeva pabbajissāmā''ti cintetvā, ``tātā ^a^V5.0305^ea^, kiṃ vo amhākaṃ accayena pabbajjāya, idāneva sabbe mayaṃ pabbajissāmā''ti rañño ārocetvā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ dānamukhe vissajjetvā dāsajanaṃ bhujissaṃ katvā ñātīnaṃ dātabbayuttakaṃ datvā cattāropi janā brahmavaḍḍhananagarā nikkhamitvā himavantapadese pañcapadumasañchannaṃ saraṃ nissāya ramaṇīye vanasaṇḍe assamaṃ māpetvā pabbajitvā tattha vasiṃsu. ubhopi bhātaro mātāpitaro paṭijaggiṃsu, tesaṃ pātova dantakaṭṭhañca mukhadhovanañca datvā paṇṇasālañca pariveṇañca sammajjitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā araññato madhuraphalāphalāni āharitvā mātāpitaro khādāpenti, uṇhena vā sītena vā vārinā nhāpenti, jaṭā sodhenti, pādaparikammādīni tesaṃ karonti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M5.0333^ea^ addhāne gate nandapaṇḍito ``mayā ābhataphalāphalāneva paṭhamaṃ mātāpitaro khādāpessāmī''ti purato gantvā hiyyo ca parahiyyo ca gahitaṭṭhānato yāni vā tāni vā pātova āharitvā mātāpitaro khādāpesi. te tāni khāditvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā uposathikā bhavanti. soṇapaṇḍito pana dūraṃ gantvā madhuramadhurāni supakkasupakkāni āharitvā upanāmesi. atha naṃ, ``tāta, kaniṭṭhena te ābhatāni mayaṃ pātova khāditvā uposathikā jātā, na idāni no attho''ti vadanti. iti tassa phalāphalāni paribhogaṃ na labhanti vinassanti, punadivasesupi tathevāti ^a^P5.0314^ea^. evaṃ so pañcābhiññatāya dūraṃ gantvāpi āharati, te pana na khādanti.

[03] atha mahāsatto cintesi -- ``mātāpitaro me sukhumālā, nando ca yāni vā tāni vā apakkaduppakkāni phalāphalāni āharitvā khādāpeti, evaṃ sante ime na cīraṃ pavattissanti, vāressāmi na''nti. atha naṃ so āmantetvā ``nanda, ito paṭṭhāya phalāphalaṃ āharitvā mamāgamanaṃ paṭimānehi, ubhopi ekatova khādāpessāmā''ti āha. so evaṃ vuttepi attano puññaṃ paccāsīsanto na tassa vacanamakāsi. mahāsatto ``nando mama vacanaṃ akaronto ayuttaṃ karoti, palāpessāmi naṃ, tato ekakova mātāpitaro paṭijaggissāmī''ti cintetvā ``nanda, tvaṃ anovādako paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ na karosi, ahaṃ jeṭṭho, mātāpitaro mameva bhāro, ahameva nesaṃ paṭijaggissāmi, tvaṃ idha vasituṃ na lacchasi, aññattha yāhī''ti tassa accharaṃ pahari.

[03] so tena palāpito tassa santike ṭhātuṃ asakkonto taṃ vanditvā mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā attano paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā kasiṇaṃ oloketvā taṃ divasameva ^a^V5.0306^ea^ pañca abhiññāyo aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā cintesi -- ``ahaṃ sīnerupādato ratanavālukā āharitvā mama bhātu paṇṇasālāya pariveṇe okiritvā bhātaraṃ khamāpetuṃ pahomi, evampi na sobhissati, anotattato udakaṃ āharitvā mama bhātu paṇṇasālāya pariveṇe osiñcitvā bhātaraṃ khamāpetuṃ pahomi, evampi na sobhissati, sace me bhātaraṃ devatānaṃ vasena khamāpeyyaṃ, cattāro ca mahārājāno sakkañca ānetvā bhātaraṃ khamāpetuṃ pahomi, evampi na sobhissati ^a^M5.0334^ea^, sakalajambudīpe manojaṃ aggarājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā rājāno ānetvā khamāpessāmi, evaṃ sante mama bhātu guṇo sakalajambudīpe avattharitvā gamissati, candimasūriyo viya paññāyissatī''ti. so tāvadeva iddhiyā gantvā brahmavaḍḍhananagare tassa rañño nivesanadvāre otaritvā ṭhito ``eko kira ^a^P5.0315^ea^ vo tāpaso daṭṭhukāmo''ti rañño ārocāpesi. rājā ``kiṃ pabbajitassa mayā diṭṭhena, āhāratthāya āgato bhavissatī''ti bhattaṃ pahiṇi, so bhattaṃ na icchi. taṇḍulaṃ pahiṇi, taṇḍulaṃ na icchi. vatthāni pahiṇi, vatthāni na icchi. tambūlaṃ pahiṇi, tambūlaṃ na icchi. athassa santike dūtaṃ pesesi, ``kimatthaṃ āgatosī''ti. so dūtena puṭṭho ``rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahituṃ āgatomhī''ti āha. rājā taṃ sutvā ``bahū mama upaṭṭhākā, attanova tāpasadhammaṃ karotū''ti pesesi. so taṃ sutvā ``ahaṃ tumhākaṃ attano balena sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ gahetvā dassāmī''ti āha.

[03] taṃ sutvā rājā cintesi -- ``pabbajitā nāma paṇḍitā, kiñci upāyaṃ jānissantī''ti taṃ pakkosāpetvā āsane nisīdāpetvā vanditvā ``bhante, tumhe kira mayhaṃ sakalajambudīparajjaṃ gahetvā dassathā''ti pucchi. ``āma mahārājā''ti. ``kathaṃ gaṇhissathā''ti? ``mahārāja, antamaso khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ kassaci anuppādetvā tava dhanacchedaṃ akatvā attano iddhiyāva gahetvā dassāmi, apica kevalaṃ papañcaṃ akatvā ajjeva nikkhamituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti. so tassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā senaṅgaparivuto nagarā nikkhami. sace senāya uṇhaṃ hoti, nandapaṇḍito attano iddhiyā chāyaṃ katvā sītaṃ karoti, deve vassante senāya upari vassituṃ na deti, sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā vāreti, magge khāṇukaṇṭakādayo sabbaparissaye antaradhāpeti, maggaṃ kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samaṃ katvā sayaṃ ākāse cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā pallaṅkena nisinno senāya parivuto gacchati.

[03] evaṃ senaṃ ādāya paṭhamaṃ kosalaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā nagarassāvidūre khandhāvāraṃ nivāsāpetvā ``yuddhaṃ vā no detu setacchattaṃ vā''ti kosalarañño dūtaṃ pāhesi. so kujjhitvā ``kiṃ ahaṃ na rājā''ti ``yuddhaṃ dammī''ti senāya purakkhato nikkhami. dve ^a^P5.0316^ea^ senā yujjhituṃ ārabhiṃsu ^a^V5.0307^ea^. nandapaṇḍito dvinnampi antare attano nisīdanaṃ ajinacammaṃ mahantaṃ katvā pasāretvā dvīhipi ^a^M5.0335^ea^ senāhi khittasare cammeneva sampaṭicchi. ekasenāyapi koci kaṇḍena viddho nāma natthi, hatthagatānaṃ pana kaṇḍānaṃ khayena dvepi senā nirussāhā aṭṭhaṃsu. nandapaṇḍito manojarājassa santikaṃ gantvā ``mā bhāyi, mahārājā''ti assāsetvā kosalassa santikaṃ gantvā ``mahārāja, mā bhāyi, natthi te paripantho, tava rajjaṃ taveva bhavissati, kevalaṃ manojarañño vasavattī hohī''ti āha. so tassa saddahitvā ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchi. atha naṃ manojassa santikaṃ netvā ``mahārāja, kosalarājā te vase vattati, imassa rajjaṃ imasseva hotū''ti āha. so ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā taṃ attano vase vattetvā dve senā ādāya aṅgaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā aṅgaṃ gahetvā tato magadharaṭṭhanti etenupāyena sakalajambudīpe rājāno attano vase vattetvā tato tehi parivuto brahmavaḍḍhananagarameva gato. rajjaṃ gaṇhanto panesa sattannaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ upari sattadivasādhikehi sattamāsehi gaṇhi. so ekekarājadhānito nānappakāraṃ khajjabhojanaṃ āharāpetvā ekasatarājāno gahetvā tehi saddhiṃ sattāhaṃ mahāpānaṃ pivi.

[03] nandapaṇḍito ``yāva rājā sattāhaṃ issariyasukhaṃ anubhoti, tāvassa attānaṃ na dassessāmī''ti uttarakurumhi piṇḍāya caritvā himavante kañcanaguhādvāre sattāhaṃ vasi. manojopi sattame divase attano mahantaṃ sirivibhavaṃ oloketvā ``ayaṃ yaso na mayhaṃ mātāpitūhi, na aññehi dinno, nandatāpasaṃ nissāya uppanno, taṃ kho pana me apassantassa ajja sattamo divaso, kahaṃ nu kho me yasadāyako''ti nandapaṇḍitaṃ sari. so tassa anussaraṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgantvā purato ākāse aṭṭhāsi. rājā taṃ disvā cintesi -- ``ahaṃ imassa tāpasassa devatābhāvaṃ vā manussabhāvaṃ vā na jānāmi, sace esa ^a^P5.0317^ea^ manusso bhaveyya, sakalajambudīparajjaṃ etasseva dassāmi. atha devo, sakkāramassa karissāmī''ti. so taṃ vīmaṃsanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] manussabhūto iddhimā, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya''nti..
[03] so tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sabhāvameva kathento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``nāpi ^a^V5.0308^ea^ ^a^M5.0336^ea^ devo na gandhabbo, nāpi sakko purindado.
[03] taṃ sutvā rājā ``manussabhūto kirāyaṃ mayhaṃ evaṃ bahupakāro, mahantena yasena naṃ santappessāmī''ti cintetvā āha --
[21] ``tato phītāni raṭṭhāni, vasino te bhavaṃ akā.
[22] tato ekasataṃ khatye, anuyante bhavaṃ akā..
[21] ``atha vaṅge vā magadhe, mayaṃ bhoto dadāmase.
[22] atha vā assakāvantī, sumanā damma te mayaṃ..
[22] sace te attho rajjena, anusāsa yadicchasī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^katarūpamida^eb^nti katasabhāvaṃ. ^b^veyyāvacca^eb^nti kāyaveyyāvatikakammaṃ. ^b^anovassa^eb^nti avassaṃ, yathā devo na vassati ^a^P5.0318^ea^, tathā katanti attho. ^b^sītacchāya^eb^nti sītalaṃ chāyaṃ. ^b^vasino te^eb^ti te raṭṭhavāsino amhākaṃ vasavattino. ^b^khatye^eb^ti khattiye, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ayameva pāṭho. ^b^patītāssu^eb^ ^a^V5.0309^ea^ ^b^maya^eb^nti tuṭṭhā mayaṃ. ^b^vada taṃ bhañjamicchasī^eb^ti ^b^bhañja^eb^nti ratanassetaṃ nāmaṃ, varaṃ te dadāmi, yaṃ ratanaṃ icchasi, taṃ vadehīti attho. ^b^``hatthiyāna''ntiādīhi sarūpato taṃ taṃ ratanaṃ dasseti^eb^ ^a^M5.0337^ea^ ^b^. assakāvantī^eb^ assakaraṭṭhaṃ vā avantiraṭṭhaṃ vā. ^b^rajjenā^eb^ti sacepi te sakalajambudīparajjena attho, tampi te datvā ahaṃ phalakāvudhahattho tumhākaṃ rathassa purato gamissāmīti dīpeti. ^b^yadicchasī^eb^ti etesu mayā vuttappakāresu yaṃ icchasi, taṃ anusāsa āṇāpehīti.
[03] taṃ sutvā nandapaṇḍito attano adhippāyaṃ āvikaronto āha --
[21] ``na me atthopi rajjena, nagarena dhanena vā.
[22] athopi janapadena, attho mayhaṃ na vijjatī''ti..
[03] ``sace te mayi sineho atthi, ekaṃ me vacanaṃ karohī''ti vatvā gāthādvayamāha --
[22] pitā mayhaṃ janettī ca, ubho sammanti assame..
[22] bhavantaṃ ajjhāvaraṃ katvā, soṇaṃ yācemu saṃvara''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^raṭṭhe^eb^ti rajje. ^b^vijite^eb^ti āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne. ^b^assamo^eb^ti himavantāraññe eko assamo atthi. ^b^sammantī^eb^ti tasmiṃ assame vasanti. ^b^tesāha^eb^nti tesu ahaṃ. ^b^kātave^eb^ti vattapaṭivattaphalāphalāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ puññaṃ kātuṃ na labhāmi, bhātā me soṇapaṇḍito nāma mamekasmiṃ aparādhe mā idha vasīti maṃ palāpesi. ^b^ajjhāvara^eb^nti adhiāvaraṃ te mayaṃ bhavantaṃ saparivāraṃ katvā soṇapaṇḍitaṃ saṃvaraṃ yācemu, āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ yācāmāti attho. ``yācemimaṃ vara''ntipi pāṭho, mayaṃ tayā saddhiṃ soṇaṃ yāceyyāma khamāpeyyāma, imaṃ varaṃ tava santikā gaṇhāmīti attho.
[21] ``karomi ^a^V5.0310^ea^ te taṃ vacanaṃ, yaṃ maṃ bhaṇasi brāhmaṇa.
[22] etañca kho no akkhāhi, kīvanto hontu yācakā''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^P5.0319^ea^ ^a^M5.0338^ea^ ^b^karomī^eb^ti ahaṃ sakalajambudīparajjaṃ dadamāno ettakaṃ kiṃ na karissāmi, karomīti vadati. ^b^kīvanto^eb^ti kittakā.
[27] ime ca khattiyā sabbe, abhijātā yasassino.
[22] bhavañca rājā manojo, alaṃ hessanti yācakā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^jānapadā^eb^ti gahapatī. ^b^mahāsālā ca brāhmaṇā^eb^ti sārappattā brāhmaṇā ca parosatāyeva. ^b^alaṃ hessantī^eb^ti pariyattā bhavissanti. ^b^yācakā^eb^ti mamatthāya soṇapaṇḍitassa khamāpakā.
[21] ``hatthī asse ca yojentu, rathaṃ sannayha sārathi.
[22] assamaṃ taṃ gamissāmi, yattha sammati kosiyo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^yojentū^eb^ti hatthārohā hatthī, assārohā ca asse kappentu. ^b^rathaṃ sannayha sārathī^eb^ti sammasārathi tvampi rathaṃ sannayha. ^b^ābandhanānī^eb^ti hatthiassarathesu ābandhitabbāni bhaṇḍāni ca gaṇhatha. ^b^pādāsussārayaddhaje^eb^ti rathe ṭhapitadhajapādāsu dhaje ussārayantu ussāpentu. ^b^kosiyo^eb^ti yasmiṃ assame kosiyagotto vasatīti.
[22] agamā assamaṃ rammaṃ, yattha sammati kosiyo''ti.. -- ayaṃ abhisambuddhagāthā.

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0311^ea^ ^b^tato cā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, evaṃ vatvā tato so rājā ekasatakhattiye gahetvā mahatiyā senāya parivuto nandapaṇḍitaṃ purato katvā nagarā nikkhami. ^b^caturaṅgīnī^eb^ti caturaṅginiyā senāya agamāsi, antaramagge vattamānopi avassaṃ gāmitāya evaṃ vutto. catuvīsatiakkhobhaṇisaṅkhātena balakāyena saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipannassa tassa nandapaṇḍito iddhānubhāvena aṭṭhusabhavitthataṃ maggaṃ samaṃ māpetvā ^a^M5.0339^ea^ ākāse cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā senāya parivuto alaṅkatahatthikkhandhe nisīditvā gacchantena raññā saddhiṃ dhammayuttakathaṃ kathento sītauṇhādiparissaye vārento agamāsi.

[03] athassa assamaṃ pāpuṇanadivase soṇapaṇḍito ``mama kaniṭṭhassa atirekasattamāsasattadivasādhikāni satta vassāni ^a^P5.0320^ea^ nikkhantassā''ti āvajjetvā ``kahaṃ nu kho so etarahī''ti dibbena cakkhunā olokento ``catuvīsatiakkhobhaṇiparivārena saddhiṃ ekasatarājāno gahetvā mamaññeva khamāpetuṃ āgacchatī''ti disvā cintesi -- ``imehi rājūhi ceva parisāhi ca mama kaniṭṭhassa bahūni pāṭihāriyāni diṭṭhāni, mamānubhāvaṃ ajānitvā `ayaṃ kūṭajaṭilo attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāti, amhākaṃ ayyena saddhiṃ payojesī'ti maṃ vambhentā kathentā avīciparāyaṇā bhaveyyuṃ, iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ nesaṃ dassessāmī''ti. so caturaṅgulamattena aṃsaṃ aphusantaṃ ākāse kājaṃ ṭhapetvā anotattato udakaṃ āharituṃ rañño avidūre ākāsena pāyāsi. nandapaṇḍito taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā attānaṃ dassetuṃ avisahanto nisinnaṭṭhāneyeva antaradhāyitvā palāyitvā himavantaṃ pāvisi. manojarājā pana taṃ ramaṇīyena isivesena tathā āgacchantaṃ disvā gāthamāha --

[03] tattha ^b^kādambayo^eb^ti kadambarukkhamayo. ^b^aṃsaṃ asamphusaṃ etī^eb^ti aṃsaṃ asamphusanto sayameva āgacchati. ^b^udahārāyā^eb^ti udakaṃ āharituṃ gacchantassa kassa esa kājo evaṃ eti, ko nāma tvaṃ, kuto vā āgacchasīti.

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0340^ea^ ^b^sahitabbato^eb^ti sahitavato sīlācārasampanno eko tāpaso ahanti vadati. ^b^bharāmī^eb^ti posemi. ^b^atandito^eb^ti analaso hutvā. ^b^pubbe katamanussara^eb^nti tehi pubbe kataṃ mayhaṃ guṇaṃ anussarantoti.
[03] taṃ sutvā rājā tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ kattukāmo anantaraṃ gāthamāha --
[22] maggaṃ no soṇa akkhāhi, yena gacchemu assama''nti..
[03] atha mahāsatto attano ānubhāvena assamapadagāmimaggaṃ māpetvā gāthamāha --

[03] tassattho -- mahārāja, ayaṃ ekapadiko jaṅghamaggo, iminā gacchatha, yena disābhāgena etaṃ meghavaṇṇaṃ supupphitakoviḷārasañchannaṃ vanaṃ dissati, ettha mama pitā kosiyagotto vasati, etassa so assamoti.
[22] assamā nikkhamitvāna, sadvāramhi upāvisī''ti.. -- imā abhisambuddhagāthā.

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0341^ea^ ^b^pakkāmī^eb^ti anotattaṃ agamāsi. ^b^assamaṃ parimajjitvā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, so isi vegena anotattaṃ gantvā pānīyaṃ ādāya tesu rājūsu assamaṃ asampattesuyeva āgantvā pānīyaghaṭe pānīyamāḷake ṭhapetvā ``mahājano pivissatī''ti vanakusumehi vāsetvā sammajjaniṃ ādāya assamaṃ sammajjitvā paṇṇasāladvāre pitu āsanaṃ paññāpetvā pavisitvā pitaraṃ jānāpesīti attho. ^b^upāvisī^eb^ti uccāsane nisīdi.

[03] bodhisattassa mātā pana tassa pacchato nīcaṭṭhāne ekamantaṃ nisīdi. mahāsatto nīcāsane nisīdi. nandapaṇḍitopi bodhisattassa anotattato pānīyaṃ ādāya assamaṃ āgatakāle rañño santikaṃ āgantvā assamassa avidūre khandhāvāraṃ nivāsesi. atha rājā nhatvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito ekasatarājaparivuto nandapaṇḍitaṃ gahetvā mahantena sirisobhaggena bodhisattaṃ khamāpetuṃ assamaṃ pāvisi. atha naṃ tathā āgacchantaṃ bodhisattassa pitā disvā bodhisattaṃ pucchi, sopissa ācikkhi. tamatthaṃ ^a^P5.0322^ea^ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] yuvā kalāpasannaddho, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ..
[22] mukhañca rucirā bhāti, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ..
[22] samantā parikīrenti, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^jalantaṃrivā^eb^ti jalantaṃ viya. ^b^paṭipannānī^eb^ti etāni tūriyāni kassa purato āgacchantīti attho. ^b^hāsayantā^eb^ti tosentā. ^b^kañcanapaṭṭenā^eb^ti, tāta, kassa kañcanamayena vijjuvaṇṇena uṇhīsapaṭṭena nalāṭanto parikkhittoti pucchati. ^b^yuvā^eb^ti taruṇo. ^b^kalāpasannaddho^eb^ti ^a^V5.0315^ea^ sannaddhasaratūṇīro. ^b^ukkāmukhapahaṭṭhaṃ vā^eb^ti kammārānaṃ uddhane pahaṭṭhaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ viya. ^b^khadiraṅgārasannibha^eb^nti vītaccitakhadiraṅgāravaṇṇaṃ. ^b^ādiccaraṃsāvaraṇa^eb^ntiādiccaraṃsīnaṃ āvaraṇaṃ. ^b^aṅgaṃ pariggayhā^eb^ti aṅgaṃ pariggahetvā, sarīraṃ parikkhipitvāti attho. ^b^vālabījanimuttama^eb^nti vālabījaniṃ uttamaṃ ^a^P5.0323^ea^. ^b^carantī^eb^ti sañcaranti. ^b^chattānī^eb^ti ājānīyapiṭṭhe nisinnānaṃ dhāritachattāni. ^b^parikīrentī^eb^ti tassa samantā sabbadisābhāgesu parikīrayanti. ^b^caturaṅginī^eb^ti etehi hatthiādīhi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā. ^b^akkhobhaṇī^eb^ti khobhetuṃ na sakkā. ^b^sāgarassevā^eb^ti sāgarassa ūmiyo viya apariyantā. ^b^rājābhirājā^eb^ti ekasatarājūnaṃ pūjito, tesaṃ vā adhiko rājāti rājābhirājā. ^b^jayataṃ patī^eb^ti jayappattānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ jeṭṭhako. ^b^ajjhāvara^eb^nti mamaṃ khamāpanatthāya nandassa parisabhāvaṃ upagantvā eti.
[03] tattha ^b^isīnaṃ ajjhupāgamu^eb^nti, bhikkhave, sabbepi te rājāno surabhicandanena anulittā uttamakāsikavatthadhārino sirasi patiṭṭhāpitāñjalī hutvā isīnaṃ santikaṃ upagatā.
[03] tato manojo rājā taṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno paṭisanthāraṃ karonto gāthādvayamāha --
[21] ``kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmayaṃ.
[22] kacci uñchena yāpetha, kacci mūlaphalā bahū..
[22] vane vāḷamigākiṇṇe, kacci hiṃsā na vijjatī''ti..
[03] tato paraṃ ubhinnaṃ tesaṃ vacanapaṭivacanavasena kathitagāthā honti --
[22] atho uñchena yāpema, atho mūlaphalā bahū..
[22] vane vāḷamigākiṇṇe, hiṃsā mayhaṃ na vijjati..
[22] phalāni khuddakappāni, bhuñja rāja varaṃ varaṃ..
[22] tato piva mahārāja, sace tvaṃ abhikaṅkhasi..
[22] suṇātu bhavaṃ vacanaṃ, nandassa parisāya cā''ti..

[03] imā yebhuyyena pākaṭasambandhāyeva, yaṃ panettha apākaṭaṃ, tadeva vakkhāma. ^b^pavedayā^eb^ti yaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne tava abhirucitaṃ atthi, taṃ no kathehīti vadati. ^b^khuddakappānī^eb^ti etāni nānārukkhaphalāni khuddakamadhupaṭibhāgāni madhurāni. ^b^varaṃ vara^eb^nti ito uttamuttamaṃ gahetvā bhuñja. ^b^girigabbharā^eb^ti anotattato. ^b^sabbassa agghiya^eb^nti yena mayaṃ āpucchitā, taṃ amhehi paṭiggahitaṃ nāma tumhehi ca dinnameva nāma, ettāvatā imassa janassa sabbassa agghiyaṃ tumhehi kataṃ. ^b^nandassāpī^eb^ti amhākaṃ tāva sabbaṃ kataṃ, idāni pana nandapaṇḍito kiñci vattukāmo ^a^V5.0317^ea^, tassapi tāva vacanaṃ suṇātha. ^b^ajjhāvaramhā^eb^ti mayañhi na aññena kammena āgatā, nandassa pana parisā hutvā tumhākaṃ khamāpanatthāya āgatāti vadati. ^b^bhava^eb^nti bhavaṃ soṇapaṇḍito suṇātu.
[03] evaṃ vutte nandapaṇḍito uṭṭhāyāsanā mātāpitaro ca bhātarañca vanditvā sakaparisāya saddhiṃ sallapanto āha --
[27] ime ca khattiyā sabbe, abhijātā yasassino.
[22] bhavañca rājā manojo, anumaññantu me vaco..
[21] ``ye ca santi samītāro, yakkhāni idha massame.
[22] so tyāhaṃ dakkhiṇā bāhu, tava kosiya sammato..
[22] vīra puññamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ, mā maṃ kosiya vāraya..
[22] maggo saggassa lokassa, yathā jānāsi tvaṃ ise..
[22] taṃ maṃ puññā nivāreti, ariyamaggāvaro naro''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0318^ea^ ^b^anumaññantū^eb^ti anubujjhantu, sādhukaṃ sutvā paccakkhaṃ karontūti attho. ^b^samītāro^eb^ti samāgatā. ^b^araññe bhūtabhabyānī^eb^ti asmiṃ himavantāraññe yāni bhūtāni ceva vuḍḍhimariyādappattāni bhabyāni ca taruṇadevatāni, tānipi sabbāni mama vacanaṃ suṇantūti attho. ^b^``namo katvānā''^eb^ti idaṃ so parisāya saññaṃ datvā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nibbattadevatānaṃ namakkāraṃ katvā āha. tassattho -- ajja bahūhi devatāhi mama bhātikassa dhammakathāsavanatthaṃ āgatāhi bhavitabbaṃ, ahaṃ vo namakkāro, tumhepi mayhaṃ sahāyā hothāti. so devatānaṃ añjaliṃ paggahetvā parisaṃ jānāpetvā ^b^``isiṃ vakkhāmī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^isi^eb^nti soṇapaṇḍitaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^sammato^eb^ti bhātaro nāma aṅgasamā honti, tasmā so te ahaṃ dakkhiṇā bāhūti sammato. tena me khamituṃ arahathāti dīpeti.

[03] ^b^vīrā^eb^ti vīriyavanta mahāparakkama. ^b^puññamidaṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti idaṃ mātāpitūpaṭṭhānaṃ nāma puññaṃ saggasaṃvattanikakāraṇaṃ, taṃ karontaṃ maṃ mā vārayāti vadati. ^b^sabbhi heta^eb^nti etañhi mātāpitūpaṭṭhānaṃ nāma paṇḍitehi ^b^upaññātaṃ^eb^ upagantvā ñātañceva vaṇṇitañca. ^b^mametaṃ upanissajā^eb^ti idaṃ tvaṃ mayhaṃ nissaja vissajjehi dehi. ^b^uṭṭhānapāricariyāyā^eb^ti uṭṭhānena ca pāricariyāya ca. ^b^kata^eb^nti dīgharattaṃ tayā kusalaṃ kataṃ. ^b^puññānī^eb^ti idāni ahaṃ mātāpitūsu puññāni kattukāmo. ^b^mama lokadado^eb^ti tassa mama tvaṃ saggalokadado hoti, ahañhi tesaṃ vattaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ katvā devaloke aparimāṇaṃ yasaṃ labhissāmi, tassa me tvaṃ dāyako hohīti vadati.

[03] ^b^tathevā^eb^ti ^a^M5.0346^ea^ yathā tvaṃ jānāsi, tatheva aññepi manujā imissaṃ parisāyaṃ santi, te nānappakāre dhamme idaṃ jeṭṭhāpacāyikabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ dhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ vadanti. kinti? ^b^maggo saggassa lokassā^eb^ti. ^b^sukhāvaha^eb^nti uṭṭhānena ca pāricariyāya ca mātāpitūnaṃ sukhāvahaṃ. ^b^taṃ ma^eb^nti taṃ maṃ evaṃ sammāpaṭipannampi bhātā soṇapaṇḍito tamhā puññā abhivāreti. ^b^ariyamaggāvaro^eb^ti so evaṃ vārento ayaṃ naro mama piyadassanatāya ariyasaṅkhātassa vedalokassa maggāvaraṇo nāma hotīti.
[03] evaṃ ^a^P5.0326^ea^ nandapaṇḍitena vutte mahāsatto ``imassa tāva tumhehi vacanaṃ sutaṃ, idāni mamapi suṇāthā''ti sāvento āha --
[22] cārittena ca sampannā, na te gacchanti duggatiṃ..
[21] ``mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, bhaginī ñāti bandhavā.
[22] sabbe jeṭṭhassa te bhārā, evaṃ jānāhi bhāradha..

[03] tattha ^b^bhāturajjhāvarā^eb^ti mama bhātu parisā hutvā āgatā bhonto sabbepi rājāno mamapi tāva vacanaṃ suṇantu. ^b^parihāpaya^eb^nti parihāpento. ^b^dhammassā^eb^ti jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammassa paveṇīdhammassa. ^b^kusalā^eb^ti chekā. ^b^cārittena cā^eb^ti ācārasīlena sampannā. ^b^bhārā^eb^ti sabbe ete jeṭṭhena vahitabbā paṭijaggitabbāti tassa bhārā nāma. ^b^nāviko viyā^eb^ti yathā nāvāya garuṃ bhāraṃ ādiyitvā samuddamajjhe nāvaṃ sotthinā netuṃ nāviko ussaheti vāyamati, saha nāvāya sabbabhaṇḍañca jano ca tasseva bhāro hoti, tathā mameva sabbe ñātakā bhāroti ^a^M5.0347^ea^, ahañca te ussahāmi paṭijaggituṃ sakkomi, tañca jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammaṃ nappamajjāmi, na kevalañca etesaññeva, sakalassapi lokassa jeṭṭho ca asmi, tasmā ahameva saddhiṃ nandena paṭijaggituṃ yuttoti.

[03] taṃ sutvā sabbepi te rājāno attamanā hutvā ``jeṭṭhabhātikassa kira avasesā bhārāti ajja amhehi ñāta''nti nandapaṇḍitaṃ pahāya mahāsattaṃ sannissitā hutvā tassa thutiṃ karontā dve gāthā abhāsiṃsu --
[22] evameva no bhavaṃ dhammaṃ, kosiyo pavidaṃsayi..
[22] evameva no bhavaṃ dhammaṃ, kosiyo pavidaṃsayī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0327^ea^ ^b^adhigamā^eb^ti mayaṃ ito pubbe jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammapaṭicchādake tame vattamānā na jānāma, ajja jātavedato jālaṃva ñāṇaṃ adhigatā. ^b^evameva no^eb^ti yathā mahandhakāre pabbatamatthake jalito jātavedo samantā ālokaṃ pharanto rūpāni dasseti, tathā no bhavaṃ kosiyagotto dhammaṃ pavidaṃsayīti attho. ^b^vāsudevo^eb^ti vasudevo vasujotano, dhanapakāsanoti attho.

[03] iti mahāsatto ettakaṃ kālaṃ nandapaṇḍitassa pāṭihāriyāni disvā tasmiṃ pasannacitte te rājāno ñāṇabalena tasmiṃ pasādaṃ bhinditvā attano kathaṃ gāhāpetvā sabbeva attano mukhaṃ ullokite akāsi. atha nandapaṇḍito ``bhātā me paṇḍito byatto dhammakathiko sabbepime rājāno bhinditvā attano pakkhe kari, ṭhapetvā imaṃ añño mayhaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ natthi, imameva yācissāmī''ti cintetvā gāthamāha --

[03] tassatthā ^a^M5.0348^ea^ -- sace tumhe mama evaṃ yācamānassa khamāpanatthāya paggahitaṃ añjaliṃ nāvabujjhatha na paṭiggaṇhatha, tumheva mātāpitaro upaṭṭhahatha, ahaṃ pana tumhākaṃ baddhacaro veyyāvaccakaro hessaṃ, rattindivaṃ analasabhāvena vuṭṭhito paricārako ahaṃ tumhe paṭijaggissāmīti.

[03] mahāsattassa pakatiyāpi nandapaṇḍite doso vā veraṃ vā natthi, atithaddhaṃ vacanaṃ kathentassa panassa mānahāpanatthaṃ niggahavasena tathā katvā idānissa vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhacitto tasmiṃ pasādaṃ uppādetvā ``idāni te khamāmi, mātāpitaro ca paṭijaggituṃ labhissasī''ti tassa guṇaṃ pakāsento āha --
[22] ariyo ariyasamācāro, bāḷhaṃ tvaṃ mama ruccasi..
[22] nāyaṃ bhāro bhāramato, ahu mayhaṃ kudācanaṃ..
[22] nandaṃ vo varatha eko, kaṃ nando upatiṭṭhatū''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ariyo^eb^ti sundaro. ^b^ariyasamācāro^eb^ti sundarasamācāropi jāto. ^b^bāḷha^eb^nti idāni tvaṃ mama ativiya ruccasi. ^b^suṇāthā^eb^ti amma tātā tumhe mama vacanaṃ suṇātha. ^b^nāyaṃ bhāro^eb^ti ayaṃ tumhākaṃ paṭijagganabhāro na kadāci mama bhāramato ahu. ^b^taṃ ma^eb^nti taṃ bhāroti amaññitvāva maṃ tumhe upaṭṭhitaṃ samānaṃ. ^b^upaṭṭhānāya yācatī^eb^ti tumhe upaṭṭhātuṃ maṃ yācati. ^b^yo ve icchatī^eb^ti mayhañhi tvaṃ me mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā upaṭṭhahāti vattuṃ na yuttaṃ, tumhākaṃ pana santānaṃ brahmacārīnaṃ yo eko icchati, taṃ vadāmi kāmena ^b^nandaṃ vo varatha,^eb^ taṃ mama kaniṭṭhaṃ nandaṃ rocetha, tumhesu kaṃ esa upaṭṭhātu, ubhopi hi mayaṃ tumhākaṃ puttāyevāti.

[03] athassa ^a^M5.0349^ea^ mātā āsanā vuṭṭhāya, ``tāta soṇapaṇḍita, cirappavuttho te kaniṭṭho, evaṃ cirāgatampi taṃ yācituṃ na visahāmi, mayañhi taṃ nissitā, idāni pana tayā anuññātā ahaṃ etaṃ brahmacārinaṃ bāhāhi upagūhitvā sīse upasiṅghāyituṃ labheyya''nti imamatthaṃ pakāsentī gāthamāha --
[21] ``tayā tāta anuññātā, soṇa taṃ nissitā mayaṃ.

[03] atha mahāsatto ``tena hi, amma, anujānāmi, tvaṃ gaccha, puttaṃ nandaṃ āliṅgitvā sīse ghāyitvā cumbitvā tava hadaye sokaṃ nibbāpehī''ti āha. sā tassa santikaṃ gantvā nandapaṇḍitaṃ ^a^V5.0322^ea^ parisamajjheyeva āliṅgitvā sīsaṃ ghāyitvā cumbitvā hadaye sokaṃ nibbāpetvā mahāsattena saddhiṃ sallapantī āha --
[22] cirassaṃ nandaṃ disvāna, hadayaṃ me pavedhati..
[22] udaggā sumanā homi, nando no āgato ayaṃ..
[22] bhattucca mayhañca piyo, nando no pāvisī gharaṃ..
[21] ``pitupi nando suppiyo, yaṃ nando nappavase gharā.
[22] labhatū tāta nando taṃ, maṃ nando upatiṭṭhatū''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^māluterita^eb^nti yathā vātāhataṃ assatthassa pallavaṃ kampati, evaṃ cirassaṃ nandaṃ disvā ajja mama hadayaṃ kampatīti vadati. ^b^suttā^eb^ti, tāta soṇa, yadāhaṃ suttāpi supine nandaṃ āgataṃ passāmi, tadāpi udaggā homi. ^b^bhattuccā^eb^ti sāmikassa ca me mayhañca piyo. ^b^nando no pāvisī ghara^eb^nti, tāta, putto no nando paṇṇasālaṃ pavisatu. ^b^ya^eb^nti yasmā pitupi suṭṭhu piyo, tasmā puna imamhā gharā na vippavaseyya. ^b^nando^eb^ ^a^M5.0350^ea^ ^b^ta^eb^nti, tāta, nando yaṃ icchati, taṃ labhatu. ^b^maṃ nando^eb^ti, tāta soṇa, tava pitaraṃ tvaṃ upaṭṭhaha, maṃ nando upaṭṭhātu.

[03] mahāsatto ``evaṃ hotū''ti mātu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ``nanda, tayā jeṭṭhakakoṭṭhāso laddho, mātā nāma atiguṇakārikā, appamatto hutvā paṭijaggeyyāsī''ti ovaditvā mātu guṇaṃ pakāsento dve gāthā abhāsi --
[21] ``anukampikā ^a^V5.0323^ea^ patiṭṭhā ca, pubbe rasadadī ca no.
[22] maggo saggassa lokassa, mātā taṃ varate ise..
[22] maggo saggassa lokassa, mātā taṃ varate ise''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^anukampikā^eb^ti muduhadayā. ^b^pubbe rasadadī^eb^ti paṭhamameva attano khīrasaṅkhātassa rasassa dāyikā. ^b^mātā ta^eb^nti mama mātā maṃ na icchati, taṃ varati icchati. ^b^gottī^eb^ti gopāyikā. ^b^puññūpasaṃhitā^eb^ti puññūpanissitā puññadāyikā.

[03] evaṃ mahāsatto dvīhi gāthāhi mātu guṇaṃ kathetvā punāgantvā tassā āsane nisinnakāle ``nanda, tvaṃ dukkarakārikaṃ mātaraṃ labhasi, ubhopi mayaṃ mātarā dukkhena saṃvaḍḍhitā, taṃ idāni tvaṃ appamatto paṭijaggāhi, amadhurāni phalāphalāni mā khādāpehī''ti vatvā parisamajjheyeva mātu dukkarakārikataṃ pakāsento āha --
[22] tena dohaḷinī hoti, suhadā tena vuccati..
[22] tena sā janayantīti, janetti tena vuccati..
[22] rodantaṃ puttaṃ toseti, tosentī tena vuccati..
[22] ubhayampetassa gopeti, api puttassa no siyā..
[21] ``evaṃ putta aduṃ putta, iti mātā vihaññati.
[22] sāyaṃ puttaṃ anāyantaṃ, iti mātā vihaññati..
[22] mātaraṃ aparicaritvāna, kicchaṃ vā so nigacchati..
[22] pitaraṃ aparicaritvāna, kicchaṃ vā so nigacchati..
[21] ``dānañca piyavācā ca, atthacariyā ca yā idha.
[27] samānattatā ca dhammesu, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ.
[22] ete kho saṅgahā loke, rathassāṇīva yāyato..
[21] ``ete ^a^V5.0325^ea^ ca saṅgahā nāssu, na mātā puttakāraṇā.
[22] labhetha ^a^P5.0331^ea^ mānaṃ pūjaṃ vā, pitā vā puttakāraṇā..
[22] tasmā mahattaṃ papponti, pāsaṃsā ca bhavanti te..
[21] ``tasmā hi ne namasseyya, sakkareyya ca paṇḍito.
[27] annena atho pānena, vatthena sayanena ca.
[22] idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^puttaphala^eb^nti puttasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ. ^b^devatāya namassatī^eb^ti ``putto me uppajjatū''ti devatāya namakkāraṃ karoti āyācati. ^b^pucchatī^eb^ti ``katarena nakkhattena jāto putto dīghāyuko hoti, katarena appāyuko''ti evaṃ nakkhattāni ca pucchati. ^b^utusaṃvaccharāni cā^eb^ti ``channaṃ utūnaṃ katarasmiṃ utumhi jāto dīghāyuko hoti, katarasmiṃ utumhi appāyuko, kativassāya vā mātuyā jāto putto dīghāyuko hoti, kativassāya appāyuko''ti evaṃ utusaṃvaccharāni ca pucchati. ^b^utumhi nhātāyā^eb^ti pupphe uppanne utumhi nhātāya. ^b^vokkamo^eb^ti tiṇṇaṃ sannipātā gabbhāvakkanti hoti, kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāti. ^b^tenā^eb^ti tena gabbhena sā dohaḷinī hoti. ^b^tenā^eb^ti tadā tassā kucchimhi nibbattapajāya sineho uppajjati, tena kāraṇena ``suhadā''ti vuccati. ^b^tenā^eb^ti tena kāraṇena sā ``janayantī''ti ca ``janettī''ti ca vuccati.

[03] ^b^aṅgapāvuraṇena cā^eb^ti thanantare nipajjāpetvā sarīrasamphassaṃ pharāpentī aṅgasaṅkhāteneva pāvuraṇena. ^b^tosentī^eb^ti saññāpentī hāsentī. ^b^mamaṃ katvā udikkhatī^eb^ti ``puttassa me upari vāto paharati, ātapo pharatī''ti evaṃ mamaṃkāraṃ katvā siniddhena hadayena udikkhati. ^b^ubhayampetassā^eb^ti ^a^V5.0326^ea^ ubhayampi etaṃ dhanaṃ etassa puttassa atthāya aññesaṃ adassetvā sāragabbhādīsu mātā gopeti. ^b^evaṃ putta, aduṃ puttā^eb^ti ``andhabāla putta, evaṃ rājakulādīsu appamatto hohi, aduñca kammaṃ mā karohī''ti sikkhāpentī iti mātā vihaññati kilamati. ^b^pattayobbane^eb^ti ^a^M5.0353^ea^ putte pattayobbane taṃ puttaṃ nisīthe paradāresu pamattaṃ sāyaṃ anāgacchantaṃ ñatvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi maggaṃ olokentī vihaññati kilamati.

[03] ^b^kicchā bhato^eb^ti kicchena bhato paṭijaggito. ^b^micchā caritvānā^eb^ti mātaraṃ apaṭijaggitvā. ^b^dhanāpī^eb^ti dhanampi, ayameva vā pāṭho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- dhanakāmānaṃ ^a^P5.0332^ea^ uppannaṃ dhanampi mātaraṃ apaṭijaggantānaṃ nassatīti me sutanti. ^b^kicchaṃ vā so^eb^ti iti dhanaṃ vā tassa nassati, dukkhaṃ vāso puriso nigacchati. ^b^labbhameta^eb^nti etaṃ idhaloke ca paraloke ca ānandādisukhaṃ mātaraṃ paricaritvā vijānato paṇḍitassa labbhaṃ, sakkā laddhuṃ tādisenāti attho.

[03] ^b^dānañcā^eb^ti mātāpitūnaṃ dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, piyavacanaṃ bhaṇitabbaṃ, uppannakiccasādhanavasena attho caritabbo. ^b^dhammesū^eb^ti jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammesu tattha tattha parisamajjhe vā rahogatānaṃ vā abhivādanādivasena samānattatā kātabbā, na raho abhivādanādīni katvā parisati na kātabbāni, sabbattha samāneneva bhavitabbaṃ. ^b^ete ca saṅgahā nāssū^eb^ti sace ete cattāro saṅgahā na bhaveyyuṃ. ^b^sammapekkhantī^eb^ti sammā nayena kāraṇena pekkhanti. ^b^mahatta^eb^nti seṭṭhattaṃ. ^b^brahmā^eb^ti puttānaṃ brahmasamā uttamā seṭṭhā. ^b^pubbācariyā^eb^ti paṭhamācariyā. ^b^āhuneyyā^eb^ti āhunapaṭiggāhakā yassa kassaci sakkārassa anucchavikā. ^b^annena atho^eb^ti annena ceva attho pānena ca. ^b^peccā^eb^ti kālakiriyāya pariyosāne ito gantvā sagge pamodatīti.

[03] evaṃ mahasatto sineruṃ pavaṭṭento viya dhammadesanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. taṃ sutvā sabbepi te rājāno balakāyā ca pasīdiṃsu. atha ne pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā ``dānādīsu appamattā hothā''ti ovaditvā uyyojesi. sabbepi dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā āyupariyosāne devanagaraṃ pūrayiṃsu. soṇapaṇḍitanandapaṇḍitāpi yāvatāyukaṃ mātāpitaro paricaritvā brahmalokaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.

[03] satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne mātuposakabhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. tadā mātāpitaro māhārājakulāni ^a^V5.0327^ea^ ahesuṃ, nandapaṇḍito ānando ^a^M5.0354^ea^, manojarājā sāriputto, ekasatarājāno asītimahātherā ceva aññataratherā ca, catuvīsati akkhobhaṇiyo buddhaparisā, soṇapaṇḍito pana ahameva ahosinti.
[22] atha soṇasunandavaro ca puna, abhivāsitasattatimamhi suteti..

[03] ^b^sumukhā^eb^ti ^a^V5.0328^ea^ ^a^M5.0355^ea^ ^a^P5.0333^ea^ idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto āyasmato ānandassa jīvitapariccāgaṃ ārabbha kathesi. devadattena hi tathāgataṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ payojitesu dhanuggahesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ pesitena āgantvā ``nāhaṃ, bhante, sakkomi taṃ bhagavantaṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ, mahiddhiko so bhagavā mahānubhāvo''ti vutte devadatto ``alaṃ, āvuso, mā tvaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā voropehi, ahameva samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā voropessāmī''ti vatvā tathāgate gijjhakūṭapabbatassa pacchimachāyāya caṅkamante sayaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ pabbataṃ abhiruhitvā yantavegena mahatiṃ silaṃ pavijjhi, ``imāya silāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā voropessāmī''ti. tadā dve pabbatakūṭā samāgantvā taṃ silaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu. tato papaṭikā uppatitvā bhagavato pādaṃ paharitvā ruhiraṃ uppādesi, balavavedanā pavattiṃsu. jīvako tathāgatassa pādaṃ satthakena phāletvā duṭṭhalohitaṃ vametvā pūtimaṃsaṃ apanetvā dhovitvā bhesajjaṃ ālimpitvā nirogamakāsi. satthā purimasadisameva bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto mahatiyā buddhalīlāya vicari.

[03] atha naṃ disvā devadatto cintesi -- ``samaṇassa gotamassa rūpasobhaggappattaṃ sarīraṃ disvā koci manussabhūto upasaṅkamituṃ na sakkoti, rañño kho pana nāḷāgiri nāma hatthī caṇḍo pharuso ^a^P5.0334^ea^ manussaghātako buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe na jānāti, so taṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessatī''ti. so gantvā rañño tamatthaṃ ārocesi. rājā ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā hatthācariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā ``samma, sve nāḷāgiriṃ mattaṃ katvā pātova samaṇena gotamena paṭipannavīthiyaṃ vissajjehī''ti āha. devadattopi naṃ ``aññesu divasesu hatthī kittakaṃ suraṃ pivatī''ti pucchitvā ``aṭṭha ghaṭe, bhante''ti vutte ``tena hi sve tvaṃ taṃ soḷasa ghaṭe ^a^M5.0356^ea^ pāyetvā samaṇena gotamena paṭipannavīthiyaṃ abhimukhaṃ kareyyāsī''ti āha. so ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchi. rājā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi -- ``sve nāḷāgiriṃ mattaṃ katvā nagare vissajjessati, nāgarā pātova sabbakiccāni katvā antaravīthiṃ mā paṭipajjiṃsū''ti. devadattopi ^a^V5.0329^ea^ rājanivesanā oruyha hatthisālaṃ gantvā hatthigopake āmantetvā ``mayaṃ bhaṇe uccaṭṭhāniyaṃ nīcaṭṭhāne, nīcaṭṭhāniyaṃ vā uccaṭṭhāne kātuṃ samatthā, sace vo yasena attho, sve pātova nāḷāgiriṃ tikhiṇasurāya soḷasa ghaṭe pāyetvā samaṇassa gotamassa āgamanavelāya tuttatomarehi vijjhitvā kujjhāpetvā hatthisālaṃ bhindāpetvā samaṇena gotamena paṭipannavīthiyaṃ abhimukhaṃ katvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpethā''ti āha. te ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchiṃsu.

[03] sā pavatti sakalanagare vitthārikā ahosi. buddhadhammasaṅghamāmakā upāsakā taṃ sutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``bhante, devadatto raññā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā sve tumhehi paṭipannavīthiyaṃ nāḷāgiriṃ vissajjāpessati, sve piṇḍāya apavisitvā idheva hotha, mayaṃ vihāreyeva buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmā''ti vadiṃsu. satthāpi ``sve piṇḍāya na pavisissāmī''ti avatvāva ``ahaṃ sve nāḷāgiriṃ dametvā pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā titthiye madditvā rājagahe piṇḍāya acaritvāva bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nagarā nikkhamitvā veḷuvanameva āgamissāmi, rājagahavāsinopi bahūni bhattabhājanāni gahetvā veḷuvanameva āgamissanti, sve vihāreyeva bhattaggaṃ bhavissatī''ti iminā kāraṇena tesaṃ adhivāsesi. te tathāgatassa adhivāsanaṃ viditvā bhattabhājanāni āharitvā ``vihāreyeva dānaṃ dassāmā''ti pakkamiṃsu.

[03] satthāpi paṭhamayāme dhammaṃ desetvā majjhimayāme devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjetvā pacchimayāmassa paṭhamakoṭṭhāse sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā dutiyakoṭṭhāse phalasamāpattiyā ^a^P5.0335^ea^ vītināmetvā tatiyakoṭṭhāse mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya bodhaneyyabandhave olokento nāḷāgiridamane caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayaṃ disvā vibhātāya rattiyā katasarīrapaṭijaggano hutvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantetvā ^a^M5.0357^ea^, ``ānanda, ajja rājagahaparivattakesu aṭṭhārasasu mahāvihāresu sabbesampi bhikkhūnaṃ mayāsaddhiṃ rājagahaṃ pavisituṃ ārocehī''ti āha. thero tathā akāsi. sabbepi bhikkhū veḷuvane sannipatiṃsu. satthā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahaṃ pāvisi. atha hatthimeṇḍā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu, mahanto samāgamo ahosi. saddhāsampannā manussā ``ajja kira buddhanāgassa tiracchānanāgena saṅgāmo bhavissati, anūpamāya buddhalīlāya nāḷāgiridamanaṃ passissāmā''ti pāsādahammiyagehacchadanādīni abhiruhitvā aṭṭhaṃsu. asaddhā pana micchādiṭṭhikā ``ayaṃ nāḷāgiri caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako buddhādīnaṃ guṇaṃ na jānāti, so ajja samaṇassa gotamassa ^a^V5.0330^ea^ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ viddhaṃsetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessati, ajja paccāmittassa piṭṭhiṃ passissāmā''ti pāsādādīsu aṭṭhaṃsu.

[03] hatthīpi bhagavantaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā manusse tāsento gehāni viddhaṃsento sakaṭāni saṃcuṇṇento soṇḍaṃ ussāpetvā pahaṭṭhakaṇṇavālo pabbato viya ajjhottharanto yena bhagavā tenābhidhāvi. taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ -- ``ayaṃ, bhante, nāḷāgiri caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako imaṃ racchaṃ paṭipanno, na kho panāyaṃ buddhādiguṇaṃ jānāti, paṭikkamatu, bhante, bhagavā, paṭikkamatu sugato''ti. mā, bhikkhave, bhāyittha, paṭibalo ahaṃ nāḷāgiriṃ dametunti. athāyasmā sāriputto satthāraṃ yāci -- ``bhante, pitu uppannakiccaṃ nāma jeṭṭhaputtassa bhāro, ahameva taṃ damemī''ti. atha naṃ satthā, ``sāriputta, buddhabalaṃ nāma aññaṃ, sāvakabalaṃ aññaṃ, tiṭṭha tva''nti paṭibāhi. evaṃ yebhuyyena asīti mahātherā yāciṃsu. satthā sabbepi paṭibāhi. atha āyasmā ānando satthari balavasinehena adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto ``ayaṃ hatthī paṭhamaṃ maṃ māretū''ti tathāgatassatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā gantvā satthu purato aṭṭhāsi. atha naṃ satthā ``apehi, ānanda, mā me purato aṭṭhāsī''ti āha. ``bhante, ayaṃ hatthī caṇḍo ^a^P5.0336^ea^ pharuso manussaghātako kappuṭṭhānaggisadiso paṭhamaṃ maṃ māretvā pacchā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchatū''ti thero avaca. yāvatatiyaṃ vuccamānopi tatheva aṭṭhāsi na paṭikkami. atha naṃ bhagavā iddhibalena paṭikkamāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ antare ṭhapesi.

[03] tasmiṃ ^a^M5.0358^ea^ khaṇe ekā itthī nāḷāgiriṃ disvā maraṇabhayabhītā palāyamānā aṅkena gahitaṃ dārakaṃ hatthino ca tathāgatassa ca antare chaḍḍetvā palāyi. hatthī taṃ anubandhitvā nivattitvā dārakassa santikaṃ agamāsi. tadā dārako mahāravaṃ ravi. satthā nāḷāgiriṃ odissakamettāya pharitvā sumadhuraṃ brahmassaraṃ nicchāretvā ``ambho nāḷāgiri taṃ soḷasa surāghaṭe pāyetvā mattaṃ karontā na `aññaṃ gaṇhissatī'ti kariṃsu, `maṃ gaṇhissatī'ti pana kariṃsu, mā akāraṇena jaṅghāyo kilamento vicari, ito ehī''ti pakkosi. so satthu vacanaṃ sutvā akkhīni ummīletvā bhagavato rūpasiriṃ oloketvā paṭiladdhasaṃvego buddhatejena pacchinnasurāmado soṇḍaṃ olambento kaṇṇe cālento āgantvā tathāgatassa pādesu pati. atha naṃ satthā, ``nāḷāgiri, tvaṃ tiracchānahatthī, ahaṃ buddhavāraṇo, ito paṭṭhāya mā caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako bhava, sabbasattesu mettacittaṃ paṭilabhā''ti vatvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā kumbhe parāmasitvā --
[21] ``mā ^a^V5.0331^ea^ kuñjara nāgamāsado, dukkho hi kuñjara nāgamāsado.
[22] na hi nāgahatassa kuñjara, sugati hoti ito paraṃ yato..
[21] ``mā ca mado mā ca pamādo, na hi pamattā sugatiṃ vajanti te.
[22] tvaññeva tathā karissasi, yena tvaṃ sugatiṃ gamissasī''ti.. (cūḷava0 342) --

[03] tassa sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ ahosi. sace kira tiracchānagato nābhavissā, sotāpattiphalaṃ adhigamissā. manussā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā unnadiṃsu apphoṭiṃsu, sañjātasomanassā nānābharaṇāni khipiṃsu, tāni hatthissa sarīraṃ paṭicchādayiṃsu. tato paṭṭhāya ^a^P5.0337^ea^ nāḷāgiri dhanapālako nāma jāto. tasmiṃ kho pana dhanapālakasamāgame caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni amataṃ piviṃsu. satthā dhanapālakaṃ pañcasu ^a^M5.0359^ea^ sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi. so soṇḍāya bhagavato pāde paṃsūni gahetvā upari muddhani ākiritvā paṭikuṭitova paṭikkamitvā dassanūpacāre ṭhito dasabalaṃ vanditvā nivattitvā hatthisālaṃ pāvisi. tato paṭṭhāya dantasudanto hutvā na kañci viheṭheti. satthā nipphannamanoratho ``yehi yaṃ dhanaṃ khittaṃ, tesaññeva taṃ hotū''ti adhiṭṭhāya ``ajja mayā mahantaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kataṃ, imasmiṃ nagare piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ appaṭirūpa''nti titthiye madditvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto jayappatto viya khattiyo nagarā nikkhamitvā veḷuvanameva gato. nagaravāsino bahuṃ annapānakhādanīyaṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ pavattayiṃsu.

[03] taṃ divasaṃ sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhaṃ pūretvā sannisinnā bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ -- ``āvuso, āyasmatā ānandena tathāgatassatthāya attano jīvitaṃ pariccajantena dukkaraṃ kataṃ, nāḷāgiriṃ disvā satthārā tikkhattuṃ paṭibāhiyamānopi nāpagato, aho dukkarakārako, āvuso, āyasmā ānando''ti. satthā ``ānandassa guṇakathā pavattati, gantabbaṃ mayā etthā''ti gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā āgantvā ``kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā''ti pucchitvā ``imāya nāmā''ti vutte ``na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi ānando tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi mamatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajiyevā''ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.

[03] atīte ^a^V5.0332^ea^ mahiṃsakaraṭṭhe sāgalanagare sāgalo nāma rājā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi. tadā nagarato avidūre ekasmiṃ nesādagāmake aññataro nesādo pāsehi sakuṇe bandhitvā nagare vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ kappesi. nagarato ca avidūre āvaṭṭato dvādasayojano mānusiyo nāma padumasaro ahosi pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchanno. tattha nānappakāro sakuṇasaṅgho otari. so nesādo tattha aniyāmena pāse oḍḍesi. tasmiṃ kāle dhataraṭṭho haṃsarājā channavutihaṃsasahassaparivāro cittakūṭapabbate suvaṇṇaguhāyaṃ vasati, sumukho nāmassa senāpati ahosi. athekadivasaṃ tato haṃsayūthā katipayā ^a^P5.0338^ea^ suvaṇṇahaṃsā mānusiyaṃ saraṃ gantvā pahūtagocare tasmiṃ yathāsukhaṃ vicaritvā suhitā cittakūṭaṃ āgantvā dhataraṭṭhassa ārocesuṃ -- ``mahārāja, manussapathe ^a^M5.0360^ea^ mānusiyo nāma padumasaro sampannagocaro, tattha gocaraṃ gaṇhituṃ gacchāmā''ti. so ``manussapatho nāma sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo, mā vo ruccitthā''ti paṭikkhipitvāpi tehi punappunaṃ vuccamāno ``sace tumhākaṃ ruccati, gacchāmā''ti saparivāro taṃ saraṃ agamāsi. so ākāsā otaranto pādaṃ pāse pavesentoyeva otari. athassa pāso pādaṃ ayapaṭṭakena kaḍḍhanto viya ābandhitvā gaṇhi. athassa ``chindissāmi na''nti ākaḍḍhantassa paṭhamavāre cammaṃ chijji, dutiyavāre maṃsaṃ chijji, tatiyavāre nhāru chijji, pāso aṭṭhiṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi, lohitaṃ pagghari, balavavedanā pavattiṃsu.

[03] so cintesi -- ``sacāhaṃ baddharavaṃ ravissāmi, ñātakā me utrastā hutvā gocaraṃ aggaṇhitvā chātajjhattāva palāyantā dubbalatāya mahāsamudde patissantī''ti. so vedanaṃ adhivāsetvā ñātīnaṃ yāvadatthaṃ caritvā haṃsānaṃ kīḷanakāle mahantena saddena baddharavaṃ ravi. taṃ sutvā te haṃsā maraṇabhayatajjitā vaggavaggā hutvā cittakūṭābhimukhā pakkamiṃsu. tesu pakkantesu sumukho haṃsasenāpati ``kacci nu kho idaṃ bhayaṃ mahārājassa uppannaṃ, jānissāmi na''nti vegena pakkhanditvā purato gacchantassa haṃsagaṇassa antare mahāsattaṃ adisvā majjhimahaṃsagaṇaṃ vicini, tatthapi adisvā pacchimahaṃsagaṇaṃ vicini, tatthapi adisvā ``nissaṃsayaṃ tassevedaṃ bhayaṃ uppanna''nti nivattitvā ^a^P5.0339^ea^ āgacchanto mahāsattaṃ pāse baddhaṃ lohitamakkhitaṃ dukkhāturaṃ paṅkapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ disvā ``mā bhāyi, mahārāja, ahaṃ mama jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā tumhe pāsato mocessāmī''ti vadanto otaritvā mahāsattaṃ assāsentova paṅkapiṭṭhe nisīdi. atha naṃ vīmaṃsanto mahāsatto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] gaccha tuvampi mā kaṅkhi, natthi baddhe sahāyatā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0333^ea^ ^b^anupacinantā^eb^ti sinehena ālayavasena anolokentā. ^b^pakkamantī^eb^ti ete channavuti haṃsasahassā ñātivihaṅgamā maṃ chaḍḍetvā gacchanti, tvampi gaccha, mā idha vāsaṃ ākaṅkhi, evañhi pāsena baddhe mayi sahāyatā nāma natthi, na hi te ahaṃ idāni kiñci sahāyakiccaṃ kātuṃ ^a^M5.0361^ea^ sakkhissāmi, kiṃ te mayā nirūpakārena, papañcaṃ akatvā gacchevāti vadati.
[21] ``gacche vāhaṃ na vā gacche, na tena amaro siyaṃ.
[22] sukhitaṃ taṃ upāsitvā, dukkhitaṃ taṃ kathaṃ jahe..
[21] ``maraṇaṃ vā tayā saddhiṃ, jīvitaṃ vā tayā vinā.
[22] tadeva maraṇaṃ seyyo, yañce jīve tayā vinā..
[21] ``nesa dhammo mahārāja, yaṃ taṃ evaṃ gataṃ jahe.
[22] yā gati tuyhaṃ sā mayhaṃ, ruccate vihagādhipa..
[21] ``kā nu pāsena baddhassa, gati aññā mahānasā.
[22] sā kathaṃ cetayānassa, muttassa tava ruccati..
[21] ``kaṃ vā tvaṃ passase atthaṃ, mama tuyhañca pakkhima.
[21] ``kathaṃ nu patataṃ seṭṭha, dhamme atthaṃ na bujjhasi.
[22] dhammo apacito santo, atthaṃ dasseti pāṇinaṃ..
[40] 10^b^.^eb^ ``addhā eso sataṃ dhammo, yo mitto mittamāpade.
[21] ``svāyaṃ dhammo ca te ciṇṇo, bhatti ca viditā mayi.
[21] ``api tvevaṃ gate kāle, yaṃ khaṇḍaṃ ñātinaṃ mayā.
[21] ``yaṃ ^a^V5.0335^ea^ nu pāsena mahatā, baddho na kurute disaṃ.
[22] atha kasmā abaddho tvaṃ, balī pakkhi na gacchasi..
[21] ``kiṃ nu tyāyaṃ dijo hoti, mutto baddhaṃ upāsasi.
[22] ohāya sakuṇā yanti, kiṃ eko avahīyasi..
[21] ``rājā me so dijāmitta, sakhā pāṇasamo ca me.
[22] neva naṃ vijahissāmi, yāva kālassa pariyāyaṃ..
[22] atha jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhati..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0363^ea^ ^b^gacche vā^eb^ti, mahārāja, ahaṃ ito gaccheyyaṃ vā na vā, nāhaṃ tena gamanena vā agamanena vā amaro siyaṃ, ahañhi ito gatopi agatopi maraṇato amuttova, ito pubbe pana sukhitaṃ taṃ upāsitvā idāni dukkhitaṃ taṃ kathaṃ jaheyyanti vadati. ^b^maraṇaṃ vā^eb^ti mama agacchantassa vā tayā saddhiṃ maraṇaṃ bhaveyya, gacchantassa vā tayā vinā jīvitaṃ. tesu dvīsu yaṃ tayā saddhiṃ maraṇaṃ, tadeva me varaṃ, yaṃ tayā vinā jīveyyaṃ, na me taṃ varanti attho. ^b^ruccate^eb^ti yā tava gati nipphatti, sāva mayhaṃ ruccati. ^b^sā katha^eb^nti samma sumukha mama tāva daḷhena vālapāsena baddhassa parahatthaṃ gatassa sā gati ruccatu, tava pana ^b^cetayānassa^eb^ sacetanassa paññavato muttassa kathaṃ ruccati.

[01] ^b^pakkhimā^eb^ti pakkhasampanna. ^b^ubhinna^eb^nti amhākaṃ dvinnaṃ jīvitakkhaye sati tvaṃ mama vā tava ^a^V5.0336^ea^ vā avasiṭṭhañātīnaṃ vā kaṃ atthaṃ passasi. ^b^yaṃ nā^eb^ti ettha ^b^na^eb^-kāro upamāne. ^b^kañcanadepiñchā^eb^ti kañcanadvepiñcha, ayameva vā pāṭho, kañcanasadisaubhayapakkhāti attho. ^b^tamasā^eb^ti tamasi. ^b^gata^eb^nti kataṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. purimassa ^b^na^eb^-kārassa iminā sambandho, ``na kata''nti kataṃ viyāti attho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- tayi pāṇaṃ cajantepi acajantepi mama jīvitassa abhāvā yaṃ tava pāṇasañcajanaṃ, taṃ andhena tamasi kataṃ viya kiñcideva rūpakammaṃ apaccakkhaguṇaṃ, tādise tava apaccakkhaguṇe pāṇasañcajane tvaṃ pāṇaṃ sañcajanto kamatthaṃ joteyyāsīti.

[03] ^b^dhammo apacito santo^eb^ti dhammo pūjito mānito samāno. ^b^atthaṃ dassetī^eb^ti vuddhiṃ dasseti. ^b^apekkhāno^eb^ti apekkhanto. ^b^dhammā cattha^eb^nti dhammato ca atthaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ passanto ^a^P5.0342^ea^. ^b^bhatti^eb^nti sinehaṃ. sataṃ ^b^dhammo^eb^ti paṇḍitānaṃ sabhāvo. ^b^yo mitto^eb^ti yo mitto āpadāsu mittaṃ na caje, tassa acajantassa mittassa esa sabhāvo nāma addhā sataṃ dhammo. ^b^viditā^eb^ti pākaṭā jātā. ^b^kāmaṃ karassū^eb^ti etaṃ mama kāmaṃ mayā icchitaṃ mama vacanaṃ karassu. ^b^api tvevaṃ gate kāle^eb^ti api tu evaṃ gate kāle mayi imasmiṃ ṭhāne pāsena baddhe. ^b^paramasaṃvuta^eb^nti paramaparipuṇṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^iccevaṃ mantayantāna^eb^nti ``gaccha, na gacchāmī''ti evaṃ kathentānaṃ ^b^ariyāna^eb^nti ācārāriyānaṃ. ^b^paccadissathā^eb^ti kāsāyāni nivāsetvā rattamālaṃ piḷandhitvā ^a^M5.0364^ea^ muggaraṃ ādāya āgacchanto adissatha. ^b^āturāna^eb^nti gilānānaṃ maccu viya. ^b^abhisañcikkhā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, te ubhopi sattuṃ āyantaṃ passitvā. ^b^hitā^eb^ti dīgharattaṃ aññamaññassa hitā muducittā. ^b^na sañcalesumāsanā^eb^ti āsanato na caliṃsu, yathānisinnāva ahesuṃ. sumukho pana ``ayaṃ nesādo āgantvā paharanto maṃ paṭhamaṃ paharatū''ti cintetvā mahāsattaṃ pacchato katvā nisīdi.

[03] ^b^dhataraṭṭhe^eb^ti haṃse. ^b^samuḍḍente^eb^ti maraṇabhayena ito cito ca uppatante disvā. ^b^āsajjā^eb^ti itare dve jane upagantvā. ^b^paccakamitthā^eb^ti ``baddhā, na baddhā''ti cintento upadhārento akamittha, vegaṃ hāpetvā saṇikaṃ agamāsi. ^b^āsajja baddhamāsīna^eb^nti baddhaṃ mahāsattaṃ upagantvā nisinnaṃ sumukhaṃ. ^b^adīnava^eb^ntiādīnavameva hutvā mahāsattaṃ olokentaṃ disvā. ^b^vimato^eb^ti kiṃ nu kho abaddho baddhassa santike nisinno, kāraṇaṃ pucchissāmīti vimatijāto hutvāti attho. ^b^paṇḍare^eb^ti haṃse, atha vā parisuddhe nimmale, sampahaṭṭhakañcanavaṇṇeti attho. ^b^pavaḍḍhakāye^eb^ti vaḍḍhitakāye ^a^V5.0337^ea^ mahāsarīre. ^b^yaṃ nū^eb^ti yaṃ tāva eso mahāpāsena baddho. ^b^na kurute disa^eb^nti palāyanatthāya ekaṃ disaṃ na bhajati, taṃ yuttanti adhippāyo. ^b^balī^eb^ti balasampanno hutvāpi. ^b^pakkhī^eb^ti taṃ ālapati. ^b^ohāyā^eb^ti chaḍḍetvā. ^b^yantī^eb^ti sesasakuṇā gacchanti. ^b^avahīyasī^eb^ti ohīyasi.

[03] ^b^dijāmittā^eb^ti dijānaṃ amitta. ^b^yāva kālassa pariyāya^eb^nti yāva maraṇassa vāro āgacchati. ^b^kathaṃ panāya^eb^nti tvaṃ rājā me soti vadasi, rājāno ca nāma paṇḍitā honti, itipi paṇḍito samāno kena kāraṇena oḍḍitaṃ pāsaṃ na addasa. ^b^padaṃ heta^eb^nti yasamahattaṃ vā ñāṇamahattaṃ vā pattānaṃ attano āpadabujjhanaṃ nāma padaṃ kāraṇaṃ, tasmā te āpadaṃ boddhumarahanti. ^b^parābhavo^eb^ti avaḍḍhi. ^b^āsajjāpī^eb^ti upagantvāpi na bujjhati. ^b^tatā^eb^ti vitatā oḍḍitā. ^b^guyhamāsajjā^eb^ti tesu pāsesu yo guḷho paṭicchanno pāso, taṃ āsajja bajjhanti. ^b^atheva^eb^nti atha evaṃ jīvitakkhaye bajjhantevāti attho.
[03] iti ^a^M5.0365^ea^ naṃ so kathāsallāpena muduhadayaṃ katvā mahāsattassa jīvitaṃ yācanto gāthamāha --
[22] api no anumaññāsi, api no jīvitaṃ dade''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^api nāya^eb^nti api nu ayaṃ. ^b^sukhudrayo^eb^ti sukhaphalo. ^b^api no anumaññāsī^eb^ti cittakūṭaṃ gantvā ñātake passituṃ tvaṃ api no anujāneyyāsi. ^b^api no jīvitaṃ dade^eb^ti api no imāya kathāya uppannavissāso na māreyyāsīti.
[21] ``na ceva me tvaṃ baddhosi, napi icchāmi te vadhaṃ.
[22] kāmaṃ khippamito gantvā, jīva tvaṃ anigho cira''nti..
[22] sace ekena tuṭṭhosi, muñcetaṃ mañca bhakkhaya..
[22] na te lābhena jīvatthi, etena niminā tuvaṃ..
[22] maṃ pubbe bandha pāsena, pacchā muñca dijādhipaṃ..
[21] ``tāvadeva ca te lābho, katāssa yācanāya ca.
[22] mitti ca dhataraṭṭhehi, yāvajīvāya te siyā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^eta^eb^nti yaṃ aññatra etassa jīvitā mama jīvitaṃ, etaṃ ahaṃ neva icchāmi. ^b^tulyāsmā^eb^ti samānā homa. ^b^niminā tuva^eb^nti parivattehi tvaṃ. ^b^tavamhasū^eb^ti tava amhesu giddhi hotu, kiṃ te etena, mayi lobhaṃ uppādehīti vadati. ^b^tāvadevā^eb^ti tattakoyeva. ^b^yācanāya cā^eb^ti yā mama yācanā, sāva katā assāti attho.
[01] iti ^a^M5.0366^ea^ so tāya dhammadesanāya tele pakkhittakappāsapicu viya mudugatahadayo mahāsattaṃ tassa dāyaṃ katvā dadanto āha --
[21] ``passantu no mahāsaṅghā, tayā muttaṃ ito gataṃ.
[22] mittāmaccā ca bhaccā ca, puttadārā ca bandhavā..
[21] ``na ca te tādisā mittā, bahūnaṃ idha vijjati.
[21] ``so te sahāyaṃ muñcāmi, hotu rājā tavānugo.

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0344^ea^ ^b^no^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^tayā mutta^eb^nti imañhi tvaññeva muñcasi nāma, tasmā imaṃ tayā ^a^V5.0339^ea^ muttaṃ ito cittakūṭapabbataṃ gataṃ mahantā ñātisaṅghā ete ca mittādayo passantu. ettha ca ^b^bandhavā^eb^ti ekalohitasambandhā. ^b^vijjatī^eb^ti vijjanti. ^b^pāṇasādhāraṇo^eb^ti sādhāraṇapāṇo avibhattajīviko, yathā tvaṃ etassa sakhā, etādisā aññesaṃ bahūnaṃ mittā nāma na vijjanti. ^b^tavānugo^eb^ti etaṃ dukkhitaṃ ādāya purato gacchantassa tava ayaṃ anugo hotūti.

[03] evaṃ vatvā pana nesādaputto mettacittena mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bandhanaṃ chinditvā āliṅgitvā sarato nikkhāmetvā saratīre taruṇadabbatiṇapiṭṭhe nisīdāpetvā pāde bandhanapāsaṃ muducittena saṇikaṃ mocetvā dūre khipitvā mahāsatte balavasinehaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā mettacittena udakaṃ ādāya lohitaṃ dhovitvā punappunaṃ parimajji. tassa mettacittānubhāvena bodhisattassa pāde sirā sirāhi, maṃsaṃ maṃsena, cammaṃ cammena ghaṭitaṃ, tāvadeva pādo saṃruḷho sañjātachavisañjātalomo ahosi abaddhapādena nibbiseso. bodhisatto sukhito pakatibhāveneva nisīdi. atha sumukho attānaṃ nissāya mahāsattassa sukhitabhāvaṃ disvā sañjātasomanasso nesādassa thutimakāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] evaṃ luddassa thutiṃ katvā sumukho bodhisattaṃ āha -- ``mahārāja, iminā amhākaṃ mahāupakāro kato, ayañhi amhākaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā kīḷāhaṃse no katvā issarānaṃ dento bahuṃ dhanaṃ labheyya, māretvā maṃsaṃ vikkiṇanto mūlampi labhetha, attano pana jīvitaṃ anoloketvā amhākaṃ vacanaṃ akari ^a^P5.0345^ea^, imaṃ rañño santikaṃ netvā sukhajīvitaṃ karomā''ti. mahāsatto sampaṭicchi. sumukho attano bhāsāya mahāsattena saddhiṃ kathetvā puna manussabhāsāya luddaputtaṃ āmantetvā ``samma, tvaṃ kimatthaṃ pāse oḍḍesī''ti pucchitvā ``dhanattha''nti vutte ``evaṃ sante amhe ādāya nagaraṃ pavisitvā rañño dassehi, bahuṃ te dhanaṃ dāpessāmī''ti vatvā āha --
[22] lābhaṃ tavāyaṃ dhataraṭṭho, pāpaṃ kiñci na dakkhati..
[22] patīto sumano vitto, bahuṃ dassati te dhana''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^anusikkhāmī^eb^ti anusāsāmi. ^b^pāpa^eb^nti lāmakaṃ. ^b^rañño dassehi no ubho^eb^ti amhe ubhopi rañño dassehi. ayaṃ bodhisattassa paññāpabhāvadassanatthaṃ, attano mittadhammassa āvibhāvanatthaṃ, luddassa dhanalābhatthaṃ, rañño sīlesu patiṭṭhāpanatthañcāti catūhi kāraṇehi ^a^M5.0368^ea^ evamāha. ^b^dhataraṭṭhā^eb^ti netvā ca pana rañño evaṃ ācikkheyyāsi, ``mahārāja, ime dhataraṭṭhakule jātā dve haṃsādhipatino, etesu ayaṃ rājā, itaro senāpatī''ti. iti naṃ sikkhāpesi. ^b^``patīto''^eb^tiādīni tīṇipi tuṭṭhākāravevacanāneva.

[03] evaṃ vutte luddo, ``sāmi, mā vo rājadassanaṃ rucci, rājāno nāma calacittā, kīḷāhaṃse vā vo kareyyuṃ mārāpeyyuṃ vā''ti vatvā, ``samma, mā bhāyi, ahaṃ tādisaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ luddaṃ lohitapāṇiṃ dhammakathāya mudukaṃ katvā mama pādesu pātesiṃ, rājāno nāma puññavanto paññavanto ca subhāsitadubbhāsitaññū ca, khippaṃ amhe rañño dassehī''ti vutte ``tena hi mā mayhaṃ kujjhittha, ahaṃ avassaṃ tumhākaṃ ^a^P5.0346^ea^ ruciyā nemī''ti vatvā ubhopi kājaṃ āropetvā rājakulaṃ gantvā rañño dassetvā raññā puṭṭho yathābhūtaṃ ārocesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] kathaṃ luddo mahantānaṃ, issare idha ajjhagā..
[22] tato naṃ pāmuciṃ pāsā, anuññāsiṃ sukhena ca..
[22] lābhaṃ tavāyaṃ dhataraṭṭho, pāpaṃ kiñci na dakkhati..
[22] patīto sumano vitto, bahuṃ dassati te dhanaṃ..
[22] ettheva hi ime āsuṃ, ubho anumatā mayā..

[03] tattha ^b^kammunā upapādayī^eb^ti yaṃ so avaca, taṃ karonto kāyakammena sampādesi. ^b^gantvā^eb^ti haṃsarājena nisinnakājakoṭiṃ uccataraṃ, senāpatinā nisinnakājakoṭiṃ thokaṃ nīcaṃ katvā ubhopi te ukkhipitvā ``haṃsarājā ca senāpati ca rājānaṃ passituṃ gacchanti, ussaratha ussarathā''ti janaṃ ussārento ``evarūpā nāma sobhaggappattā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā haṃsarājāno na diṭṭhapubbā''ti muduhadayesu manussesu pasaṃsantesu ^a^M5.0370^ea^ khippamantepuraṃ gantvā. ^b^adassayī^eb^ti ``haṃsarājāno tumhe daṭṭhuṃ āgatā''ti rañño ārocāpetvā tena tuṭṭhacittena ``āgacchantū''ti pakkosāpito abhiharitvā dassesi. ^b^hatthatta^eb^nti hatthesu āgataṃ, pattanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^mahantāna^eb^nti yasamahantappattānaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇānaṃ dhataraṭṭhahaṃsānaṃ issare sāmino kathaṃ tvaṃ luddo hutvā adhigatoti pucchati. ``issaramidhamajjhagā''tipi pāṭho, etesaṃ issariyaṃ tvaṃ kathaṃ ajjhagāti attho.

[03] ^b^vihitā^eb^ti yojitā. ^b^yaṃ yadāyatanaṃ maññe^eb^ti, mahārāja, yaṃ yaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ dijānaṃ pāṇarodhanaṃ ^a^V5.0343^ea^ jīvitakkhayakaraṃ maññāmi, tattha tattha mayā pallalesu pāsā vihitā. ^b^tādisa^eb^nti mānusiyasare tathāvidhaṃ pāṇarodhanaṃ mayā vihitaṃ pāsaṃ. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ etaṃ tattha baddhaṃ. ^b^upāsino^eb^ti attano jīvitaṃ agaṇetvā upagantvā nisinno. ^b^mamāya^eb^nti maṃ ayaṃ senāpati ^b^ajjhabhāsatha,^eb^ mayā saddhiṃ kathesi. ^b^sudukkara^eb^nti tasmiṃ khaṇe esa amhādisehi anariyehi sudukkaraṃ akāsi. kiṃ tanti? ^b^dahate bhāvamuttamaṃ,^eb^ attano uttamaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ dahati vidahati pakāseti. ^b^attanāya^eb^nti attano ayaṃ. ^b^anutthunanto^eb^ti bhattuguṇe vaṇṇento tassa jīvitaṃ muñcāti maṃ yāci.

[03] ^b^tassā^eb^ti tassa tathā yācantassa. ^b^sukhena cā^eb^ti yathāsukhena cittakūṭaṃ gantvā ñātisaṅghaṃ passathāti ca anujāniṃ. ^b^ettheva hī^eb^ti mayā pana ime dve ettha mānusiyasareyeva cittakūṭagamanāya anumatā ahesuṃ. ^b^evaṃ gato^eb^ti evaṃ sattu hatthagato. ^b^janayeyyātha maddava^eb^nti attani mettacittaṃ janesi. ^b^upāyana^eb^nti paṇṇākāraṃ. ^b^sabbasākuṇikāgāme^eb^ti ^a^P5.0348^ea^ sabbasmimpi sākuṇikagāme nāhaṃ aññaṃ tava evarūpaṃ kenaci sākuṇikena ābhatapubbaṃ upāyanaṃ passāmi. ^b^taṃ passā^eb^ti taṃ mayā ābhataṃ upāyanaṃ passa manujādhipāti.

[03] evaṃ so ṭhitakova sumukhassa guṇaṃ kathesi. tato rājā haṃsarañño mahārahaṃ āsanaṃ, sumukhassa ca suvaṇṇabhaddapīṭhakaṃ dāpetvā tesaṃ tattha nisinnānaṃ suvaṇṇabhājanehi lājamadhuphāṇitādīni dāpetvā niṭṭhite pānabhojanakicce añjaliṃ paggayha mahāsattaṃ dhammakathaṃ yācitvā ^a^M5.0371^ea^ suvaṇṇapīṭhake nisīdi. so tena yācito paṭisanthāraṃ tāva akāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmayaṃ.
[21] ``kacci ^a^V5.0344^ea^ bhoto amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati.
[22] kacci ca te tavatthesu, nāvakaṅkhanti jīvitaṃ..
[21] ``athopi me amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati.

[03] tattha ^b^rājāna^eb^nti sāgalarājānaṃ. ^b^vakkaṅgo^eb^ti haṃsarājā. ^b^dhammena manusāsasī^eb^ti dhammena anusāsasi. ^b^doso^eb^ti aparādho. ^b^tavatthesū^eb^ti uppannesu tava yuddhādīsu atthesu. ^b^nāvakaṅkhantī^eb^ti uraṃ datvā pariccajantā kicci attano jīvitaṃ na patthenti, jīvitañca cajitvā tavevatthaṃ karonti. ^b^sādisī^eb^ti samānajātikā. ^b^assavā^eb^ti vacanasampaṭicchikā. ^b^puttarūpayasūpetā^eb^ti ^a^P5.0349^ea^ puttehi ca rūpena ca yasena ca upetā. ^b^tava chandavasānugā^eb^ti kacci tava ajjhāsayaṃ tava vasaṃ anuvattati, na attano cittavasena vattatīti pucchati.
[03] evaṃ bodhisattena paṭisanthāre kate puna rājā tena saddhiṃ kathento āha --
[22] na cāyaṃ kiñci rasmāsu, sattūva samapajjatha..
[22] tato maṃ pāmucī pāsā, anuññāsi sukhena ca..
[22] eso cāpi bahuṃ vittaṃ, labhataṃ yāvadicchatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^mahāsattuhatthattataṃ gato^eb^ti mahantassa sattuno hatthattaṃ gato. ^b^āpatitvānā^eb^ti upadhāvitvā. ^b^pātika^eb^nti pākatikaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- etesañhi jammānaṃ tāvadeva evaṃ pākatikaṃ hoti, sakuṇe daṇḍena pothetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpento dhanavetanaṃ labhatīti. ^b^kiñci rasmāsū^eb^ti kiñci amhesu. ^b^sattūvā^eb^ti sattu viya. ^b^paccagamitthā^eb^ti, mahārāja, esa amhe disvā baddhāti saññāya thokaṃ osakkittha. ^b^pubbevā^eb^ti ayameva paṭhamaṃ ajjhabhāsi. ^b^tadā^eb^ti tasmiṃ kāle. ^b^etadatthāyā^eb^ti etassa nesādaputtassa atthāya cintitaṃ. ^b^dhanamicchatā^eb^ti etassa dhanaṃ icchantena ^a^P5.0350^ea^ tava santikaṃ amhākaṃ āgamanaṃ cintitaṃ. ^b^svāgatañcevida^eb^nti mā bhonto cintayantu, bhavataṃ idaṃ idhāgamanaṃ svāgatameva. ^b^labhata^eb^nti labhatu.

[03] evañca ^a^M5.0373^ea^ pana vatvā rājā aññataraṃ amaccaṃ oloketvā ``kiṃ karomi devā''ti vutte ``imaṃ nesādaṃ kappitakesamassuṃ nhātānulittaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ kāretvā ānehī''ti vatvā tena tathā katvā ānītassa tassa saṃvacchare saṃvacchare satasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ gāmaṃ, dve vīthiyo gahetvā ṭhitaṃ mahantaṃ gehaṃ, rathavarañca, aññañca bahuṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ adāsi. tamatthaṃ āvikaronto satthā āha --
[03] atha ^a^V5.0346^ea^ mahāsatto rañño dhammaṃ desesi. so tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhahadayo ``dhammakathikassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī''ti setacchattaṃ datvā rajjaṃ paṭicchāpento āha --
[22] etaṃ dadāmi vo vittaṃ, issariyaṃ vissajāmi vo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^vaso vattatī^eb^ti yattha mama vaso vattati. ^b^kiñcana^eb^nti taṃ appamattakampi. ^b^sabbatthissariya^eb^nti sabbaṃ bhavataṃyeva issariyaṃ atthu. ^b^yaṃ caññaṃ upakappatī^eb^ti puññakāmatāya dānatthaṃ vā chattaṃ ussāpetvā rajjameva upabhottuṃ vā yaṃ vā aññaṃ tumhākaṃ ruccati, taṃ karotha, etaṃ dadāmi vo vittaṃ, saddhiṃyeva setacchattena mama santakaṃ issariyaṃ vissajjāmi voti.

[03] atha mahāsatto raññā dinnaṃ setacchattaṃ puna tasseva adāsi. rājāpi cintesi -- ``haṃsarañño tāva me dhammakathā sutā, luddaputtena pana `ayaṃ sumukho mudhurakatho'ti ativiya ^a^P5.0351^ea^ vaṇṇito, imassapi dhammakathaṃ sossāmī''ti. so tena saddhiṃ sallapanto anantaraṃ gāthamāha --
[03] tattha ^a^M5.0374^ea^ ^b^yathā^eb^ti yadi. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yadi ca me ayaṃ sumukho paṇḍito buddhisampanno kāmasā attano ruciyā ajjhabhāseyya, taṃ me paramappiyaṃ assāti.
[22] paṭivattuṃ na sakkomi, na me so vinayo siyā..

[03] tattha ^b^nāgarājārivantara^eb^nti peḷāya abbhantaraṃ paviṭṭho nāgarājā viya. ^b^paṭivattu^eb^nti tumhākaṃ dvinnaṃ antare vattuṃ na sakkomi. ^b^na me so^eb^ti sace vadeyyaṃ, na me so vinayo bhaveyya. ^b^amhākañcevā^eb^ti channavutiyā haṃsasahassānaṃ. ^b^uttamasattavo^eb^ti uttamasatto. ^b^pūjā^eb^ti ubho tumhe mayhaṃ bahūhi kāraṇehi pūjārahā ceva pasaṃsārahā ca. ^b^pessenā^eb^ti veyyāvaccakarena sevakena.
[03] rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhahadayo ``nesādaputto taṃ vaṇṇeti, na aññena tumhādisena madhuradhammakathikena nāma bhavitabba''nti vatvā āha --
[22] yāvatatthi mayā diṭṭhā, nāññaṃ passāmi edisaṃ..
[22] eso cāpi mamacchando, ciraṃ passeyya vo ubho''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0375^ea^ ^a^P5.0352^ea^ ^b^dhammenā^eb^ti sabhāvena kāraṇena. ^b^akatattassā^eb^ti asampāditāttabhāvassa mittadubbhissa. ^b^nayo^eb^ti paññā. ^b^aggapakatimā^eb^ti aggasabhāvo. ^b^uttamasattavo^eb^ti uttamasatto. ^b^yāvatatthī^eb^ti yāvatā mayā diṭṭhā nāma atthi. ^b^nāñña^eb^nti tasmiṃ mayā diṭṭhaṭṭhāne aññaṃ evarūpaṃ na passāmi. ^b^tuṭṭhosmi vo pakatiyā^eb^ti samma haṃsarāja ahaṃ pakatiyā paṭhamameva tumhākaṃ dassanena tuṭṭho. ^b^vākyenā^eb^ti idāni pana vo madhuravacanena tuṭṭhosmi. ^b^ciraṃ passeyya vo^eb^ti idheva vasāpetvā muhuttampi avippavāsanto ciraṃ tumhe passeyyanti esa me chandoti vadati.
[21] ``yaṃ kiccaṃ parame mitte, katamasmāsu taṃ tayā.
[22] pattā nissaṃsayaṃ tyāmhā, bhattirasmāsu yā tava..
[22] eso cāpi mahā attho, ñātivissāsanā siyā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^katamasmāsū^eb^ti kataṃ amhesu. ^b^pattā nissaṃsayaṃ tyāmhā^eb^ti mayaṃ nissaṃsayena tayā pattāyeva. ^b^bhattirasmāsu yā tavā^eb^ti yā tava amhesu bhatti, tāya bhattiyā mayaṃ tayā asaṃsayena pattāyeva, na ca vippayuttā, vippavuṭṭhāpi sahavāsinoyeva nāma mayanti dīpeti. ^b^aduñca nūna sumahā^eb^ti etañca ekaṃseneva sumahantaṃ. ^b^ñātisaṅghassa mantara^eb^nti amhehi dvīhi janehi virahitassa mama ñātisaṅghassa antaraṃ chiddaṃ. ^b^asmāka^eb^nti amhākaṃ dvinnaṃ adassanena bahūsu pakkhīsu dukkhaṃ uppannaṃ. ^b^passemurindamā^eb^ti passeyyāma arindama. ^b^bhavata^eb^nti bhoto dassanena. ^b^eso cāpi mahā attho^eb^ti yā esā ñātisaṅghasaṅkhātā ñātivissāsanā siyā, eso cāpi mahanto atthopi.

[03] evaṃ vutte rājā tesaṃ gamanaṃ anujāni. mahāsattopi rañño pañcavidhe dussīlye ādīnavaṃ, sīle ca ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā ``imaṃ sīlaṃ rakkha, dhammena ^a^M5.0376^ea^ rajjaṃ kārehi, catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ saṅgaṇhāhī''ti ovaditvā cittakūṭaṃ agamāsi. tamatthaṃ ^a^P5.0353^ea^ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] tattha ^b^upāgamu^eb^nti aruṇuggamanavelāyameva lājamadhuphāṇitādīni paribhuñjitvā raññā ca deviyā ca dvīhi suvaṇṇatālavaṇṭehi ukkhipitvā gandhamālādīhi katasakkārā tālavaṇṭehi otaritvā rājānaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā raññā añjaliṃ paggayha ``gacchatha sāmino''ti vutte sīhapañjarena nikkhantā uttamena javena gantvā ñātigaṇaṃ upāgamiṃsu. ^b^parame^eb^ti uttame. ^b^kekā^eb^ti attano sabhāvena ``kekā''ti saddamakaṃsu. ^b^bhattugāravā^eb^ti bhattari sagāravā. ^b^parikiriṃsū^eb^ti bhattuno muttabhāvena tuṭṭhā taṃ bhattāraṃ samantā parivārayiṃsu. ^b^laddhapaccayā^eb^ti laddhapatiṭṭhā.

[03] evaṃ parivāretvā pana te haṃsā ``kathaṃ muttosi, mahārājā''ti pucchiṃsu. mahāsatto sumukhaṃ nissāya muttabhāvaṃ, sāgalarājaluddaputtehi katakammañca kathesi. taṃ sutvā tuṭṭho haṃsagaṇo ``sumukhasenāpati ca rājā ca luddaputto ca sukhitā niddukkhā ciraṃ jīvantū''ti thutimakāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā osānagāthamāha --

[03] tattha ^b^mittavata^eb^nti kalyāṇamittasampannānaṃ. ^b^padakkhiṇā^eb^ti sukhanipphattino vuḍḍhiyuttā. ^b^dhataraṭṭhā^eb^ti haṃsarājā sumukho raññā ceva luddaputtena cāti dvīhi evaṃ ubhopi te dhataraṭṭhā kalyāṇamittasampannā yathā ñātisaṅghaṃ upāgamuṃ ^a^M5.0377^ea^, ñātisaṅghaupagamanasaṅkhāto nesaṃ attho padakkhiṇo jāto, evaṃ aññesampi mittavataṃ atthā padakkhiṇā hontīti.

[03] satthā ^a^P5.0354^ea^ imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā ``na bhikkhave idāneva, pubbepānando mamatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajī''ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi ``tadā nesādo channo ahosi, rājā sāriputto ^a^V5.0350^ea^, sumukho ānando, channavuti haṃsasahassā buddhaparisā, haṃsarājā pana ahameva ahosi''nti.
[03] ^b^ete haṃsā pakkamantī^eb^ti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ānandatherassa jīvitapariccāgameva ārabbha kathesi. vatthu heṭṭhā vuttasadisameva, idha pana satthā atītaṃ āharanto idamāhari.

[03] atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ saṃyamassa nāma bārāṇasirañño khemā nāma aggamahesī ahosi. tadā bodhisatto navutihaṃsasahassaparivuto cittakūṭe vihāsi. athekadivasaṃ khemā devī paccūsasamaye supinaṃ addasa. suvaṇṇavaṇṇā haṃsā āgantvā rājapallaṅke nisīditvā madhurassarena dhammakathaṃ kathesuṃ. deviyā sādhukāraṃ datvā dhammaṃ suṇantiyā dhammassavanena atittāya eva ratti vibhāyi. haṃsā dhammaṃ kathetvā sīhapañjarena nikkhamitvā agamaṃsu. sā vegenuṭṭhāya ``palāyamāne haṃse gaṇhatha gaṇhathā''ti vatvā hatthaṃ pasārentīyeva pabujjhi. tassā kathaṃ sutvā paricārikāyo ``kuhiṃ haṃsā''ti thokaṃ avahasiṃsu. sā tasmiṃ khaṇe supinabhāvaṃ ñatvā cintesi -- ``ahaṃ abhūtaṃ na passāmi, addhā imasmiṃ loke suvaṇṇavaṇṇā haṃsā bhavissanti, sace kho pana `suvaṇṇahaṃsānaṃ dhammaṃ sotukāmāmhī'ti rājānaṃ vakkhāmi, `amhehi suvaṇṇahaṃsā nāma na diṭṭhapubbā, haṃsānañca kathā nāma abhūtāyevā'ti vatvā nirussukko bhavissati, `dohaḷo'ti vutte pana yena kenaci upāyena pariyesissati, evaṃ me manoratho samijjhissatī''ti. sā gilānālayaṃ dassetvā paricārikānaṃ ^a^P5.0355^ea^ saññaṃ datvā nipajji.

[03] rājā ^a^M5.0378^ea^ rājāsane nisinno tassā dassanavelāya taṃ adisvā ``kahaṃ, khemā devī''ti pucchitvā ``gilānā''ti sutvā tassā santikaṃ gantvā sayanekadese nisīditvā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto ``kiṃ te aphāsuka''nti pucchi. ``deva aññaṃ aphāsukaṃ natthi, dohaḷo pana me uppanno''ti. tena hi ``bhaṇa, devi, yaṃ icchasi, taṃ sīghaṃ te upanāmessāmī''ti. ``mahārāja, ahamekassa suvaṇṇahaṃsassa samussitasetacchatte rājapallaṅke nisinnassa gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ katvā sādhukāraṃ dadamānā dhammakathaṃ sotumicchāmi, sace labhāmi, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce, jīvitaṃ me natthī''ti. atha naṃ rājā ``sace manussaloke atthi, labhissasi ^a^V5.0351^ea^, mā cintayī''ti assāsetvā sirigabbhato nikkhamma amaccehi saddhiṃ mantesi -- ``ambho, khemā devī, `suvaṇṇahaṃsassa dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ labhantī jīvissāmi, alabhantiyā me jīvitaṃ natthī'ti vadati, atthi nu kho suvaṇṇavaṇṇā haṃsā''ti. ``deva amhehi neva diṭṭhapubbā na sutapubbā''ti. ``ke pana jāneyyu''nti? ``brāhmaṇā, devā''ti. rājā brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā sakkāraṃ katvā pucchi -- ``honti nu kho ācariyā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā haṃsā''ti? ``āma, mahārāja amhākaṃ mantesumacchā, kakkaṭakā, kacchapā, migā, morā, haṃsāti cha ete tiracchānagatā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā hontīti āgatā, tattha dhataraṭṭhakulahaṃsā nāma paṇḍitā ñāṇasampannā, iti manussehi saddhiṃ satta suvaṇṇavaṇṇā hontī''ti.

[03] taṃ sutvā rājā attamano hutvā ``kahaṃ nu kho ācariyā dhataraṭṭhahaṃsā vasantī''ti pucchitvā ``na jānāma, mahārājā''ti vutte ``atha ke pana jānissantī''ti vatvā ``luddaputtā''ti vutte sabbe attano vijite luddake sannipātāpetvā pucchi -- ``tātā, suvaṇṇavaṇṇā dhataraṭṭhakulahaṃsā nāma kahaṃ vasantī''ti? atheko luddo ``himavante kira, deva, cittakūṭapabbateti no kulaparamparāya kathentī''ti āha. ``jānāsi pana nesaṃ gahaṇūpāya''nti? ``na jānāmi, devā''ti. ``ke pana jānissantī''ti? brāhmaṇāti. so brāhmaṇapaṇḍite pakkosāpetvā ^a^P5.0356^ea^ cittakūṭapabbate suvaṇṇavaṇṇānaṃ haṃsānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ ārocetvā ``jānātha nu kho tesaṃ gahaṇūpāya''nti pucchi. ``mahārāja, kiṃ tehi gantvā gahitehi, upāyena te nagarasamīpaṃ ānetvā gahessāmā''ti. ``ko pana upāyo''ti? ``mahārāja, nagarato avidūre uttarena tigāvutamatte tigāvutappamāṇaṃ khemaṃ nāma saraṃ ^a^M5.0379^ea^ kārāpetvā udakassa pūretvā nānādhaññāni ropetvā pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ kārāpetvā ekaṃ paṇḍitaṃ nesādaṃ paṭicchāpetvā manussānaṃ upagantuṃ adatvā catūsu kaṇṇesu ṭhitehi abhayaṃ ghosāpetha, taṃ sutvā nānāsakuṇā dasa disā otarissanti, tepi haṃsā paramparāya tassa sarassa khemabhāvaṃ sutvā āgacchissanti, atha ne vālapāsehi bandhāpetvā gaṇhāpeyyāthā''ti.

[03] taṃ sutvā rājā tehi vuttapadese vuttappakāraṃ saraṃ kārāpetvā chekaṃ nesādaṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa sahassaṃ dāpetvā ``tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya attano kammaṃ mā kari, puttadāraṃ te ahaṃ posessāmi, tvaṃ appamatto khemaṃ saraṃ rakkhanto manusse paṭikkamāpetvā catūsu kaṇṇesu abhayaṃ ghosāpetvā āgatāgate sakuṇe mama ācikkheyyāsi, suvaṇṇahaṃsesu āgatesu mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ labhissasī''ti tamassāsetvā khemaṃ saraṃ paṭicchāpesi. so tato paṭṭhāya raññā vuttanayeneva tattha paṭipajji, ``khemaṃ saraṃ rakkhatī''ti cassa ``khemanesādo''tveva nāmaṃ udapādi ^a^V5.0352^ea^. tato paṭṭhāya ca nānappakārā sakuṇā otariṃsu, ``khemaṃ nibbhayaṃ sara''nti paramparāghosena nānāhaṃsā āgamiṃsu. paṭhamaṃ tāva tiṇahaṃsā āgamiṃsu, tesaṃ ghosena paṇḍuhaṃsā, tesaṃ ghosena manosilāvaṇṇā haṃsā, tesaṃ ghosena setahaṃsā, tesaṃ ghosena pākahaṃsā āgamiṃsu. tesu āgatesu khemako rañño ārocesi -- ``deva, pañcavaṇṇā haṃsā āgantvā sare gocaraṃ gaṇhanti, pākahaṃsānaṃ āgatattā idāni katipāheneva suvaṇṇahaṃsā āgamissanti, mā ^a^P5.0357^ea^ cintayittha, devā''ti.

[03] taṃ sutvā rājā ``aññena tattha na gantabbaṃ, yo gacchissati, hatthapādachedanañca gharavilopañca pāpuṇissatī''ti nagara bheriṃ carāpesi. tato paṭṭhāya tattha koci na gacchati. cittakūṭassa panāvidūre kañcanaguhāyaṃpākahaṃsā vasanti, tepi mahabbalā. dhataraṭṭhakulena saddhiṃ tesaṃ sarīravaṇṇova viseso. pākahaṃsarañño pana dhītā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ahosi. so taṃ dhataraṭṭhamahissarassa anurūpāti tassa pādaparicārikaṃ katvā pesesi. sā tassa piyā ahosi manāpā, teneva ca kāraṇena tāni dve haṃsakulāni aññamaññaṃ vissāsikāni jātāni.

[03] athekadivasaṃ ^a^M5.0380^ea^ bodhisattassa parivārahaṃsā pākahaṃse pucchiṃsu -- ``tumhe imesu divasesu kahaṃ gocaraṃ gaṇhathā''ti? ``mayaṃ bārāṇasito avidūre khemasare gocaraṃ gaṇhāma, tumhe pana kuhiṃ āhiṇḍathā''ti. ``asukaṃ nāmā''ti vutte ``kasmā khemasaraṃ na gacchatha, so hi saro ramaṇīyo nānāsakuṇasamākiṇṇo pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchanno nānādhaññaphalasampanno nānappakārabhamaragaṇanikūjito catūsu kaṇṇesu niccaṃ pavattābhayaghosano, koci naṃ upasaṅkamituṃ samattho nāma natthi, pageva aññaṃ upaddavaṃ kātuṃ, evarūpo so saro''ti khemasaraṃ vaṇṇayiṃsu. te tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ``bārāṇasiyā samīpe kira evarūpo khemo nāma saro atthi, pākahaṃsā tattha gantvā gocaraṃ gaṇhanti, tumhepi dhataraṭṭhamahissarassa ārocetha, sace anujānāti, mayampi tattha gantvā gocaraṃ gaṇheyyāmā''ti sumukhassa kathesuṃ. sumukho rañño ārocesi. so cintesi -- ``manussā nāma bahumāyā kharamantā upāyakusalā, bhavitabbamettha kāraṇena, ettakaṃ kālaṃ eso saro natthi, idāni amhākaṃ gahaṇatthāya kato bhavissatī''ti. so sumukhaṃ āha -- ``mā vo tattha gamanaṃ ruccatha, na so saro tehi sudhammatāya kato, amhākaṃ gahaṇatthāyeva kato, manussā nāma bahumāyā kharamantā upāyakusalā, tumhe sakeyeva gocare carathā''ti ^a^P5.0358^ea^.

[03] suvaṇṇahaṃsā ``khemaṃ saraṃ gantukāmamhā''ti dutiyampi tatiyampi sumukhassa ārocesuṃ. so ^a^V5.0353^ea^ tesaṃ tattha gantukāmataṃ mahāsattassa ārocesi. atha mahāsatto ``mama ñātakā maṃ nissāya mā kilamantu, tena hi gacchāmā''ti navutihaṃsasahassaparivuto tattha gantvā gocaraṃ gahetvā haṃsakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā cittakūṭameva paccāgami. khemako tesaṃ gocaraṃ caritvā gatakāle gantvā tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ rañño ārocesi. rājā tuṭṭhacitto hutvā, ``samma khemaka, ekaṃ vā dve vā haṃse gaṇhituṃ vāyama, mahantaṃ te yasaṃ dassāmī''ti vatvā paribbayaṃ datvā taṃ uyyojesi. so tattha gantvā cāṭipañjare nisīditvā haṃsānaṃ caraṇaṭṭhānaṃ vīmaṃsi. bodhisattā nāma nilloluppacārino honti, tasmā mahāsatto otiṇṇaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya sapadānaṃ sāliṃ khādanto agamāsi. sesā ito cito ca khādantā vicariṃsu.

[03] atha ^a^M5.0381^ea^ luddaputto ``ayaṃ haṃso nilloluppacārī, imaṃ bandhituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti cintetvā punadivase haṃsesu saraṃ anotiṇṇesuyeva cāṭipañjare nisinno taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā avidūre pañjare attānaṃ paṭicchādetvā chiddena olokento acchi. tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāsatto navutihaṃsasahassapurakkhato hiyyo otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva otaritvā odhiyaṃ nisīditvā sāliṃ khādanto pāyāsi. nesādo pañjarachiddena olokento tassa rūpasobhaggappattaṃ attabhāvaṃ disvā ``ayaṃ haṃso sakaṭanābhippamāṇasarīro suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, tīhi rattarājīhi gīvāyaṃ parikkhitto, tisso rājiyo galena otaritvā urantarena gatā, tisso pacchābhāgena nibbijjhitvā gatā, rattakambalasuttasikkāya ṭhapitakañcanakkhandho viya atirocati, iminā etesaṃ raññā bhavitabbaṃ, imameva gaṇhissāmī''ti cintesi. haṃsarājāpi bahuṃ gocaraṃ caritvā jalakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā haṃsagaṇaparivuto cittakūṭameva agamāsi. iminā niyāmeneva pañca divase gocaraṃ gaṇhi. chaṭṭhe divase khemako kāḷāssavālamayaṃ daḷhaṃ mahārajjuṃ vaṭṭitvā yaṭṭhiyā pāsaṃ katvā ``sve haṃsarājā imasmiṃ okāse ^a^P5.0359^ea^ otarissatī''ti tathato ñatvā antoudake yaṭṭhipāsaṃ oḍḍi.

[03] punadivase haṃsarājā otaranto pādaṃ pāse pavesantoyeva otari. athassa pāso pādaṃ ayapaṭṭakena kaḍḍhanto viya ābandhitvā gaṇhi. so ``chindissāmi na''nti vegaṃ janetvā kaḍḍhitvā pātesi. paṭhamavāre suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ cammaṃ chijji, dutiyavāre kambalavaṇṇaṃ maṃsaṃ chijji, tatiyavāre nhāru chijji, catutthavāre pana ``pādā chijjeyyuṃ, rañño pana hīnaṅgatā nāma ananucchavikā''ti na vāyāmaṃ akāsi, balavavedanā ca pavattiṃsu. so cintesi -- ``sacāhaṃ baddharavaṃ ravissāmi, ñātakā me ñatrastā hutvā gocaraṃ aggahetvā chātajjhattāva palāyantā dubbalattā samudde patissantī''ti. so vedanaṃ adhivāsetvā pāsavase vattetvā sāliṃ khādanto ^a^V5.0354^ea^ viya hutvā tesaṃ yāvadatthaṃ caritvā haṃsakīḷaṃ kīḷanakāle mahantena saddena baddharavaṃ ravi. taṃ sutvā haṃsā maraṇabhayatajjitā vaggavaggā cittakūṭābhimukhā purimanayeneva pakkamiṃsu.

[03] sumukhopi ^a^M5.0382^ea^ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva cintetvā vicinitvā tīsupi koṭṭhāsesu mahāsattaṃ adisvā ``addhā tassevedaṃ bhayaṃ uppanna''nti nivattitvā āgato mahāsattaṃ pāsena baddhaṃ lohitamakkhitaṃ dukkhāturaṃ paṅkapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ disvā ``mā bhāyi, mahārāja, ahaṃ mama jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā tumhe mocessāmī''ti vadanto otaritvā mahāsattaṃ assāsento paṅkapiṭṭhe nisīdi. mahāsatto ``navutihaṃsasahassesu maṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyantesu ayaṃ sumukho ekakova āgato, kiṃ nu kho luddaputtassa āgatakāle maṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyissati, udāhu no''ti vīmaṃsanavasena lohitamakkhito pāsayaṭṭhiyaṃ olambantoyeva tisso gāthā abhāsi --
[22] mā anīghāya hāpesi, kāmaṃ sumukha pakkamā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0360^ea^ ^b^bhayameritā^eb^ti bhayena eritā bhayaṭṭitā bhayacalitā. tatiyapade ``harī''tipi ``hema''ntipi suvaṇṇasseva nāmaṃ. so ca harittacatāya hemavaṇṇo, tena taṃ evaṃ ālapati. ^b^sumukhā^eb^ti sundaramukha. ^b^anapekkhamānā^eb^ti tava ñātakā maṃ anolokentā nirālayā hutvā. ^b^patevā^eb^ti uppatāhiyeva. ^b^mā anīghāyā^eb^ti ito gantvā pattabbāya nidukkhabhāvāya vīriyaṃ mā hāpesi.
[03] taṃ sutvā sumukho ``ayaṃ haṃsarājā mama piyamittabhāvaṃ na jānāti, anuppiyabhāṇī mittoti maṃ sallakkheti, sinehabhāvamassa dassessāmī''ti cintetvā catasso gāthā abhāsi --
[22] jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ vā me, tayā saddhiṃ bhavissati..
[27] taṃ hitvā patataṃ seṭṭha, kiṃ te vakkhāmito gato.

[03] tattha ^b^nāha^eb^nti ahaṃ, mahārāja, kāyikacetasikena dukkhena phuṭṭhopi taṃ na jahāmi. ^b^anariyasaṃyutte^eb^ti mittadubbhīhi ahirikehi kattabbatāya anariyabhāvena saṃyutte. ^b^kamme^eb^ti taṃ jahitvā pakkamanakamme. ^b^sakumāro^eb^ti samānakumāro, ekadivaseneva paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā ekadivase aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā ekato vaḍḍhitakumāroti attho. ^b^sakhātyasmī^eb^ti ahaṃ te dakkhiṇakkhisamo piyasahāyo. ^b^sacitte^eb^ti tava sake citte ahaṃ ṭhito tava vase vattāmi, tayi jīvante jīvāmi, na jīvante na jīvāmīti attho. ``saṃcitte''tipi pāṭho, tava citte ahaṃ saṇṭhito suṭṭhu ṭhitoti attho. ^b^ñāto^eb^ti sabbahaṃsānaṃ antare paññāto. ^b^vikattissa^eb^nti ``kuhiṃ haṃsarājā''ti pucchito ahaṃ kinti kathessāmi. ^b^kiṃ te vakkhāmī^eb^ti te tava pavattiṃ pucchante haṃsagaṇe kiṃ vakkhāmi.
[03] evaṃ sumukhena catūhi gāthāhi sīhanāde nadite tassa guṇaṃ pakāsento mahāsatto āha --
[21] ``eso hi dhammo sumukha, yaṃ tvaṃ ariyapathe ṭhito.
[22] yo bhattāraṃ sakhāraṃ maṃ, na pariccattumussahe..
[21] ``tañhi ^a^V5.0356^ea^ ^a^P5.0361^ea^ me pekkhamānassa, bhayaṃ na tveva jāyati.

[03] tattha ^b^eso dhammo^eb^ti esa porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ sabhāvo. ^b^bhattāraṃ sakhāraṃ ma^eb^nti sāmikañca sahāyañca maṃ. ^b^bhaya^eb^nti cittutrāso mayhaṃ na jāyati, cittakūṭapabbate haṃsagaṇamajjhe ṭhito viya homi. ^b^mayha^eb^nti mama jīvitaṃ tvaṃ labhāpessasi.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M5.0384^ea^ tesaṃ kathentānaññeva luddaputto sarapariyante ṭhito haṃse tīhi khandhehi palāyante disvā ``kiṃ nu kho''ti pāsaṭṭhānaṃ olokento bodhisattaṃ pāsayaṭṭhiyaṃ olambantaṃ disvā sañjātasomanasso kacchaṃ daḷhaṃ bandhitvā muggaraṃ gahetvā kappuṭṭhānaggi viya avattharamāno paṇhiyā akkantakalale uparisīsena gantvā purato patante vegena upasaṅkami. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] aṭṭhāsi purato rañño, haṃso vissāsayaṃ byathaṃ..
[21] ``mā bhāyi patataṃ seṭṭha, na hi bhāyanti tādisā.

[03] tattha ^b^ariyavuttina^eb^nti ariyācāre vattamānānaṃ. ^b^bhusa^eb^nti daḷhaṃ balavaṃ. ^b^atibrūhayī^eb^ti anantaragāthāya āgataṃ ``mā bhāyī''ti vacanaṃ vadanto atibrūhesi mahāsaddaṃ nicchāresi. ^b^aṭṭhāsī^eb^ti sace nesādo rājānaṃ paharissati, ahaṃ pahāraṃ sampaṭicchissāmīti jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā purato aṭṭhāsi. ^b^vissāsaya^eb^nti vissāsento assāsento. ^b^byatha^eb^nti byathitaṃ bhītaṃ rājānaṃ ``mā bhāyī''ti iminā vacanena vissāsento. ^b^tādisā^eb^ti tumhādisā ñāṇavīriyasampannā. ^b^yoga^eb^nti ñāṇavīriyayogaṃ. ^b^yutta^eb^nti anucchavikaṃ. ^b^dhammūpasañhita^eb^nti kāraṇanissitaṃ. ^b^tena pariyāpadānenā^eb^ti tena mayā payuttena yogena parisuddhena. ^b^pamokkhasī^eb^ti muccissasi.
