[03] evaṃ ^a^V5.0357^ea^ sumukho mahāsattaṃ assāsetvā luddaputtassa santikaṃ gantvā madhuraṃ mānusiṃ vācaṃ nicchārento, ``samma, tvaṃ konāmosī''ti ^a^P5.0362^ea^ pucchitvā ``suvaṇṇavaṇṇahaṃsarāja, ahaṃ khemako nāmā''ti vutte, ``samma khemaka, `tayā oḍḍitavālapāse yo vā so vā haṃso baddho'ti saññaṃ mā kari, navutiyā haṃsasahassānaṃ pavaro dhataraṭṭhahaṃsarājā te pāse ^a^M5.0385^ea^ baddho, ñāṇasīlācārasampanno saṅgāhakapakkhe ṭhito, na taṃ māretuṃ yutto, ahaṃ tava iminā kattabbakiccaṃ karissāmi, ayampi suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, ahampi tatheva, ahaṃ etassatthāya attano jīvitaṃ pariccajissāmi, sace tvaṃ etassa pattāni gaṇhitukāmosi, mama pattāni gaṇha, athopi cammamaṃsanhāruaṭṭhīnamaññataraṃ gaṇhitukāmosi, mameva sarīrato gaṇha, atha naṃ kīḷāhaṃsaṃ kātukāmosi, maññeva kara, jīvantameva vikkiṇitvā sace dhanaṃ uppādetukāmosi, maṃ jīvantameva vikkiṇitvā dhanaṃ uppādehi, mā etaṃ ñāṇādiguṇasaṃyuttaṃ haṃsarājānaṃ avadhi, sace hi naṃ vadhissasi, nirayādīhi na muccissasī''ti taṃ nirayādibhayena santajjetvā attano madhurakathaṃ gaṇhāpetvā puna bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ assāsento aṭṭhāsi. nesādo tassa kathaṃ sutvā ``ayaṃ tiracchānagato samāno manussehipi kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ evarūpaṃ mittadhammaṃ karoti, manussāpi evaṃ mittadhamme ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti, aho esa ñāṇasampanno madhurakatho dhammiko''ti sakalasarīraṃ pītisomanassaparipuṇṇaṃ katvā pahaṭṭhalomo daṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā sirasi añjaliṃ patiṭṭhapetvā sūriyaṃ namassanto viya sumukhassa guṇaṃ kittento aṭṭhāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``na me sutaṃ vā diṭṭhaṃ vā, bhāsanto mānusiṃ dijo.
[22] ariyaṃ bruvāno vakkaṅgo, cajanto mānusiṃ giraṃ..
[21] ``kiṃ nu tāyaṃ dijo hoti, mutto baddhaṃ upāsasi.
[22] ohāya sakuṇā yanti, kiṃ eko avahīyasī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0363^ea^ ^b^añjalissa paṇāmayī^eb^ti añjaliṃ assa upanāmayi, ``na me''ti gāthāyassa thutiṃ karoti. tattha ^b^mānusi^eb^nti manussavācaṃ. ^b^ariya^eb^nti sundaraṃ niddosaṃ. ^b^cajanto^eb^ti vissajjento. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- samma, tvaṃ dijo samāno ajja mayā saddhiṃ mānusiṃ vācaṃ bhāsanto niddosaṃ ^a^V5.0358^ea^ bruvāno mānusiṃ giraṃ cajanto paccakkhato diṭṭho, ito pubbe pana idaṃ acchariyaṃ mayā ^a^M5.0386^ea^ neva sutaṃ na diṭṭhanti. ^b^kiṃ nu tāya^eb^nti yaṃ etaṃ tvaṃ upāsasi, kiṃ nu te ayaṃ hoti.
[03] evaṃ tuṭṭhacittena nesādena puṭṭho sumukho ``ayaṃ muduko jāto, idānissa bhiyyosomattāya mudubhāvatthaṃ mama guṇaṃ dassesāmī''ti cintetvā āha --
[21] ``mahāgaṇāya bhattā me, mā eko byasanaṃ agā.
[22] tathā taṃ samma nesāda, bhattāyaṃ abhito rame''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^nussahe^eb^ti na samatthomhi. ^b^mahāgaṇāyā^eb^ti mahato haṃsagaṇassa. ^b^mā eko^eb^ti mādise sevake vijjamāne mā ekako byasanaṃ agā. ^b^tathā ta^eb^nti yathā ahaṃ vadāmi, tatheva taṃ. ^b^sammā^eb^ti vayassa. ^b^bhattāyaṃ abhito rame^eb^ti bhattā ayaṃ mama, ahamassa abhito rame santike ramāmi na ukkaṇṭhāmīti.

[03] nesādo taṃ tassa dhammanissitaṃ madhurakathaṃ sutvā somanassappatto pahaṭṭhalomo ``sacāhaṃ etaṃ sīlādiguṇasaṃyuttaṃ haṃsarājānaṃ vadhissāmi, catūhi apāyehi na muccissāmi, rājā maṃ yadicchati, taṃ karotu, ahametaṃ sumukhassa dāyaṃ katvā vissajjessāmī''ti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[22] cajāmi te taṃ bhattāraṃ, gacchathūbho yathāsukha''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^ariyavattasī^eb^ti mittadhammarakkhaṇasaṅkhātena ācārāriyānaṃ vattena samannāgatosi. ^b^piṇḍamapacāyasī^eb^ti bhattu santikā laddhaṃ piṇḍaṃ senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ pūjesi. ^b^gacchathūbho^eb^ti dvepi janā assumukhe ñātisaṅghe hāsayamānā yathāsukhaṃ gacchathāti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V5.0359^ea^ ^a^P5.0364^ea^ vatvā nesādo muducittena mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yaṭṭhiṃ onāmetvā paṅkapiṭṭhe nisīdāpetvā pāsayaṭṭhiyā mocetvā taṃ ukkhipitvā sarato nīharitvā taruṇadabbatiṇapiṭṭhe nisīdāpetvā pāde baddhapāsaṃ ^a^M5.0387^ea^ saṇikaṃ mocetvā mahāsatte balavasinehaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā mettacittena udakaṃ ādāya lohitaṃ dhovitvā punappunaṃ parimajji, athassa mettānubhāvena sirāya sirā, maṃsena maṃsaṃ, cammena cammaṃ ghaṭitaṃ, pādo pākatiko ahosi, itarena nibbiseso. bodhisatto sukhappatto hutvā pakatibhāvena nisīdi. sumukho attānaṃ nissāya rañño sukhitabhāvaṃ disvā sañjātasomanasso cintesi -- ``iminā amhākaṃ mahāupakāro kato, amhehi etassa kato upakāro nāma natthi, sace esa rājarājamahāmattānaṃ atthāya amhe gaṇhi, tesaṃ santikaṃ netvā bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhissati, sace attano atthāya gaṇhi, amhe vikkiṇitvā dhanaṃ labhissateva, pucchissāmi tāva na''nti. atha naṃ upakāraṃ kātukāmatāya pucchanto āha --

[03] tattha ^b^sace^eb^ti, samma nesāda, sace tayā attano payogena attano atthāya haṃsānañceva sesapakkhīnañca pāso ohito. ^b^anissaro^eb^ti anissaro hutvā amhe muñcanto yenāsi āṇatto, tassasantakaṃ gaṇhanto theyyaṃ kayirāsi.

[03] taṃ sutvā nesādo ``nāhaṃ tumhe attano atthāya gaṇhiṃ, bārāṇasiraññā pana saṃyamena gaṇhāpitomhī''ti vatvā deviyā diṭṭhasupinakālato paṭṭhāya yāva raññā tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā, ``samma khemaka, ekaṃ vā dve vā haṃse gaṇhituṃ vāyama, mahantaṃ te yasaṃ dassāmī''ti vatvā paribbayaṃ datvā uyyojitabhāvo, tāva sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. taṃ sutvā sumukho ``iminā nesādena attano jīvitaṃ agaṇetvā amhe vissajjentena ^a^P5.0365^ea^ dukkaraṃ kataṃ, sace mayaṃ ito cittakūṭaṃ gamissāma, neva dhataraṭṭharañño paññānubhāvo, na mayhaṃ mittadhammo pākaṭo bhavissati, na luddaputto mahantaṃ yasaṃ lacchati, na rājā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhahissati, na deviyā manoratho matthakaṃ pāpuṇissatī''ti cintetvā ^a^M5.0388^ea^, ``samma, evaṃ sante amhe vissajjetuṃ na ^a^V5.0360^ea^ labhasi, rañño no dassehi, so amhe yathāruciṃ karissatī''ti imamatthaṃ pakāsento gāthamāha --
[21] ``yassa tvaṃ bhatako rañño, kāmaṃ tasseva pāpaya.
[03] tattha ^b^tassevā^eb^ti tasseva santikaṃ nehi. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ rājanivesane. ^b^yathābhiñña^eb^nti yathādhippāyaṃ yathāruciṃ.

[03] taṃ sutvā nesādo ``mā vo bhaddante rājadassanaṃ ruccittha, rājāno nāma sappaṭibhayā, kīḷāhaṃse vā vo kareyyuṃ māreyyuṃ vā''ti āha. atha naṃ sumukho, ``samma luddaka mā amhākaṃ cintayi, ahaṃ tādisassa kakkhaḷassa dhammakathāya maddavaṃ janesiṃ, rañño kiṃ na janessāmi, rājāno hi paṇḍitā subhāsitadubbhāsitaññu, khippaṃ no rañño santikaṃ nehi, nayanto ca mā bandhanena nayi, pupphapañjare pana nisīdāpetvā nehi, pupphapañjaraṃ karonto dhataraṭṭhassa mahantaṃ setapadumasañchannaṃ, mama khuddakaṃ rattapadumasañchannaṃ katvā dhataraṭṭhaṃ purato, mamaṃ pacchato nīcataraṃ katvā ādāya khippaṃ netvā rañño dassehī''ti āha. so tassa vacanaṃ sutvā ``sumukho rājānaṃ disvā mama mahantaṃ yasaṃ dātukāmo bhavissatī''ti sañjātasomanasso mudūhi latāhi pañjare katvā padumehi chādetvā vuttanayeneva te gahetvā agamāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[03] evaṃ ^a^M5.0389^ea^ luddassa te ādāya pakkamanakāle dhataraṭṭho pākahaṃsarājadhītaraṃ attano bhariyaṃ saritvā sumukhaṃ āmantetvā kilesavasena vilapi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] tattha ^b^bhāyāmī^eb^ti maraṇato bhāyāmi. ^b^sāmāyā^eb^ti suvaṇṇavaṇṇāya. ^b^lakkhaṇūruyā^eb^ti lakkhaṇasampannaūruyā. ^b^vacamaññāyā^eb^ti vadhaṃ jānitvā ``mama piyasāmiko mārito''ti saññī hutvā. ^b^vadhissatī^eb^ti kiṃ me piyasāmike mate jīvitenāti marissati. ^b^pākahaṃsā^eb^ti pākahaṃsarājadhītā. ^b^suhemā^eb^ti evaṃnāmikā. ^b^hemasuttacā^eb^ti hemasadisasundaratacā. ^b^rucchatī^eb^ti yathā loṇisaṅkhātaṃ samuddaṃ otaritvā mate patimhi koñcī sakuṇikā kapaṇā rodati, evaṃ nūna sā rodissatīti.

[03] taṃ sutvā sumukho ``ayaṃ haṃsarājā aññe ovadituṃ yutto mātugāmaṃ nissāya kilesavasena vilapati, udakassa ādittakālo viya vatiyā uṭṭhāya kedārakhādanakālo viya ca jāto, yaṃnūnāhaṃ attano balena mātugāmassa dosaṃ pakāsetvā etaṃ saññāpeyya''nti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``māyā ^a^V5.0362^ea^ cetā marīcī ca, sokā rogā cupaddavā.
[27] kharā ca bandhanā cetā, maccupāsā guhāsayā.
[22] tāsu yo vissase poso, so naresu narādhamo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^mahanto^eb^ti mahanto samāno. ^b^lokassā^eb^ti haṃsalokassa. ^b^appameyyo^eb^ti guṇehi pametuṃ asakkuṇeyyo. ^b^mahāgaṇī^eb^ti mahantena gaṇena samannāgato gaṇasatthā. ^b^ekitthi^eb^nti yaṃ evarūpo bhavaṃ ekaṃ itthiṃ anusoceyya, idaṃ anusocanaṃ na paññavataṃ iva, tenāhaṃ ajja taṃ bāloti maññāmīti adhippāyenevamāha.

[03] ^b^ādetī^eb^ti gaṇhāti. ^b^chekapāpaka^eb^nti sundarāsundaraṃ. ^b^āmakapakka^eb^ti āmakañca pakkañca. ^b^lolo^eb^ti rasalolo. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- mahārāja, yathā nāma vāto padumasarādīni paharitvā sugandhampi saṅkāraṭṭhānādīni paharitvā duggandhampīti ubhayaṃ chekapāpakaṃ gandhaṃ ādiyati, yathā ca bālo kumārako ambajambūnaṃ heṭṭhā nisinno hatthaṃ pasāretvā patitapatitaṃ āmakampi pakkampi phalaṃ gahetvā khādati, yathā ca rasalolo andho bhatte upanīte yaṃkiñci samakkhikampi nimmakkhikampi āmisaṃ ādiyati, evaṃ itthiyo nāma kilesavasena aḍḍhampi duggatampi kulīnampi akulīnampi abhirūpampi virūpampi gaṇhanti bhajanti, tādisānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ itthīnaṃ kiṃkāraṇā vippalapasi, mahārājāti.

[03] ^b^atthesū^eb^ti kāraṇākāraṇesu. ^b^mando^eb^ti andhabālo. ^b^paṭibhāsi ma^eb^nti mama upaṭṭhāsi. ^b^kālapariyāya^eb^nti evarūpaṃ maraṇakālaṃ patto ``imasmiṃ kāle idaṃ kattabbaṃ, idaṃ nakattabbaṃ, idaṃ vattabbaṃ, idaṃ na vattabba''nti na jānāsi devāti. ^b^aḍḍhummatto^eb^ti aḍḍhummattako maññe hutvā. ^b^udīresī^eb^ti yathā suraṃ pivitvā nātimatto puriso yaṃ vā taṃ vā palapati, evaṃ palapasīti attho. ^b^seyyā^eb^ti varā uttamā.

[03] ``māyā cā''tiādīsu, deva, itthiyo nāmetā vañcanaṭṭhena ^b^māyā,^eb^ agayhupagaṭṭhena ^b^marīcī,^eb^ sokādīnaṃ paccayattā ^b^sokā, rogā,^eb^ anekappakārā ^b^upaddavā,^eb^ kodhādīhi thaddhabhāveneva ^b^kharā^eb^. tā hi nissāya ^a^M5.0391^ea^ andubandhanādīhi bandhanato ^b^bandhanā cetā,^eb^ itthiyo nāma sarīraguhāsayavaseneva maccu nāma etā, devāti. ``kāmahetu, kāmanidānaṃ, kāmādhikaraṇaṃ, kāmānameva hetu rājāno coraṃ gahetvā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.168-169) suttenapesa attho dīpetabbo.
[03] tato ^a^V5.0363^ea^ ^a^P5.0368^ea^ dhataraṭṭho mātugāme paṭibaddhacittatāya ``tvaṃ mātugāmassa guṇaṃ na jānāsi, paṇḍitā eva etaṃ jānanti, na hetā garahitabbā''ti dīpento āha --
[27] bījāni tyāsu rūhanti, yadidaṃ sattā pajāyare.
[22] tāsu ko nibbide poso, pāṇamāsajja pāṇibhi..
[22] tassa tyajja bhaye jāte, bhīte na jāyate mati..
[21] ``sabbo hi saṃsayaṃ patto, bhayaṃ bhīrū titikkhati.
[22] paṇḍitā ca mahantāno, atthe yuñjanti duyyuje..
[21] ``mā no ajja vikantiṃsu, rañño sūdā mahānase.
[22] tathā hi vaṇṇo pattānaṃ, phalaṃ veḷuṃva taṃ vadhi..
[21] ``muttopi na icchi uḍḍetuṃ, sayaṃ bandhaṃ upāgami.
[22] sopajja saṃsayaṃ patto, atthaṃ gaṇhāhi mā mukha''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^ya^eb^nti yaṃ mātugāmasaṅkhātaṃ vatthu paññāvuddhehi ñātaṃ, tesameva pākaṭaṃ, na bālānaṃ. ^b^mahābhūtā^eb^ti mahāguṇā mahānisaṃsā. ^b^udapajjisu^eb^nti paṭhamakappikakāle ^a^M5.0392^ea^ itthiliṅgasseva paṭhamaṃ pātubhūtattā paṭhamaṃ nibbattāti attho. ^b^tyāsū^eb^ti sumukha tāsu itthīsu kāyavacīkhiḍḍā ca ^b^paṇihitā^eb^ ohitā ṭhapitā, kāmaguṇarati ca patiṭṭhitā. ^b^bījānī^eb^ti buddhapaccekabuddhāriyasāvakacakkavattiādibījāni ^a^V5.0364^ea^ tāsu ruhanti. ^b^yadida^eb^nti ye ete sabbepi sattā. ^b^pajāyare^eb^ti sabbe tāsaññeva kucchimhi saṃvaddhāti dīpeti. ^b^nibbide^eb^ti nibbindeyya. ^b^pāṇamāsajja pāṇibhī^eb^ti attano pāṇehipi tāsaṃ pāṇaṃ āsādetvā attano jīvitaṃ cajantopi tā labhitvā ko nibbindeyyāti attho.

[03] ^b^nañño^eb^ti na añño, sumukha, mayā cittakūṭatale haṃsagaṇamajjhe nisinnena taṃ adisvā ``kahaṃ nu sumukho''ti vutte ``esa mātugāmaṃ gahetvā kañcanaguhāyaṃ uttamaratiṃ anubhotī''ti vadanti, evaṃ tvameva thīnaṃ atthesu ^b^yuñjasi^eb^ yuttapayutto hosi, na ^a^P5.0369^ea^ aññoti attho. ^b^tassa tyajjā^eb^ti tassa te ajja maraṇabhaye jāte iminā bhītena maraṇabhayena bhīto maññe, ayaṃ mātugāmassa dosadassane nipuṇā mati jāyateti adhippāyenevamāha.

[03] ^b^sabbo hī^eb^ti yo hi koci. ^b^saṃsayaṃ patto^eb^ti jīvitasaṃsayappatto. ^b^bhīrū^eb^ti bhīrū hutvāpi bhayaṃ adhivāseti. ^b^mahantāno^eb^ti ye pana paṇḍitā ca honti mahante ca ṭhāne ṭhitā mahantāno, te duyyuje atthe yuñjanti ghaṭenti vāyamanti, tasmā ``mā bhāyi, dhīro hohī''ti taṃ ussāhento evamāha. ^b^āpada^eb^nti sāmino āgataṃ āpadaṃ esa sūro paṭibāhati, etadatthāya sūraṃ mantinaṃ icchanti. ^b^attapariyāya^eb^nti attano parittāṇampi ca kātuṃ sakkotīti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^vikantiṃsū^eb^ti chindiṃsu. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- samma sumukha, tvaṃ mayā attano anantare ṭhāne ṭhapito, tasmā yathā ajja rañño sūdā amhe maṃsatthāya na vikantiṃsu, tathā karohi, tādiso hi amhākaṃ pattavaṇṇo. ^b^taṃ vadhī^eb^ti svāyaṃ vaṇṇo yathā nāma veḷuṃ nissāya jātaṃ phalaṃ veḷumeva vadhati, tathā mā taṃ vadhi, tañca mañca mā vadhīti adhippāyenevamāha.

[03] ^b^muttopī^eb^ti ^a^M5.0393^ea^ yathāsukhaṃ cittakūṭapabbataṃ gacchāti evaṃ luddaputtena mayā saddhiṃ mutto vissajjito samānopi uḍḍituṃ na icchi. ^b^saya^eb^nti rājānaṃ daṭṭhukāmo hutvā sayameva bandhaṃ upagatoti evamidaṃ amhākaṃ bhayaṃ taṃ nissāya āgataṃ. ^b^sopajjā^eb^ti sopi ajja jīvitasaṃsayaṃ patto. ^b^atthaṃ gaṇhāhi mā mukha^eb^nti idāni amhākaṃ muñcanakāraṇaṃ gaṇha, yathā muccāma, tathā vāyama, ``vātova gandhamādetī''tiādīni vadanto itthigarahatthāya mukhaṃ mā pasārayi.
[03] evaṃ ^a^V5.0365^ea^ mahāsatto mātugāmaṃ vaṇṇetvā sumukhaṃ appaṭibhāṇaṃ katvā tassa anattamanabhāvaṃ viditvā idāni naṃ paggaṇhanto gāthamāha --

[03] tattha ^b^so^eb^ti, samma sumukha, so tvaṃ. ^b^taṃ yoga^eb^nti yaṃ pubbe ``ahaṃ yogaṃ payuñjissaṃ, yuttaṃ dhammūpasaṃhita''nti avacāsi, taṃ idāni payuñjassu. ^b^tava pariyāpadānenā^eb^ti tava tena yogena parisuddhena. ``pariyodātenā''tipi pāṭho, parittāṇenāti attho, tayā katattā tava santakena parittāṇena mama jīvitapariyesanaṃ carāti adhippāyo.
[03] atha ^a^P5.0370^ea^ sumukho ``ayaṃ ativiya maraṇabhayabhīto mama ñāṇabalaṃ na jānāti, rājānaṃ disvā thokaṃ kathaṃ labhitvā jānissāmi, assāsessāmi tāva na''nti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``mā bhāyi patataṃ seṭṭha, na hi bhāyanti tādisā.

[01] iti tesaṃ sakuṇabhāsāya kathentānaṃ luddaputto na kiñci aññāsi, kevalaṃ pana te kājenādāya bārāṇasiṃ pāvisi. acchariyabbhutajātena añjalinā mahājanena anuggacchamāno so rājadvāraṃ patvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ rañño ārocāpesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[03] tattha ^b^paṭivedetha ma^eb^nti khemako āgatoti evaṃ maṃ rañño nivedetha. ^b^dhataraṭṭhāya^eb^nti ayaṃ dhataraṭṭho āgatoti paṭivedetha.

[03] dovāriko ^a^V5.0366^ea^ gantvā paṭivedesi. rājā sañjātasomanasso ``khippaṃ āgacchatū''ti vatvā amaccagaṇaparivuto samussitasetacchatte rājapallaṅke nisinno khemakaṃ haṃsakājaṃ ādāya mahātalaṃ abhiruḷhaṃ disvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇe haṃse oloketvā ``sampuṇṇo me manoratho''ti tassa kattabbakiccaṃ amacce āṇāpesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] tattha ^b^puññasaṅkāse^eb^ti attano puññasadise. ^b^lakkhaṇasammate^eb^ti seṭṭhasammate abhiññāte. ^b^khalū^eb^ti nipāto, tassa ``te khalu disvā''ti purimapadena sambandho. ^b^``dethā''^eb^tiādīni rājā pasannākāraṃ karonto āha. tattha ^b^kāmaṃkaro hiraññassā^eb^ti ^a^P5.0371^ea^ hiraññaṃ assa kāmakiriyā atthu. ^b^yāvanto^eb^ti yattakaṃ esa icchati, tattakaṃ hiraññamassa dethāti attho.

[01] evaṃ pasannākāraṃ kāretvā pītisomanassāsamussahito ``gacchatha naṃ alaṅkaritvā ānethā''ti āha. atha naṃ amaccā rājanivesanā otāretvā kappitakesamassuṃ nhātānulittaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ katvā rañño dassesuṃ. athassa rājā saṃvacchare satasahassuṭṭhānake dvādasa gāme ājaññayuttaṃ rathaṃ alaṅkatamahāgehañcāti mahantaṃ yasaṃ dāpesi. so mahantaṃ yasaṃ labhitvā attano kammaṃ pakāsetuṃ ``na te, deva, mayā yo vā so vā haṃso ānīto, ayaṃ pana navutiyā haṃsasahassānaṃ rājā dhataraṭṭho nāma, ayaṃ senāpati sumukho nāmā''ti āha ^a^M5.0395^ea^. atha naṃ rājā ``kathaṃ te, samma, ete gahitā''ti pucchi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] yadyāyaṃ samma khemaka, puṇṇā haṃsehi tiṭṭhati..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0367^ea^ ^b^pasannatta^eb^nti pasannabhāvaṃ somanassappattaṃ. ^b^yadyāya^eb^nti, samma khemaka, yadi ayaṃ amhākaṃ pokkharaṇī navutihaṃsasahassehi puṇṇā tiṭṭhati. ^b^kathaṃ rucimajjhagata^eb^nti evaṃ sante tvaṃ tesaṃ rucīnaṃ piyadassanānaṃ haṃsānaṃ majjhagataṃ etaṃ ñātisaṅghehi okiṇṇaṃ. ^b^nimmajjhima^eb^nti neva majjhimaṃ neva kaniṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ haṃsarājānaṃ kathaṃ pāsahattho upāgami kathaṃ gaṇhīti.
[22] tatthāhaṃ odahiṃ pāsaṃ, evaṃ taṃ dijamaggahi''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0372^ea^ ^b^adanānī^eb^ti ādānāni, gocaraggahaṇaṭṭhānānīti attho, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^upāsato^eb^ti upagacchantassa. ^b^pada^eb^nti gocarabhūmiyaṃ akkantapadaṃ. ^b^ghaṭassito^eb^ti cāṭipañjare nissito hutvā. ^b^athassā^eb^ti atha chaṭṭhe divase etassa adanesanaṃ carantassa padaṃ addakkhiṃ. ^b^evaṃ ta^eb^nti evaṃ taṃ dijaṃ aggahinti sabbaṃ gahitopāyaṃ ācikkhi.
[03] taṃ sutvā rājā ``ayaṃ dvāre ṭhatvā paṭivedentopi dhataraṭṭhassevāgamanaṃ paṭivedesi, idānipi etaṃ ekameva gaṇhinti vadati, kiṃ nu kho ettha kāraṇa''nti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``ludda dve ime sakuṇā, atha ekoti bhāsasi.
[22] cittaṃ nu te vipariyattaṃ, adu kiṃ nu jigīsasī''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^M5.0396^ea^ ^b^vipariyatta^eb^nti vipallatthaṃ. ^b^adu kiṃ nu jigīsasī^eb^ti udāhu kiṃ nu cintesi, kiṃ itaraṃ gahetvā aññassa dātukāmo hutvā cintesīti pucchati.
[03] tato luddo ``na me, deva, cittaṃ vipallatthaṃ, nāpi ahaṃ itaraṃ aññassa dātukāmo, apica kho pana mayā ohite pāse ekova baddho''ti āvi karonto āha --
[22] uraṃ saṃhacca tiṭṭhanti, so me bandhaṃ upāgami..
[22] ariyaṃ bruvāno aṭṭhāsi, cajanto mānusiṃ gira''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^lohitakā^eb^ti rattavaṇṇā. ^b^lātā^eb^ti rājiyo. ^b^uraṃ saṃhaccā^eb^ti uraṃ āhacca. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- mahārāja, yassetā rattasuvaṇṇasappaṭibhāgā tisso lohitakā rājiyo gīvaṃ parikkhipitvā uraṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti, so ekova mama pāse bandhaṃ upāgatoti. ^b^bhassaro^eb^ti parisuddho pabhāsampanno. ^b^ātura^eb^nti gilānaṃ dukkhitaṃ aṭṭhāsīti.

[03] atha dhataraṭṭhassa baddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā nivattitvā etaṃ samassāsetvā mamāgamanakāle ca paccuggamanaṃ katvā ākāseyeva mayā saddhiṃ madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā manussabhāsāya dhataraṭṭhassa guṇaṃ kathento aṭṭhāsi, mama hadayaṃ mudukaṃ ^a^P5.0373^ea^ katvā puna etasseva purato aṭṭhāsi. athāhaṃ, deva, sumukhassa subhāsitaṃ sutvā pasannacitto dhataraṭṭhaṃ vissajjesiṃ, iti dhataraṭṭhassa pāsato mokkho, ime haṃse ādāya mama idhāgamanañca sumukheneva katanti. evaṃ so sumukhassa guṇakathaṃ kathesi. taṃ sutvā rājā sumukhassa dhammakathaṃ sotukāmo ahosi. luddaputtassa sakkāraṃ karontasseva sūriyo atthaṅgato, dīpā pajjalitā, bahū khattiyādayo sannipatitā, khemā devīpi vividhanāṭakaparivārā rañño dakkhiṇapasse nisīdi. tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā sumukhaṃ kathāpetukāmo gāthamāha --
[21] ``atha kiṃ dāni sumukha, hanuṃ saṃhacca tiṭṭhasi.
[22] adu me parisaṃ patto, bhayā bhīto na bhāsasī''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^M5.0397^ea^ ^b^hanuṃ saṃhaccā^eb^ti madhurakatho kira tvaṃ, atha kasmā idāni mukhaṃ pidhāya tiṭṭhasi. ^b^adū^eb^ti kacci. ^b^bhayā bhīto^eb^ti parisasārajjabhayena bhīto hutvā.
[03] taṃ sutvā sumukho abhītabhāvaṃ dassento gāthamāha --
[22] nāhaṃ bhayā na bhāsissaṃ, vākyaṃ atthasmiṃ tādise''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^tādise^eb^ti apica kho pana tathārūpe atthe uppanne vākyaṃ bhāsissāmīti vacanokāsaṃ olokento nisinnomhīti attho.
[03] taṃ sutvā rājā tassa kathaṃ vaḍḍhetukāmatāya parihāsaṃ karonto āha --
[21] ``na te abhisaraṃ passe, na rathe napi pattike.
[22] nāssa cammaṃva kīṭaṃ vā, vammite ca dhanuggahe..
[21] ``na hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ vā, nagaraṃ vā sumāpitaṃ.
[22] yattha paviṭṭho sumukha, bhāyitabbaṃ na bhāyasī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0370^ea^ ^b^abhisara^eb^nti rakkhaṇatthāya parivāretvā ṭhitaṃ āvudhahatthaṃ parisaṃ te na passāmi. ^b^nāssā^eb^ti ettha ^b^assā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^camma^eb^nti saraparittāṇacammaṃ. ^b^kīṭa^eb^nti kīṭaṃ cāṭikapālādi vuccati. cāṭikapālahatthāpi te santike natthīti dīpeti. ^b^vammite^eb^ti cammasannaddhe. ^b^na hirañña^eb^nti yaṃ nissāya na bhāyasi, taṃ hiraññampi te na passāmi.
[03] evaṃ ^a^P5.0374^ea^ raññā ``kiṃ te abhāyanakāraṇa''nti vutte taṃ kathento āha --

[03] tattha ^b^abhisarenā^eb^ti ārakkhaparivārena. ^b^attho^eb^ti etena mama kiccaṃ natthi. kasmā? yasmā ^b^apathena^eb^ tumhādisānaṃ amaggena pathaṃ māpetvā yāma, ākāsacārino mayanti. ^b^paṇḍitā tyamhā^eb^ti paṇḍitāti tayā sutāmhā, teneva kāraṇena amhākaṃ santikā dhammaṃ sotukāmo kira no gāhāpesi. ^b^sacce cassā^eb^ti sace pana tvaṃ sacce patiṭṭhito assa, atthavatiṃ kāraṇanissitaṃ vācaṃ bhāseyyāma. ^b^asaccassā^eb^ti vacīsaccarahitassa tava subhāsitaṃ muṇḍassa dantasūci viya kiṃ karissati.
[03] taṃ sutvā rājā ``kasmā maṃ musāvādī anariyoti vadasi, kiṃ mayā kata''nti āha. atha naṃ sumukho ``tena hi, mahārāja, suṇāhī''ti vatvā āha --
[22] abhayañca tayā ghuṭṭhaṃ, imāyo dasadhā disā..
[22] pahūtaṃ cādanaṃ tattha, ahiṃsā cettha pakkhinaṃ..
[22] te te baddhasma pāsena, etaṃ te bhāsitaṃ musā..

[03] tattha ^b^ta^eb^nti tvaṃ. ^b^khema^eb^nti evaṃnāmikaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ. ^b^ghuṭṭha^eb^nti catūsu kaṇṇesu ṭhatvā ghosāpitaṃ. ^b^dasadhā^eb^ti imāsu dasadhā ṭhitāsu disāsu tayā abhayaṃ ghuṭṭhaṃ. ^b^ogayhā^eb^ti ogāhetvā āgatānaṃ santikā. ^b^pahūtaṃ cādana^eb^nti pahūtañca padumapupphasāliādikaṃ adanaṃ. ^b^idaṃ sutvānā^eb^ti ^a^P5.0375^ea^ tesaṃ taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ ogāhetvā āgatānaṃ santikā idaṃ abhayaṃ sutvā ^b^tavantike^eb^ tava samīpe tayā kāritapokkharaṇiṃ āgatāmhāti attho. ^b^te te^eb^ti te mayaṃ tava pāsena baddhā. ^b^purakkhatvā^eb^ti purato katvā ^a^M5.0399^ea^. ^b^icchālobha^eb^nti icchāsaṅkhātaṃ pāpakaṃ lobhaṃ. ^b^ubhosandhi^eb^nti ubhayaṃ devaloke ca manussaloke ca paṭisandhiṃ ime pāpadhamme purato katvā caranto puggalo sugatipaṭisandhiṃ atikkamitvā asātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatīti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V5.0371^ea^ parisamajjheyeva rājānaṃ lajjāpesi. atha naṃ rājā ``nāhaṃ, sumukha, tumhe māretvā maṃsaṃ khāditukāmo gaṇhāpesiṃ, paṇḍitabhāvaṃ pana vo sutvā subhāsitaṃ sotukāmo gaṇhāpesi''nti pakāsento āha --
[22] tathā taṃ samma nesādo, vutto sumukha maggahī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^nāparajjhāmā^eb^ti mārento aparajjhati nāma, mayaṃ na mārema. ^b^lobhāva maggahi^eb^nti maṃsaṃ khāditukāmo hutvā lobhāva tumhe nāhaṃ aggahiṃ. ^b^paṇḍitātyatthā^eb^ti paṇḍitāti sutā attha. ^b^atthacintakā^eb^ti paṭicchannānaṃ atthānaṃ cintakā. ^b^atthavati^eb^nti kāraṇanissitaṃ. ^b^tathā^eb^ti tena kāraṇena. ^b^vutto^eb^ti mayā vutto hutvā. ^b^sumukha, maggahī^eb^ti, sumukhāti ālapati, ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro. ^b^aggahī^eb^ti dhammaṃ desetuṃ tumhe gaṇhi.
[01] taṃ sutvā sumukho ``subhāsitaṃ sotukāmena ayuttaṃ te kataṃ, mahārājā''ti vatvā āha --
[21] ``yo migena migaṃ hanti, pakkhiṃ vā pana pakkhinā.
[22] sutena vā sutaṃ kiṇyā, kiṃ anariyataraṃ tato..
[22] ubho so dhaṃsate lokā, idha ceva parattha ca..
[21] ``na ^a^M5.0400^ea^ majjetha yasaṃ patto, na byādhe pattasaṃsayaṃ.
[22] idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, evaṃte tidivaṃ gatā..

[03] tattha ^b^upanītasmi^eb^nti maraṇasantikaṃ upanīte. ^b^kālapariyāya^eb^nti maraṇakālavāraṃ sampattā samānā na bhāsissāma. na hi dhammakathikaṃ bandhitvā maraṇabhayena tajjetvā dhammaṃ suṇanti, ayuttaṃ te katanti. ^b^migenā^eb^ti suṭṭhu sikkhāpitena dīpakamigena. ^b^hantī^eb^ti hanati. ^b^pakkhinā^eb^ti dīpakapakkhinā. ^b^sutenā^eb^ti khemaṃ nibbhayanti vissutena dīpakamigapakkhisadisena padumasarena. ^b^suta^eb^nti ``paṇḍito citrakathī''ti evaṃ sutaṃ dhammakathikaṃ. ^b^kiṇyā^eb^ti ``dhammaṃ sossāmī''ti pāsabandhanena yo kiṇeyya hiṃseyya bādheyya. ^b^tato^eb^ti tesaṃ kiriyato uttari aññaṃ anariyataraṃ nāma kimatthi.

[03] ^b^ariyaruda^eb^nti mukhena ariyavacanaṃ sundaravacanaṃ bhāsati. ^b^anariyadhammavassito^eb^ti kammena anariyadhammaṃ avassito. ^b^ubho^eb^ti devalokā ca manussalokā cāti ubhayamhā. ^b^idha cevā^eb^ti idha uppannopi parattha uppannopi evarūpo dvīhi sugatilokehi dhaṃsitvā nirayameva upapajjati. ^b^pattasaṃsaya^eb^nti jīvitasaṃsayamāpannampi dukkhaṃ patvā na kilameyya. ^b^saṃvare vivarāni cā^eb^ti attano chiddāni dvārāni saṃvareyya pidaheyya. ^b^vuddhā^eb^ti guṇavuddhā paṇḍitā. ^b^abbhatikkantā^eb^ti imaṃ manussalokaṃ atikkantā. ^b^kālapariyāya^eb^nti maraṇakālapariyāyaṃ pattā hutvā. ^b^evaṃte^eb^ti evaṃ ete. ^b^ida^eb^nti idaṃ mayā vuttaṃ atthanissitaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti paveṇiyadhammampi sucaritadhammampi.
[22] yo sukhe sukhito rañño, dukkhite hoti dukkhito..
[01] rañño vacanaṃ sutvā tesaṃ āsanāni āharitvā tattha nisinnānaṃ gandhodakena pāde dhovitvā satapākena telena abbhañjiṃsu. tamatthaṃ ^a^P5.0377^ea^ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] tattha ^b^maṭṭha^eb^nti karaṇapariniṭṭhitaṃ. ^b^kāsikamatthanna^eb^nti kāsikavatthena atthataṃ. ^b^koccha^eb^nti majjhe saṃkhittaṃ. ^b^veyyagghaparisibbita^eb^nti byagghacammaparisibbitaṃ maṅgaladivase aggamahesiyā nisinnapīṭhaṃ. ^b^kañcanapattehī^eb^ti suvaṇṇabhājanehi. ^b^puthū^eb^ti bahū janā. ^b^kāsiyo^eb^ti kāsiraṭṭhavāsino. ^b^abhihāresu^eb^nti upanāmesuṃ. ^b^aggarañño pavāsita^eb^nti aṭṭhasatapalasuvaṇṇapātiparikkhittaṃ haṃsarañño paṇṇākāratthāya kāsiraññā pesitaṃ nānaggarasabhojanaṃ.

[03] evaṃ upanīte pana tasmiṃ kāsirājā tesaṃ sampaggahatthaṃ sayaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ gahetvā upanāmesi. te tato madhulāje khāditvā madhurodakañca piviṃsu. atha mahāsatto rañño abhihārañca pasādañca disvā paṭisanthāramakāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``kacci bhoto amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati.
[22] kacci ca te tavatthesu, nāvakaṅkhanti jīvitaṃ..
[21] ``athopi me amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati.
[22] ṭhito dasasu dhammesu, paralokaṃ na santase..

[03] tattha ^b^disvā^eb^ti taṃ bahuṃ aggapānabhojanaṃ disvā. ^b^pesita^eb^nti āharāpetvā upanītaṃ. ^b^khattadhammāna^eb^nti paṭhamakāraṇesu paṭisanthāradhammānaṃ. ^b^tato pucchi anantarā^eb^ti tasmiṃ kāle ``kacci nu, bhoto''ti anupaṭipāṭiyā pucchi. tā panetā cha gāthā heṭṭhā vuttatthāyeva. ^b^anuppīḷa^eb^nti kacci raṭṭhavāsino yante ucchuṃ viya na pīḷesīti pucchati. ^b^akutociupaddava^eb^nti kutoci anupaddavaṃ. ^b^dhammena samena manusāsasī^eb^ti kacci tava raṭṭhaṃ dhammena samena anusāsasi. ^b^santo^eb^ti sīlādiguṇasaṃyuttā sappurisā. ^b^niraṃkatvā^eb^ti chaḍḍetvā. ^b^nānāgataṃ dīgha^eb^nti anāgataṃ attano jīvitapavattiṃ ``kacci dīgha''nti na samavekkhasi, āyusaṅkhārānaṃ parittabhāvaṃ jānāsīti pucchati. ^b^madanīye^eb^ti madārahe rūpādiārammaṇe. ^b^na santasī^eb^ti na bhāyasi. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- kacci rūpādīsu kāmaguṇesu amatto appamatto hutvā dānādīnaṃ kusalānaṃ katattā paralokaṃ na bhāyasīti.

[03] ^b^dasasū^eb^ti dasasu rājadhammesu. dānādīsu dasavatthukā cetanā ^b^dānaṃ,^eb^ pañcasīladasasīlāni ^b^sīlaṃ^eb^ ^a^V5.0376^ea^, deyyadhammacāgo ^a^P5.0379^ea^ ^b^pariccāgo,^eb^ ujubhāvo ^b^ajjavaṃ,^eb^ mudubhāvo ^b^maddavaṃ,^eb^ uposathakammaṃ ^b^tapo,^eb^ mettāpubbabhāgo ^b^akkodho,^eb^ karuṇāpubbabhāgo ^b^avihiṃsā,^eb^ adhivāsanā ^b^khanti,^eb^ avirodho ^b^avirodhanaṃ. acintetvā^eb^ti mama imaṃ guṇasampattiṃ acintetvā. ^b^bhāvadosa^eb^nti cittadosaṃ. ^b^anaññāyā^eb^ti ajānitvā. asmākañhi cittadoso ^a^M5.0404^ea^ nāma natthi, yamesa jāneyya, taṃ ajānitvāva pharusaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ giraṃ vissajjesi. ^b^ayoniso^eb^ti anupāyena. ^b^yānasmesū^eb^ti yāni vajjāni amhesu na vijjanti, tāni vadati. ^b^nayida^eb^nti tasmāssa idaṃ vacanaṃ paññavataṃ iva na hoti, tenesa mama na paṇḍito viya upaṭṭhāti.
[03] taṃ sutvā sumukho ``mayā guṇasampannova rājā apasādito, so me kuddho, khamāpessāmi na''nti cintetvā āha --
[22] dhataraṭṭhe ca baddhasmiṃ, dukkhaṃ me vipulaṃ ahu..

[03] tattha ^b^atisāra^eb^nti pakkhalitaṃ. ^b^vegenā^eb^ti ahaṃ etaṃ kathaṃ kathento vegena sahasā kathesiṃ. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ mama vipulaṃ ahosi, tasmā kodhavasena yaṃ mayā vuttaṃ, taṃ me khamatha, mahārājāti. ^b^puttāna^eb^nti tvaṃ amhākaṃ puttānaṃ pitā viya. ^b^dharaṇīrivā^eb^ti pāṇabhūtānaṃ patiṭṭhā pathavī viya tvaṃ amhākaṃ avassayo. ^b^adhipannāna^eb^nti dosena aparādhena ajjhotthaṭānaṃ khamassūti idaṃ so āsanā oruyha pakkhehi añjaliṃ katvā āha.
[01] atha naṃ rājā āliṅgitvā ādāya suvaṇṇapīṭhe nisīdāpetvā accayadesanaṃ paṭiggaṇhanto āha --
[21] ``etaṃ te anumodāma, yaṃ bhāvaṃ na nigūhasi.
[03] tattha ^a^V5.0377^ea^ ^b^anumodāmā^eb^ti etaṃ te dosaṃ khamāma. ^b^ya^eb^nti yasmā tvaṃ attano cittapaṭicchannabhāvaṃ na nigūhasi. ^b^khila^eb^nti cittakhilaṃ cittakhāṇukaṃ.
[01] idañca pana vatvā rājā mahāsattassa dhammakathāya sumukhassa ca ujubhāve pasīditvā ``pasannena nāma pasannākāro kātabbo''ti ubhinnampi tesaṃ attano rajjasiriṃ niyyādento āha --
[22] etaṃ dadāmi vo vittaṃ, issaraṃ vissajāmi vo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^muttā^eb^ti viddhāviddhamuttā. ^b^maṇayo^eb^ti maṇibhaṇḍakāni. ^b^saṅkhamuttā cā^eb^ti dakkhiṇāvaṭṭasaṅkharatanañca āmalakavaṭṭamuttaratanañca. ^b^vatthaka^eb^nti sukhumakāsikavatthāni. ^b^ajina^eb^nti ajinamigacammaṃ. ^b^lohaṃ kāḷāyasa^eb^nti tambalohañca kāḷalohañca. ^b^issara^eb^nti kañcanamālena setacchattena saddhiṃ dvādasayojanike bārāṇasinagare rajjaṃ.
[03] evañca pana vatvā ubhopi te setacchattena pūjetvā rajjaṃ paṭicchāpesi. atha mahāsatto raññā saddhiṃ sallapanto āha --
[22] dhammesu vattamānānaṃ, tvaṃ no ācariyo bhava..

[03] tattha ^b^dhammesū^eb^ti kusalakammapathadhammesu. ^b^ācariyo^eb^ti tvaṃ amhehi byattataro, tasmā no ācariyo hoti, apica dasannaṃ rājadhammānaṃ kathitattā sumukhassa dosaṃ dassetvā accayapaṭiggahaṇassa ^a^V5.0378^ea^ katattāpi tvaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyova, tasmā idānipi no ācārasikkhāpanena ācariyo bhavāti āha. ^b^passemurindamā^eb^ti passemu arindama.
[03] so tesaṃ gamanaṃ anujāni, bodhisattassapi dhammaṃ kathentasseva aruṇaṃ uṭṭhahi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[03] tattha ^b^yathākatha^eb^nti yaṃkiñci atthaṃ tehi saddhiṃ cintetabbaṃ mantetabbañca, sabbaṃ taṃ cintetvā ca mantetvā cāti attho. ^b^anuññāsī^eb^ti gacchathāti anuññāsi.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M5.0406^ea^ tena anuññāto bodhisatto rājānaṃ ``appamatto dhammena rajjaṃ kārehī''ti ovaditvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi. rājā tesaṃ kañcanabhājanehi ^a^P5.0381^ea^ madhulājañca madhurodakañca upanāmetvā niṭṭhitāhārakicce gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā bodhisattaṃ suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena sayaṃ ukkhipi, khemā devī sumukhaṃ ukkhipi. atha ne sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā sūriyuggamanavelāya ``gacchatha sāmino''ti vissajjesuṃ. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] tesu mahāsatto suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakato uppatitvā ākāse ṭhatvā ``mā cindayi, mahārāja, appamatto amhākaṃ ovāde vatteyyāsī''ti rājānaṃ samassāsetvā sumukhaṃ ādāya cittakūṭameva gato. tānipi kho navuti haṃsasahassāni kañcanaguhato nikkhamitvā pabbatatale nisinnāni te āgacchante disvā paccuggantvā parivāresuṃ. te ñātigaṇaparivutā cittakūṭatalaṃ pavisiṃsu. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] evaṃ parivāretvā ca pana te haṃsā ``kathaṃ muttosi, mahārājā''ti pucchiṃsu. mahāsatto sumukhaṃ nissāya muttabhāvaṃ saṃyamarājaluddaputtehi katakammañca kathesi. taṃ sutvā tuṭṭhā haṃsagaṇā ``sumukho senāpati ca rājā ca luddaputto ca sukhitā niddukkhā ciraṃ jīvantū''ti āhaṃsu. tamatthaṃ ^a^P5.0382^ea^ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] satthā ^a^M5.0407^ea^ imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā ``na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi ānando mamatthāya attano jīvitaṃ pariccajī''ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi ``tadā luddaputto channo ahosi, khemā devī, khemā bhikkhunī, rājā sāriputto, sumukho ānando, sesaparisā buddhaparisā, dhataraṭṭhahaṃsarājā pana ahameva ahosi''nti.

[03] ^b^neva kiṇāmi napi vikkiṇāmī^eb^ti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dānajjhāsayaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. so kira sāvatthiyaṃ eko kulaputto hutvā satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannacitto pabbajitvā sīlesu paripūrakārī dhutaṅgaguṇasamannāgato sabrahmacārīsu pavattamettacitto divasassa tikkhattuṃ buddhadhammasaṅghupaṭṭhāne appamatto ācārasampanno dānajjhāsayo ahosi. sāraṇīyadhammapūrako attanā laddhaṃ paṭiggāhakesu vijjamānesu chinnabhatto hutvāpi detiyeva, tasmā ^a^V5.0380^ea^ tassa dānajjhāsayadānābhiratabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭo ahosi. athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, ``āvuso, asuko nāma bhikkhu dānajjhāsayo dānābhirato attanā laddhaṃ pasatamattapānīyampi lobhaṃ chinditvā sabrahmacārīnaṃ deti, bodhisattassevassa ajjhāsayo''ti. satthā taṃ kathaṃ dibbāya sotadhātuyā sutvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā āgantvā ``kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā''ti pucchitvā ``imāya nāmā''ti vutte ``ayaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pubbe adānasīlo maccharī tiṇaggena telabindumpi adātā ahosi, atha naṃ ahaṃ dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā dānaphalaṃ vaṇṇetvā dāne patiṭṭhāpesiṃ, so `pasatamattaṃ udakampi labhitvā adatvā na pivissāmī'ti mama santike varaṃ aggahesi, tassa phalena dānajjhāsayo dānābhirato jāto''ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.

[03] atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente eko gahapati aḍḍho ahosi asītikoṭivibhavo. athassa rājā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi ^a^M5.0408^ea^. so rājapūjito nāgarajānapadapūjito hutvā ekadivasaṃ attano sampattiṃ oloketvā cintesi -- ``ayaṃ yaso mayā atītabhave neva niddāyantena, na kāyaduccaritādīni karontena laddho, sucaritāni pana ^a^P5.0383^ea^ pūretvā laddho, anāgatepi mayā mama patiṭṭhaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti. so rañño santikaṃ gantvā ``deva, mama ghare asītikoṭidhanaṃ atthi, taṃ gaṇhāhī''ti vatvā ``na mayhaṃ tava dhanenattho, bahuṃ me dhanaṃ, itopi yadicchasi, taṃ gaṇhāhī''ti vutte ``kiṃ nu, deva, mama dhanaṃ dātuṃ labhāmī''ti āha. atha raññā ``yathāruci karohī''ti vutte catūsu nagaradvāresu nagaramajjhe nivesanadvāre cāti cha dānasālāyo kāretvā devasikaṃ chasatasahassapariccāgaṃ karonto mahādānaṃ pavattesi. so yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā ``imaṃ mama dānavaṃsaṃ mā upacchindathā''ti putte anusāsitvā jīvitapariyosāne sakko hutvā nibbatti. puttopissa tatheva dānaṃ datvā cando hutvā nibbatti, tassa putto sūriyo hutvā nibbatti, tassa putto mātali hutvā nibbatti, tassa putto pañcasikho hutvā nibbatti, tassa pana putto chaṭṭho seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ laddhā macchariyakosiyo nāma ahosi asītikoṭivibhavoyeva. so ``mama pitupitāmahā bālā ahesuṃ, dukkhena sambhataṃ dhanaṃ chaḍḍesuṃ, ahaṃ pana dhanaṃ rakkhissāmi, kassaci kiñci na dassāmī''ti cintetvā dānasālā viddhaṃsetvā agginā jhāpetvā thaddhamaccharī ahosi.

[03] athassa gehadvāre yācakā sannipatitvā bāhā paggayha, ``mahāseṭṭhi, mā attano pitupitāmahānaṃ dānavaṃsaṃ nāsayi, dānaṃ dehī''ti mahāsaddena parideviṃsu. taṃ sutvā mahājano ``macchariyakosiyena ^a^V5.0381^ea^ attano dānavaṃso upacchinno''ti taṃ garahi. so lajjito nivesanadvāre yācakānaṃ āgatāgataṭṭhānaṃ nivāretuṃ ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. te nippaccayā hutvā puna tassa gehadvāraṃ na olokesuṃ. so tato paṭṭhāya dhanameva saṃharati, neva attanā paribhuñjati, na puttadārādīnaṃ deti, kañjikabilaṅgadutiyaṃ sakuṇḍakabhattaṃ bhuñjati, mūlaphalamattatantāni thūlavatthāni nivāseti, paṇṇachattaṃ matthake dhāretvā jaraggoṇayuttena jajjararathakena yāti. iti tassa asappurisassa tattakaṃ ^a^P5.0384^ea^ dhanaṃ sunakhena laddhaṃ nāḷikeraṃ viya ahosi.

[03] so ^a^M5.0409^ea^ ekadivasaṃ rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto ``anuseṭṭhiṃ ādāya gamissāmī''ti tassa gehaṃ agamāsi. tasmiṃ khaṇe anuseṭṭhi puttadhītādīhi parivuto navasappipakkamadhusakkharacuṇṇehi saṅkhataṃ pāyāsaṃ bhuñjamāno nisinno hoti. so macchariyakosiyaṃ disvā āsanā vuṭṭhāya ``ehi, mahāseṭṭhi, imasmiṃ pallaṅke nisīda, pāyāsaṃ bhuñjissāmā''ti āha. tassa pāyāsaṃ disvāva mukhe kheḷā uppajji, bhuñjitukāmo ahosi, evaṃ pana cintesi -- ``sacāhaṃ bhuñjissāmi, anuseṭṭhino mama gehaṃ āgatakāle paṭisakkāro kātabbo bhavissati, evaṃ me dhanaṃ nassissati, na bhuñjissāmī''ti. atha punappunaṃ yāciyamānopi ``idāni me bhuttaṃ, suhitosmī''ti na icchi. anuseṭṭhimhi bhuñjante pana olokento mukhe sañjāyamānena kheḷena nisīditvā tassa bhattakiccāvasāne tena saddhiṃ rājanivesanaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ passitvā rājanivesanato otaritvā attano gehaṃ anuppatto pāyāsataṇhāya pīḷiyamāno cintesi -- ``sacāhaṃ `pāyāsaṃ bhuñjitukāmomhī'ti vakkhāmi, mahājano bhuñjitukāmo bhavissati, bahū taṇḍulādayo nassissanti, na kassaci kathessāmī''ti. so rattindivaṃ pāyāsameva cintento vītināmetvāpi dhananāsanabhayena kassaci akathetvāva pipāsaṃ adhivāsesi, anukkamena adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto ahosi. evaṃ santepi dhananāsanabhayena akathento aparabhāge dubbalo hutvā sayanaṃ upagūhitvā nipajji.

[03] atha naṃ bhariyā upagantvā hatthena piṭṭhiṃ parimajjamānā ``kiṃ te, sāmi, aphāsuka''nti pucchi. ``taveva sarīre aphāsukaṃ karohi, mama aphāsukaṃ natthī''ti. ``sāmi, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātosi, kiṃ nu te kāci cintā atthi, udāhu rājā te kupito, adu puttehi avamāno kato, atha vā pana kāci taṇhā uppannā''ti? ``āma, taṇhā me uppannā''ti. ``kathehi, sāmī''ti? ``kathessāmi, sakkhissasi naṃ rakkhitu''nti. ``rakkhitabbayuttakā ce, rakkhissāmī''ti. evampi ^a^P5.0385^ea^ dhananāsanabhayena kathetuṃ na ussahi. tāya punappunaṃ pīḷiyamāno kathesi -- ``bhadde, ahaṃ ekadivasaṃ anuseṭṭhiṃ navasappimadhusakkharacuṇṇehi saṅkhataṃ ^a^V5.0382^ea^ pāyāsaṃ bhuñjantaṃ disvā tato paṭṭhāya tādisaṃ pāyāsaṃ bhuñjitukāmo jāto''ti. ``asappurisa, kiṃ tvaṃ duggato, sakalamārāṇasivāsīnaṃ pahonakaṃ pāyāsaṃ pacissāmī''ti. athassa sīse daṇḍena paharaṇakālo ^a^M5.0410^ea^ viya ahosi. so tassā kujjhitvā ``jānāmahaṃ tava mahaddhanabhāvaṃ, sace te kulagharā ābhataṃ atthi, pāyāsaṃ pacitvā nāgarānaṃ dehī''ti āha. ``tena hi ekavīthivāsīnaṃ pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī''ti. ``kiṃ te etehi, attano pana santakaṃ khādantū''ti? ``tena hi ito cito ca sattasattagharavāsīnaṃ pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī''ti. ``kiṃ te etehī''ti. ``tena hi imasmiṃ gehe parijanassā''ti. ``kiṃ te etenā''ti? ``tena hi bandhujanasseva pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī''ti. ``kiṃ te etenā''ti? ``tena hi tuyhañca mayhañca pacāmi sāmī''ti. ``kāsi tvaṃ, na tuyhaṃ vaṭṭatī''ti? ``tena hi ekasseva te pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī''ti. ``mayhañca tvaṃ mā paci, gehe pana pacante bahū paccāsīsanti, mayhaṃ pana patthaṃ taṇḍulānaṃ catubhāgaṃ khīrassa accharaṃ sakkharāya karaṇḍakaṃ sappissa karaṇḍakaṃ madhussa ekañca pacanabhājanaṃ dehi, ahaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha pacitvā bhuñjāmī''ti. sā tathā akāsi. so taṃ sabbaṃ ceṭakena gāhāpetvā ``gaccha asukaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhāhī''ti taṃ purato pesetvā ekakova oguṇṭhikaṃ katvā aññātakavesena tattha gantvā nadītīre ekasmiṃ gacchamūle uddhanaṃ kāretvā dārudakaṃ āharāpetvā ``tvaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ magge ṭhatvā kañcideva disvā mama saññaṃ dadeyyāsi, mayā pakkositakāleva āgaccheyyāsī''ti taṃ pesetvā aggiṃ katvā pāyāsaṃ paci.

[03] tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko devarājā dasasahassayojanaṃ alaṅkatadevanagaraṃ, saṭṭhiyojanaṃ ^a^P5.0386^ea^ suvaṇṇavīthiṃ, yojanasahassubbedhaṃ vejayantaṃ, pañcayojanasatikaṃ sudhammasabhaṃ, saṭṭhiyojanaṃ paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ, pañcayojanāvaṭṭaṃ kañcanamālasetacchattaṃ, aḍḍhateyyakoṭisaṅkhā devaccharā, alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ attabhāvanti imaṃ attano siriṃ oloketvā ``kiṃ nu kho katvā mayā ayaṃ yaso laddho''ti cintetvā bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhibhūtena pavattitaṃ dānaṃ addasa. tato ``mama puttādayo kuhiṃ nibbattā''ti olokento ``putto me cando devaputto hutvā nibbatti, tassa putto sūriyo, tassa putto, mātali, tassa putto, pañcasikho''ti sabbesaṃ nibbattiṃ disvā ``pañcasikhassa putto kīdiso''ti olokento attano vaṃsassa upacchinnabhāvaṃ passi. athassa etadahosi -- ``ayaṃ asappuriso maccharī hutvā neva attanā paribhuñjati ^a^M5.0411^ea^, na paresaṃ deti, mama vaṃso tena upacchinno, kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbattissati, ovādamassa datvā mama vaṃsaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā etassa imasmiṃ devanagare nibbattanākāraṃ karissāmī''ti. so candādayo pakkosāpetvā ``etha manussapathaṃ gamissāma, macchariyakosiyena amhākaṃ vaṃso upacchinno ^a^V5.0383^ea^, dānasālā jhāpitā, neva attanā paribhuñjati, na paresaṃ deti, idāni pana pāyāsaṃ bhuñjitukāmo hutvā `ghare paccante aññassapi pāyāso dātabbo bhavissatī'ti araññaṃ pavisitvā ekakova pacati, etaṃ dametvā dānaphalaṃ jānāpetvā āgamissāma, apica kho pana amhehi sabbehi ekato yāciyamāno tattheva mareyya. mama paṭhamaṃ gantvā pāyāsaṃ yācitvā nisinnakāle tumhe brāhmaṇavaṇṇena paṭipāṭiyā āgantvā yāceyyāthā''ti vatvā sayaṃ tāva brāhmaṇavaṇṇena taṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``bho, kataro bārāṇasigamanamaggo''ti pucchi. atha naṃ macchariyakosiyo ``kiṃ ummattakosi, bārāṇasimaggampi na jānāsi, kiṃ ito esi, etto yāhī''ti āha.

[03] sakko tassa vacanaṃ sutvā asuṇanto viya ``kiṃ kathesī''ti taṃ upagacchateva. sopi, ``are ^a^P5.0387^ea^, badhira brāhmaṇa, kiṃ ito esi, purato yāhī''ti viravi. atha naṃ sakko, ``bho, kasmā viravasi, dhūmo paññāyati, aggi paññāyati, pāyāso paccati, brāhmaṇānaṃ nimantanaṭṭhānena bhavitabbaṃ, ahampi brāhmaṇānaṃ bhojanakāle thokaṃ labhissāmi, kiṃ maṃ nicchubhasī''ti vatvā ``natthettha brāhmaṇānaṃ nimantanaṃ, purato yāhī''ti vutte ``tena hi kasmā kujjhasi, tava bhojanakāle thokaṃ labhissāmī''ti āha. atha naṃ so ``ahaṃ te ekasitthampi na dassāmi, thokaṃ idaṃ mama yāpanamattameva, mayāpi cetaṃ yācitvāva laddhaṃ, tvaṃ aññato āhāraṃ pariyesāhī''ti vatvā bhariyaṃ yācitvā laddhabhāvaṃ sandhāyeva vatvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``neva kiṇāmi napi vikkiṇāmi, na cāpi me sannicayo ca atthi.
[22] sukiccharūpaṃ vatidaṃ parittaṃ, patthodano nālamayaṃ duvinna''nti..
[03] taṃ ^a^M5.0412^ea^ sutvā sakko ``ahampi te madhurasaddena ekaṃ silokaṃ kathessāmi, taṃ suṇāhī''ti vatvā ``na me tava silokena attho''ti tassa vārentasseva gāthādvayamāha --
[21] ``taṃ taṃ vadāmi kosiya, dehi dānāni bhuñja ca.

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0384^ea^ ^b^anumajjhato majjhaka^eb^nti appamattakampi majjhe chetvā dve koṭṭhāse karitvā ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ datvā tato avasesato anumajjhatopi puna majjhe chetvā eko koṭṭhāso dātabboyeva. ^b^adānaṃ nūpapajjatī^eb^ti appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā dinnaṃ hotu, adānaṃ nāma na hoti, tampi dānameva mahapphalameva.

[03] so ^a^P5.0388^ea^ tassa vacanaṃ sutvā ``manāpaṃ te, brāhmaṇa, kathitaṃ, pāyāse pakke thokaṃ labhissasi, nisīdāhī''ti āha. sakko ekamante nisīdi. tasmiṃ nisinne cando teneva niyāmena upasaṅkamitvā tatheva kathaṃ pavattetvā tassa vārentasseva gāthādvayamāha --
[22] atithismiṃ yo nisinnasmiṃ, eko bhuñjati bhojanaṃ..
[21] taṃ taṃ vadāmi kosiya, dehi dānāni bhuñja ca.

[03] so tassa vacanaṃ sutvā kicchena kasirena ``tena hi nisīda, thokaṃ labhissasī''ti āha. so gantvā sakkassa santike nisīdi. tato sūriyo teneva nayena upasaṅkamitvā tatheva kathaṃ pavattetvā tassa vārentasseva gāthādvayamāha --
[22] atithismiṃ yo nisinnasmiṃ, neko bhuñjati bhojanaṃ..
[21] ``taṃ ^a^M5.0413^ea^ taṃ vadāmi kosiya, dehi dānāni bhuñja ca.

[03] tassapi vacanaṃ sutvā kicchena kasirena ``tena hi nisīda, thokaṃ labhissasī''ti āha. so gantvā candassa santike nisīdi. atha naṃ mātali teneva nayena upasaṅkamitvā tatheva kathaṃ pavattetvā tassa vārentasseva imā gāthā abhāsi --
[21] ``atra cassa hutaṃ hoti, atra cassa samīhitaṃ.
[22] atithismiṃ yo nisinnasmiṃ, neko bhuñjati bhojanaṃ..
[21] ``taṃ taṃ vadāmi kosiya, dehi dānāni bhuñja ca.

[03] tāsaṃ attho -- yo puriso ``nāgayakkhādīnaṃ balikammaṃ karomī''ti samuddasoṇḍipokkharaṇīādīsu yaṃ kiñci sarañca upagantvā juhati, tattha balikammaṃ karoti ^a^P5.0389^ea^, tathā bahukāya nadiyā gayāya pokkharaṇiyā doṇanāmake ca timbarunāmake ca titthe sīghasote mahante vārivahe. ^b^atra cassā^eb^ti yadi atrāpi etesu sarādīsu assa purisassa hutañceva samīhitañca hoti, saphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sampajjati. atithismiṃ yo nisinnasmiṃ neko bhuñjati bhojanaṃ, ettha vattabbameva natthi, tena taṃ vadāmi -- kosiya, dānāni ca dehi, sayañca bhuñja, ariyānaṃ dānābhiratānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ maggaṃ abhiruha. na hi ekāsī ekova bhuñjamāno sukhaṃ nāma labhatīti.

[03] so tassapi vacanaṃ sutvā pabbatakūṭena otthaṭo viya kicchena kasirena ``tena hi nisīda, thokaṃ labhissasī''ti āha. mātali gantvā sūriyassa santike nisīdi. tato pañcasikho teneva nayena upasaṅkamitvā tatheva kathaṃ pavattetvā tassa vārentasseva gāthādvayamāha --
[22] atithismiṃ yo nisinnasmiṃ, eko bhuñjati bhojanaṃ..
[21] ``taṃ taṃ vadāmi kosiya, dehi dānāni bhuñja ca.

[03] macchariyakosiyo taṃ sutvā dukkhavedano nitthunanto ``tena hi nisīda, thokaṃ labhissasī''ti āha. pañcasikho gantvā mātalissa santike nisīdi. iti tesu pañcasu brāhmaṇesu ^a^V5.0386^ea^ nisinnamattesveva pāyāso pacci. atha naṃ kosiyo uddhanā otāretvā ``tumhākaṃ pattāni āharathā''ti āha. te anuṭṭhāya yathānisinnāva hatthe pasāretvā himavantato māluvapattāni āhariṃsu. kosiyo tāni disvā ``tumhākaṃ etesu pattesu dātabbapāyāso natthi, khadirādīnaṃ pattāni āharathā''ti āha. te tānipi āhariṃsu. ekekaṃ pattaṃ yodhaphalakappamāṇaṃ ahosi. so sabbesaṃ dabbiyā pāyāsaṃ adāsi, sabbantimassa dānakālepi ukkhaliyā ūnaṃ na paññāyi, pañcannampi datvā sayaṃ ukkhaliṃ gahetvā nisīdi. tasmiṃ khaṇe pañcasikho uṭṭhāya attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā sunakho hutvā tesaṃ purato passāvaṃ karonto agamāsi. brāhmaṇā attano pāyāsaṃ pattena pidahiṃsu. kosiyassa hatthapiṭṭhe passāvabindu pati. brāhmaṇā ^a^P5.0390^ea^ kuṇḍikāhi udakaṃ gahetvā pāyāsaṃ abbhukiritvā bhuñjamānā viya ahesuṃ. kosiyo ``mayhampi udakaṃ detha, hatthaṃ dhovitvā bhuñjissāmī''ti āha. ``tava udakaṃ āharitvā hatthaṃ dhovā''ti. ``mayā tumhākaṃ pāyāso dinno, mayhaṃ thokaṃ udakaṃ dethā''ti. ``mayaṃ piṇḍapaṭipiṇḍakammaṃ nāma na karomā''ti. ``tena hi imaṃ ukkhaliṃ oloketha, hatthaṃ dhovitvā āgamissāmī''ti nadiṃ otari. tasmiṃ khaṇe sunakho ukkhaliṃ passāvassa pūresi. so taṃ passāvaṃ karontaṃ disvā mahantaṃ daṇḍamādāya taṃ tajjento āgacchi. so assājānīyamatto hutvā taṃ anubandhanto nānāvaṇṇo ahosi, kāḷopi hoti setopi suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi kabaropi uccopi nīcopi, evaṃ nānāvaṇṇo hutvā macchariyakosiyaṃ anubandhi. so maraṇabhayabhīto brāhmaṇe upasaṅkami. tepi uppatitvā ākāse ṭhitā. so tesaṃ taṃ iddhiṃ disvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``uḷāravaṇṇā ^a^M5.0415^ea^ vata brāhmaṇā ime, ayañca vo sunakho kissa hetu.
[03] uccāvacaṃ vaṇṇanibhaṃ vikubbati, akkhātha no brāhmaṇā ke nu tumhe''ti..
[21] ``cando ca sūriyo ca ubho idhāgatā, ayaṃ pana mātali devasārathi.
[22] sakkohamasmi tidasānamindo. eso ca kho pañcasikhoti vuccatī''ti..
[03] gāthaṃ vatvā tassa yasaṃ vaṇṇento gāthamāha --
[03] so tassa vacanaṃ sutvā ``sakka, evarūpaṃ dibbasampattiṃ kinti katvā labhasī''ti pucchi. sakko ``adānasīlā tāva pāpadhammā maccharino devalokaṃ na gacchanti, niraye nibbattantī''ti dassento --
[22] idheva nikkhippa sarīradehaṃ, kāyassa bhedā nirayaṃ vajantī''ti.. --
[25] imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā dhamme ṭhitānaṃ devalokapaṭilābhaṃ dassetuṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``ye kecime suggatimāsamānā, dhamme ṭhitā saṃyame saṃvibhāge.
[22] idheva nikkhippa sarīradehaṃ, kāyassa bhedā sugatiṃ vajantī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^āsamānā^eb^ti āsīsantā. ye keci sugatiṃ āsīsanti, sabbe te saṃyamasaṅkhāte dasasīladhamme saṃvibhāgasaṅkhāte dānadhamme ca ṭhitā ^a^M5.0416^ea^ hutvā idha sarīrasaṅkhātaṃ dehaṃ nikkhipitvā tassa kāyassa bhedā sugatiṃ vajantīti attho.
[03] evaṃ vatvā ca pana, ``kosiya, na mayaṃ tava santike pāyāsatthāya āgatā, kāruññena pana taṃ anukampamānā āgatāmhā''ti tassa pakāsetuṃ āha --
[21] ``tvaṃ nosi ñāti purimāsu jātisu, so maccharī rosako pāpadhammo.
[22] taveva atthāya idhāgatamhā, mā pāpadhammo nirayaṃ gamitthā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^so^eb^ti so tvaṃ. ^b^mā pāpadhammo^eb^ti ayaṃ amhākaṃ ñāti pāpadhammo mā nirayaṃ agamāti etadatthaṃ āgatamhāti attho.
[03] taṃ sutvā kosiyo ``atthakāmā kira me, ete maṃ nirayā uddharitvā sagge patiṭṭhāpetukāmā''ti tuṭṭhacitto āha --
[21] ``addhā ^a^V5.0388^ea^ maṃ vo hitakāmā, yaṃ maṃ samanusāsatha.
[22] sohaṃ tathā karissāmi, sabbaṃ vuttaṃ hitesibhi..
[21] ``esāhamajjeva uparamāmi, na cāhaṃ kiñci kareyya pāpaṃ.
[22] na ^a^P5.0392^ea^ cāpi me kiñci adeyyamatthi, na cāpidatvā udakaṃ pivāmi..
[21] ``evañca me dadato sabbakālaṃ, bhogā ime vāsava khīyissanti.
[22] tato ahaṃ pabbajissāmi sakka, hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikānī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ma^eb^nti mama. ^b^vo^eb^ti tumhe. ^b^yaṃ ma^eb^nti yena maṃ samanusāsatha, tena me tumhe hitakāmā. ^b^tathā^eb^ti yathā vadatha, tatheva karissāmi. ^b^uparamāmī^eb^ti maccharibhāvato uparamāmi. ^b^adeyyamatthī^eb^ti ito paṭṭhāya ca mama ālopato upaḍḍhampi adeyyaṃ nāma natthi, ^b^na cāpidatvā^eb^ti udakapasatampi ^a^M5.0417^ea^ cāhaṃ labhitvā adatvā na pivissāmi. ^b^khīyissantī^eb^ti vikkhīyissanti. ^b^yathodhikānī^eb^ti vatthukāmakilesakāmavasena yathāṭhitakoṭṭhāsāniyeva.

[03] sakko macchariyakosiyaṃ dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā dānaphalaṃ jānāpetvā dhammadesanāya pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā saddhiṃ tehi devanagarameva gato. macchariyakosiyopi nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājānaṃ anujānāpetvā ``gahitagahitabhājanāni pūretvā gaṇhantū''ti yācakānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā tasmiṃ khīṇe nikkhamma himavantato dakkhiṇapasse gaṅgāya ceva ekassa ca jātassarassa antare paṇṇasālaṃ katvā pabbajitvā vanamūlaphalāhāro tattha ciraṃ vihāsi, jaraṃ pāpuṇi. tadā sakkassa āsā saddhā sirī hirīti catasso dhītaro honti. tā bahuṃ dibbagandhamālaṃ ādāya udakakīḷanatthāya anotattadahaṃ gantvā tattha kīḷitvā manosilātale nisīdiṃsu. tasmiṃ khaṇe nārado nāma brāhmaṇatāpaso tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ divāvihāratthāya gantvā nandanavanacittalatāvanesu divāvihāraṃ katvā pāricchattakapupphaṃ chattaṃ viya chāyatthāya dhārayamāno manosilātalamatthakena attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kañcanaguhaṃ gacchati. atha tā tassa hatthe taṃ pupphaṃ disvā yāciṃsu. tamatthaṃ ^a^P5.0393^ea^ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``suciṃ ^a^V5.0389^ea^ sugandhaṃ tidasehi sakkataṃ, pupphuttamaṃ amaravarehi sevitaṃ.
[22] aladdha maccehiva dānavehi vā, aññatra devehi tadārahaṃ hidaṃ..
[21] ``tato ^a^M5.0418^ea^ catasso kanakattacūpamā, uṭṭhāya nāriyo pamadādhipā muniṃ.
[22] āsā ca saddhā ca sirī tato hirī, iccabravuṃ nāradadeva brāhmaṇaṃ..
[21] ``sace anuddiṭṭhaṃ tayā mahāmuni, pupphaṃ imaṃ pārichattassa bramhe.
[22] dadāhi no sabbā gati te ijjhatu, tuvampi no hohi yatheva vāsavo..
[22] na mayhamatthatthi imehi koci naṃ, yāyeva vo seyyasi sā piḷandhathā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^girivare^eb^ti purimassa vevacanaṃ. ^b^devavarābhipālitā^eb^ti sakkena rakkhitā. ^b^sabbalokagū^eb^ti devaloke ca manussaloke ca sabbattha gamanasamattho. ^b^dumavarasākhamādiyā^eb^ti sākhāya jātattā dumavarasākhanti laddhanāmaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā. ^b^sakkata^eb^nti katasakkāraṃ. ^b^amaravarehī^eb^ti sakkaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^aññatra devehī^eb^ti ṭhapetvā deve ca iddhimante ca aññehi manussehi vā yakkhādīhi vā aladdhaṃ. ^b^tadārahaṃ hida^eb^nti tesaṃyeva hi taṃ arahaṃ anucchavikaṃ. ^b^kanakattacūpamā^eb^ti kanakūpamā tacā. ^b^uṭṭhāyā^eb^ti ayyo mālāgandhavilepanādipaṭivirato pupphaṃ na piḷandhissati, ekasmiṃ padese chaḍḍessati, etha taṃ yācitvā pupphaṃ piḷandhissāmāti hatthe pasāretvā yācamānā ekappahāreneva uṭṭhahitvā. ^b^pamadādhipā^eb^ti pamadānaṃ uttamā. ^b^muni^eb^nti isiṃ.

[01] ^b^anuddiṭṭha^eb^nti ``asukassa nāma dassāmī''ti na uddiṭṭhaṃ. ^b^sabbā gati te ijjhatū^eb^ti sabbā te cittagati ijjhatu, patthitapatthitassa ^a^P5.0394^ea^ lābhī hohīti tassa thulimaṅgalaṃ vadanti. ^b^yatheva vāsavo^eb^ti yathā amhākaṃ pitā vāsavo icchiticchitaṃ deti, tatheva no tvampi hohīti. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ pupphaṃ. ^b^abhisamekkhā^eb^ti disvā. ^b^saṃkalaha^eb^nti nānāgāhaṃ kalahavaḍḍhanaṃ kathaṃ udīrayi. ^b^imehī^eb^ti imehi pupphehi nāma mayhaṃ attho natthi, paṭivirato ahaṃ ^a^M5.0419^ea^ mālādhāraṇatoti dīpeti. ^b^yāyeva vo seyyasī^eb^ti yā tumhākaṃ antare jeṭṭhikā. ^b^sā piḷandhathā^eb^ti sā etaṃ piḷandhatūti attho.
[03] tā ^a^V5.0390^ea^ catassopi tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gāthamāhaṃsu --
[22] yassā hi no nārada tvaṃ padassasi, sāyeva no hehiti seṭṭhasammatā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^tvaṃ nottamevā^eb^ti uttamamahāmuni tvameva no upadhārehi. tāsaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā nārado tā ālapanto gāthamāha --
[21] ``akallametaṃ vacanaṃ sugatte, ko brāhmaṇo saṃkalahaṃ udīraye.
[22] gantvāna bhūtādhipameva pucchatha, sace na jānātha idhuttamādhame''nti..

[03] tassattho -- bhadde sugatte, idaṃ tumhehi vuttaṃ vacanaṃ mama ayuttaṃ, evañhi sati mayā tumhesu ekaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, sesā hīnā karontena kalaho vaḍḍhito bhavissati, ko bāhitapāpo brāhmaṇo kalahaṃ udīraye vaḍḍheyya. evarūpassa hi kalahavaḍḍhanaṃ nāma ayuttaṃ, tasmā ito gatvā attano pitaraṃ bhūtādhipaṃ sakkameva pucchatha, sace attano uttamaṃ adhamañca na jānāthāti.
[22] sakāse gantvāna sahassacakkhuno, pucchiṃsu bhūtādhipaṃ kā nu seyyasī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0420^ea^ ^b^paramappakopitā^eb^ti pupphaṃ adadantena ativiya kopitā tassa kupitā hutvā. ^b^udīritā^eb^ti ``bhūtādhipameva pucchathā''ti vuttā. ^b^sahassacakkhuno^eb^ti sakkassa santikaṃ gantvā. ^b^kā nū^eb^ti amhākaṃ antare katamā uttamāti pucchiṃsu.
[21] ``tā disvā āyattamanā purindado, iccabravī devavaro katañjalī.
[22] sabbāva vo hotha sugatte sādisī, koneva bhadde kalahaṃ udīrayī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0391^ea^ ^b^tā disvā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, catassopi attano santikaṃ āgatā disvā. ^b^āyattamanā^eb^ti ussukkamanā byāvaṭacittā. ^b^katañjalī^eb^ti namassamānāhi devatāhi paggahitañjalī. ^b^sādisī^eb^ti sabbāva tumhe sādisiyo. ^b^ko nevā^eb^ti ko nu evaṃ. ^b^kalahaṃ udīrayī^eb^ti idaṃ nānāgāhaṃ viggahaṃ kathesi vaḍḍhesi.
[21] ``yo sabbalokaccarito mahāmuni, dhamme ṭhito nārado saccanikkamo.
[27] so nobravi girivare gandhamādane, gantvāna bhūtādhipameva pucchatha.

[03] taṃ sutvā sakko ``imā catassopi mayhaṃ dhītarova, sacāhaṃ `etāsu ekā guṇasampannā uttamā'ti vakkhāmi, sesā kujjhissanti, na sakkā ayaṃ aḍḍo vinicchinituṃ, imā himavante kosiyatāpasassa santikaṃ pesesāmi, so etāsaṃ aḍḍaṃ vinicchinissatī''ti cintetvā ``ahaṃ tumhākaṃ aḍḍaṃ na vinicchinissāmi, himavante kosiyo nāma tāpaso atthi, tassāhaṃ attano sudhābhojanaṃ pesessāmi, so parassa adatvā na bhuñjati, dadanto ^a^M5.0421^ea^ ca vicinitvā guṇavantānaṃ deti, yā tumhesu tassa hatthato bhattaṃ labhissati, sā uttamā bhavissatī''ti ācikkhanto gāthamāha --
[21] ``asu brahāraññacaro mahāmuni, nādatvā bhattaṃ varagatte bhuñjati.
[22] yassā hi so dassati sāva seyyasī''ti..
[03] iti so tāpasassa santikaṃ pesetvā mātaliṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa santikaṃ pesento anantaraṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``asū ^a^V5.0392^ea^ hi yo sammati dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ, gaṅgāya tīre himavantapassani.
[22] sa kosiyo dullabhapānabhojano, tassa sudhaṃ pāpaya devasārathī''ti..
[01] tattha ^b^sammatī^eb^ti vasati. ^b^dakkhiṇa^eb^nti himavantassa dakkhiṇāya disāya. ^b^passanī^eb^ti passe.
[21] ``sa mātalī devavarena pesito, sahassayuttaṃ abhiruyha sandanaṃ.
[22] sukhippameva upagamma assamaṃ, adissamāno munino sudhaṃ adā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^adissamāno^eb^ti, bhikkhave, so mātali devarājassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā taṃ assamaṃ gantvā adissamānakāyo hutvā tassa sudhaṃ adāsi, dadamāno ca rattiṃ padhānamanuyuñjitvā paccūsasamaye aggiṃ paricaritvā vibhātāya rattiyā udentaṃ sūriyaṃ namassamānassa ṭhitassa tassa hatthe sudhābhojanapātiṃ ṭhapesi.
[22] ko neva me pāṇisu kiṃ sudhodahi..
[22] adiṭṭhapubbaṃ mama jātu cakkhubhi, kā devatā pāṇisu kiṃ sudhodahī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^udaggihutta^eb^nti udakāggihuttaṃ paricaritvā aggisālato nikkhamma paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhatvā pabhaṅkaraṃ lokatamonudaṃ uttamaṃ ādiccaṃ upatiṭṭhato mama sabbāni bhūtāni adhicca atikkamitvā vattamāno vāsavo nu kho evaṃ mama pāṇīsu kiṃ sudhaṃ kiṃ nāmetaṃ odahi. ``saṅkhūpama''ntiādīhi ṭhitakova sudhaṃ vaṇṇeti.
[21] ``ahaṃ ^a^V5.0393^ea^ mahindena mahesi pesito, sudhābhihāsiṃ turito mahāmuni.
[22] jānāsi maṃ mātali devasārathi, bhuñjassu bhattuttama mābhivārayi..
[21] ``bhuttā ca sā dvādasa hanti pāpake, khudaṃ pipāsaṃ aratiṃ daraklamaṃ.
[22] kodhūpanāhañca vivādapesuṇaṃ, sītuṇha tandiñca rasuttamaṃ ida''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^sudhābhihāsi^eb^nti imaṃ sudhābhojanaṃ tuyhaṃ abhihariṃ. ^b^jānāsī^eb^ti jānāhi maṃ tvaṃ, ahaṃ mātali nāma devasārathīti attho. ^b^mābhivārayī^eb^ti na bhuñjāmīti appaṭikkhipitvā bhuñja mā papañca kari. ^b^pāpake^eb^ti ayañhi ^a^M5.0423^ea^ sudhā bhuttā dvādasa pāpadhamme hanati. ^b^khuda^eb^nti paṭhamaṃ tāva chātabhāvaṃ hanati, dutiyaṃ pānīyapipāsaṃ, tatiyaṃ ukkaṇṭhitaṃ, catutthaṃ kāyadarathaṃ, pañcamaṃ kilantabhāvaṃ, chaṭṭhaṃ kodhaṃ, sattamaṃ upanāhaṃ, aṭṭhamaṃ vivādaṃ, navamaṃ pesuṇaṃ, dasamaṃ sītaṃ, ekādasamaṃ uṇhaṃ, dvādasamaṃ tandiṃ ālasiyabhāvaṃ, idaṃ rasuttamaṃ uttamarasaṃ sudhābhojanaṃ ime dvādasa pāpadhamme hanati.
[03] taṃ sutvā kosiyo attano vatasamādānaṃ āvikaronto --
[21] ``na kappatī mātali mayha bhuñjituṃ, pubbe adatvā iti me vatuttamaṃ.
[22] na cāpi ekāsnamariyapūjitaṃ, asaṃvibhāgī ca sukhaṃ na vindatī''ti.. --
[25] gāthaṃ vatvā, ``bhante, tumhehi parassa adatvā bhojane kaṃ dosaṃ disvā idaṃ vataṃ samādinna''nti mātalinā puṭṭho āha --
[21] ``thīghātakā ye cime pāradārikā, mittadduno ye ca sapanti subbate.
[22] sabbe ca te maccharipañcamādhamā, tasmā adatvā udakampi nāsniye..
[21] ``sohitthiyā ^a^P5.0398^ea^ vā purisassa vā pana, dassāmi dānaṃ vidusampavaṇṇitaṃ.
[22] saddhā vadaññū idha vītamaccharā, bhavanti hete sucisaccasammatā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^pubbe^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ adatvā, atha vā iti me pubbe vatuttamaṃ idaṃ pubbeva mayā vataṃ samādinnanti dasseti. ^b^na cāpi ekāsnamariyapūjita^eb^nti ekakassa asanaṃ na ariyehi buddhādīhi ^a^V5.0394^ea^ pūjitaṃ. ^b^sukha^eb^nti dibbamānusikaṃ sukhaṃ na labhati. ^b^thīghātakā^eb^ti itthighātakā. ^b^ye cime^eb^ti ye ca ime. ^b^sapantī^eb^ti akkosanti. ^b^subbate^eb^ti dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇe. ^b^maccharipañcamā^eb^ti maccharī pañcamo etesanti maccharipañcamā. ^b^adhamā^eb^ti ime pañca adhamā nāma. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ahaṃ pañcamādhamabhāvabhayena adatvā udakampi ^b^nāsniye^eb^ na ^a^M5.0424^ea^ paribhuñjissāmīti imaṃ vataṃ samādiyiṃ. ^b^sohitthiyā vā^eb^ti so ahaṃ itthiyā vā. ^b^vidusampavaṇṇita^eb^nti vidūhi paṇḍitehi buddhādīhi vaṇṇitaṃ. ^b^sucisaccasammatā^eb^ti ete okappaniyasaddhāya samannāgatā vadaññū vītamaccharā purisā sucī ceva uttamasammatā ca hontīti attho.

[03] taṃ sutvā mātali dissamānakāyena aṭṭhāsi. tasmiṃ khaṇe tā catasso devakaññāyo catuddisaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu, sirī pācīnadisāya aṭṭhāsi, āsā dakkhiṇadisāya, saddhā pacchimadisāya, hirī uttaradisāya. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``ato matā devavarena pesitā, kaññā catasso kanakattacūpamā.
[22] āsā ca saddhā ca sirī tato hirī, taṃ assamaṃ āgamu yattha kosiyo..
[21] ``tā disvā sabbo paramappamodito, subhena vaṇṇena sikhārivaggino.
[22] kaññā catasso caturo catuddisā, iccabravī mātalino ca sammukhā..
[21] ``purimaṃ disaṃ kā tvaṃ pabhāsi devate, alaṅkatā tāravarāva osadhī.
[22] pucchāmi taṃ kañcanavelliviggahe, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi devatā..
[22] sudhāvivādena tavantimāgatā, taṃ maṃ sudhāya varapañña bhājaya..
[21] ``yassāhamicchāmi sudhaṃ mahāmuni, so sabbakāmehi naro pamodati.
[22] sirīti maṃ jānahi jūhatuttama, taṃ maṃ sudhāya varapañña bhājayā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0425^ea^ ^b^ato^eb^ti tato. ^b^matā^eb^ti anumatā, atha devavarena anumatā ceva pesitā cāti attho. ^b^sabbo paramappamodito^eb^ti anavaseso hutvā atipamodito. ``sāma''ntipi pāṭho, tā devatā ^a^V5.0395^ea^ sāmaṃ disvāti attho. ^b^caturo^eb^ti caturā. ayameva vā pāṭho, cāturiyena samannāgatāti attho. ^b^tāravarā^eb^ti tārakānaṃ varā. ^b^kañcanavelliviggahe^eb^ti kañcanarūpasadisasarīre. ^b^sirāhā^eb^ti sirī ahaṃ. ^b^tavantimāgatā^eb^ti tava santikaṃ āgatā. ^b^bhājayā^eb^ti yathā maṃ sudhā bhajati, tathā karohi, sudhaṃ me dehīti attho. ^b^jānahī^eb^ti jāna. ^b^jūhatuttamā^eb^ti aggiṃ juhantānaṃ uttama.
[21] ``sippena vijjācaraṇena buddhiyā, narā upetā paguṇā sakammunā.
[22] tayā vihīnā na labhanti kiñcanaṃ, tayidaṃ na sādhu yadidaṃ tayā kataṃ..
[21] ``passāmi posaṃ alasaṃ mahagghasaṃ, sudukkulīnampi arūpimaṃ naraṃ.
[22] tayānugutto siri jātimāmapi, peseti dāsaṃ viya bhogavā sukhī..
[21] ``taṃ taṃ asaccaṃ avibhajjaseviniṃ, jānāmi mūḷhaṃ vidurānupātiniṃ.
[22] na tādisī arahati āsanūdakaṃ, kuto sudhā gaccha na mayha ruccasī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sippenā^eb^ti hatthiassarathadhanusippādinā. ^b^vijjācaraṇenā^eb^ti vedattayasaṅkhātāya vijjāya ceva sīlena ca. ^b^paguṇā sakammunā^eb^ti attano purisakārena padhānaguṇasamannāgatā. ^b^kiñcana^eb^nti kiñci appamattakampi yasaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā na labhanti. ^b^yadida^eb^nti yaṃ etaṃ issariyatthāya sippāni ^a^M5.0426^ea^ uggaṇhitvā carantānaṃ ^a^P5.0400^ea^ tayā vekallaṃ kataṃ, taṃ te na sādhu. ^b^arūpima^eb^nti virūpaṃ. ^b^tayānugutto^eb^ti tayā anurakkhito. ^b^jātimāmapī^eb^ti jātisampannampi sippavijjācaraṇabuddhikammehi sampannampi. ^b^pesetī^eb^ti pesanakārakaṃ karoti. ^b^taṃ ta^eb^nti tasmā taṃ. ^b^asacca^eb^nti sabhāvasaṅkhāte sacce avattanatāya asaccaṃ uttamabhāvarahitaṃ. ^b^avibhajjasevini^eb^nti avibhajitvā yuttāyuttaṃ ajānitvā sippādisampannepi itarepi sevamānaṃ. ^b^vidurānupātini^eb^nti paṇḍitānupātiniṃ paṇḍite pātetvā pothetvā viheṭhetvā caramānaṃ. ^b^kuto sudhā^eb^ti tādisāya nigguṇāya kuto sudhābhojanaṃ, na me ruccasi, gaccha mā idha tiṭṭhāti.
[03] sā tena paṭikkhittā tatthevantaradhāyi. tato so āsāya saddhiṃ sallapanto āha --
[22] osittavaṇṇaṃ paridayha sobhasi, kusaggirattaṃ apiḷayha mañjariṃ..
[22] ko te dutīyo ida mandalocane, na bhāyasi ekikā kānane vane''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^cittaṅgadā^eb^ti citrehi aṅgadehi samannāgatā. ^b^kambuvimaṭṭhadhārinī^eb^ti karaṇapariniṭṭhitena vimaṭṭhasuvaṇṇālaṅkāradhārinī. ^b^osittavaṇṇa^eb^nti avasittaudakadhāravaṇṇaṃ dibbadukūlaṃ. ^b^paridayhā^eb^ti nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca. ^b^kusaggiratta^eb^nti kusatiṇaggisikhāvaṇṇaṃ. ^b^apiḷayha mañjari^eb^nti sapallavaṃ asokakaṇṇikaṃ kaṇṇe piḷandhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^saracāpadhārinā^eb^ti luddena. ^b^virādhitā^eb^ti viraddhapahārā. ^b^mandamivā^eb^ti yathā sā migī bhītā vanantare ṭhatvā taṃ mandaṃ mandaṃ oloketi, evaṃ olokesi.
[21] ``na me dutīyo idha matthi kosiya, masakkasārappabhavamhi devatā.
[22] āsā sudhāsāya tavantimāgatā, taṃ maṃ sudhāya varapañña bhājayā''ti..
[03] taṃ ^a^P5.0401^ea^ sutvā kosiyo ``tvaṃ kira yo te ruccati, tassa āsāphalanipphādanena āsaṃ desi, yo te na ruccati, tassa na desi, natthi tayā samā patthitatthavināsikā''ti dīpento āha --
[21] ``āsāya yanti vāṇijā dhanesino, nāvaṃ samāruyha parenti aṇṇave.
[22] te tattha sīdanti athopi ekadā, jīnādhanā enti vinaṭṭhapābhatā..
[21] ``āsāya khettāni kasanti kassakā, vapanti bījāni karontupāyaso.
[22] ītīnipātena avuṭṭhitāya vā, na kiñci vindanti tato phalāgamaṃ..
[21] ``athattakārāni ^a^V5.0397^ea^ karonti bhattusu, āsaṃ purakkhatvā narā sukhesino.
[22] te bhatturatthā atigāḷhitā puna, disā panassanti aladdha kiñcanaṃ..
[21] ``hitvāna dhaññañca dhanañca ñātake, āsāya saggādhimanā sukhesino.
[22] tapanti lūkhampi tapaṃ cirantaraṃ, kumaggamāruyha parenti duggatiṃ..
[21] ``āsā ^a^M5.0428^ea^ visaṃvādikasammatā ime, āse sudhāsaṃ vinayassu attani.
[22] na tādisī arahati āsanūdakaṃ, kuto sudhā gaccha na mayha ruccasī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^parentī^eb^ti pakkhandanti. ^b^jīnādhanā^eb^ti jīnadhanā. iti tava vasena eke sampajjanti eke vipajjanti, natthi tayā sadisā pāpadhammāti vadati. ^b^karontupāyaso^eb^ti taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ upāyena karonti. ^b^ītīnipātenā^eb^ti visamavātamūsikasalabhasukapāṇakasetaṭṭhikarogādīnaṃ sassupaddavānaṃ aññataranipātena vā. ^b^tato^eb^ti tato sassato te kiñci phalaṃ na vindanti, tesampi āsacchedanakammaṃ tvameva karosīti vadati. ^b^athattakārānī^eb^ti yuddhabhūmīsu purisakāre. ^b^āsaṃ purakkhatvā^eb^ti issariyāsaṃ purato katvā. ^b^bhatturatthā^eb^ti sāmino atthāya. ^b^atigāḷitā^eb^ti paccatthikehi atipīḷitā viluttasāpateyyā ddhastasenavāhanā hutvā. ^b^panassantī^eb^ti palāyanti. ^b^aladdha kiñcana^eb^nti kiñci issariyaṃ alabhitvā ^a^P5.0402^ea^. iti etesampi issariyālābhaṃ tvameva karosīti vadati. ^b^saggādhimanā^eb^ti saggaṃ adhigantumanā. ^b^lūkha^eb^nti nirojaṃ pañcatapādikaṃ kāyakilamathaṃ. ^b^cirantara^eb^nti cirakālaṃ. ^b^āsā visaṃvādikasammatā ime^eb^ti evaṃ ime sattā saggāsāya duggatiṃ gacchanti, tasmā tvaṃ āsā nāma visaṃvādikasammatā visaṃvādikāti saṅkhaṃ gatā. ^b^āse^eb^ti taṃ ālapati.
[03] sāpi tena paṭikkhittā antaradhāyi. tato saddhāya saddhiṃ sallapanto gāthamāha --
[22] pucchāmi taṃ kañcanavelliviggahe, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi devate''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^daddallamānā^eb^ti jalamānā. ^b^jighaññanāmavhayana^eb^nti aparāti ca pacchimāti ca evaṃ jighaññena lāmakena nāmena vuccamānaṃ disaṃ pati daddallamānā tiṭṭhasi.
[22] sudhāvivādena tavanti māgatā, taṃ maṃ sudhāya varapañña bhājayā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^saddhā^eb^ti yassa kassaci vacanapattiyāyanā sāvajjāpi hoti anavajjāpi. ^b^pūjitā^eb^ti anavajjakoṭṭhāsavasena pūjitā. ^b^apāpasattūpanisevinī^eb^ti anavajjasaddhāya ca ekantapattiyāyanusabhāvāra paresupi pattiyāyanavidahanasamatthāya devatāyetaṃ nāmaṃ.
[03] athaṃ naṃ kosiyo ``ime sattā yassa kassaci vacanaṃ saddahitvā taṃ taṃ karontā kattabbato akattabbameva bahutaraṃ karonti, taṃ sabbaṃ tayā kāritaṃ nāma hotī''ti vatvā evamāha --
[21] ``dānaṃ damaṃ cāgamathopi saṃyamaṃ, ādāya saddhāya karonti hekadā.
[22] theyyaṃ ^a^P5.0403^ea^ musā kūṭamathopi pesuṇaṃ, karonti heke puna viccutā tayā..
[22] vinetvāna chandaṃ kulitthirāsupi, karoti saddhaṃ puna kumbhadāsiyā..
[21] ``tvameva saddhe paradārasevinī, pāpaṃ karosi kusalampi riñcasi.
[22] na tādisī arahati āsanūdakaṃ, kuto sudhā gaccha na mayha ruccasī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^dāna^eb^nti dasavatthukaṃ puññacetanaṃ. damab^nti indriyadamanaṃ. ^b^cāga^eb^nti deyyadhammapariccāgaṃ. ^b^saṃyama^eb^nti sīlaṃ. ^b^ādāya saddhāyā^eb^ti ``etāni dānādīni mahānisaṃsāni kattabbānī''ti vadataṃ vacanaṃ saddhāya ādiyitvāpi ^a^M5.0430^ea^ karonti ekadā. ^b^kūṭa^eb^nti tulākūṭādikaṃ vā gāmakūṭādikaṃ kammaṃ vā. ^b^karonti heke^eb^ti eke manussā evarūpesu nāma kālesu imesañca atthāya theyyādīni kattabbānīti kesañci vacanaṃ saddahitvā etānipi karonti. ^b^puna viccutā tayā^eb^ti puna tayā visuttā sāvajjadukkhavipākānetāni na kattabbānīti vadataṃ vacanaṃ apattiyāyitvāpi karonti. iti tava vasena sāvajjampi anavajjampi kareyyāsi vadati.

[03] ^b^sadisīsū^eb^ti ^a^V5.0399^ea^ jātigottasīlādīhi sadisīsu. ^b^pekkhavā^eb^ti pekkhā vuccati taṇhā, sataṇhoti attho. ^b^chanda^eb^nti chandarāgaṃ. ^b^karoti saddha^eb^nti kumbhadāsiyāpi vacane saddhaṃ karoti, tassā ``ahaṃ tumhākaṃ idaṃ nāma upakāraṃ karissāmī''ti vadantiyā pattiyāyitvā kulitthiyopi chaḍḍetvā tameva paṭisevati, asukā nāma tumhesu paṭibaddhacittāti kumbhadāsiyāpi vacane saddhaṃ katvāva paradāraṃ sevati. ^b^tvameva saddhe paradārasevinī^eb^ti yasmā taṃ taṃ pattiyāyitvā tava vasena paradāraṃ sevanti pāpaṃ karonti kusalaṃ jahanti, tasmā tvameva paradārasevinī tvaṃ pāpāni karosi, kusalampi riñcasi, natthi tayā samā lokavināsikā pāpadhammā, gaccha na me ruccasīti.
[03] sā tattheva antaradhāyi. kosiyopi uttarato ṭhitāya hiriyā saddhiṃ sallapanto gāthādvayamāha --
[22] tathūpamā ^a^P5.0404^ea^ maṃ paṭibhāsi devate, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi accharā..
[22] kā tiṭṭhasi mandamigāvalokayaṃ, bhāsesamānāva giraṃ na muñcasī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^jighaññaratti^eb^nti pacchimarattiṃ, rattipariyosāneti attho. ^b^ūhate^eb^ti aruṇe uggate. ^b^yā^eb^ti yā puratthimā disā rattasuvaṇṇatāya uppamarūpadharā ^a^M5.0431^ea^ hutvā dissati. ^b^kāḷā nidāgherivā^eb^ti nidāghasamaye kāḷavalli viya. ^b^aggijārivā^eb^ti aggijālā iva, sāpi nijjhāmakhettesu taruṇauṭṭhitakāḷavalli viyāti attho. ^b^lohitapattamālinī^eb^ti lohitavaṇṇehi pattehi parivutā. ^b^kā tiṭṭhasī^eb^ti yathā sā taruṇakāḷavalli vāteritā vilāsamānā sobhamānā tiṭṭhati, evaṃ kā nāma tvaṃ tiṭṭhasi. ^b^bhāsesamānāvā^eb^ti mayā saddhiṃ bhāsitukāmā viya hosi, na ca giraṃ muñcasi.
[27] sudhāvivādena tavantimāgatā, sāhaṃ na sakkomi sudhampi yācituṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^hirāha^eb^nti hirī ahaṃ. ^b^sudhampī^eb^ti sā ahaṃ sudhābhojanaṃ taṃ yācitumpi na sakkomi. kiṃkāraṇā? ^b^kopīnarūpā viya yācanitthiyā,^eb^ yasmā itthiyā yācanā nāma kopīnarūpā viya rahassaṅgavivaraṇasadisā hoti, nillajjā viya hotīti attho.
[03] taṃ sutvā tāpaso dve gāthā abhāsi --
[04] ``dhammena ñāyena sugatte lacchasi, eso hi dhammo na hi yācanā sudhā.
[22] taṃ taṃ ayācantimahaṃ nimantaye, sudhāya yañcicchasi tampi dammi te..
[21] ``sā ^a^P5.0405^ea^ tvaṃ mayā ajja sakamhi assame, nimantitā kañcanavelliviggahe.
[22] tuvañhi me sabbarasehi pūjiyā, taṃ pūjayitvāna sudhampi asniye''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^dhammenā^eb^ti sabhāvena. ^b^ñāyenā^eb^ti kāraṇena. ^b^na hi yācanā sudhā^eb^ti na hi yācanāya sudhā labbhati, teneva kāraṇena itarā tisso ^a^M5.0432^ea^ nalabhiṃsu. ^b^taṃ ta^eb^nti tasmā taṃ. ^b^yañcicchasī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ nimantemiyeva, yañca sudhaṃ icchasi, tampi dammi te. ^b^kañcanavelliviggahe^eb^ti kañcanarāsisassirikasarīre. ^b^pūjiyā^eb^ti na kevalaṃ sudhāya, aññehipi sabbarasehi tvaṃ mayā pūjetabbayuttakāva. ^b^asniye^eb^ti taṃ pūjetvā sace sudhāya avasesaṃ bhavissati, ahampi bhuñjissāmi.
[21] ``sā kosiyenānumatā jutīmatā, addhā hiri rammaṃ pāvisi yassamaṃ.
[21] ``rukkhaggahānā bahukettha pupphitā, ambā piyālā panasā ca kiṃsukā.
[22] sobhañjanā loddamathopi paddhakā, kekā ca bhaṅgā tilakā supupphitā..
[22] mocā kadalī bahukettha sāliyo, pavīhayo ābhūjino ca taṇḍulā..
[27] siṅgū savaṅkā saṃkulā, satavaṅkā ca rohitā.
[27] haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, cakkavākā ca kukkuhā.
[27] eṇeyyā ca varāhā ca, gaṇino nīkasūkarā.

[03] tattha ^b^jutīmatā^eb^ti ānubhāvasampannena. ^b^pāvisi yassama^eb^nti pāvisi assamaṃ, ^b^ya^eb^-kāro byañjanasandhikaro. ^b^udakavanta^eb^nti tesu tesu ṭhānesu udakasampannaṃ. ^b^phala^eb^nti anekaphalasampannaṃ. ^b^ariyapūjita^eb^nti nīvaraṇadosarahitehi jhānalābhīhi ariyehi pūjitaṃ pasatthaṃ. ^b^rukkhaggahānā^eb^ti pupphūpagaphalūpagarukkhagahanā. ^b^sobhañjanā^eb^ti siggurukkhā. ^b^loddamathopi paddhakā^eb^ti loddarukkhā ca padumarukkhā ^a^V5.0402^ea^ ca. ^b^kekā ca bhaṅgā^eb^ti evaṃnāmakā rukkhā eva. ^b^karerī^eb^ti karerirukkhā. ^b^uddālakā^eb^ti vātaghātakā. ^b^mucalindaketakā^eb^ti mucalindā ca pañcavidhaketakā ca. ^b^hareṇukā^eb^ti aparaṇṇajāti. ^b^veḷukā^eb^ti vaṃsabhedakā. ^b^keṇū^eb^ti araññamāsā. ^b^tindukā^eb^ti timbarurukkhā. ^b^cīnakā^eb^ti khuddakarājamāsā. ^b^mocā^eb^ti aṭṭhikakadaliyo. ^b^sāliyo^eb^ti nānappakārā jātassaraṃ upanissāya jātā sāliyo. ^b^pavīhayo^eb^ti nānappakārā vīhayo. ^b^ābhūjino^eb^ti bhujapattā. ^b^taṇḍulā^eb^ti nikkuṇḍakathusāni sayaṃjātataṇḍulasīsāni.

[03] ^b^tassevā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, tasseva assamassa uttaradisābhāge. ^b^pokkharaṇī^eb^ti pañcavidhapadumasañchannā jātassarapokkharaṇī. ^b^akakkasā^eb^ti macchasippikasevālādikakkasarahitā. ^b^apabbhārā^eb^ti acchinnataṭā samatitthā. ^b^appaṭigandhikā^eb^ti apaṭikkūlagandhena udakena samannāgatā. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tassā pokkharaṇiyā. ^b^khemino^eb^ti abhayā. ^b^``siṅgū''^eb^tiādīni tesaṃ macchānaṃ ^a^M5.0434^ea^ nāmāni. ^b^kuṇālakā^eb^ti kokilā. ^b^citrā^eb^ti citrapattā. ^b^sikhaṇḍī^eb^ti uṭṭhitasikhā morā, aññepi vā matthake jātasikhā pakkhino. ^b^pānāya māyantī^eb^ti pānāya āyanti. ^b^palāsādā^eb^ti khaggā. ^b^gavajā^eb^ti gavayā. ^b^gaṇino^eb^ti gokaṇṇā. ^b^kaṇṇikā^eb^ti kaṇṇikamigā. ^b^chamāgirī^eb^ti bhūmisamapatthaṭā piṭṭhipāsāṇā. ^b^pupphavicitrasanthatā^eb^ti vicitrapupphasanthatā. ^b^dijābhighuṭṭhā^eb^ti madhurassarehi dijehi abhighuṭṭhā. evarūpā tattha bhūmipabbatāti evaṃ bhagavā kosiyassa assamaṃ vaṇṇeti.
[03] idāni hirideviyā tattha pavisanādīni dassetuṃ āha --
[27] tassā susambandhasiraṃ kusāmayaṃ, suciṃ sugandhaṃ ajinūpasevitaṃ.
[22] atricca kocchaṃ hirimetadabravi, nisīda kalyāṇi sukhayidamāsanaṃ..
[22] navehi pattehi sayaṃ sahūdakaṃ, sudhābhihāsī turito mahāmuni..
[21] ``sā taṃ paṭiggayha ubhohi pāṇibhi, iccabravi attamanā jaṭādharaṃ.
[22] handāhaṃ etarahi pūjitā tayā, gaccheyyaṃ brahme tidivaṃ jitāvinī..
[22] sakāse gantvāna sahassacakkhuno, ayaṃ sudhā vāsava dehi me jayaṃ..
[22] sā pañjalī devamanussapūjitā, navamhi kocchamhi yadā upāvisī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^suttacā^eb^ti succhavī. ^b^nīladumābhilambitā^eb^ti nīlesu dumesu abhilambitā hutvā, taṃ taṃ nīladumasākhaṃ parāmasantīti attho. ^b^mahāmegharivā^eb^ti tena nimantitā mahāmeghavijju viya tassa taṃ assamaṃ pāvisi. ^b^tassā^eb^ti tassā hiriyā. ^b^susambandhasira^eb^nti suṭṭhu sambandhasīsaṃ. ^b^kusāmaya^eb^nti usīrādimissakakusatiṇamayaṃ. ^b^sugandha^eb^nti usīrena ceva aññena sugandhatiṇena ca missakattā sugandhaṃ. ^b^ajinūpasevita^eb^nti upariatthatena ajinacammena upasevitaṃ. ^b^atricca koccha^eb^nti evarūpaṃ kocchāsanaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre attharitvā. ^b^sukhayidamāsana^eb^nti sukhaṃ nisīda idamāsanaṃ.

[03] ^b^ya^eb^nti yāvadatthaṃ. ^b^icchamānāyā^eb^ti sudhaṃ icchantiyā. ^b^navehi pattehī^eb^ti taṅkhaṇaññeva pokkharaṇito ābhatehi allapaduminipattehi. ^b^saya^eb^nti sahatthena. ^b^sahūdaka^eb^nti ^a^P5.0408^ea^ dakkhiṇodakasahitaṃ. ^b^sudhābhihāsī^eb^ti sudhaṃ abhihari. ^b^turito^eb^ti somanassavegena turito. ^b^handā^eb^ti vavassaggatthe nipāto. ^b^jitāvinī^eb^ti vijayappattā hutvā.

[03] ^b^anumatā^eb^ti idāni yathāruciṃ gacchāti anuññātā. ^b^udīritā^eb^ti tidasapuraṃ gantvā sakkassa santike ayaṃ sudhāti udīrayi. ^b^surakañña^eb^nti devadhītaraṃ. ^b^uttama^eb^nti pavaraṃ. ^b^sā pañjalī devamanussapūjitā^eb^ti pañjalī devehi ca manussehi ca pūjitā. ^b^yadā^eb^ti yadā nisīdanatthāya sakkena dāpite nave kañcanapīṭhasaṅkhāte kocche sā upāvisi, tadā naṃ tattha nisinnaṃ sakko ca sesadevatā ca pāricchattakapupphādīhi pūjayiṃsu.
[03] evaṃ sakko taṃ pūjetvā cintesi -- ``kena nu kho kāraṇena kosiyo sesānaṃ adatvā imissāva sudhaṃ adāsī''ti. so tassa kāraṇassa jānanatthāya puna mātaliṃ pesesi. tamatthaṃ āvi karonto satthā āha --
[27] gantvāna vākyaṃ mama brūhi kosiyaṃ, āsāya saddhā siriyā ca kosiya.
[03] tattha ^b^saṃsī^eb^ti abhāsi. ^b^vākyaṃ mamā^eb^ti mama vākyaṃ kosiyaṃ brūhi. ^b^āsāya saddhā siriyā cā^eb^ti āsāto ca saddhāto ca sirito ca hirīyeva kena hetunā sudhamalatthāti.
[03] so tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vejayantarathamāruyha agamāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] eṇeyyakā laṅghamayettha pakkhino, migettha veḷuriyamayā yudhā yutā..
[21] ``taṃ yānaseṭṭhaṃ abhiruyha mātali, disā imāyo abhinādayittha.
[22] nabhañca selañca vanappatiniñca, sasāgaraṃ pabyathayittha mediniṃ..
[22] bahussutaṃ vuddhaṃ vinītavantaṃ, iccabravi mātali devabrāhmaṇaṃ..
[21] ``indassa vākyaṃ nisāmehi kosiya, dūto ahaṃ pucchati taṃ purindado.
[22] āsāya saddhā siriyā ca kosiya, hirī sudhaṃ kena malattha hetunā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^taṃ suplavattha^eb^nti taṃ vejayantarathaṃ sukhena plavanatthaṃ. ^b^udatārayī^eb^ti uttāresi ukkhipitvā gamanasajjamakāsi. ^b^upakāriyasādisa^eb^nti upakaraṇabhaṇḍehi sadisaṃ, yathā tassa aggisikhāya ^a^V5.0405^ea^ samānavaṇṇāni upakaraṇāni jalanti, tatheva jalitanti attho. ^b^jambonadīsa^eb^nti jambunadasaṅkhātaṃ rattasuvaṇṇamayaṃ īsaṃ. ^b^kañcanacittasannibha^eb^nti, kañcanamayena sattaratanavicittena aṭṭhamaṅgalena samannāgataṃ. ^b^suvaṇṇacandetthā^eb^ti suvaṇṇamayā candakā ettha rathe. ^b^hatthī^eb^ti suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimayā hatthī. ^b^gavā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^laṅghamayettha pakkhino^eb^ti ettha rathe laṅghamayā nānāratanamayā pakkhigaṇāpi paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā. ^b^yudhā yutā^eb^ti attano attano yudhena saddhiṃ yuttā hutvā dassitā.

[03] ^b^assarājaharayo^eb^ti harivaṇṇamanomayāssarājāno. ^b^susunāgasādise^eb^ti balasampattiyā taruṇanāgasadise. ^b^kañcanajāluracchade^eb^ti kañcanajālamayena uracchadālaṅkārena samannāgate. ^b^āveḷine^eb^ti āveḷasaṅkhātehi kaṇṇālaṅkārehi yutte. ^b^saddagame^eb^ti patodappahāraṃ vinā saddamatteneva gamanasīle. ^b^asaṅgīte^eb^ti nissaṅge sīghajave evarūpe assarāje tattha yojesunti attho.

[03] ^b^abhinādayitthā^eb^ti yānasaddena ekaninnādaṃ akāsi. ^b^vanappatiniñcā^eb^ti vanappatinī ca vanasaṇḍe cāti attho. ^b^pabyathayitthā^eb^ti kampayittha. tattha ākāsaṭṭhakavimānakampanena nabhakampanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^pāvāramekaṃsakato^eb^ti ekaṃsakatapāvāradibbavattho. ^b^vuddha^eb^nti guṇavuddhaṃ. ^b^vinītavanta^eb^nti vinītena ^a^M5.0438^ea^ ācāravattena samannāgataṃ. ^b^iccabravī^eb^ti rathaṃ ākāse ṭhapetvā otaritvā evaṃ abravi. ^b^devabrāhmaṇa^eb^nti devasamaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ.
[04] ``andhā sirī maṃ paṭibhāti mātali, saddhā aniccā pana devasārathi.
[22] āsā visaṃvādikasammatā hi me, hirī ca ariyamhi guṇe patiṭṭhitā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^andhā^eb^ti sippādisampannepi asampannepi bhajanato ``andhā''ti maṃ paṭibhāti. ^b^aniccā^eb^ti saddhā pana taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ pahāya aññasmiṃ aññasmiṃ uppajjanato hutvā abhāvākārena ``aniccā''ti maṃ paṭibhāti. ^b^visaṃvādikasammatā^eb^ti āsā pana yasmā dhanatthikā nāvāya samuddaṃ pakkhanditvā vinaṭṭhapābhatā enti, tasmā ``visaṃvādikā''ti maṃ paṭibhāti. ^b^ariyamhi guṇe^eb^ti hirī pana hirottappasabhāvasaṅkhāte parisuddhe ariyaguṇe patiṭṭhitāti.
[21] ``kumāriyo yācimā gottarakkhitā, jiṇṇā ca yā yā ca sabhattuitthiyo.
[22] tā chandarāgaṃ purisesu uggataṃ, hiriyā nivārenti sacittamattano..
[22] hiriyā nivattanti jahitva jīvitaṃ, te sampaṭicchanti punā hirīmanā..
[21] ``velā yathā sāgaravegavārinī, hirāya hi pāpajanaṃ nivārinī.
[22] taṃ sabbaloke hirimariyapūjitaṃ, indassa taṃ vedaya devasārathī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0439^ea^ ^b^jiṇṇā^eb^ti vidhavā. ^b^sabhattū^eb^ti sasāmikā taruṇitthiyo. ^b^attano^eb^ti tā sabbāpi parapurisesu attano chandarāgaṃ uggataṃ viditvā ``ayuttametaṃ amhāka''nti hiriyā sacittaṃ nivārenti, pāpakammaṃ na karonti. ^b^patataṃ palāyina^eb^nti patantānañca palāyantānañca antare. ^b^jahitva jīvita^eb^nti ye hirimanto honti, te attano jīvitaṃ cajitvā hiriyā nivattanti, evaṃ nivattā ca pana te hirīmanā puna attano sāmikaṃ sampaṭicchanti, amittahatthato mocetvā gaṇhanti. ^b^pāpajanaṃ nivārinī^eb^ti pāpato janaṃ nivārinī, ayameva vā pāṭho ^a^P5.0411^ea^. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ hiriṃ. ^b^ariyapūjita^eb^nti ariyehi buddhādīhi pūjitaṃ. ^b^indassa taṃ vedayā^eb^ti yasmā evaṃ mahāguṇā ariyapūjitāvesā, tasmā taṃ evaṃ uttamā nāmesāti indassa kathehīti.
[21] ``ko te imaṃ kosiya diṭṭhimodahi, brahmā mahindo atha vā pajāpati.
[22] hirāya devesu hi seṭṭhasammatā, dhītā mahindassa mahesi jāyathā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^diṭṭhi^eb^nti ``hirī nāma mahāguṇā ariyapūjitā''ti laddhiṃ. ^b^odahī^eb^ti hadaye pavesesi. ^b^seṭṭhasammatā^eb^ti tava santike sudhāya laddhakālato paṭṭhāya indassa santike kañcanāsanaṃ labhitvā sabbadevatāhi pūjiyamānā uttamasammatā jāyatha.

[03] evaṃ tasmiṃ kathenteyeva kosiyassa taṅkhaṇaññeva cavanadhammo jāto. atha naṃ, mātali, ``kosiya ^a^V5.0407^ea^ āyusaṅkhāro te ossaṭṭho, cavanadhammopi te sampatto, kiṃ te manussalokena, devalokaṃ gacchāmā''ti tattha netukāmo hutvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``handehi dāni tidivaṃ apakkama, rathaṃ samāruyha mamāyitaṃ imaṃ.
[22] indo ca taṃ indasagotta kaṅkhati, ajjeva tvaṃ indasahabyataṃ vajā''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^M5.0440^ea^ ^b^mamāyita^eb^nti piyaṃ manāpaṃ. ^b^indasagottā^eb^ti purimabhave indena samānagotta. ^b^kaṅkhatī^eb^ti tavāgamanaṃ icchanto kaṅkhati.

[03] iti tasmiṃ kosiyena saddhiṃ kathenteyeva kosiyo cavitvā opapātiko devaputto hutvā āruyha dibbarathe aṭṭhāsi. atha naṃ, mātali, sakkassa santikaṃ nesi. sakko taṃ disvāva tuṭṭhamānaso attano dhītaraṃ hirideviṃ tassa aggamahesiṃ katvā adāsi, aparimāṇamassa issariyaṃ ahosi. tamatthaṃ viditvā ``anomasattānaṃ kammaṃ nāma evaṃ visujjhatī''ti satthā osānagāthamāha --
[21] ``evaṃ visujjhanti apāpakammino, atho suciṇṇassa phalaṃ na nassati.
[22] ye ^a^P5.0412^ea^ keci maddakkhu sudhāya bhojanaṃ, sabbeva te indasahabyataṃ gatā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^apāpakammino^eb^ti apāpakammā sattā evaṃ visujjhanti ^b^ye keci maddakkhū^eb^ti ye keci sattā tasmiṃ himavantapadese tadā kosiyena hiriyā dīyamānaṃ sudhābhojanaṃ addasaṃsu. ^b^sabbeva te^eb^ti te sabbepi taṃ dānaṃ anumoditvā cittaṃ pasādetvā indasahabyataṃ gatāti.

[03] satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā ``na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepetaṃ adānābhirataṃ thaddhamacchariyaṃ samānaṃ ahaṃ damesiṃyevā''ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi ``tadā hirī devatā uppalavaṇṇā ahosi, kosiyo dānapati bhikkhu, pañcasikho anuruddho, mātali ānando, sūriyo kassapo, cando moggallāno, nārado sāriputto, sakko ahameva ahosi''nti.

[03] ^b^evamakkhāyatī^eb^ti ^a^V5.0408^ea^ idaṃ satthā kuṇāladahe viharanto anabhiratipīḷite pañcasate bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi. tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā -- sākiyakoliyā ^a^M5.0441^ea^ kira kapilavatthunagarassa ca koliyanagarassa ca antare rohiṇiṃ nāma nadiṃ ekenevāvaraṇena bandhāpetvā sassāni kārenti. atha jeṭṭhamūlamāse sassesu milāyantesu ubhayanagaravāsīnampi kammakārā sannipatiṃsu. tattha koliyanagaravāsino vadiṃsu -- ``idaṃ udakaṃ ubhayato nīhariyamānaṃ neva tumhākaṃ, na amhākaṃ pahossati, amhākaṃ pana sassaṃ ekaudakeneva nipphajjissati, idaṃ udakaṃ amhākaṃ dethā''ti. kapilavatthuvāsino vadiṃsu -- ``tumhesu koṭṭhe pūretvā ṭhitesu mayaṃ rattasuvaṇṇanīlamaṇikāḷakahāpaṇe gahetvā na sakkhissāma pacchipasibbakādihatthā tumhākaṃ gharadvāre vicarituṃ, amhākampi sassaṃ ekeneva udakena nipphajjissati, idaṃ udakaṃ amhākaṃ dethā''ti. ``na mayaṃ dassāmā''ti? ``mayampi na dassāmā''ti. evaṃ kalahaṃ vaḍḍhetvā eko uṭṭhāya ekassa pahāraṃ adāsi, sopi aññassāti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ paharitvā rājakulānaṃ jātiṃ ghaṭṭetvā kalahaṃ pavattesuṃ.

[03] koliyakammakārā vadanti -- ``tumhe kapilavatthuvāsike sākiyadārake gahetvā gajjatha ^a^P5.0413^ea^, ye soṇasiṅgālādayo viya attano bhaginīhi saddhiṃ vasiṃsu, etesaṃ hatthiassādayo vā phalakāvudhāni vā amhākaṃ kiṃ karissantī''ti? sākiyakammakārā vadanti -- ``tumhe dāni kuṭṭhino dārake gahetvā gajjatha, ye anāthā niggatikā tiracchānā viya kolarukkhe vasiṃsu, etesaṃ hatthiassādayo vā phalakāvudhāni vā amhākaṃ kiṃ karissantī''ti? te gantvā tasmiṃ kamme niyuttāmaccānaṃ kathesuṃ, amaccā rājakulānaṃ kathesuṃ. tato sākiyā ``bhaginīhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsikānaṃ thāmañca balañca dassessāmā''ti yuddhasajjā nikkhamiṃsu. koliyāpi ``kolarukkhavāsīnaṃ thāmañca balañca dassessāmā''ti yuddhasajjā nikkhamiṃsu. apare panācariyā ``sākiyakoliyānaṃ dāsīsu udakatthāya nadiṃ gantvā cumbaṭāni bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipitvā sukhakathāya sannisinnāsu ekissā cumbaṭaṃ ekā sakasaññāya gaṇhi, taṃ nissāya `mama cumbaṭaṃ, tava cumbaṭa'nti kalahe pavatte kamena ubhayanagaravāsino dāsakammakārā ceva sevakagāmabhojakāmaccauparājāno cāti sabbe yuddhasajjā nikkhamiṃsū''ti vadanti. imamhā pana nayā purimanayova bahūsu aṭṭhakathāsu āgato, yuttarūpo cāti sveva gahetabbo.
