[03] tasmiṃ ^a^M7.0037^ea^ khaṇe alampāyano sunhāto suvilitto maṭṭhasāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā ratanapeḷaṃ gāhāpetvā rājadvārameva gato. mahājano sannipati, rañño āsanaṃ paññattaṃ. so antonivesane ṭhitova ``ahaṃ āgacchāmi, nāgarājānaṃ kīḷāpetū''ti pesesi. alampāyano cittattharaṇe ratanapeḷaṃ ṭhapetvā vivaritvā ``ehi mahānāgā''ti saññamadāsi. tasmiṃ samaye sudassanopi parisantare ṭhāto. atha mahāsatto sīsaṃ nīharitvā sabbāvantaṃ parisaṃ olokesi. nāgā hi dvīhi kāraṇehi parisaṃ olokenti supaṇṇaparipanthaṃ vā ñātake vā dassanatthāya. te supaṇṇaṃ disvā bhītā na naccanti, ñātake vā disvā lajjamānā na naccanti. mahāsatto pana olokento parisantare bhātaraṃ addasa. so akkhipūrāni assūni gahetvā peḷato nikkhamitvā bhātarābhimukho pāyāsi. mahājano taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā bhīto paṭikkami, eko sudassanova aṭṭhāsi. so gantvā tassa pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā rodi, sudassanopi paridevi. mahāsatto roditvā nivattitvā peḷameva pāvisi. alampāyanopi ``iminā nāgena tāpaso ḍaṭṭho bhavissati, assāsessāmi na''nti upasaṅkamitvā āha --
[21] ``hatthā ^a^P6.0192^ea^ pamutto urago, pāde te nipatī bhusaṃ.
[22] kacci nu taṃ ḍaṃsī tāta, mā bhāyi sukhito bhavā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^mā bhāyī^eb^ti tāta tāpasa, ahaṃ alampāyano nāma, mā bhāyi, tava paṭijagganaṃ nāma mama bhāroti.
[21] ``neva mayhaṃ ayaṃ nāgo, alaṃ dukkhāya kāyaci.
[22] yāvatatthi ahiggāho, mayā bhiyyo na vijjatī''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^V7.0037^ea^ ^b^kāyacī^eb^ti kassaci appamattakassapi dukkhassa uppādane ayaṃ mama asamattho. mayā hi sadiso ahituṇḍiko nāma natthīti.

[03] tattha ^b^ditto^eb^ti gabbito bālo andhañāṇo. ^b^avhāyantū^eb^ti avhāyanto, ayameva vā pāṭho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ayaṃ ko bālo ummattako viya maṃ suyuddhena avhāyanto attanā saddhiṃ samaṃ karonto parisamāgato, parisā mama vacanaṃ suṇantu, mayhaṃ doso natthi, mā kho me kujjhitthāti.
[22] hotu no abbhutaṃ tattha, ā sahassehi pañcahī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^nāgenā^eb^ti tvaṃ nāgena mayā saddhiṃ yujjha, ahaṃ maṇḍūkachāpiyā tayā saddhiṃ yujjhissāmi. ^b^ā sahassehi pañcahī^eb^ti tasmiṃ no yuddhe yāva pañcahi sahassehi abbhutaṃ hotūti.
[22] ko nu te pāṭibhogatthi, upajūtañca kiṃ siyā..
[22] hotu no abbhutaṃ tattha, ā sahassehi pañcahī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0038^ea^ ^b^ko nu te^eb^ti tava pabbajitassa ko nu pāṭibhogo atthi. ^b^upajūtañcā^eb^ti imasmiṃ vā jūte upanikkhepabhūtaṃ kiṃ nāma tava dhanaṃ siyā, dassehi meti ^a^P6.0193^ea^ vadati. ^b^upajūtañca me^eb^ti mayhaṃ pana dātabbaṃ upanikkhepadhanaṃ vā ṭhapetabbapāṭibhogo vā tādiso atthi, tasmā no tattha yāva pañcahi sahassehi abbhutaṃ hotūti.
[03] sudassano tassa kathaṃ sutvā ``pañcahi no sahassehi abbhutaṃ hotū''ti abhīto rājanivesanaṃ āruyha mātularañño santike ṭhito gāthamāha --
[22] pañcannaṃ me sahassānaṃ, pāṭibhogo hi kittimā''ti..
[03] rājā ``ayaṃ tāpaso maṃ atibahuṃ dhanaṃ yācati, kiṃ nu kho''ti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``pettikaṃ vā iṇaṃ hoti, yaṃ vā hoti sayaṃkataṃ.
[22] kiṃ tvaṃ evaṃ bahuṃ mayhaṃ, dhanaṃ yācasi brāhmaṇā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^pettikaṃ vā^eb^ti pitarā vā gahetvā khāditaṃ, attanā vā kataṃ iṇaṃ nāma hoti, kiṃ mama pitarā tava hatthato gahitaṃ atthi, udāhu mayā, kiṃkāraṇā maṃ evaṃ bahuṃ dhanaṃ yācasīti?
[03] evaṃ vutte sudassano dve gāthā abhāsi --

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0039^ea^ ^b^abhijigīsatī^eb^ti yuddhe jinituṃ icchati. tattha sace so jīyissati, mayhaṃ pañcasahassāni dassati. sacāhaṃ jīyissāmi, ahamassa dassāmi, tasmā taṃ bahuṃ dhanaṃ yācāmi. ^b^ta^eb^nti tasmā tvaṃ mahārāja, ajja ahidassanaṃ daṭṭhuṃ niyyāhīti.
[03] rājā ``tena hi gacchāmā''ti tāpasena saddhiṃyeva nikkhami. taṃ disvā alampāyano ``ayaṃ tāpaso gantvā rājānaṃ gahetvā āgato, rājakulūpako bhavissatī''ti bhīto taṃ anuvattanto gāthamāha --
[03] tattha ^a^P6.0194^ea^ ^a^M7.0040^ea^ ^b^sippavādenā^eb^ti māṇava, ahaṃ attano sippena taṃ nātimaññāmi, tvaṃ pana sippena atimatto imaṃ uragaṃ na pūjesi, nāgassa apacitiṃ na karosīti.
[22] avisena ca nāgena, bhusaṃ vañcayase janaṃ..
[21] ``evañcetaṃ jano jaññā, yathā jānāmi taṃ ahaṃ.
[22] na tvaṃ labhasi ālampa, bhusamuṭṭhiṃ kuto dhana''nti..
[22] yo tvaṃ evaṃ gataṃ nāgaṃ, `aviso' atimaññati..
[21] ``āsajja kho naṃ jaññāsi, puṇṇaṃ uggassa tejaso.
[03] tattha ^a^V7.0040^ea^ ^b^dummī^eb^ti anaññtinayano. ^b^aviso atimaññasī^eb^ti nibbisoti avajānāsi. ^b^āsajjā^eb^ti upagantvā. ^b^jaññāsī^eb^ti jāneyyāsi.
[03] atha tena saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karonto sudassano gāthamāha --

[03] tattha ^b^siluttassā^eb^ti gharasappassa. ^b^deḍḍubhassā^eb^ti udakasappassa. ^b^silābhuno^eb^ti nīlavaṇṇasappassa. iti nibbise sappe dassetvā etesaṃ visaṃ siyā, neva lohitasīsassa sappassāti āha.
[03] atha naṃ alampāyano dvīhi gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi --
[27] idha dānāni datvāna, saggaṃ gacchanti dāyakā.
[22] jīvanto dehi dānāni, yadi te atthi dātave..
[22] tena taṃ ḍaṃsayissāmi, so taṃ bhasmaṃ karissatī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^dātave^eb^ti yadi te kiñci dātabbaṃ atthi, taṃ dehīti.
[27] idha dānāni datvāna, saggaṃ gacchanti dāyakā.
[22] tvameva dehi jīvanto, yadi te atthi dātave..
[22] tāya taṃ ḍaṃsayissāmi, sā taṃ bhasmaṃ karissati..
[22] sā taṃ ḍaṃsatvajamukhī, puṇṇā uggassa tejaso''ti.. --
[25] imā gāthā sudassanassa vacanaṃ. tattha ^b^puṇṇā uggassa tejaso^eb^ti uggena visena puṇṇā.

[03] evañca pana vatvā ``amma ajamukhi, jaṭantarato me nikkhamitvā pāṇimhi patiṭṭhahā''ti mahājanassa majjheyeva bhaginiṃ pakkositvā hatthaṃ pasāresi. sā tassa saddaṃ sutvā jaṭantare nisinnāva tikkhattuṃ maṇḍūkavassitaṃ vassitvā nikkhamitvā aṃsakūṭe nisīditvā uppatitvā tassa hatthatale tīṇi visabindūni pātetvā puna tassa jaṭantarameva pāvisi. sudassano visaṃ gahetvā ṭhitova ``nassissatāyaṃ janapado, nassissatāyaṃ janapado''ti tikkhattuṃ mahāsaddaṃ abhāsi. tassa so saddo dvādasayojanikaṃ bārāṇasiṃ chādetvā aṭṭhāsi. atha rājā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā ``kimatthaṃ janapado nassissatī''ti pucchi. ``mahārāja, imassa visassa nisiñcanaṭṭhānaṃ na passāmī''ti. ``tāta, mahantā ayaṃ pathavī, pathaviyaṃ nisiñcā''ti. atha naṃ ``na sakkā pathaviyaṃ siñcituṃ, mahārājā''ti paṭikkhipanto gāthamāha --
[03] tattha ^a^M7.0042^ea^ ^b^tiṇalatānī^eb^ti pathavinissitāni tiṇāni ca latā ca sabbosadhiyo ca ussusseyyuṃ, tasmā na sakkā pathaviyaṃ nisiñcitunti.
[03] tena hi naṃ, tāta, uddhaṃ ākāsaṃ khipāti. tatrāpi na sakkāti dassento gāthamāha --
[22] sattavassāniyaṃ devo, na vasse na himaṃ pate''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^na himaṃ pate^eb^ti sattavassāni himabindumattampi na patissati.
[03] tena ^a^V7.0042^ea^ hi naṃ tāta udake siñcāti. tatrāpi na sakkāti dassetuṃ gāthamāha --

[03] atha naṃ rājā āha -- ``tāta, mayaṃ na kiñci jānāma, yathā amhākaṃ raṭṭhaṃ na nassati, taṃ upāyaṃ tvameva jānāhī''ti. ``tena hi, mahārāja, imasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭipāṭiyā tayo āvāṭe khaṇāpethā''ti. rājā khaṇāpesi. sudassano paṭhamaṃ āvāṭaṃ nānābhesajjānaṃ pūrāpesi, dutiyaṃ gomayassa, tatiyaṃ dibbosadhānaññeva. tato paṭhame āvāṭe visabindūni pātesi. taṅkhaṇaññeva dhūmāyitvā jālā uṭṭhahi. sā gantvā gomaye āvāṭaṃ gaṇhi. tatopi jālā uṭṭhāya itaraṃ dibbosadhassa puṇṇaṃ gahetvā osadhāni jhāpetvā nibbāyi. alampāyano tassa āvāṭassa avidūre aṭṭhāsi. atha naṃ visausumā pahari, sarīracchavi uppāṭetvā gatā, setakuṭṭhi ahosi. so bhayatajjito ``nāgarājānaṃ vissajjemī''ti tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi. taṃ sutvā bodhisatto ratanapeḷāya nikkhamitvā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā devarājalīlāya ṭhito. sudassanopi ajamukhīpi tatheva aṭṭhaṃsu. tato sudassano rājānaṃ āha -- ``jānāsi no, mahārāja, kassete puttā''ti? ``na jānāmī''ti. ``tumhe tāva na jānāsi, kāsirañño pana dhītāya samuddajāya dhataraṭṭhassa dinnabhāvaṃ jānāsī''ti? ``āma, jānāmi, mayhaṃ sā kaniṭṭhabhaginī''ti. ``mayaṃ tassā puttā, tvaṃ no mātulo''ti.

[03] taṃ ^a^M7.0043^ea^ sutvā rājā kampamāno te āliṅgitvā sīse cumbitvā roditvā pāsādaṃ āropetvā mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kāretvā bhūridattena paṭisanthāraṃ karonto pucchi ``tāta, taṃ evarūpaṃ uggatejaṃ kathaṃ alampāyano gaṇhī''ti? so sabbaṃ vitthārena kathetvā rājānaṃ ovadanto ``mahārāja, raññā nāma iminā niyāmena rajjaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti mātulassa dhammaṃ desesi. atha naṃ sudassano āha -- ``mātula, mama mātā bhūridattaṃ apassantī kilamati, na sakkā amhehi papañcaṃ kātu''nti. ``sādhu, tātā, tumhe tāva gacchatha. ahaṃ pana mama bhaginiṃ daṭṭhukāmomhi, kathaṃ passissāmī''ti. ``mātula, kahaṃ pana no ayyako kāsirājā''ti? ``tāta, mama bhaginiyā vinā ^a^P6.0197^ea^ vasituṃ asakkonto rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā asuke vanasaṇḍe nāma vasatī''ti. ``mātula, mama mātā tumhe ceva ayyakañca daṭṭhukāmā, tumhe asukadivase mama ayyakassa santikaṃ gacchatha, mayaṃ mātaraṃ ādāya ayyakassa assamapadaṃ āgacchissāma. tattha naṃ tumhepi passissathā''ti. iti te mātulassa divasaṃ ^a^V7.0043^ea^ vavatthapetvā rājanivesanā otariṃsu. rājā bhāgineyye uyyojetvā roditvā nivatti. tepi pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā nāgabhavanaṃ gatā.

[03] mahāsatte sampatte sakalanāgabhavanaṃ ekaparidevasaddaṃ ahosi. sopi māsaṃ peḷāya vasitattā kilanto gilānaseyyaṃ sayi. tassa santikaṃ āgacchantānaṃ nāgānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi. so tehi saddhiṃ kathento kilamati. kāṇāriṭṭho devalokaṃ gantvā mahāsattaṃ adisvā paṭhamamevāgato. atha naṃ ``esa caṇḍo pharuso, sakkhissati nāgaparisaṃ vāretu''nti mahāsattassa nisinnaṭṭhāne dovārikaṃ kariṃsu. subhogopi sakalahimavantaṃ vicaritvā tato mahāsamuddañca sesanadiyo ca upadhāretvā yamunaṃ upadhārento āgacchati. nesādabrāhmaṇopi alampāyanaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ disvā cintesi ``ayaṃ bhūridattaṃ kilametvā kuṭṭhi jāto, ahaṃ pana taṃ mayhaṃ tāva bahūpakāraṃ maṇilobhena alampāyanassa dassesiṃ, taṃ pāpaṃ mama āgamissati. yāva taṃ na āgacchati, tāvadeva yamunaṃ gantvā payāgatitthe pāpapavāhanaṃ karissāmī''ti. so tattha gantvā ``mayā bhūridatte mittadubbhikammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ pāpaṃ pavāhessāmī''ti vatvā udakorohanakammaṃ karoti. tasmiṃ khaṇe subhogo ^a^M7.0044^ea^ taṃ ṭhānaṃ patto. tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ``iminā kira pāpakena tāva mahantassa yasassa dāyako mama bhātā maṇiratanassa kāraṇā alampāyanassa dassito, nāssa jīvitaṃ dassāmī''ti naṅguṭṭhena tassa pādesu veṭhetvā ākaḍḍhitvā udake osidāpetvā nirassāsakāle thokaṃ sithilaṃ akāsi. so sīsaṃ ukkhipi. atha naṃ punākaḍḍhitvā ^a^P6.0198^ea^ osīdāpesi. evaṃ bahū vāre tena kilamiyamāno nesādabrāhmaṇo sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā gāthamāha --
[22] ko maṃ ajjhoharī bhūto, ogāḷhaṃ yamunaṃ nadi''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^lokya^eb^nti evaṃ pāpavāhanasamatthanti lokasammataṃ. ^b^sajanta^eb^nti evarūpaṃ udakaṃ abhisiñcantaṃ. ^b^payāgasmi^eb^nti payāgatitthe.
[22] tassāha putto uragūsabhassa, subhogoti maṃ brāhmaṇa vedayantī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^yadesā^eb^ti yo eso. ^b^pakriya samantato^eb^ti paccatthikānaṃ duppaharaṇasamatthatāya parisamantato pakiriya sabbaṃ parikkhipitvā upari phaṇena chādesi.
[03] atha naṃ brāhmaṇo ``ayaṃ bhūridattabhātā, na me jīvitaṃ dassati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ etassa ceva mātāpitūnañcassa vaṇṇakittanena muducittataṃ katvā attano jīvitaṃ yāceyya''nti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``sace hi putto uragūsabhassa, kāsissa rañño amarādhipassa.
[27] mahesakkho aññataro pitā te, maccesu mātā pana te atulyā.
[22] na tādiso arahati brāhmaṇassa, dāsampi ohārituṃ mahānubhāvo''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0045^ea^ ^b^kāsissā^eb^ti aparena nāmena evaṃnāmakassa. ``kāsikarañño''tipi paṭhantiyeva. kāsirājadhītāya gahitattā kāsirajjampi tasseva santakaṃ katvā vaṇṇeti. ^b^amarādhipassā^eb^ti dīghāyukatāya amarasaṅkhātānaṃ nāgānaṃ adhipassa. ^b^mahesakkho^eb^ti mahānubhāvo. ^b^aññataro^eb^ti mahesakkhānaṃ aññataro. ^b^dāsampī^eb^ti ^a^P6.0199^ea^ tādiso hi mahānubhāvo ānubhāvarahitaṃ brāhmaṇassa dāsampi udake oharituṃ nārahati, pageva mahānubhāvaṃ brāhmaṇanti.
[03] atha naṃ subhogo ``are duṭṭhabrāhmaṇa, tvaṃ maṃ vañcetvā `muñcissāmī'ti maññasi, na te jīvitaṃ dassāmī''ti tena katakammaṃ pakāsento āha --
[21] ``tattha te so pāturahu, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ.
[22] aduṭṭhassa tuvaṃ dubbhi, taṃ te veraṃ idhāgataṃ..
[21] ``khippaṃ gīvaṃ pasārehi, na te dassāmi jīvitaṃ.
[22] bhātu parisaraṃ veraṃ, chedayissāmi te sira''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^sāyaṃ nigrodhupāgamī^eb^ti vikāle nigrodhaṃ upagato asi. ^b^piṅgala^eb^nti pakkānaṃ vaṇṇena piṅgalaṃ. ^b^santhatāyuta^eb^nti pārohaparikiṇṇaṃ. ^b^kokilābhiruda^eb^nti kokilāhi abhirudaṃ. ^b^dhuvaṃ haritasaddala^eb^nti udakabhūmiyaṃ jātattā niccaṃ haritasaddalaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ. ^b^pāturahū^eb^ti tasmiṃ te nigrodhe ṭhitassa ^a^M7.0046^ea^ so mama bhātā pākaṭo ahosi. ^b^iddhiyā^eb^ti puññatejena. ^b^so tenā^eb^ti so tuvaṃ tena attano nāgabhavanaṃ netvā pariciṇṇo. ^b^parisara^eb^nti tayā mama bhātu kataṃ veraṃ pāpakammaṃ parisaranto anussaranto. ^b^chedayissāmi te sira^eb^nti tava sīsaṃ chindissāmīti.
[03] atha brāhmaṇo ``na mesa jīvitaṃ dassati, yaṃ kiñci pana vatvā mokkhatthāya vāyamituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[22] etehi tīhi ṭhānehi, avajjho hoti brāhmaṇo''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^etehī^eb^ti etehi ajjhāyakatādīhi tīhi kāraṇehi brāhmaṇo avajjho, na labbhā brāhmaṇaṃ vadhituṃ, kiṃ tvaṃ vadesi, yo hi brāhmaṇaṃ vadheti, so niraye nibbattatīti.
[03] taṃ ^a^P6.0200^ea^ sutvā subhogo saṃsayapakkhando hutvā ``imaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ netvā bhātaro paṭipucchitvā jānissāmī''ti cintetvā dve gāthā abhāsi --
[22] yathā te tattha vakkhanti, tathā hessasi brāhmaṇā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^pura^eb^nti nāgapuraṃ. ^b^ogāḷha^eb^nti anupaviṭṭhaṃ. ^b^girimāhacca yāmuna^eb^nti yamunāto avidūre ṭhitaṃ himavantaṃ āhacca jotati. ^b^tattha te^eb^ti tasmiṃ nagare te mama bhātaro vasanti, tattha nīte tayi yathā te vakkhanti, tathā bhavissasi. sace hi saccaṃ kathesi, jīvitaṃ te atthi. no ce, tattheva sīsaṃ chindissāmīti.
[03] iti naṃ vatvā subhogo gīvāyaṃ gahetvā khipanto akkosanto paribhāsanto mahāsattassa pāsādadvāraṃ agamāsi.

[03] atha ^a^M7.0047^ea^ naṃ dovāriko hutvā nisinno kāṇāriṭṭho tathā kilametvā ānīyamānaṃ disvā paṭimaggaṃ gantvā ``subhoga, mā viheṭhayi, brāhmaṇā nāma mahābrahmuno puttā. sace hi mahābrahmā jānissati, `mama puttaṃ viheṭhentī'ti kujjhitvā amhākaṃ sakalaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ vināsessati. lokasmiñhi brāhmaṇā nāma seṭṭhā mahānubhāvā, tvaṃ tesaṃ ānubhāvaṃ na jānāsi, ahaṃ pana jānāmī''ti āha. kāṇāriṭṭho kira atītānantarabhave yaññakārabrāhmaṇo ahosi, tasmā evamāha. vatvā ca pana anubhūtapubbavasena yajanasīlo hutvā subhogañca nāgaparisañca āmantetvā ``etha, bho, yaññakārakānaṃ vo guṇe vaṇṇessāmī''ti vatvā yaññavaṇṇanaṃ ārabhanto āha --
[21] ``anittarā ittarasampayuttā, yaññā ca vedā ca subhoga loke.
[22] tadaggarayhañhi vinindamāno, jahāti vittañca satañca dhamma''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0047^ea^ ^a^P6.0201^ea^ ^b^anittarā^eb^ti subhoga imasmiṃ loke yaññā ca vedā ca anittarā na lāmakā mahānubhāvā, te ittarehi brāhmaṇehi sampayuttā, tasmā brāhmaṇāpi anittarāva jātā. ^b^tadaggarayha^eb^nti tasmā agārayhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vinindamāno dhanañca paṇḍitānaṃ dhammañca jahāti. idaṃ kira so ``iminā bhūridatte mittadubbhikammaṃ katanti vattuṃ nāgaparisā mā labhantū''ti avoca.
[03] atha naṃ kāṇāriṭṭho ``subhoga jānāsi pana ayaṃ loko kena nimmito''ti vatvā ``na jānāmī''ti vutte ``brāhmaṇānaṃ pitāmahena mahābrahmunā nimmito''ti dassetuṃ itaraṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``ajjhenamariyā pathaviṃ janindā, vessā kasiṃ pāricariyañca suddā.
[22] upāgu paccekaṃ yathāpadesaṃ, katāhu ete vasināti āhū''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^upāgū^eb^ti upagatā. brahmā kira brāhmaṇādayo cattāro vaṇṇe nimminitvā ariye tāva brāhmaṇe āha -- ``tumhe ajjhenameva upagacchatha ^a^M7.0048^ea^, mā aññaṃ kiñci karitthā''ti, janinde āha ``tumhe pathaviṃyeva vijinatha'', vesse āha -- ``tumhe kasiṃyeva upetha'', sudde āha ``tumhe tiṇṇaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ pāricariyaṃyeva upethā''ti. tato paṭṭhāya ariyā ajjhenaṃ, janindā pathaviṃ, vessā kasiṃ, suddā pāricariyaṃ upāgatāti vadanti. ^b^paccekaṃ yathāpadesa^eb^nti upagacchantā ca pāṭiyekkaṃ attano kulapadesānurūpena brahmunā vuttaniyāmeneva upagatā. ^b^katāhu ete vasināti āhū^eb^ti evaṃ kira ete vasinā mahābrahmunā katā ahesunti kathenti.
[03] evaṃ mahāguṇā ete brāhmaṇā nāma. yo hi etesu cittaṃ pasādetvā dānaṃ deti, tassa aññattha paṭisandhi natthi, devalokameva gacchatīti vatvā āha --
[21] ``dhātā vidhātā varuṇo kuvero, somo yamo candimā vāyu sūriyo.
[22] etepi yaññaṃ puthuso yajitvā, ajjhāyakānaṃ atho sabbakāme..
[21] ``vikāsitā cāpasatāni pañca, yo ajjuno balavā bhīmaseno.
[22] sahassabāhu asamo pathabyā, sopi tadā ādahi jātaveda''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0048^ea^ ^a^P6.0202^ea^ ^b^etepī^eb^ti ete dhātādayo devarājāno. ^b^puthuso^eb^ti anekappakāraṃ yaññaṃ yajitvā. ^b^atho sabbakāme^eb^ti atha ajjhāyakānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ sabbakāme datvā etāni ṭhānāni pattāti dasseti. ^b^vikāsitā^eb^ti ākaḍḍhitā. ^b^cāpasatāni pañcā^eb^ti na dhanupañcasatāni, pañcacāpasatappamāṇaṃ pana mahādhanuṃ sayameva ākaḍḍhati. ^b^bhīmaseno^eb^ti bhayānakaseno. ^b^sahassabāhū^eb^ti na tassa bāhūnaṃ sahassaṃ, pañcannaṃ pana dhanuggahasatānaṃ bāhusahassena ākaḍḍhitabbassa dhanuno ākaḍḍhanenevaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^ādahi jātaveda^eb^nti sopi rājā tasmiṃ kāle brāhmaṇe sabbakāmehi santappetvā aggiṃ ādahi patiṭṭhāpetvā paricari, teneva kāraṇena ^a^M7.0049^ea^ devaloke nibbatto. tasmā brāhmaṇā nāma imasmiṃ loke jeṭṭhakāti āha.
[21] ``yo brāhmaṇe bhojayi dīgharattaṃ, annena pānena yathānubhāvaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^yo^eb^ti yo so porāṇako bārāṇasirājāti dasseti. ^b^yathānubhāva^eb^nti yathābalaṃ yaṃ tassa atthi, taṃ sabbaṃ pariccajitvā bhojesi. ^b^devaññataro^eb^ti so aññataro mahesakkhadevarājā ahosi. evaṃ brāhmaṇā nāma aggadakkhiṇeyyāti dasseti.
[03] athassa aparampi kāraṇaṃ āharitvā dassento gāthamāha --
[22] sa yaññatantaṃ varato yajitvā, dibbaṃ gatiṃ mucalindajjhagacchī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^mahāsana^eb^nti mahābhakkhaṃ. ^b^bhojetu^eb^nti santappetuṃ. ^b^yaññatanta^eb^nti yaññavidhānaṃ. ^b^varato^eb^ti varassa aggidevassa yajitvā. ^b^mucalindajjhagacchī^eb^ti mucalindo adhigatoti.

[03] eko kira pubbe bārāṇasiyaṃ mucalindo nāma rājā brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā saggamaggaṃ pucchi. atha naṃ te ``brāhmaṇānañca brāhmaṇadevatāya ca sakkāraṃ karohī''ti vatvā ``kā brāhmaṇadevatā''ti vutte ```aggidevoti taṃ navanītasappinā santappehī'''ti āhaṃsu. so tathā akāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento esa imaṃ gāthamāha.
[22] hitvā ^a^P6.0203^ea^ apariyanta raṭṭhaṃ sasenaṃ, rājā dudīpopi jagāma sagga''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^pabbajī^eb^ti pañcavassasatāni rajjaṃ kārento brāhmaṇānaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā apariyantaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sasenaṃ hitvā pabbaji. ^b^dudīpopī^eb^ti so dudīpo nāma rājā brāhmaṇe pūjetvāva saggaṃ gatoti vadati. ``dujīpo''tipi pāṭho.
[21] ``yo sāgarantaṃ sāgaro vijitvā, yūpaṃ subhaṃ soṇṇamayaṃ uḷāraṃ.
[22] sa lomapādo paricariya maggiṃ, aṅgo sahassakkhapurajjhagacchī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sāgaranta^eb^nti sāgarapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ. ^b^ussesī^eb^ti brāhmaṇe saggamaggaṃ pucchitvā ``sovaṇṇayūpaṃ ussāpehī''ti vutto pasughātanatthāya ussāpesi. ^b^vessānaramādahāno^eb^ti vessānaraṃ aggiṃ ādahanto. ``vesānari''ntipi pāṭho. ^b^devaññataro^eb^ti subhoga, so hi rājā aggiṃ juhitvā aññataro mahesakkhadevo ahosīti vadati. ^b^yassānubhāvenā^eb^ti bho subhoga, gaṅgā ca mahāsamuddo ca kena katoti jānāsīti. na jānāmīti. kiṃ tvaṃ jānissasi, brāhmaṇeyeva pothetuṃ jānāsīti. atītasmiñhi aṅgo nāma lomapādo bārāṇasirājā brāhmaṇe saggamaggaṃ pucchitvā tehi ``bho, mahārāja, himavantaṃ pavisitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā aggiṃ paricarāhī''ti vutte aparimāṇā ^a^M7.0051^ea^ gāviyo ca mahiṃsiyo ca ādāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā tathā akāsi. ``brāhmaṇehi bhuttātirittaṃ khīradadhiṃ kiṃ kātabba''nti ca vutte ``chaḍḍethā''ti āha. tattha thokassa khīrassa chaḍḍitaṭṭhāne kunnadiyo ahesuṃ, bahukassa chaḍḍitaṭṭhāne gaṅgā pavattatha. taṃ pana khīraṃ yattha dadhi hutvā sannisinnaṃ ṭhitaṃ, taṃ samuddaṃ nāma jātaṃ. iti so evarūpaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā brāhmaṇehi vuttavidhānena aggiṃ paricariya sahassakkhassa puraṃ ajjhagacchi.
[03] itissa ^a^V7.0050^ea^ idaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā imaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] so ^a^P6.0204^ea^ somayāgena malaṃ vihantvā, subhoga devaññataro ahosī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^so somayāgena malaṃ vihantvā^eb^ti bho subhoga, yo idāni sakkassa senāpati mahāyaso devaputto, sopi pubbe eko bārāṇasirājā brāhmaṇe saggamaggaṃ pucchitvā tehi ``somayāgena attano malaṃ pavāhetvā devalokaṃ gacchāhī''ti vutte brāhmaṇānaṃ mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā tehi vuttavidhānena somayāgaṃ katvā tena attano malaṃ vihantvā devaññataro jātoti imamatthaṃ pakāsento evamāha.
[22] yo iddhimā devavaro yasassī, sopi tadā ādahi jātavedaṃ..
[21] ``mālāgirī himavā yo ca gijjho, sudassano nisabho kuveru.
[22] ete ca aññe ca nagā mahantā, cityā katā yaññakarehi māhū''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0052^ea^ ^b^sopi tadā ādahi jātaveda^eb^nti bhātika subhoga, yena mahābrahmunā ayañca loko paro ca loko bhāgīrathigaṅgā ca himavantapabbato ca gijjhapabbato ca kato, sopi yadā brahmupapattito pubbe māṇavako ahosi, tadā aggimeva ādahi, aggiṃ juhitvā mahābrahmā hutvā idaṃ sabbamakāsi. evaṃmahiddhikā brāhmaṇāti dasseti.

[03] ^b^cityā katā^eb^ti pubbe kireko bārāṇasirājā brāhmaṇe saggamaggaṃ pucchitvā ``brāhmaṇānaṃ sakkāraṃ karohī''ti vutte tesaṃ mahādānaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ``mayhaṃ dāne kiṃ natthī''ti pucchitvā ``sabbaṃ, deva, atthi, brāhmaṇānaṃ pana āsanāni nappahontī''ti vutte iṭṭhakāhi cināpetvā āsanāni kāresi. tadā cityā āsanapīṭhikā brāhmaṇānaṃ ānubhāvena vaḍḍhitvā mālāgiriādayo pabbatā jātā. evamete yaññakārehi brāhmaṇehi katāti kathentīti.

[03] atha ^a^V7.0051^ea^ naṃ puna āha ``bhātika, jānāsi panāyaṃ samuddo kena kāraṇena apeyyo loṇodako jāto''ti? ``na jānāmi, ariṭṭhā''ti. atha naṃ ``tvaṃ brāhmaṇeyeva vihiṃsituṃ jānāsi, suṇohī''ti vatvā gāthamāha --
[22] tīre ^a^P6.0205^ea^ samuddassudakaṃ sajantaṃ, taṃ sāgarojjhohari tenāpeyyo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^`yācayogotidhāhū^eb^ti taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ yācayogoti idha loke āhu. ^b^udakaṃ sajanta^eb^ti so kirekadivasaṃ pāpapavāhanakammaṃ karonto tīre ṭhatvā samuddato udakaṃ gahetvā attano upari sīse sajantaṃ abbhukirati. atha naṃ evaṃ karontaṃ vaḍḍhitvā sāgaro ajjhohari. taṃ kāraṇaṃ mahābrahmā ñatvā ``iminā kira me putto hato''ti kujjhitvā ``samuddo apeyyo loṇodako bhavatū''ti vatvā abhisapi, tena kāraṇena apeyyo jāto. evarūpā ete brāhmaṇā nāma mahānubhāvāti.
[22] purimaṃ disaṃ pacchimaṃ dakkhiṇuttaraṃ, saṃvijjamānā janayanti veda''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^vāsavassā^eb^ti pubbe brāhmaṇānaṃ dānaṃ datvā vāsavattaṃ pattassa vāsavassa. ^b^āyāgavatthūnī^eb^ti puññakkhettabhūtā aggadakkhiṇeyyā pathabyā puthū brāhmaṇā saṃvijjanti. ^b^purimaṃ disa^eb^nti te idānipi catūsu disāsu saṃvijjamānā tassa vāsavassa mahantaṃ vedaṃ janayanti, pītisomanassaṃ āvahanti.
[03] evaṃ ariṭṭho cuddasahi gāthāhi brāhmaṇe ca yaññe ca vede ca vaṇṇesi.

[03] tassa taṃ kathaṃ sutvā mahāsattassa gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatā bahū nāgā ``ayaṃ bhūtameva kathetī''ti micchāgāhaṃ gaṇhanākārappattā jātā. mahāsatto gilānaseyyāya nipannova taṃ sabbaṃ assosi ^a^V7.0052^ea^. nāgāpissa ārocesuṃ. tato mahāsatto cintesi ``ariṭṭho micchāmaggaṃ vaṇṇeti, vādamassa bhinditvā parisaṃ sammādiṭṭhikaṃ karissāmī''ti. so uṭṭhāya nhatvā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito dhammāsane nisīditvā sabbaṃ nāgaparisaṃ sannipātāpetvā ariṭṭhaṃ pakkosāpetvā ``ariṭṭha, tvaṃ abhūtaṃ vatvā vede ca yaññe ca brāhmaṇe ca vaṇṇesi, brāhmaṇānañhi vedavidhānena yaññayajanaṃ nāma anariyasammataṃ na saggāvahaṃ, tava vāde abhūtaṃ passāhī''ti vatvā yaññabhedavādaṃ nāma ārabhanto āha --
[21] ``kalī ^a^P6.0206^ea^ hi dhīrāna kaṭaṃ magānaṃ, bhavanti vedajjhagatānariṭṭha.
[21] ``vedā ^a^M7.0054^ea^ na tāṇāya bhavanti dassa, mittadduno bhūnahuno narassa.
[22] na tāyate pariciṇṇo ca aggi, dosantaraṃ maccamanariyakammaṃ..
[21] ``sabbañca maccā sadhanaṃ sabhogaṃ, ādīpitaṃ dāru tiṇena missaṃ.
[22] dahaṃ na tappe asamatthatejo, ko taṃ subhikkhaṃ dvirasaññu kayirā..
[21] ``yathāpi khīraṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, dadhi bhavitvā navanītampi hoti.
[22] evampi aggi vipariṇāmadhammo, tejo samorohatī yogayutto..
[21] ``na dissatī aggi manuppaviṭṭho, sukkhesu kaṭṭhesu navesu cāpi.
[21] ``sace hi aggi antarato vaseyya, sukkhesu kaṭṭhesu navesu cāpi.
[22] sabbāni susseyyu vanāni loke, sukkhāni kaṭṭhāni ca pajjaleyyuṃ..
[21] ``karoti ce dārutiṇena puññaṃ, bhojaṃ naro dhūmasikhiṃ patāpavaṃ.
[22] aṅgārikā loṇakarā ca sūdā, sarīradāhāpi kareyyu puññaṃ..
[21] ``atha ^a^P6.0207^ea^ ce hi ete na karonti puññaṃ, ajjhenamaggiṃ idha tappayitvā.
[22] na koci lokasmiṃ karoti puññaṃ, bhojaṃ naro dhūmasikhiṃ patāpavaṃ..
[22] yadeva maccā parivajjayanti, tadappasatthaṃ dvirasaññu bhuñje..
[21] ``sikhimpi devesu vadanti heke, āpaṃ milakkhū pana devamāhu.
[22] sabbeva ete vitathaṃ bhaṇanti, aggī na devaññataro na cāpo..
[22] paricariya maggiṃ sugatiṃ kathaṃ vaje, pāpāni kammāni pakubbamāno..
[22] sabbānubhāvī ca vasī kimatthaṃ, animmito nimmitaṃ vanditassa..
[22] te lābhasakkāre apātubhonte, sandhāpitā jantubhi santidhammaṃ..
[21] ``ajjhenamariyā pathaviṃ janindā, vessā kasiṃ pāricariyañca suddā.
[22] upāgu paccekaṃ yathāpadesaṃ, katāhu ete vasināti āhu..
[21] ``etañca ^a^P6.0208^ea^ saccaṃ vacanaṃ bhaveyya, yathā idaṃ bhāsitaṃ brāhmaṇehi.
[27] nākhattiyo jātu labhetha rajjaṃ, nābrāhmaṇo mantapadāni sikkhe.
[22] nāññatra vessehi kasiṃ kareyya, suddo na mucce parapesanāya..
[21] ``yasmā ^a^M7.0056^ea^ ca etaṃ vacanaṃ abhūtaṃ, musāvime odariyā bhaṇanti.
[22] tadappapaññā abhisaddahanti, passanti taṃ paṇḍitā attanāva..
[21] ``khatyā hi vessānaṃ baliṃ haranti, ādāya satthāni caranti brāhmaṇā.
[22] taṃ tādisaṃ saṅkhubhitaṃ pabhinnaṃ, kasmā brahmā nujju karoti lokaṃ..
[21] ``sace hi so issaro sabbaloke, brahmā bahūbhūtapatī pajānaṃ.
[22] kiṃ sabbalokaṃ vidahī alakkhiṃ, kiṃ sabbalokaṃ na sukhiṃ akāsi..
[21] ``sace ^a^V7.0054^ea^ hi so issaro sabbaloke, brahmā bahūbhūtapatī pajānaṃ.
[22] māyā musāvajjamadena cāpi, lokaṃ adhammena kimatthamakāri..
[21] ``sace hi so issaro sabbaloke, brahmā bahūbhūtapatī pajānaṃ.
[22] adhammiko bhūtapatī ariṭṭha, dhamme sati yo vidahī adhammaṃ..
[21] ``kīṭā paṭaṅgā uragā ca bhekā, gantvā kimī sujjhati makkhikā ca.
[22] etepi dhammā anariyarūpā, kambojakānaṃ vitathā bahūna''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^P6.0209^ea^ ^b^vedajjhagatānariṭṭhā^eb^ti ariṭṭha, imāni vedādhigamanāni nāma dhīrānaṃ parājayasaṅkhāto kaliggāho, magānaṃ bālānaṃ jayasaṅkhāto kaṭaggāho. ^b^marīcidhamma^eb^nti idañhi vedattayaṃ marīcidhammaṃ. tayidaṃ asamekkhitattā yuttāyuttaṃ ^a^M7.0057^ea^ ajānantā bālā udakasaññāya magā marīciṃ viya bhūtasaññāya anavajjasaññāya attano vināsaṃ upagacchanti. ^b^pañña^eb^nti evarūpā pana māyākoṭṭhāsā paññaṃ ñāṇasampannaṃ purisaṃ nātivahanti na vañcenti. ^b^bhavanti dassā^eb^ti ^b^da^eb^-kāro byañjanasandhimattaṃ, assa ^b^bhūnahuno^eb^ vuḍḍhighātakassa mittadubbhino narassa vedā na tāṇatthāya bhavanti, patiṭṭhā hotuṃ na sakkontīti attho. ^b^pariciṇṇo ca aggī^eb^ti aggi ca pariciṇṇo tividhena duccaritadosena sadosacittaṃ pāpakammaṃ purisaṃ na tāyati na rakkhati.

[03] ^b^sabbañca maccā^eb^ti sacepi hi maccā yattakaṃ loke dāru atthi, taṃ sabbaṃ sadhanaṃ sabhogaṃ attano dhanena ca bhogehi ca saddhiṃ tiṇena missaṃ katvā ādīpeyyuṃ. evaṃ sabbampi taṃ tehi ādīpitaṃ dahanto ayaṃ asamatthatejo asadisatejo tava aggi na tappeyya. evaṃ atappanīyaṃ, bhātika, dvirasaññu dvīhi jivhāhi rasajānanasamattho ko taṃ sappiādīhi subhikkhaṃ suhītaṃ kayirā, ko sakkuṇeyya kātuṃ. evaṃ atittaṃ panetaṃ mahagghasaṃ santappetvā ko nāma devalokaṃ gamissati, passa yāvañcetaṃ dukkathitanti. ^b^yogayutto^eb^ti araṇimathanayogena yutto hutvā taṃ paccayaṃ labhitvāva aggi samorohati nibbattati. evaṃ paravāyāmena uppajjamānaṃ acetanaṃ taṃ tvaṃ ``devo''ti vadesi. idampi abhūtameva kathesīti.

[03] ^b^aggi manuppaviṭṭho^eb^ti aggi anupaviṭṭho. ^b^nāmatthamāno^eb^ti nāpi araṇihatthena narena amatthiyamāno nibbattati. ^b^nākammunā jāyati jātavedo^eb^ti ekassa kiriyaṃ vinā attano dhammatāya eva na jāyati. ^b^susseyyu^eb^nti anto agginā sosiyamānāni vanāni sukkheyyuṃ, allāneva ^a^V7.0055^ea^ na siyuṃ. ^b^bhoja^eb^nti bhojento. ^b^dhūmasikhiṃ patāpava^eb^nti dhūmasikhāya yuttaṃ patāpavantaṃ. ^b^aṅgārikā^eb^ti aṅgārakammakarā. ^b^loṇakarā^eb^ti loṇodakaṃ pacitvā loṇakārakā. ^b^sūdā^eb^ti bhattakārakā. ^b^sarīradāhā^eb^ti matasarīrajjhāpakā. ^b^puñña^eb^nti etepi sabbe puññameva kareyyuṃ.

[03] ^b^ajjhenamaggi^eb^nti ajjhenāggiṃ. ^b^na kocī^eb^ti mantajjhāyakā brāhmaṇāpi hontu, koci naro dhūmasikhiṃ patāpavantaṃ aggiṃ bhojento tappayitvāpi puññaṃ ^a^M7.0058^ea^ na karoti nāma. ^b^lokāpacito samāno^eb^ti tava devolokassa apacito pūjito samāno. ^b^yadevā^eb^ti yaṃ ahikuṇapādiṃ paṭikulaṃ jegucchaṃ maccā dūrato parivajjenti. ^b^tadappasattha^eb^nti taṃ appasatthaṃ, samma, dvirasaññu kathaṃ kena kāraṇena paribhuñjeyya. ^b^devesū^eb^ti eke manussā sikhimpi devesu aññataraṃ devaṃ vadanti. ^b^milakkhū panā^eb^ti aññāṇā pana milakkhū udakaṃ ``devo''ti vadanti. ^b^asaññakāya^eb^nti ^a^P6.0210^ea^ anindriyabaddhaṃ acittakāyañca samānaṃ etaṃ acetanaṃ pajānaṃ pacanādikammakaraṃ vessānaraṃ aggiṃ paricaritvā pāpāni kammāni karonto loko kathaṃ sugatiṃ gamissati. idaṃ te ativiya dukkathitaṃ.

[03] ^b^sabbābhi bhūtāhudha jīvikatthā^eb^ti ime brāhmaṇā attano jīvikatthaṃ mahābrahmā sabbābhibhūti āhaṃsu, sabbo loko teneva nimmitoti vadanti. puna aggissa brahmā paricārakotipi vadanti. sopi kira aggiṃ juhateva. ^b^sabbānubhāvī ca vasī^eb^ti so pana yadi sabbānubhāvī ca vasī ca, atha kimatthaṃ sayaṃ animmito hutvā attanāva nimmitaṃ vanditā bhaveyya. idampi te ^b^dukkathita^eb^meva. ^b^hassa^eb^nti ariṭṭha brāhmaṇānaṃ vacanaṃ nāma hasitabbayuttakaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ na nijjhānakkhamaṃ. ^b^pakiriṃsū^eb^ti ime brāhmaṇā evarūpaṃ musāvādaṃ attano sakkārahetu pubbe patthariṃsu. ^b^sandhāpitā jantubhi santidhamma^eb^nti te ettakena lābhasakkāre apātubhūte jantūhi saddhiṃ yojetvā pāṇavadhapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ attano laddhidhammasaṅkhātaṃ santidhammaṃ sandhāpitā, yaññasuttaṃ nāma ganthayiṃsūti attho.

[03] ^b^etañca sacca^eb^nti yadetaṃ tayā ``ajjhenamariyā''tiādi vuttaṃ, etañca saccaṃ bhaveyya. ^b^nākhattiyo^eb^ti evaṃ sante akhattiyo rajjaṃ nāma na labheyya, abrāhmaṇopi mantapadāni na sikkheyya. ^b^musāvime^eb^ti musāva ime. ^b^odariyā^eb^ti udaranissitajīvikā, udarapūraṇahetu vā. ^b^tadappapaññā^eb^ti taṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ appapaññā. ^b^attanāvā^eb^ti paṇḍitā pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ ``sadosa''nti attanāva passanti. ^b^tādisa^eb^nti tathārūpaṃ. ^b^saṅkhubhita^eb^nti saṅkhubhitvā brahmunā ṭhapitamariyādaṃ bhinditvā ṭhitaṃ saṅkhubhitaṃ vibhindaṃ lokaṃ so tavabrahmā kasmā ujuṃ na karoti ^a^V7.0056^ea^. ^b^alakkhi^eb^nti kiṃkāraṇā sabbaloke dukkhaṃ vidahi. ^b^sukhi^eb^nti kiṃ nu ekantasukhimeva sabbalokaṃ na ^a^M7.0059^ea^ akāsi, lokavināsako coro maññe tava brahmāti. ^b^māyā^eb^ti māyāya. ^b^adhammena kimatthamakārī^eb^ti iminā māyādinā adhammena kiṃkāraṇā lokaṃ anatthakiriyāyaṃ saṃyojesīti attho. ^b^ariṭṭhā^eb^ti ariṭṭha, tava bhūtapati adhammiko, yo dasavidhe kusaladhamme sati dhammameva avidahitvā adhammaṃ vidahi. ^b^kīṭā^eb^tiādi upayogatthe paccattaṃ. ete kīṭādayo pāṇe hantvā macco sujjhatīti etepi kambojaraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ bahūnaṃ anariyānaṃ dhammā, te pana vitathā, adhammāva dhammāti vuttā. tehipi tava brahmunāva nimmitehi bhavitabbanti.
[21] ``sace hi so sujjhati yo hanāti, hatopi so saggamupeti ṭhānaṃ.
[22] bhovādi ^a^P6.0211^ea^ bhovādina mārayeyyuṃ, ye cāpi tesaṃ abhisaddaheyyuṃ..
[21] ``neva migā na pasū nopi gāvo, āyācanti attavadhāya keci.
[22] vipphandamāne idha jīvikatthā, yaññesu pāṇe pasumārabhanti..
[21] ``yūpussane pasubandhe ca bālā, cittehi vaṇṇehi mukhaṃ nayanti.
[22] ayaṃ te yūpo kāmaduho parattha, bhavissati sassato samparāye..
[21] ``sace ca yūpe maṇisaṅkhamuttaṃ, dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ.
[27] sukkhesu kaṭṭhesu navesu cāpi, sace duhe tidive sabbakāme.
[22] tevijjasaṅghāva puthū yajeyyuṃ, abrāhmaṇaṃ kañci na yājayeyyuṃ..
[21] ``kuto ^a^M7.0060^ea^ ca yūpe maṇisaṅkhamuttaṃ, dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ.
[22] sukkhesu kaṭṭhesu navesu cāpi, kuto duhe tidive sabbakāme..
[21] ``saṭhā ca luddā ca paluddhabālā, cittehi vaṇṇehi mukhaṃ nayanti.
[22] ādāya aggiṃ mama dehi vittaṃ, tato sukhī hohisi sabbakāme..
[21] ``tamaggihuttaṃ ^a^V7.0057^ea^ saraṇaṃ pavissa, cittehi vaṇṇehi mukhaṃ nayanti.
[22] oropayitvā kesamassuṃ nakhañca, vedehi vittaṃ atigāḷhayanti..
[21] ``kākā ulūkaṃva raho labhitvā, ekaṃ samānaṃ bahukā samecca.
[22] annāni ^a^P6.0212^ea^ bhutvā kuhakā kuhitvā, muṇḍaṃ karitvā yaññapathossajanti..
[21] ``evañhi so vañcito brāhmaṇehi, eko samāno bahukā samecca.
[22] te yogayogena vilumpamānā, diṭṭhaṃ adiṭṭhena dhanaṃ haranti..
[22] te tādisā corasamā asantā, vajjhā na haññanti ariṭṭha loke..
[22] taṃ cepi saccaṃ maghavā chinnabāhu, kenassa indo asure jināti..
[21] ``tañceva ^a^M7.0061^ea^ tucchaṃ maghavā samaṅgī, hantā avajjho paramo sa devo.
[22] mantā ime brāhmaṇā tuccharūpā, sandiṭṭhikā vañcanā esa loke..
[21] ``mālāgiri himavā yo ca gijjho, sudassano nisabho kuveru.
[22] ete ca aññe ca nagā mahantā, cityā katā yaññakarehi māhu..
[21] ``yathāpakārāni hi iṭṭhakāni, cityā katā yaññakarehi māhu.
[22] na pabbatā honti tathāpakārā, aññā disā acalā tiṭṭhaselā..
[21] ``na iṭṭhakā honti silā cirena, na tattha sañjāyati ayo na lohaṃ.
[22] yaññañca ^a^P6.0213^ea^ etaṃ parivaṇṇayantā, cityā katā yaññakarehi māhu..
[22] tīre samuddassudakaṃ sajantaṃ, taṃ sāgarajjhohari tenāpeyyo..
[22] na tena byāpannarasūdakā na, kasmā samuddo atulo apeyyo..
[21] ``ye keci kūpā idha jīvaloke, loṇūdakā kūpakhaṇehi khātā.
[22] na brāhmaṇajjhoharaṇena tesu, āpo apeyyo dvirasaññu māhu..
[21] ``pure ^a^M7.0062^ea^ puratthā kā kassa bhariyā, mano manussaṃ ajanesi pubbe.
[22] tenāpi dhammena na koci hīno, evampi vossaggavibhaṅgamāhu..
[21] ``caṇḍālaputtopi adhicca vede, bhāseyya mante kusalo matīmā.
[22] na tassa muddhāpi phaleyya sattadhā, mantā ime attavadhāya katā..
[22] bālāna cittaṃ visame niviṭṭhaṃ, tadappapaññā abhisaddahanti..
[21] ``sīhassa byagghassa ca dīpino ca, na vijjatī porisiyaṃ balena.
[22] manussabhāvo ca gavaṃva pekkho, jātī hi tesaṃ asamā samānā..
[21] ``sace ^a^P6.0214^ea^ ca rājā pathaviṃ vijitvā, sajīvavā assavapārisajjo.
[22] sayameva so sattusaṅghaṃ vijeyya, tassappajā niccasukhī bhaveyya..
[21] ``khattiyamantā ca tayo ca vedā, atthena ete samakā bhavanti.
[22] tesañca atthaṃ avinicchinitvā, na bujjhatī oghapathaṃva channaṃ..
[21] ``khattiyamantā ca tayo ca vedā, atthena ete samakā bhavanti.
[22] lābho alābho ayaso yaso ca, sabbeva tesaṃ catunnañca dhammā..
[21] ``yathāpi ^a^M7.0063^ea^ ibbhā dhanadhaññahetu, kammāni karonti puthū pathabyā.
[22] tevijjasaṅghā ca tatheva ajja, kammāni karonti puthū pathabyā..
[21] ``ibbhehi ^a^V7.0059^ea^ ye te samakā bhavanti, niccussukā kāmaguṇesu yuttā.
[22] kammāni karonti puthū pathabyā, tadappapaññā dvirasaññurā te''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^bhovādī^eb^ti brāhmaṇā. ^b^bhovādina mārayeyyu^eb^nti brāhmaṇameva māreyyuṃ. ^b^ye cāpī^eb^ti yepi brāhmaṇānaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ saddaheyyuṃ, te attano upaṭṭhākeyeva ca brāhmaṇe ca māreyyuṃ. brāhmaṇā pana brāhmaṇe ca upaṭṭhāke ca amāretvā nānappakāre tiracchāneyeva mārenti. iti tesaṃ vacanaṃ micchā. ^b^kecī^eb^ti yaññesu no māretha, mayaṃ saggaṃ gamissāmāti āyācantā keci natthi. ^b^pāṇe pasumārabhantī^eb^ti migādayo pāṇe ca pasū ca vipphandamāne jīvikatthāya mārenti. ^b^mukhaṃ nayantī^eb^ti etesu yūpussanesu pasubandhesu imasmiṃ te yūpe sabbaṃ maṇisaṅkhamuttaṃ dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ sannihitaṃ, ayaṃ te yūpo parattha paraloke kāmaduho bhavissati, sassatabhāvaṃ āvahissatīti citrehi kāraṇehi mukhaṃ pasādenti, taṃ taṃ vatvā micchāgāhaṃ ^a^P6.0215^ea^ gāhentīti attho.

[03] ^b^sace cā^eb^ti sace ca yūpe vā sesakaṭṭhesu vā etaṃ maṇiādikaṃ bhaveyya, tidive vā sabbakāmaduho assa, tevijjasaṅghāva puthū hutvā yaññaṃ yajeyyuṃ bahudhanatāya ceva saggakāmatāya ca, aññaṃ abrāhmaṇaṃ na yājeyyuṃ. yasmā pana attano dhanaṃ paccāsīsantā aññampi yajāpenti, tasmā abhūtavādinoti veditabbā. ^b^kuto cā^eb^ti etasmiñca yūpe vā sesakaṭṭhesu vā kuto etaṃ maṇiādikaṃ avijjamānameva, kuto tidive sabbakāme duhissati. sabbathāpi abhūtameva tesaṃ vacanaṃ.

[03] ^b^saṭhā^eb^ ^a^M7.0064^ea^ ^b^ca luddā ca paluddhabālā^eb^ti ariṭṭha, ime brāhmaṇā nāma kerāṭikā ceva nikkaruṇā ca, te bālā lokaṃ palobhetvā upalobhetvā citrehi kāraṇehi mukhaṃ pasādenti. sabbakāmeti aggiṃ ādāya tvañca jūha, amhākañca vittaṃ dehi, tato sabbakāme labhitvā sukhī hohisi.

[03] ^b^tamaggihuttaṃ saraṇaṃ pavissā^eb^ti taṃ rājānaṃ vā rājamahāmattaṃ vā ādāya aggijuhanaṭṭhānaṃ gehaṃ pavisitvā. ^b^oropayitvā^eb^ti citrāni kāraṇāni vadantā kesamassuṃ nakhe ca oropayitvā. ^b^atigāḷhayantī^eb^ti vuttatāya tayo vede nissāya ``idaṃ dātabbaṃ, idaṃ kattabba''nti vadantā vedehi tassa santakaṃ vittaṃ atigāḷhayanti vināsenti viddhaṃsenti.

[03] ^b^annāni^eb^ ^a^V7.0060^ea^ ^b^bhutvā kuhakā kuhitvā^eb^ti te kuhakā nānappakāraṃ kuhakakammaṃ katvā ^b^samecca^eb^ samāgantvā yaññaṃ vaṇṇetvā vañcetvā tassa santakaṃ nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā atha naṃ muṇḍakaṃ katvā yaññapathe ossajanti, taṃ gahetvā bahiyaññāvāṭaṃ gacchantīti attho.

[03] ^b^yogayogenā^eb^ti te brāhmaṇā taṃ ekaṃ bahukā samecca tena tena yogena tāya tāya yuttiyā vilumpamānā diṭṭhaṃ paccakkhaṃ tassa dhanaṃ adiṭṭhena devalokena adiṭṭhaṃ devalokaṃ vaṇṇetvā āharaṇaṭṭhānaṃ katvā haranti. ^b^akāsiyā rājūhivānusiṭṭhā^eb^ti ``idañcidañca baliṃ gaṇhathā''ti rājūhi anusiṭṭhā akāsiyasaṅkhātā rājapurisā viya. ^b^tadassā^eb^ti taṃ assa dhanaṃ ādāya haranti. ^b^corasamā^eb^ti abhūtabaliggāhakā sandhicchedakacorasadisā asappurisā. ^b^vajjhā^eb^ti vadhārahā evarūpā pāpadhammā udāni loke na haññanti.

[03] ^b^bāhārasī^eb^ti bāhā asi. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- idampi ariṭṭha, brāhmaṇānaṃ musāvādaṃ passa. te kira yaññesu mahatiṃ palāsayaṭṭhiṃ ``indassa bāhā asi dakkhiṇā''ti vatvā chindanti. tañce etesaṃ vacanaṃ saccaṃ, atha chinnabāhu samāno kenassa bāhubalena indo asure jinātīti. ^b^samaṅgī^eb^ti bāhusamaṅgī acchinnabāhu arogoyeva. ^b^hantā^eb^ti asurānaṃ hantā. ^b^paramo^eb^ti uttamo puññiddhiyā samannāgato aññesaṃ avajjho. ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti brāhmaṇānaṃ. ^b^tuccharūpā^eb^ti tucchasabhāvā nipphalā ^a^M7.0065^ea^. ^b^vañcanā^eb^ti ye ca te brāhmaṇānaṃ mantā nāma, esā loke sandiṭṭhikā vañcanā.

[03] ^b^yathāpakārānī^eb^ti yādisāni iṭṭhakāni gahetvā yaññakarehi cityā katāti vadanti. ^b^tiṭṭhaselā^eb^ti pabbatā hi acalā tiṭṭhā na upacitā ekagghanā silāmayā ca. iṭṭhakāni calāni na ekagghanāni na silāmayāni. ^b^parivaṇṇayantā^eb^ti etaṃ ^a^P6.0216^ea^ yaññaṃ vaṇṇentā brāhmaṇā.

[03] ^b^samantavede^eb^ti paripuṇṇavede brāhmaṇe. ^b^vahantī^eb^ti sotesupi āvaṭṭesupi patite vahanti, nimujjāpetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti. ^b^na tena byāpannarasūdakā nā^eb^ti ettha eko ^b^na^eb^-kāro pucchanattho hoti. nanu tena byāpannarasūdakā nadiyoti taṃ pucchanto evamāha. ^b^kasmā^eb^ti kena kāraṇena tāva mahāsamuddova apeyyo kato, kiṃ mahābrahmā yamunādīsu nadīsu udakaṃ apeyyaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, samuddeyeva sakkotīti. ^b^dvirasaññu māhū^eb^ti dvirasaññū ahu, jātoti attho.

[03] ^b^pure^eb^ ^a^V7.0061^ea^ ^b^puratthā^eb^ti ito pure pubbe puratthā paṭhamakappikakāle. ^b^kā kassa bhariyā^eb^ti kā kassa bhariyā nāma. tadā hi itthiliṅgameva natthi, pacchā methunadhammavasena mātāpitaro nāma jātā. ^b^mano manussa^eb^nti tadā hi manoyeva manussaṃ janesi, manomayāva sattā nibbattiṃsūti attho. ^b^tenāpi dhammenā^eb^ti tenāpi kāraṇena tena sabhāvena na koci jātiyā hīno. na hi tadā khattiyādibhedo atthi, tasmā yaṃ brāhmaṇā vadanti ``brāhmaṇāva jātiyā seṭṭhā, itare hīnā''ti, taṃ micchā. ^b^evampī^eb^ti evaṃ vattamāne loke porāṇakavattaṃ jahitvā pacchā attanā sammannitvā katānaṃ vasena khattiyādayo cattāro koṭṭhāsā jātā, evampi ^b^vossaggavibhaṅgamāhu,^eb^ attanā katehi kammavossaggehi tesaṃ sattānaṃ ekacce khattiyā jātā, ekacce brāhmaṇādayoti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ kathenti, tasmā ``brāhmaṇāva seṭṭhā''ti vacanaṃ micchā.

[03] ^b^sattadhā^eb^ti yadi mahābrahmunā brāhmaṇānaññeva tayo vedā dinnā, na aññesaṃ, caṇḍālassa mante bhāsantassa muddhā sattadhā phaleyya, na ^a^M7.0066^ea^ ca phalati, tasmā imehi brāhmaṇehi attavadhāya mantā katā, attanoyeva nesaṃ musāvāditaṃ pakāsentā guṇavadhaṃ karonti. ^b^vācākatā^eb^ti ete mantā nāma musāvādena cintetvā katā. ^b^giddhikatā gahītā^eb^ti lābhagiddhikatāya brāhmaṇehi gahitā. ^b^dummocayā^eb^ti macchena gilitabaliso viya dummocayā. ^b^kabyapathānupannā^eb^ti kabyākārakabrāhmaṇānaṃ vacanapathaṃ anupannā anugatā. te hi yathā icchanti, tathā musā vatvā bandhanti. ^b^bālāna^eb^nti tesañhi bālānaṃ cittaṃ visame niviṭṭhaṃ, taṃ aññe appapaññāva abhisaddahanti.

[03] ^b^porisiyaṃbalenā^eb^ti porisiyasaṅkhātena balena. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yaṃ etesaṃ sīhādīnaṃ purisathāmasaṅkhātaṃ porisiyabalaṃ, tena balena samannāgato brāhmaṇo nāma natthi, sabbe imehi tiracchānehipi hīnāyevāti. ^b^manussabhāvo ca gavaṃva pekkho^eb^ti apica yo etesaṃ manussabhāvo, so gunnaṃ viya pekkhitabbo. kiṃkāraṇā? jāti hi tesaṃ asamā samānā. tesañhi brāhmaṇānaṃ duppaññatāya gohi saddhiṃ samānajātiyeva asamā. aññameva hi gunnaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ, aññaṃ tesanti. etena brāhmaṇe tiracchānesu sīhādīhi samepi akatvā gorūpasameva karoti.

[03] ^b^sace ca rājā^eb^ti ariṭṭha, yadi mahābrahmunā dinnabhāvena khattiyova pathaviṃ vijitvā. ^b^sajīvavā^eb^ti sahajīvīhi amaccehi samannāgato. ^b^assavapārisajjo^eb^ti attano ovādakaraparisāvacarova siyā, athassa parisāya yujjhitvā ^a^P6.0217^ea^ rajjaṃ kātabbaṃ nāma na bhaveyya ^a^V7.0062^ea^. sayameva so ekakova sattusaṅghaṃ vijeyya, evaṃ sati yuddhe dukkhābhāvena tassa pajā niccasukhī bhaveyya, etañca natthi. tasmā tesaṃ vacanaṃ micchā.

[03] ^b^khattiyamantā^eb^ti rājasatthañca tayo ca vedā attano āṇāya ruciyā ``idameva kattabba''nti pavattattā atthena ete samakā bhavanti. ^b^avinicchinitvā^eb^ti tesaṃ khattiyamantānaṃ khattiyopi vedānaṃ brāhmaṇopi atthaṃ avinicchinitvā āṇāvaseneva uggaṇhanto taṃ atthaṃ udakoghena channamaggaṃ viya na bujjhati.

[03] ^b^atthena^eb^ ^a^M7.0067^ea^ ^b^ete^eb^ti vañcanatthena ete samakā bhavanti. kiṃkāraṇā? brāhmaṇāva seṭṭhā, aññe vaṇṇā hīnāti vadanti. ye ca te lābhādayo lokadhammā, sabbeva tesaṃ catunnampi vaṇṇānaṃ dhammā. ekasattopi etehi muttako nāma natthi. iti brāhmaṇā lokadhammehi aparimuttāva samānā ``seṭṭhā maya''nti musā kathenti.

[03] ^b^ibbhā^eb^ti gahapatikā. ^b^tevijjasaṅghā cā^eb^ti brāhmaṇāpi tatheva puthūni kasigorakkhādīni kammāni karonti. ^b^niccussukā^eb^ti niccaṃ ussukkajātā chandajātā. ^b^tadappapaññā dvirasaññurā te^eb^ti tasmā bhātika, dvirasaññu nippaññā brāhmaṇā, ārā te dhammato. porāṇakā hi brāhmaṇadhammā etarahi sunakhesu sandissantīti.

[03] evaṃ mahāsatto tassa vādaṃ bhinditvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā sabbā nāgaparisā somanassajātā ahesuṃ. mahāsatto nesādabrāhmaṇaṃ nāgabhavanā nīharāpesi, paribhāsamattampissa nākāsi. sāgarabrahmadattopi ṭhapitadivasaṃ anatikkamitvā caturaṅginiyā senāya saha pitu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. mahāsattopi ``mātulañca ayyakañca passissāmī''ti bheriṃ carāpetvā mahantena sirisobhaggena yamunāto uttaritvā tameva assamapadaṃ ārabbha pāyāsi. avasesā bhātaro cassa mātāpitaro ca pacchato pāyiṃsu. tasmiṃ khaṇe sāgarabrahmadatto mahāsattaṃ mahatiyā parisāya āgacchantaṃ asañjānitvā pitaraṃ pucchanto āha --
[22] yuvā kalāpasannaddho, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ..
[22] mukhañca rucirā bhāti, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ..
[22] kassete kuṇḍalā vaggū, sobhanti dubhato mukhaṃ..
[22] ko sobhati visālakkho, kassetaṃ uṇṇajaṃ mukhaṃ..
[22] ko so bimboṭṭhasampanno, divā sūriyova bhāsati..
[22] ko so odātapāvāro, jayaṃ indova sobhati..
[22] ko so parisamogayha, īsaṃ khaggaṃ pamuñcati..
[22] ko so omuñcate pādā, namo katvā mahesino''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^paṭipannānī^eb^ti kassetāni tūriyāni purato paṭipannāni. ^b^hāsayantā^eb^ti etaṃ rājānaṃ hāsayantā. ^b^kassa kañcanapaṭṭenā^eb^ti kassa nalāṭante bandhena uṇhīsapaṭṭena vijjuyā meghamukhaṃ viya mukhaṃ pajjotatīti pucchati. ^b^yuvā kalāpasannaddho^eb^ti taruṇo sannaddhakalāpo. ^b^ukkāmukhapahaṭṭhaṃvā^eb^ti kammāruddhane pahaṭṭhasuvaṇṇaṃ viya. ^b^khadiraṅgārasannibha^eb^nti ādittakhadiraṅgārasannibhaṃ. ^b^jambonada^eb^nti rattasuvaṇṇamayaṃ. ^b^aṅgaṃ pariggayhā^eb^ti cāmarigāhakena ^a^M7.0069^ea^ aṅgena pariggahitā hutvā. ^b^vālabījanimuttama^eb^nti uttamaṃ vālabījaniṃ. ^b^pekhuṇahatthānī^eb^ti morapiñchahatthakāni. ^b^citrānī^eb^ti sattaratanacitrāni. ^b^kañcanamaṇidaṇḍānī^eb^ti tapanīyasuvaṇṇena ca maṇīhi ^a^P6.0219^ea^ ca khaṇitadaṇḍāni. ^b^dubhato mukha^eb^nti mukhassa ubhayapassesu caranti.

[03] ^b^vātena chupitā^eb^ti vātapahaṭā. ^b^niddhantā^eb^ti siniddhāntā. ^b^nalāṭanta^eb^nti kassete evarūpā kesā nalāṭantaṃ upasobhenti. ^b^nabhā vijjurivuggatā^eb^ti nabhato uggatā vijju viya. ^b^uṇṇaja^eb^nti kañcanādāso viya paripuṇṇaṃ. ^b^lapanajātā^eb^ti mukhajātā. ^b^kuppilasādisā^eb^ti mandālakamakulasadisā. ^b^sukhedhitā^eb^ti sukhaparihaṭā. ^b^jayaṃ indovā^eb^ti jayaṃ patto indo viya. ^b^suvaṇṇapīḷakākiṇṇa^eb^nti suvaṇṇapīḷakāhi ākiṇṇaṃ. ^b^maṇidaṇḍavicittaka^eb^nti maṇīhi tharumhi vicittakaṃ. ^b^suvaṇṇavikatā^eb^ti suvaṇṇakhacitā. ^b^cittā^eb^ti sattaratanavicittā. ^b^sukatā^eb^ti suṭṭhu niṭṭhitā. ^b^cittasibbanā^eb^ti citrasibbiniyo. ^b^ko so omuñcate pādā^eb^ti ko esa pādato evarūpā pādukā omuñcatīti.
[03] evaṃ puttena sāgarabrahmadattena puṭṭho iddhimā abhiññālābhī tāpaso ``tāta, ete dhataraṭṭharañño puttā tava bhāgineyyanāgā''ti ācikkhanto gāthamāha --

[03] evaṃ tesaṃ kathentānaññeva nāgaparisā patvā tāpasassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. samuddajāpi pitaraṃ vanditvā roditvā nāgaparisāya saddhiṃ nāgabhavanameva gatā. sāgarabrahmadattopi tattheva katipāhaṃ vasitvā bārāṇasimeva gato. samuddajā nāgabhavaneyeva kālamakāsi. bodhisatto yāvajīvaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā āyupariyosāne saddhiṃ parisāya saggapuraṃ pūresi.

[03] satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā ``evaṃ upāsakā porāṇakapaṇḍitā anuppannepi buddhe evarūpaṃ nāma sampattiṃ pahāya uposathakammaṃ kariṃsuyevā''ti ^a^M7.0070^ea^ vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi. desanāpariyosāne upāsakā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. tadā mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni ahesuṃ, nesādabrāhmaṇo devadatto, somadatto ānando, ajamukhī uppalavaṇṇā, sudassano sāriputto, subhogo moggallāno, kāṇāriṭṭho sunakkhatto, bhūridatto pana ahameva sammāsambuddho ahosinti.

[03] ^b^rājāsi^eb^ ^a^V7.0066^ea^ ^a^M7.0071^ea^ ^b^luddakammo^eb^ti idaṃ satthā gijjhakūṭe viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi. tassa vatthu saṅghabhedakakkhandhake āgatameva. taṃ tassa pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya yāva bimbisārarañño maraṇā tatthāgatanayeneva veditabbaṃ. taṃ pana mārāpetvā devadatto ajātasattuṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``mahārāja, tava manoratho matthakaṃ patto, mama manoratho tāva na pāpuṇātī''ti āha. ``ko pana te, bhante, manoratho''ti? ``nanu dasabalaṃ māretvā buddho bhavissāmī''ti. ``amhehettha kiṃ kātabba''nti? ``mahārāja, dhanuggahe sannipātāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti. ``sādhu, bhante''ti rājā akkhaṇavedhīnaṃ dhanuggahānaṃ pañcasatāni sannipātāpetvā tato ekatiṃsa jane uccinitvā therassa santikaṃ pāhesi. so tesaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ āmantetvā ``āvuso samaṇo gotamo gijjhakūṭe viharati, asukasmiṃ nāma divāṭṭhāne caṅkamati. tvaṃ tattha gantvā taṃ visapītena sallena vijjhitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā asukena nāma maggena ehī''ti vatvā pesetvā tasmiṃ magge dve dhanuggahe ṭhapesi ``tumhākaṃ ṭhitamaggena eko puriso āgamissati, taṃ tumhe jīvitā voropetvā asukena nāma maggena ethā''ti, tasmiṃ magge cattāro purise ṭhapesi ``tumhākaṃ ṭhitamaggena dve purisā āgamissanti, tumhe te jīvitā voropetvā asukena nāma maggena ethā''ti, tasmiṃ magge aṭṭha jane ṭhapesi ``tumhākaṃ ṭhitamaggena cattāro puriso āgamissanti, tumhe te jīvitā voropetvā asukena nāma maggena ethā''ti, tasmiṃ magge soḷasa purise ṭhapesi ``tumhākaṃ ṭhitamaggena aṭṭha purisā āgamissanti, tumhe te jīvitā voropetvā asukena nāma maggena ethā''ti.

[03] kasmā panesa evamakāsīti? attano kammassa paṭicchādanatthaṃ. atha so jeṭṭhakadhanuggaho vāmato khaggaṃ laggetvā piṭṭhiyā tuṇīraṃ bandhitvā meṇḍasiṅgamahādhanuṃ gahetvā tathāgatassa santikaṃ gantvā ``vijjhissāmi na''nti saññāya dhanuṃ āropetvā saraṃ sannayhitvā ^a^M7.0072^ea^ ākaḍḍhitvā vissajjetuṃ nāsakkhi. so saraṃ oropetumpi asakkonto phāsukā bhijjantiyo viya mukhato kheḷena paggharantena kilantarūpo ahosi, sakalasarīraṃ thaddhaṃ jātaṃ, yantena pīḷitākārappattaṃ viya ahosi. so maraṇabhayatajjito aṭṭhāsi. atha naṃ satthā disvā ^a^V7.0067^ea^ madhurassaraṃ nicchāretvā etadavoca ``mā bhāyi bho, purisa, ito ehī''ti. so tasmiṃ khaṇe āvudhāni chaḍḍetvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā ``accayo maṃ, bhante, accagamā yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ, svāhaṃ tumhākaṃ guṇe ajānanto andhabālassa devadattassa vacanena tumhe jīvitā voropetuṃ āgatomhi, khamatha me, bhante''ti khamāpetvā ekamante nisīdi. atha naṃ satthā dhammaṃ desento saccāni pakāsetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā ``āvuso, devadattena ācikkhitamaggaṃ appaṭipajjitvā aññena maggena yāhī''ti uyyojesi. uyyojetvā ca pana caṅkamā oruyha aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.

[03] atha tasmiṃ dhanuggahe anāgacchante itare dve janā ``kiṃ nu kho so cirāyatī''ti paṭimaggena gacchantā dasabalaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. satthā tesampi dhammaṃ desetvā saccāni pakāsetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā ``āvuso, devadattena kathitamaggaṃ appaṭipajjitvā iminā maggena gacchathā''ti uyyojesi. iminā upāyena itaresupi āgantvā nisinnesu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā aññena maggena uyyojesi. atha so paṭhamamāgato jeṭṭhakadhanuggaho devadattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``bhante, devadatta ahaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ, mahiddhiko so bhagavā mahānubhāvo''ti ārocesi. te sabbepi ``sammāsambuddhaṃ nissāya amhehi jīvitaṃ laddha''nti satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. ayaṃ pavatti bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭā ahosi. bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ ``āvuso devadatto kira ekasmiṃ tathāgate veracittena bahū jane jīvitā voropetuṃ vāyāmamakāsi, te sabbepi satthāraṃ nissāya jīvitaṃ labhiṃsū''ti. satthā āgantvā ``kāya ^a^M7.0073^ea^ nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā''ti pucchitvā ``imāya nāmā''ti vutte ``na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi devadatto maṃ ekakaṃ nissāya mayi veracittena bahū jane jīvitā voropetuṃ vāyāmaṃ akāsiyevā''ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.

[03] atīte ayaṃ bārāṇasī pupphavatī nāma ahosi. tattha vasavattirañño putto ekarājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi, tassa putto candakumāro nāma oparajjaṃ kāresi. khaṇḍahālo nāma brāhmaṇo purohito ahosi. so rañño atthañca dhammañca anusāsi. taṃ kira rājā ``paṇḍito''ti vinicchaye nisīdāpesi. so lañjavittako hutvā lañjaṃ gahetvā asāmike sāmike karoti, sāmike ca asāmike. athekadivasaṃ eko aḍḍaparājito puriso vinicchayaṭṭhānā upakkosento nikkhamitvā rājupaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchantaṃ candakumāraṃ disvā dhāvitvā tassa pādesu nipatitvā rodi. so ``kiṃ, bho purisa, rodasī''ti āha. ``sāmi, khaṇḍahālo ^a^V7.0068^ea^ vinicchaye vilopaṃ khādati, ahaṃ tena lañjaṃ gahetvā parājayaṃ pāpito''ti. candakumāro ``mā bhāyī''ti taṃ assāsetvā vinicchayaṃ netvā sāmikameva sāmikaṃ, asāmikameva asāmikaṃ akāsi. mahājano mahāsaddena sādhukāramadāsi. rājā taṃ sutvā ``kiṃsaddo eso''ti pucchi. ``candakumārena kira aḍḍo suvinicchito, tattheso sādhukārasaddo''ti. taṃ sutvā rājā tussi. kumāro āgantvā taṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. atha naṃ rājā ``tāta, eko kira te aḍḍo vinicchito''ti āha. ``āma, devā''ti. ``tena hi, tāta, ito paṭṭhāya tvameva vinicchayaṃ paṭṭhapehī''ti vinicchayaṃ kumārassa adāsi.

[03] tato paṭṭhāya khaṇḍahālassa āyo pacchijji. so tato paṭṭhāya kumāre āghātaṃ bandhitvā okāsaṃ gavesanto antarāpekkho vicari. so pana rājā mandapañño. so ekadivasaṃ rattibhāge supitvā paccūsasamaye supinante alaṅkatadvārakoṭṭhakaṃ, sattaratanamayapākāraṃ, saṭṭhiyojanikasuvaṇṇamayavālukamahāvīthiṃ, yojanasahassubbedhavejayantapāsādapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nandanavanādivanarāmaṇeyyakanandāpokkharaṇiādipokkharaṇirāmaṇeyyakasamannāgataṃ ākiṇṇadevagaṇaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ disvā ^a^M7.0074^ea^ pabujjhitvā tattha gantukāmo cintesi -- ``sve ācariyakhaṇḍahālassāgamanavelāya devalokagāmimaggaṃ pucchitvā tena desitamaggena devalokaṃ gamissāmī''ti khaṇḍahālopi pātova nhatvā bhuñjitvā rājupaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā rājanivesanaṃ pavisitvā rañño sukhaseyyaṃ pucchi. athassa rājā āsanaṃ dāpetvā pañhaṃ pucchi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] so pucchi brahmabandhuṃ, khaṇḍahālaṃ purohitaṃ mūḷhaṃ..
[22] yathā ito vajanti sugatiṃ, narā puññāni katvānā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^rājāsī^eb^ti rājā āsi. ^b^luddakammo^eb^ti kakkhaḷapharusakammo. ^b^saggāna magga^eb^nti saggānaṃ gamanamaggaṃ. ^b^dhammavinayakusalo^eb^ti sucaritadhamme ca ācāravinaye ca kusalo. ^b^yathā^eb^ti yathā narā puññāni katvā ito sugatiṃ gacchanti, taṃ me sugatimaggaṃ ācikkhāhīti pucchi.

[03] imaṃ ^a^V7.0069^ea^ pana pañhaṃ sabbaññubuddhaṃ vā tassa sāvake vā tesaṃ alābhena bodhisattaṃ vā pucchituṃ vaṭṭati. rājā pana yathā nāma sattāhaṃ maggamūḷho puriso aññaṃ māsamattaṃ maggamūḷhaṃ maggaṃ puccheyya, evaṃ khaṇḍahālaṃ pucchi. so cintesi ``ayaṃ me paccāmittassa piṭṭhidassanakālo, idāni candakumāraṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā mama manorathaṃ pūressāmī''ti. atha rājānaṃ āmantetvā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] evaṃ vajanti sugatiṃ, narā puññāni katvānā''ti..
[03] tassattho -- mahārāja saggaṃ gacchantā nāma atidānaṃ dadanti, avajjhe ghātenti. sacepi saggaṃ gantukāmosi, tvampi tatheva karohīti.
[03] atha naṃ rājā pañhassa atthaṃ pucchi --
[21] ``kiṃ pana taṃ atidānaṃ, ke ca avajjhā imasmi lokasmiṃ.
[22] etañca kho no akkhāhi, yajissāmi dadāmi dānānī''ti..
[22] usabhehi ājāniyehi catūhi, sabbacatukkena deva yajitabba''nti..
[03] rañño pañhaṃ byākaronto ca devalokamaggaṃ puṭṭho nirayamaggaṃ byākāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^puttehī^eb^ti attanā jātehi piyaputtehi ceva piyadhītāhi ca. ^b^mahesīhī^eb^ti piyabhariyāhi. ^b^negamehī^eb^ti seṭṭhīhi. ^b^usabhehī^eb^ti sabbasetehi usabharājūhi. ^b^ājāniyehī^eb^ti maṅgalāssehi. ^b^catūhī^eb^ti etehi sabbeheva aññehi ca hatthiādīhi catūhi catūhīti evaṃ sabbacatukkena, deva, yajitabbaṃ. etesañhi khaggena sīsaṃ chinditvā suvaṇṇapātiyā galalohitaṃ gahetvā āvāṭe pakkhipitvā yaññassa yajanakarājāno sarīrena saha devalokaṃ gacchanti. mahārāja, samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ ghāsacchādanādisampadānaṃ dānameva ^a^V7.0070^ea^ pavattati. ime pana puttadhītādayo māretvā tesaṃ galalohitena yaññassa yajanaṃ atidānaṃ nāmāti rājānaṃ saññāpesi.

[03] iti so ``sace candakumāraṃ ekaññeva gaṇhissāmi, veracittena karaṇaṃ maññissantī''ti taṃ mahājanassa antare pakkhipi. idaṃ pana tesaṃ kathentānaṃ kathaṃ sutvā sabbe antepurajanā bhītatasitā saṃviggamānahadayā ekappahāreneva mahāravaṃ raviṃsu. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``taṃ sutvā antepure, kumārā mahesiyo ca haññantu.
[22] eko ahosi nigghoso, bhikkhā accuggato saddo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ta^eb^nti ``kumārā ca mahesiyo ca haññantū''ti taṃ saddaṃ sutvā ^b^eko^eb^ti sakalarājanivesane ekova nigghoso ahosi. ^b^bhismā^eb^ti bhayānako. ^b^accuggato^eb^ti atiuggato ahosi, sakalarājakulaṃ yugantavātappahaṭaṃ viya sālavanaṃ ahosi.

[03] brāhmaṇo rājānaṃ āha -- ``kiṃ pana, mahārāja, yaññaṃ yajituṃ sakkosi, na sakkosī''ti? ``kiṃ kathesi, ācariya, yaññaṃ yajitvā devalokaṃ ^a^M7.0076^ea^ gamissāmī''ti. ``mahārāja, bhīrukā dubbalajjhāsayā yaññaṃ yajituṃ samatthā nāma na honti, tumhe idha sabbe sannipātetha, ahaṃ yaññāvāṭe kammaṃ karissāmī''ti attano pahonakaṃ balakāyaṃ gahetvā nagarā nikkhamma yaññāvāṭaṃ samatalaṃ kāretvā vatiyā parikkhipi. kasmā? dhammiko hi samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā āgantvā nivāreyyāti yaññāvāṭe vatiyā parikkhepanaṃ nāma cārittanti katvā porāṇakabrāhmaṇehi ṭhapitaṃ. rājāpi purise pakkosāpetvā ``tātā, ahaṃ attano puttadhītaro ca bhariyāyo ca māretvā yaññaṃ yajitvā devalokaṃ gamissāmi, gacchatha nesaṃ ācikkhitvā sabbe idhānethā''ti puttānaṃ tāva ānayanatthāya āha --
[22] sūrañca vāmagottañca, pacurā kira hotha yaññatthāyā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^gacchatha vadetha kumāre^eb^ti candakumāro ca sūriyakumāro cāti dve gotamideviyā aggamahesiyā ^a^V7.0071^ea^ puttā, bhaddaseno ca sūro ca vāmagotto ca tesaṃ vemātikabhātaro. ^b^pacurā kira hothā^eb^ti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne rāsī hothāti ācikkhathāti attho.

[03] te paṭhamaṃ candakumārassa santikaṃ gantvā āhaṃsu ``kumāra, tumhe kira māretvā tumhākaṃ pitā devalokaṃ gantukāmo, tumhākaṃ gaṇhanatthāya amhe pesesī''ti. ``kassa vacanena maṃ gaṇhāpesī''ti? ``khaṇḍahālassa, devā''ti. ``kiṃ so maññeva gaṇhāpeti, udāhu aññepī''ti. ``rājaputta, aññepi gaṇhāpeti, sabbacatukkaṃ kira yaññaṃ yajitukāmo''ti. so cintesi ``tassa aññehi saddhiṃ veraṃ natthi, `vinicchaye vilopaṃ kātuṃ na labhāmī'ti pana mayi ekasmiṃ veracittena bahū mārāpeti, pitaraṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhantassa sabbesaṃ tesaṃ mocāpanaṃ nāma mama bhāro''ti. atha ne rājapurise āha ``tena hi me pitu vacanaṃ karothā''ti. te taṃ netvā rājaṅgaṇe ekamante ṭhapetvā itarepi tayo āmantetvā tasseva santike katvā rañño ārocayiṃsu ``ānītā te, deva, puttā''ti. so tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ``tātā, idāni me dhītaro ānetvā ^a^M7.0077^ea^ tesaññeva bhātikānaṃ santike karothā''ti catasso dhītaro āharāpetuṃ itaraṃ gāthamāha --
[22] nandañcāpi kumāriṃ, pacurā kira hotha yaññatthāyā''ti..
[03] te ``evaṃ karissāmā''ti tāsaṃ santikaṃ gantvā tā rodamānā paridevamānā ānetvā bhātikānaññeva santike kariṃsu. tato rājā attano bhariyānaṃ gahaṇatthāya itaraṃ gāthamāha --
[03] tattha ^b^lakkhaṇavarūpapannā^eb^ti uttamehi catusaṭṭhiyā itthilakkhaṇehi upapannā etāpi vadethāti attho.
[03] te tāpi paridevamānā ānetvā kumārānaṃ santike kariṃsu. atha rājā cattāro seṭṭhino gahaṇatthāya āṇāpento itaraṃ gāthamāha --
[22] vaḍḍhañcāpi gahapatiṃ, pacurā kira hotha yaññatthāyā''ti..

[03] rājapurisā gantvā tepi ānayiṃsu. rañño puttadāre gayhamāne sakalanagaraṃ na kiñci avoca. seṭṭhikulāni pana mahāsambandhāni, tasmā tesaṃ gahitakāle sakalanagaraṃ saṅkhubhitvā ``rañño seṭṭhino māretvā yaññaṃ yajituṃ na dassāmā''ti seṭṭhino parivāretvāva tesaṃ ñātivaggena saddhiṃ rājakulaṃ agami. atha te seṭṭhino ñātigaṇaparivutā rājānaṃ vanditvā attano jīvitaṃ yāciṃsu. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] sabbeva sikhino deva karohi, atha vā no dāse sāvehī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0078^ea^ ^b^sabbeva sikhino^eb^ti sabbe amhe matthake cūḷaṃ bandhitvā attano ceṭake karohi, mayaṃ te ceṭakakiccaṃ karissāma. ^b^atha vā no dāse sāvehī^eb^ti atha vā no asaddahanto sabbaseniyo sannipātetvā rāsimajjhe amhe dāse sāvehi, mayaṃ te dāsattaṃ paṭissuṇissāmāti.
[03] te evaṃ yācantāpi jīvitaṃ laddhuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. rājapurisā sese paṭikkamāpetvā te gahetvā kumārānaññeva santike nisīdāpesuṃ. tato pana rājā hatthiādīnaṃ gahaṇatthāya āṇāpento āha --
[22] ānetha kho ne khippaṃ, yaññatthāya bhavissanti..
[22] ānetha kho ne khippaṃ, yaññatthāya bhavissanti..
[21] ``usabhampi yūthapatiṃ anojaṃ, nisabhaṃ gavampatiṃ tepi mayhaṃ ānetha.
[22] samūha karontu sabbaṃ, yajissāmi dadāmi dānāni..
[22] āṇāpetha ca kumāre, abhiramantu imaṃ rattiṃ..
[22] vadetha dāni kumāre, ajja kho pacchimā rattī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^samūha karontu sabba^eb^nti na kevalaṃ ettakameva, avasesampi catuppadagaṇañceva pakkhigaṇañca sabbaṃ catukkaṃ katvā rāsiṃ karontu, sabbacatukkaṃ yaññaṃ yajissāmi, yācakabrāhmaṇānañca dānaṃ dassāmīti. ^b^sabbaṃ paṭiyādethā^eb^ti evaṃ mayā vuttaṃ anavasesaṃ upaṭṭhapetha. ^b^uggatamhī^eb^ti ahaṃ pana yaññaṃ uggate sūriye sve pātova yajissāmi. ^b^sabbaṃ upaṭṭhapethā^eb^ti sesampi sabbaṃ yaññaupakaraṇaṃ upaṭṭhapethāti.

[03] rañño ^a^M7.0079^ea^ pana mātāpitaro dharantiyeva. athassa amaccā gantvā mātuyā ārocesuṃ ``ayye, putto vo puttadāraṃ māretvā yaññaṃ yajitukāmo''ti. sā ``kiṃ kathetha, tātā''ti hatthena hadayaṃ paharitvā rodamānā āgantvā ``saccaṃ kira evarūpo te yañño bhavissatī''ti pucchi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] yañño kira te putta, bhavissati catūhi puttehī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^taṃta^eb^nti taṃ etaṃ rājānaṃ. ^b^vimānato^eb^ti attano vasanaṭṭhānato.
[22] puttehi yaññaṃ yajitvāna, sugatiṃ saggaṃ gamissāmī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^cattā^eb^ti candakumāre haññamāneyeva sabbepi yaññatthāya mayā pariccattā.
[21] ``mā ^a^V7.0074^ea^ taṃ putta saddahesi, sugati kira hoti puttayaññena.
[22] nirayāneso maggo, neso maggo hi saggānaṃ..
[22] esa maggo sugatiyā, na ca maggo puttayaññenā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^nirayāneso^eb^ti nirassādatthena nirayānaṃ catunnaṃ apāyānaṃ esa maggo. ^b^koṇḍaññā^eb^ti rājānaṃ gottenālapati. ^b^bhūtabhabyāna^eb^nti bhūtānañca bhavitabbasattānañca. ^b^puttayaññenā^eb^ti evarūpena puttadhītaro māretvā yajakayaññena saggamaggo nāma natthīti.
[22] puttehi yaññaṃ yajitvāna duccajehi, sugatiṃ saggaṃ gamissāmī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0080^ea^ ^b^ācariyānaṃ vacana^eb^nti amma, nesā mama attano mati, ācārasikkhāpanakassa pana me khaṇḍahālācariyassa etaṃ vacanaṃ, esā anusiṭṭhi. tasmā ahaṃ ete ghātessaṃ, duccajehi puttehi yaññaṃ yajitvā saggaṃ gamissāmīti.
[03] athassa mātā attano vacanaṃ gāhāpetuṃ asakkontī apagatā. pitā taṃ pavattiṃ pucchi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``taṃtaṃ pitāpi avaca, vasavattī orasaṃ sakaṃ puttaṃ.
[22] yañño kira te putta, bhavissati catūhi puttehī''ti..
[22] puttehi yaññaṃ yajitvāna, sugatiṃ saggaṃ gamissāmī''ti..
[21] ``mā taṃ putta saddahesi, sugati kira hoti puttayaññena.
[22] nirayāneso maggo, neso maggo hi saggānaṃ..
[22] esa maggo sugatiyā, na ca maggo puttayaññenā''ti..
[22] puttehi yaññaṃ yajitvāna duccajehi, sugatiṃ saggaṃ gamissāmī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^puttaparivuto^eb^ti puttehi parivuto. ^b^raṭṭhaṃ janapadañcā^eb^ti sakalakāsiraṭṭhañca tasseva taṃ taṃ koṭṭhāsabhūtaṃ janapadañca.

[03] sopi ^a^M7.0081^ea^ taṃ attano vacanaṃ gāhāpetuṃ nāsakkhi. tato candakumāro cintesi ``imassa ettakassa janassa dukkhaṃ maṃ ekaṃ nissāya uppannaṃ, mama pitaraṃ yācitvā ettakaṃ janaṃ maraṇadukkhato mocessāmī''ti. so pitarā saddhiṃ sallapanto āha --
[21] ``mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa.
[22] api nigaḷabandhakāpi, hatthī asse ca pālema..
[21] ``mā ^a^V7.0076^ea^ no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa.
[21] ``mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa.
[21] ``mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa.
[27] yassa honti tava kāmā, api raṭṭhā pabbājitā.

[03] tattha ^b^api nigaḷabandhakāpī^eb^ti api nāma mayaṃ mahānigaḷehi bandhakāpi hutvā. ^b^yassa honti tava kāmā^eb^ti sacepi khaṇḍahālassa dātukāmosi, tassa no dāse katvā dehi, karissāmassa dāsakammanti vadati. ^b^api raṭṭhā^eb^ti sace amhākaṃ koci doso atthi, raṭṭhā no pabbājehi. api nāma raṭṭhā pabbājitāpi kapaṇā viya kapālaṃ gahetvā bhikkhācariyaṃ carissāma, mā no avadhi, dehi no jīvitanti vilapi.
[03] tassa taṃ nānappakāraṃ vilāpaṃ sutvā rājā hadayaphalitappatto viya assupuṇṇehi nettehi rodamāno ``na me koci putte māretuṃ lacchati, na mamattho devalokenā''ti sabbe te mocetuṃ āha --
[21] ``dukkhaṃ kho me janayatha, vilapantā jīvitassa kāmā hi.
[22] muñcetha dāni kumāre, alampi me hotu puttayaññenā''ti..

[03] taṃ rañño kathaṃ sutvā rājaputte ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ taṃ pakkhipariyosānaṃ pāṇagaṇaṃ vissajjesuṃ. khaṇḍahālopi yaññāvāṭe kammaṃ saṃvidahati. atha naṃ eko puriso ``are duṭṭha, khaṇḍahāla, raññā puttā ^a^M7.0082^ea^ vissajjitā, tvaṃ attano putte māretvā tesaṃ galalohitena yaññaṃ yajassū''ti āha. so ``kiṃ nāma raññā kata''nti kappuṭṭhānaggi viya avattharanto uṭṭhāya turito dhāvitvā āha --
[22] atha no upakkhaṭassa yaññassa, kasmā karosi vikkhepaṃ..
[21] ``sabbe vajanti sugatiṃ, ye yajanti yepi yājenti.
[22] ye cāpi anumodanti, yajantānaṃ edisaṃ mahāyañña''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^pubbevā^eb^ti mayā tvaṃ pubbeva vutto ``na tumhādisena bhīrukajātikena sakkā yaññaṃ yajituṃ, yaññayajanaṃ nāmetaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhava''nti, atha no idāni upakkhaṭassa paṭiyattassa yaññassa vikkhepaṃ karosi. ``vikkhambha''ntipi pāṭho, paṭisedhanti attho. mahārāja, kasmā evaṃ karosi. yattakā hi yaññaṃ yajanti vā yājenti vā anumodanti vā, sabbe sugatimeva vajantīti dasseti.
[03] so andhabālo rājā tassa kodhavasikassa kathaṃ gahetvā dhammasaññī hutvā puna putte gaṇhāpesi. tato candakumāro pitaraṃ anubodhayamāno āha --
[21] ``atha kissa jano pubbe, sotthānaṃ brāhmaṇe avācesi.
[22] atha no akāraṇasmā, yaññatthāya deva ghātesi..
[21] ``pubbeva no daharakāle, na hanesi na ghātesi.
[22] daharamhā yobbanaṃ pattā, adūsakā tāta haññāma..
[22] yuddhe vā yujjhamāne vā, na hi mādisā sūrā honti yaññatthāya..
[21] ``paccante vāpi kupite, aṭavīsu vā mādise niyojenti.
[22] atha no akāraṇasmā, abhūmiyaṃ tāta haññāma..
[21] ``yāpi ^a^M7.0083^ea^ hi tā sakuṇiyo, vasanti tiṇagharāni katvāna.
[22] tāsampi piyā puttā, atha no tvaṃ deva ghātesi..
[21] ``mā ^a^V7.0078^ea^ tassa saddahesi, na maṃ khaṇḍahālo ghāteyya.
[22] mamañhi so ghātetvāna, anantarā tampi deva ghāteyya..
[21] ``mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa.
[22] api nigaḷabandhakāpi, hatthī asse ca pālema..
[21] ``mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa.
[21] ``mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa.
[21] ``mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa.
[27] yassa honti tava kāmā, api raṭṭhā pabbājitā.

[03] tattha ^b^pubbe^eb^ti tāta, yadi ahaṃ māretabbo, atha kasmā amhākaṃ ñātijano pubbe mama jātakāle brāhmaṇe sotthānaṃ avācesi. tadā kira khaṇḍahālova mama lakkhaṇāni upadhāretvā ``imassa kumārassa na koci antarāyo bhavissati, tumhākaṃ accayena rajjaṃ kāressatī''ti āha. iccassa purimena pacchimaṃ na sameti, musāvādī esa. atha no etassa vacanaṃ gahetvā akāraṇasmā nikkāraṇāyeva yaññatthāya, deva, ghātesi. mā amhe ghātesi. ayañhi mayi ekasmiṃ verena mahājanaṃ māretukāmo, sādhukaṃ sallakkhehi narindāti. ^b^pubbeva no^eb^ti mahārāja, sacepi amhe māretukāmo, pubbeva no kasmā sayaṃ ^a^M7.0084^ea^ vā na hanesi, aññehi vā na ^a^V7.0079^ea^ ghātāpesi. idāni pana mayaṃ daharamhā taruṇā, paṭhamavaye ṭhitā puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhāma, evaṃbhūtā tava adūsakāva kiṃkāraṇā haññāmāti?

[03] ^b^passa no^eb^ti amheva cattāro bhātike passa. ^b^yujjhamāne^eb^ti paccatthikānaṃ nagaraṃ parivāretvā ṭhitakāle amhādise putte tehi saddhiṃ yujjhamāne passa. aputtakā hi rājāno anāthā nāma honti. ^b^mādisā^eb^ti amhādisā sūrā balavanto na yaññatthāya māretabbā honti. ^b^niyojentī^eb^ti tesaṃ paccāmittānaṃ gaṇhanatthāya payojenti. ^b^atha no^eb^ti atha amhe akāraṇasmā akāraṇena abhūmiyaṃ anokāseyeva kasmā, tāta, haññāmāti attho. ^b^mā tassa saddahesī^eb^ti mahārāja, na maṃ khaṇḍahālo ghātaye, mā tassa saddaheyyāsi. ^b^bhogampissā^eb^ti bhogampi assa brāhmaṇassa rājāno denti. ^b^athaggapiṇḍikāpī^eb^ti atha te aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ labhantā aggapiṇḍikāpi honti. ^b^tesampī^eb^ti yesaṃ kule bhuñjanti, tesampi evarūpānaṃ piṇḍadāyakānaṃ dubbhituṃ icchanti.
[21] ``dukkhaṃ kho me janayatha, vilapantā jīvitassa kāmā hi.
[22] muñcetha dāni kumāre, alampi me hotu puttayaññenā''ti.. --
[25] imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā punapi mocesi. khaṇḍahālo āgantvā punapi --
[22] atha no upakkhaṭassa yaññassa, kasmā karosi vikkhepaṃ..
[21] ``sabbe vajanti sugatiṃ, ye yajanti yepi yājenti.
[22] ye cāpi anumodanti, yajantānaṃ edisaṃ mahāyañña''nti.. --
[25] evaṃ vatvā puna gaṇhāpesi. athassa anunayanatthaṃ kumāro āha --
[21] ``yadi kira yajitvā puttehi, devalokaṃ ito cutā yanti.
[22] brāhmaṇo tāva yajatu, pacchāpi yajasi tuvaṃ rāja..
[21] ``yadi ^a^V7.0080^ea^ ^a^M7.0085^ea^ kira yajitvā puttehi, devalokaṃ ito cutā yanti.
[21] ``evaṃ jānanto khaṇḍahālo, kiṃ puttake na ghātesi.
[21] ``sabbe vajanti nirayaṃ, ye yajanti yepi yājenti.
[22] ye cāpi anumodanti, yajantānaṃ edisaṃ mahāyaññaṃ..
[21] ``sace hi so sujjhati yo hanāti, hatopi so saggamupeti ṭhānaṃ.
[22] bhovādi bhovādina mārayeyyuṃ, ye cāpi tesaṃ abhisaddaheyyu''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^brāhmaṇo tāvā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ tāva khaṇḍahālo yajatu sakehi puttehi, atha tasmiṃ evaṃ yajitvā devalokaṃ gate pacchā tvaṃ yajissasi. deva, sādurasabhojanampi hi tvaṃ aññehi vīmaṃsāpetvā bhuñjasi, puttadāramāraṇaṃyeva kasmā avīmaṃsitvā karosīti dīpento evamāha. ^b^evaṃ jānanto^eb^ti ``puttadhītaro māretvā devalokaṃ gacchatī''ti evaṃ jānanto kiṃkāraṇā attano putte ca ñātī ca attānañca na ghātesi. sace hi paraṃ māretvā devalokaṃ gacchanti, attānaṃ māretvā brahmalokaṃ gantabbo bhavissati. evaṃ yaññaguṇaṃ jānantena paraṃ amāretvā attāva māretabbo siyā. ayaṃ pana tathā akatvā maṃ mārāpeti. imināpi kāraṇena jānāhi, mahārāja ``yathā esa vinicchaye vilopaṃ kātuṃ alabhanto evaṃ karotī''ti. ^b^edisa^eb^nti evarūpaṃ puttaghātayaññaṃ.
[03] kumāro ettakaṃ kathentopi pitaraṃ attano vacanaṃ gāhāpetuṃ asakkonto rājānaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitaṃ parisaṃ ārabbha āha --
[22] nagaramhi na uparavanti rājānaṃ, mā ghātayi orasaṃ puttaṃ..
[22] nagaramhi na uparavanti rājānaṃ, mā ghātayi atrajaṃ puttaṃ..
[22] na koci assa paṭighaṃ, mayā jānapado na pavedetī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^puttakāmāyo^eb^ti gharaṇiyo sandhāya vuttaṃ. gahapatayo pana puttakāmā nāma honti. ^b^na uparavantī^eb^ti na upakkosanti na vadanti. ^b^atraja^eb^nti attato jātaṃ. evaṃ vuttepi koci raññā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi. ^b^na koci assa paṭighaṃ mayā^eb^ti iminā no lañjo vā gahito, issariyamadena vā idaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ katanti koci ekopi mayā saddhiṃ paṭighaṃ kattā nāma nāhosi. ^b^jānapado na pavedetī^eb^ti evaṃ rañño ca janapadassa ca atthakāmassa mama pitaraṃ ayaṃ jānapado ``guṇasampanno te putto''ti na pavedeti, na jānāpetīti attho.
[03] evaṃ vuttepi koci kiñci na kathesi. tato candakumāro attano bhariyāyo taṃ yācanatthāya uyyojento āha --
[03] tā gantvā yāciṃsu. tāpi rājā na olokesi. tato kumāro anātho hutvā vilapanto --
[22] na hajja maṃ rāja yaññe ghāteyyā''ti.. --
[25] vatvā puna tā bhariyāyo uyyojento āha --
[22] pādesu nipatatha, kinte bhante mayaṃ adūsemā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^aparādhāhaṃ na passāmī^eb^ti ahaṃ ācariyakhaṇḍahāle attano aparādhaṃ na passāmi. ^b^kinte bhante^eb^ti ayya khaṇḍahāla, mayaṃ tuyhaṃ kiṃ dūsayimhā, atha candakumārassa doso atthi, taṃ khamathāti vadethāti.
[03] atha candakumārassa kaniṭṭhabhaginī selakumārī nāma sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontī pitu pādamūle patitvā paridevi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] yañño kira me ukkhipito, tātena saggakāmenā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^upanītatte^eb^ti upanītasabhāve. ^b^ukkhipito^eb^ti ukkhitto. ^b^saggakāmeno^eb^ti mama bhātaro māretvā saggaṃ icchantena. tāta, ime māretvā kiṃ saggena karissasīti vilapati.

[03] rājā tassāpi kathaṃ na gaṇhi. tato candakumārassa putto vasulo nāma pitaraṃ dukkhitaṃ disvā ``ahaṃ ayyakaṃ yācitvā mama pitu jīvitaṃ dāpessāmī''ti rañño pādamūle paridevi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] mā no pitaraṃ avadhi, daharamhāyobbanaṃ pattā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^daharamhāyobbanaṃ pattā^eb^ti deva, mayaṃ taruṇadārakā, na tāva yobbanappattā, amhesupi tāva anukampāya amhākaṃ pitaraṃ mā avadhīti.
[03] rājā tassa paridevitaṃ sutvā bhijjamānahadayo viya hutvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi kumāraṃ āliṅgitvā ``tāta, assāsaṃ paṭilabha, vissajjemi te pitara''nti vatvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``eso ^a^V7.0083^ea^ te vasula pitā, samehi pitarā saha.
[27] dukkhaṃ kho me janayasi, vilapanto antepurasmiṃ.
[22] muñcetha dāni kumāre, alampi me hotu puttayaññenā''ti..
[22] atha no upakkhaṭassa yaññassa, kasmā karosi vikkhepaṃ..
[21] ``sabbe vajanti sugatiṃ, ye yajanti yepi yājenti.
[22] ye cāpi anumodanti, yajantānaṃ edisaṃ mahāyañña''nti..

[03] rājā pana andhabālo puna tassa vacanena putte gaṇhāpesi. tato khaṇḍahālo cintesi -- ``ayaṃ rājā muducitto kālena gaṇhāpeti, kālena vissajjeti, punapi dārakānaṃ vacanena putte vissajjeyya, yaññāvāṭaññeva naṃ nemī''ti. athassa tattha gamanatthāya gāthamāha --
[22] abhinikkhamassu deva, saggaṃ gato tvaṃ pamodissasī''ti..
[03] tassattho -- mahārāja, tava yañño sabbaratanehi upakkhaṭo paṭiyatto, idāni te abhinikkhamanakālo, tasmā abhinikkhama, yaññaṃ yajitvā saggaṃ gato pamodissasīti.
[03] tato bodhisattaṃ ādāya yaññāvāṭagamanakāle tassa orodhā ekatova nikkhamiṃsu. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``aparā ^a^V7.0084^ea^ pana sokena, nikkhantā nandane viya devā.
[03] tattha ^b^nandane viya devā^eb^ti nandanavane cavanadevaputtaṃ parivāretvā nikkhantadevatā viya gatā.

[03] tattha ^b^kāsikasucivatthadharā^eb^ti kāsikāni sucivatthāni dhārayamānā. ^b^candasūriyā^eb^ti candakumāro ca sūriyakumāro ca. ^b^nhāpakasunhāpitā^eb^ti candanacuṇṇena ^a^M7.0090^ea^ ubbaṭṭetvā nhāpakehi kataparikammatāya sunhāpitā. ^b^yassū^eb^ti ye assu. ^b^assū^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, ye kumāreti attho. ^b^pubbe^eb^ti ito pubbe. ^b^hatthivaradhuragate^eb^ti hatthivarānaṃ dhuragate, alaṅkatahatthikkhandhavaragateti attho. ^b^assavaradhuragate^eb^ti assavarapiṭṭhigate. ^b^rathavaradhuragate^eb^ti rathavaramajjhagate. ^b^niyyaṃsū^eb^ti nikkhamiṃsu.

[03] evaṃ tāsu paridevantīsuyeva bodhisattaṃ nagarā nīhariṃsu. sakalanagaraṃ saṅkhubhitvā nikkhamituṃ ārabhi. mahājane nikkhante dvārāni nappahonti. brāhmaṇo atibahuṃ janaṃ disvā ``ko jānāti, kiṃ bhavissatī''ti nagaradvārāni thakāpesi. mahājano nikkhamituṃ alabhanto nagaradvārassa āsannaṭṭhāne uyyānaṃ atthi, tassa santike mahāviravaṃ ravi. tena ravena sakuṇasaṅgho saṅkhubhito ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. mahājano taṃ taṃ sakuṇiṃ āmantetvā vilapanto āha --

[03] tattha ^b^maṃsamicchasī^eb^ti ambho sakuṇi, sace maṃsaṃ icchasi, pupphavatiyā pubbena puratthimadisāyaṃ yaññāvāṭo atthi, tattha gaccha. ^b^yajatetthā^eb^ti ettha khaṇḍahālassa vacanaṃ gahetvā sammūḷho ekarājā catūhi puttehi yaññaṃ yajati. sesagāthāsupi eseva nayo.
[03] evaṃ mahājano tasmiṃ ṭhāne paridevitvā bodhisattassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā pāsādaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto antepure kūṭāgārauyyānādīni passanto gāthāhi paridevi --
[27] nāvā ca sovaṇṇavikatā, pupphavalliyā cittā suramaṇīyā.
[03] tattha ^a^M7.0092^ea^ ^b^tedānī^eb^ti idāni te candakumārappamukhā amhākaṃ ayyaputtā evarūpaṃ pāsādaṃ chaḍḍetvā vadhāya nīyanti. ^b^sovaṇṇavikatā^eb^ti suvaṇṇakhacitā.
[03] ettakesu ṭhānesu vilapantā puna hatthisālādīni upasaṅkamitvā āhaṃsu --
[27] yatthassu ayyaputtā, sobhiṃsu nandane viya devā.
[22] rājā yajissate yaññaṃ, sammūḷho catūhi puttehi..
[22] rājā yajissate yaññaṃ, sammūḷho catūhi kaññāhi..
[22] rājā yajissate yaññaṃ, sammūḷho catūhi mahesīhi..
[22] rājā yajissate yaññaṃ, sammūḷho catūhi gahapatīhi..

[03] tattha ^b^erāvaṇo^eb^ti tassa hatthino nāmaṃ. ^b^ekakhuro^eb^ti abhinnakhuro. ^b^sāḷiyanigghoso^eb^ti gamanakāle sāḷikānaṃ viya madhurena nigghosena ^a^M7.0093^ea^ samannāgato. ^b^kathaṃ nāmā^eb^ti kena nāma kāraṇena. ^b^sāmasamasundarehī^eb^ti suvaṇṇasāmehi ca aññamaññaṃ jātiyā samehi ca niddosatāya sundarehi. ^b^candanamudukagattehī^eb^ti lohitacandanalittagattehi. ^b^brahāraññā^eb^ti yathā te gāmanigamā suññā nimmanussā brahāraññā honti, tathā pupphavatiyāpi yaññe yiṭṭhesu rājaputtesu suññā araññasadisā bhavissatīti.

[03] atha mahājano bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhanto antonagareyeva vicaranto paridevi. bodhisattopi yaññāvāṭaṃ nīto. athassa mātā gotamī nāma devī ``puttānaṃ me jīvitaṃ dehi, devā''ti rañño pādamūle parivattitvā paridevamānā āha --
[22] sace candavaraṃ hanti, pāṇā me deva rujjhanti..
[22] sace sūriyavaraṃ hanti, pāṇā me deva rujjhantī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^bhūnahatā^eb^ti hatavuḍḍhi. ^b^paṃsunā ca parikiṇṇā^eb^ti paṃsuparikiṇṇasarīrā ummattikā hutvā vicarissāmi.

[03] sā evaṃ paridevantīpi rañño santikā kiñci kathaṃ alabhitvā ``mama putto tumhākaṃ kujjhitvā gato bhavissati, kissa naṃ tumhe na nivattethā''ti kumārassa catasso bhariyāyo āliṅgitvā paridevantī āha --
[27] ghaṭṭikā uparikkhī ca, pokkharaṇī ca bhārikā.
[22] candasūriyesu naccantiyo, samā tāsaṃ na vijjatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^kinnumā na ramāpeyyu^eb^nti kena kāraṇena imā ghaṭṭikātiādikā catasso aññamaññaṃ piyaṃvadā candasūriyakumārānaṃ santike ^a^M7.0094^ea^ naccantiyo mama putte na ramāpayiṃsu, ukkaṇṭhāpayiṃsu. sakalajambudīpasmiñhi nacce vā gīte vā samā aññā kāci tāsaṃ na vijjatīti attho.
[03] iti sā suṇhāhi saddhiṃ paridevitvā aññaṃ gahetabbaggahaṇaṃ apassantī khaṇḍahālaṃ akkosamānā aṭṭha gāthā abhāsi --
[21] ``imaṃ mayhaṃ hadayasokaṃ, paṭimuñcatu khaṇḍahāla tava mātā.
[22] yo mayhaṃ hadayasoko, candamhi vadhāya ninnīte..
[21] ``imaṃ mayhaṃ hadayasokaṃ, paṭimuñcatu khaṇḍahāla tava mātā.
[22] yo mayhaṃ hadayasoko, sūriyamhi vadhāya ninnīte..
[21] ``imaṃ mayhaṃ hadayasokaṃ, paṭimuñcatu khaṇḍahāla tava jāyā.
[22] yo mayhaṃ hadayasoko, candamhi vadhāya ninnīte..
[21] ``imaṃ ^a^V7.0090^ea^ mayhaṃ hadayasokaṃ, paṭimuñcatu khaṇḍahāla tava jāyā.
[22] yo mayhaṃ hadayasoko, sūriyamhi vadhāya ninnīte..
[21] ``mā ca putte mā ca patiṃ, addakkhi khaṇḍahāla tava mātā.
[21] ``mā ca putte mā ca patiṃ, addakkhi khaṇḍahāla tava mātā.
[21] ``mā ca putte mā ca patiṃ, addakkhi khaṇḍahāla tava jāyā.
[21] ``mā ca putte mā ca patiṃ, addakkhi khaṇḍahāla tava jāyā.

[03] tattha ^b^imaṃ mayha^eb^nti mayhaṃ imaṃ hadayasokaṃ dukkhaṃ. ^b^paṭimuñcatū^eb^ti pavisatu pāpuṇātu. ^b^yo ghātesī^eb^ti yo tvaṃ ghātesi. ^b^apekkhite^eb^ti sabbalokena olokite dissamāne māresīti attho.
[21] ``mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa.
[22] api nigaḷabandhakāpi, hatthī asse ca pālema..
[21] ``mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa.
[21] ``mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa.
[21] ``mā ^a^V7.0091^ea^ no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa.
[27] yassa honti tava kāmā, api raṭṭhā pabbājitā.
[22] paṭibhānānipi hitvā, putte na labhanti ekaccā..
[21] ``āsīsikāni karonti, puttā no jāyantu tato paputtā.
[22] atha no akāraṇasmā, yaññatthāya deva ghātesi..
[21] ``upayācitakena puttaṃ labhanti, mā tāta no aghātesi.
[22] mā kicchāladdhakehi puttehi, yajittho imaṃ yaññaṃ..
[21] ``upayācitakena puttaṃ labhanti, mā tāta no aghātesi.
[22] mā kapaṇaladdhakehi puttehi, ammāya no vippavāsehī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^dibba^eb^nti deva, aputtikā daliddāpi nāriyo puttatthikā hutvā bahuṃ paṇṇākāraṃ karitvā puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā labhāmāti dibyaṃ upayācanti. ^b^paṭibhānānipi hitvā^eb^ti dohaḷāni chaḍḍetvāpi, alabhitvāpīti attho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- mahārāja, nārīnañhi uppannaṃ dohaḷaṃ alabhitvā gabbho sussitvā nassati. tattha ekaccā yācantāpi putte alabhamānā, kāci laddhampi dohaḷaṃ pahāya aparibhuñjitvā na labhanti, kāci dohaḷaṃ alabhamānā na labhanti. mayhaṃ pana mātā uppannaṃ dohaḷaṃ labhitvā paribhuñjitvā uppannaṃ gabbhaṃ anāsetvā putte paṭilabhi. evaṃ paṭiladdhe mā no avadhīti yācati.

[03] ^b^āsīsikānī^eb^ti ^a^M7.0096^ea^ mahārāja, ime sattā āsīsaṃ karonti. kinti? puttā no jāyantūti. ^b^tato paputtā^eb^ti puttānampi no puttā jāyantūti. ^b^atha no akāraṇasmā^eb^ti atha tvaṃ amhe akāraṇena yaññatthāya ghātesi. ^b^upayācitakenā^eb^ti devatānaṃ āyācanena. ^b^kapaṇaladdhakehī^eb^ti kapaṇā viya hutvā laddhakehi. ^b^puttehī^eb^ti amhehi saddhiṃ amhākaṃ ammāya mā vippavāsehi, mā no mātarā saddhiṃ vippavāsaṃ karīti vadati.
[03] so ^a^V7.0092^ea^ evaṃ vadantopi pitu santikā kiñci kathaṃ alabhitvā mātu pādamūle nipatitvā paridevamāno āha --
[21] ``bahudukkhā posiya candaṃ, amma tuvaṃ jīyase puttaṃ.
[22] vandāmi kho te pāde, labhataṃ tāto paralokaṃ..
[21] ``handa ca maṃ upagūha, pāde te amma vandituṃ dehi.
[21] ``handa ca maṃ upagūha, pāde te amma vandituṃ dehi.
[22] gacchāmi dāni pavāsaṃ, mātu katvā hadayasokaṃ..
[21] ``handa ca maṃ upagūha, pāde te amma vandituṃ dehi.
[22] gacchāmi dāni pavāsaṃ, janassa katvā hadayasoka''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^bahudukkhā posiyā^eb^ti bahūhi dukkhehi posiya. ^b^canda^eb^nti maṃ candakumāraṃ evaṃ posetvā idāni, amma, tvaṃ jīyase puttaṃ. ^b^labhataṃ tāto paraloka^eb^nti pitā me bhogasampannaṃ paralokaṃ labhatu. ^b^upagūhā^eb^ti āliṅga parissaja. ^b^pavāsa^eb^nti puna anāgamanāya accantaṃ vippavāsaṃ gacchāmi.
[03] athassa mātā paridevantī catasso gāthā abhāsi --
[21] ``handa ^a^M7.0097^ea^ ca vilepanaṃ te, pacchimakaṃ candanaṃ vilimpassu.
[21] ``handa ca mudukāni vatthāni, pacchimakaṃ kāsikaṃ nivāsehi.

[03] tattha ^b^padumapattāna^eb^nti padumapattaveṭhanaṃ nāmekaṃ pasādhanaṃ, taṃ sandhāyevamāha. tava vippakiṇṇaṃ moḷiṃ ukkhipitvā padumapattaveṭhanena yojetvā bandhāti attho. ^b^gotamiputtā^eb^ti candakumāraṃ ālapati. ^b^campakadalamissāyo^eb^ti abbhantarimehi campakadalehi missitā vaṇṇagandhasampannā nānāpupphamālā pilandhassu. ^b^esā te^eb^ti esā tava porāṇikā pakati, tameva gaṇhassu puttāti paridevati. ^b^yehi cā^eb^ti yehi lohitacandanavilepanehi vilitto rājaparisāya sobhasi, tāni vilimpassūti attho. ^b^kāsika^eb^nti satasahassagghanakaṃ kāsikavatthaṃ. ^b^gaṇhassū^eb^ti pilandhassu.
[03] idānissa candā nāma aggamahesī tassa pādamūle nipatitvā paridevamānā āha --
[21] ``na hi nūnāyaṃ raṭṭhapālo, bhūmipati janapadassa dāyādo.
[21] ``mayhampi piyā puttā, attā ca piyo tumhe ca bhariyāyo.

[03] tassattho -- kiṃkāraṇā puttasinehaṃ na janemi? na kevalaṃ gotamiyā eva, atha kho mayhampi piyā puttā, tathā attā ca tumhe ca suṇhāyo bhariyāyo ca piyāyeva. evaṃ santepi saggañca patthayāno ahaṃ saggaṃ patthento, tena kāraṇena ete ghātayissāmi, mā cintayittha, sabbepete mayā saddhiṃ devalokaṃ ekato gamissantīti.
[21] ``maṃ paṭhamaṃ ghātehi, mā me hadayaṃ dukkhaṃ phālesi.
[22] alaṅkato sundarako, putto deva tava sukhumālo..
[22] puññaṃ karassu vipulaṃ, vicarāma ubhopi paraloke''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^paṭhama^eb^nti deva, mama sāmikato paṭhamataraṃ maṃ ghātehi. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti candassa maraṇadukkhaṃ mama hadayaṃ mā phālesi. ^b^alaṅkato^eb^ti ayaṃ mama ekova alaṃ pariyattoti evaṃ alaṅkato. evarūpaṃ nāma puttaṃ mā ghātayi, mahārājāti dīpeti. ^b^handayyā^eb^ti handa, ayya, rājānaṃ ālapantī evamāha. ^b^paraloke candakenā^eb^ti candena saddhiṃ paraloke bhavissāmi. ^b^vicarāma ubhopi paraloke^eb^ti tayā ekato ghātitā ubhopi paraloke sukhaṃ anubhavantā vicarāma, mā no saggantarāyamakāsīti.
[21] ``mā tvaṃ cande rucci maraṇaṃ, bahukā tava devarā visālakkhi.
[03] tattha ^b^mā tvaṃ cande ruccī^eb^ti mā tvaṃ attano maraṇaṃ rocesi. ``mā ruddī''tipi pāṭho, mā rodīti attho. ^b^devarā^eb^ti patibhātukā.
[21] ``evaṃ vutte candā attānaṃ, hanti hatthatalakehī''ti.. -- upaḍḍhagāthamāha.
[21] ``na hi nūnimassa rañño, mittāmaccā ca vijjare suhadā.
[22] ye na vadanti rājānaṃ, `mā ghātayi orase putte'..
[21] ``na ^a^V7.0095^ea^ ^a^M7.0099^ea^ hi nūnimassa rañño, ñātī mittā ca vijjare suhadā.
[22] ye na vadanti rājānaṃ, `mā ghātayi atraje putte'..
[21] ``ime tepi mayhaṃ puttā, guṇino kāyūradhārino rāja.
[22] tehipi yajassu yaññaṃ, atha muñcatu gotamiputte..
