[03] tattha ^b^eva^eb^nti evaṃ andhabālena ekarājena vutte. ^b^hantī^eb^ti ``kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathesī''ti vatvā hatthatalehi attānaṃ hanti. ^b^pissāmī^eb^ti pivissāmi. ^b^ime tepī^eb^ti vasulakumāraṃ ādiṃ katvā sesadārake hatthe gahetvā rañño pādamūle ṭhitā evamāha. ^b^guṇino^eb^ti mālāguṇāabharaṇehi samannāgatā. ^b^kāyūradhārino^eb^ti kāyūrapasādhanadharā. ^b^bilasata^eb^nti mahārāja, maṃ ghātetvā koṭṭhāsasataṃ katvā sattadhā sattasu ṭhānesu yaññaṃ yajassu.

[03] iti sā rañño santike imāhi gāthāhi paridevitvā assāsaṃ alabhamānā bodhisattasseva santikaṃ gantvā paridevamānā aṭṭhāsi. atha naṃ so āha -- ``cande, mayā jīvamānena tuyhaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ subhaṇite sukathite uccāvacāni maṇimuttādīni bahūni ābharaṇāni dinnāni, ajja pana te idaṃ pacchimadānaṃ, sarīrāruḷhaṃ ābharaṇaṃ dammi, gaṇhāhi na''nti. imamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[03] candādevīpi taṃ sutvā tato parāhi navahi gāthāhi vilapi --
[22] atha mama hadayaṃ na phalati, tāva daḷhabandhañca me āsi..

[03] tattha ^b^mālāguṇā^eb^ti pupphadāmāni. ^b^tesajjā^eb^ti tesaṃ ajja. ^b^nettiṃso^eb^ti asi. ^b^vivattissatī^eb^ti patissati. ^b^aciraṃ vatā^eb^ti acirena vata. ^b^na phalatī^eb^ti na bhijjati. ^b^tāva daḷhabandhañca^eb^ ^a^V7.0097^ea^ ^b^me āsī^eb^ti ativiya thirabandhanaṃ me hadayaṃ bhavissatīti attho. ^b^niyyāthā^eb^ti gacchatha.

[03] evaṃ tassā paridevantiyāva yaññāvāṭe sabbakammaṃ niṭṭhāsi. rājaputtaṃ netvā gīvaṃ onāmetvā nisīdāpesuṃ. khaṇḍahālo suvaṇṇapātiṃ upanāmetvā khaggaṃ ādāya ``tassa gīvaṃ chindissāmī''ti aṭṭhāsi. taṃ disvā candādevī ``aññaṃ me paṭisaraṇaṃ natthi, attano saccabalena sāmikassa ^a^M7.0101^ea^ sotthiṃ karissāmī''ti añjaliṃ paggayha parisāya antare vicarantī saccakiriyaṃ akāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] karontu me veyyāvaṭikaṃ, samaṅginī sāmikena homi..
[22] saraṇesiniṃ anāthaṃ tāyatha maṃ, yācāmahaṃ pati māhaṃ ajeyya''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^upakkhaṭasmi^eb^nti sabbasmiṃ yaññasambhāre sajjite paṭiyatte. ^b^samaṅginī^eb^ti sampayuttā ekasaṃvāsā. ^b^ye idhatthī^eb^ti ye idha atthi. ^b^yakkhabhūtabhabyānī^eb^ti devasaṅkhātā yakkhā ca vaḍḍhitvā ṭhitasattasaṅkhātā bhūtā ca idāni vaḍḍhanakasattasaṅkhātāni bhabyāni ca. ^b^veyyāvaṭika^eb^nti mayhaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karontu. ^b^tāyatha ma^eb^nti rakkhatha maṃ. ^b^yācāmaha^eb^nti ahaṃ vo yācāmi. ^b^pati māha^eb^nti patiṃ ahaṃ mā ajeyyaṃ.
[03] atha sakko devarājā tassā paridevasaddaṃ sutvā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā jalitaṃ ayakūṭaṃ ādāya gantvā rājānaṃ tāsetvā sabbe vissajjāpesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``bujjhassu kho rājakali, mā tāhaṃ matthakaṃ nitāḷesiṃ.
[22] seṭṭhi ca gahapatayo, adūsakā saggakāmā hi..
[21] ``taṃ sutvā khaṇḍahālo, rājā ca abbhutamidaṃ disvāna.
[22] sabbesaṃ bandhanāni mocesuṃ, yathā taṃ anupaghātaṃ..
[21] ``sabbesu vippamuttesu, ye tattha samāgatā tadā āsuṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^amanusso^eb^ti sakko devarājā. ^b^bujjhassū^eb^ti jānassu sallakkhehi. ^b^rājakalī^eb^ti rājakāḷakaṇṇi rājalāmaka. ^b^mā tāha^eb^nti pāparāja, bujjha, mā te ahaṃ matthakaṃ nitāḷesiṃ. ^b^ko te diṭṭho^eb^ti kuhiṃ tayā diṭṭhapubbo. ^b^saggakāmā hī^eb^ti ettha ^b^hī^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, saggakāmā saggaṃ patthayamānāti attho. ^b^taṃ sutvā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, taṃ sakkassa vacanaṃ khaṇḍahālo sutvā. ^b^abbhutamida^eb^nti rājā ca idaṃ sakkassa dassanaṃ pubbe abhūtaṃ disvā. ^b^yathā ta^eb^nti yathā anupaghātaṃ pāṇaṃ mocenti, evameva mocesuṃ. ^b^ekekaleḍḍukamadaṃsū^eb^ti bhikkhave, yattakā tasmiṃ yaññāvāṭe samāgatā, sabbe ekakolāhalaṃ katvā khaṇḍahālassa ekekaleḍḍupahāraṃ adaṃsu. ^b^esa vadho^eb^ti esova khaṇḍahālassa vadho ahosi, tattheva naṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesunti attho.

[03] taṃ pana māretvā mahājano rājānaṃ māretuṃ ārabhi. bodhisatto pitaraṃ parissajitvā māretuṃ na adāsi. mahājano ``jīvitaṃ etassa pāparañño dema, chattaṃ panassa nagare ca vāsaṃ na dassāma, caṇḍālaṃ katvā bahinagare vasāpessāmā''ti vatvā rājavesaṃ hāretvā kāsāvaṃ nivāsāpetvā haliddipilotikāya sīsaṃ veṭhetvā caṇḍālaṃ katvā caṇḍālavasanaṭṭhānaṃ taṃ pahiṇi. ye panetaṃ pasughātayaññaṃ yajiṃsu ceva yajāpesuñca anumodiṃsu ca, sabbe nirayaparāyaṇāva ahesuṃ. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``sabbe ^a^V7.0099^ea^ ^a^M7.0103^ea^ paviṭṭhā nirayaṃ, yathā taṃ pāpakaṃ karitvāna.
[22] na hi pāpakammaṃ katvā, labbhā sugatiṃ ito gantu''nti..
[03] sopi kho mahājano dve kāḷakaṇṇiyo hāretvā tattheva abhisekasambhāre āharitvā candakumāraṃ abhisiñci. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``sabbesu vippamuttesu, ye tattha samāgatā tadā āsuṃ.
[21] ``sabbesu vippamuttesu, ye tattha samāgatā tadā āsuṃ.
[21] ``sabbesu vippamuttesu, ye tattha samāgatā tadā āsuṃ.
[21] ``sabbesu vippamuttesu, ye tattha samāgatā tadā āsuṃ.
[21] ``sabbesu vippamuttesu, ye tattha samāgatā tadā āsuṃ.
[21] ``sabbesu vippamuttesu, ye tattha samāgatā tadā āsuṃ.
[21] ``sabbesu vippamuttesu, ye tattha samāgatā tadā āsuṃ.
[21] ``sabbesu vippamuttesu, ye tattha samāgatā tadā āsuṃ.
[22] nandiṃ pavesi nagaraṃ, bandhanā mokkho aghositthā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^rājaparisā cā^eb^ti rājaparisāpi tīhi saṅkhehi abhisiñciṃsu. ^b^rājakaññāyo cā^eb^ti khattiyadhītaropi naṃ abhisiñciṃsu. ^b^devaparisā cā^eb^ti sakko ^a^M7.0104^ea^ devarājā vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ gahetvā devaparisāya saddhiṃ abhisiñci. ^b^devakaññāyo cā^eb^ti sujāpi devadhītarāhi saddhiṃ abhisiñci. ^b^celukkhepamakaru^eb^nti nānāvaṇṇehi vatthehi dhaje ussāpetvā uttarisāṭakāni ākāse khipantā celukkhepaṃ kariṃsu. rājaparisā ca itare tayo koṭṭhāsā cāti abhisekakārakā cattāropi koṭṭhāsā kariṃsuyeva. ^b^ānanditā ahu^eb^nti āmoditā ahesuṃ. ^b^nandiṃ pavesi nagara^eb^nti candakumārassa chattaṃ ussāpetvā nagaraṃ paviṭṭhakāle nagare ānandabheri cari. ``kiṃ vatvā''ti? yathā ``amhākaṃ candakumāro bandhanā mutto, evameva sabbe bandhanā muccantū''ti. tena vuttaṃ ``bandhanā mokkho aghositthā''ti.

[03] bodhisatto pitu vattaṃ paṭṭhapesi. antonagaraṃ pana pavisituṃ na labhati. paribbayassa khīṇakāle bodhisatto uyyānakīḷādīnaṃ atthāya gacchanto taṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``patimhī''ti na vandati, añjaliṃ pana katvā ``ciraṃ jīva sāmī''ti vadati. ``kenattho''ti vutte ārocesi. athassa paribbayaṃ dāpesi. so dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā āyupariyosāne devalokaṃ pūrayamāno agamāsi.

[03] satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā ``na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi devadatto maṃ ekaṃ nissāya bahū māretuṃ vāyāmamakāsī''ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi. tadā khaṇḍahālo devadatto ahosi, gotamīdevī mahāmāyā, candādevī rāhulamātā, vasulo rāhulo, selā uppalavaṇṇā, sūro vāmagotto kassapo, bhaddaseno moggallāno, sūriyakumāro sāriputto, candarājā pana ahameva sammāsambuddho ahosinti.

[03] ^b^ahu^eb^ ^a^V7.0101^ea^ ^a^M7.0105^ea^ ^b^rājā videhāna^eb^nti idaṃ satthā laṭṭhivanuyyāne viharanto uruvelakassapadamanaṃ ārabbha kathesi. yadā hi satthā pavattitavaradhammacakko uruvelakassapādayo ^a^P6.0220^ea^ jaṭile dametvā magadharājassa paṭissavaṃ locetuṃ purāṇajaṭilasahassaparivuto laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ agamāsi. tadā dvādasanahutāya parisāya saddhiṃ āgantvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā nisinnassa magadharañño parisantare brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ vitakko uppajji ``kiṃ nu kho uruvelakassapo mahāsamaṇe brahmacariyaṃ carati, udāhu mahāsamaṇo uruvelakassape''ti. atha kho bhagavā tesaṃ dvādasanahutānaṃ cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya ``kassapassa mama santike pabbajitabhāvaṃ jānāpessāmī''ti imaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] pucchāmi taṃ kassapa etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ pahīnaṃ tava aggihutta''nti.. (mahāva0 55).
[21] ``rūpe ca sadde ca atho rase ca, kāmitthiyo cābhivadanti yaññā.
[22] etaṃ malanti upadhīsu ñatvā, tasmā na yiṭṭhe na hute arañji''nti.. (mahāva0 55). --

[25] imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā attano sāvakabhāvaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ tathāgatassa pādapiṭṭhe sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā ``satthā me, bhante, bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī''ti vatvā ekatālaṃ dvitālaṃ titālanti yāva sattatālappamāṇaṃ sattakkhattuṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā oruyha tathāgataṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā mahājano ``aho mahānubhāvo buddho, evaṃ thāmagatadiṭṭhiko nāma attānaṃ `arahā'ti maññamāno uruvelakassapopi diṭṭhijālaṃ bhinditvā tathāgatena damito''ti satthu guṇakathaññeva kathesi. taṃ sutvā satthā ``anacchariyaṃ idāni sabbaññutappattena ^a^V7.0102^ea^ mayā imassa damanaṃ, svāhaṃ pubbe sarāgakālepi nārado nāma brahmā ^a^M7.0106^ea^ hutvā imassa diṭṭhijālaṃ bhinditvā imaṃ nibbisevanamakāsi''nti vatvā tāya parisāya yācito atītaṃ āhari.

[03] atīte videharaṭṭhe mithilāyaṃ aṅgati nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi dhammiko dhammarājā. tassa rucā nāma dhītā ahosi abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā kappasatasahassaṃ patthitapatthanā mahāpuññā aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattā. sesā panassa soḷasasahassā itthiyo vañjhā ahesuṃ. tassa sā dhītā piyā ahosi manāpā. so tassā nānāpupphapūre pañcavīsatipupphasamugge anagghāni sukhumāni vatthāni ca ``imehi attānaṃ alaṅkarotū''ti ^a^P6.0221^ea^ devasikaṃ pahiṇi. khādanīyabhojanīyassa pana pamāṇaṃ natthi. anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ ``dānaṃ detū''ti sahassaṃ sahassaṃ pesesi. tassa kho pana vijayo ca sunāmo ca alāto cāti tayo amaccā ahesuṃ. so komudiyā cātumāsiniyā chaṇe pavattamāne devanagaraṃ viya nagare ca antepure ca alaṅkate sunhāto suvilitto sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito bhuttasāyamāso vivaṭasīhapañjare mahātale amaccagaṇaparivuto visuddhaṃ gaganatalaṃ abhilaṅghamānaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ disvā ``ramaṇīyā vata bho dosinā ratti, kāya nu kho ajja ratiyā abhirameyyāmā''ti amacce pucchi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] kāyajja ratiyā rattiṃ, viharemu imaṃ utu''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0103^ea^ ^a^M7.0107^ea^ ^b^pahūtayoggo^eb^ti bahukena hatthiyoggādinā samannāgato. ^b^anantabalaporiso^eb^ti anantabalakāyo. ^b^anāgate^eb^ti pariyosānaṃ appatte, anatikkanteti attho. ^b^cātumāsā^eb^ti catunnaṃ vassikamāsānaṃ pacchimadivasabhūtāya rattiyā. ^b^komudiyā^eb^ti phullakumudāya. ^b^mhitapubbe^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ sitaṃ katvā pacchā kathanasīle. ^b^tamanupucchī^eb^ti taṃ tesu amaccesu ekekaṃ amaccaṃ anupucchi. ^b^paccekaṃ brūtha saṃ ruci^eb^nti sabbepi tumhe attano attano ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ ruciṃ paccekaṃ mayhaṃ kathetha. ^b^komudajjā^eb^ti komudī ajja. ^b^juṇha^eb^nti juṇhāya nissayabhūtaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ abbhuggacchati. ^b^byapahataṃ tama^eb^nti tena sabbaṃ andhakāraṃ vihataṃ. ^b^utu^eb^nti ajja rattiṃ imaṃ evarūpaṃ utuṃ kāyaratiyā vihareyyāmāti.
[03] iti rājā amacce pucchi. tena te pucchitā attano attano ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ kathaṃ kathayiṃsu. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[27] ye te vasaṃ na āyanti, vasaṃ upanayāmase.
[22] esā mayhaṃ sakā diṭṭhi, ajitaṃ ojināmase'..
[22] uttamo ussavo ajja, na yuddhaṃ mama ruccati..
[21] `na ^a^V7.0104^ea^ ^a^M7.0108^ea^ hete dullabhā deva, tava kāmehi modituṃ.
[22] sadāpi kāmā sulabhā, netaṃ cittamataṃ mama..
[22] yo najja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise'..
[21] vijayassa vaco sutvā, rājā aṅgati mabravi.
[22] yo najja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise..
[21] `sabbeva santā karotha matiṃ, kaṃ upāsemu paṇḍitaṃ.
[22] yo najja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise'..
[22] taṃ deva payirupāsemu, so no kaṅkhaṃ vinessati'..
[22] migadāyaṃ gamissāma, yuttaṃ yānaṃ idhā nayā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^haṭṭha^eb^nti tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhaṃ. ^b^ojināmase^eb^ti yaṃ no ajitaṃ, taṃ jināma. eso mama ajjhāsayoti. rājā tassa kathaṃ neva paṭikkosi, nābhinandi. ^b^etadabravī^eb^ti rājānaṃ alātassa vacanaṃ anabhinandantaṃ appaṭikkosantaṃ disvā ``nāyaṃ yuddhajjhāsayo, ahamassa cittaṃ gaṇhanto kāmaguṇābhiratiṃ vaṇṇayissāmī''ti cintetvā etaṃ ``sabbe tuyha''ntiādivacanaṃ abravi.

[03] ^b^vijayo^eb^ ^a^V7.0105^ea^ ^b^etadabravī^eb^ti rājā sunāmassapi vacanaṃ nābhinandi, na paṭikkosi. tato vijayo ``ayaṃ rājā imesaṃ dvinnampi vacanaṃ sutvā tuṇhīyeva ṭhito, paṇḍitā nāma dhammassavanasoṇḍā honti, dhammassavanamassa vaṇṇayissāmī''ti cintetvā etaṃ ``sabbe kāmā''tiādivacanaṃ abravi. tattha ^b^tava^eb^ ^a^M7.0109^ea^ ^b^mupaṭṭhitā^eb^ti tava upaṭṭhitā. ^b^moditu^eb^nti ^a^P6.0223^ea^ tava kāmehi modituṃ abhiramituṃ icchāya sati na hi ete kāmā dullabhā. ^b^netaṃ cittamataṃ mamā^eb^ti etaṃ tava kāmehi abhiramaṇaṃ mama cittamataṃ na hoti, na me ettha cittaṃ pakkhandati. ^b^yo najjā^eb^ti yo no ajja. ^b^atthadhammavidū^eb^ti pāḷiatthañceva pāḷidhammañca jānanto. ^b^ise^eb^ti isi esitaguṇo.

[03] ^b^aṅgati mabravī^eb^ti aṅgati abravi. ^b^mayhampetaṃva ruccatī^eb^ti mayhampi etaññeva ruccati. ^b^sabbeva santā^eb^ti sabbeva tumhe idha vijjamānā matiṃ karotha cintetha. ^b^alāto etadabravī^eb^ti rañño kathaṃ sutvā alāto ``ayaṃ mama kulūpako guṇo nāma ājīvako rājuyyāne vasati, taṃ pasaṃsitvā rājakulūpakaṃ karissāmī''ti cintetvā etaṃ ``atthāya''ntiādivacanaṃ abravi. tattha ^b^dhīrasammato^eb^ti paṇḍitoti sammato. ^b^kassapagottāya^eb^nti kassapagotto ayaṃ. ^b^suto^eb^ti bahussuto. ^b^gaṇī^eb^ti gaṇasatthā. ^b^codesī^eb^ti āṇāpesi.
[03] rañño taṃ kathaṃ sutvā sārathino tathā kariṃsu. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] na te apanayī rājā, akataṃ bhūmimāgate''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0110^ea^ ^b^tassa yāna^eb^nti tassa rañño rathaṃ yojayiṃsu. ^b^danta^eb^nti dantamayaṃ. ^b^rūpiyapakkhara^eb^nti rajatamayaupakkharaṃ. ^b^sukkamaṭṭhaparivāra^eb^nti parisuddhāpharusaparivāraṃ. ^b^dosinā mukha^eb^nti vigatadosāya rattiyā mukhaṃ viya, candasadisanti attho. ^b^tatrāsu^eb^nti tatra ahesuṃ. ^b^kumudā^eb^ti kumudavaṇṇā. ^b^sindhavā^eb^ti sindhavajātikā. ^b^anilūpamasamuppātā^eb^ti vātasadisavegā. ^b^setacchatta^eb^nti tasmiṃ rathe samussāpitaṃ chattampi setaṃ ahosi. ^b^setaratho^eb^ti sopi ratho setoyeva. ^b^setassā^eb^ti assāpi setā. ^b^setabījanī^eb^ti bījanīpi setā. ^b^niyya^eb^nti tena rathena niggacchanto amaccagaṇaparivuto vedeharājā cando viya sobhati.

[03] ^b^naravarādhipa^eb^nti naravarānaṃ adhipatiṃ rājādhirājānaṃ. ^b^so muhuttaṃva yāyitvā^eb^ti so rājā muhutteneva uyyānaṃ gantvā. ^b^pattī guṇamupāgamī^eb^ti pattikova guṇaṃ ājīvakaṃ upāgami. ^b^yepi tattha tadā āsu^eb^nti yepi tasmiṃ uyyāne tadā puretaraṃ gantvā taṃ ājīvakaṃ payirupāsamānā nisinnā ahesuṃ. ^b^na te apanayī^eb^ti amhākameva doso, ye mayaṃ pacchā ^a^P6.0224^ea^ agamimhā, tumhe mā cintayitthāti te brāhmaṇe ca ibbhe ca raññoyeva atthāya akataṃ akatokāsaṃ bhūmiṃ samāgate na ussāraṇaṃ kāretvā apanayīti.
[03] tāya pana omissakaparisāya parivutova ekamantaṃ nisīditvā paṭisanthāramakāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] appābādho casi kacci, cakkhuṃ na parihāyati'..
[21] taṃ guṇo paṭisammodi, vedehaṃ vinaye rataṃ.
[27] kacci arogaṃ yoggaṃ te, kacci vahati vāhanaṃ.
[22] kathaṃ care ācariye, puttadāre kathaṃ care..

[03] tattha ^b^mudukā bhisiyā^eb^ti mudukāya sukhasamphassāya bhisiyā. ^b^muducittakasanthate^eb^ti sukhasamphasse cittattharaṇe. ^b^mudupaccatthate^eb^ti mudunā paccattharaṇena paccatthate. ^b^sammodī^eb^ti ājīvakena saddhiṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathesi. ^b^tato^eb^ti tato nisajjanato anantarameva sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ kathesīti attho. tattha ^b^kacci yāpaniya^eb^nti kacci te, bhante, sarīraṃ paccayehi yāpetuṃ sakkā. ^b^vātānamaviyaggatā^eb^ti kacci te sarīre dhātuyo samappavattā, vātānaṃ byaggatā natthi, tattha tattha vaggavaggā hutvā vātā na bādhayantīti attho.

[03] ^b^akasirā^eb^ti niddukkhā. ^b^vuttī^eb^ti jīvitavutti. ^b^appābādho^eb^ti iriyāpathabhañjakenābādhena virahito ^a^V7.0108^ea^. ^b^cakkhu^eb^nti kacci te cakkhuādīni ^a^P6.0225^ea^ indriyāni na parihāyantīti pucchati. ^b^paṭisammodī^eb^ti sammodanīyakathāya paṭikathesi. tattha ^b^sabbameta^eb^nti yaṃ tayā vuttaṃ vātānamaviyaggatādi, taṃ sabbaṃ tatheva. ^b^tadubhaya^eb^nti yampi tayā ``appābādho casi kacci, cakkhuṃ na parihāyatī''ti vuttaṃ, tampi ubhayaṃ tatheva.

[03] ^b^na balīyare^eb^ti nābhibhavanti na kuppanti. ^b^anantarā^eb^ti paṭisanthārato anantarā pañhaṃ pucchi. tattha ^b^atthaṃ dhammañca ñāyañcā^eb^ti pāḷiatthañca pāḷiñca kāraṇayuttiñca ^a^M7.0112^ea^. so hi ``kathaṃ dhammaṃ care''ti pucchanto mātāpituādīsu paṭipattidīpakaṃ pāḷiñca pāḷiatthañca kāraṇayuttiñca me kathethāti imaṃ atthañca dhammañca ñāyañca pucchati. tattha ^b^kathañceke adhammaṭṭhā^eb^ti ekacce adhamme ṭhitā kathaṃ nirayañceva atho sesāpāye ca patantīti sabbaññubuddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakamahābodhisattesu purimassa purimassa alābhena pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ pucchitabbakaṃ mahesakkhapañhaṃ rājā kiñci ajānantaṃ naggabhoggaṃ nissirikaṃ andhabālaṃ ājīvakaṃ pucchi.

[03] sopi evaṃ pucchito pucchānurūpaṃ byākaraṇaṃ adisvā carantaṃ goṇaṃ daṇḍena paharanto viya bhattapātiyaṃ kacavaraṃ khipanto viya ca ``suṇa, mahārājā''ti okāsaṃ kāretvā attano micchāvādaṃ paṭṭhapesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] natthi deva paro loko, ko tato hi idhāgato..
[21] `natthi deva pitaro vā, kuto mātā kuto pitā.
[22] natthi ācariyo nāma, adantaṃ ko damessati..
[27] natthi balaṃ vīriyaṃ vā, kuto uṭṭhānaporisaṃ.
[22] niyatāni hi bhūtāni, yathā goṭaviso tathā..

[03] tattha ^b^idhāgato^eb^ti tato paralokato idhāgato nāma natthi. ^b^natthi deva pitaro vā^eb^ti deva, ayyakapeyyakādayo vā natthi, tesu ^a^M7.0113^ea^ asantesu kuto mātā kuto pitā. ^b^yathā goṭaviso^eb^ ^a^P6.0226^ea^ ^b^tathā^eb^ti goṭaviso vuccati pacchābandho, yathā nāvāya pacchābandho nāvameva anugacchati, tathā ime sattā niyatameva anugacchantīti vadati. ^b^avaso devavīriyo^eb^ti evaṃ dānaphale asati yo koci bālo dānaṃ deti, so avaso avīriyo na attano vasena balena deti, dānaphalaṃ pana atthīti saññāya aññesaṃ andhabālānaṃ saddahitvā detīti dīpeti. ^b^bālehi dānaṃ paññatta^eb^nti ``dānaṃ dātabba''nti andhabālehi paññattaṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ dānaṃ bālāyeva denti, paṇḍitā paṭiggaṇhanti.
[03] evaṃ dānassa nipphalataṃ vaṇṇetvā idāni pāpassa nipphalabhāvaṃ vaṇṇetuṃ āha --
[27] tejo pathavī āpo ca, vāyo sukhaṃ dukhañcime.
[22] jīve ca sattime kāyā, yesaṃ chettā na vijjati..
[21] ``natthi hantā va chettā vā, haññe yevāpi koci naṃ.
[22] na so chindati te kāye, tattha pāpaphalaṃ kuto..
[22] anāgate tamhi kāle, saññatopi na sujjhati..
[22] pāpañcepi bahuṃ katvā, taṃ khaṇaṃ nātivattare..

[03] tattha ^b^kāyā^eb^ti samūhā. ^b^avikopino^eb^ti vikopetuṃ na sakkā. ^b^jīve^eb^ti jīvo. ``jīvo''tipi pāṭho, ayameva attho. ^b^sattime kāyā^eb^ti ime satta kāyā. ^b^haññe yevāpi koci na^eb^nti yo haññeyya, sopi nattheva. ^b^vītivattare^eb^ti imesaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ antareyeva caranti ^a^M7.0114^ea^, chindituṃ na sakkonti. ^b^siramādāyā^eb^ti paresaṃ sīsaṃ gahetvā. ^b^nisitāsinā^eb^ti nisitena asinā chindati, ^b^na so chindatī^eb^ti sopi te kāye na chindati, pathavī pathavimeva upeti, āpādayo āpādike, sukhadukkhajīvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandantīti dasseti.

[03] ^b^saṃsara^eb^nti mahārāja, ime sattā imaṃ pathaviṃ ekamaṃsakhalaṃ katvāpi ettake kappe saṃsarantā sujjhanti. aññatra hi saṃsārā satte sodhetuṃ samattho nāma natthi, sabbe saṃsāreneva sujjhanti. ^b^anāgate tamhi kāle^eb^ti yathāvutte pana etasmiṃ kāle anāgate appatte antarā saññatopi parisuddhasīlopi na sujjhati. ^b^taṃ^eb^ ^a^P6.0227^ea^ ^b^khaṇa^eb^nti taṃ vuttappakāraṃ kālaṃ. ^b^anupubbena no suddhī^eb^ti amhākaṃ vāde anupubbena suddhi, sabbesaṃ amhākaṃ anupubbena suddhi bhavissatīti attho. iti so ucchedavādo attano thāmena sakavādaṃ nippadesato kathesīti.
[22] piṅgalo nāmahaṃ āsiṃ, luddo goghātako pure..
[22] bahū mayā hatā pāṇā, mahiṃsā sūkarā ajā..
[22] natthi nūna phalaṃ pāpaṃ, yohaṃ na nirayaṃ gato'''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^alāto etadabravī^eb^ti so kira kassapadasabalassa cetiye anojapupphadāmena pūjaṃ katvā maraṇasamaye aññena kammena yathānubhāvaṃ khitto saṃsāre saṃsaranto ekassa pāpakammassa nissandena goghātakakule nibbattitvā bahuṃ pāpamakāsi. athassa maraṇakāle bhasmapaṭicchanno viya aggi ettakaṃ kālaṃ ṭhitaṃ taṃ puññakammaṃ okāsamakāsi. so tassānubhāvena idha nibbattitvā taṃ vibhūtiṃ patto, jātiṃ saranto pana atītānantarato paraṃ parisarituṃ asakkonto ``goghātakakammaṃ katvā idha nibbattosmī''ti saññāya tassa ^a^M7.0115^ea^ vādaṃ upatthambhento idaṃ ``yathā bhadanto bhaṇatī''tiādivacanaṃ abravi. tattha ^b^sare saṃsaritattano^eb^ti attano saṃsaritaṃ sarāmi. ^b^senāpatīkule^eb^ti senāpatikulamhi.
[22] passasanto muhuṃ uṇhaṃ, rudaṃ assūni vattayī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^athetthā^eb^ti atha ettha etissaṃ mithilāyaṃ. ^b^paṭaccarī^eb^ti daliddo kapaṇo ahosi. ^b^guṇasantikupāgamī^eb^ti guṇassa santikaṃ kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ sossāmīti upagatoti veditabbo.
[22] kiṃ te sutaṃ vā diṭṭhaṃ vā, kiṃ maṃ vedesi vedana'''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^P6.0228^ea^ ^b^kiṃ maṃ vedesi vedana^eb^nti kiṃ nāma tvaṃ kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā vedanaṃ pattoyaṃ, evaṃ rodanto maṃ vedesi jānāpesi, uttānameva naṃ katvā mayhaṃ ācikkhāhīti.
[22] `natthi me vedanā dukkhā, mahārāja suṇohi me..
[22] sāketāhaṃ pure āsiṃ, bhāvaseṭṭhi guṇe rato..
[22] na cāpi pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, sarāmi katamattano..
[22] upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ bhattassa, dadāmi yo me icchati..
[22] na cāpi bhūte hiṃsāmi, theyyaṃ cāpi vivajjayiṃ..
[22] niratthaṃ maññidaṃ sīlaṃ, alāto bhāsatī yathā..

[03] tattha ^b^bhāvaseṭṭhī^eb^ti evaṃnāmako asītikoṭivibhavo seṭṭhi. ^b^guṇe rato^eb^ti guṇamhi rato. ^b^sammato^eb^ti sambhāvito saṃvaṇṇito. ^b^sucī^eb^ti sucikammo. ^b^idha jāto duritthiyā^eb^ti imasmiṃ mithilanagare daliddiyā kapaṇāya kumbhadāsiyā kucchimhi jātosmīti. so kira pubbe kassapabuddhakāle araññe naṭṭhaṃ balibaddaṃ gavesamāno ekena maggamūḷhena bhikkhunā maggaṃ puṭṭho tuṇhī hutvā puna tena pucchito kujjhitvā ``samaṇa, dāsā nāma mukharā honti, dāsena tayā bhavitabbaṃ, atimukharosī''ti āha. taṃ kammaṃ tadā vipākaṃ adatvā bhasmacchanno viya pāvako ^a^V7.0113^ea^ ṭhitaṃ. maraṇasamaye aññaṃ kammaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. so yathākammaṃ saṃsāre saṃsaranto ekassa kusalakammassa balena sākete vuttappakāro seṭṭhi hutvā dānādīni puññāni akāsi. taṃ panassa kammaṃ pathaviyaṃ nihitanidhi viya ṭhitaṃ okāsaṃ labhitvā vipākaṃ dassati. yaṃ pana tena taṃ bhikkhuṃ akkosantena kataṃ pāpakammaṃ, tamassa tasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ adāsi. so ajānanto ``itarassa kalyāṇakammassa balena kumbhadāsiyā kucchimhi nibbattosmī''ti saññāya evamāha. ^b^yato jāto suduggato^eb^ti sohaṃ jātakālato paṭṭhāya atiduggatoti dīpeti.

[03] ^b^samacariyamadhiṭṭhito^eb^ti samacariyāyameva ^a^P6.0229^ea^ patiṭṭhitomhi. ^b^nūneta^eb^nti ekaṃsena etaṃ. ^b^maññidaṃ sīla^eb^nti deva, idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma niratthakaṃ maññe. ^b^alāto^eb^ti yathā ayaṃ alātasenāpati ``mayā purimabhave bahuṃ pāṇātipātakammaṃ katvā senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ laddha''nti bhāsati, tena kāraṇenāhaṃ ^a^M7.0117^ea^ niratthakaṃ sīlanti maññāmi. ^b^kalimevā^eb^ti yathā asippo asikkhito akkhadhutto parājayaggāhaṃ gaṇhāti, tathā nūna gaṇhāmi, purimabhave attano sāpateyyaṃ nāsetvā idāni dukkhaṃ anubhavāmi. ^b^kassapabhāsita^eb^nti kassapagottassa acelakassa bhāsitaṃ sutvāti vadati.
[21] `sukhaṃ vā yadi vā dukkhaṃ, niyatiyā kira labbhati.

[03] tattha ^b^aṅgati mabravī^eb^ti paṭhamameva itaresaṃ dvinnaṃ, pacchā bījakassāti tiṇṇaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā daḷhaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ gahetvā etaṃ ``natthi dvāra''ntiādivacanamabravi. ^b^niyatiṃ kaṅkhā^eb^ti samma bījaka, niyatimeva olokehi. cullāsītimahākappappamāṇo kāloyeva hi satte sodheti, tvaṃ atituritoti adhippāyenevamāha. ^b^anāgate^eb^ti tasmiṃ kāle asampatte antarāva devalokaṃ gacchāmīti mā turittho. ^b^byāvaṭo^eb^ti brāhmaṇesu ca gahapatikesu ca tesaṃyeva kāyaveyyāvaccadānādikammakaraṇena byāvaṭo ahosiṃ. ^b^vohāra^eb^nti vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisīditvā rājakiccaṃ ^a^V7.0114^ea^ vohāraṃ anusāsantova. ^b^ratihīno tadantarā^eb^ti ettakaṃ kālaṃ kāmaguṇaratiyā parihīnoti.

[03] evañca pana vatvā ``bhante kassapa, mayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ pamajjimhā, idāni pana amhehi ācariyo laddho, ito paṭṭhāya kāmaratimeva anubhavissāma, tumhākaṃ santike ito uttari dhammassavanampi no papañco bhavissati, tiṭṭhatha tumhe, mayaṃ gamissāmā''ti āpucchanto āha --
[03] tattha ^b^saṅgati ce^eb^ti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ce no samāgamo bhavissati,no ce, asati puññaphale kiṃ tayā diṭṭhenāti.
[03] tattha ^b^sanivesana^eb^nti bhikkhave, idaṃ vacanaṃ vedeharājā vatvā rathaṃ abhiruyha attano nivesanaṃ candakapāsādatalameva paṭigato.

[03] rājā ^a^P6.0230^ea^ paṭhamaṃ guṇasantikaṃ gantvā taṃ vanditvā pañhaṃ pucchi. āgacchanto pana avanditvāva āgato. guṇo attano aguṇatāya vandanampi nālattha, piṇḍādikaṃ sakkāraṃ kimeva lacchati. rājāpi taṃ rattiṃ vītināmetvā punadivase amacce sannipātetvā ``kāmaguṇe me upaṭṭhāpetha, ahaṃ ito paṭṭhāya kāmaguṇasukhameva anubhavissāmi, na me aññāni kiccāni ārocetabbāni, vinicchayakiccaṃ asuko ca asuko ca karotū''ti vatvā kāmaratimatto ahosi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] `candake me vimānasmiṃ, sadā kāme vidhentu me.
[22] na cāpi brāhmaṇibbhesu, atthe kismiñci byāvaṭo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^upaṭṭhānamhī^eb^ti attano upaṭṭhānaṭṭhāne. ^b^candake me^eb^ti mama santake candakapāsāde. ^b^vidhentu me^eb^ti niccaṃ mayhaṃ kāme saṃvidahantu upaṭṭhapentu. ^b^guyhappakāsiyesū^eb^ti guyhesupi pakāsiyesupi atthesu uppannesu maṃ keci mā upagacchuṃ. ^b^atthe^eb^ti atthakaraṇe vinicchayaṭṭhāne. ^b^nisīdantū^eb^ti mayā kattabbakiccassa karaṇatthaṃ sesāmaccehi saddhiṃ nisīdantūti.

[03] tattha ^b^tato^eb^ti tato rañño kāmapaṅke laggitadivasato paṭṭhāya. ^b^dvesattarattassā^eb^ti cuddasame divase. ^b^dhātimātaramabravī^eb^ti pitu santikaṃ gantukāmā ^a^P6.0231^ea^ hutvā dhātimātaramāha. sā kira cātuddase cātuddase pañcasatakumārikāhi parivutā dhātigaṇaṃ ādāya mahantena sirivilāsena attano sattabhūmikā rativaḍḍhanapāsādā oruyha pitu dassanatthaṃ candakapāsādaṃ gacchati. atha naṃ pitā disvā tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā mahāsakkāraṃ kāretvā uyyojento ``amma, dānaṃ dehī''ti sahassaṃ datvā uyyojeti. sā attano nivesanaṃ āgantvā punadivase uposathikā hutvā kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ mahādānaṃ deti. raññā kirassā eko janapadopi dinno. tato āyena ^a^V7.0116^ea^ sabbakiccāni karoti. tadā pana ``raññā kira guṇaṃ ājīvakaṃ nissāya micchādassanaṃ gahita''nti sakalanagare ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi. taṃ pavattiṃ rucāya dhātiyo sutvā rājadhītāya ārocayiṃsu ``ayye, pitarā kira te ājīvakassa kathaṃ sutvā micchādassanaṃ gahitaṃ, so kira catūsu nagaradvāresu dānasālāyo viddhaṃsāpetvā parapariggahitā itthiyo ca kumārikāyo ca pasayhakārena gaṇhituṃ āṇāpeti, rajjaṃ na vicāreti, kāmamattoyeva kira jāto''ti. sā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā anattamanā hutvā ``kathañhi nāma me tāto apagatasukkadhammaṃ nillajjaṃ naggabhoggaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchissati, nanu dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇe kammavādino upasaṅkamitvā pucchitabbo siyā, ṭhapetvā kho pana maṃ añño mayhaṃ pitaraṃ micchādassanā apanetvā sammādassane patiṭṭhāpetuṃ samattho nāma natthi. ahañhi atītā satta, anāgatā sattāti cuddasa jātiyo anussarāmi, tasmā pubbe mayā kataṃ pāpakammaṃ kathetvā pāpakammassa phalaṃ dassentī mama pitaraṃ ^a^M7.0120^ea^ micchādassanā mocessāmi. sace pana ajjeva gamissāmi, atha maṃ pitā `amma, tvaṃ pubbe aḍḍhamāse āgacchasi, ajja kasmā evaṃ lahu āgatāsī'ti vakkhati. tatra sace ahaṃ `tumhehi kira micchādassanaṃ gahita'nti sutvā `āgatamhī'ti vakkhāmi, na me vacanaṃ garuṃ katvā gaṇhissati, tasmā ajja agantvā ito cuddasame divase kāḷapakkheyeva kiñci ajānantī viya pubbe gamanākārenteva gantvā āgamanakāle dānavattatthāya sahassaṃ yācissāmi, tadā me pitā diṭṭhiyā gahitabhāvaṃ kathessati. atha naṃ ahaṃ attano balena micchādiṭṭhiṃ chaḍḍāpessāmī''ti cintesi. tasmā cuddasame divase pitu santikaṃ gantukāmā hutvā evamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^sakhiyo cā^eb^ti sahāyikāyopi me pañcasatā kumārikāyo ekāyekaṃ asadisaṃ katvā nānālaṅkārehi nānāvaṇṇehi pupphagandhavilepanehi alaṅkarontūti. ^b^dibyo^eb^ti dibbasadiso, devatāsannipātapaṭimaṇḍitotipi dibbo. ^b^gaccha^eb^nti mama dānavattaṃ āharāpetuṃ videhissarassa pitu santikaṃ gamissāmīti. ^b^abhihariṃsū^eb^ti soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi nhāpetvā maṇḍanatthāya abhihariṃsu. ^b^parikiriyā^eb^ti parivāretvā. ^b^asobhiṃsū^eb^ti sujaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā devakaññā viya taṃ divasaṃ ativiya asobhiṃsūti.
[03] tattha ^a^P6.0232^ea^ ^b^upāvisī^eb^ti pitu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ candakapāsādaṃ pāvisi. ^b^suvaṇṇakhacite^eb^ti sattaratanakhacite suvaṇṇamaye pīṭhe.
[22] kacci bahuvidhaṃ khajjaṃ, sadā abhiharanti te..
[21] `kena vā vikalaṃ tuyhaṃ, kiṃ khippaṃ āharanti te.

[03] tattha ^b^saṅgama^eb^nti accharānaṃ saṅgamaṃ viya samāgamaṃ disvā. ^b^pāsāde^eb^ti amma mayā tuyhaṃ vejayantasadiso rativaḍḍhanapāsādo kārito, kacci tattha ramasi. ^b^antopokkharaṇiṃ patī^eb^ti antovatthusmiññeva te mayā nandāpokkharaṇīpaṭibhāgāpokkharaṇī kāritā, kacci taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ paṭicca udakakīḷaṃ kīḷantī ramasi. ^b^mālya^eb^nti amma, ahaṃ tuyhaṃ devasikaṃ pañcavīsati pupphasamugge pahiṇāmi, kacci tumhe sabbāpi kumārikāyo taṃ mālyaṃ ocinitvā ganthitvā abhiṇhaṃ khiḍḍāratiratā hutvā paccekaṃ gharake karotha, ``idaṃ sundaraṃ, idaṃ sundaratara''nti pāṭiyekkaṃ sārambhena vāyapupphagharakāni pupphagabbhe ca pupphāsanapupphasayanāni ca kacci karothāti pucchati.

[03] ^b^vikala^eb^nti vekallaṃ. ^b^mano karassū^eb^ti cittaṃ uppādehi. ^b^kuḍḍamukhī^eb^ti sāsapakakkehi pasāditamukhatāya taṃ evamāha. itthiyo hi mukhavaṇṇaṃ pasādentiyo duṭṭhalohitamukhadūsitapīḷakāharaṇatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ sāsapakakkena mukhaṃ vilimpanti, tato lohitassa samakaraṇatthaṃ ^a^V7.0118^ea^ mattikākakkena, tato chavipasādanatthaṃ tilakakkena. ^b^candasamamhipī^eb^ti candato dullabhataro nāma natthi, tādisepi ruciṃ katvā mamācikkha, sampādessāmi teti.

[03] tattha ^a^P6.0233^ea^ ^b^aṅgati mabravī^eb^ti bhikkhave, so aṅgatirājā pubbe ayācitopi ``amma, dānaṃ dehī''ti sahassaṃ datvā taṃ divasaṃ yācitopi micchādassanassa gahitattā adatvā idaṃ ``bahuṃ vināsita''ntiādivacanaṃ abravi. ^b^niyatetaṃ abhuttabba^eb^nti etaṃ niyativasena tayā abhuñjitabbaṃ bhavissati, bhuñjantānampi abhuñjantānampi puññaṃ natthi. sabbe hi cullāsītimahākappe atikkamitvāva sujjhanti.
[22] natthi bhadde paro loko, kiṃ niratthaṃ vihaññasī'''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^bījakopī^eb^ti bījakopi pubbe kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tassa nissandena dāsikucchiyaṃ nibbattoti ^a^V7.0119^ea^ bījakavatthumpissā udāharaṇatthaṃ āhari. ^b^natthi bhadde^eb^ti bhadde, guṇācariyo evamāha ``natthi ayaṃ loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mātā, natthi pitā, natthi sattā opapātikā, natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā''ti. paraloke hi sati idhalokopi nāma bhaveyya, soyeva ca natthi. mātāpitūsu santesu puttadhītaro nāma bhaveyyūuṃ, teyeva ca natthi. dhamme sati dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā bhaveyyūṃ, teyeva ca natthi. kiṃ dānaṃ dentī sīlaṃ rakkhantī niratthaṃ vihaññasīti.

[03] tattha ^b^pubbāparaṃ dhamma^eb^nti bhikkhave, pitu vacanaṃ sutvā rucā rājadhītā atīte sattajātivasena pubbadhammaṃ, anāgate sattajātivasena anāgatadhammañca jānantī pitaraṃ micchādiṭṭhito mocetukāmā etaṃ ``sutamevā''tiādimāha. tattha ^b^samapajjathā^eb^ti yo puggalo bālūpasevī hoti, so bālova samapajjatīti etaṃ mayā pubbe sutameva, ajja pana paccakkhato diṭṭhaṃ. ^b^mūḷho^eb^ti maggamūḷhaṃ āgamma maggamūḷho viya diṭṭhimūḷhaṃ āgamma diṭṭhimūḷhopi uttari mohaṃ nigacchati, mūḷhataro hoti. ^b^alātenā^eb^ti deva, tumhehi jātigottakulapadesaissariyapuññapaññāhīnena alātasenāpatinā accantahīnena duppaññena bījakadāsena ca gāmadārakasadisaṃ ahirikaṃ bālaṃ guṇaṃ ājīvakaṃ āgamma muyhituṃ patirūpaṃ anucchavikaṃ. kiṃ te na muyhissantīti?
[03] evaṃ te ubhopi garahitvā diṭṭhito mocetukāmatāya pitaraṃ vaṇṇentī āha --
[22] kīṭova aggiṃ jalitaṃ apāpataṃ, upapajjati mohamūḷho naggabhāvaṃ..
[21] ``saṃsārasuddhīti pure niviṭṭhā, kammaṃ vidūsenti bahū ajānaṃ.
[22] pubbe kalī duggahitovanatthā, dummocayā balisā ambujovā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sappañño^eb^ti yasavayapuññatitthāvāsayonisomanasikārasākacchāvasena laddhāya paññāya sappañño, teneva kāraṇena ^b^dhīro,^eb^ dhīratāya atthānatthassa kāraṇākāraṇassa ^b^kovido. bālebhi sadisa^eb^nti yathā te bālā upagatā, tathā kathaṃ ^a^M7.0124^ea^ tvaṃ hīnadiṭṭhiṃ upagato. ^b^apāpata^eb^nti api āpataṃ, patantoti attho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- tāta, saṃsārena suddhīti laddhiyā sati yathā paṭaṅgakīṭo rattibhāge jalitaṃ aggiṃ disvā tappaccayaṃ dukkhaṃ ajānitvā mohena tattha patanto mahādukkhaṃ āpajjati, tathā guṇopi pañca kāmaguṇe pahāya mohamūḷho nirassādaṃ naggabhāvaṃ upapajjati.

[03] ^b^pure niviṭṭhā^eb^ti tāta, saṃsārena suddhīti kassaci vacanaṃ asutvā paṭhamameva niviṭṭho natthi, sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalanti gahitattā bahū janā ajānantā kammaṃ vidūsentā kammaphalampi vidūsentiyeva, evaṃ tesaṃ pubbe gahito kali parājayagāho duggahitova hotīti attho. ^b^dummocayā balisā ambujovā^eb^ti te pana evaṃ ajānantā micchādassanena anatthaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā bālā yathā nāma balisaṃ gilitvā ṭhito maccho balisā dummocayo hoti, evaṃ tamhā anatthā dummocayā honti.
[22] ācināti ca taṃ pāpaṃ, yena gacchati duggatiṃ..
[22] tasseva deva nissando, yañceso labhate sukhaṃ..
[21] ``khīyate cassa taṃ puññaṃ, tathā hi aguṇe rato.

[03] tattha ^b^niraye^eb^ti aṭṭhavidhe mahāniraye, soḷasavidhe ussadaniraye, lokantaraniraye ca. ^b^bhāro^eb^ti tāta, na tāva alātassa akusalabhāro pūrati. ^b^tassevā^eb^ti tassa pubbe katassa puññasseva nissando, yaṃ so alātasenāpati ajja sukhaṃ labhati. na hi tāta, etaṃ goghātakakammassa phalaṃ. pāpakammassa hi nāma vipāko iṭṭho kanto bhavissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ. ^b^aguṇe rato^eb^ti tathāhesa idāni akusalakamme rato. ^b^ujumagga^eb^nti dasakusalakammapathamaggaṃ. ^b^kummagga^eb^nti nirayagāmiakusalamaggaṃ.

[03] ^b^ohite tulamaṇḍale^eb^ti bhaṇḍapaṭicchanatthāya tulamaṇḍale laggetvā ṭhapite. ^b^unnametī^eb^ti uddhaṃ ukkhipati. ^b^ācina^eb^nti thokaṃ thokampi puññaṃ ācinanto pāpabhāraṃ otāretvā naro kalyāṇakammassa sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā devalokaṃ gacchati. ^b^saggātimāno^eb^ti sagge atimāno saggasampāpake sātaphale kalyāṇakamme abhirato. ``saggādhimāno''tipi pāṭho, saggaṃ adhikāraṃ katvā ṭhitacittoti ^a^V7.0122^ea^ attho. ^b^sātave rato^eb^ti esa bījakadāso sātave madhuravipāke kusaladhammeyeva rato. so imassa pāpakammassa khīṇakāle, kalyāṇakammassa phalena devaloke nibbattissati.
[03] yañcesa idāni dāsattaṃ upagato, na taṃ kalyāṇakammassa phalena. dāsattasaṃvattanikañhissa pubbe kataṃ pāpaṃ bhavissatīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti imamatthaṃ pakāsentī āha --
[21] ``khīyate cassa taṃ pāpaṃ, tathā hi vinaye rato.
[03] tattha ^a^M7.0126^ea^ ^b^mā hevuppathamāgamā^eb^ti tāta, tvaṃ imaṃ naggaṃ kassapājīvakaṃ upagantvā mā heva nirayagāmiṃ uppathaṃ agamā, mā pāpamakāsīti pitaraṃ ovadati.
[03] idānissa pāpūpasevanāya dosaṃ kalyāṇamittūpasevanāya ca guṇaṃ dassentī āha --
[21] ``yaṃ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṃ vā yadi vā asaṃ.
[22] sīlavantaṃ visīlaṃ vā, vasaṃ tasseva gacchati..
[22] sopi tādisako hoti, sahavāso hi tādiso..
[22] asanto nirayaṃ nenti, santo pāpenti suggati''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^santaṃ vā^eb^ti sappurisaṃ vā. ^b^yadi vā asa^eb^nti asappurisaṃ vā. ^b^saro diddho kalāpaṃvā^eb^ti mahārāja, yathā nāma halāhalavisalitto saro sarakalāpe khitto sabbaṃ taṃ visena alittampi sarakalāpaṃ limpati, visadiddhameva karoti, evameva pāpamitto pāpaṃ sevamāno attānaṃ sevamānaṃ paraṃ, tena samphuṭṭho taṃ samphusaṃ alittaṃ pāpena purisaṃ attanā ekajjhāsayaṃ karonto upalimpati. ^b^pūti vāyantī^eb^ti tassa te kusāpi duggandhā vāyanti. ^b^tagarañcā^eb^ti tagarañca aññañca gandhasampannaṃ gandhajātaṃ. ^b^eva^eb^nti evarūpā dhīrūpasevanā. dhīro hi attānaṃ sevamānaṃ dhīrameva karoti.

[03] ^b^tasmā^eb^ ^a^M7.0127^ea^ ^b^pattapuṭassevā^eb^ti yasmā tagarādipaliveṭhamānāni paṇṇānipi sugandhāni honti, tasmā palāsapattapuṭasseva paṇḍitūpasevanena ahampi paṇḍito bhavissāmīti evaṃ. ^b^ñatvā sampākamattano^eb^ti attano paripākaṃ paṇḍitabhāvaṃ parimāṇaṃ ñatvā asante pahāya paṇḍite sante seveyya. ``^b^nirayaṃ nentī^eb^''ti ettha devadattādīhi nirayaṃ, ``^b^pāpenti suggati'^eb^'nti ettha sāriputtattherādīhi sugatiṃ nītānaṃ vasena udāharaṇāni āharitabbāni.
[03] evaṃ rājadhītā chahi gāthāhi pitu dhammaṃ kathetvā idāni atīte attanā anubhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ dassentī āha --
[22] anāgatāpi satteva, yā gamissaṃ ito cutā..
[21] ``yā me sā sattamī jāti, ahu pubbe janādhipa.
[22] paṇḍitaṃ sutasampannaṃ, so maṃ atthe nivesayi..
[22] taṃ kammaṃ nihitaṃ aṭṭhā, nidhīva udakantike..
[22] phalaṃ pariyāga maṃ pacchā, bhutvā duṭṭhavisaṃ yathā..
[22] sakammunā apaccissaṃ, taṃ saraṃ na sukhaṃ labhe..

[03] tattha ^b^sattā^eb^ti mahārāja, idhalokaparalokā nāma sukatadukkaṭānañca phalaṃ nāma atthi. na hi saṃsāro satte sodhetuṃ sakkoti, sakammunā eva sattā sujjhanti. alātasenāpati ca bījakadāso ca ekameva jātiṃ anussaranti. na kevalaṃ eteva jātiṃ saranti, ahampi atīte satta jātiyo attano saṃsaritaṃ sarāmi, anāgatepi ito gantabbā satteva jānāmi. ^b^yā me sā^eb^ti yā sā mama atīte sattamī jāti āsi. ^b^kammāraputto^eb^ti tāya jātiyā ahaṃ magadhesu rājagahanagare suvaṇṇakāraputto ahosiṃ.

[03] ^b^paradārassa^eb^ ^a^V7.0125^ea^ ^b^heṭhento^eb^ti paradāraṃ heṭhentā paresaṃ rakkhitagopite varabhaṇḍe aparajjhantā. ^b^aṭṭhā^eb^ti taṃ tadā mayā kataṃ pāpakammaṃ okāsaṃ alabhitvā okāse sati vipākadāyakaṃ hutvā bhasmapaṭicchanno aggi viya nihitaṃ aṭṭhāsi. ^b^vaṃsabhūmiya^eb^nti vaṃsaraṭṭhe. ^b^ekaputto^eb^ti asītikoṭivibhave seṭṭhikule ahaṃ ekaputtakova ahosiṃ. ^b^sātave rata^eb^nti kalyāṇakamme abhirataṃ. ^b^so ma^eb^nti so sahāyako maṃ atthe kusalakamme patiṭṭhāpesi.

[03] ^b^taṃ kamma^eb^nti tampi me kataṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ tadā okāsaṃ alabhitvā okāse sati vipākadāyakaṃ hutvā udakantike nidhi viya nihitaṃ aṭṭhāsi. ^b^yameta^eb^nti atha mama santakesu pāpakammesu yaṃ etaṃ mayā magadhesu paradārikakammaṃ kataṃ, tassa phalaṃ pacchā maṃ pariyāgaṃ upagatanti attho. yathā kiṃ? ^b^bhutvā duṭṭhavisaṃ yathā,^eb^ yathā savisaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā ṭhitassa taṃ duṭṭhaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ halāhalaṃ visaṃ kuppati, tathā maṃ pariyāgatanti attho. ^b^tato^eb^ti tato kosambiyaṃ seṭṭhikulato. ^b^taṃ sara^eb^nti taṃ tasmiṃ niraye anubhūtadukkhaṃ sarantī cittasukhaṃ nāma na labhāmi, bhayameva me uppajjati. ^b^bhinnāgate^eb^ti bhinnāgate nāma raṭṭhe. ^b^uddhatapphalo^eb^ti uddhatabījo.
[03] so pana chagalako balasampanno ahosi. piṭṭhiyaṃ abhiruyhapi naṃ vāhayiṃsu, yānakepi yojayiṃsu. imamatthaṃ ^a^P6.0238^ea^ pakāsentī āha --
[21] ``sātaputtā ^a^M7.0129^ea^ mayā vūḷhā, piṭṭhiyā ca rathena ca.

[03] tattha ^b^sātaputtā^eb^ti amaccaputtā. ^b^tassa kammassā^eb^ti deva, roruve mahāniraye paccanañca chagalakakāle bījuppāṭanañca piṭṭhivāhanayānakayojanāni ca sabbopesa tassa nissando paradāragamanassa meti.

[03] tato pana cavitvā araññe kapiyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. atha naṃ jātadivase yūthapatino dassesuṃ. so ``ānetha me, putta''nti daḷhaṃ gahetvā tassa viravantassa dantehi phalāni uppāṭesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsentī āha --
[03] tattha ^b^niluñcitaphaloyevā^eb^ti tatrapāhaṃ pagabbhena yūthapatinā luñcitvā uppāṭitaphaloyeva ahosinti attho.
[27] niluñcito javo bhadro, yoggaṃ vūḷhaṃ ciraṃ mayā.
[27] nevitthī na pumā āsiṃ, manussatte sudullabhe.
[22] anāgatāpi satteva, yā gamissaṃ ito cutā..
[21] ``pariyāgataṃ taṃ kusalaṃ, yaṃ me kosambiyaṃ kataṃ.
[22] deve ceva manusse ca, sandhāvissaṃ ito cutā..
[22] thībhāvāpi na muccissaṃ, chaṭṭhā nigatiyo imā..
[22] devaputto javo nāma, yo me mālaṃ paṭicchati..
[21] ``muhutto viya so dibyo, idha vassāni soḷasa.
[22] rattindivo ca so dibyo, mānusiṃ saradosataṃ..
[22] kalyāṇaṃ yadi vā pāpaṃ, na hi kammaṃ vinassatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^dassanesū^eb^ti dassanaraṭṭhesu. ^b^pasū^eb^ti goṇo ahosiṃ. ^b^niluñcito^eb^ti vacchakāleyeva maṃ evaṃ manāpo bhavissatīti nibbījakamakaṃsu. sohaṃ niluñcito uddhatabījo javo bhadro ahosiṃ. ^b^vajjīsu kulamāgamā^eb^ti goyonito cavitvā vajjiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ mahābhogakule nibbattinti dasseti. ^b^nevitthī na pumā^eb^ti napuṃsakattaṃ sandhāya āha. ^b^bhavane tāvatiṃsāha^eb^nti tāvatiṃsabhavane ahaṃ.

[03] ^b^tattha ṭhitāhaṃ, vedeha, sarāmi jātiyo imā^eb^ti sā kira tasmiṃ devaloke ṭhitā ``ahaṃ evarūpaṃ devalokaṃ āgacchantī kuto nu kho āgatā''ti olokentī vajjiraṭṭhe mahābhogakule napuṃsakattabhāvato cavitvā tattha nibbattabhāvaṃ passi. tato ``kena nu kho kammena evarūpe ramaṇīye ṭhāne nibbattāmhī''ti olokentī kosambiyaṃ seṭṭhikule ^a^M7.0131^ea^ nibbattitvā kataṃ dānādikusalaṃ disvā ``etassa phalena nibbattāmhī''ti ñatvā ``anantarātīte napuṃsakattabhāve nibbattamānā kuto āgatāmhī''ti olokentī dassanaraṭṭhesu goyoniyaṃ mahādukkhassa anubhūtabhāvaṃ aññāsi. tato anantaraṃ jātiṃ anussaramānā vānarayoniyaṃ uddhataphalabhāvaṃ addasa. tato anantaraṃ anussarantī bhinnāgate chagalakayoniyaṃ uddhatabījabhāvaṃ anussari. tato paraṃ anussaramānā roruve nibbattabhāvaṃ anussari.

[03] athassā ^a^V7.0128^ea^ niraye tiracchānayoniyañca anubhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ anussarantiyā bhayaṃ uppajji. tato ``kena nu kho kammena evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ mayā''ti chaṭṭhaṃ jātiṃ olokentī tāya jātiyā kosambinagare kataṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ disvā sattamaṃ olokentī magadharaṭṭhe pāpasahāyaṃ nissāya kataṃ paradārikakammaṃ disvā ``etassa phalena me taṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhūta''nti aññāsi. atha ``ito cavitvā anāgate kuhiṃ nibbattissāmī''ti olokentī ``yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā puna sakkasseva paricārikā hutvā nibbattissāmī''ti aññāsi. evaṃ punappunaṃ olokayamānā ``tatiyepi attabhāve sakkasseva paricārikā hutvā nibbattissāmi, tathā catutthe, pañcame pana tasmiṃyeva devaloke javanadevaputtassa aggamahesī hutvā nibbattissāmī''ti ñatvā tato anantaraṃ olokentī ``chaṭṭhe attabhāve ito tāvatiṃsabhavanato cavitvā aṅgatirañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattissāmi, `rucā'ti me nāmaṃ bhavissatī''ti ñatvā ``tato anantarā kuhiṃ nibbattissāmī''ti olokentī ``sattamāya jātiyā tato cavitvā tāvatiṃsabhavane mahiddhiko devaputto hutvā nibbattissāmi, itthibhāvato ^a^P6.0240^ea^ muccissāmī''ti aññāsi. tasmā --
[22] anāgatāpi satteva, yā gamissaṃ ito cutā''ti.. -- ādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^pariyāgata^eb^nti pariyāyena attano vārena āgataṃ. ^b^satta jacco^eb^ti vajjiraṭṭhe napuṃsakajātiyā saddhiṃ devaloke pañca, ayañca chaṭṭhāti satta jātiyoti vuccanti. etā satta jātiyo niccaṃ sakkatapūjitā ^a^M7.0132^ea^ ahosinti dasseti. ^b^chaṭṭhā nigatiyo^eb^ti devaloke pana pañca, ayañca ekāti imā cha gatiyo itthibhāvāna muccissanti vadati. ^b^sattamī cā^eb^ti ito cavitvā anantaraṃ. ^b^santānamaya^eb^nti ekatovaṇṭakādivasena katasantānaṃ. ^b^ganthentī^eb^ti yathā santānamayā honti, evaṃ ajjapi mama paricārikā nandanavane mālaṃ ganthentiyeva. ^b^yo me mālaṃ paṭicchatī^eb^ti mahārāja, anantarajātiyaṃ mama sāmiko javo nāma devaputto yo rukkhato patitapatitaṃ mālaṃ paṭicchati.

[03] ^b^soḷasā^eb^ti mahārāja, mama jātiyā imāni soḷasa vassāni, ettako pana kālo devānaṃ eko muhutto, tena tā mama cutabhāvampi ajānantā mamatthāya mālaṃ ganthentiyeva. ^b^mānusi^eb^nti manussānaṃ vassagaṇanaṃ āgamma esa saradosataṃ vassasataṃ hoti, evaṃ dīghāyukā devā ^a^V7.0129^ea^. iminā pana kāraṇena paralokassa ca kalyāṇapāpakānañca kammānaṃ atthitaṃ jānāhi, devāti.

[03] ^b^anventī^eb^ti yathā maṃ anubandhiṃsu, evaṃ anubandhanti. ^b^na hi kammaṃ vinassatī^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ tasmiṃyeva attabhāve, upapajjavedanīyaṃ anantarabhave vipākaṃ deti, aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ pana vipākaṃ adatvā na nassati. taṃ sandhāya ``na hi kammaṃ vinassatī''ti vatvā ``deva, ahaṃ paradārikakammassa nissandena niraye ca tiracchānayoniyañca mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhaviṃ. sace pana tumhepi idāni guṇassa kathaṃ gahetvā evaṃ karissatha, mayā anubhūtasadisameva dukkhaṃ anubhavissatha, tasmā evaṃ mā karitthā''ti āha.
[21] ``yo icche puriso hotuṃ, jātiṃ jātiṃ punappunaṃ.
[21] ``yā icche puriso hotuṃ, jātiṃ jātiṃ punappunaṃ.
[22] attano hoti atthāya, itthī vā yadi vā pumā..
[22] asaṃsayaṃ tehi pure suciṇṇaṃ, kammassakāse puthu sabbasattā..
[21] ``iṅghānucintesi sayampi deva, kutonidānā te imā janinda.
[22] yā te imā accharāsannikāsā, alaṅkatā kañcanajālachannā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0130^ea^ ^a^P6.0241^ea^ ^b^hotu^eb^nti bhavituṃ. ^b^sabbasamantabhogā^eb^ti paripuṇṇasabbabhogā. ^b^suciṇṇa^eb^nti suṭṭhu ciṇṇaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ kataṃ. ^b^kammassakāse^eb^ti kammassakā attanā katakammasseva vipākapaṭisaṃvedino. na hi mātāpitūhi kataṃ kammaṃ puttadhītānaṃ vipākaṃ deti, na tāhi puttadhītāhi kataṃ kammaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ vipākaṃ deti. sesehi kataṃ sesānaṃ kimeva dassati? ^b^iṅghā^eb^ti codanatthe nipāto. ^b^anucintesī^eb^ti punappunaṃ cinteyyāsi. ^b^yā te imā^eb^ti yā imā soḷasasahassā itthiyo taṃ upaṭṭhahanti, imā te kutonidānā, kiṃ nipajjitvā niddāyantena laddhā, udāhu panthadūsanasandhicchedādīni pāpāni katvā, adu kalyāṇakammaṃ nissāya laddhāti idaṃ tāva attanāpi cinteyyāsi, devāti.
[03] evaṃ sā pitaraṃ anusāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] tattha ^b^icceva^eb^nti bhikkhave, iti imehi evarūpehi madhurehi vacanehi rucākaññā pitaraṃ tosesi, mūḷhassa maggaṃ viya tassa sugatimaggaṃ ācikkhi, nānānayehi sucaritadhammaṃ akkhāsi. dhammaṃ kathentīyeva sā subbatā sundaravatā attano atītajātiyopi kathesi.

[03] evaṃ pubbaṇhato paṭṭhāya sabbarattiṃ pitu dhammaṃ desetvā ``mā, deva, naggassa micchādiṭṭhikassa vacanaṃ gaṇhi, `atthi ayaṃ loko, atthi paraloko ^a^M7.0134^ea^, atthi sukaṭadukkaṭakammānaṃ phala'nti vadantassa mādisassa kalyāṇamittassa vacanaṃ gaṇha, mā atitthena pakkhandī''ti āha. evaṃ santepi pitaraṃ micchādassanā mocetuṃ nāsakkhi. so hi kevalaṃ tassā madhuravacanaṃ sutvā tussi. mātāpitaro hi piyaputtānaṃ vacanaṃ piyāyanti, na pana taṃ micchādassanaṃ vissajjesi. nagarepi ``rucā kira rājadhītā pitu dhammaṃ desetvā micchādassanaṃ vissajjāpesī''ti ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi. ``paṇḍitā rājadhītā ajja pitaraṃ micchādassanā mocetvā nagaravāsīnaṃ sotthibhāvaṃ karissatī''ti mahājano tussi. sā pitaraṃ bodhetuṃ asakkontī vīriyaṃ avissajjetvāva ``yena kenaci upāyena pitu sotthibhāvaṃ karissāmī''ti sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ patiṭṭhapetvā dasadisā namassitvā ``imasmiṃ loke lokasandhārakā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā nāma lokapāladevatā nāma mahābrahmāno nāma atthi, te idhāgantvā attano balena mama pitaraṃ micchādassanaṃ vissajjāpentu ^a^P6.0242^ea^, etassa guṇe asatipi mama ^a^V7.0131^ea^ guṇena mama sīlena mama saccena idhāgantvā imaṃ micchādassanaṃ vissajjāpetvā sakalalokassa sotthiṃ karontū''ti adhiṭṭhahitvā namassi.

[03] tadā bodhisatto nārado nāma mahābrahmā ahosi. bodhisattā ca nāma attano mettābhāvanāya anuddayāya mahantabhāvena suppaṭipannaduppaṭipanne satte dassanatthaṃ kālānukālaṃ lokaṃ olokenti. so taṃ divasaṃ lokaṃ olokento taṃ rājadhītaraṃ pitu micchādiṭṭhimocanatthaṃ lokasandhārakadevatāyo namassamānaṃ disvā, ``ṭhapetvā maṃ añño etaṃ rājānaṃ micchādassanaṃ vissajjāpetuṃ samattho nāma natthi, ajja mayā rājadhītu saṅgahaṃ, rañño ca saparijanassa sotthibhāvaṃ katvā āgantuṃ vaṭṭati, kena nu kho vesena gamissāmī''ti cintetvā ``manussānaṃ pabbajitā piyā ceva garuno ca ādeyyavacanā ca, tasmā pabbajitavesena gamissāmī''ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā pāsādikaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ manussattabhāvaṃ māpetvā manuññaṃ jaṭāmaṇḍalaṃ bandhitvā jaṭantare kañcanasūciṃ odahitvā anto rattapaṭaṃ upari rattavākacīraṃ nivāsetvā pārupitvā suvaṇṇatārākhacitaṃ rajatamayaṃ ajinacammaṃ ekaṃse katvā muttāsikkāya pakkhittaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ bhikkhābhājanaṃ ādāya tīsu ṭhānesu onataṃ suvaṇṇakājaṃ khandhe katvā muttāsikkāya ^a^M7.0135^ea^ eva pavāḷakamaṇḍaluṃ ādāya iminā isivesena gaganatale cando viya virocamāno ākāsena āgantvā alaṅkatacandakapāsādamahātalaṃ pavisitvā rañño purato ākāse aṭṭhāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] tattha ^b^addā^eb^ti brahmaloke ṭhitova jambudīpaṃ avekkhanto guṇājīvakassa santike gahitamicchādassanaṃ rājānaṃ aṅgatiṃ addasa, tasmā āgatoti attho. ^b^tato patiṭṭhā^eb^ti tato so brahmā tassa rañño amaccagaṇaparivutassa nisinnassa purato ^a^P6.0243^ea^ tasmiṃ pāsāde apade padaṃ dassento ākāse patiṭṭhahi. ^b^anuppatta^eb^nti āgataṃ. ^b^isi^eb^nti isivesena āgatattā satthā ``isi''nti āha. ^b^avandathā^eb^ti ``mamānuggahena mama pitari kāruññaṃ katvā eko devarājā āgato ^a^V7.0132^ea^ bhavissatī''ti haṭṭhapahaṭṭhā vātābhihaṭā suvaṇṇakadalī viya onamitvā nāradabrahmānaṃ avandi.
[03] rājāpi taṃ disvāva brahmatejena tajjito attano āsane saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto āsanā oruyha bhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā āgataṭṭhānañca nāmagottañca pucchi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] `kuto nu āgacchasi devavaṇṇi, obhāsayaṃ sabbadisā candimāva.
[22] akkhāhi me pucchito nāmagottaṃ, kathaṃ taṃ jānanti manussaloke'''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^byathitamānaso^eb^ti bhītacitto. ^b^kuto nū^eb^ti kacci nu kho vijjādharo bhaveyyāti maññamāno avanditvāva evaṃ pucchi.
[03] atha ^a^M7.0136^ea^ so ``ayaṃ rājā `paraloko natthī'ti maññati, paralokamevassa tāva ācikkhissāmī''ti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``ahañhi devato idāni emi, obhāsayaṃ sabbadisā candimāva.
[22] akkhāmi te pucchito nāmagottaṃ, jānanti maṃ nārado kassapo cā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^devato^eb^ti devalokato. ^b^nārado kassapo cā^eb^ti maṃ nāmena nārado, gottena kassapoti jānanti.
[03] atha rājā ``imaṃ pacchāpi paralokaṃ pucchissāmi, iddhiyā laddhakāraṇaṃ tāva pucchissāmī''ti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``accherarūpaṃ tava yādisañca, vehāyasaṃ gacchasi tiṭṭhasī ca.
[22] pucchāmi taṃ nārada etamatthaṃ, atha kena vaṇṇena tavāyamiddhī''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^V7.0133^ea^ ^b^yādisañcā^eb^ti yādisañca tava saṇṭhānaṃ, yañca tvaṃ ākāse gacchasi tiṭṭhasi ca, idaṃ acchariyajātaṃ.
[21] ``saccañca dhammo ca damo ca cāgo, guṇā mamete pakatā purāṇā.
[22] teheva dhammehi susevitehi, manojalo yena kāmaṃ gatosmī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sacca^eb^nti musāvādavirahitaṃ vacīsaccaṃ. ^b^dhammo^eb^ti tividhasucaritadhammo ceva kasiṇaparikammajhānadhammo ca. ^b^damo^eb^ti indriyadamanaṃ. ^b^cāgo^eb^ti kilesapariccāgo ca deyyadhammapariccāgo ca. ^b^mamete guṇā^eb^ti mama ete guṇasampayuttā guṇasahagatā. ^b^pakatā purāṇā^eb^ti mayā purimabhave katāti dasseti. ^b^``teheva dhammehi susevitehī''^eb^ti te sabbe guṇe susevite paricārite dasseti. ^b^manojavo^eb^ti iddhiyā ^a^M7.0137^ea^ kāraṇena paṭiladdho. ^b^yena kāmaṃ gatosmī^eb^ti yena devaṭṭhāne ca manussaṭṭhāne ca gantuṃ icchanaṃ, tena gatosmīti attho.
[03] rājā evaṃ tasmiṃ kathentepi micchādassanassa gahitattā paralokaṃ asaddahanto ``atthi nu kho puññavipāko''ti vatvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``accheramācikkhasi puññasiddhiṃ, sace hi etehi yathā vadesi.
[22] pucchāmi taṃ nārada etamatthaṃ, puṭṭho ca me sādhu viyākarohī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^puññasiddhi^eb^nti puññānaṃ siddhiṃ phaladāyakattaṃ ācikkhanto acchariyaṃ ācikkhasi.
[21] ``pucchassu maṃ rāja tavesa attho, yaṃ saṃsayaṃ kuruse bhūmipāla.
[22] ahaṃ taṃ nissaṃsayataṃ gamemi, nayehi ñāyehi ca hetubhī cā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^tavesa attho^eb^ti pucchitabbako nāma tava esa attho. ^b^yaṃ saṃsaya^eb^nti yaṃ kismiñcideva ^a^V7.0134^ea^ atthe saṃsayaṃ karosi, taṃ maṃ puccha. ^b^nissaṃsayata^eb^nti ahaṃ taṃ nissaṃsayabhāvaṃ gamemi. ^b^nayehī^eb^ti kāraṇavacanehi. ^b^ñāyehī^eb^ti ñāṇehi. ^b^hetubhī^eb^ti paccayehi, paṭiññāmatteneva avatvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā kāraṇavacanena ca tesaṃ dhammānaṃ samuṭṭhāpakapaccayehi ca taṃ nissaṃsayaṃ karissāmīti attho.
[21] ``pucchāmi taṃ nārada etamatthaṃ, puṭṭho ca me nārada mā musā bhaṇi.
[22] atthi nu devā pitaro nu atthi, loko paro atthi jano yamāhū''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^jano yamāhū^eb^ti yaṃ jano evamāha -- ``atthi devā, atthi pitaro, atthi paro loko''ti, taṃ sabbaṃ atthi nu khoti pucchati.
[21] ``attheva devā pitaro ca atthi, loko paro atthi jano yamāhu.
[22] kāmesu giddhā ca narā pamūḷhā, lokaṃ paraṃ na vidū mohayuttā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^attheva devā^eb^ti mahārāja, devā ca pitaro ca atthi, yampi jano paralokamāha, sopi attheva. ^b^na vidū^eb^ti kāmagiddhā pana mohamūḷhā janā paralokaṃ na vidanti na jānantīti.
[03] taṃ sutvā rājā parihāsaṃ karonto evamāha --
[21] ``atthīti ce nārada saddahāsi, nivesanaṃ paraloke matānaṃ.
[22] idheva me pañca satāni dehi, dassāmi te paraloke sahassa''nti..
[03] atha naṃ mahāsatto parisamajjheyeva garahanto āha --
[21] ``dajjemu ^a^V7.0135^ea^ kho pañca satāni bhoto, jaññāmu ce sīlavantaṃ vadaññuṃ.
[22] luddaṃ taṃ bhontaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassaṃ..
[21] ``idheva yo hoti adhammasīlo, pāpācāro alaso luddakammo.
[22] na paṇḍitā tasmiṃ iṇaṃ dadanti, na hi āgamo hoti tathāvidhamhā..
[21] ``dakkhañca ^a^P6.0246^ea^ posaṃ manujā viditvā, uṭṭhānakaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadaññuṃ.
[22] sayameva bhogehi nimantayanti, kammaṃ karitvā puna māharesī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0139^ea^ ^b^jaññāmu ce^eb^ti yadi mayaṃ bhavantaṃ ``sīlavā esa vadaññū, dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ imasmiṃ kāle iminā nāmatthoti jānitvā tassa tassa kiccassa kārako vadaññū''ti jāneyyāma. atha te vaḍḍhiyā pañca satāni dadeyyāma, tvaṃ pana luddo sāhasiko micchādassanaṃ gahetvā dānasālaṃ viddhaṃsetvā paradāresu aparajjhasi, ito cuto niraye uppajjissasi, evaṃ luddaṃ taṃ niraye vasantaṃ bhontaṃ tattha gantvā ko ``sahassaṃ me dehī''ti codessati. ^b^tathāvidhamhā^eb^ti tādisā purisā dinnassa iṇassa puna āgamo nāma na hoti. ^b^dakkha^eb^nti dhanuppādanakusalaṃ. ^b^puna māharesī^eb^ti attano kammaṃ karitvā dhanaṃ uppādetvā puna amhākaṃ santakaṃ āhareyyāsi, mā nikkammo vasīti sayameva bhogehi nimantayantīti.

[03] iti rājā tena niggayhamāno appaṭibhāno ahosi. mahājano haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā ``mahiddhiko devopi ajja rājānaṃ micchādassanaṃ vissajjāpessatī''ti sakalanagaraṃ ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi. mahāsattassānubhāvena tadā sattayojanikāya mithilāya tassa dhammadesanaṃ assuṇanto nāma nāhosi. atha mahāsatto ``ayaṃ rājā ativiya daḷhaṃ micchādassanaṃ gaṇhi, nirayabhayena naṃ santajjetvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ vissajjāpetvā puna devalokena assāsessāmī''ti cintetvā ``mahārāja, sace diṭṭhiṃ na vissajjessasi, evaṃ anantadukkhaṃ nirayaṃ gamissasī''ti vatvā nirayakathaṃ paṭṭhapesi --
[21] ``ito cuto dakkhasi tattha rāja, kākolasaṅghehi vikassamānaṃ.
[27] taṃ khajjamānaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, kākehi gijjhehi ca senakehi.
[22] sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^V7.0136^ea^ ^b^kākolasaṅghehī^eb^ti lohatuṇḍehi kākasaṅghehi. ^b^vikassamāna^eb^nti attānaṃ ākaḍḍhiyamānaṃ tattha niraye passissasi. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ bhavantaṃ.
[03] taṃ ^a^P6.0247^ea^ ^a^M7.0140^ea^ pana kākolanirayaṃ vaṇṇetvā ``sacepi ettha na nibbattissasi, lokantaraniraye nibbattissasī''ti vatvā taṃ nirayaṃ dassetuṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``andhaṃtamaṃ tattha na candasūriyā, nirayo sadā tumulo ghorarūpo.
[22] sā neva rattī na divā paññāyati, tathāvidhe ko vicare dhanatthiko''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^andhaṃ tama^eb^nti mahārāja, yamhi lokantaraniraye micchādiṭṭhikā nibbattanti, tattha cakkhuviññāṇassa uppattinivāraṇaṃ andhatamaṃ. ^b^sadā tumulo^eb^ti so nirayo niccaṃ bahalandhakāro. ^b^ghorarūpo^eb^ti bhīsanakajātiko. ^b^sā neva rattī^eb^ti yā idha ratti divā ca, sā neva tattha paññāyati. ^b^ko vicare^eb^ti ko uddhāraṃ sodhento vicarissati.
[03] tampissa lokantaranirayaṃ vitthārena vaṇṇetvā ``mahārāja, micchādiṭṭhiṃ avissajjento na kevalaṃ etadeva, aññampi dukkhaṃ anubhavissasī''ti dassento gāthamāha --
[21] ``sabalo ca sāmo ca duve suvānā, pavaddhakāyā balino mahantā.
[22] khādanti dantehi ayomayehi, ito paṇunnaṃ paralokapatta''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^ito paṇunna^eb^nti imamhā manussalokā cutaṃ. parato nirayesupi eseva nayo. tasmā sabbāni tāni nirayaṭṭhānāni nirayapālānaṃ upakkamehi saddhiṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva vitthāretvā tāsaṃ tāsaṃ gāthānaṃ anuttānāni padāni vaṇṇetabbāni.
[21] ``taṃ khajjamānaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, luddehi vāḷehi aghammigehi ca.
[22] sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^luddehī^eb^ti dāruṇehi. ^b^vāḷehī^eb^ti duṭṭhehi. ^b^aghammigehī^eb^ti aghāvahehi migehi, dukkhāvahehi sunakhehīti attho.
[21] ``usūhi ^a^V7.0137^ea^ ^a^P6.0248^ea^ ^a^M7.0141^ea^ sattīhi ca sunisitāhi, hananti vijjhanti ca paccamittā.
[22] kāḷūpakāḷā nirayamhi ghore, pubbe naraṃ dukkaṭakammakāri''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^hananti vijjhanti cā^eb^ti jalitāya ayapathaviyaṃ pātetvā sakalasarīraṃ chiddāvachiddaṃ karontā paharanti ceva vijjhanti ca. ^b^kāḷūpakāḷā^eb^ti evaṃnāmakā nirayapālā. ^b^nirayamhī^eb^ti tasmiṃ tesaññeva vasena kāḷūpakāḷasaṅkhāte niraye. ^b^dukkaṭakammakāri^eb^nti micchādiṭṭhivasena dukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ kārakaṃ.
[21] ``taṃ haññamānaṃ niraye vajantaṃ, kucchismiṃ passasmiṃ vipphālitūdaraṃ.
[22] sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ bhavantaṃ tattha niraye tathā haññamānaṃ. ^b^vajanta^eb^nti ito cito ca dhāvantaṃ. ^b^kucchismi^eb^nti kucchiyañca passe ca haññamānaṃ vijjhiyamānanti attho.
[21] ``sattī usū tomarabhiṇḍivālā, vividhāvudhā vassanti tattha devā.

[03] tattha ^b^aṅgāramivaccimanto^eb^ti jalitāṅgārā viya accimantā āvudhavisesā patanti. ^b^silāsanī^eb^ti jalitasilāsani. ^b^vassati luddakamme^eb^ti yathā nāma deve vassante asani patati, evameva ākāse samuṭṭhāya cicciṭāyamānaṃ jalitasilāvassaṃ tesaṃ luddakammānaṃ upari patati.
[21] ``uṇho ca vāto nirayamhi dussaho, na tamhi sukhaṃ labbhati ittarampi.
[22] taṃ taṃ vidhāvantamalenamāturaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa''nti..
[22] patodalaṭṭhīhi ^a^P6.0249^ea^ sucodayantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^V7.0138^ea^ ^b^rathesu yutta^eb^nti vārena vāraṃ tesu jalitaloharathesu yuttaṃ. ^b^kamanta^eb^nti akkamamānaṃ. ^b^sucodayanta^eb^nti suṭṭhu codayantaṃ.
[22] sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^tamāruhanta^eb^nti taṃ bhavantaṃ jalitāvudhapahāre asahitvā jalitakhurehi sañcitaṃ jalitalohapabbataṃ āruhantaṃ.
[22] sudaḍḍhagattaṃ kapaṇaṃ rudantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^kaṇṭakanicitā^eb^ti jalitakaṇṭakehi citā. ^b^``ayomayehī''^eb^ti idaṃ yehi kaṇṭakehi ācitā, te dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
[03] tattha ^b^tamāruhantī^eb^ti taṃ evarūpaṃ simbalirukkhaṃ āruhanti. ^b^yamaniddesakāribhī^eb^ti yamassa vacanakarehi, nirayapālehīti attho.
[22] dumagge vitacaṃ gattaṃ, ko taṃ yāceyya taṃ dhana''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^vidaḍḍhakāya^eb^nti vihiṃsitakāyaṃ. ^b^vitaca^eb^nti cammamaṃsānaṃ chiddāvachiddaṃ chinnatāya koviḷārapupphaṃ viya kiṃsukapupphaṃ viya ca.
[22] sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^tamāruhanta^eb^nti taṃ bhavantaṃ nirayapālānaṃ āvudhapahāre asahitvā āruhantaṃ.
[22] sampatitaṃ vetaraṇiṃ, ko taṃ yāceyya taṃ dhana''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^kharā^eb^ti pharusā. ^b^ayopokkharasañchannā^eb^ti ayomayehi tikhiṇapariyantehi pokkharapattehi sañchannā. ^b^pattehī^eb^ti tehi pattehi sā nadī tikkhā hutvā sandati.
[22] vetaraññe anālambe, ko taṃ yāceyya taṃ dhana''nti..
[03] imaṃ ^a^M7.0144^ea^ pana mahāsattassa nirayakathaṃ sutvā rājā saṃviggahadayo mahāsattaññeva tāṇagavesī hutvā āha --
[21] ``vedhāmi rukkho viya chijjamāno, disaṃ na jānāmi pamūḷhasañño.
[22] bhayānutappāmi mahā ca me bhayā, sutvāna kathā tava bhāsitā ise..
[22] andhakāreva pajjoto, tvaṃ nosi saraṇaṃ ise..
[21] ``atthañca ^a^P6.0251^ea^ dhammaṃ anusāsa maṃ ise, atītamaddhā aparādhitaṃ mayā.
[22] ācikkha me nārada suddhimaggaṃ, yathā ahaṃ no nirayaṃ pateyya''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^bhayānutappāmī^eb^ti attanā katassa pāpassa bhayena anutappāmi. ^b^mahā ca me bhayā^eb^ti mahantañca me nirayabhayaṃ uppannaṃ. ^b^dipaṃvoghe^eb^ti dīpaṃva oghe. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- āditte kāle vārimajjhaṃ viya bhinnanāvānaṃ oghe aṇṇave patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamānānaṃ dīpaṃ viya andhakāragatānaṃ pajjoto viya ca tvaṃ no ise saraṇaṃ bhava. ^b^atītamaddhā aparādhitaṃ mayā^eb^ti ekaṃsena mayā atītaṃ kammaṃ aparādhitaṃ virādhitaṃ, kusalaṃ atikkamitvā akusalameva katanti.
[03] athassa mahāsatto visuddhimaggaṃ ācikkhituṃ sammāpaṭipanne porāṇakarājāno udāharaṇavasena dassento āha --
[22] usindaro cāpi sivī ca rājā, paricārakā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ..
[21] ``ete caññe ca rājāno, ye saggavisayaṃ gatā.
[21] ``annahatthā ^a^V7.0141^ea^ ^a^M7.0145^ea^ ca te byamhe, ghosayantu pure tava.
[27] `ko chāto ko ca tasito, ko mālaṃ ko vilepanaṃ.
[21] `ko panthe chattamāneti, pādukā ca mudū subhā'.
[22] iti sāyañca pāto ca, ghosayantu pure tava..
[21] ``jiṇṇaṃ posaṃ gavāssañca, māssu yuñja yathā pure.

[03] tattha ^b^ete cā^eb^ti yathā ete ca dhataraṭṭho vessāmitto aṭṭhako yāmataggi usindaro sivīti cha rājāno aññe ca dhammaṃ caritvā saggavisayaṃ gatā, evaṃ tvampi adhammaṃ parivajjetvā dhammaṃ cara. ^b^ko chāto^eb^ti mahārāja, tava byamhe pure rājanivesane ceva nagare ca annahatthā purisā ``ko chāto, ko tasito''ti tesaṃ dātukāmatāya ghosentu. ^b^ko māla^eb^nti ko mālaṃ icchati, ko ^a^P6.0252^ea^ vilepanaṃ icchati, nānārattānaṃ vatthānaṃ yaṃ yaṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ ko naggo paridahissatīti ghosentu. ^b^ko panthe chattamānetī^eb^ti ko panthe chattaṃ dhārayissati. ^b^pādukā cā^eb^ti upāhanā ca mudū subhā ko icchati.

[03] ^b^jiṇṇaṃ posa^eb^nti yo te upaṭṭhākesu amacco vā añño vā pubbe katūpakāro jarājiṇṇakāle yathā porāṇakāle kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, yepi te gavāssādayo jiṇṇatāya kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti, tesu ekampi pubbe viya kammesu mā yojayi. jiṇṇakālasmiñhi te tāni kammāni kātuṃ na sakkonti. ^b^parihārañcā^eb^ti idha parivāro ``parihāro''ti vutto. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yo ca te balī hutvā adhikārakato pubbe katūpakāro hoti, tassa jarājiṇṇakāle yathāporāṇaparivāraṃ dadeyyāsi. asappurisā hi attano upakārakānaṃ upakāraṃ kātuṃ samatthakāleyeva sammānaṃ karonti, samatthakāle pana na olokenti. sappurisā pana asamatthakālepi tesaṃ tatheva sakkāraṃ karonti, tasmā tuvampi evaṃ kareyyāsīti.

[03] iti ^a^M7.0146^ea^ mahāsatto rañño dānakathañca sīlakathañca kathetvā idāni yasmā ayaṃ rājā attano ^a^V7.0142^ea^ attabhāve rathena upametvā vaṇṇiyamāne tussissati, tasmāssa sabbakāmaduharathopamāya dhammaṃ desento āha --
[22] satipatodo dhīrassa, dhiti yogo ca rasmiyo..
[22] icchā lobho ca kummaggo, ujumaggo ca saṃyamo..
[22] paññā ākoṭanī rāja, tattha attāva sārathi..
[22] sabbakāmaduho rāja, na jātu nirayaṃ vaje''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0147^ea^ ^b^rathasaññāto^eb^ti mahārāja, tava kāyo rathoti saññāto hotu. ^b^manosārathiko^eb^ti manasaṅkhātena kusalacittena sārathinā samannāgato. ^b^lahū^eb^ti vigatathinamiddhatāya sallahuko. ^b^avihiṃsāsāritakkho^eb^ti avihiṃsāmayena sāritena suṭṭhu pariniṭṭhitena akkhena samannāgato. ^b^saṃvibhāgapaṭicchado^eb^ti dānasaṃvibhāgamayena paṭicchadena samannāgato. ^b^pādasaññamanemiyo^eb^ti pādasaṃyamamayāya nemiyā samannāgato. ^b^hatthasaññamapakkharo^eb^ti hatthasaṃyamamayena pakkharena samannāgato. ^b^kucchisaññamanabbhanto^eb^ti kucchisaṃyamasaṅkhātena mitabhojanamayena telena abbhanto. ``abbhañjitabbo nābhi hotū''tipi pāṭho. ^b^vācāsaññamakūjano^eb^ti vācāsaṃyamena akūjano.

[03] ^b^saccavākyasamattaṅgo^eb^ti saccavākyena paripuṇṇāṅgo akhaṇḍarathaṅgo. ^b^apesuññasusaññato^eb^ti apesuññena suṭṭhu saññato samussito. ^b^girāsakhilanelaṅgo^eb^ti sakhilāya saṇhavācāya niddosaṅgo maṭṭharathaṅgo. ^b^mitabhāṇisilesito^eb^ mitabhāṇasaṅkhātena silesena suṭṭhu sambandho. ^b^saddhālobhasusaṅkhāro^eb^ti kammaphalasaddahanasaddhāmayena ca alobhamayena ca sundarena alaṅkārena samannāgato. ^b^nivātañjalikubbaro^eb^ti sīlavantānaṃ nivātamayena ceva añjalikammamayena ca kubbarena samannāgato. ^b^athaddhatānatīsāko^eb^ti sakhilasammodabhāvasaṅkhātāya athaddhatāya anataīso, thokanataīsoti attho. ^b^sīlasaṃvaranandhano^eb^ti akhaṇḍapañcasīlacakkhundriyādisaṃvarasaṅkhātāya nandhanarajjuyā samannāgato.

[03] ^b^akkodhanamanugghātī^eb^ti akkodhanabhāvasaṅkhātena anugghātena samannāgato. ^b^dhammapaṇḍara-chattako^eb^ti dasakusaladhammasaṅkhātena paṇḍaracchattena samannāgato. ^b^bāhusaccamapālambo^eb^ti atthasannissitabahussutabhāvamayena apālambena samannāgato. ^b^ṭhitacittamupādhiyo^eb^ti lokadhammehi avikampanabhāvena suṭṭhu ṭhitaekaggabhāvappattacittasaṅkhātena upādhinā uttarattharaṇena vā rājāsanena samannāgato. ^b^kālaññutācittasāro^eb^ti ``ayaṃ dānassa dinnakālo, ayaṃ sīlassa rakkhanakālo''ti evaṃ kālaññutāsaṅkhātena kālaṃ jānitvā katena cittena ^a^M7.0148^ea^ kusalasārena samannāgato. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā, mahārāja, rathassa nāma āṇiṃ ādiṃ katvā dabbasambhārajātaṃ parisuddhaṃ sāramayañca icchitabbaṃ, evañhi so ratho addhānakkhamo hoti, evaṃ tavapi kāyaratho kālaṃ jānitvā katena cittena parisuddhena dānādikusalasārena samannāgato hotūti. ^b^vesārajjatidaṇḍako^eb^ti parisamajjhe kathentassapi visāradabhāvasaṅkhātena tidaṇḍena ^a^V7.0144^ea^ samannāgato. ^b^nivātavuttiyottako^eb^ti ovāde pavattanasaṅkhātena mudunā dhurayottena samannāgato ^a^P6.0254^ea^. mudunā hi dhurayottena baddharathaṃ sindhavā sukhaṃ vahanti, evaṃ tava kāyarathopi paṇḍitānaṃ ovādappavattitāya ābaddho sukhaṃ yātūti attho. ^b^anatimānayugo lahū^eb^ti anatimānasaṅkhātena lahukena yugena samannāgato.

[03] ^b^alīnacittasanthāro^eb^ti yathā ratho nāma dantamayena uḷārena santhārena sobhati, evaṃ tava kāyarathopi dānādinā alīnāsaṅkuṭitacittasanthāro hotu. ^b^vuddhisevī rajohato^eb^ti yathā ratho nāma visamena rajuṭṭhānamaggena gacchanto rajokiṇṇo na sobhati, samena virajena maggena gacchanto sobhati, evaṃ tava kāyarathopi paññāvuddhisevitāya samatalaṃ ujumaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā hatarajo hotu. ^b^satipatodo dhīrassā^eb^ti paṇḍitassa tava tasmiṃ kāyarathe supatiṭṭhitasatipatodo hotu. ^b^dhiti yogo ca rasmiyo^eb^ti abbocchinnavīriyasaṅkhātā dhiti ca hitappaṭipattiyaṃ yuñjanabhāvasaṅkhāto yogo ca tava tasmiṃ kāyarathe vaṭṭitā thirā rasmiyo hontu. ^b^mano dantaṃ pathaṃ neti, samadantehi vāhibhī^eb^ti yathā ratho nāma visamadantehi sindhavehi uppathaṃ yāti, samadantehi samasikkhitehi yutto ujupathameva anveti, evaṃ manopi dantaṃ nibbisevanaṃ kummaggaṃ pahāya ujumaggaṃ gaṇhāti. tasmā sudantaṃ ācārasampannaṃ cittaṃ tava kāyarathassa sindhavakiccaṃ sādhetu. ^b^icchālobho cā^eb^ti appattesu vatthūsu icchā, pattesu lobhoti ayaṃ icchā ca lobho ca kummaggo nāma. kuṭilo anujumaggo apāyameva neti. dasakusalakammapathavasena pana aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena vā pavatto sīlasaṃyamo ujumaggo nāma. so tava kāyarathassa maggo hotu.

[03] ^b^rūpe^eb^ti ^a^M7.0149^ea^ etesu manāpiyesu rūpādīsu kāmaguṇesu nimittaṃ gahetvā dhāvantassa tava kāyarathassa uppathaṃ paṭipannassa rājarathassa sindhave ākoṭetvā nivāraṇapatodayaṭṭhi viya paññā ākoṭanī hotu. sā hi taṃ uppathagamanato nivāretvā ujuṃ sucaritamaggaṃ āropessati. ^b^tattha attāva sārathī^eb^ti tasmiṃ pana te kāyarathe añño sārathi nāma natthi, tava attāva sārathi hotu. ^b^sace etena yānenā^eb^ti mahārāja, yassetaṃ evarūpaṃ yānaṃ sace atthi, etena yānena. ^b^samacariyā daḷhā dhitī^eb^ti yassa samacariyā ca dhiti ca daḷhā hoti thirā, so etena yānena yasmā esa ratho sabbakāmaduho rāja, yathādhippete sabbakāme deti, tasmā na jātu nirayaṃ vaje, ekaṃsenetaṃ dhārehi, evarūpena yānena nirayaṃ na gacchasīti attho. iti kho, mahārāja, yaṃ maṃ avaca ``ācikkha me, nārada, suddhimaggaṃ, yathā ahaṃ no niraye pateyya''nti, ayaṃ te so mayā anekapariyāyena akkhātoti.

[03] evamassa ^a^V7.0145^ea^ dhammaṃ desetvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ jahāpetvā sīle patiṭṭhāpetvā ``ito paṭṭhāya pāpamitte pahāya kalyāṇamitte upasaṅkama, niccaṃ appamatto hohī''ti ovādaṃ datvā rājadhītu guṇaṃ vaṇṇetvā rājaparisāya ^a^P6.0255^ea^ ca rājorodhānañca ovādaṃ datvā mahantenānubhāvena tesaṃ passantānaññeva brahmalokaṃ gato.
[03] satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā ``na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi mayā diṭṭhijālaṃ bhinditvā uruvelakassapo damitoyevā''ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānento imā gāthā abhāsi --
[22] ānando sā rucā āsi, yā rājānaṃ pasādayi..

[03] ^b^paṇḍu^eb^ ^a^V7.0146^ea^ ^a^M7.0151^ea^ ^b^kisiyāsi dubbalā^eb^ti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto attano paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha kathesi. ekadivasañhi bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ ``āvuso, satthā mahāpañño puthupañño gambhīrapañño javanapañño hāsapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño parappavādamaddano, attano paññānubhāvena khattiyapaṇḍitādīhi abhisaṅkhate sukhumapañhe bhinditvā te dametvā nibbisevane katvā tīsu saraṇesu ceva sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā amatagāmimaggaṃ paṭipādesī''ti. satthā āgantvā ``kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā''ti pucchitvā ``imāya nāmā''ti vutte ``anacchariyaṃ, bhikkhave, yaṃ tathāgato paramābhisambodhippatto parappavādaṃ bhinditvā khattiyādayo dameyya. purimabhavasmiñhi bodhiñāṇaṃ pariyesantopi tathāgato paññavā parappavādamaddanoyeva. tathā hi ahaṃ vidhurakāle saṭṭhiyojanubbedhe kāḷapabbatamuddhani puṇṇakaṃ nāma yakkhasenāpatiṃ attano ñāṇabaleneva dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā pañcasīlesu patiṭṭhāpento attano jīvitaṃ dāpesi''nti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.

[03] atīte kururaṭṭhe indapatthanagare dhanañcayakorabyo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. vidhurapaṇḍito nāma amacco tassa atthadhammānusāsako ahosi. so madhurakatho mahādhammakathiko sakalajambudīpe rājāno hatthikantavīṇāsarena paluddhahatthino viya ^a^P6.0256^ea^ attano madhuradhammadesanāya palobhetvā tesaṃ sakasakarajjāni gantuṃ adadamāno buddhalīlāya mahājanassa dhammaṃ desento mahantena yasena tasmiṃ nagare paṭivasi.

[01] tadā hi bārāṇasiyampi gihisahāyakā cattāro brāhmaṇamahāsālā mahallakakāle kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā vanamūlaphalāhārā tattheva ciraṃ vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya cārikaṃ ^a^M7.0152^ea^ caramānā aṅgaraṭṭhe ^a^V7.0147^ea^ kālacampānagaraṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase bhikkhāya nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu. tattha cattāro sahāyakā kuṭumbikā tesaṃ iriyāpathesu pasīditvā vanditvā bhikkhābhājanaṃ gahetvā ekekaṃ attano nivesane nisīdāpetvā paṇītena āhārena parivisitvā paṭiññaṃ gāhāpetvā uyyāneyeva vāsāpesuṃ. te cattāro tāpasā catunnaṃ kuṭumbikānaṃ gehesu nibaddhaṃ bhuñjitvā divāvihāratthāya eko tāpaso tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gacchati, eko nāgabhavanaṃ, eko supaṇṇabhavanaṃ, eko korabyarañño migājinauyyānaṃ gacchati. tesu yo devalokaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ karoti, so sakkassa yasaṃ oloketvā attano upaṭṭhākassa tameva vaṇṇeti. yo nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ karoti, so nāgarājassa sampattiṃ oloketvā attano upaṭṭhākassa tameva vaṇṇeti. yo supaṇṇabhavanaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ karoti, so supaṇṇarājassa vibhūtiṃ oloketvā attano upaṭṭhākassa tameva vaṇṇeti. yo dhanañcayakorabyarājassa uyyānaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ karoti, so dhanañcayakorabyarañño sirisobhaggaṃ oloketvā attano upaṭṭhākassa tameva vaṇṇeti.

[03] te cattāropi janā taṃ tadeva ṭhānaṃ patthetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne eko sakko hutvā nibbatti, eko saputtadāro nāgabhavane nāgarājā hutvā nibbatti, eko supaṇṇabhavane simbalivimāne supaṇṇarājā hutvā nibbatti. eko dhanañcayakorabyarañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti. tepi tāpasā aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu. korabyakumāro vuḍḍhimanvāya pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhahitvā dhammena samena rajjaṃ kāresi. so pana jūtavittako ahosi. so vidhurapaṇḍitassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ rakkhati, uposathaṃ upavasati.

[03] so ekadivasaṃ samādinnuposatho ``vivekamanubrūhissāmī''ti ^a^P6.0257^ea^ uyyānaṃ gantvā manuññaṭṭhāne nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. sakkopi samādinnuposatho ``devaloke palibodho hotī''ti manussaloke tameva uyyānaṃ āgantvā ekasmiṃ manuññaṭṭhāne nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. varuṇanāgarājāpi samādinnuposatho ``nāgabhavane palibodho hotī''ti tatthevāgantvā ekasmiṃ manuññaṭṭhāne nisīditvā ^a^M7.0153^ea^ samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. supaṇṇarājāpi samādinnuposatho ``supaṇṇabhavane palibodho hotī''ti tatthevāgantvā ekasmiṃ manuññaṭṭhāne nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. tepi cattāro janā sāyanhasamaye sakaṭṭhānehi nikkhamitvā maṅgalapokkharaṇitīre samāgantvā aññamaññaṃ oloketvā pubbasinehavasena samaggā sammodamānā hutvā aññamaññaṃ mettacittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ kariṃsu. tesu sakko maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe nisīdi, itarepi attano attano yuttāsanaṃ ñatvā nisīdiṃsu. atha ne sakko āha ``mayaṃ cattāropi rājānova ^a^V7.0148^ea^, amhesu pana kassa sīlaṃ mahanta''nti? atha naṃ varuṇanāgarājā āha ``tumhākaṃ tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ sīlato mayhaṃ sīlaṃ mahanta''nti. ``kimettha kāraṇa''nti? ``ayaṃ supaṇṇarājā amhākaṃ jātānampi ajātānampi paccāmittova, ahaṃ evarūpaṃ amhākaṃ jīvitakkhayakaraṃ paccāmittaṃ disvāpi kodhaṃ na karomi, iminā kāraṇena mama sīlaṃ mahanta''nti vatvā idaṃ dasakanipāte catuposathajātake paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``yo kopaneyye na karoti kopaṃ, na kujjhati sappuriso kadāci.
[22] kuddhopi so nāvikaroti kopaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke''ti.. (jā0 1.10.24).

[01] tattha ^b^yo^eb^ti khattiyādīsu yo koci. ^b^kopaneyye^eb^ti kujjhitabbayuttake puggale khantīvādītāpaso viya kopaṃ na karoti. ^b^kadācī^eb^ti yo kismiñci kāle na kujjhateva. ^b^kuddhopī^eb^ti sace pana so sappuriso kujjhati, atha kuddhopi taṃ kopaṃ nāvikaroti cūḷabodhitāpaso viya. ^b^taṃ ve nara^eb^nti mahārājāno taṃ ve purisaṃ samitapāpatāya loke paṇḍitā ``samaṇa''nti kathenti. ime ^a^P6.0258^ea^ pana guṇā mayi santi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahantanti.

[03] taṃ sutvā supaṇṇarājā ``ayaṃ nāgo mama aggabhakkho, yasmā panāhaṃ evarūpaṃ aggabhakkhaṃ disvāpi khudaṃ adhivāsetvā āhārahetu pāpaṃ na karomi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahanta''nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``ūnūdaro ^a^M7.0154^ea^ yo sahate jighacchaṃ, danto tapassī mitapānabhojano.
[22] āhārahetu na karoti pāpaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke''ti.. (jā0 1.10.25).

[03] tattha ^b^danto^eb^ti indriyadamanena samannāgato. ^b^tapassī^eb^ti tapanissitako. ^b^āhārahetū^eb^ti atijighacchapiḷitopi yo pāpaṃ lāmakakammaṃ na karoti dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero viya. ahaṃ panajja āhārahetu pāpaṃ na karomi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahantanti.
[03] tato sakko devarājā ``ahaṃ nānappakāraṃ sukhapadaṭṭhānaṃ devalokasampattiṃ pahāya sīlarakkhaṇatthāya manussalokaṃ āgato, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahanta''nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``khiḍḍaṃ ^a^V7.0149^ea^ ratiṃ vippajahitvāna sabbaṃ, na cālikaṃ bhāsati kiñci loke.
[22] vibhūsaṭṭhānā virato methunasmā, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke''ti.. (jā0 1.10.26).

[03] tattha ^b^khiḍḍa^eb^nti kāyikavācasikakhiḍḍaṃ. ^b^rati^eb^nti dibbakāmaguṇaratiṃ. ^b^kiñcī^eb^ti appamattakampi. ^b^vibhūsaṭṭhānā^eb^ti maṃsavibhūsā chavivibhūsāti dve vibhūsā. tattha ajjhoharaṇīyāhāro maṃsavibhūsā nāma, mālāgandhādīni chavivibhūsā nāma, yena akusalacittena dhārīyati, taṃ tassa ṭhānaṃ, tato virato methunasevanato ca yo paṭivirato. ^b^taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke^eb^ti ahaṃ ajja devaccharāyo pahāya idhāgantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karomi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahantanti. evaṃ sakkopi attano sīlameva vaṇṇeti.
[03] taṃ sutvā dhanañcayarājā ``ahaṃ ajja mahantaṃ pariggahaṃ soḷasasahassanāṭakitthiparipuṇṇaṃ antepuraṃ cajitvā uyyāne samaṇadhammaṃ karomi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahanta''nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``pariggahaṃ ^a^P6.0259^ea^ ^a^M7.0155^ea^ lobhadhammañca sabbaṃ, yo ve pariññāya pariccajeti.
[22] dantaṃ ṭhitattaṃ amamaṃ nirāsaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke''ti.. (jā0 1.10.27).

[03] tattha ^b^pariggaha^eb^nti nānappakāraṃ vatthukāmaṃ. ^b^lobhadhamma^eb^nti tasmiṃ uppajjanataṇhaṃ. ^b^pariññāyā^eb^ti ñātapariññā, tīraṇapariññā, pahānapariññāti imāhi tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā. tattha khandhādīnaṃ dukkhādisabhāvajānanaṃ ñātapariññā, tesu aguṇaṃ upadhāretvā tīraṇaṃ tīraṇapariññā, tesu dosaṃ disvā chandarāgassāpakaḍḍhanaṃ pahānapariññā. yo imāhi tīhi pariññāhi jānitvā vatthukāmakilesakāme pariccajati, chaḍḍetvā gacchati. ^b^danta^eb^nti nibbisevanaṃ. ^b^ṭhitatta^eb^nti micchāvitakkābhāvena ṭhitasabhāvaṃ. ^b^amama^eb^nti ahanti mamāyanataṇhārahitaṃ. ^b^nirāsa^eb^nti puttadārādīsu nicchandarāgaṃ. ^b^taṃ ve nara^eb^nti taṃ evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ ``samaṇa''nti vadanti.

[03] iti te sabbepi attano attano sīlameva mahantanti vaṇṇetvā sakkādayo dhanañcayaṃ pucchiṃsu ``atthi pana, mahārāja, koci tumhākaṃ santike paṇḍito, yo no imaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vinodeyyā''ti ^a^V7.0150^ea^. ``āma, mahārājāno mama atthadhammānusāsako mahāpañño asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito nāma atthi, so no imaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vinodessati, tassa santikaṃ gacchāmā''ti. atha te sabbe ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchiṃsu. atha sabbepi uyyānā nikkhamitvā dhammasabhaṃ gantvā pallaṅkaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā bodhisattaṃ pallaṅkavaramajjhe nisīdāpetvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā ``paṇḍita, amhākaṃ kaṅkhā uppannā, taṃ no vinodehī''ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu --
[21] ``pucchāma kattāramanomapaññaṃ, kathāsu no viggaho atthi jāto.
[22] chindajja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni, tadajja kaṅkhaṃ vitaremu sabbe''ti.. (jā0 1.10.28).

[03] tattha ^b^kattāra^eb^nti kattabbayuttakakārakaṃ. ^b^viggaho atthi jāto^eb^ti eko sīlaviggaho sīlavivādo uppanno atthi. ^b^chindajjā^eb^ti amhākaṃ taṃ ^a^M7.0156^ea^ kaṅkhaṃ tāni ca vicikicchitāni vajirena sineruṃ paharanto viya ajja chinda. ^b^vitaremū^eb^ti vitareyyāma.
[03] paṇḍito ^a^P6.0260^ea^ tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā ``mahārājāno tumhākaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya uppannaṃ vivādakathaṃ sukathitadukkathitaṃ jānissāmī''ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``ye paṇḍitā atthadasā bhavanti, bhāsanti te yoniso tattha kāle.
[22] kathaṃ nu kathānaṃ abhāsitānaṃ, atthaṃ nayeyyuṃ kusalā janindā''ti.. (jā0 1.10.29).

[03] tattha ^b^atthadasā^eb^ti atthadassanasamatthā. ^b^tattha kāle^eb^ti tasmiṃ viggahe ārocite yuttappayuttakāle te paṇḍitā tamatthaṃ ācikkhantā yoniso bhāsanti. ^b^atthaṃ nayeyyuṃ kusalā^eb^ti kusalā chekāpi samānā abhāsitānaṃ kathānaṃ kathaṃ nu atthaṃ ñāṇena nayeyyuṃ upaparikkheyyuṃ. ^b^janindā^eb^ti rājāno ālapati. tasmā idaṃ tāva me vadetha.
[21] ``kathaṃ have bhāsati nāgarājā, garuḷo pana venateyyo kimāha.
[22] gandhabbarājā pana kiṃ vadeti, kathaṃ pana kurūnaṃ rājaseṭṭho''ti.. (jā0 1.10.30).
[21] ``khantiṃ have bhāsati nāgarājā, appāhāraṃ garuḷo venateyyo.

[03] tassattho -- paṇḍita, nāgarājā tāva kopaneyyepi puggale akuppanasaṅkhātaṃ adhivāsanakhantiṃ vaṇṇeti, garuḷo appāhāratāsaṅkhātaṃ āhārahetu ^a^M7.0157^ea^ pāpassa akaraṇaṃ, sakko pañcakāmaguṇaratīnaṃ vippahānaṃ, kururājā nippalibodhabhāvaṃ vaṇṇetīti.
[03] atha tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā mahāsatto imaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``sabbāni etāni subhāsitāni, na hettha dubbhāsitamatthi kiñci.
[27] yasmiñca etāni patiṭṭhitāni, arāva ^a^P6.0261^ea^ nābhyā susamohitāni.
[22] catubbhi dhammehi samaṅgibhūtaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke''ti.. (jā0 1.10.32).

[03] tattha ^b^etānī^eb^ti etāni cattāripi guṇajātāni yasmiṃ puggale sakaṭanābhiyaṃ suṭṭhu samohitāni arā viya patiṭṭhitāni, catūhipetehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ puggalaṃ paṇḍitā ``samaṇa''nti āhu loketi.
[03] evaṃ mahāsatto catunnampi sīlaṃ ekasamameva akāsi. taṃ sutvā cattāropi rājāno tassa tuṭṭhā thutiṃ karontā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu --
[21] ``tuvañhi seṭṭho tvamanuttarosi, tvaṃ dhammagū dhammavidū sumedho.
[27] paññāya pañhaṃ samadhiggahetvā, acchecchi dhīro vicikicchitāni.
[03] acchecchi kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni, cundo yathā nāgadantaṃ kharenā''ti.. (jā0 1.10.33).

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0152^ea^ ^b^tvamanuttarosī^eb^ti tvaṃ anuttaro asi, natthi tayā uttaritaro nāma. ^b^dhammagū^eb^ti dhammassa gopako ceva dhammaññū ca. ^b^dhammavidū^eb^ti pākaṭadhammo. ^b^sumedho^eb^ti sundarapañño ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti attano paññāya amhākaṃ pañhaṃ suṭṭhu adhigaṇhitvā ``idamettha kāraṇa''nti yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā. ^b^acchecchī^eb^ti tvaṃ dhīro amhākaṃ vicikicchitāni chindi, evaṃ chindanto ca ``chindajja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitānī''ti idaṃ amhākaṃ āyācanaṃ sampādento acchecchi kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni ^a^M7.0158^ea^. ^b^cundo yathā nāgadantaṃ kharenā^eb^ti yathā dantakāro kakacena hatthidantaṃ chindeyya, evaṃ chindīti attho.

[03] evaṃ te cattāropi rājāno tassa pañhabyākaraṇena tuṭṭhamānasā ahesuṃ. atha naṃ sakko dibbadukūlena pūjesi, garuḷo suvaṇṇamālāya, varuṇo nāgarājā maṇinā, dhanañcayarājā gavasahassādīhi pūjesi. tenevāha --
[22] pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te dhammapūjāya dhīra..
[22] pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te dhammapūjāya dhīra..
[21] ``maṇiṃ anagghaṃ ruciraṃ pabhassaraṃ, kaṇṭhāvasattaṃ maṇibhūsitaṃ me.
[22] pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te dhammapūjāya dhīra..
[21] ``gavaṃ sahassaṃ usabhañca nāgaṃ, ājaññayutte ca rathe dasa ime.
[22] pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te gāmavarāni soḷasā''ti.. (jā0 1.10.34-37).
[03] evaṃ sakkādayo ^a^P6.0262^ea^ mahāsattaṃ pūjetvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamiṃsu.

[03] tesu ^a^V7.0153^ea^ ^a^M7.0159^ea^ nāgarājassa bhariyā vimalādevī nāma. sā tassa gīvāya piḷandhanamaṇiṃ apassantī pucchi ``deva, kahaṃ pana te maṇī''ti? ``bhadde, candabrāhmaṇaputtassa vidhurapaṇḍitassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannacitto ahaṃ tena maṇinā taṃ pūjesiṃ. na kevalañca ahameva, sakkopi taṃ dibbadukūlena pūjesi, supaṇṇarājā suvaṇṇamālāya, dhanañcayarājā gavassasahassādīhi pūjesī''ti. ``dhammakathiko so, devā''ti. ``bhadde, kiṃ vadesi, jambudīpatale buddhuppādo viya pavattati, sakalajambudīpe ekasatarājāno tassa madhuradhammakathāya bajjhitvā hatthikantavīṇāsarena paluddhamattavāraṇā viya attano attano rajjāni gantuṃ na icchanti, evarūpo so madhuradhammakathiko''ti tassa guṇaṃ vaṇṇesi. sā vidhurapaṇḍitassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā tassa dhammakathaṃ sotukāmā hutvā cintesi ``sacāhaṃ vakkhāmi `deva, tassa dhammakathaṃ sotukāmā, idha naṃ ānehī'ti, na metaṃ ānessati. yaṃnūnāhaṃ `tassa me hadaye dohaḷo uppanno'ti gilānālayaṃ kareyya''nti. sā tathā katvā siragabbhaṃ pavisitvā attano paricārikānaṃ saññaṃ datvā sirisayane nipajji. nāgarājā upaṭṭhānavelāya taṃ apassanto ``kahaṃ vimalā''ti paricārikāyo pucchitvā ``gilānā, devā''ti vutte uṭṭhāyāsanā tassā santikaṃ gantvā sayanapasse nisīditvā sarīraṃ parimajjanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``paṇḍu kisiyāsi dubbalā, vaṇṇarūpaṃ na tavedisaṃ pure.
[22] vimale akkhāhi pucchitā, kīdisī tuyhaṃ sarīravedanā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^paṇḍū^eb^ti paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇā. ^b^kisiyā^eb^ti kisā. ^b^dubbalā^eb^ti appathāmā. ^b^vaṇṇarūpaṃ na tavedisaṃ pure^eb^ti tava vaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ pure edisaṃ na hoti, niddosaṃ anavajjaṃ, taṃ idāni parivattitvā amanuññasabhāvaṃ jātaṃ. ^b^vimale^eb^ti taṃ ālapati.
[21] ``dhammo ^a^P6.0263^ea^ manujesu mātīnaṃ, dohaḷo nāma janinda vuccati.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0154^ea^ ^b^dhammo^eb^ti sabhāvo. ^b^mātīna^eb^nti itthīnaṃ. ^b^janindā^eb^ti nāgajanassa inda. ^b^dhammāhaṭaṃ nāgakuñjara, vidhurassa hadayābhipatthaye^eb^ti nāgaseṭṭha, ahaṃ dhammena samena asāhasikakammena āhaṭaṃ vidhurassa hadayaṃ abhipatthayāmi, taṃ me labhamānāya jīvitaṃ atthi, alabhamānāya idheva maraṇanti tassa paññaṃ sandhāyevamāha --
[21] ``candaṃ kho tvaṃ dohaḷāyasi, sūriyaṃ vā atha vāpi mālutaṃ.
[22] dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassanaṃ, ko vidhuramidha mānayissatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassana^eb^nti asamadhurassa vidhurassa dassanameva dullabhaṃ. tassa hi sakalajambudīpe rājāno dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā vicaranti, passitumpi naṃ koci na labhati, taṃ ko idha ānayissatīti vadati.
