[03] sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā ``alabhamānāya me idheva maraṇa''nti parivattitvā piṭṭhiṃ datvā sāḷakakaṇṇena mukhaṃ pidahitvā nipajji. nāgarājā anattamano sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā sayanapiṭṭhe nisinno ``vimalā vidhurapaṇḍitassa hadayamaṃsaṃ āharāpetī''ti saññī hutvā ``paṇḍitassa hadayaṃ alabhantiyā vimalāya jīvitaṃ natthi, kathaṃ nu kho tassa hadayamaṃsaṃ labhissāmī''ti cintesi. athassa dhītā irandhatī nāma nāgakaññā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā mahantena sirivilāsena pitu upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā pitaraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā, sā tassa indriyavikāraṃ disvā ``tāta, ativiya domanassappattosi, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa''nti pucchantī imaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``kiṃ ^a^M7.0161^ea^ nu tāta tuvaṃ pajjhāyasi, padumaṃ hatthagataṃva te mukhaṃ.
[22] kiṃ nu dummanarūposi ^a^P6.0264^ea^ issara, mā tvaṃ soci amittatāpanā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^pajjhāyasī^eb^ti punappunaṃ cintesi. ^b^hatthagata^eb^nti hatthena parimadditaṃ padumaṃ viya te mukhaṃ jātaṃ. ^b^issarā^eb^ti pañcayojanasatikassa mandiranāgabhavanassa, sāmīti.
[03] dhītu vacanaṃ sutvā nāgarājā tamatthaṃ ārocento āha --
[21] ``mātā ^a^V7.0155^ea^ hi tava irandhati, vidhurassa hadayaṃ dhaniyati.
[22] dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassanaṃ, ko vidhuramidha mānayissatī''ti..
[03] atha naṃ nāgarājā ``amma, mama santike vidhuraṃ ānetuṃ samattho natthi, tvaṃ mātu jīvitaṃ dehi, vidhuraṃ ānetuṃ samatthaṃ bhattāraṃ pariyesāhī''ti uyyojento upaḍḍhagāthamāha --
[03] iti so kilesābhiratabhāvena dhītu ananucchavikaṃ kathaṃ kathesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] ``pituno ca sā sutvāna vākyaṃ, rattiṃ nikkhamma avassutiṃ carī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^avassuti^eb^nti bhikkhave, sā nāgamāṇavikā pitu vacanaṃ sutvā pitaraṃ assāsetvā mātu santikaṃ gantvā tampi assāsetvā attano sirigabbhaṃ gantvā sabbālaṅkārehi attānaṃ alaṅkaritvā ekaṃ kusumbharattavatthaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ ekaṃse katvā tameva rattiṃ udakaṃ dvidhā katvā nāgabhavanato nikkhamma ^a^M7.0162^ea^ himavantappadese samuddatīre ṭhitaṃ saṭṭhiyojanubbedhaṃ ekagghanaṃ kāḷapabbataṃ nāma añjanagiriṃ gantvā avassutiṃ cari kilesāvassutiṃ bhattupariyesanaṃ carīti attho.

[03] carantī ^a^P6.0265^ea^ ca yāni himavante vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni, tāni āharitvā sakalapabbataṃ maṇiagghiyaṃ viya alaṅkaritvā uparitale pupphasanthāraṃ katvā manoramenākārena naccitvā madhuragītaṃ gāyantī sattamaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``ke gandhabbe rakkhase ca nāge, ke kimpurise cāpi mānuse.
[22] ke paṇḍite sabbakāmadade, dīgharattaṃ bhattā me bhavissatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0156^ea^ ^b^ke gandhabbe rakkhase ca nāge^eb^ti ko gandhabbo vā rakkhaso vā nāgo vā. ^b^ke paṇḍite sabbakāmadade^eb^ti ko etesu gandhabbādīsu paṇḍito sabbakāmaṃ dātuṃ samattho, so vidhurassa hadayamaṃsadohaḷiniyā mama mātu manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ bhattā bhavissatīti.

[03] tasmiṃ khaṇe vessavaṇamahārājassa bhāgineyyo puṇṇako nāma yakkhasenāpati tigāvutappamāṇaṃ manomayasindhavaṃ abhiruyha kāḷapabbatamatthakena yakkhasamāgamaṃ gacchanto taṃ tāya gītasaddaṃ assosi. anantare attabhāve anubhūtapubbāya itthiyā gītasaddo tassa chaviādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi. so tāya paṭibaddhacitto hutvā nivattitvā sindhavapiṭṭhe nisinnova ``bhadde, ahaṃ mama paññāya dhammena samena vidhurassa hadayaṃ ānetuṃ samatthomhi, tvaṃ mā cintayī''ti taṃ assāsento aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``assāsa hessāmi te pati, bhattā te hessāmi anindalocane.
[22] paññā hi mamaṃ tathāvidhā, assāsa hessasi bhariyā mamā''ti..
[03] atha naṃ irandhatī ``tena hi ehi, gacchāma me pitu santika''nti ānesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] ehi ^a^P6.0266^ea^ gacchāma pitu mamantike, esova te etamatthaṃ pavakkhatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^pubbapathānugatenā^eb^ti anantare attabhāve bhūtapubbasāmike tasmiṃ pubbapatheneva anugatena. ^b^ehi gacchāmā^eb^ti bhikkhave, so yakkhasenāpati evaṃ vatvā ``imaṃ assapiṭṭhiṃ āropetvā nessāmī''ti pabbatamatthakā otaritvā tassā gahaṇatthaṃ hatthaṃ pasāresi. sā attano hatthaṃ gaṇhituṃ adatvā tena pasāritahatthaṃ sayaṃ gahetvā ``sāmi, nāhaṃ anāthā, mayhaṃ pitā varuṇo nāma nāgarājā, mātā vimalā nāma devī, ehi mama pitu santikaṃ gacchāma, eso eva te yathā amhākaṃ maṅgalakiriyāya bhavitabbaṃ, evaṃ etamatthaṃ pavakkhatī''ti avacāsi.
[03] evaṃ ^a^V7.0157^ea^ vatvā sā yakkhaṃ gahetvā pitu santikaṃ agamāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[03] tattha ^b^pitusantikupāgamī^eb^ti attano pituno nāgarañño santikaṃ upāgami.
[03] puṇṇakopi yakkho paṭiharitvā nāgarājassa santikaṃ gantvā irandhatiṃ yācanto āha --
[21] ``nāgavara vaco suṇohi me, patirūpaṃ paṭipajja suṅkiyaṃ.
[22] patthemi ahaṃ irandhatiṃ, tāya samaṅgiṃ karohi maṃ tuvaṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^suṅkiya^eb^nti attano kulapadesānurūpaṃ dhitu suṅkaṃ dhanaṃ paṭipajja gaṇha. ^b^samaṅgiṃ karohī^eb^ti maṃ tāya saddhiṃ samaṅgibhūtaṃ karohi. ^b^valabhiyo^eb^ti bhaṇḍasakaṭiyo. ^b^nānāratnassa kevalā^eb^ti nānāratanassa sakalaparipuṇṇā.
[22] anāmanta kataṃ kammaṃ, taṃ pacchā anutappatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^yāva āmantaye ñātī^eb^ti bho yakkhasenāpati, ahaṃ tuyhaṃ dhītaraṃ demi, no na demi, thokaṃ pana āgamehi, yāva ñātakepi jānāpemi. ^b^taṃ pacchā anutappatī^eb^ti itthiyo hi gatagataṭṭhāne abhiramantipi anabhiramantipi, anabhiratikāle ñātakādayo amhehi ^a^P6.0267^ea^ saddhiṃ anāmantetvā ^a^V7.0158^ea^ kataṃ kammaṃ nāma evarūpaṃ hotīti ussukkaṃ na karonti, evaṃ taṃ kammaṃ pacchā anutāpaṃ āvahatīti.
[03] evaṃ vatvā so bhariyāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tāya saddhiṃ sallapi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ```ayaṃ so puṇṇako yakkho, yācatī maṃ irandhatiṃ.
[22] bahunā vittalābhena, tassa dema piyaṃ mama'''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^pavisitvā^eb^ti varuṇo puṇṇakaṃ tattheva ṭhapetvā sayaṃ uṭṭhāya yatthassa bhariyā nipannā, taṃ nivesanaṃ pavisitvā. ^b^piyaṃ mama^eb^nti mama piyaṃ dhītaraṃ tassa bahunā vittalābhena demāti pucchati.
[21] ``na dhanena na vittena, labbhā amhaṃ irandhatī.
[27] sace ca kho hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa, dhammena laddhā idha māhareyya.
[22] etena vittena kumāri labbhā, nāññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāmā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^amhaṃ irandhatī^eb^ti amhākaṃ dhītā irandhatī. ^b^etena vittenā^eb^ti etena tuṭṭhikāraṇena.
[03] so tāya saddhiṃ mantetvā punadeva puṇṇakena saddhiṃ mantesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ```na ^a^V7.0159^ea^ dhanena na vittena, labbhā amhaṃ irandhatī.
[27] sace tuvaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍitasa, dhammena laddhā idha māharesi.
[22] etena vittena kumāri labbhā, nāññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāmā'''ti..
[21] ``yaṃ paṇḍitotyeke vadanti loke, tameva bāloti punāhu aññe.
[22] akkhāhi me vippavadanti ettha, kaṃ paṇḍitaṃ nāga tuvaṃ vadesī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^yaṃ^eb^ ^a^P6.0268^ea^ ^b^paṇḍitotyeke^eb^ti so kira ``hadayaṃ paṇḍitassā''ti sutvā cintesi ``yaṃ eke paṇḍitoti vadanti, tameva aññe bāloti kathenti. kiñcāpi me irandhatiyā vidhuroti akkhātaṃ, tathāpi tathato jānituṃ pucchissāmi na''nti. tasmā evamāha.
[21] ``korabyarājassa dhanañcayassa, yadi te suto vidhuro nāma kattā.
[22] ānehi taṃ paṇḍitaṃ dhammaladdhā, irandhatī padacarā te hotū''ti..
[03] taṃ sutvā puṇṇako somanassappatto sindhavaṃ nayanatthāya upaṭṭhākaṃ āṇāpesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``idañca sutvā varuṇassa vākyaṃ, uṭṭhāya yakkho paramappatīto.
[22] tattheva santo purisaṃ asaṃsi, ānehi ājaññamidheva yutta''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^purisaṃ asaṃsī^eb^ti attano upaṭṭhākaṃ āṇāpesi. ^b^ājañña^eb^nti kāraṇākāraṇajānanakasindhavaṃ. ^b^yutta^eb^nti kappitaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^jātarūpamayā kaṇṇā^eb^ti tameva sindhavaṃ vaṇṇento āha. tassa hi manomayassa sindhavassa jātarūpamayā kaṇṇā, kācamhicamayā khurā, tassa khurā rattamaṇimayāti attho. ^b^jambonadassa pākassā^eb^ti jambonadassa pakkassa rattasuvaṇṇassa uracchado.
[03] so puriso tāvadeva taṃ sindhavaṃ ānesi. puṇṇako taṃ abhiruyha ākāsena vessavaṇassa santikaṃ gantvā nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇetvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. tassatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ --
[21] ``so ^a^M7.0167^ea^ puṇṇako kāmarāgena giddho, irandhatiṃ nāgakaññaṃ jigīsaṃ.
[22] gantvāna ^a^P6.0269^ea^ taṃ bhūtapatiṃ yasassiṃ, iccabravī vessavaṇaṃ kuveraṃ..
[22] nagare nimmite kañcanamaye, maṇḍalassa uragassa niṭṭhitaṃ..
[22] ete dumā pariṇāmitā, sobhayanti uragassa mandiraṃ..
[22] taṃ tesaṃ demi issara, tena te denti irandhatiṃ mama''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^devavāhavahaṃ yāna^eb^nti vahitabboti vāho, devasaṅkhātaṃ vāhaṃ vahatīti devavāhavahaṃ. yanti etenāti yānaṃ. ^b^kappitakesamassū^eb^ti maṇḍanavasena susaṃvihitakesamassu. devānaṃ pana kesamassukaraṇakammaṃ nāma natthi, vicittakathikena pana kathitaṃ. ^b^jigīsa^eb^nti patthayanto. ^b^vessavaṇa^eb^nti visāṇāya rājadhāniyā issararājānaṃ. ^b^kuvera^eb^nti evaṃnāmakaṃ. ^b^bhogavatī nāmā^eb^ti sampannabhogatāya evaṃladdhanāmaṃ. ^b^mandire^eb^ti mandiraṃ, bhavananti attho. ^b^vāsā hiraññavatī^eb^ti nāgarājassa vasanaṭṭhānattā vāsāti ca, kañcanavatiyā suvaṇṇapākārena parikkhittattā hiraññavatīti ca vuccati. ^b^nagare nimmite^eb^ti nagaraṃ nimmitaṃ. ^b^kañcanamaye^eb^ti suvaṇṇamayaṃ. ^b^maṇḍalassā^eb^ti bhogamaṇḍalena samannāgatassa. ^b^niṭṭhita^eb^nti karaṇapariniṭṭhitaṃ. ^b^oṭṭhagīviyo^eb^ti oṭṭhagīvāsaṇṭhānena katā rattamaṇimasāragallamayā aṭṭālakā. ^b^pāsādetthā^eb^ti ettha nāgabhavane pāsādā. ^b^silāmayā^eb^ti maṇimayā. ^b^sovaṇṇaratanehī^eb^ti suvaṇṇasaṅkhātehi ratanehi, suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāhi chāditāti attho. ^b^sahā^eb^ti sahakārā. ^b^uparibhaddakā^eb^ti uddālakajātikāyeva rukkhā. ^b^campeyyakā nāgamallikā^eb^ti campakā ca nāgā ca mallikā ca. ^b^bhaginīmālā atha mettha koliyā^eb^ti bhaginīmālā ceva atha ettha nāgabhavane koliyā nāma rukkhā ca. ^b^ete dumā pariṇāmitā^eb^ti ete pupphūpagaphalūpagarukkhā aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭasākhatāya pariṇāmitā ākulasamākulā. ^b^khajjuretthā^eb^ti khajjurirukkhā ettha. ^b^silāmayā^eb^ti indanīlamaṇimayā. ^b^sovaṇṇadhuvapupphitā^eb^ti te pana suvaṇṇapupphehi niccapupphitā. ^b^yattha vasatopapātiko^eb^ti yattha nāgabhavane opapātiko nāgarājā vasati. ^b^kañcanavelliviggahā^eb^ti ^a^M7.0169^ea^ suvaṇṇarāsisassirikasarīrā. ^b^kālā taruṇāva uggatā^eb^ti vilāsayuttatāya mandavāteritā kālavallipallavā viya uggatā. ^b^pucimandatthanī^eb^ti nimbaphalasaṇṭhānacūcukā ^a^V7.0162^ea^. ^b^lākhārasarattasucchavī^eb^ti hatthapādatalachaviṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^tidivokacarā^eb^ti tidasabhavanacarā. ^b^vijjuvabbhaghanā^eb^ti abbhaghanavalāhakantarato nissaṭā vijjulatā viya. ^b^taṃ tesaṃ demī^eb^ti taṃ tassa hadayaṃ ahaṃ tesaṃ demi, evaṃ jānassu. ^b^issarā^eb^ti mātulaṃ ālapati.

[03] iti so vessavaṇena ananuññāto gantuṃ avisahitvā taṃ anujānāpetuṃ etā ettakā gāthā kathesi. vessavaṇo pana tassa kathaṃ na suṇāti. kiṃkāraṇā? dvinnaṃ devaputtānaṃ vimānāḍḍaṃ paricchindatīti. puṇṇako attano vacanassa assutabhāvaṃ ñatvā jinakadevaputtassa ^a^P6.0271^ea^ santike aṭṭhāsi. vessavaṇo aḍḍaṃ vinicchinitvā parājitaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā itaraṃ ``gaccha tvaṃ, tava vimāne vasāhī''ti āha. puṇṇako ``gaccha tva''nti vuttakkhaṇeyeva ``mayhaṃ mātulena mama pesitabhāvaṃ jānāthā''ti katipayadevaputte sakkhiṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sindhavaṃ āharāpetvā abhiruyha pakkāmi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``so puṇṇako bhūtapatiṃ yasassiṃ, āmantaya vessavaṇaṃ kuveraṃ.
[22] tattheva santo purisaṃ asaṃsi, ānehi ājaññamidheva yuttaṃ..

[03] so ākāsena gacchantoyeva cintesi ``vidhurapaṇḍito mahāparivāro, na sakkā taṃ gaṇhituṃ, dhanañcayakorabyo pana jūtavittako, taṃ jūtena ^a^M7.0170^ea^ jinitvā vidhuraṃ gaṇhissāmi, ghare panassa bahūni ratanāni, appagghena lakkhena jūtaṃ na kīḷissati, mahaggharatanaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati, aññaṃ ratanaṃ rājā na gaṇhissati, rājagahassa sāmantā vepullapabbatabbhantare cakkavattirañño paribhogamaṇiratanaṃ atthi mahānubhāvaṃ, taṃ gahetvā tena rājānaṃ palobhetvā jinissāmī''ti. so tathā akāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``so ^a^V7.0163^ea^ aggamā rājagahaṃ surammaṃ, aṅgassa rañño nagaraṃ durāyutaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^aṅgassa rañño^eb^ti tadā aṅgassa raññova magadharajjaṃ ahosi. tena vuttaṃ -- ``aṅgassa rañño nagara''nti. ^b^durāyuta^eb^nti paccatthikehi durāyuttaṃ. ^b^masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassā^eb^ti masakkasārasaṅkhāte sinerupabbatamatthake māpitattā ``masakkasāra''nti laddhanāmaṃ vāsavassa bhavanaṃ viya. ^b^dijābhighuṭṭha^eb^nti aññehi ca pakkhīhi abhisaṅghuṭṭhaṃ ninnāditaṃ. ^b^nānāsakuntābhiruda^eb^nti madhurassarena gāyantehi viya nānāvidhehi sakuṇehi abhirudaṃ, abhigītanti attho. ^b^suvaṅgaṇa^eb^nti sundarāṅgaṇaṃ manuññatalaṃ. ^b^himavaṃva pabbata^eb^nti himavantapabbataṃ viya. ^b^vepulamābhirūhī^eb^ti bhikkhave, so puṇṇako evarūpaṃ vepullapabbataṃ abhiruhi. ^b^pabbatakūṭamajjhe^eb^ti pabbatakūṭāntare taṃ maṇiṃ addasa.
[21] ``disvā ^a^M7.0171^ea^ maṇiṃ pabhassaraṃ jātimantaṃ, manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^manohara^eb^nti manasābhipatthitassa dhanassa āharaṇasamatthaṃ. ^b^daddallamāna^eb^nti ujjalamānaṃ. ^b^yasasā^eb^ti parivāramaṇigaṇena. ^b^obhāsatī^eb^ti taṃ maṇiratanaṃ ākāse vijjuriva obhāsati. ^b^tamaggahī^eb^ti taṃ maṇiratanaṃ aggahesi. taṃ pana maṇiratanaṃ kumbhiro nāma yakkho kumbhaṇḍasahassaparivāro rakkhati. so pana tena kujjhitvā olokitamatteneva bhītatasito palāyitvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ patvā kampamāno olokento aṭṭhāsi. iti taṃ palāpetvā puṇṇako maṇiratanaṃ aggahesi. ^b^manoharaṃ nāmā^eb^ti manasā cintitaṃ dhanaṃ āharituṃ sakkotīti evaṃladdhanāmaṃ.
[03] iti ^a^V7.0164^ea^ so taṃ gahetvā ākāsena gacchanto taṃ nagaraṃ patto. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] samāgate ^a^P6.0273^ea^ ekasataṃ samagge, avhettha yakkho avikampamāno..
[22] kamanuttaraṃ ratanavaraṃ jināma, ko vāpi no jeti varaddhanenā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0172^ea^ ^b^oruyhupāgacchi sabhaṃ kurūna^eb^nti bhikkhave, so puṇṇako assapiṭṭhito oruyha assaṃ adissamānarūpaṃ ṭhapetvā māṇavakavaṇṇena kurūnaṃ sabhaṃ upagato. ^b^ekasata^eb^nti ekasatarājāno achambhīto hutvā ``ko nīdhā''tiādīni vadanto jūtena avhettha. ^b^ko nīdhā^eb^ti ko nu imasmiṃ rājasamāgame. ^b^rañña^eb^nti rājūnaṃ antare. ^b^varamābhijetī^eb^ti amhākaṃ santakaṃ seṭṭharatanaṃ abhijeti, ``ahaṃ jināmī''ti vattuṃ ussahati. ^b^kamābhijeyyāmā^eb^ti kaṃ vā mayaṃ jineyyāma. ^b^varaddhanenā^eb^ti uttamadhanena. ^b^kamanuttara^eb^nti jinanto ca kataraṃ rājānaṃ anuttaraṃ ratanavaraṃ jināma. ^b^ko vāpi no jetī^eb^ti atha vā ko nāma rājā amhe varadhanena jeti. iti so catūhi padehi korabyameva ghaṭṭeti.
[03] atha rājā ``mayā ito pubbe evaṃ sūro hutvā kathento nāma na diṭṭhapubbo, ko nu kho eso''ti cintetvā pucchanto gāthamāha --
[21] ``kuhiṃ nu raṭṭhe tava jātibhūmi, na korabyasseva vaco tavedaṃ.
[22] abhītosi no vaṇṇanibhāya sabbe, akkhāhi me nāmañca bandhave cā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^na korabyassevā^eb^ti kururaṭṭhavāsikasseva tava vacanaṃ na hoti.

[03] taṃ sutvā itaro ``ayaṃ rājā mama nāmaṃ pucchati, puṇṇako ca nāma dāso hoti. sacāhaṃ `puṇṇakosmī'ti vakkhāmi, `esa dāso, tasmā maṃ pagabbhatāya evaṃ vadetī'ti avamaññissati, anantarātīte attabhāve nāmamassa kathessāmī''ti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[22] aṅgesu ^a^P6.0274^ea^ me ñātayo bandhavā ca, akkhena devasmi idhānupatto''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^anūnanāmo^eb^ti na ūnanāmo. iminā attano puṇṇakanāmameva paṭicchannaṃ katvā katheti. ^b^iti mavhayantī^eb^ti iti maṃ avhayanti pakkosanti ^a^M7.0173^ea^. ^b^aṅgesū^eb^ti aṅgaraṭṭhe kālacampānagare vasanti. ^b^akkhena devasmī^eb^ti deva, jūtakīḷanatthena idha anuppattosmi.
[03] atha rājā ``māṇava, tvaṃ jūtena jito kiṃ dassasi, kiṃ te atthī''ti pucchanto gāthamāha --
[21] ``kiṃ māṇavassa ratanāni atthi, ye taṃ jinanto hare akkhadhutto.
[22] bahūni rañño ratanāni atthi, te tvaṃ daliddo kathamavhayesī''ti..

[03] tassattho -- kittakāni bhoto māṇavassa ratanāni atthi, ye taṃ jinanto akkhadhutto ``āharā''ti vatvā hareyya. rañño pana nivesane bahūni ratanāni atthi, te rājāno evaṃ bahudhane tvaṃ daliddo samāno kathaṃ jūtena avhayasīti.
[21] ``manoharo nāma maṇī mamāyaṃ, manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ.
[22] imañca ājaññamamittatāpanaṃ, etaṃ me jinitvā hare akkhadhutto''ti..
[03] pāḷipotthakesu pana ``maṇi mama vijjati lohitaṅko''ti likhitaṃ. so pana maṇi veḷuriyo, tasmā idameva sameti.
[03] tattha ^b^ājañña^eb^nti imaṃ ājānīyassañca maṇiñcāti etaṃ me ubhayaṃ hareyya akkhadhuttoti assaṃ dassetvā evamāha.
[21] ``eko ^a^V7.0166^ea^ maṇī māṇava kiṃ karissati, ājāniyeko pana kiṃ karissati.
[22] bahūni rañño maṇiratanāni atthi, ājāniyā vātajavā anappakā''ti..

[03] so ^a^P6.0275^ea^ ^a^M7.0174^ea^ rañño kathaṃ sutvā ``mahārāja, kiṃ nāma etaṃ vadetha, eko asso assasahassaṃ lakkhaṃ hoti, eko maṇi maṇisahassaṃ lakkhaṃ hoti. na hi sabbe assā ekasadisā, imassa tāva javaṃ passathā''ti vatvā assaṃ abhiruhitvā pākāramatthakena pesesi. sattayojanikaṃ nagaraṃ assehi gīvāya gīvaṃ paharantehi parikkhittaṃ viya ahosi. athānukkamena assopi na paññāyi, yakkhopi na paññāyi, udare baddharattapaṭova paññāyi. so assato oruyha ``diṭṭho, mahārāja, assassa vego''ti vatvā ``āma, diṭṭho''ti vutte ``idāni puna passa, mahārājā''ti vatvā assaṃ antonagare uyyāne pokkharaṇiyā udakapiṭṭhe pesesi, khuraggāni atementova pakkhandi. atha naṃ padumapattesu vicarāpetvā pāṇiṃ paharitvā hatthaṃ pasāresi, asso āgantvā pāṇitale patiṭṭhāsi. tato ``vaṭṭate evarūpaṃ assaratanaṃ narindā''ti vatvā ``vaṭṭatī''ti vutte ``mahārāja, assaratanaṃ tāva tiṭṭhatu, maṇiratanassa mahānubhāvaṃ passā''ti vatvā tassānubhāvaṃ pakāsento āha --
[22] nāgarājā supaṇṇā ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^itthīna^eb^nti etasmiñhi maṇiratane alaṅkatapaṭiyattā anekā itthiviggahā purisaviggahā nānappakārā migapakkhisaṅghā senaṅgādīni ca paññāyanti, tāni dassento evamāha. ^b^nimmita^eb^nti idaṃ evarūpaṃ accherakaṃ maṇimhi nimmitaṃ passa.
[22] aṭṭālake ca dvāre ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^pura^eb^nti nagaraṃ. ^b^uddhāpasampanna^eb^nti pākāravatthunā sampannaṃ. ^b^bahupākāratoraṇa^eb^nti uccapākāratoraṇanagaradvārena sampannaṃ. ^b^siṅghāṭake^eb^ti vīthicatukkāni. ^b^subhūmiyo^eb^ti nagarūpacāre vicittā ramaṇīyabhūmiyo. ^b^esikā^eb^ti nagaradvāresu uṭṭhāpite esikatthambhe. ^b^palikha^eb^nti palighaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^aggaḷānī^eb^ti nagaradvārakavāṭāni. ^b^dvāre cā^eb^ti gopurāni ca.
[22] haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, cakkavākā ca kukkuhā..
[03] tattha ^b^toraṇamaggesū^eb^ti etasmiṃ nagare toraṇaggesu. ^b^kuṇālakā^eb^ti kāḷakokilā. ^b^citrā^eb^ti citrapattakokilā.

[03] tattha ^b^supākāra^eb^nti kañcanapākāraparikkhittaṃ. ^b^paṇṇasālāyo^eb^ti nānābhaṇḍapuṇṇe āpaṇe. ^b^nivesane nivese cā^eb^ti gehāni ceva gehavatthūni ca. ^b^sandhibyūhe^eb^ti gharasandhiyo ca anibbiddharacchā ca. ^b^pathaddhiyo^eb^ti nibbiddhavīthiyo.
[21] ``pānāgāre ^a^M7.0176^ea^ ca soṇḍe ca, sūnā odaniyā gharā.
[22] vesī ca gaṇikāyo ca, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^soṇḍe cā^eb^ti attano anurūpehi kaṇṭhakaṇṇapilandhanehi samannāgate āpānabhūmiṃ ^a^P6.0277^ea^ sajjetvā nisinne surāsoṇḍe ca. ^b^āḷārike^eb^ti pūvapāke. ^b^sūde^eb^ti bhattakārake. ^b^pāṇissare^eb^ti pāṇippahārena gāyante. ^b^kumbhathūnike^eb^ti ghaṭadaddarivādake.
[22] vetālike ca jalle ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^sammatālañcā^eb^ti khadirādisammañceva kaṃsatālañca. ^b^tūriyatāḷitasaṅghuṭṭha^eb^nti nānātūriyānaṃ ^a^V7.0169^ea^ tāḷitehi saṅghuṭṭhaṃ. ^b^muṭṭhikā^eb^ti muṭṭhikamallā. ^b^sobhiyā^eb^ti nagarasobhanā itthī ca sampannarūpā purisā ca. ^b^vetālike^eb^ti vetālauṭṭhāpake. ^b^jalle^eb^ti massūni karonte nhāpite.
[03] tattha ^b^mañcātimañce^eb^ti mañcānaṃ upari baddhamañce. ^b^bhūmiyo^eb^ti ramaṇīyā samajjabhūmiyo.
[22] nihate nihatamāne ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^samajjasmi^eb^nti mallaraṅge. ^b^nihate^eb^ti nihanitvā jinitvā ṭhite. ^b^nihatamāne^eb^ti parājite.
[22] eṇeyyā ca varāhā ca, gaṇino nīkasūkarā..

[03] tattha ^b^palāsādā^eb^ti khaggamigā. ``palatā''tipi pāṭho. ^b^gavajā^eb^ti gavayā. ^b^varāhā^eb^ti ekā migajātikā. tathā gaṇino ceva nīkasūkarā ca.^b^ bahū citrā^eb^ti nānappakārā citrā migā.^b^ biḷārā^eb^ti araññabiḷārā. ^b^sasakaṇṭakā^eb^ti sasā ca kaṇṭakā ca.
[03] tattha ^b^najjāyo^eb^ti nadiyo. ^b^soṇṇavālukasanthatā^eb^ti suvaṇṇavālukāya santhatatalā. ^b^kumbhīlā^eb^ti ime evarūpā jalacarā antonadiyaṃ vicaranti, tepi maṇimhi passāhīti.
[03] tattha ^a^M7.0178^ea^ ^b^veḷuriyakarodāyo^eb^ti veḷuriyapāsāṇe paharitvā saddaṃ karontiyo evarūpā najjāyoti.
[03] tattha ^b^puthulomanisevitā^eb^ti mahāmacchehi nisevitā. ^b^vanarājehī^eb^ti vanarājīhi, ayameva vā pāṭho.
[22] cattāro ca mahārāje, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^videhe^eb^ti pubbavidehadīpaṃ. ^b^goyāniye^eb^ti aparagoyānadīpaṃ. ^b^kuruyo^eb^ti uttarakuru ca dakkhiṇato jambudīpañca. ^b^anupariyante^eb^ti ete candimasūriye sineruṃ anupariyāyante. ^b^pāṭiye^eb^ti pattharitvā ṭhapite viya piṭṭhipāsāṇe.
[22] pajjalante ca vaṇṇena, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ..
[21] ``tāvatiṃse ca yāme ca, tusite cāpi nimmite.
[22] cha piṅgalā pannarasa, haliddā ca catuddasa..

[03] tattha ^b^dasettha rājiyo setā^eb^ti etasmiṃ maṇikkhandhe dasa setarājiyo. ^b^cha piṅgalā pannarasā^eb^ti cha ca pannarasa cāti ekavīsati piṅgalarājiyo ^a^M7.0180^ea^. ^b^haliddā^eb^ti haliddavaṇṇā catuddasa. ^b^tiṃsatī^eb^ti indagopakavaṇṇābhā tiṃsa rājiyo. ^b^dasa chaccā^eb^ti dasa ca cha ca soḷasa kāḷarājiyo. ^b^pannavīsatī^eb^ti pañcavīsati mañjeṭṭhavaṇṇā pabhassarā. ^b^missā bandhukapupphehī^eb^ti kāḷamañjeṭṭhavaṇṇarājiyo etehi missā vicittikā passa. ettha hi kāḷarājiyo bandhujīvakapupphehi missā, mañjeṭṭharājiyo nīluppalehi vicittikā. ^b^odhisuṅka^eb^nti suṅkakoṭṭhāsaṃ. yo maṃ jūte jinissati, tassimaṃ suṅkakoṭṭhāsaṃ passāti vadati. aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ``hotu suṅkaṃ, mahārājā''tipi pāṭho. tassattho -- dvipaduttama passa tvaṃ imaṃ evarūpaṃ maṇikkhandhaṃ, idameva, mahārāja, suṅkaṃ hotu. yo maṃ jūte jinissati, tassidaṃ bhavissatīti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^P6.0280^ea^ vatvā puṇṇako ``mahārāja, ahaṃ tāva jūte parājito imaṃ maṇiratanaṃ dassāmi, tvaṃ pana kiṃ dassasī''ti āha. ``tāta, mama sarīrañca deviñca setacchattañca ṭhapetvā sesaṃ mama santakaṃ suṅkaṃ hotū''ti. ``tena hi, deva, mā cirāyi, ahaṃ dūrāgato, khippaṃ jūtamaṇḍalaṃ sajjāpehī''ti. rājā amacce āṇāpesi. te khippaṃ jūtamaṇḍalaṃ sajjetvā ^a^V7.0173^ea^ rañño varapotthakattharaṇaṃ santharitvā sesarājūnañcāpi āsanāni paññapetvā puṇṇakassapi patirūpaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā rañño kālaṃ ārocayiṃsu. tato puṇṇako rājānaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi --
[21] ``upāgataṃ rāja mupehi lakkhaṃ, netādisaṃ maṇiratanaṃ tavatthi.
[22] dhammena jissāma asāhasena, jito ca no khippamavākarohī''ti..

[03] tassattho -- mahārāja, jūtasālāya kammaṃ upāgataṃ niṭṭhitaṃ, etādisaṃ maṇiratanaṃ tava natthi, mā papañcaṃ karohi, upehi lakkhaṃ akkhehi kīḷanaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^M7.0181^ea^ upagaccha. kīḷantā ca mayaṃ dhammena jissāma, dhammeneva no asāhasena jayo hotu. sace pana tvaṃ jito bhavissasi, atha no khippamavākarohi, papañcaṃ akatvāva jito dhanaṃ dadeyyāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] atha naṃ rājā ``māṇava, tvaṃ maṃ `rājā'ti mā bhāyi, dhammeneva no asāhasena jayaparājayo bhavissatī''ti āha. taṃ sutvā puṇṇako ``amhākaṃ dhammeneva jayaparājayabhāvaṃ jānāthā''ti tepi rājāno sakkhiṃ karonto gāthamāha --
[21] ``pañcāla paccuggata sūrasena, macchā ca maddā saha kekakebhi.
[22] passantu note asaṭhena yuddhaṃ, na no sabhāyaṃ na karonti kiñcī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^paccuggatā^eb^ti uggatattā paññātattā pākaṭattā pañcālarājānamevālapati. ^b^macchā cā^eb^ti tvañca, samma maccharāja. ^b^maddā^eb^ti maddarāja. ^b^saha kekakebhī^eb^ti kekakebhināmena janapadena saha vattamānakekakebhirāja, tvañca. atha vā ^a^P6.0281^ea^ sahasaddaṃ ``kekakebhī''ti padassa pacchato ṭhapetvā paccuggatasaddañca sūrasenavisesanaṃ katvā pañcālapaccuggatasūrasena macchā ca maddā ca kekakebhi saha sesarājāno cāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^passantu note^eb^ti amhākaṃ dvinnaṃ ete rājāno asaṭhena akkhayuddhaṃ passantu. ^b^na no sabhāyaṃ na karonti kiñcī^eb^ti ettha ^b^no^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, sabhāyaṃ kiñci sakkhiṃ na na karonti, khattiyepi brāhmaṇepi karontiyeva, tasmā sace kiñci akāraṇaṃ uppajjati, ``na no sutaṃ, na no diṭṭha''nti vattuṃ na labhissatha, appamattā hothāti.

[03] evaṃ yakkhasenāpati rājāno sakkhiṃ akāsi. rājāpi ekasatarājaparivuto puṇṇakaṃ gahetvā ^a^V7.0174^ea^ jūtasālaṃ pāvisi. sabbepi patirūpāsanesu nisīdiṃsu, rajataphalake suvaṇṇapāsake ṭhapayiṃsu. puṇṇako turitaturito āha ``mahārāja, pāsakesu āyā nāma mālikaṃ sāvaṭṭaṃ bahulaṃ santibhadrādayo catuvīsati, tesu tumhe attano ruccanakaṃ āyaṃ gaṇhathā''ti. rājā ``sādhū''ti bahulaṃ gaṇhi. puṇṇako ^a^M7.0182^ea^ sāvaṭṭaṃ gaṇhi. atha naṃ rājā āha ``tena hi tāva māṇava, pāsake pātehī''ti. ``mahārāja, paṭhamaṃ mama vāro na pāpuṇāti, tumhe pātethā''ti vutte rājā ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchi. tassa pana tatiye attabhāve mātubhūtapubbā ārakkhadevatā, tassā ānubhāvena rājā jūte jināti. sā tassa avidūre ṭhitā ahosi. rājā devadhītaraṃ anussaritvā jūtagītaṃ gāyanto imā gāthā āha --
[21] ``atha passatu maṃ amma, vijayaṃ me padissatu.
[21] ``devate tvajja rakkha devi, passa mā maṃ vibhāveyya.
[22] anukampakā patiṭṭhā ca, passa bhadrāni rakkhituṃ..
[21] ``devate me jayaṃ dehi, passa maṃ appabhāginaṃ.

[03] rājā evaṃ jūtagītaṃ gāyitvā pāsake hatthena parivattetvā ākāse khipi. puṇṇakassa ānubhāvena pāsakā rañño parājayāya bhassanti. rājā jūtasippamhi atikusalatāya pāsake attano ^a^V7.0175^ea^ parājayāya ^a^P6.0282^ea^ bhassante ñatvā ākāseyeva saṅkaḍḍhanto gahetvā puna ākāse khipi. dutiyampi attano parājayāya bhassante ñatvā tatheva aggahesi. tato puṇṇako cintesi ``ayaṃ rājā mādisena yakkhena saddhiṃ jūtaṃ kīḷanto bhassamāne pāsake saṅkaḍḍhitvā gaṇhāti, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa''nti. so olokento tassa ārakkhadevatāya ānubhāvaṃ ñatvā akkhīni ummīletvā kuddho viya naṃ olokesi. sā bhītatasitā ^a^M7.0183^ea^ palāyitvā cakkavāḷapabbatamatthakaṃ patvā kampamānā oloketvā aṭṭhāsi. rājā tatiyampi pāsake khipitvā attano parājayāya bhassante ñatvāpi puṇṇakassānubhāvena hatthaṃ pasāretvā gaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi. te rañño parājayāya patiṃsu. athassa parājitabhāvaṃ ñatvā puṇṇako apphoṭetvā mahantena saddena ``jitaṃ me''ti tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi. so saddo sakalajambudīpaṃ phari. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``te pāvisuṃ akkhamadena mattā, rājā kurūnaṃ puṇṇako cāpi yakkho.
[22] rājā kaliṃ viccinamaggahesi, kaṭaṃ aggahī puṇṇako nāma yakkho..
[21] ``te tattha jūte ubhaye samāgate, raññaṃ sakāse sakhīnañca majjhe.
[22] ajesi yakkho naravīraseṭṭhaṃ, tatthappanādo tumulo babhūvā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^pāvisu^eb^nti jūtasālaṃ pavisiṃsu. ^b^viccina^eb^nti rājā catuvīsatiyā āyesu vicinanto kaliṃ parājayaggāhaṃ aggahesi. ^b^kaṭaṃ aggahī^eb^ti puṇṇako nāma yakkho jayaggāhaṃ gaṇhi. ^b^te tattha jūte ubhaye samāgate^eb^ti te tattha jūte samāgatā ubho jūtaṃ kīḷiṃsūti attho. ^b^rañña^eb^nti atha tesaṃ ekasatarājūnaṃ sakāse avasesānañca sakhīnaṃ majjhe so yakkho naravīraseṭṭhaṃ rājānaṃ ajesi. ^b^tatthappanādo tumulo babhūvā^eb^ti tasmiṃ jūtamaṇḍale ``rañño parājitabhāvaṃ jānātha, jitaṃ me, jitaṃ me''ti mahanto saddo ahosi.
[03] rājā parājito anattamano ahosi. atha naṃ samassāsento puṇṇako gāthamāha --
[21] ``jayo ^a^P6.0283^ea^ ^a^M7.0184^ea^ mahārāja parājayo ca, āyūhataṃ aññatarassa hoti.
[22] janinda jīnosi varaddhanena, jito ca me khippamavākarohī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^āyūhata^eb^nti dvinnaṃ vāyāmamānānaṃ aññatarassa eva hoti, tasmā ``parājitomhī''ti ^a^V7.0176^ea^ mā cintayi. ^b^jīnosī^eb^ti parihīnosi. ^b^varaddhanenā^eb^ti paramadhanena. ^b^khippamavākarohī^eb^ti khippaṃ me jayaṃ dhanaṃ dehīti.
[03] atha naṃ rājā ``gaṇha, tātā''ti vadanto gāthamāha --
[21] ``hatthī gavāssā maṇikuṇḍalā ca, yañcāpi mayhaṃ ratanaṃ pathabyā.
[22] gaṇhāhi kaccāna varaṃ dhanānaṃ, ādāya yenicchasi tena gacchā''ti..
[21] ``hatthī gavāssā maṇikuṇḍalā ca, yañcāpi tuyhaṃ ratanaṃ pathabyā.
[22] tesaṃ varo vidhuro nāma kattā, so me jito taṃ me avākarohī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^so me jito taṃ me^eb^ti mayā hi tava vijite uttamaṃ ratanaṃ jitaṃ, so ca sabbaratanānaṃ varo vidhuro, tasmā, deva, so mayā jito nāma hoti, taṃ me dehīti.
[21] ``attā ca me so saraṇaṃ gatī ca, dīpo ca leṇo ca parāyaṇo ca.
[22] asantuleyyo mama so dhanena, pāṇena me sādiso esa kattā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^attā ca me so^eb^ti so mayhaṃ attā ca, mayā ca ``attānaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ dassāmī''ti vuttaṃ, tasmā taṃ mā gaṇhi. na kevalañca attāva ^a^M7.0185^ea^, atha kho me so saraṇañca gati ca dīpo ca leṇo ca parāyaṇo ca. ^b^asantuleyyo mama so dhanenā^eb^ti sattavidhena ratanena saddhiṃ na tuletabboti.
[21] ``ciraṃ vivādo mama tuyhañcassa, kāmañca pucchāma tameva gantvā.
[22] esova ^a^P6.0284^ea^ no vivaratu etamatthaṃ, yaṃ vakkhatī hotu kathā ubhinna''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0177^ea^ ^b^vivaratu etamattha^eb^nti ``so tava attā vā na vā''ti etamatthaṃ esova pakāsetu. ^b^hotu kathā ubhinna^eb^nti yaṃ so vakkhati, sāyeva no ubhinnaṃ kathā hotu, taṃ pamāṇaṃ hotūti attho.
[21] ``addhā hi saccaṃ bhaṇasi, na ca māṇava sāhasaṃ.
[22] tameva gantvā pucchāma, tena tussāmubho janā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^na ca māṇava sāhasa^eb^nti mayhaṃ pasayha sāhasikavacanaṃ na ca bhaṇasi.

[03] evaṃ vatvā rājā ekasatarājāno puṇṇakañca gahetvā tuṭṭhamānaso vegena dhammasabhaṃ agamāsi. paṇḍitopi āsanā oruyha rājānaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. atha puṇṇako mahāsattaṃ āmantetvā ``paṇḍita, `tvaṃ dhamme ṭhito jīvitahetupi musāvādaṃ na bhaṇasī'ti kittisaddo te sakalaloke phuṭo, ahaṃ pana te ajja dhamme ṭhitabhāvaṃ jānissāmī''ti vatvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``saccaṃ nu devā vidahū kurūnaṃ, dhamme ṭhitaṃ vidhuraṃ nāmamaccaṃ.
[22] dāsosi rañño uda vāsi ñāti, vidhuroti saṅkhā katamāsi loke''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^saccaṃ nu devā vidahū kurūnaṃ, dhamme ṭhitaṃ vidhuraṃ nāmamacca^eb^nti ``kurūnaṃ raṭṭhe vidhuro nāma amacco dhamme ṭhito jīvitahetupi musāvādaṃ na ^a^M7.0186^ea^ bhaṇatī''ti evaṃ devā vidahū vidahanti kathenti pakāsenti, evaṃ vidahamānā te devā saccaṃ nu vidahanti, udāhu abhūtavādāyeveteti. ^b^vidhuroti saṅkhā katamāsi loke^eb^ti yā esā tava ``vidhuro''ti loke saṅkhā paññatti, sā katamā āsi, tvaṃ pakāsehi, kiṃ nu rañño dāso nīcatarajātiko, udāhu samo vā uttaritaro vā ñātīti idaṃ tāva me ācikkha, dāsosi rañño, uda vāsi ñātīti.

[03] atha mahāsatto ``ayaṃ maṃ evaṃ pucchati, ahaṃ kho panetaṃ `rañño ñātī'tipi `rañño uttaritaro'tipi `rañño na kiñci homī'tipi saññāpetuṃ sakkomi, evaṃ santepi imasmiṃ loke ^a^V7.0178^ea^ saccasamo avassayo ^a^P6.0285^ea^ nāma natthi, saccameva kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti cintetvā ``māṇava, nevāhaṃ rañño ñāti, na uttaritaro, catunnaṃ pana dāsānaṃ aññataro''ti dassetuṃ gāthādvayamāha --
[21] ``āmāyadāsāpi bhavanti heke, dhanena kītāpi bhavanti dāsā.
[22] sayampi heke upayanti dāsā, bhayā paṇunnāpi bhavanti dāsā..
[21] ``ete narānaṃ caturova dāsā, addhā hi yonito ahampi jāto.
[27] bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño, dāsāhaṃ devassa parampi gantvā.

[03] tattha ^b^āmāyadāsā^eb^ti dāsiyā kucchimhi jātadāsā. ^b^sayampi heke upayanti dāsā^eb^ti ye keci upaṭṭhākajātikā, sabbe te sayaṃ dāsabhāvaṃ upagatā dāsā nāma. ^b^bhayā paṇunnā^eb^ti rājabhayena vā corabhayena vā attano vasanaṭṭhānato paṇunnā karamarā hutvā paravisayaṃ gatāpi dāsāyeva nāma. ^b^addhā hi yonito ahampi jāto^eb^ti māṇava, ekaṃseneva ahampi catūsu dāsayonīsu ekato sayaṃ dāsayonito nibbattadāso. ^b^bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño^eb^ti rañño ^a^M7.0187^ea^ vuḍḍhi vā hotu avuḍḍhi vā, na sakkā mayā musā bhāsituṃ. ^b^parampī^eb^ti dūraṃ gantvāpi ahaṃ devassa dāsoyeva. ^b^dajjā^eb^ti maṃ rājā jayadhanena khaṇḍetvā tuyhaṃ dento dhammena sabhāvena dadeyyāti.
[03] taṃ sutvā puṇṇako haṭṭhatuṭṭho puna apphoṭetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``ayaṃ dutīyo vijayo mamajja, puṭṭho hi kattā vivarettha pañhaṃ.
[22] adhammarūpo vata rājaseṭṭho, subhāsitaṃ nānujānāsi mayha''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^rājaseṭṭho^eb^ti ayaṃ rājaseṭṭho adhammarūpo vata. ^b^subhāsita^eb^nti vidhurapaṇḍitena sukathitaṃ suvinicchitaṃ. ^b^nānujānāsi mayha^eb^nti idānetaṃ vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ mayhaṃ kasmā nānujānāsi, kimatthaṃ na desīti vadati.

[03] taṃ sutvā rājā anattamano hutvā ``paṇḍito mādisaṃ yasadāyakaṃ anoloketvā idāni diṭṭhaṃ ^a^V7.0179^ea^ māṇavakaṃ oloketī''ti mahāsattassa kujjhitvā ``māṇava, sace so dāso me bhaveyya, taṃ gahetvā gacchā''ti vatvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``evaṃ ^a^P6.0286^ea^ ce no so vivarettha pañhaṃ, dāsohamasmi na ca khosmi ñāti.
[22] gaṇhāhi kaccāna varaṃ dhanānaṃ, ādāya yenicchasi tena gacchā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^evaṃ ce no so vivarettha pañha^eb^nti sace so amhākaṃ pañhaṃ ``dāsohamasmi, na ca khosmi ñātī''ti evaṃ vivari ettha parisamaṇḍale, atha kiṃ acchasi, sakalaloke dhanānaṃ varaṃ etaṃ gaṇha, gahetvā ca pana yena icchasi, tena gacchāti.

[03] evañca ^a^M7.0188^ea^ pana vatvā rājā cintesi ``paṇḍitaṃ gahetvā māṇavo yathāruci gamissati, tassa gatakālato paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ madhuradhammakathā dullabhā bhavissati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapetvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīdapetvā gharāvāsapañhaṃ puccheyya''nti. atha naṃ rājā evamāha ``paṇḍita, tumhākaṃ gatakāle mama madhuradhammakathā dullabhā bhavissati, alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīdāpetvā attano ṭhāne ṭhatvā mayhaṃ gharāvāsapañhaṃ kathethā''ti. so ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā raññā pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjesi. tatrāyaṃ pañho --
[22] khemā vutti kathaṃ assa, kathaṃ nu assa saṅgaho..
[22] asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, kathaṃ pecca na socatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^khemā vutti kathaṃ assā^eb^ti kathaṃ gharāvāsaṃ vasantassa gahaṭṭhassa khemā nibbhayā vutti bhaveyya. ^b^kathaṃ nu assa saṅgaho^eb^ti catubbidho saṅgahavatthusaṅkhāto saṅgaho tassa kathaṃ bhaveyya ^a^V7.0180^ea^. ^b^abyābajjha^eb^nti niddukkhatā. ^b^saccavādī cā^eb^ti kathaṃ nu māṇavo saccavādī nāma bhaveyya. ^b^peccā^eb^ti paralokaṃ gantvā.
[03] taṃ sutvā paṇḍito rañño pañhaṃ kathesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] na seve lokāyatikaṃ, netaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhanaṃ..
[22] khemā vutti siyā evaṃ, evaṃ nu assa saṅgaho..
[22] asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, evaṃ pecca na socatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^taṃ tatthā^eb^ti bhikkhave, taṃ rājānaṃ tattha dhammasabhāyaṃ ñāṇagatiyā ^b^gatimā,^eb^ abbocchinnavīriyena ^b^dhitimā,^eb^ bhūrisamāya vipulāya paññāya ^b^matimā,^eb^ saṇhasukhumatthadassinā ñāṇena ^b^atthadassimā,^eb^ paricchinditvā jānanañāṇasaṅkhātāya paññāya sabbadhammānaṃ ^b^saṅkhātā,^eb^ vidhurapaṇḍito etaṃ ``na sādhāraṇadārassā''tiādivacanaṃ abravi. tattha yo paresaṃ dāresu aparajjhati ^a^V7.0181^ea^, so sādhāraṇadāro nāma, tādiso na assa bhaveyya. ^b^na bhuñje sādumekako^eb^ti sādurasaṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ aññesaṃ adatvā ekakova na bhuñjeyya. ^b^lokāyatika^eb^nti anatthanissitaṃ saggamaggānaṃ adāyakaṃ aniyyānikaṃ vitaṇḍasallāpaṃ lokāyatikavādaṃ na seveyya. ^b^netaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhana^eb^nti na hi etaṃ lokāyatikaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhanaṃ. ^b^sīlavā^eb^ti akhaṇḍehi pañcahi sīlehi samannāgato. ^b^vattasampanno^eb^ti gharāvāsavattena vā rājavattena vā samannāgato. ^b^appamatto^eb^ti kusaladhammesu appamatto. ^b^nivātavuttī^eb^ti atimānaṃ akatvā nīcavutti ovādānusāsanipaṭicchako. ^b^atthaddho^eb^ti thaddhamacchariyavirahito. ^b^surato^eb^ti soraccena samannāgato. ^b^sakhilo^eb^ti pemanīyavacano. ^b^mudū^eb^ti kāyavācācittehi apharuso.

[03] ^b^saṅgahetā ca mittāna^eb^nti kalyāṇamittānaṃ saṅgahakaro. dānādīsu yo yena saṅgahaṃ icchati, tassa teneva saṅgāhako. ^b^saṃvibhāgī^eb^ti dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañceva kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakādīnañca saṃvibhāgakaro. ^b^vidhānavā^eb^ti ``imasmiṃ kāle kasituṃ vaṭṭati, imasmiṃ kāle vapituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti evaṃ sabbakiccesu vidhānasampanno. ^b^tappeyyā^eb^ti gahitagahitabhājanāni ^a^M7.0190^ea^ pūretvā dadamāno tappeyya. ^b^dhammakāmo^eb^ti paveṇidhammampi sucaritadhammampi kāmayamāno patthayamāno. ^b^sutādhāro^eb^ti sutassa ādhārabhūto. ^b^paripucchako^eb^ti dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā ``kiṃ, bhante, kusala''ntiādivacanehi paripucchanasīlo. ^b^sakkacca^eb^nti gāravena. ^b^evaṃ nu assa saṅgaho^eb^ti saṅgahopissa evaṃ kato nāma bhaveyya. ^b^saccavādī^eb^ti evaṃ paṭipannoyeva sabhāvavādī nāma siyā.
[03] evaṃ mahāsatto rañño gharāvāsapañhaṃ kathetvā pallaṅkā oruyha rājānaṃ vandi. rājāpissa mahāsakkāraṃ katvā ekasatarājūhi parivuto attano nivesanameva gato.
[03] mahāsatto ^a^P6.0288^ea^ pana paṭinivatto. atha naṃ puṇṇako āha --
[21] ``ehi dāni gamissāma, dinno no issarena me.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0182^ea^ ^b^dinno no^eb^ti ettha ^b^no^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, tvaṃ issarena mayhaṃ dinnoti attho. ^b^sanantano^eb^ti mama atthaṃ paṭipajjantena hi tayā attano sāmikassa attho paṭipanno hoti. yañcetaṃ sāmikassa atthakaraṇaṃ nāma, esa dhammo sanantano porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ sabhāvoti.
[22] tīhañca taṃ vāsayemu agāre, yenaddhunā anusāsemu putte''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^tayāhamasmī^eb^ti tayā laddhohamasmīti jānāmi, labhantena ca na aññathā laddho. ^b^dinnohamasmi tava issarenā^eb^ti mama issarena raññā ^a^M7.0191^ea^ ahaṃ tava dinno. ^b^tīhaṃ cā^eb^ti māṇava, ahaṃ tava bahūpakāro, rājānaṃ anoloketvā saccameva kathesiṃ, tenāhaṃ tayā laddho, tvaṃ me mahantaguṇabhāvaṃ jānāhi, mayaṃ tīṇipi divasāni attano agāre vāsemu, tasmā yenaddhunā yattakena kālena mayaṃ puttādāre anusāsemu, taṃ kālaṃ adhivāsehīti.
[03] taṃ sutvā puṇṇako ``saccaṃ paṇḍito āha, bahūpakāro esa mama, `sattāhampi aḍḍhamāsampi nisīdāhī'ti vutte adhivāsetabbamevā''ti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``taṃ me tathā hotu vasemu tīhaṃ, kurutaṃ bhavajja gharesu kiccaṃ.
[22] anusāsataṃ puttadāre bhavajja, yathā tayī pecca sukhī bhaveyyā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^taṃ me^eb^ti yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi, sabbaṃ taṃ mama tathā hotu. ^b^bhavajjā^eb^ti bhavaṃ ajja paṭṭhāya tīhaṃ anusāsatu. ^b^tayī peccā^eb^ti yathā tayi gate pacchā tava puttadāro sukhī bhaveyya, evaṃ anusāsatu.
[03] evaṃ vatvā puṇṇako mahāsattena saddhiṃyeva tassa nivesanaṃ pāvisi. tamatthaṃ ^a^P6.0289^ea^ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``sādhūti vatvāna pahūtakāmo, pakkāmi yakkho vidhurena saddhiṃ.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0183^ea^ ^b^pahūtakāmo^eb^ti mahābhogo. ^b^kuñjarājaññahayānuciṇṇa^eb^nti kuñjarehi ca ājaññahayehi ca anuciṇṇaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ. ^b^ariyaseṭṭho^eb^ti ācārāriyesu uttamo puṇṇako yakkho paṇḍitassa antepuraṃ pāvisi.
[03] mahāsattassa pana tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ atthāya tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. tesu eko koñco nāma, eko mayūro nāma, eko piyaketo nāma. te sandhāya ayaṃ gāthā vuttā --
[21] ``koñcaṃ ^a^M7.0192^ea^ mayūrañca piyañca ketaṃ, upāgamī tattha surammarūpaṃ.
[03] tattha ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu tīsu pāsādesu yattha tasmiṃ samaye attanā vasati, taṃ surammarūpaṃ pāsādaṃ puṇṇakaṃ ādāya upāgami.

[03] so upagantvā ca pana alaṅkatapāsādassa sattamāya bhūmiyā sayanagabbhañceva mahātalañca sajjāpetvā sirisayanaṃ paññāpetvā sabbaṃ annapānādividhiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā devakaññāyo viya pañcasatā itthiyo ``imā te pādaparicārikā hontu, anukkaṇṭhanto idha vasāhī''ti tassa niyyādetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato. tassa gatakāle tā itthiyo nānātūriyāni gahetvā puṇṇakassa paricariyāya naccādīni paṭṭhapesuṃ. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[03] tattha ^b^avhayanti varāvara^eb^nti varato varaṃ naccañca gītañca karontiyo pakkosanti.
[21] ``samaṅgikatvā pamadāhi yakkhaṃ, annena pānena ca dhammapālo.

[03] tattha ^b^pamadāhī^eb^ti pamadāhi ceva annapānehi ca samaṅgikatvā. ^b^dhammapālo^eb^ti dhammassa pālako gopako. ^b^atthatthamevā^eb^ti atthabhūtameva atthaṃ. ^b^bhariyāyā^eb^ti sabbajeṭṭhikāya bhariyāya.
[22] bhariyaṃvacā `ehi suṇohi bhoti, puttāni āmantaya tambanette'''ti..
[21] ``sutvāna vākyaṃ patino anujjā, suṇisaṃ vaca tambanakhiṃ sunettaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^anujjā^eb^ti evaṃnāmikā. ^b^suṇisaṃvaca tambanakhiṃ sunetta^eb^nti sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā assumukhī rodamānā ``sayaṃ gantvā putte pakkosituṃ ayuttaṃ, suṇisaṃ pesessāmī''ti tassā nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tambanakhiṃ sunettaṃ suṇisaṃ avaca. ^b^vammadharānī^eb^ti vammadhare sūre, samattheti attho, ābharaṇabhaṇḍameva vā idha ``vamma''nti adhippetaṃ, tasmā ābharaṇadharetipi attho. ^b^cete^eb^ti taṃ nāmenālapati, ^b^puttānī^eb^ti mama putte ca dhītaro ca. ^b^indīvarapupphasāme^eb^ti taṃ ālapati.

[03] sā ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā pāsādā oruyha anuvicaritvā ``pitā vo ovādaṃ dātukāmo pakkosati, idaṃ kira vo tassa pacchimadassana''nti sabbamevassa suhadajanañca puttadhītaro ca sannipātesi. dhammapālakumāro pana taṃ vacanaṃ sutvāva rodanto kaniṭṭhabhātikagaṇaparivuto pitu santikaṃ agamāsi. paṇḍito te disvāva sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto assupuṇṇehi nettehi āliṅgitvā sīse cumbitvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ muhuttaṃ hadaye nipajjāpetvā hadayā otāretvā sirigabbhato nikkhamma mahātale pallaṅkamajjhe nisīditvā puttasahassassa ovādaṃ adāsi. tamatthaṃ ^a^P6.0291^ea^ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``te āgate muddhani dhammapālo, cumbitvā putte avikampamāno.
[22] āmantayitvāna avoca vākyaṃ, dinnāhaṃ raññā idha māṇavassa..
[21] ``tassajjahaṃ ^a^M7.0194^ea^ attasukhī vidheyyo, ādāya yenicchati tena gacchati.
[22] ahañca vo sāsitumāgatosmi, kathaṃ ahaṃ aparittāya gacche..
[21] ``sace ^a^V7.0185^ea^ vo rājā kururaṭṭhavāsī, janasandho puccheyya pahūtakāmo.
[22] kimābhijānātha pure purāṇaṃ, kiṃ vo pitā puratthā..
[21] ``samāsanā hotha mayāva sabbe, konīdha rañño abbhatiko manusso.
[27] tamañjaliṃ kariya vadetha evaṃ, mā hevaṃ deva na hi esa dhammo.
[22] viyaggharājassa nihīnajacco, samāsano deva kathaṃ bhaveyyā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^dhammapālo^eb^ti mahāsatto. ^b^dinnāha^eb^nti ahaṃ jayadhanena khaṇḍetvā raññā dinno. ^b^tassajjahaṃ attasukhī vidheyyo^eb^ti ajja paṭṭhāya tīhamattaṃ ahaṃ iminā attano sukhena attasukhī, tato paraṃ pana tassa māṇavassāhaṃ vidheyyo homi. so hi ito catutthe divase ekaṃsena maṃ ādāya yatthicchati, tattha gacchati. ^b^aparittāyā^eb^ti tumhākaṃ parittaṃ akatvā kathaṃ gaccheyyanti anusāsituṃ āgatosmi. ^b^janasandho^eb^ti mittabandhanena mittajanassa sandhānakaro. ^b^pure purāṇa^eb^nti ito pubbe tumhe kiṃ purāṇakāraṇaṃ abhijānātha. ^b^anusāse^eb^ti anusāsi. evaṃ tumhe raññā puṭṭhā ``amhākaṃ pitā imañcimañca ovādaṃ adāsī''ti katheyyātha. ^b^samāsanā hothā^eb^ti sace vo rājā mayā dinnassa ovādassa kathitakāle ``etha tumhe, ajja mayā saddhiṃ samāsanā hotha, idha rājakule tumhehi añño ko nu rañño abbhatiko manusso''ti attano āsane nisīdāpeyya, atha tumhe añjaliṃ katvā taṃ rājānaṃ evaṃ vadeyyātha ``deva, evaṃ mā avaca. na hi amhākaṃ esapaveṇidhammo. ^b^viyaggharājassa^eb^ kesarasīhassa nihīnajacco jarasiṅgālo ^a^M7.0195^ea^, deva, kathaṃ samāsano bhaveyya. yathā siṅgālo sīhassa samāsano na hoti, tatheva mayaṃ tumhāka''nti.
[03] imaṃ ^a^P6.0292^ea^ panassa kathaṃ sutvā puttadhītaro ca ñātisuhajjādayo ca dāsakammakaraporisā ca te sabbe sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā mahāviravaṃ viraviṃsu. tesaṃ mahāsatto saññāpesi.

[03] atha ne paṇḍito puttadhītaro ca ñātayo ca upasaṅkamitvā tuṇhībhūte disvā ``tātā, mā cintayittha, sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, yaso nāma vipattipariyosāno, apica tumhākaṃ rājavasatiṃ ^a^V7.0186^ea^ nāma yasapaṭilābhakāraṇaṃ kathessāmi, taṃ ekaggacittā suṇāthā''ti buddhalīlāya rājavasatiṃ nāma paṭṭhapesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``so ca putte amacce ca, ñātayo suhadajjane.
[22] yathā rājakulaṃ patto, yasaṃ poso nigacchatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^suhadajjane^eb^ti suhadayajane. ^b^ethayyo^eb^ti etha, ayyo. piyasamudācārena putte ālapati. ^b^rājavasati^eb^nti mayā vuccamānaṃ rājapāricariyaṃ suṇātha. ^b^yathā^eb^ti yena kāraṇena rājakulaṃ patto upasaṅkamanto rañño santike caranto poso yasaṃ nigacchati labhati, taṃ kāraṇaṃ suṇāthāti attho.
[21] ``na hi rājakulaṃ patto, aññāto labhate yasaṃ.
[22] atha vissasate tyamhi, guyhañcassa na rakkhatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0196^ea^ ^b^aññāto^eb^ti apākaṭaguṇo aviditakammāvadāno. ^b^nāsūro^eb^ti na asūro bhīrukajātiko. ^b^yadāssa sīla^eb^nti yadā assa sevakassa rājā sīlañca paññañca soceyyañca adhigacchati, ācārasampattiñca ñāṇabalañca sucibhāvañca jānāti. ^b^atha vissasate tyamhī^eb^ti atha rājā tamhi vissasate vissāsaṃ karoti, attano guyhañcassa na rakkhati na gūhati.
[22] ajjhiṭṭho na vikampeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase..

[03] tattha ^b^tulā^eb^ ^a^P6.0293^ea^ ^b^yathā^eb^ti yathā esā vuttappakārā tulā na onamati na unnamati, evameva rājasevako kismiñcideva kamme raññā ``idaṃ nāma karohī''ti ajjhiṭṭho āṇatto chandādiagativasena na vikampeyya, sabbakiccesu paggahitatulā viya samo bhaveyya. ^b^sa rājavasati^eb^nti so evarūpo sevako rājakule vāsaṃ vaseyya, rājānaṃ paricareyya, evaṃ paricaranto pana yasaṃ labheyyāti attho. ^b^sabbāni abhisambhonto^eb^ti sabbāni rājakiccāni karonto.
[21] ``divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, rājakiccesu paṇḍito.
[22] ajjhiṭṭho na vikampeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase..
[21] ``divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, rājakiccesu paṇḍito.
[22] na tena vutto gaccheyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^na vikampeyyā^eb^ti avikampamāno tāni kiccāni kareyya. ^b^yo cassā^eb^ti yo ca rañño gamanamaggo sukato assa ^b^suppaṭiyādito^eb^ sumaṇḍito, ``iminā maggena gacchā''ti vuttopi tena na gaccheyya.
[22] sabbattha pacchato gacche, sa rājavasatiṃ vase..
[21] ``na rañño sadisaṃ vatthaṃ, na mālaṃ na vilepanaṃ.
[27] ākappaṃ sarakuttiṃ vā, na rañño sadisamācare.
[22] aññaṃ kareyya ākappaṃ, sa rājavasatiṃ vase''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0188^ea^ ^b^na rañño^eb^ti rañño kāmabhogena samaṃ kāmabhogaṃ na bhuñjeyya. tādisassa hi rājā kujjhati. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu rūpādīsu kāmaguṇesu rañño pacchatova gaccheyya, hīnatarameva seveyyāti attho. ^b^aññaṃ kareyyā^eb^ti rañño ākappato sarakuttito ca aññameva ākappaṃ kareyya.

[03] tattha ^b^bhāva^eb^nti vissāsavasena adhippāyaṃ. ^b^acapalo^eb^ti amaṇḍanasīlo. ^b^nipako^eb^ti paripakkañāṇo. ^b^saṃvutindriyo^eb^ti pihitachaḷindriyo rañño vā aṅgapaccaṅgāni orodhe vāssa na olokeyya. ^b^manopaṇidhisampanno^eb^ti acapalena suṭṭhu ṭhapitena cittena samannāgato.
[22] nāssa kosā dhanaṃ gaṇhe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase..
[21] ``na niddaṃ bahu maññeyya, na madāya suraṃ pive.
[22] nāssa dāye mige haññe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase..
[21] ``nāssa pīṭhaṃ na pallaṅkaṃ, na kocchaṃ na nāvaṃ rathaṃ.
[21] ``na ^a^M7.0198^ea^ ve rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti methuno.

[03] tattha ^b^na manteyyā^eb^ti tassa rañño bhariyāhi saddhiṃ neva kīḷeyya, na raho manteyya. ^b^kosā dhana^eb^nti rañño kosā dhanaṃ thenetvā na gaṇheyya. ^b^na madāyā^eb^ti tātā, rājasevako nāma madatthāya suraṃ na piveyya. ^b^nāssa dāye mige^eb^ti assa rañño dinnābhaye mige na haññeyya. ^b^koccha^eb^nti bhaddapīṭhaṃ. ^b^sammatomhī^eb^ti ahaṃ sammato hutvā evaṃ karomīti na āruheyya. ^b^sammukhañcassa tiṭṭheyyā^eb^ti assa rañño purato khuddakamahantakathāsavanaṭṭhāne tiṭṭheyya. ^b^sandissanto sabhattuno^eb^ti yo rājasevako tassa bhattuno dassanaṭṭhāne tiṭṭheyya. ^b^sūkenā^eb^ti akkhimhi patitena vīhisūkādinā ghaṭṭitaṃ akkhi pakatisabhāvaṃ jahantaṃ yathā kujjhati nāma, evaṃ kujjhanti, na tesu vissāso kātabbo. ^b^pūjito maññamāno^eb^ti ahaṃ rājapūjitomhīti maññamāno. ^b^pharusaṃ patimanteyyā^eb^ti yena so kujjhati, tathārūpaṃ na manteyya.
[22] aggīva saṃyato tiṭṭhe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase..
[21] ``puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā saṃ, sampaggaṇhāti khattiyo.
[27] gāmehi nigamehi vā, raṭṭhehi janapadehi vā.

[03] tattha ^b^laddhadvāro^eb^ ^a^P6.0295^ea^ ^b^labhe dvāra^eb^nti ahaṃ nippaṭihāro laddhadvāroti appaṭihāretvā na paviseyya, punapi dvāraṃ labheyya, paṭihāretvāva paviseyyāti attho. ^b^saṃyato^eb^ti appamatto hutvā. ^b^bhātaraṃ vā sa^eb^nti sakaṃ bhātaraṃ vā. ^b^sampaggaṇhātī^eb^ti ``asukagāmaṃ vā asukanigamaṃ vā assa demā''ti yadā sevakehi saddhiṃ katheti. ^b^na bhaṇe chekapāpaka^eb^nti tadā guṇaṃ vā aguṇaṃ vā na bhaṇeyya.
[22] na tesaṃ antarā gacche, sa rājavasatiṃ vase..
[22] paṭilomaṃ na vatteyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase..
[22] appāsī nipako sūro, sa rājavasatiṃ vase''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^na tesaṃ antarā gacche^eb^ti tesaṃ lābhassa antarā na gacche, antarāyaṃ na kareyya. ^b^vaṃsovāpī^eb^ti yathā vaṃsagumbato uggatavaṃso vātena pahaṭakāle pakampati, evaṃ raññā kathitakāle pakampeyya. ^b^cāpovūnudaro^eb^ti yathā cāpo mahodaro na hoti, evaṃ mahodaro na siyā. ^b^ajivhavā^eb^ti yathā maccho ajivhatāya na katheti, tathā sevako mandakathatāya ajivhavā bhaveyya. ^b^appāsī^eb^ti bhojanamattaññū.
[22] kāsaṃ sāsaṃ daraṃ bālyaṃ, khīṇamedho nigacchati..
[22] avikiṇṇaṃ mitaṃ vācaṃ, patte kāle udīraye..
[22] samphaṃ giraṃ na bhāseyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase..

[03] tattha ^b^na bāḷha^eb^nti punappunaṃ kilesavasena na gaccheyya. ^b^tejasaṅkhaya^eb^nti evaṃ gacchanto hi puriso tejasaṅkhayaṃ gacchati pāpuṇāti, taṃ sampassanto bāḷhaṃ na gaccheyya. ^b^dara^eb^nti kāyadarathaṃ. ^b^bālya^eb^nti dubbalabhāvaṃ. ^b^khīṇamedho^eb^ti punappunaṃ kilesarativasena khīṇapañño puriso ete kāsādayo nigacchati. ^b^nātivela^eb^nti tātā rājūnaṃ santike pamāṇātikkantaṃ na bhāseyya ^a^M7.0200^ea^. ^b^patte kāle^eb^ti attano vacanakāle sampatte. ^b^asaṅghaṭṭo^eb^ti paraṃ asaṅghaṭṭento. ^b^sampha^eb^nti niratthakaṃ. ^b^gira^eb^nti vacanaṃ.
[22] appamatto suci dakkho, sa rājavasatiṃ vase..

[03] tattha ^b^vinīto^eb^ti ācārasampanno. ^b^sippavā^eb^ti attano kule sikkhitabbasippena samannāgato. ^b^danto^eb^ti chasu dvāresu nibbisevano. ^b^katatto^eb^ti sampāditatto. ^b^niyato^eb^ti yasādīni nissāya acalasabhāvo. ^b^mudū^eb^ti anatimānī. ^b^appamatto^eb^ti kattabbakiccesu pamādarahito. ^b^dakkho^eb^ti upaṭṭhāne cheko. ^b^nivātavuttī^eb^ti nīcavutti. ^b^sukhasaṃvāso^eb^ti garusaṃvāsasīlo. ^b^sahituṃ patita^eb^nti pararājūhi sakarañño santikaṃ guyharakkhaṇavasena vā paṭicchannapākaṭakaraṇavasenavā pesitaṃ. tathārūpena hi saddhiṃ kathentopi rañño sammukhāva katheyya. ^b^bhattāraññevudikkheyyā^eb^ti attano sāmikameva olokeyya. ^b^na ca aññassa rājino^eb^ti aññassa rañño santako na bhaveyya.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0192^ea^ ^a^M7.0201^ea^ ^b^sakkaccaṃ payirupāseyyā^eb^ti gāravena punappunaṃ upasaṅkameyya. ^b^anuvāseyyā^eb^ti uposathavāsaṃ vasanto anuvatteyya. ^b^tappeyyā^eb^ti yāvadatthaṃ dānena tappeyya. ^b^āsajjā^eb^ti upasaṅkamitvā. ^b^paññe^eb^ti paṇḍite, āsajjapaññe vā, asajjamānapaññeti attho.
[22] na ca kiñci nivāreyya, dānakāle vaṇibbake..
[22] kālaññū samayaññū ca, sa rājavasatiṃ vase..

[03] tattha ^b^dinnapubba^eb^nti pakatipaṭiyattaṃ dānavattaṃ. ^b^samaṇabrāhmaṇe^eb^ti samaṇe vā brāhmaṇe vā. ^b^vaṇibbake^eb^ti dānakāle vaṇibbake āgate disvā kiñci na nivāreyya. ^b^paññavā^eb^ti vicāraṇapaññāya yutto. ^b^buddhisampanno^eb^ti avekallabuddhisampanno. ^b^vidhānavidhikovido^eb^ti nānappakāresu dāsakammakaraporisādīnaṃ saṃvidahanakoṭṭhāsesu cheko. ^b^kālaññū^eb^ti ``ayaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ, ayaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ, ayaṃ uposathakammaṃ kātuṃ kālo''ti jāneyya. ^b^samayaññū^eb^ti ``ayaṃ kasanasamayo, ayaṃ vapanasamayo, ayaṃ vohārasamayo, ayaṃ upaṭṭhānasamayo''ti jāneyya. ^b^kammadheyyesū^eb^ti attano kattabbakammesu.
[21] ``khalaṃ sālaṃ pasuṃ khettaṃ, gantā cassa abhikkhaṇaṃ.
[22] mitaṃ dhaññaṃ nidhāpeyya, mitaṃva pācaye ghare..
[21] ``puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā saṃ, sīlesu asamāhitaṃ.
[27] anaṅgavā hi te bālā, yathā petā tatheva te.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0193^ea^ ^a^M7.0202^ea^ ^b^pasuṃ khetta^eb^nti gokulañceva sassaṭṭhānañca. ^b^gantā^eb^ti gamanasīlo. ^b^mita^eb^nti minitvā ettakanti ñatvā koṭṭhesu nidhāpeyya. ^b^ghare^eb^ti gharepi parijanaṃ gaṇetvā mitameva pacāpeyya. ^b^sīlesu asamāhita^eb^nti evarūpaṃ dussīlaṃ anācāraṃ kismiñci ādhipaccaṭṭhāne na ṭhapeyyāti attho. ^b^anaṅgavā hi te bālā^eb^ti ``aṅgametaṃ manussānaṃ, bhātā loke pavuccatī''ti (jā0 1.4.58) kiñcāpi jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātaro aṅgasamānatāya ``aṅga''nti vuttā, ime pana dussīlā, tasmā aṅgasamānā na honti. yathā pana susāne chaḍḍitā petā matā, tatheva te. tasmā tādisā ādhipaccaṭṭhāne na ṭhapetabbā. kuṭumbañhi te vināsenti, vinaṭṭhakuṭumbassa ca daliddassa rājavasati nāma na sampajjati. ^b^āsīnāna^eb^nti āgantvā nisinnānaṃ puttabhātānaṃ matasattānaṃ matakabhattaṃ viya dento ghāsacchādanamattameva padāpeyya. ^b^uṭṭhānasampanne^eb^ti uṭṭhānavīriyena samannāgate.
[21] ``sīlavā ca alolo ca, anurakkho ca rājino.
[22] āvī raho hito tassa, sa rājavasatiṃ vase..
[22] āhatopi na kuppeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^alolo^eb^ti aluddho. ^b^cittaṭṭho^eb^ti citte ṭhito, rājacittavasikoti attho. ^b^asaṅkusakavuttissā^eb^ti appaṭilomavutti assa. ^b^adhosira^eb^nti pāde dhovantopi adhosiraṃ katvā heṭṭhāmukhova dhoveyya, na rañño mukhaṃ ullokeyyāti attho.
[21] ``yo deti sayanaṃ vatthaṃ, yānaṃ āvasathaṃ gharaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^kumbhampañjaliṃ kariyā, cāṭañcāpi padakkhiṇa^eb^nti vuddhiṃ paccāsīsanto puriso udakapūritaṃ kumbhaṃ disvā tassa añjaliṃ kareyya, cāṭañca sakuṇaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kareyya. añjaliṃ vā padakkhiṇaṃ vā karontassa te kiñci dātuṃ na sakkonti. ^b^kimevā^eb^ti yo pana sabbakāmānaṃ dātā dhīro ca, taṃ rājānaṃ kiṃkāraṇā na namasseyya. rājāyeva hi namassitabbo ca ārādhetabbo ca. ^b^pajjunnorivā^eb^ti megho viya. ^b^esayyo rājavasatī^eb^ti ayyo yā ayaṃ mayā kathitā, esā rājavasati nāma rājasevakānaṃ anusāsanī. ^b^yathā^eb^ti yāya rājavasatiyā vattamāno naro rājānaṃ ārādheti, rājūnañca santikā pūjaṃ labhati, sā esāti.
[22] evaṃ asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito buddhalīlāya rājavasatiṃ kathesi.

[03] evaṃ puttadārañātimittasuhajjādayo anusāsantasseva tassa tayo divasā jātā. so divasassa pāripūriṃ ñatvā pātova nhatvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā ``rājānaṃ apaloketvā māṇavena saddhiṃ gamissāmī''ti ñātigaṇaparivuto rājanivesanaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito vattabbayuttakaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``vanditvā ^a^P6.0299^ea^ sirasā pāde, katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ.
[21] ``putte ca me udikkhesi, yañca maññaṃ ghare dhanaṃ.
[22] yathā pecca na hāyetha, ñātisaṅgho mayī gate..
[22] evetaṃ khalitaṃ mayhaṃ, etaṃ passāmi accaya''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^suhadehī^eb^ti suhadayehi ñātimittādīhi. ^b^yañca mañña^eb^nti yañca me aññaṃ tayā ceva aññehi ca rājūhi dinnaṃ ghare aparimāṇaṃ dhanaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tvameva olokeyyāsi. ^b^peccā^eb^ti pacchākāle. ^b^khalatī^eb^ti pakkhalati. ^b^eveta^eb^nti evaṃ etaṃ. ahañhi bhūmiyaṃ khalitvā tattheva patiṭṭhitapuriso viya tumhesu khalitvā tumhesuyeva patiṭṭhahāmi. ^b^etaṃ passāmī^eb^ti yo esa ``kiṃ te rājā hotī''ti māṇavena puṭṭhassa mama tumhe anoloketvā saccaṃ apekkhitvā ``dāsohamasmī''ti vadantassa accayo, etaṃ accayaṃ passāmi, añño pana me doso natthi, taṃ me accayaṃ tumhe khamatha, etaṃ hadaye katvā pacchā mama puttadāresu mā aparajjhitthāti.
[03] taṃ sutvā rājā ``paṇḍita, tava gamanaṃ mayhaṃ na ruccati, māṇavaṃ upāyena pakkosāpetvā ghātetvā kilañjena paṭicchādetuṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī''ti dīpento gāthamāha --
[21] ``sakkā na gantuṃ iti mayha hoti, chetvā vadhitvā idha kātiyānaṃ.
[22] idheva hohī iti mayha ruccati, mā tvaṃ agā uttamabhūripaññā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^chetvā^eb^ti idheva rājagehe taṃ pothetvā māretvā paṭicchādessāmīti.
[03] taṃ sutvā mahāsatto ``deva, tumhākaṃ ajjhāsayo evarūpo hoti, so tumhesu ayutto''ti vatvā āha --
[21] ``mā ^a^M7.0205^ea^ hevadhammesu manaṃ paṇīdahi, atthe ca dhamme ca yutto bhavassu.
[22] dhiratthu kammaṃ akusalaṃ anariyaṃ, yaṃ katvā pacchā nirayaṃ vajeyya..
[21] ``nevesa ^a^V7.0196^ea^ ^a^P6.0300^ea^ dhammo na puneta kiccaṃ, ayiro hi dāsassa janinda issaro.
[22] ghātetuṃ jhāpetuṃ athopi hantuṃ, na ca mayha kodhatthi vajāmi cāha''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^mā hevadhammesu manaṃ paṇīdahī^eb^ti adhammesu anatthesu ayuttesu tava cittaṃ mā heva paṇidahīti attho. ^b^pacchā^eb^ti yaṃ kammaṃ katvāpi ajarāmaro na hoti, atha kho pacchā nirayameva upapajjeyya. ^b^dhiratthu kamma^eb^nti taṃ kammaṃ garahitaṃ atthu assa bhaveyya. ^b^nevesā^eb^ti neva esa. ^b^ayiro^eb^ti sāmiko. ^b^ghātetu^eb^nti etāni ghātādīni kātuṃ ayiro dāsassa issaro, sabbānetāni kātuṃ labhati, mayhaṃ māṇave appamattakopi kodho natthi, dinnakālato paṭṭhāya tava cittaṃ sandhāretuṃ vaṭṭati, vajāmi ahaṃ narindāti āha --

[03] evaṃ vatvā mahāsatto rājānaṃ vanditvā rañño orodhe ca puttadāre ca rājaparisañca ovaditvā tesu sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkuṇitvā mahāviravaṃ viravantesuyeva rājanivesanā nikkhami. sakalanagaravāsinopi ``paṇḍito kira māṇavena saddhiṃ gamissati, etha, passissāma na''nti mantayitvā rājaṅgaṇeyeva naṃ passiṃsu. atha ne mahāsatto assāsetvā ``tumhe mā cintayittha, sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sarīraṃ addhuvaṃ, yaso nāma vipattipariyosāno, apica tumhe dānādīsu puññesu appamattā hothā''ti tesaṃ ovādaṃ datvā nivattāpetvā attano gehābhimukho pāyāsi. tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammapālakumāro bhātikagaṇaparivuto ``pitu paccuggamanaṃ karissāmī''ti nikkhanto nivesanadvāreyeva pitu sammukho ahosi. mahāsatto taṃ disvā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto upaguyha ure nipajjāpetvā nivesanaṃ pāvisi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] ghare panassa sahassaputtā, sahassadhītaro, sahassabhariyāyo, ca sattavaṇṇadāsisatāni ca santi, tehi ceva avasesadāsidāsakammakarañātimittasuhajjādīhi ca sakalanivesanaṃ yugantavātābhighātapatitehi sālehi sālavanaṃ viya nirantaraṃ ahosi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] senti puttā ca dārā ca, vidhurassa nivesane..
[21] ``orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā.
[22] bāhā paggayha pakkantuṃ, kasmā no vijahissasi..
[21] ``orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā.
[22] bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, kasmā no vijahissasi..
[22] bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, kasmā no vijahissasi..
[22] bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, kasmā no vijahissasī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0207^ea^ ^b^sentī^eb^ti mahātale chinnapādā viya patitā āvattantā parivattantā sayanti. ^b^itthisahassaṃ bhariyāna^eb^nti bhariyānameva itthīnaṃ sahassaṃ. ^b^kasmā no vijahissasī^eb^ti kena kāraṇena amhe vijahissasīti parideviṃsu.

[03] mahāsatto ^a^V7.0198^ea^ sabbaṃ taṃ mahājanaṃ assāsetvā ghare avasesakiccāni katvā antojanañca bahijanañca ovaditvā ācikkhitabbayuttakaṃ sabbaṃ ācikkhitvā puṇṇakassa santikaṃ gantvā attano niṭṭhitakiccataṃ ārocesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] mittāmacce ca bhacce ca, puttadāre ca bandhave..
[21] ``avasī tuvaṃ mayha tīhaṃ agāre, katāni kiccāni gharesu mayhaṃ.
[22] anusāsitā puttadārā mayā ca, karoma kaccāna yathāmatiṃ te''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^kammantaṃ saṃvidhetvānā^eb^ti ``evañca kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti ghare kattabbayuttakaṃ kammaṃ saṃvidahitvā. ^b^nidhi^eb^nti nidahitvā ṭhapitadhanaṃ. ^b^iṇadāna^eb^nti iṇavasena saṃyojitadhanaṃ. ^b^yathāmatiṃ te^eb^ti idāni tava ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ karomāti vadati.
[21] ``sace hi katte anusāsitā te, puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca.
[22] handehi dānī taramānarūpo, dīgho hi addhāpi ayaṃ puratthā..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0208^ea^ ^b^katte^eb^ti somanassappatto yakkho mahāsattaṃ ālapati. ^b^dīgho hi addhāpī^eb^ti gantabbamaggopi dīgho. ^b^``achambhitovā''^eb^ti idaṃ so heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ anotaritvā tatova gantukāmo hutvā avaca.
[21] ``sohaṃ ^a^V7.0199^ea^ kissa nu bhāyissaṃ, yassa me natthi dukkaṭaṃ.
[22] kāyena vācā manasā, yena gaccheyya duggati''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^sohaṃ kissa nu bhāyissa^eb^nti idaṃ mahāsatto ``achambhitova gaṇhāhī''ti vuttattā evamāha.

[03] evaṃ mahāsatto sīhanādaṃ naditvā achambhito kesarasīho viya nibbhayo hutvā ``ayaṃ sāṭako mama aruciyā mā muccatū''ti adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ purecārikaṃ katvā daḷhaṃ nivāsetvā assassa vāladhiṃ viyūhitvā ubhohi hatthehi daḷhaṃ vāladhiṃ gahetvā dvīhi pādehi assassa ūrūsu paliveṭhetvā ``māṇava, gahito me vāladhi, yathāruci yāhī''ti āha. tasmiṃ khaṇe puṇṇako manomayasindhavassa saññaṃ adāsi. so paṇḍitaṃ ādāya ākāse pakkhandi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] tattha ^b^sākhāsu selesu asajjamāno^eb^ti puṇṇako kira cintesi ``dūraṃ agantvāva imaṃ himavantappadese rukkhesu pabbatesu ca pothetvā māretvā hadayamaṃsaṃ ādāya kaḷevaraṃ pabbatantare ^a^P6.0303^ea^ chaḍḍetvā nāgabhavanameva gamissāmī''ti. so rukkhe ca pabbate ca apariharitvā tesaṃ majjheneva assaṃ pesesi. mahāsattassānubhāvena rukkhāpi pabbatāpi sarīrato ubhosu passesu ratanamattaṃ paṭikkamanti. so ``mato vā, no vā''ti parivattitvā mahāsattassa mukhaṃ olokento kañcanādāsamiva vippasannaṃ disvā ``ayaṃ evaṃ na maratī''ti punapi sakalahimavantappadese rukkhe ca pabbate ca tikkhattuṃ pothento pesesi ^a^M7.0209^ea^. evaṃ pothentopi tatheva rukkhapabbatā dūrameva paṭikkamantiyeva. mahāsatto pana kilantakāyo ahosi. atha puṇṇako ``ayaṃ neva marati, idāni vātakkhandhe cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karissāmī''ti kodhābhibhūto sattamaṃ vātakkhandhaṃ pakkhandi. bodhisattassānubhāvena vātakkhandho dvidhā hutvā bodhisattassa okāsaṃ akāsi. tato verambhavātehi paharāpesi, verambhavātāpi satasahassāsanisaddo viya hutvā bodhisattassa okāsaṃ adaṃsu. so puṇṇako tassa antarāyābhāvaṃ passanto taṃ ādāya kāḷapabbataṃ agamāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[03] tattha ^b^asajjamāno^eb^ti alaggamāno appaṭihaññamāno vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ vahanto kāḷapabbatamatthakaṃ upāgato.

[03] evaṃ puṇṇakassa mahāsattaṃ gahetvā gatakāle paṇḍitassa puttadārādayo puṇṇakassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tattha mahāsattaṃ adisvā chinnapādā viya patitvā aparāparaṃ parivattamānā mahāsaddena parideviṃsu. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā.
[22] bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, `paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato'..
[21] ``orodhā ^a^V7.0201^ea^ ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā.
[22] bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, `paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato'..
[22] bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, `paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato'..
[22] bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, `paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato'''ti..

[03] evaṃ pakkanditvā ca pana te sabbepi sakalanagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ roditvā rājadvāraṃ agamaṃsu. rājā mahantaṃ paridevasaddaṃ sutvā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā ``tumhe kasmā paridevathā''ti pucchi. athassa te ``deva, so kira māṇavo na brāhmaṇo, yakkho pana brāhmaṇavaṇṇena āgantvā paṇḍitaṃ ādāya gato, tena vinā ^a^P6.0304^ea^ amhākaṃ jīvitaṃ natthi. sace so ito sattame divase nāgamissati, sakaṭasatehi sakaṭasahassehi ca dārūni saṅkaḍḍhitvā sabbe mayaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletvā pavisissāmā''ti imamatthaṃ ārocentā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu --
[22] sabbe aggiṃ pavekkhāma, natthattho jīvitena no''ti..

[03] sammāsambuddhassa parinibbutakālepi ``mayaṃ aggiṃ pavisitvā marissāmā''ti vattāro nāma nāhesuṃ. aho subhāsitaṃ mahāsatte nāgarehīti. rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā ``tumhe mā cintayittha, mā ^a^M7.0211^ea^ socittha, mā paridevittha, madhurakatho paṇḍito māṇavaṃ dhammakathāya palobhetvā attano pādesu pātetvā sakalanagaravāsīnaṃ assumukhaṃ hāsayanto na cirasseva āgamissatī''ti assāsento gāthamāha --
[21] ``paṇḍito ca viyatto ca, vibhāvī ca vicakkhaṇo.

[03] tattha ^b^viyatto^eb^ti veyyattiyā vicāraṇapaññāya samannāgato. ^b^vibhāvī^eb^ti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ vibhāvetvā dassetvā kathetuṃ samattho. ^b^vicakkhaṇo^eb^ti taṅkhaṇeyeva ṭhānuppattikāya kāraṇacintanapaññāya ^a^V7.0202^ea^ yutto. ^b^mā bhāyitthā^eb^ti mā bhāyatha, attānaṃ mocetvā khippaṃ āgamissatīti assāseti.
[03] nāgarāpi ``paṇḍito kira rañño kathetvā gato bhavissatī''ti assāsaṃ paṭilabhitvā attano gehāni pakkamiṃsu.

[03] puṇṇakopi mahāsattaṃ kāḷāgirimatthake ṭhapetvā ``imasmiṃ jīvamāne mayhaṃ vuḍḍhi nāma natthi, imaṃ māretvā hadayamaṃsaṃ gahetvā nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā vimalāya datvā irandhatiṃ gahetvā devalokaṃ gamissāmī''ti cintesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``so tattha gantvāna vicintayanto, uccāvacā cetanakā bhavanti.
[22] nayimassa jīvena mamatthi kiñci, hantvānimaṃ hadayamānayissa''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^so^eb^ti so puṇṇako. ^b^tattha gantvānā^eb^ti gantvā tattha kāḷāgirimatthake ṭhito. ^b^uccāvacā cetanakā bhavantī^eb^ti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānā ^a^M7.0212^ea^ cetanā uccāpi avacāpi uppajjanti. ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ mametassa jīvitadānacetanāpi uppajjeyyāti. imassa ^a^P6.0305^ea^ pana jīvitena tahiṃ nāgabhavane mama appamattakampi kiñci kiccaṃ natthi, idhevimaṃ māretvā assa hadayaṃ ānayissāmīti sanniṭṭhānamakāsīti attho.

[03] tato puna cintesi ``yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ sahatthena amāretvā bheravarūpadassanena jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpeyya''nti. so bheravayakkharūpaṃ nimminitvā mahāsattaṃ tajjento āgantvā taṃ pātetvā dāṭhānaṃ antare katvā khāditukāmo viya ahosi, mahāsattassa lomahaṃsanamattampi nāhosi. tato sīharūpena mattamahāhatthirūpena ca āgantvā dāṭhāhi ceva dantehi ca vijjhitukāmo viya ahosi. tathāpi abhāyantassa ekadoṇikanāvappamāṇaṃ mahantaṃ sappavaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā assasanto passasanto ``susū''ti saddaṃ karonto āgantvā mahāsattassa sakalasarīraṃ veṭhetvā matthake phaṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi, tassa sārajjamattampi nāhosi. atha ``naṃ pabbatamatthake ṭhapetvā pātetvā ^a^V7.0203^ea^ cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karissāmī''ti mahāvātaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. so tassa kesaggamattampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhi. atha naṃ tattheva pabbatamatthake ṭhapetvā hatthī viya khajjūrirukkhaṃ pabbataṃ aparāparaṃ cālesi, tathāpi naṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato kesaggamattampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhi.

[03] tato ``saddasantāsenassa hadayaphālanaṃ katvā māressāmī''ti antopabbataṃ pavisitvā pathaviñca nabhañca ekaninnādaṃ karonto mahānādaṃ nadi, evampissa sārajjamattampi nāhosi. jānāti hi mahāsatto ``yakkhasīhahatthināgarājavesehi āgatopi mahāvātavuṭṭhiṃ samuṭṭhāpakopi pabbatacalanaṃ karontopi antopabbataṃ pavisitvā nādaṃ vissajjentopi māṇavoyeva, na añño''ti. tato puṇṇako cintesi ``nāhaṃ imaṃ bāhirupakkamena māretuṃ sakkomi, sahattheneva naṃ māressāmī''ti. tato yakkho mahāsattaṃ pabbatamuddhani ṭhapetvā pabbatapādaṃ gantvā maṇikkhandhe paṇḍusuttaṃ pavesento viya pabbataṃ pavisitvā tāsento vagganto antopabbatena uggantvā mahāsattaṃ pāde daḷhaṃ ^a^M7.0213^ea^ gahetvā parivattetvā adhosiraṃ katvā anālambe ākāse vissajjesi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``so ^a^P6.0306^ea^ tattha gantvā pabbatantarasmiṃ, anto pavisitvāna paduṭṭhacitto.

[03] tattha ^b^so tattha gantvā^eb^ti so puṇṇako pabbatamatthakā pabbatapādaṃ gantvā tattha pabbatantare ṭhatvā tassa anto pavisitvā pabbatamatthake ṭhitassa heṭṭhā paññāyamāno asaṃvute bhūmipadese dhāresīti. na āditova dhāresi, tattha pana taṃ khipitvā pannarasayojanamattaṃ bhaṭṭhakāle pabbatamuddhani ṭhitova hatthaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adhosiraṃ bhassantaṃ pādesu gahetvā adhosirameva ukkhipitvā mukhaṃ olokento ``na maratī''ti ñatvā dutiyampi khipitvā tiṃsayojanamattaṃ bhaṭṭhakāle tatheva ukkhipitvā puna tassa mukhaṃ olokento jīvantameva disvā cintesi ``sace idāni saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ bhassitvā na marissati, pādesu naṃ gahetvā pabbatamuddhani pothetvā māressāmī''ti atha naṃ tatiyampi khipitvā saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ bhaṭṭhakāle hatthaṃ vaḍḍhetvā pādesu gahetvā ukkhipi. tato mahāsatto cintesi ``ayaṃ maṃ paṭhamaṃ pannarasayojanaṭṭhānaṃ khipi, dutiyampi tiṃsayojanaṃ, tatiyampi saṭṭhiyojanaṃ, idāni puna maṃ na khipissati, ukkhipantoyeva pabbatamuddhani paharitvā māressati, yāva maṃ ukkhipitvā pabbatamuddhani na potheti, tāva naṃ adhosiro hutvā olambantova māraṇakāraṇaṃ pucchissāmī''ti. evaṃ cintetvā ^a^V7.0204^ea^ ca pana so achambhito asantasanto tathā akāsi. tena vuttaṃ ``dhārayi kātiyāno''ti, tikkhattuṃ khipitvā dhārayīti attho.
[21] ``so lambamāno narake papāte, mahabbhaye lomahaṃse vidugge.
[22] asantasanto kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭho, iccabravi puṇṇakaṃ nāma yakkhaṃ..
[22] accāhitaṃ kammaṃ karosi ludraṃ, bhāve ca te kusalaṃ natthi kiñci..
[21] ``yaṃ maṃ papātasmiṃ papātumicchasi, ko nu tavattho maraṇena mayhaṃ.
[22] amānusasseva tavajja vaṇṇo, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi devatāti..

[03] tattha ^b^so lambamāno^eb^ti so kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭho tatiyavāre lambamāno. ^b^ariyāvakāso^eb^ti rūpena ariyasadiso devavaṇṇo hutvā carasi. ^b^asaññato^eb^ti kāyādīhi asaññato ^a^P6.0307^ea^ dussīlo. ^b^accāhita^eb^nti hitātikkantaṃ, atiahitaṃ vā. ^b^bhāve ca te^eb^ti tava citte appamattakampi kusalaṃ natthi. ^b^amānusasseva tavajja vaṇṇo^eb^ti ajja tava idaṃ kāraṇaṃ amānusasseva. ^b^katamāsi devatā^eb^ti yakkhānaṃ antare katarayakkho nāma tvaṃ.
[21] ``yadi te suto puṇṇako nāma yakkho, rañño kuverassa hi so sajibbo.
[22] bhūmindharo varuṇo nāma nāgo, brahā sucī vaṇṇabalūpapanno..
[21] ``tassānujaṃ dhītaraṃ kāmayāmi, irandhatī nāma sā nāgakaññā.
[22] tassā sumajjhāya piyāya hetu, patārayiṃ tuyha vadhāya dhīrā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sajibbo^eb^ti sajīvo amacco. ^b^brahā^eb^ti ārohapariṇāhasampanno uṭṭhāpitakañcanarūpasadiso. ^b^vaṇṇabalūpapanno^eb^ti sarīravaṇṇena ca kāyabalena ca upagato. ^b^tassānuja^eb^nti tassa anujātaṃ dhītaraṃ. ^b^patārayi^eb^nti cittaṃ pavattesiṃ, sanniṭṭhānamakāsinti attho.
[03] taṃ ^a^V7.0205^ea^ ^a^M7.0215^ea^ sutvā mahāsatto ``ayaṃ loko duggahitena nassati, nāgamāṇavikaṃ patthentassa mama maraṇena kiṃ payojanaṃ, tathato kāraṇaṃ jānissāmī''ti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``mā heva tvaṃ yakkha ahosi mūḷho, naṭṭhā bahū duggahītena loke.
[22] kiṃ te sumajjhāya piyāya kiccaṃ, maraṇena me iṅgha suṇomi sabba''nti..
[03] taṃ sutvā tassa ācikkhanto puṇṇako āha --
[22] taṃ yācamānaṃ sasuro avoca, yathā mamaññiṃsu sukāmanītaṃ..
[21] ``dajjemu kho te sutanuṃ sunettaṃ, sucimhitaṃ candanalittagattaṃ.
[27] sace tuvaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa, dhammena laddhā idha māharesi.
[22] etena ^a^P6.0308^ea^ vittena kumāri labbhā, naññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāma..
[21] ``evaṃ na mūḷhosmi suṇohi katte, na cāpi me duggahitatthi kiñci.
[22] hadayena te dhammaladdhena nāgā, irandhatiṃ nāgakaññaṃ dadanti..
[21] ``tasmā ahaṃ tuyhaṃ vadhāya yutto, evaṃ mamattho maraṇena tuyhaṃ.
[22] idheva taṃ narake pātayitvā, hantvāna taṃ hadayamānayissa''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^dhītukāmo^eb^ti dhītaraṃ kāmemi patthemi, dhītu atthāya vicarāmi. ^b^ñātibhatohamasmī^eb^ti tasmā tassa ñātibhatako nāma ahaṃ amhi. ^b^ta^eb^nti ^a^M7.0216^ea^ taṃ nāgakaññaṃ. ^b^yācamāna^eb^nti yācantaṃ maṃ. ^b^yathā ma^eb^nti yasmā maṃ. ^b^aññiṃsū^eb^ti jāniṃsu. ^b^sukāmanīta^eb^nti suṭṭhu esa kāmena nītoti sukāmanīto, taṃ sukāmanītaṃ. tasmā sasuro ^b^`dajjemu kho te''^eb^tiādimavoca. tattha ^b^dajjemū^eb^ti dadeyyāma. ^b^sutanu^eb^nti sundarasarīraṃ. ^b^idha māharesī^eb^ti idha nāgabhavane dhammena laddhā āhareyyāsīti.

[03] tassa taṃ kathaṃ sutvā mahāsatto cintesi ``vimalāya mama hadayena kiccaṃ natthi, varuṇanāgarājena mama dhammakathaṃ sutvā maṇinā maṃ pūjetvā tattha gatena mama dhammakathikabhāvo vaṇṇito ^a^V7.0206^ea^ bhavissati, tato vimalāya mama dhammakathāya dohaḷo uppanno bhavissati, varuṇena duggahitaṃ gahetvā puṇṇako āṇatto bhavissati, svāyaṃ attanā duggahitena maṃ māretuṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpesi, mama paṇḍitabhāvo ṭhānuppattikāraṇacintanasamatthatā imasmiṃ maṃ mārente kiṃ karissati, handāhaṃ saññāpessāmi na''nti. cintetvā ca pana ``māṇava, sādhunaradhammaṃ nāma jānāmi, yāvāhaṃ na marāmi, tāva maṃ pabbatamuddhani nisīdāpetvā sādhunaradhammaṃ nāma suṇohi, pacchā yaṃ icchasi, taṃ kareyyāsī''ti vatvā sādhunaradhammaṃ vaṇṇetvā attano jīvitaṃ āharāpento so adhosiro olambantova gāthamāha --
[21] ``khippaṃ mamaṃ uddhara kātiyāna, hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ.
[22] ye ^a^P6.0309^ea^ kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva te pātukaromi ajjā''ti..

[03] taṃ sutvā puṇṇako ``ayaṃ paṇḍitena devamanussānaṃ akathitapubbo dhammo bhavissati, khippameva naṃ uddharitvā sādhunaradhammaṃ suṇissāmī''ti cintetvā mahāsattaṃ ukkhipitvā pabbatamuddhani nisīdāpesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``so puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, nagamuddhani khippaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā.
[21] ``samuddhaṭo ^a^M7.0217^ea^ mesi tuvaṃ papātā, hadayena te ajja mamatthi kiccaṃ.
[22] ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva me pātukarohi ajjā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^assatthamāsīna^eb^nti laddhassāsaṃ hutvā nisinnaṃ. ^b^samekkhiyānā^eb^ti disvā. ^b^sādhunarassa dhammā^eb^ti narassa sādhudhammā, sundaradhammāti attho.
[21] ``samuddhaṭo tyasmi ahaṃ papātā, hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ.
[22] ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva te pātukaromi ajjā''ti..

[03] atha ^a^V7.0207^ea^ naṃ mahāsatto ``kiliṭṭhagattomhi, nhāyāmi tāvā''ti āha. yakkhopi ``sādhū''ti nhānodakaṃ āharitvā nhātakāle mahāsattassa dibbadussagandhamālādīni datvā alaṅkatappaṭiyattakāle dibbabhojanaṃ adāsi. atha mahāsatto bhuttabhojano kāḷāgirimatthakaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā buddhalīlāya sādhunaradhammaṃ desento gāthamāha --
[21] ``yātānuyāyī ca bhavāhi māṇava, allañca pāṇiṃ parivajjayassu.
[22] mā ^a^P6.0310^ea^ cassu mittesu kadāci dubbhī, mā ca vasaṃ asatīnaṃ nigacche''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^allañca pāṇiṃ parivajjayassū^eb^ti allaṃ tintaṃ pāṇiṃ mā dahi mā jhāpehi.
[03] yakkho saṃkhittena bhāsite cattāro sādhunaradhamme bujjhituṃ asakkonto vitthārena pucchanto gāthamāha --
[21] ``kathaṃ ^a^M7.0218^ea^ nu yātaṃ anuyāyi hoti, allañca pāṇiṃ dahate kathaṃ so.
[22] asatī ca kā ko pana mittadubbho, akkhāhi me pucchito etamattha''nti..
[21] ``asanthutaṃ nopi ca diṭṭhapubbaṃ, yo āsanenāpi nimantayeyya.
[22] tasseva atthaṃ puriso kareyya, yātānuyāyīti tamāhu paṇḍitā..
[22] na tassa pāpaṃ manasāpi cintaye, adubbhapāṇiṃ dahate mittadubbho..
[22] na tassa sākhaṃ bhañjeyya, mittadubbho hi pāpako..
[21] ``puṇṇampi cemaṃ pathaviṃ dhanena, dajjitthiyā puriso sammatāya.
[22] laddhā khaṇaṃ atimaññeyya tampi, tāsaṃ vasaṃ asatīnaṃ na gacche..
[26] asatī ca sā so pana mittadubbho,

[03] tattha ^a^P6.0311^ea^ ^b^asanthuta^eb^nti ekāhadvīhampi ekato avutthapubbaṃ. ^b^yo āsanenāpī^eb^ti yo evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ āsanamattenapi nimantayeyya, pageva annapānādīhi. ^b^tassevā^eb^ti tassa pubbakārissa atthaṃ puriso karoteva. ^b^yātānuyāyī^eb^ti pubbakāritāya yātassa puggalassa anuyāyī ^a^M7.0219^ea^. paṭhamaṃ karonto hi yāyī nāma, pacchā karonto anuyāyī nāmāti evaṃ paṇḍitā kathenti. ayaṃ devarāja, paṭhamo sādhunaradhammo. ^b^adubbhapāṇi^eb^nti adubbhakaṃ attano bhuñjanahatthameva dahanto hi mittadubbhī nāma hoti. iti allahatthassa ajjhāpanaṃ nāma ayaṃ dutiyo sādhunaradhammo. ^b^na tassā^eb^ti tassa sākhaṃ vā pattaṃ vā na bhañjeyya. kiṃkāraṇā? mittadubbho hi pāpako. iti paribhuttacchāyassa acetanassa rukkhassapi pāpaṃ karonto mittadubbhī nāma hoti, kimaṅgaṃ pana manussabhūtassāti. evaṃ mittesu adubbhanaṃ nāma ayaṃ tatiyo sādhunaradhammo. ^b^dajjitthiyā^eb^ti dadeyya itthiyā. ^b^sammatāyā^eb^ti ``ahameva tassā piyo, na añño, maññeva sā icchatī''ti evaṃ suṭṭhu matāya. ^b^laddhā khaṇa^eb^nti aticārassa okāsaṃ labhitvā. ^b^asatīna^eb^nti asaddhammasamannāgatānaṃ itthīnaṃ. iti mātugāmaṃ nissāya pāpassa akaraṇaṃ nāma ayaṃ catuttho sādhunaradhammo. ^b^so dhammiko hohī^eb^ti devarāja, so tvaṃ imehi catūhi sādhunaradhammehi yutto hohīti.
[03] evaṃ mahāsatto yakkhassa cattāro sādhunaradhamme buddhalīlāya kathesi.

[03] te dhamme suṇantoyeva puṇṇako sallakkhesi ``catūsupi ṭhānesu paṇḍito attano jīvitameva yācati, ayaṃ kho mayhaṃ pubbe asanthutasseva sakkāramakāsi, ahamassa nivesane tīhaṃ mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhavanto vasiṃ, ahañcimaṃ pāpakammaṃ karonto mātugāmaṃ nissāya karomi, sabbathāpi ahameva mittadubbhī. sace paṇḍitaṃ aparajjhāmi, na sādhunaradhamme vattissāmi ^a^V7.0209^ea^ nāma, tasmā kiṃ me nāgamāṇavikāya, indapatthanagaravāsīnaṃ assumukhāni hāsento imaṃ vegena tattha netvā dhammasabhāyaṃ otāressāmī''ti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``avasiṃ ^a^M7.0220^ea^ ahaṃ tuyha tīhaṃ agāre, annena pānena upaṭṭhitosmi.
[22] mitto mamāsī visajjāmahaṃ taṃ, kāmaṃ gharaṃ uttamapañña gaccha..
[21] api ^a^P6.0312^ea^ hāyatu nāgakulā attho, alampi me nāgakaññāya hotu.
[22] so tvaṃ sakeneva subhāsitena, muttosi me ajja vadhāya paññā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^upaṭṭhitosmī^eb^ti tayā upaṭṭhitosmi. ^b^visajjāmahaṃ ta^eb^nti vissajjemi ahaṃ taṃ. ^b^kāma^eb^nti ekaṃsena. ^b^vadhāyā^eb^ti vadhato. ^b^paññā^eb^ti paññavanta.
[03] atha naṃ mahāsatto ``māṇava, tvaṃ tāva maṃ attano gharaṃ mā pesehi, nāgabhavanameva maṃ nehī''ti vadanto gāthamāha --
[21] ``handa tuvaṃ yakkha mamampi nehi, sasuraṃ te atthaṃ mayi carassu.
[22] mayañca nāgādhipatiṃ vimānaṃ, dakkhemu nāgassa adiṭṭhapubba''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^handā^eb^ti vavassaggatthe nipāto. ^b^sasuraṃ te atthaṃ mayi carassū^eb^ti tava sasurassa santakaṃ atthaṃ mayi cara mā nāsehi. ^b^nāgādhipatiṃ vimāna^eb^nti ahampi nāgādhipatiñca vimānañcassa adiṭṭhapubbaṃ passeyyaṃ.
[21] ``yaṃ ve narassa ahitāya assa, na taṃ pañño arahati dassanāya.
[22] atha kena vaṇṇena amittagāmaṃ, tuvamicchasi uttamapañña gantu''nti..
[21] ``addhā ^a^V7.0210^ea^ pajānāmi ahampi etaṃ, na taṃ pañño arahati dassanāya.
[22] pāpañca me natthi kataṃ kuhiñci, tasmā na saṅke maraṇāgamāyā''ti..

[03] apica ^a^P6.0313^ea^, devarāja, tādiso yakkho kakkhaḷo mayā dhammakathāya palobhetvā mudukato, idāneva maṃ ``alaṃ me nāgamāṇavikāya, attano gharaṃ yāhī''ti vadesi, nāgarājassa mudukaraṇaṃ mama bhāro, nehiyeva maṃ tatthāti. tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā puṇṇako ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā tuṭṭhacitto āha --
[21] ``handa ca ṭhānaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, mayā saha dakkhasi ehi katte.
[22] yatthacchati naccagītehi nāgo, rājā yathā vessavaṇo naḷiññaṃ..
[21] ``naṃ nāgakaññā caritaṃ gaṇena, nikīḷitaṃ niccamaho ca rattiṃ.
[21] ``annena pānena upetarūpaṃ, naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi.

[03] tattha ^b^handa cā^eb^ti nipātamattameva. ^b^ṭhāna^eb^nti nāgarājassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^naḷiñña^eb^nti naḷiniyaṃ nāma rājadhāniyaṃ. ^b^caritaṃ gaṇenā^eb^ti taṃ nāgakaññānaṃ gaṇena caritaṃ. ^b^nikīḷita^eb^nti niccaṃ aho ca rattiñca nāgakaññāhi kīḷitānukīḷitaṃ.
[03] evañca ^a^M7.0222^ea^ pana vatvā puṇṇako mahāsattaṃ assapiṭṭhaṃ āropetvā tattha nesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``so puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, nisīdayī pacchato āsanasmiṃ.
[21] ``patvāna ^a^V7.0211^ea^ ṭhānaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, aṭṭhāsi kattā pacchato puṇṇakassa.

[03] tattha ^b^so^eb^ ^a^P6.0314^ea^ ^b^puṇṇako^eb^ti bhikkhave, so evaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇetvā paṇḍitaṃ attano ājaññaṃ āropetvā nāgabhavanaṃ nesi. ^b^ṭhāna^eb^nti nāgarājassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^pacchato puṇṇakassā^eb^ti puṇṇakassa kira etadahosi ``sace nāgarājā paṇḍitaṃ disvā muducitto bhavissati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. no ce, tassa taṃ apassantasseva sindhavaṃ āropetvā ādāya gamissāmī''ti. atha naṃ pacchato ṭhapesi. tena vuttaṃ ``pacchato puṇṇakassā''ti. ^b^sāmaggipekkhamāno^eb^ti sāmaggiṃ apekkhamāno. ``sāmaṃ apekkhī''tipi pāṭho, attano jāmātaraṃ passitvā paṭhamataraṃ sayameva ajjhabhāsathāti attho.
[21] ``yannu tuvaṃ agamā maccalokaṃ, anvesamāno hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa.
[03] tattha ^b^kacci samiddhenā^eb^ti kacci te manorathena samiddhena nipphannena idhāgatosīti pucchati.
[21] ``ayañhi so āgato yaṃ tvamicchasi, dhammena laddho mama dhammapālo.
[22] taṃ passatha sammukhā bhāsamānaṃ, sukho have sappurisehi saṅgamo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^yaṃ tvamicchasī^eb^ti yaṃ tvaṃ icchasi. ``yantu micchasī''tipi pāṭho. ^b^sammukhā bhāsamāna^eb^nti taṃ lokasakkataṃ dhammapālaṃ idāni madhurena sarena dhammaṃ bhāsamānaṃ sammukhāva passatha, sappurisehi ekaṭṭhāne samāgamo hi nāma sukho hotīti.
[03] tattha ^b^byamhito^eb^ti bhīto. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- paṇḍita, tvaṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ disvā maraṇabhayena aṭṭito bhīto hutvā yaṃ maṃ nābhivādesi, idaṃ kāraṇaṃ paññavantānaṃ na hotīti.

[03] evaṃ vandanaṃ paccāsīsantaṃ nāgarājānaṃ mahāsatto ``na tvaṃ mayā vanditabbo''ti avatvāva attano ñāṇavantatāya upāyakosallena ``ahaṃ vajjhappattabhāvena naṃ taṃ vandāmī''ti vadanto gāthādvayamāha --
[21] ``na ^a^P6.0315^ea^ camhi byamhito nāga, na ca maccubhayaṭṭito.
[22] na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye..
[22] yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjatī''ti..

[03] tassattho -- nevāhaṃ, nāgarāja, adiṭṭhapubbaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ disvā bhīto, na maraṇabhayaṭṭito. mādisassa hi maraṇabhayaṃ nāma natthi, vajjho pana abhivādetuṃ, vajjhaṃ vā avajjhopi abhivādāpetuṃ na labhati. yañhi naro ^a^M7.0224^ea^ hantumiccheyya, so taṃ kathaṃ nu abhivādeyya, kathaṃ vā tena attānaṃ abhivādāpayetha ve. tassa hi taṃ kammaṃ na upapajjati. tvañca kira maṃ mārāpetuṃ imaṃ āṇāpesi, kathāhaṃ taṃ vandādhīti.
[03] taṃ sutvā nāgarājā mahāsattassa thutiṃ karonto dve gāthā abhāsi --
[22] na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye..
[22] yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjatī''ti..
[03] idāni mahāsatto nāgarājena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonto āha --
[21] ``asassataṃ sassataṃ nu tavayidaṃ, iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti.
[22] pucchāmi taṃ nāgarājetamatthaṃ, kathaṃ nu te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ..
[21] ``adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ.
[22] akkhāhi me nāgarājetamatthaṃ, yatheva te laddhamidaṃ vimāna''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^tavayida^eb^nti idaṃ tava yasajātaṃ, vimānaṃ vā asassataṃ sassatasadisaṃ, ``mā kho yasaṃ nissāya pāpamakāsī''ti iminā padena attano jīvitaṃ yācati. ^b^iddhī^eb^ti nāgaiddhi ca nāgajuti ca kāyabalañca cetasikavīriyañca nāgabhavane upapatti ca ^a^P6.0316^ea^ yañca te idaṃ vimānaṃ, pucchāmi taṃ nāgarāja, etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ nu te idaṃ sabbaṃ laddhanti. ^b^adhiccaladdha^eb^nti kiṃ nu tayā idaṃ vimānaṃ evaṃ sampannaṃ adhicca akāraṇena laddhaṃ, udāhu utupariṇāmajaṃ te idaṃ, udāhu sayaṃ sahattheneva kataṃ, udāhu devehi te dinnaṃ, yatheva te idaṃ laddhaṃ, etaṃ me atthaṃ akkhāhīti.
[21] ``nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkataṃ nāpi devehi dinnaṃ.
[22] sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimāna''nti..
[21] ``kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko.
[22] iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti, idañca te nāga mahāvimāna''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^V7.0214^ea^ ^b^kiṃ te vata^eb^nti nāgarāja, purimabhave tava kiṃ vataṃ ahosi, ko pana brahmacariyavāso, katarassa sucaritassevesa iddhiādiko vipākoti.
[21] ``ahañca bhariyā ca manussaloke, saddhā ubho dānapatī ahumhā.
[22] opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca..
[22] acchādanaṃ sāyanamannapānaṃ, sakkacca dānāni adamha tattha..
[21] ``taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko.
[22] iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti, idañca me dhīra mahāvimāna''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^P6.0317^ea^ ^a^M7.0226^ea^ ^b^manussaloke^eb^ti aṅgaraṭṭhe kālacampānagare. ^b^taṃ me vata^eb^nti taṃ sakkaccaṃ dinnadānameva mayhaṃ vattasamādānañca brahmacariyañca ahosi, tasseva sucaritassa ayaṃ iddhādiko vipākoti.
[21] ``evaṃ ce te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, jānāsi puññānaṃ phalūpapattiṃ.
[22] tasmā hi dhammaṃ cara appamatto, yathā vimānaṃ puna māvasesī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^jānāsī^eb^ti sace tayā dānānubhāvena taṃ laddhaṃ, evaṃ sante jānāsi nāma puññānaṃ phalañca puññaphalena nibbattaṃ upapattiñca. ^b^tasmā hī^eb^ti yasmā puññehi tayā idaṃ laddhaṃ, tasmā. ^b^puna māvasesī^eb^ti punapi yathā imaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ ajjhāvasasi, evaṃ dhammaṃ cara.
[21] ``nayidha ^a^V7.0215^ea^ santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, yesannapānāni dademu katte.
[22] akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, yathā vimānaṃ puna māvasemā''ti..
[21] ``bhogī hi te santi idhūpapannā, puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca.
[22] tesu tuvaṃ vacasā kammunā ca, asampaduṭṭho ca bhavāhi niccaṃ..
[21] ``evaṃ tuvaṃ nāga asampadosaṃ, anupālaya vacasā kammunā ca.
[22] ṭhatvā idha yāvatāyukaṃ vimāne, uddhaṃ ito gacchasi devaloka''nti..
