[03] tattha ^a^M7.0227^ea^ ^b^bhogī^eb^ti bhogino, nāgāti attho. ^b^tesū^eb^ti tesu puttadārādīsu bhogīsu vācāya kammena ca niccaṃ asampaduṭṭho bhava. ^b^anupālayā^eb^ti evaṃ puttādīsu ceva sesasattesu ca mettacittasaṅkhātaṃ asampadosaṃ anurakkha. ^b^uddhaṃ ito^eb^ti ito nāgabhavanato cuto uparidevalokaṃ gamissati. mettacittañhi dānato atirekataraṃ puññanti.

[03] tato nāgarājā ^a^P6.0318^ea^ mahāsattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā ``na sakkā paṇḍitena bahi papañcaṃ kātuṃ, vimalāya dassetvā subhāsitaṃ sāvetvā dohaḷaṃ paṭippassambhetvā dhanañcayarājānaṃ hāsento paṇḍitaṃ pesetuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti cintetvā gāthamāha --
[21] ``addhā hi so socati rājaseṭṭho, tayā vinā yassa tuvaṃ sajibbo.
[22] dukkhūpanītopi tayā samecca, vindeyya poso sukhamāturopī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^sajibbo^eb^ti sajīvo amacco. ^b^sameccā^eb^ti tayā saha samāgantvā. ^b^āturopī^eb^ti bāḷhagilānopi samāno.
[03] taṃ sutvā mahāsatto nāgarājassa thutiṃ karonto itaraṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``addhā sataṃ bhāsasi nāga dhammaṃ, anuttaraṃ atthapadaṃ suciṇṇaṃ.
[22] etādisiyāsu hi āpadāsu, paññāyate mādisānaṃ viseso''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0216^ea^ ^b^addhā sata^eb^nti ekaṃsena santānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsasi. ^b^atthapada^eb^nti hitakoṭṭhāsaṃ. ^b^etādisiyāsū^eb^ti evarūpāsu āpadāsu etādise bhaye upaṭṭhite mādisānaṃ paññavantānaṃ viseso paññāyati.
[03] taṃ sutvā nāgarājā atirekataraṃ tuṭṭho tameva pucchanto gāthamāha --
[21] ``akkhāhi ^a^M7.0228^ea^ no tāyaṃ mudhā nu laddho, akkhehi no tāyaṃ ajesi jūte.
[22] dhammena laddho iti tāyamāha, kathaṃ nu tvaṃ hatthamimassa māgato''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^akkhāhi no^eb^ti ācikkha amhākaṃ. ^b^tāya^eb^nti taṃ ayaṃ. ^b^mudhā nu laddho^eb^ti kiṃ nu kho mudhā amūlakeneva labhi, udāhu jūte ajesi. ^b^iti tāyamāhā^eb^ti ayaṃ puṇṇako ``dhammena me paṇḍito laddho''ti vadati. ^b^kathaṃ nu tvaṃ hatthamimassa māgato^eb^ti tvaṃ kathaṃ imassa hatthaṃ āgatosi.
[21] ``yo missaro tattha ahosi rājā, tamāyamakkhehi ajesi jūte.
[22] so ^a^P6.0319^ea^ maṃ jito rājā imassadāsi, dhammena laddhosmi asāhasenā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^yo missaro^eb^ti yo maṃ issaro. ^b^imassadāsī^eb^ti imassa puṇṇakassa adāsi.
[03] taṃ sutvā nāgarājā tuṭṭho ahosi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] hatthe gahetvāna anomapaññaṃ, pāvekkhi bhariyāya tadā sakāse..
[21] ``yena tvaṃ vimale paṇḍu, yena bhattaṃ na ruccati.
[22] na ca metādiso vaṇṇo, ayameso tamonudo..
[22] tassa vākyaṃ nisāmehi, dullabhaṃ dassanaṃ punā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0229^ea^ ^b^pāvekkhī^eb^ti paviṭṭho. ^b^yenā^eb^ti bhadde vimale, yena kāraṇena tvaṃ paṇḍu ceva, na ca te bhattaṃ ruccati. ^b^na ca metādiso vaṇṇo^eb^ti pathavitale vā devaloke vā na ca tādiso vaṇṇo aññassa kassaci atthi, yādiso etassa guṇavaṇṇo patthaṭo. ^b^ayameso tamonudo^eb^ti yaṃ nissāya tava dohaḷo uppanno, ayameva so sabbalokassa tamonudo. ^b^punā^eb^ti puna etassa dassanaṃ nāma dullabhanti vadati.
[03] vimalāpi taṃ disvā paṭisanthāraṃ akāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``disvāna taṃ vimalā bhūripaññaṃ, dasaṅgulī añjaliṃ paggahetvā.
[22] haṭṭhena bhāvena patītarūpā, iccabravi kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭha''nti..
[03] ito paraṃ vimalāya ca mahāsattassa ca vacanappaṭivacanagāthā --
[21] ``na camhi byamhito nāgi, na ca maccubhayaṭṭito.
[22] na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye..
[22] yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjati..
[22] na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye..
[22] yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjati..
[21] ``asassataṃ sassataṃ nu tavayidaṃ, iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti.
[22] pucchāmi taṃ nāgakaññetamatthaṃ, kathaṃ nu te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ..
[21] ``adhiccaladdhaṃ ^a^M7.0230^ea^ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ.
[22] akkhāhi me nāgakaññetamatthaṃ, yatheva te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ..
[21] ``nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkathaṃ nāpi devehi dinnaṃ.
[22] sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ..
[21] ``kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko.
[22] iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti, idañca te nāgi mahāvimānaṃ..
[21] ``ahañca kho sāmiko cāpi mayhaṃ, saddhā ubho dānapatī ahumhā.
[22] opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca..
[22] acchādanaṃ sāyanamannapānaṃ, sakkacca dānāni adamha tattha..
[21] ``taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko.
[22] iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti, idañca me dhīra mahāvimānaṃ..
[21] ``evaṃ ^a^P6.0321^ea^ ce te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, jānāsi puññānaṃ phalūpapattiṃ.
[22] tasmā hi dhammaṃ cara appamattā, yathā vimānaṃ puna māvasesi..
[21] ``nayidha ^a^M7.0231^ea^ santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, yesannapānāni dademu katte.
[22] akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, yathā vimānaṃ puna māvasema..
[21] ``bhogī ^a^V7.0219^ea^ hi te santi idhūpapannā, puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca.
[22] tesu tuvaṃ vacasā kammunā ca, asampaduṭṭhā ca bhavāhi niccaṃ..
[21] ``evaṃ tuvaṃ nāgi asampadosaṃ, anupālaya vacasā kammunā ca.
[22] ṭhatvā idha yāvatāyukaṃ vimāne, uddhaṃ ito gacchasi devalokaṃ..
[21] ``addhā hi so socati rājaseṭṭho, tayā vinā yassa tuvaṃ sajibbo.
[22] dukkhūpanītopi tayā samecca, vindeyya poso sukhamāturopi..
[21] ``addhā sataṃ bhāsasi nāgi dhammaṃ, anuttaraṃ atthapadaṃ suciṇṇaṃ.
[22] etādisiyāsu hi āpadāsu, paññāyate mādisānaṃ viseso..
[21] ``akkhāhi no tāyaṃ mudhā nu laddho, akkhehi no tāyaṃ ajesi jūte.
[22] dhammena laddho iti tāyamāha, kathaṃ nu tvaṃ hatthamimassa māgato..
[21] ``yo missaro tattha ahosi rājā, tamāyamakkhehi ajesi jūte.
[22] so ^a^P6.0322^ea^ maṃ jito rājā imassadāsi, dhammena laddhosmi asāhasenā''ti..
[03] imāsaṃ gāthānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] mahāsattassa ^a^M7.0232^ea^ vacanaṃ sutvā atirekataraṃ tuṭṭhā vimalā mahāsattaṃ gahetvā sahassagandhodakaghaṭehi nhāpetvā nhānakāle mahāsattassa dibbadussadibbagandhamālādīni datvā alaṅkatappaṭiyattakāle dibbabhojanaṃ bhojesi. mahāsatto bhuttabhojano alaṅkatāsanaṃ paññāpetvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``ubhopi ^a^V7.0220^ea^ te attamane viditvā, mahoragaṃ nāgakaññañca dhīro.
[22] achambhī abhīto alomahaṭṭho, iccabravi varuṇaṃ nāgarājānaṃ..
[21] ``mā rodhayi nāga āyāhamasmi, yena tavattho idaṃ sarīraṃ.
[22] hadayena maṃsena karohi kiccaṃ, sayaṃ karissāmi yathāmati te''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^achambhī^eb^ti nikkampo. ^b^alomahaṭṭho^eb^ti bhayena ahaṭṭhalomo. ^b^iccabravī^eb^ti vīmaṃsanavasena iti abravi. ^b^mā rodhayī^eb^ti ``mittadubbhikammaṃ karomī''ti mā bhāyi, ``kathaṃ nu kho imaṃ idāni māressāmī''ti vā mā cintayi. ^b^nāgā^eb^ti varuṇaṃ ālapati. ^b^āyāhamasmī^eb^ti āyo ahaṃ asmi, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^sayaṃ karissāmī^eb^ti sace tvaṃ ``imassa santike idāni dhammo me suto''ti maṃ māretuṃ na visahasi, ahameva yathā tava ajjhāsayo, tathā sayaṃ karissāmīti.
[21] ``paññā have hadayaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ, te tyamha paññāya mayaṃ sutuṭṭhā.
[22] anūnanāmo labhatajja dāraṃ, ajjeva taṃ kuruyo pāpayātū''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^te tyamhā^eb^ti te mayaṃ tava paññāya sutuṭṭhā. ^b^anūnanāmo^eb^ti sampuṇṇanāmo puṇṇako yakkhasenāpati. ^b^labhatajja dāra^eb^nti labhatu ajja dāraṃ, dadāmi assa dhītaraṃ irandhatiṃ. ^b^pāpayātū^eb^ti ajjeva taṃ kururaṭṭhaṃ puṇṇako pāpetu.
[03] evañca ^a^P6.0323^ea^ pana vatvā varuṇo nāgarājā irandhatiṃ puṇṇakassa adāsi. so taṃ labhitvā tuṭṭhacitto mahāsattena saddhiṃ sallapi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``sa puṇṇako attamano udaggo, irandhatiṃ nāgakaññaṃ labhitvā.
[22] haṭṭhena bhāvena patītarūpo, iccabravi kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ..
[21] ``bhariyāya maṃ tvaṃ akari samaṅgiṃ, ahañca te vidhura karomi kiccaṃ.
[22] idañca te maṇiratanaṃ dadāmi, ajjeva taṃ kuruyo pāpayāmī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0221^ea^ ^b^maṇiratana^eb^nti paṇḍita, ahaṃ tava guṇesu pasanno arahāmi tava anucchavikaṃ kiccaṃ kātuṃ, tasmā imañca te cakkavattiparibhogaṃ maṇiratanaṃ demi, ajjeva taṃ indapatthaṃ pāpemīti.
[03] atha mahāsatto tassa thutiṃ karonto itaraṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``ajeyyamesā tava hotu metti, bhariyāya kaccāna piyāya saddhiṃ.
[22] ānandi vitto sumano patīto, datvā maṇiṃ mañca nayindapattha''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0234^ea^ ^b^ajeyyamesā^eb^ti esā tava bhariyāya saddhiṃ piyasaṃvāsametti ajeyyā hotu. ``ānandi vitto''tiādīhi pītisamaṅgibhāvamevassa vadati. ^b^nayindapattha^eb^nti naya indapatthaṃ.
[03] taṃ sutvā puṇṇako tathā akāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``sa puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, nisīdayī purato āsanasmiṃ.
[21] ``mano manussassa yathāpi gacche, tatopissa khippataraṃ ahosi.
[22] sa puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, upānayī nagaraṃ indapatthaṃ..
[21] ``etindapatthaṃ ^a^P6.0324^ea^ nagaraṃ padissati, rammāni ca ambavanāni bhāgaso.
[22] ahañca bhariyāya samaṅgibhūto, tuvañca pattosi sakaṃ niketa''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^yathāpi gacche^eb^ti mano nāma kiñcāpi na gacchati, dūre ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhanto pana gatoti vuccati, tasmā manassa ārammaṇaggahaṇatopi khippataraṃ tassa manomayasindhavassa gamanaṃ ahosīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^etindapattha^eb^nti assapiṭṭhe nisinnoyevassa dassento evamāha. ^b^sakaṃ niketa^eb^nti tvañca attano nivesanaṃ sampattoti āha.

[03] tasmiṃ pana divase paccūsakāle rājā supinaṃ addasa. evarūpo supino ahosi -- rañño nivesanadvāre paññākkhandho sīlamayasākho pañcagorasaphalo alaṅkatahatthigavāssapaṭicchanno mahārukkho ^a^V7.0222^ea^ ṭhito. mahājano tassa sakkāraṃ katvā añjaliṃ paggayha namassamāno ^a^M7.0235^ea^ aṭṭhāsi. atheko kaṇhapuriso pharuso rattasāṭakanivattho rattapupphakaṇṇadharo āvudhahattho āgantvā mahājanassa paridevantasseva taṃ rukkhaṃ samūlaṃ chinditvā ākaḍḍhanto ādāya gantvā puna taṃ āharitvā pakatiṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetvā pakkāmīti. rājā taṃ supinaṃ pariggaṇhanto ``mahārukkho viya na añño koci, vidhurapaṇḍito. mahājanassa paridevantasseva taṃ samūlaṃ chinditvā ādāya gatapuriso viya na añño koci, paṇḍitaṃ gahetvā gatamāṇavo. puna taṃ āharitvā pakatiṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetvā gato viya so māṇavo puna taṃ paṇḍitaṃ ānetvā dhammasabhāya dvāre ṭhapetvā pakkamissati. addhā ajja mayaṃ paṇḍitaṃ passissāmā''ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā somanassapatto sakalanagaraṃ alaṅkārāpetvā dhammasabhaṃ sajjāpetvā alaṅkataratanamaṇḍape dhammāsanaṃ paññāpetvā ekasatarājāmaccagaṇanagaravāsijānapadaparivuto ``ajja tumhe paṇḍitaṃ passissatha, mā socitthā''ti mahājanaṃ assāsetvā paṇḍitassa āgamanaṃ olokento dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīdi. amaccādayopi nisīdiṃsu. tasmiṃ khaṇe puṇṇakopi paṇḍitaṃ otāretvā dhammasabhāya dvāre parisamajjheyeva ṭhapetvā irandhatiṃ ādāya devanagarameva gato. tamatthaṃ ^a^P6.0325^ea^ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``na puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, oropiya dhammasabhāya majjhe.
[21] ``taṃ disvā rājā paramappatīto, uṭṭhāya bāhāhi palissajitvā.

[03] tattha ^b^anomavaṇṇo^eb^ti ahīnavaṇṇo uttamavaṇṇo. ^b^avikampaya^eb^nti bhikkhave, so rājā paṇḍitaṃ palissajitvā mahājanamajjhe avikampanto anolīyantoyeva hatthe gahetvā attano abhimukhaṃ katvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīdāpesi.
[03] atha ^a^M7.0236^ea^ rājā tena saddhiṃ sammoditvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ karonto gāthamāha --
[21] ``tvaṃ no vinetāsi rathaṃva naddhaṃ, nandanti taṃ kuruyo dassanena.
[22] akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ pamokkho ahu māṇavassā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0223^ea^ ^b^naddha^eb^nti yathā naddhaṃ rathaṃ sārathi vineti, evaṃ tvaṃ amhākaṃ kāraṇena nayena hitakiriyāsu vinetā. ^b^nandanti ta^eb^nti taṃ disvāva ime kururaṭṭhavāsino tava dassanena nandanti. ^b^māṇavassā^eb^ti māṇavassa santikā kathaṃ tava pamokkho ahosi? yo vā taṃ muñcantassa māṇavassa pamokkho, so kena kāraṇena ahosīti attho.
[21] ``yaṃ māṇavotyābhivadī janinda, na so manusso naravīraseṭṭha.
[22] yadi te suto puṇṇako nāma yakkho, rañño kuverassa hi so sajibbo..
[21] ``bhūmindharo varuṇo nāma nāgo, brahā sucī vaṇṇabalūpapanno.
[22] tassānujaṃ dhītaraṃ kāmayāno, irandhatī nāma sā nāgakaññā..
[21] ``tassā ^a^P6.0326^ea^ sumajjhāya piyāya hetu, patārayittha maraṇāya mayhaṃ.
[22] so ceva bhariyāya samaṅgibhūto, ahañca anuññāto maṇi ca laddho''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^yaṃ māṇavotyābhivadī^eb^ti janinda yaṃ tvaṃ ``māṇavo''ti abhivadasi. ^b^bhūmindharo^eb^ti bhūmindharanāgabhavanavāsī. ^b^sā nāgakaññā^eb^ti yaṃ nāgakaññaṃ so patthayamāno mama maraṇāya patārayi cittaṃ pavattesi, sā nāgakaññā ^a^M7.0237^ea^ irandhatī nāma. ^b^piyāya hetū^eb^ti mahārāja, so hi nāgarājā catupposathikapañhavissajjane pasanno maṃ maṇinā pūjetvā nāgabhavanaṃ gato vimalāya nāma deviyā taṃ maṇiṃ adisvā ``deva, kuhiṃ maṇī''ti pucchito mama dhammakathikabhāvaṃ vaṇṇesi. sā mayhaṃ dhammakathaṃ sotukāmā hutvā mama hadaye dohaḷaṃ uppādesi. nāgarājā duggahitena pana dhītaraṃ irandhatiṃ āha -- ``mātā, te vidhurassa hadayamaṃse dohaḷinī, tassa hadayamaṃsaṃ āharituṃ samatthaṃ sāmikaṃ pariyesāhī''ti. sā pariyesantī vessavaṇassa bhāgineyyaṃ puṇṇakaṃ nāma yakkhaṃ disvā taṃ attani paṭibaddhacittaṃ ñatvā pitu santikaṃ nesi. atha naṃ so ``vidhurapaṇḍitassa hadayamaṃsaṃ āharituṃ sakkonto irandhatiṃ labhissasī''ti āha. puṇṇako vepullapabbatato cakkavattiparibhogaṃ maṇiratanaṃ āharitvā tumhehi saddhiṃ jūtaṃ kīḷitvā maṃ jinitvā labhi. ahañca mama nivesane tīhaṃ vasāpetvā mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ akāsiṃ. sopi maṃ assavāladhiṃ gāhāpetvā himavante rukkhesu ca pabbatesu ca pothetvā māretuṃ asakkonto sattame vātakkhandhe verambhavātamukhe ca pakkhanditvā anupubbena saṭṭhiyojanubbedhe ^a^V7.0224^ea^ kāḷāgirimatthake ṭhapetvā sīhavesādivasena idañcidañca rūpaṃ katvāpi māretuṃ asakkonto mayā attano māraṇakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho ācikkhi. athassāhaṃ sādhunaradhamme kathesiṃ. taṃ sutvā pasannacitto maṃ idha ānetukāmo ahosi.

[03] athāhaṃ taṃ ādāya nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā nāgarañño ca vimalāya ca dhammaṃ desesiṃ. tato nāgarājā ca vimalā ca sabbanāgaparisā ca pasīdiṃsu. nāgarājā tattha mayā chāhaṃ vutthakāle irandhatiṃ puṇṇakassa ^a^P6.0327^ea^ adāsi. so taṃ labhitvā pasannacitto hutvā maṃ maṇiratanena pūjetvā nāgarājena āṇatto manomayasindhavaṃ āropetvā sayaṃ majjhimāsane nisīditvā irandhatiṃ pacchimāsane nisīdāpetvā maṃ purimāsane nisīdāpetvā idhāgantvā parisamajjhe otāretvā irandhatiṃ ādāya attano nagarameva gato. evaṃ, mahārāja, so puṇṇako tassā sumajjhāya piyāya hetu patārayittha maraṇāya mayhaṃ. athevaṃ maṃ nissāya so ceva bhariyāya samaṅgibhūto, mama dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannena nāgarājena ahañca anuññāto, tassa puṇṇakassa santikā ayaṃ sabbakāmadado cakkavattiparibhogamaṇi ca laddho, gaṇhatha, deva, imaṃ maṇinti rañño ratanaṃ adāsi.
[03] tato ^a^M7.0238^ea^ rājā paccūsakāle attanā diṭṭhasupinaṃ nagaravāsīnaṃ kathetukāmo ``bhonto, nagaravāsino ajja mayā diṭṭhasupinaṃ suṇāthā''ti vatvā āha --
[21] ``rukkho hi mayhaṃ padvāre sujāto, paññākkhandho sīlamayassa sākhā.
[22] atthe ca dhamme ca ṭhito nipāko, gavapphalo hatthigavāssachanno..
[22] so no ayaṃ āgato sanniketaṃ, rukkhassimassāpacitiṃ karotha..
[21] ``ye keci vittā mama paccayena, sabbeva te pātukarontu ajja.
[21] ``ye keci baddhā mama atthi raṭṭhe, sabbeva te bandhanā mocayantu.
[22] yathevayaṃ bandhanasmā pamutto, evamete muñcare bandhanasmā..
[22] amajjapā majjarahā pivantu, puṇṇāhi thālāhi palissutāhi..
[21] ``mahāpathaṃ nicca samavhayantu, tibbañca rakkhaṃ vidahantu raṭṭhe.

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0239^ea^ ^b^sīlamayassa sākhā^eb^ti etassa rukkhassa sīlamayā sākhā. ^b^atthe ca dhammecā^eb^ti vaddhiyañca sabhāve ca. ^b^ṭhito nipāko^eb^ti so paññāmayarukkho patiṭṭhito. ^b^gavapphalo^eb^ti pañcavidhagorasaphalo. ^b^hatthigavāssachanno^eb^ti alaṅkatahatthigavāssehi sañchanno. ^b^naccagītatūriyābhinādite^eb^ti atha tassa rukkhassa pūjaṃ karontena mahājanena tasmiṃ rukkhe etehi naccādīhi abhinādite. ^b^ucchijja senaṃ puriso ahāsī^eb^ti eko kaṇhapuriso āgantvā taṃ rukkhaṃ ucchijja parivāretvā ṭhitaṃ senaṃ palāpetvā ahāsi gahetvā gato. puna so rukkho āgantvā amhākaṃ nivesanadvārayeva ṭhito. so no ayaṃ rukkhasadiso paṇḍito sanniketaṃ āgato. idāni sabbeva tumhe rukkhassa imassa apacitiṃ karotha, mahāsakkāraṃ pavattetha.

[03] ^b^mama paccayenā^eb^ti ambho, amaccā ye keci maṃ nissāya laddhena yasena ^b^vittā^eb^ tuṭṭhacittā, te sabbe attano vittaṃ pātukarontu. ^b^tibbānī^eb^ti bahalāni mahantāni. ^b^upāyanānī^eb^ti paṇṇākāre. ^b^ye kecī^eb^ti antamaso kīḷanatthāya baddhe migapakkhino upādāya. ^b^muñcare^eb^ti muñcantu. ^b^unnaṅgalā māsamimaṃ karontū^eb^ti imaṃ māsaṃ kasananaṅgalāni ussāpetvā ekamante ṭhapetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā sabbeva manussā mahāchaṇaṃ karontu. ^b^bhakkhayantū^eb^ti bhuñjantu. ^b^amajjapā^eb^ti ettha ^b^a^eb^-kāro nipātamattaṃ, majjapā purisā majjarahā attano attano āpānaṭṭhānesu nisinnā pivantūti attho. ^b^puṇṇāhi thālāhī^eb^ti puṇṇehi thālehi. ^b^palissutāhī^eb^ti atipuṇṇattā paggharamānehi. ^b^mahāpathaṃ nicca samavhayantū^eb^ti antonagare alaṅkatamahāpathaṃ rājamaggaṃ nissāya ṭhitā vesiyā niccakālaṃ kilesavasena kilesatthikaṃ janaṃ avhayantūti attho. ^b^tibba^eb^nti gāḷhaṃ. ^b^yathā^eb^ti yathā rakkhassa susaṃvihitattā unnaṅgalā hutvā rukkhassimassa apacitiṃ karontā aññamaññaṃ na viheṭhayeyyuṃ, evaṃ rakkhaṃ saṃvidahantūti attho.
[21] ``orodhā ^a^V7.0226^ea^ ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā.

[03] tattha ^b^abhihārayu^eb^nti evaṃ raññā āṇattā mahāchaṇaṃ paṭiyādetvā sabbe satte bandhanā mocetvā ete sabbe orodhādayo nānappakāraṃ paṇṇākāraṃ sajjitvā tena saddhiṃ annañca pānañca paṇḍitassa pesesuṃ. ^b^paṇḍitamāgate^eb^ti paṇḍite āgate taṃ paṇḍitaṃ disvā bahujano pasanno ahosi.

[03] chaṇo māsena osānaṃ agamāsi. tato mahāsatto buddhakiccaṃ sādhento viya mahājanassa dhammaṃ desento rājānañca anusāsanto dānādīni puññāni katvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā āyupariyosāne saggaparāyaṇo ahosi. rājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbepi nagaravāsino paṇḍitassovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne saggapuraṃ pūrayiṃsu.

[03] satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā ``na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi tathāgato paññāsampanno upāyakusaloyevā''ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi -- ``tadā paṇḍitassa mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni ahesuṃ, jeṭṭhabhariyā rāhulamātā, jeṭṭhaputto rāhulo, vimalā uppalavaṇṇā, varuṇanāgarājā sāriputto, supaṇṇarājā moggallāno, sakko anuruddho, dhanañcayakorabyarājā ānando, puṇṇako channo, parisā buddhaparisā, vidhurapaṇḍito pana ahameva sammāsambuddho ahosi''nti.

[03] ^b^phussatī^eb^ ^a^V7.0227^ea^ ^a^P6.0479^ea^ ^a^M7.0241^ea^ ^b^varavaṇṇābhe^eb^ti idaṃ satthā kapilavatthuṃ upanissāya nigrodhārāme viharanto pokkharavassaṃ ārabbha kathesi. yadā hi satthā pavattitavaradhammacakko anukkamena rājagahaṃ gantvā tattha hemantaṃ vītināmetvā udāyittherena maggadesakena vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto paṭhamagamanena kapilavatthuṃ agamāsi, tadā sakyarājāno ``mayaṃ amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhaṃ passissāmā''ti sannipatitvā bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vīmaṃsamānā ``nigrodhasakkassārāmo ramaṇīyo''ti sallakkhetvā tattha sabbaṃ paṭijagganavidhiṃ katvā gandhapupphādihatthā paccuggamanaṃ karontā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍite daharadahare nāgaradārake ca nāgaradārikāyo ca paṭhamaṃ pahiṇiṃsu, tato rājakumāre ca rājakumārikāyo ca. tesaṃ antarā sāmaṃ gandhapupphacuṇṇādīhi satthāraṃ pūjetvā bhagavantaṃ gahetvā nigrodhārāmameva agamiṃsu. tattha bhagavā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi. tadā hi sākiyā mānajātikā mānatthaddhā. te ``ayaṃ siddhatthakumāro amhehi daharataro, amhākaṃ kaniṭṭho bhāgineyyo putto nattā''ti cintetvā daharadahare rājakumāre ca rājakumārikāyo ca āhaṃsu ``tumhe bhagavantaṃ vandatha, mayaṃ tumhākaṃ piṭṭhito nisīdissāmā''ti.

[03] tesu evaṃ avanditvā nisinnesu bhagavā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā ``na maṃ ñātayo vandanti, handa idāneva vandāpessāmī''ti abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā tesaṃ sīse pādapaṃsuṃ okiramāno viya kaṇḍambarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyasadisaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi. rājā suddhodano taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā āha ``bhante, tumhākaṃ jātadivase kāḷadevalassa vandanatthaṃ upanītānaṃ vo pāde parivattitvā brāhmaṇassa matthake ṭhite disvā ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pāde vandiṃ, ayaṃ me paṭhamavandanā. punapi vappamaṅgaladivase jambucchāyāya sirisayane nisinnānaṃ vo jambucchāyāya aparivattanaṃ ^a^M7.0242^ea^ disvāpi ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pāde vandiṃ, ayaṃ me dutiyavandanā. idāni imaṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ ^a^V7.0228^ea^ disvāpi tumhākaṃ pāde vandāmi, ayaṃ me tatiyavandanā''ti. raññā pana vandite avanditvā ṭhātuṃ samattho nāma ekasākiyopi nāhosi, sabbe vandiṃsuyeva.

[03] iti bhagavā ñātayo vandāpetvā ākāsato otaritvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi. nisinne ca bhagavati sikhāpatto ñātisamāgamo ahosi, sabbe ekaggacittā hutvā nisīdiṃsu. tato mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā pokkharavassaṃ vassi, tambavaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā viravantaṃ gacchati. ye temetukāmā, te tementi. atemetukāmassa ^a^P6.0480^ea^ sarīre ekabindumattampi na patati. taṃ disvā sabbe acchariyabbhutacittajātā ahesuṃ. ``aho acchariyaṃ aho abbhutaṃ aho buddhānaṃ mahānubhāvatā, yesaṃ ñātisamāgame evarūpaṃ pokkharavassaṃ vassī''ti bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. taṃ sutvā satthā ``na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi mama ñātisamāgame mahāmegho pokkharavassaṃ vassiyevā''ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.

[03] atīte siviraṭṭhe jetuttaranagare sivimahārājā nāma rajjaṃ kārento sañjayaṃ nāma puttaṃ paṭilabhi. so tassa vayappattassa maddarājadhītaraṃ phussatiṃ nāma rājakaññaṃ ānetvā rajjaṃ niyyādetvā phussatiṃ aggamahesiṃ akāsi. tassā ayaṃ pubbayogo -- ito ekanavutikappe vipassī nāma satthā loke udapādi. tasmiṃ bandhumatinagaraṃ nissāya kheme migadāye viharante eko rājā rañño bandhumassa anagghena candanasārena saddhiṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇamālaṃ pesesi. rañño pana dve dhītaro ahesuṃ. so taṃ paṇṇākāraṃ tāsaṃ dātukāmo hutvā candanasāraṃ jeṭṭhikāya adāsi, suvaṇṇamālaṃ kaniṭṭhāya adāsi. tā ubhopi ``na mayaṃ imaṃ attano sarīre piḷandhissāma, satthārameva pūjessāmā''ti cintetvā rājānaṃ āhaṃsu ``tāta, candanasārena ca suvaṇṇamālāya ca dasabalaṃ pūjessāmā''ti. taṃ sutvā rājā ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchi. jeṭṭhikā sukhumacandanacuṇṇaṃ kāretvā suvaṇṇasamuggaṃ pūretvā gaṇhāpesi. kaniṭṭhabhaginī pana suvaṇṇamālaṃ uracchadamālaṃ kārāpetvā ^a^M7.0243^ea^ suvaṇṇasamuggena gaṇhāpesi. tā ubhopi migadāyavihāraṃ gantvā jeṭṭhikā candanacuṇṇena dasabalassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ pūjetvā sesacuṇṇāni gandhakuṭiyaṃ vikiritvā ``bhante, anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa mātā bhaveyya''nti patthanaṃ akāsi. kaniṭṭhabhaginīpi tathāgatassa suvaṇṇavaṇaṃ sarīraṃ suvaṇṇamālāya katena uracchadena pūjetvā ``bhante, yāva arahattappatti, tāva idaṃ pasādhanaṃ mama sarīrā mā vigataṃ hotū''ti patthanaṃ akāsi. satthāpi tāsaṃ anumodanaṃ akāsi.

[03] tā ubhopi yāvatāyukaṃ ^a^P6.0481^ea^ ṭhatvā devaloke nibbattiṃsu. tāsu jeṭṭhabhaginī devalokato manussalokaṃ ^a^V7.0229^ea^, manussalokato devalokaṃ saṃsarantī ekanavutikappāvasāne amhākaṃ buddhuppādakāle buddhamātā mahāmāyādevī nāma ahosi. kaniṭṭhabhaginīpi tatheva saṃsarantī kassapadasabalassa kāle kikissa rañño dhītā hutvā nibbatti. sā cittakammakatāya viya uracchadamālāya alaṅkatena urena jātattā uracchadā nāma kumārikā hutvā soḷasavassikakāle satthu bhattānumodanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aparabhāge bhattānumodanaṃ suṇanteneva pitarā sotāpattiphalaṃ pattadivaseyeva arahattaṃ patvā pabbajitvā parinibbāyi. kikirājāpi aññā satta dhītaro labhi. tāsaṃ nāmāni --
[22] dhammā ceva sudhammā ca, saṅghadāsī ca sattamī''ti..

[03] tāsu ^a^M7.0244^ea^ phussatī sudhammā nāma hutvā dānādīni puññāni katvā vipassisammāsambuddhassa katāya candanacuṇṇapūjāya phalena rattacandanarasaparipphositena viya sarīrena jātattā phussatī nāma kumārikā hutvā devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsarantī aparabhāge sakkassa devarañño aggamahesī hutvā nibbatti. athassā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā pañcasu pubbanimittesu uppannesu sakko devarājā tassā parikkhīṇāyukataṃ ñatvā mahantena yasena taṃ ādāya nandanavanuyyānaṃ gantvā tattha taṃ alaṅkatasayanapiṭṭhe nisinnaṃ sayaṃ sayanapasse nisīditvā etadavoca ``bhadde phussati, te dasa vare dammi, te gaṇhassū''ti vadanto imasmiṃ gāthāsahassapaṭimaṇḍite mahāvessantarajātake paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] pathabyā cārupubbaṅgi, yaṃ tuyhaṃ manaso piya''nti..
[03] evamesā ^a^P6.0482^ea^ mahāvessantaradhammadesanā devaloke patiṭṭhāpitā nāma hoti.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0230^ea^ ^b^phussatī^eb^ti taṃ nāmenālapati. ^b^varavaṇṇābhe^eb^ti varāya vaṇṇābhāya samannāgate. ^b^dasadhā^eb^ti dasavidhe. ^b^pathabyā^eb^ti pathaviyaṃ gahetabbe katvā ^b^varassu^eb^ gaṇhassūti vadati. ^b^cārupubbaṅgī^eb^ti cārunā pubbaṅgena varalakkhaṇena samannāgate. ^b^yaṃ tuyhaṃ manaso piya^eb^nti yaṃ yaṃ tava manasā piyaṃ, taṃ taṃ dasahi koṭṭhāsehi gaṇhāhīti vadati.
[03] sā attano cavanadhammataṃ ajānantī pamattā hutvā dutiyagāthamāha --
[21] ``devarāja namo tyatthu, kiṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ mayā.
[22] rammā cāvesi maṃ ṭhānā, vātova dharaṇīruha''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^namo tyatthū^eb^ti namo te atthu. ^b^kiṃ pāpa^eb^nti kiṃ mayā tava santike pāpaṃ pakatanti pucchati. ^b^dharaṇīruha^eb^nti rukkhaṃ.
[03] athassā pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā sakko dve gāthā abhāsi --
[21] ``na ceva te kataṃ pāpaṃ, na ca me tvamasi appiyā.
[22] puññañca te parikkhīṇaṃ, yena tevaṃ vadāmahaṃ..
[22] paṭiggaṇhāhi me ete, vare dasa pavecchato''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^yena teva^eb^nti yena te evaṃ vadāmi. ^b^tuyhaṃ vinābhāvo^eb^ti tava amhehi saddhiṃ viyogo bhavissati. ^b^pavecchato^eb^ti dadamānassa.
[03] sā sakkassa vacanaṃ sutvā nicchayena attano maraṇaṃ ñatvā varaṃ gaṇhantī āha --
[22] kucchi anunnato assa, cāpaṃva likhitaṃ samaṃ..
[21] ``thanā ^a^P6.0483^ea^ me nappapateyyuṃ, palitā na santu vāsava.
[22] kāye rajo na limpetha, vajjhañcāpi pamocaye..

[03] tattha ^b^sivirājassā^eb^ti sā sakalajambudīpatalaṃ olokentī attano anucchavikaṃ sivirañño nivesanaṃ disvā tattha aggamahesibhāvaṃ patthentī evamāha. ^b^yathā migī^eb^ti ekavassikā hi migapotikā nīlanettā hoti, tenevamāha. ^b^tatthapassa^eb^nti tatthapi imināva nāmena ^a^M7.0246^ea^ assaṃ. ^b^labhethā^eb^ti labheyyaṃ. ^b^varada^eb^nti alaṅkatasīsākkhiyugalahadayamaṃsarudhirasetacchattaputtadāresu yācitayācitassa varabhaṇḍassa dāyakaṃ. ^b^kucchī^eb^ti ``majjhimaṅga''nti vuttaṃ sarūpato dasseti. ^b^likhita^eb^nti yathā chekena dhanukārena sammā likhitaṃ dhanu anunnatamajjhaṃ tulāvaṭṭaṃ samaṃ hoti, evarūpo me kucchi bhaveyya.

[03] ^b^nappapateyyu^eb^nti patitvā lambā na bhaveyyuṃ. ^b^palitā na santu vāsavā^eb^ti vāsava devaseṭṭha, palitānipi me sirasmiṃ na santu mā paññāyiṃsu. ``palitāni siroruhā''tipi pāṭho. ^b^vajjhañcāpī^eb^ti kibbisakārakaṃ rājāparādhikaṃ vajjhappattacoraṃ attano balena mocetuṃ samatthā bhaveyyaṃ. iminā attano issariyabhāvaṃ dīpeti. ^b^bhūtamāgadhavaṇṇite^eb^ti bhojanakālādīsu thutivasena ^a^V7.0232^ea^ kālaṃ ārocentehi sūtehi ceva māgadhakehi ca vaṇṇite. ^b^citraggaḷerughusite^eb^ti pañcaṅgikatūriyasaddasadisaṃ manoramaṃ ravaṃ ravantehi sattaratanavicittehi dvārakavāṭehi ugghosite. ^b^surāmaṃsapabodhane^eb^ti ``pivatha, khādathā''ti surāmaṃsehi pabodhiyamānajane evarūpe sivirājassa nivesane tassa aggamahesī bhaveyyanti ime dasa vare gaṇhi.

[03] tattha sivirājassa aggamahesibhāvo paṭhamo varo, nīlanettatā dutiyo, nīlabhamukatā tatiyo, phussatīti nāmaṃ catuttho, puttapaṭilābho pañcamo, anunnatakucchitā chaṭṭho, alambatthanatā sattamo, apalitabhāvo aṭṭhamo, sukhumacchavibhāvo navamo, vajjhappamocanasamatthatā dasamo varoti.
[21] ``ye te dasa varā dinnā, mayā sabbaṅgasobhane.
[22] sivirājassa vijite, sabbe te lacchasī vare''ti..
[03] athassā sakko devarājā phussatiyā dasa vare adāsi, datvā ca pana ``bhadde phussati, tava sabbe te samijjhantū''ti vatvā anumodi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[03] tattha ^b^anumoditthā^eb^ti ``sabbe te lacchasi vare''ti evaṃ vare datvā pamuddito tuṭṭhamānaso ahosīti attho.

[03] iti sā vare gahetvā tato cutā maddarañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti. jāyamānā ca candanacuṇṇaparikiṇṇena viya sarīrena jātā. tenassā nāmaggahaṇadivase ``phussatī''tveva ^a^V7.0233^ea^ nāmaṃ kariṃsu. sā mahantena parivārena vaḍḍhitvā soḷasavassakāle uttamarūpadharā ahosi. atha naṃ sivimahārājā puttassa sañjayakumārassa atthāya ānetvā tassa chattaṃ ussāpetvā soḷasannaṃ itthisahassānaṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ katvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] sā sañjayassa piyā manāpā ahosi. atha naṃ sakko āvajjamāno ``mayā phussatiyā dinnavaresu nava varā samiddhā''ti disvā ``eko pana puttavaro na tāva samijjhati, tampissā samijjhāpessāmī''ti cintesi. tadā mahāsatto tāvatiṃsadevaloke vasati, āyu cassa parikkhīṇaṃ ahosi. taṃ ñatvā sakko tassa santikaṃ gantvā ``mārisa, tayā manussalokaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati, tattha sivirañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti vatvā tassa ceva aññesañca cavanadhammānaṃ saṭṭhisahassānaṃ devaputtānaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato. mahāsattopi tato cavitvā tatthupapanno, sesadevaputtāpi saṭṭhisahassānaṃ amaccānaṃ gehesu nibbattiṃsu. mahāsatte kucchigate phussatī dohaḷinī hutvā catūsu nagaradvāresu nagaramajjhe ^a^M7.0248^ea^ rājanivesanadvāre cāti chasu ṭhānesu cha dānasālāyo kārāpetvā devasikaṃ cha satasahassāni vissajjetvā mahādānaṃ dātukāmā ahosi.

[03] rājā tassā dohaḷaṃ sutvā nemittake brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā pucchi. nemittakā -- ``mahārāja, deviyā kucchimhi dānābhirato satto uppanno, dānena tittiṃ na gamissatī''ti vadiṃsu. taṃ sutvā rājā tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā cha dānasālāyo kārāpetvā vuttappakāraṃ dānaṃ paṭṭhapesi. bodhisattassa ^a^P6.0485^ea^ paṭisandhiggahaṇakālato paṭṭhāya rañño āyassa pamāṇaṃ nāma nāhosi. tassa puññānubhāvena sakalajambudīparājāno paṇṇākāraṃ pahiṇiṃsu. devī mahantena parivārena gabbhaṃ dhārentī dasamāse paripuṇṇe nagaraṃ daṭṭhukāmā hutvā rañño ārocesi. rājā nagaraṃ devanagaraṃ viya alaṅkārāpetvā deviṃ rathavaraṃ āropetvā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kāresi. tassā vessānaṃ vīthiyā vemajjhaṃ sampattakāle kammajavātā caliṃsu. atha amaccā rañño ārocesuṃ. taṃ sutvā vessavīthiyaṃyeva tassā sūtigharaṃ kārāpetvā vāsaṃ gaṇhāpesi. sā tattha puttaṃ vijāyi. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] vessānaṃ vīthiyā majjhe, janesi phussatī mama''nti.. (cariyā0 1.76).

[03] mahāsatto mātu kucchito nikkhantoyeva visado hutvā akkhīni ummīletvā nikkhami. nikkhantoyeva ca mātu hatthaṃ pasāretvā ``amma, dānaṃ dassāmi, atthi kiñci te dhana''nti āha. athassa mātā ``tāta, yathāajjhāsayena dānaṃ dehī''ti pasāritahatthe sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapesi. mahāsatto hi umaṅgajātake imasmiṃ jātake pacchimattabhāveti tīsu ṭhānesu jātamatteyeva mātarā saddhiṃ kathesi. athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase vessavīthiyaṃ jātattā ``vessantaro''ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.

[03] jātadivaseyeva ^a^M7.0249^ea^ panassa ekā ākāsacārinī kareṇukā abhimaṅgalasammataṃ sabbasetaṃ hatthipotakaṃ ānetvā maṅgalahatthiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā pakkāmi. tassa mahāsattaṃ paccayaṃ katvā uppannattā ``paccayo''tveva nāmaṃ kariṃsu. taṃ divasameva amaccagehesu saṭṭhisahassakumārakā jāyiṃsu. rājā mahāsattassa atidīghādidose vivajjetvā alambathaniyo madhurakhīrāyo catusaṭṭhi dhātiyo upaṭṭhāpesi. tena saddhiṃ jātānañca saṭṭhidārakasahassānaṃ ekekā dhātiyo upaṭṭhāpesi. so saṭṭhisahassehi dārakehi saddhiṃ mahantena parivārena vaḍḍhati. athassa rājā satasahassagghanakaṃ kumārapiḷandhanaṃ kārāpesi. so catuppañcavassikakāle taṃ ^a^P6.0486^ea^ omuñcitvā dhātīnaṃ datvā puna tāhi dīyamānampi na gaṇhi. tā rañño ārocayiṃsu. rājā taṃ sutvā ``mama puttena dinnaṃ brahmadeyyameva hotū''ti aparampi kāresi. kumāro tampi adāsiyeva. iti dārakakāleyeva dhātīnaṃ nava vāre piḷandhanaṃ adāsi.

[03] aṭṭhavassikakāle pana pāsādavaragato sirisayanapiṭṭhe nisinnova cintesi ``ahaṃ bāhirakadānameva demi, taṃ maṃ na paritoseti, ajjhattikadānaṃ dātukāmomhi, sace maṃ koci sīsaṃ yāceyya, sīsaṃ chinditvā tassa dadeyyaṃ. sacepi maṃ koci hadayaṃ yāceyya, uraṃ bhinditvā hadayaṃ nīharitvā dadeyyaṃ. sace akkhīni yāceyya, akkhīni uppāṭetvā dadeyyaṃ. sace ^a^V7.0235^ea^ sarīramaṃsaṃ yāceyya, sakalasarīrato maṃsaṃ chinditvā dadeyyaṃ. sacepi maṃ koci rudhiraṃ yāceyya, rudhiraṃ gahetvā dadeyyaṃ. atha vāpi koci `dāso me hohī'ti vadeyya, attānamassa sāvetvā dāsaṃ katvā dadeyya''nti. tassevaṃ sabhāvaṃ cintentassa catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā ayaṃ mahāpathavī mattavaravāraṇo viya gajjamānā kampi. sinerupabbatarājā suseditavettaṅkuro viya onamitvā jetuttaranagarābhimukho aṭṭhāsi. pathavisaddena devā gajjanto khaṇikavassaṃ vassi, akālavijjulatā nicchariṃsu, sāgaro saṅkhubhi. sakko devarājā apphoṭesi, mahābrahmā sādhukāramadāsi. pathavitalato paṭṭhāya yāva brahmalokā ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi.
[22] tadā nisajja pāsāde, dānaṃ dātuṃ vicintayiṃ..
[22] dadeyyaṃ kāyaṃ sāvetvā, yadi koci yācaye mamaṃ..

[03] bodhisatto soḷasavassikakāleyeva sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ pāpuṇi. athassa pitā rajjaṃ dātukāmo mātarā saddhiṃ mantetvā maddarājakulato mātuladhītaraṃ maddiṃ nāma rājakaññaṃ ānetvā soḷasannaṃ itthisahassānaṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ aggamahesiṃ katvā mahāsattaṃ rajje abhisiñci. mahāsatto rajje patiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya devasikaṃ cha satasahassāni vissajjento mahādānaṃ pavattesi. aparabhāge maddidevī puttaṃ ^a^P6.0487^ea^ vijāyi. taṃ kañcanajālena sampaṭicchiṃsu, tenassa ``jālīkumāro''tveva nāmaṃ kariṃsu. tassa padasā gamanakāle dhītaraṃ vijāyi. taṃ kaṇhājinena sampaṭicchiṃsu, tenassā ``kaṇhājinā''tveva nāmaṃ kariṃsu. mahāsatto māsassa chakkhattuṃ alaṅkatahatthikkhandhavaragato cha dānasālāyo olokesi. tadā kāliṅgaraṭṭhe dubbuṭṭhikā ahosi, sassāni na sampajjiṃsu, manussānaṃ mahantaṃ chātabhayaṃ pavatti. manussā jīvituṃ asakkontācorakammaṃ karonti. dubbhikkhapīḷitā jānapadā rājaṅgaṇe sannipatitvā rājānaṃ upakkosiṃsu ^a^V7.0236^ea^. taṃ sutvā raññā ``kiṃ, tātā''ti vutte tamatthaṃ ārocayiṃsu. rājā ``sādhu, tātā, devaṃ vassāpessāmī''ti te uyyojetvā samādinnasīlo uposathavāsaṃ vasantopi devaṃ vassāpetuṃ nāsakkhi. so nāgare sannipātetvā ``ahaṃ samādinnasīlo sattāhaṃ uposathavāsaṃ vasantopi devaṃ vassāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ, kiṃ nu kho kātabba''nti pucchi. sace, deva, devaṃ vassāpetuṃ na sakkosi, esa jetuttaranagare sañjayassa rañño putto vessantaro nāma dānābhirato. tassaṃ kira sabbaseto maṅgalahatthī atthi, tassa gatagataṭṭhāne ^a^M7.0251^ea^ devo vassi. brāhmaṇe pesetvā taṃ hatthiṃ yācāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, āṇāpethāti.

[03] so ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā brāhmaṇe sannipātetvā tesu guṇavaṇṇasampanne aṭṭha jane vicinitvā tesaṃ paribbayaṃ datvā ``gacchatha, tumhe vessantaraṃ hatthiṃ yācitvā ānethā''ti pesesi. brāhmaṇā anupubbena jetuttaranagaraṃ gantvā dānagge bhattaṃ paribhuñjitvā attano sarīraṃ rajoparikiṇṇaṃ paṃsumakkhitaṃ katvā puṇṇamadivase rājānaṃ hatthiṃ yācitukāmā hutvā rañño dānaggaṃ āgamanakāle pācīnadvāraṃ agamaṃsu. rājāpi ``dānaggaṃ olokessāmī''ti pātova nhatvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā alaṅkaritvā alaṅkatahatthikkhandhavaragato pācīnadvāraṃ agamāsi. brāhmaṇā tatthokāsaṃ alabhitvā dakkhiṇadvāraṃ gantvā unnatapadese ṭhatvā rañño pācīnadvāre dānaggaṃ oloketvā dakkhiṇadvārāgamanakāle hatthe pasāretvā ``jayatu bhavaṃ vessantaro''ti tikkhattuṃ āhaṃsu. mahāsatto te brāhmaṇe disvā hatthiṃ tesaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ pesetvā hatthikkhandhe nisinno paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] paggayha dakkhiṇaṃ bāhuṃ, kiṃ maṃ yācanti brāhmaṇā''ti..

[03] taṃ sutvā mahāsatto ``ahaṃ sīsaṃ ādiṃ katvā ajjhattikadānaṃ dātukāmomhi, ime pana ^a^V7.0237^ea^ maṃ bāhirakadānameva yācanti, pūressāmi tesaṃ manoratha''nti cintetvā hatthikkhandhavaragato tatiyaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``dadāmi na vikampāmi, yaṃ maṃ yācanti brāhmaṇā.

[03] tattha ^b^opavayha^eb^nti rājavāhanaṃ. ^b^cāgādhimānaso^eb^ti cāgena adhikamānaso rājā. ^b^brāhmaṇānaṃ adā dāna^eb^nti so vāraṇassa analaṅkataṭṭhānaṃ olokanatthaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā analaṅkataṭṭhānaṃ adisvā kusumamissakasugandhodakapūritaṃ suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ gahetvā ``ito ethā''ti vatvā alaṅkatarajatadāmasadisaṃ hatthisoṇḍaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā udakaṃ pātetvā alaṅkatavāraṇaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ adāsi.

[03] tassa catūsu pādesu alaṅkāro cattāri satasahassāni agghati, ubhosu passesu alaṅkāro dve satasahassāni, heṭṭhā udare kambalaṃ satasahassaṃ, piṭṭhiyaṃ muttajālaṃ maṇijālaṃ kañcanajālanti tīṇi jālāni tīṇi satasahassāni, ubhosu kaṇṇesu alaṅkāro dve satasahassāni, piṭṭhiyaṃ attharaṇakambalaṃ satasahassaṃ, kumbhālaṅkāro satasahassaṃ, tayo vaṭaṃsakā tīṇi satasahassāni, kaṇṇacūḷālaṅkāro dve satasahassāni, dvinnaṃ dantānaṃ alaṅkāro dve satasahassāni, soṇḍāya sovatthikālaṅkāro satasahassaṃ, naṅguṭṭhālaṅkāro satasahassaṃ, ārohaṇanisseṇi satasahassaṃ, bhuñjanakaṭāhaṃ satasahassaṃ, ṭhapetvā anagghaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ kāyāruḷhapasādhanaṃ dvāvīsati satasahassāni ^a^P6.0489^ea^. evaṃ tāva ettakaṃ dhanaṃ catuvīsatisatasahassāni agghati. chattapiṇḍiyaṃ pana maṇi, cūḷāmaṇi, muttāhāre maṇi, aṅkuse maṇi, hatthikaṇṭhe veṭhanamuttāhāre maṇi, hatthikumbhe maṇīti imāni cha anagghāni, hatthīpi anagghoyevāti hatthinā saddhiṃ satta anagghānīti sabbāni tāni brāhmaṇānaṃ adāsi. tathā hatthino paricārakāni pañca kulasatāni hatthimeṇḍahatthigopakehi saddhiṃ adāsi. saha dānenevassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva bhūmikampādayo ahesuṃ. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``samākulaṃ puraṃ āsi, ghoso ca vipulo mahā.
[03] tattha ^b^tadāsī^eb^ti tadā āsi. ^b^hatthināge^eb^ti hatthisaṅkhāte nāge. ^b^khubhittha nagaraṃ tadā^eb^ti tadā jetuttaranagaraṃ saṅkhubhitaṃ ahosi.

[03] brāhmaṇā kira dakkhiṇadvāre hatthiṃ labhitvā hatthipiṭṭhe nisīditvā mahājanaparivārā nagaramajjhena pāyiṃsu. mahājano te disvā ``ambho brāhmaṇā, amhākaṃ hatthiṃ āruḷhā kuto vo hatthī laddhā''ti āha. brāhmaṇā ``vessantaramahārājena no hatthī dinno, ke tumhe''ti mahājanaṃ hatthavikārādīhi ghaṭṭentā nagaramajjhena gantvā uttaradvārena nikkhamiṃsu. nāgarā devatāvaṭṭanena bodhisattassa kuddhā rājadvāre sannipatitvā mahantaṃ upakkosamakaṃsu. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``samākulaṃ puraṃ āsi, ghoso ca vipulo mahā.
[03] tattha ^b^ghoso^eb^ti upakkosanasaddo patthaṭattā ^b^vipulo,^eb^ uddhaṃ gatattā ^b^mahā. sivīnaṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhane^eb^ti siviraṭṭhassa vuddhikare.
[03] athassa ^a^V7.0239^ea^ ^a^P6.0490^ea^ dānena saṅkhubhitacittā hutvā nagaravāsino rañño ārocesuṃ. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``uggā ^a^M7.0254^ea^ ca rājaputtā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā.
[22] disvā nāgaṃ nīyamānaṃ, te rañño paṭivedayuṃ..
[21] ``vidhamaṃ deva te raṭṭhaṃ, putto vessantaro tava.
[22] kathaṃ no hatthinaṃ dajjā, nāgaṃ raṭṭhassa pūjitaṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^uggā^eb^ti uggatā paññātā. ^b^nigamo^eb^ti negamakuṭumbikajano. ^b^vidhamaṃ deva te raṭṭha^eb^nti deva, tava raṭṭhaṃ vidhamaṃ. ^b^kathaṃ no hatthinaṃ dajjā^eb^ti kena kāraṇena amhākaṃ hatthinaṃ abhimaṅgalasammataṃ kāliṅgaraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ dadeyya. ^b^khettaññuṃ sabbayuddhāna^eb^nti sabbayuddhānaṃ khettabhūmisīsajānanasamatthaṃ. ^b^danti^eb^nti manoramadantayuttaṃ. ^b^savālabījani^eb^nti sahavālabījaniṃ. ^b^saupādheyya^eb^nti sāttharaṇaṃ. ^b^sāthabbana^eb^nti sahatthivejjaṃ. ^b^sahatthipa^eb^nti hatthiparicārakānaṃ pañcannaṃ kulasatānaṃ hatthimeṇḍahatthigopakānañca vasena sahatthipaṃ.
[22] etaṃ kho dānaṃ patirūpaṃ, etaṃ kho brāhmaṇārahaṃ..
[22] kathaṃ vessantaro putto, gajaṃ bhājeti sañjaya..
[21] ``sace ^a^M7.0255^ea^ tvaṃ na karissasi, sivīnaṃ vacanaṃ idaṃ.
[22] maññe taṃ saha puttena, sivī hatthe karissare''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^vaṃsarājā^eb^ti paveṇiyā āgato mahārājā. ^b^bhājetī^eb^ti deti. ^b^sivī hatthe karissare^eb^ti siviraṭṭhavāsino saha puttena taṃ attano hatthe karissantīti.
[03] taṃ ^a^P6.0491^ea^ sutvā rājā ``ete vessantaraṃ mārāpetuṃ icchantī''ti saññāya āha --
[22] pabbājeyyaṃ sakā raṭṭhā, putto hi mama oraso..
[22] pabbājeyyaṃ sakā raṭṭhā, putto hi mama atrajo..
[21] ``na cāhaṃ tasmiṃ dubbheyyaṃ, ariyasīlavato hi so.
[27] asilokopi me assa, pāpañca pasave bahuṃ.
[03] tattha ^b^māsī^eb^ti mā āsi, mā hotūti attho. ^b^ariyasīlavato^eb^ti ariyena sīlavatena ariyāya ca ācārasampattiyā samannāgato. ^b^ghātayāmase^eb^ti ghātayissāma.
[21] ``mā ^a^V7.0241^ea^ naṃ daṇḍena satthena, na hi so bandhanāraho.
[22] pabbājehi ca naṃ raṭṭhā, vaṅke vasatu pabbate''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^mā naṃ daṇḍena satthenā^eb^ti deva, tumhe taṃ daṇḍena vā satthena vā mā ghātayittha. ^b^na hi so bandhanāraho^eb^ti so bandhanārahopi na hotiyeva.
[21] ``eso ce sivīnaṃ chando, chandaṃ na panudāmase.
[22] imaṃ so vasatu rattiṃ, kāme ca paribhuñjatu..
[22] samaggā sivayo hutvā, raṭṭhā pabbājayantu na''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^vasatū^eb^ti puttadārassa ovādaṃ dadamāno vasatu, ekarattiñcassa okāsaṃ dethāti vadati.

[03] te ``ekarattimattaṃ vasatū''ti rañño vacanaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu. atha rājā ne uyyojetvā puttassa sāsanaṃ pesento kattāraṃ āmantetvā tassa santikaṃ pesesi. so ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā vessantarassa nivesanaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. tamatthaṃ ^a^P6.0492^ea^ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] `sivayo deva te kuddhā, negamā ca samāgatā..
[21] ``uggā ca rājaputtā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā.
[22] kevalo cāpi nigamo, sivayo ca samāgatā..
[22] samaggā sivayo hutvā, raṭṭhā pabbājayanti taṃ'..
[22] `dukkhaṃ te vedayissāmi, mā me kujjhi rathesabha'..
[22] sivayo deva te kuddhā, negamā ca samāgatā..
[21] ``uggā ca rājaputtā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā.
[22] kevalo cāpi nigamo, sivayo ca samāgatā..
[22] samaggā sivayo hutvā, raṭṭhā pabbājayanti ta''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^kumāra^eb^nti mātāpitūnaṃ atthitāya ``kumāro''tveva saṅkhaṃ gataṃ rājānaṃ. ^b^ramamāna^eb^nti attanā dinnadānassa vaṇṇaṃ kathayamānaṃ somanassappattaṃ hutvā nisinnaṃ. ^b^parikiṇṇaṃ amaccehī^eb^ti attanā ^a^V7.0243^ea^ sahajātehi saṭṭhisahassehi amaccehi parivutaṃ samussitasetacchatte rājāsane nisinnaṃ. ^b^vedayissāmī^eb^ti kathayissāmi. ^b^tattha assāsayantu ma^eb^nti tasmiṃ dukkhassāsanārocane kathetuṃ avisahavasena kilantaṃ maṃ, deva, te pādā assāsayantu, vissattho kathehīti maṃ vadathāti adhippāyenevamāha.
[21] ``kismiṃ me sivayo kuddhā, nāhaṃ passāmi dukkaṭaṃ.
[22] taṃ me katte viyācikkha, kasmā pabbājayanti ma''nti..
[21] ``uggā ca rājaputtā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā.
[03] taṃ sutvā mahāsatto somanassappatto hutvā āha --
[21] ``hadayaṃ cakkhumpahaṃ dajjaṃ, kiṃ me bāhirakaṃ dhanaṃ.
[22] hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā, muttā veḷuriyā maṇi..
[22] dadeyyaṃ na vikampeyyaṃ, dāne me ramate mano..
[21] ``kāmaṃ maṃ sivayo sabbe, pabbājentu hanantu vā.
[22] neva dānā viramissaṃ, kāmaṃ chindantu sattadhā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^yācakamāgate^eb^ti yācake āgate taṃ yācakaṃ disvā. ^b^neva dānā viramissa^eb^nti neva dānā viramissāmi.
[03] taṃ sutvā kattā neva raññā dinnaṃ na nāgarehi dinnaṃ attano matiyā eva aparaṃ sāsanaṃ kathento āha --
[21] ``evaṃ taṃ sivayo āhu, negamā ca samāgatā.
[22] yena pabbājitā yanti, tena gacchatu subbato''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0244^ea^ ^b^kontimārāyā^eb^ti kontimārāya nāma nadiyā tīrena. ^b^girimārañjaraṃ patī^eb^ti ārañjaraṃ nāma giriṃ abhimukho hutvā. ^b^yenā^eb^ti yena maggena raṭṭhā pabbājitā rājāno gacchanti, tena subbato vessantaropi gacchatūti evaṃ sivayo kathentīti āha. idaṃ kira so devatādhiggahito hutvā kathesi.

[03] taṃ sutvā bodhisatto ``sādhu dosakārakānaṃ gatamaggena gamissāmi, maṃ kho pana nāgarā na aññena dosena pabbājenti, mayā hatthissa ^a^M7.0259^ea^ dinnattā pabbājenti. evaṃ santepi ahaṃ sattasatakaṃ mahādānaṃ dassāmi, nāgarā me ekadivasaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ okāsaṃ dentu, sve dānaṃ datvā tatiyadivase gamissāmī''ti vatvā āha --
[22] rattindivaṃ me khamatha, yāva dānaṃ dadāmaha''nti..

[03] taṃ sutvā kattā ``sādhu, deva, nāgarānaṃ vakkhāmī''ti vatvā pakkāmi. mahāsatto taṃ uyyojetvā mahāsenaguttaṃ pakkosāpetvā `tāta, ahaṃ sve sattasatakaṃ nāma mahādānaṃ dassāmi, satta hatthisatāni, satta assasatāni, satta rathasatāni, satta itthisatāni, satta dhenusatāni, satta dāsasatāni, satta dāsisatāni ca paṭiyādehi, nānappakārāni ca annapānādīni antamaso surampi sabbaṃ dātabbayuttakaṃ upaṭṭhapehī''ti sattasatakaṃ mahādānaṃ vicāretvā amacce uyyojetvā ekakova maddiyā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sirisayanapiṭṭhe nisīditvā tāya saddhiṃ kathaṃ pavattesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] yaṃ te kiñci mayā dinnaṃ, dhanaṃ dhaññañca vijjati..
[21] ``hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā, muttā veḷuriyā bahū.
[22] sabbaṃ taṃ nidaheyyāsi, yañca te pettikaṃ dhana''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^nidaheyyāsī^eb^ti nidhiṃ katvā ṭhapeyyāsi. ^b^pettika^eb^nti pitito āgataṃ.
[22] kuhiṃ deva nidahāmi, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^tamabravī^eb^ti ``mayhaṃ sāmikena vessantarena ettakaṃ kālaṃ `dhanaṃ nidhehī'ti na vuttapubbaṃ, idāneva vadati, kuhiṃ nu kho nidhetabbaṃ, pucchissāmi na''nti cintetvā taṃ abravi.
[22] na hi dānā paraṃ atthi, patiṭṭhā sabbapāṇina''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^dajjāsī^eb^ti bhadde, maddi koṭṭhādīsu anidahitvā anugāmikanidhiṃ nidahamānā sīlavantesu dadeyyāsi. ^b^na hi dānā para^eb^nti dānato uttaritaraṃ patiṭṭhā nāma na hi atthi.
[03] sā ^a^P6.0495^ea^ ``sādhū''ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchi. atha naṃ uttaripi ovadanto āha --
[22] yo ca taṃ bhattā maññeyya, sakkaccaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhahe..
[21] ``no ce taṃ bhattā maññeyya, mayā vippavasena te.
[22] aññaṃ bhattāraṃ pariyesa, mā kisittho mayā vinā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0246^ea^ ^b^dayesī^eb^ti dayaṃ mettaṃ kareyyāsi. ^b^yo ca taṃ bhattā maññeyyā^eb^ti bhadde, yo ca mayi gate ``ahaṃ te bhattā bhavissāmī''ti taṃ maññissati, tampi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhaheyyāsi. ^b^mayā vippavasena te^eb^ti mayā saddhiṃ tava vippavāsena sace koci ``ahaṃ te bhattā bhavissāmī''ti taṃ na maññeyya, atha sayameva aññaṃ bhattāraṃ pariyesa. ^b^mā kisittho mayā vinā^eb^ti mayā vinā hutvā mā kisā bhavi, mā kilamīti attho.

[03] atha naṃ maddī ``kiṃ nu kho esa evarūpaṃ vacanaṃ maṃ bhaṇatī''ti cintetvā ``kasmā, deva, imaṃ ayuttaṃ kathaṃ kathesī''ti pucchi. mahāsatto ``bhadde, mayā hatthissa dinnattā sivayo kuddhā maṃ raṭṭhā pabbājenti, sve ahaṃ sattasatakaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā tatiyadivase nagarā nikkhamissāmī''ti vatvā āha --
[03] tattha ^b^saṃsayo^eb^ti anekapaccatthike ekakassa sukhumālassa mama vane vasato kuto jīvitaṃ, nicchayena marissāmīti adhippāyenevaṃ āha.
[22] abhumme kathaṃ nu bhaṇasi, pāpakaṃ vata bhāsasi..
[21] ``nesa dhammo mahārāja, yaṃ tvaṃ gaccheyya ekako.
[22] ahampi tena gacchāmi, yena gacchasi khattiya..
[21] ``maraṇaṃ vā tayā saddhiṃ, jīvitaṃ vā tayā vinā.
[22] tadeva maraṇaṃ seyyo, yaṃ ce jīve tayā vinā..
[22] tattha me maraṇaṃ seyyo, yaṃ ce jīve tayā vinā..
[22] subharā te bhavissāmi, na te hessāmi dubbharā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^abhumme^eb^ti abhūtaṃ vata me katheyyāsi. ^b^nesa dhammo^eb^ti na eso sabhāvo, netaṃ kāraṇaṃ. ^b^tadevā^eb^ti tayā saddhiṃ yaṃ maraṇaṃ atthi, tadeva maraṇaṃ seyyo. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ ekajālabhūte dārucitake. ^b^jessanta^eb^nti vicarantaṃ.
[03] evañca pana vatvā sā puna diṭṭhapubbaṃ viya himavantappadesaṃ vaṇṇentī āha --
[22] kīḷante assame ramme, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] kīḷante assame ramme, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] kīḷante assame ramme, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] ekaṃ araññe carantaṃ, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] sāyaṃ pāto vicarantaṃ, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] tassa taṃ nadato sutvā, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] kimpurise ca naccante, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] vane sossasi vāḷānaṃ, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] moraṃ dakkhisi naccantaṃ, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] moraṃ dakkhisi naccantaṃ, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] moraṃ dakkhisi naccantaṃ, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] opupphāni ca paddhāni, na rajjassa sarissasī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^P6.0498^ea^ ^b^mañjuke^eb^ti madhurakathe. ^b^kareṇusaṅghassā^eb^ti hatthinighaṭāya. ^b^yūthassā^eb^ti hatthiyūthassa purato vajanto gacchanto. ^b^dubhato^eb^ti ubhayapassesu. ^b^vanavikāse^eb^ti vanaghaṭāyo. ^b^kāmado^eb^ti mayhaṃ sabbakāmado. ^b^sindhuyā^eb^ti nadiyā. ^b^vassamānassulūkassā^eb^ti ulūkasakuṇassa vassamānassa. ^b^vāḷāna^eb^nti vāḷamigānaṃ. tesañhi sāyanhasamaye so saddo pañcaṅgikatūriyasaddo viya bhavissati, tasmā tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā rajjassa na sarissasīti vadati, ^b^barihīna^eb^nti kalāpasañchannaṃ ^a^V7.0250^ea^. ^b^matthakāsina^eb^nti niccaṃ pabbatamatthake nisinnaṃ. ``mattakāsina''ntipi pāṭho, kāmamadamattaṃ hutvā āsīnanti attho. ^b^bimbajāla^eb^nti rattaṅkurarukkhaṃ. ^b^opupphānī^eb^ti olambakapupphāni patitapupphāni.
[03] evaṃ maddī himavantavāsinī viya ettakāhi gāthāhi himavantaṃ vaṇṇesīti.

[03] phussatīpi ^a^M7.0264^ea^ kho devī ``puttassa me kaṭukasāsanaṃ gataṃ, kiṃ nu kho karoti, gantvā jānissāmī''ti paṭicchannayoggena gantvā sirigabbhadvāre ṭhitā tesaṃ taṃ sallāpaṃ sutvā kalunaṃ paridevi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[27] rajjuyā bajjha miyyāhaṃ, kasmā vessantaraṃ puttaṃ.
[27] hitaṃ sabbassa raṭṭhassa, kasmā vessantaraṃ puttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^rājaputtī^eb^ti phussatī maddarājadhītā. ^b^papateyyaha^eb^nti papateyyaṃ ahaṃ. ^b^rajjuyā bajjha miyyāha^eb^nti rajjuyā gīvaṃ bandhitvā mareyyaṃ ahaṃ. ^b^kasmā^eb^ti evaṃ amatāyameva mayi kena kāraṇena mama puttaṃ adūsakaṃ raṭṭhā pabbājenti. ^b^ajjhāyaka^eb^nti tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṅgataṃ, nānāsippesu ca nipphattiṃ pattaṃ.
[03] iti ^a^P6.0499^ea^ sā kalunaṃ paridevitvā puttañca suṇisañca assāsetvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā āha --
[22] evaṃ hessati te raṭṭhaṃ, pabbājenti adūsakaṃ..
[21] ``taṃ taṃ brūmi mahārāja, attho te mā upaccagā.
[22] mā naṃ sivīnaṃ vacanā, pabbājesi adūsaka''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^palātānī^eb^ti palātamakkhikāni madhūni viya. ^b^ambāva patitā chamā^eb^ti bhūmiyaṃ patitāmbapakkāni viya. evaṃ mama putte pabbājite tava raṭṭhaṃ sabbasādhāraṇaṃ bhavissatīti dīpeti. ^b^nikhīṇapattovā^eb^ti paggharitapatto viya. ^b^apaviddho amaccehī^eb^ti mama puttena sahajātehi saṭṭhisahassehi amaccehi chaḍḍito hutvā. ^b^vihiyyasī^eb^ti kilamissasi. ^b^sivīnaṃ vacanā^eb^ti sivīnaṃ vacanena mā naṃ adūsakaṃ mama puttaṃ pabbājesīti.
[22] pabbājemi sakaṃ puttaṃ, pāṇā piyataro hi me''ti..

[03] tassattho -- bhadde, ahaṃ sivīnaṃ dhajaṃ vessantaraṃ kumāraṃ vinayanto pabbājento siviraṭṭhe porāṇakarājūnaṃ paveṇidhammassa apacitiṃ kummi karomi, tasmā sacepi me pāṇā piyataro so, tathāpi naṃ pabbājemīti.
[21] ``yo pubbe hatthinā yāti, sivikāya rathena ca.
[22] svajja vessantaro rājā, kathaṃ gacchati pattiko..
[22] pavisantaṃ brahāraññaṃ, kasmā cīraṃ na bajjhare..
[22] sā kathajja anujjhaṅgī, pathaṃ gacchati pattikā..
[22] sā kathajja anujjhaṅgī, pathaṃ gacchati pattikā..
[22] sā kathajja anujjhaṅgī, pathaṃ gacchati pattikā..
[22] sā kathajja anujjhaṅgī, vanaṃ gacchati ekikā..
[22] sā kathajja anujjhaṅgī, vanaṃ gacchati bhīrukā..
[22] sā kathajja anujjhaṅgī, vanaṃ gacchati bhīrukā..
[22] ciraṃ dukkhena jhāyissaṃ, suññaṃ āgammimaṃ puraṃ..
[22] kisā paṇḍu bhavissāmi, piye putte apassatī..
[22] tena tena padhāvissaṃ, piye putte apassatī..
[22] ciraṃ dukkhena jhāyissaṃ, suññaṃ āgammimaṃ puraṃ..
[22] kisā paṇḍu bhavissāmi, piye putte apassatī..
[22] tena tena padhāvissaṃ, piye putte apassatī..
[22] ciraṃ dukkhena jhāyissaṃ, suññaṃ āgammimaṃ puraṃ..
[22] kisā paṇḍu bhavissāmi, piye putte apassatī..
[22] tena tena padhāvissaṃ, piye putte apassatī..
[22] pabbājesi vanaṃ raṭṭhā, maññe hissāmi jīvita''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0255^ea^ ^b^kaṇikārāvā^eb^ti suvaṇṇābharaṇasuvaṇṇavatthapaṭimaṇḍitattā supupphitā kaṇikārā viya. ^b^yāyantamanuyāyantī^eb^ti uyyānavanakīḷādīnaṃ atthāya ^a^M7.0268^ea^ gacchantaṃ vessantaraṃ anugacchanti. ^b^svajjekovā^eb^ti so ajja ekova hutvā gamissati. ^b^anīkānī^eb^ti hatthānīkādīni. ^b^gandhārā paṇḍukambalā^eb^ti gandhāraraṭṭhe uppannā satasahassagghanakā senāya pārutā rattakambalā. ^b^hāhitī^eb^ti khandhe katvā harissati. ^b^pavisanta^eb^nti pavisantassa. ^b^kasmā cīraṃ na bajjhare^eb^ti kasmā bandhituṃ jānantā vākacīraṃ na bandhanti. ^b^rājapabbajitā^eb^ti rājāno hutvā pabbajitā. ^b^khomakoṭumbarānī^eb^ti khomaraṭṭhe koṭumbararaṭṭhe uppannāni sāṭakāni.

[03] ^b^sā kathajjā^eb^ti sā kathaṃ ajja. ^b^anujjhaṅgī^eb^ti agarahitāṅgī. ^b^pīḷamānāva gacchatī^eb^ti kampitvā kampitvā tiṭṭhantī viya gacchati. ^b^yāssu itthisahassāna^eb^ntiādīsu ^b^assū^eb^ti nipāto, yāti attho. ``yā sā''tipi pāṭho. ^b^sivāyā^eb^ti siṅgāliyā. ^b^pure^eb^ti pubbe nagare vasantī. ^b^indasagottassā^eb^ti kosiyagottassa. ^b^vāruṇīvā^eb^ti devatāpaviṭṭhā yakkhadāsī viya. ^b^dukkhenā^eb^ti puttaviyogasokadukkhena. ^b^āgammi maṃ pura^eb^nti imaṃ mama putte gate ^a^P6.0502^ea^ puttanivesanaṃ āgantvā. ^b^piye putte^eb^ti vessantarañceva maddiñca sandhāyāha. ^b^hatachāpā^eb^ti hatapotakā. ^b^pabbājesi vanaṃ raṭṭhā^eb^ti yadi naṃ raṭṭhā pabbājesīti.

[03] deviyā paridevitasaddaṃ sutvā sabbā sañjayassa sivikaññā samāgatā pakkandiṃsu. tāsaṃ pakkanditasaddaṃ sutvā mahāsattassapi nivesane tatheva pakkandiṃsu. iti dvīsu rājakulesu keci sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā vātavegena pamadditā sālā viya patitvā parivattamānā parideviṃsu. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] senti puttā ca dārā ca, vessantaranivesane..
[21] ``orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā.
[22] atha vessantaro rājā, dānaṃ dātuṃ upāgami..
[22] dānena taṃ nīharanti, puna dānaṃ adā tuvaṃ..
[21] ``ye vuḍḍhā ye ca daharā, ye ca majjhimaporisā.
[21] ``thiyopi ^a^M7.0270^ea^ tattha pakkanduṃ, yā tamhi nagare ahu.
[21] ``ye brāhmaṇā ye ca samaṇā, aññe vāpi vanibbakā.
[22] bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, `adhammo kira bho' iti..
[22] esa vessantaro rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati..
[22] esa vessantaro rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati..
[22] esa vessantaro rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati..
[22] esa vessantarā rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati..
[22] esa vessantaro rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati..
[22] esa vessantaro rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati..
[22] esa vessantaro rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati..
[22] yaṃ pañjalikato rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sivikaññā^eb^ti bhikkhave, phussatiyā paridevitasaddaṃ sutvā sabbāpi sañjayassa sivirañño itthiyo samāgatā hutvā pakkanduṃ parideviṃsu. ^b^vessantaranivesane^eb^ti tattha itthīnaṃ pakkanditasaddaṃ sutvā vessantarassapi nivesane tatheva pakkanditvā dvīsu rājakulesu keci sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā vātavegena sampamathitā sālā viya patitvā parivattantā parideviṃsu. ^b^tato ratyā vivasāne^eb^ti bhikkhave, tato tassā rattiyā accayena sūriye uggate dānaveyyāvatikā ``dānaṃ paṭiyādita''nti rañño ārocayiṃsu. atha vessantaro rājā pātova nhatvā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito sādurasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā mahājanaparivuto sattasatakaṃ mahādānaṃ dātuṃ dānaggaṃ upāgami.

[03] ^b^dethā^eb^ti ^a^V7.0259^ea^ tattha gantvā saṭṭhisahassāmacce āṇāpento evamāha. ^b^vāruṇi^eb^nti ``majjadānaṃ nāma nipphala''nti jānāti, evaṃ santepi ``surāsoṇḍā dānaggaṃ patvā `vessantarassa dānagge suraṃ na labhimhā'ti vattuṃ mā labhantū''ti dāpesi. ^b^vanibbake^eb^ti vanibbakajanesu kañci ekampi mā viheṭhayittha. ^b^paṭipūjitā^eb^ti mayā pūjitā hutvā yathā maṃ thomayamānā gacchanti ^a^P6.0504^ea^, tathā tumhe karothāti vadati.

[03] iti so suvaṇṇālaṅkārānaṃ suvaṇṇadhajānaṃ hemajālappaṭicchannānaṃ hatthīnaṃ sattasatāni ca, tathārūpānaññeva assānaṃ sattasatāni ca, sīhacammādīhi parikkhittānaṃ nānāratanavicitrānaṃ suvaṇṇadhajānaṃ rathānaṃ sattasatāni, sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍitānaṃ uttamarūpadharānaṃ khattiyakaññādīnaṃ itthīnaṃ sattasatāni, suvinītānaṃ susikkhitānaṃ dāsānaṃ sattasatāni, tathā ^a^M7.0272^ea^ dāsīnaṃ sattasatāni, varausabhajeṭṭhakānaṃ kuṇḍopadohinīnaṃ dhenūnaṃ sattasatāni, aparimāṇāni pānabhojanānīti sattasatakaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi. tasmiṃ evaṃ dānaṃ dadamāne jetuttaranagaravāsino khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddādayo ``sāmi, vessantara siviraṭṭhavāsino taṃ `dānaṃ detī'ti pabbājenti, tvaṃ puna dānameva desī''ti parideviṃsu. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] dānena taṃ nīharanti, puna dānaṃ adā tuva''nti..

[03] dānapaṭiggāhakā pana dānaṃ gahetvā ``idāni kira vessantaro rājā amhe anāthe katvā araññaṃ pavisissati, ito paṭṭhāya kassa santikaṃ gamissāmā''ti chinnapādā viya patantā āvattantā parivattantā mahāsaddena parideviṃsu. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] tattha ^b^te su mattā^eb^ti ^b^su^eb^-kāro nipātamatto, te vanibbakāti attho. ^b^mattā kilantāvā^eb^ti mattā viya kilantā viya ca hutvā. ^b^sampatantī^eb^ti parivattitvā bhūmiyaṃ patanti. ^b^acchecchuṃ vatā^eb^ti chindiṃsu, ^b^vatā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^yathā^eb^ti yena kāraṇena. ^b^atiyakkhā^eb^ti bhūtavijjā ikkhaṇikāpi. ^b^vassavarā^eb^ti uddhaṭabījā orodhapālakā. ^b^vacanatthenā^eb^ti vacanakāraṇena. ^b^samhā raṭṭhā nirajjatī^eb^ti attano raṭṭhā niggacchati. ^b^gāmaṇīyehī^eb^ti hatthācariyehi. ^b^ājānīyevā^eb^ti jātisampanne ^a^V7.0260^ea^. ^b^gāmaṇīyehī^eb^ti assācariyehi. ^b^illiyācāpadhāribhī^eb^ti illiyañca cāpañca dhārentehi. ^b^dīpe athopi veyyagghe^eb^ti dīpicammabyagghacammaparikkhitte. ^b^ekamekā rathe ṭhitā^eb^ti so kira ekamekaṃ itthiratanaṃ rathe ṭhapetvā aṭṭhāṭṭhavaṇṇadāsīhi parivutaṃ katvā adāsi.

[03] ^b^nikkharajjūhī^eb^ti suvaṇṇasuttamayehi pāmaṅgehi. ^b^āḷārapamhā^eb^ti visālakkhigaṇḍā. ^b^hasulā^eb^ti mhitapubbaṅgamakathā. ^b^susaññā^eb^ti sussoṇiyo. ^b^tanumajjhimā^eb^ti ^a^M7.0273^ea^ karatalamiva tanumajjhimabhāgā. tadā pana devatāyo jambudīpatale rājūnaṃ ``vessantaro rājā mahādānaṃ detī''ti ārocayiṃsu, tasmā te khattiyā devatānubhāvenāgantvā tā gaṇhitvā pakkamiṃsu. ^b^kaṃsupadhāraṇā^eb^ti idha ^b^kaṃsa^eb^nti rajatassa nāmaṃ, rajatamayena khīrapaṭicchanabhājanena saddhiññeva adāsīti attho. ^b^padinnamhī^eb^ti dīyamāne. ^b^sampakampathā^eb^ti dānatejena kampittha. ^b^yaṃ pañjalikato^eb^ti yaṃ so vessantaro rājā mahādānaṃ datvā añjaliṃ paggayha attano dānaṃ namassamāno ``sabbaññutaññāṇassa me idaṃ paccayo hotū''ti pañjalikato ahosi, tadāpi bhīsanakameva ahosi, tasmiṃ khaṇe pathavī kampitthāti attho. ^b^nirajjatī^eb^ti evaṃ katvā niggacchatiyeva, na koci naṃ nivāretīti attho.

[03] apica ^a^P6.0505^ea^ kho tassa dānaṃ dadantasseva sāyaṃ ahosi. so attano nivesanameva gantvā ``mātāpitaro vanditvā sve gamissāmī''ti cintetvā alaṅkatarathena mātāpitūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato. maddīdevīpi ``ahaṃ sāminā saddhiṃ gantvā mātāpitaro anujānāpessāmī''ti teneva saddhiṃ gatā. mahāsatto pitaraṃ vanditvā attano gamanabhāvaṃ kathesi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] avaruddhasi maṃ deva, vaṅkaṃ gacchāmi pabbataṃ..
[21] ``ye hi keci mahārāja, bhūtā ye ca bhavissare.

[03] tattha ^b^dhamminaṃ vara^eb^nti dhammikarājūnaṃ antare uttamaṃ. ^b^avaruddhasī^eb^ti raṭṭhā nīharasi. ^b^bhūtā^eb^ti atītā. ^b^bhavissare^eb^ti ye ca anāgate bhavissanti ^a^M7.0274^ea^, paccuppanne ca nibbattā. ^b^yamasādhana^eb^nti yamarañño āṇāpavattiṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^svāhaṃ sake abhissasi^eb^nti so ahaṃ attano nagaravāsinoyeva pīḷesiṃ. kiṃ karonto? ^b^yajamāno sake pure^eb^ti. pāḷiyaṃ pana ``so aha''nti likhitaṃ. ^b^nirajjaha^eb^nti nikkhanto ahaṃ. ^b^aghaṃ ta^eb^nti yaṃ araññe vasantena paṭisevitabbaṃ dukkhaṃ, taṃ paṭisevissāmi. ^b^paṅkamhī^eb^ti tumhe pana kāmapaṅkamhi sīdathāti vadati.
[03] iti mahāsatto imāhi catūhi gāthāhi pitarā saddhiṃ kathetvā mātu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā pabbajjaṃ anujānāpento evamāha --
[27] svāhaṃ sake abhissasiṃ, yajamāno sake pure.
[03] acchataṃ saha puttehi, kiṃ araññe karissatī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^samijjhatū^eb^ti jhānena samiddhā hotu. ^b^acchata^eb^nti acchatu, idheva hotūti vadati.
[22] sace icchati anvetu, sace nicchati acchatū''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^akāmā^eb^ti amma, kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathetha, ahaṃ anicchāya dāsimpi netuṃ na ussahāmīti.
[03] tato puttassa kathaṃ sutvā rājā suṇhaṃ yācituṃ paṭipajji. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] dukkho vāso araññasmiṃ, mā hi tvaṃ lakkhaṇe gamī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^paṭipajjathā^eb^ti bhikkhave, puttassa kathaṃ sutvā rājā suṇhaṃ yācituṃ paṭipajji. ^b^candanasamācāre^eb^ti lohitacandanena parikiṇṇasarīre. ^b^mā hi tvaṃ lakkhaṇe gamī^eb^ti subhalakkhaṇena samannāgate mā tvaṃ araññaṃ gamīti.
[22] nāhaṃ taṃ sukhamiccheyyaṃ, yaṃ me vessantaraṃ vinā''ti..
[22] iṅgha maddi nisāmehi, vane ye honti dussahā..
[22] tepi taṃ tattha hiṃ seyyuṃ, taṃ te dukkhataraṃ siyā..
[22] sappā ajagarā nāma, avisā te mahabbalā..
[22] na tehi puriso diṭṭho, rukkhamāruyha muccati..
[21] ``yā tvaṃ sivāya sutvāna, muhuṃ uttasayī pure.
[22] sā tvaṃ vaṅkamanuppattā, kathaṃ maddi karissasi..

[03] tattha ^b^tamabravī^eb^ti taṃ suṇhaṃ abravi. ^b^apare passa santāpe^eb^ti aññepi santāpe bhayajanake pekkha. ^b^nadīnupanisevite^eb^ti nadīnaṃ upanisevite āsannaṭṭhāne, nadīkūle vasanteti attho. ^b^avisā^eb^ti nibbisā. ^b^api māsanna^eb^nti āsannaṃ attano sarīrasamphassaṃ āgatanti attho. ^b^aghammigā^eb^ti ^a^V7.0264^ea^ aghakarā migā, dukkhāvahā migāti attho. ^b^nadiṃ sotumbaraṃ patī^eb^ti sotumbarāya nāma nadiyā tīre. ^b^yūthāna^eb^nti yūthāni, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^dhenuva vacchagiddhāvā^eb^ti tava dārake apassantī vacchagiddhā dhenu viya kathaṃ karissasi. ^b^va^eb^-kāro panettha nipātamattova. ^b^sampatite^eb^ti sampatante. ^b^ghore^eb^ti bhīsanake virūpe. ^b^plavaṅgame^eb^ti makkaṭe. ^b^akhettaññāyā^eb^ti araññabhūmiakusalatāya. ^b^bhavissate^eb^ti bhavissati. ^b^sivāya sutvānā^eb^ti siṅgāliyā saddaṃ sutvā. ^b^muhu^eb^nti punappunaṃ. ^b^uttasayī^eb^ti uttasasi. ^b^saṇatevā^eb^ti nadati viya saṇantaṃ viya bhavissati.
[27] yāni etāni akkhāsi, vane paṭibhayāni me.
[27] yo naṃ hatthe gahetvāna, akāmaṃ parikaḍḍhati.
[27] datvā ca no pakkamati, bahuṃ dukkhaṃ anappakaṃ.
[27] itthīpi vidhavā naggā, yassāpi dasa bhātaro.
[22] taṃ ve devā pasaṃsanti, dukkarañhi karoti sā..
[21] ``kathaṃ ^a^M7.0278^ea^ nu tāsaṃ hadayaṃ, sukharā vata itthiyo.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0266^ea^ ^b^tamabravī^eb^ti bhikkhave, maddī rañño vacanaṃ sutvā taṃ rājānaṃ abravi. ^b^abhisambhossa^eb^nti sahissāmi adhivāsessāmi. ^b^poṭakila^eb^nti poṭakilatiṇaṃ. ^b^panudahissāmī^eb^ti dvedhā katvā vessantarassa purato gamissāmi. ^b^udarassuparodhenā^eb^ti upavāsena khudādhivāsena. ^b^gohanuveṭhanena cā^eb^ti visālakaṭiyo onatapassā ca itthiyo sāmikaṃ labhantīti ^a^P6.0509^ea^ katvā gohanunā kaṭiphalakaṃ koṭṭāpetvā veṭhanena ca passāni onāmetvā kumārikā patiṃ labhati. ^b^kaṭuka^eb^nti asātaṃ. ^b^gacchaññevā^eb^ti gamissāmiyeva.

[03] ^b^apissā hoti appatto^eb^ti tassā vidhavāya ucchiṭṭhakampi bhuñjituṃ ananucchavikova. ^b^yo na^eb^nti yo nīcajacco taṃ vidhavaṃ anicchamānaññeva hatthe gahetvā kaḍḍhati. ^b^kesaggahaṇamukkhepā, bhūmyā ca parisumbhanā^eb^ti asāmikaṃ itthiṃ hatthapādehi kesaggahaṇaṃ, ukkhepā, bhūmiyaṃ pātananti etāni avamaññanāni katvā atikkamanti. ^b^datvā cā^eb^ti asāmikāya itthiyā evarūpaṃ bahuṃ anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ parapuriso datvā ca ^b^no pakkamati^eb^ nirāsaṅko olokentova tiṭṭhati.

[03] ^b^sukkacchavī^eb^ti nhānīyacuṇṇena uṭṭhāpitacchavivaṇṇā. ^b^vedhaverā^eb^ti vidhavitthikāmā purisā. ^b^datvā^eb^ti kiñcideva appamattakaṃ dhanaṃ datvā. ^b^subhagamānino^eb^ti mayaṃ subhagāti maññamānā. ^b^akāma^eb^nti taṃ vidhavaṃ asāmikaṃ akāmaṃ. ^b^ulūkaññeva vāyasā^eb^ti kākā viyaulūkaṃ parikaḍḍhanti. ^b^kaṃsapajjotane^eb^ti suvaṇṇabhājanābhāya pajjotante. ^b^vasa^eb^nti evarūpepi ñātikule vasamānā. ^b^nevātivākyaṃ na labhe^eb^ti ``ayaṃ itthī nissāmikā, yāvajīvaṃ amhākaññeva bhāro jāto''tiādīni vacanāni vadantehi bhātūhipi sakhinīhipi ativākyaṃ garahavacanaṃ neva na labhati. ^b^paññāṇa^eb^nti pākaṭabhāvakāraṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^M7.0279^ea^ ^b^daliddī daliddassā^eb^ti deva, kittisampannā yā itthī attano sāmikassa daliddassa dukkhappattakāle sayampi daliddī samānā dukkhāva hoti, tassa aḍḍhakāle teneva saddhiṃ aḍḍhā sukhappattā hoti, taṃ ve devā pasaṃsanti. abhijjantyāti abhijjantiyā. sacepi hi itthiyā sakalapathavī na bhijjati, tāya sakalāya pathaviyā sāva issarā hoti, tathāpi vedhabyaṃ kaṭukamevāti attho. sukharā vata itthiyoti suṭṭhu kharā vata itthiyo.
[27] ime te daharā puttā, jālī kaṇhājinā cubho.
[22] nikkhippa lakkhaṇe gaccha, mayaṃ te posayāmase''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^jālī kaṇhājinā cubho^eb^ti jālī ca kaṇhājinā cāti ubho. ^b^nikkhippā^eb^ti ime nikkhipitvā gacchāhīti.
[27] piyā me puttakā deva, jālī kaṇhājinā cubho.
[03] tattha ^b^tyamha^eb^nti te dārakā amhākaṃ tattha araññe. ^b^jīvasokina^eb^nti avigatasokānaṃ hadayaṃ ramayissantīti attho.
[22] phuṭṭhā ḍaṃsehi makasehi, kathaṃ kāhanti dārakā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^palasate kaṃse^eb^ti palasatena katāya kañcanapātiyā. ^b^gonake cittasanthate^eb^ti mahāpiṭṭhiyaṃ kāḷakojave ceva vicittake santhare ca. ^b^cāmaramorahatthehī^eb^ti cāmarehi ceva morahatthehi ca bījitaṅgā.

[03] evaṃ tesaṃ sallapantānaññeva ratti vibhāyi, sūriyo uggañchi. mahāsattassa catusindhavayuttaṃ alaṅkatarathaṃ ānetvā rājadvāre ṭhapayiṃsu. maddīpi sassusasure vanditvā sesitthiyo apaloketvā dve putte ādāya vessantarato paṭhamataraṃ gantvā rathe aṭṭhāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[27] mā deva paridevesi, mā ca tvaṃ vimano ahu.
[22] yathā mayaṃ bhavissāma, tathā hessanti dārakā..
[03] tattha ^b^sivimaggenā^eb^ti sivirañño gantabbamaggena. ^b^anvesī^eb^ti taṃ agamāsi, pāsādā otaritvā rathaṃ abhiruhīti attho.
[22] pitu mātu ca vanditvā, katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ..
[03] tattha ^b^tato^eb^ti bhikkhave, tassā maddiyā rathaṃ abhiruhitvā ṭhitakāle. ^b^datvā^eb^ti hiyyo dānaṃ datvā. ^b^katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇa^eb^nti padakkhiṇañca katvā. ^b^na^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ.
[22] āmanta kho taṃ gacchāma, arogā hontu ñātayo''ti..

[03] tassattho -- bhikkhave, tato vessantaro rājā yattha ``vessantaraṃ rājānaṃ passissāmā''ti bahuko jano ṭhito āsi, tattha rathaṃ pesetvā mahājanaṃ āpucchanto ``āmanta kho taṃ gacchāma, arogā hontu ñātayo''ti āha. tattha ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. bhikkhave, tato vessantaro rājā ñātake āha -- ``tumhe āmantetvā mayaṃ gacchāma, tumhe sukhitā hotha nidukkhā''ti.

[03] evaṃ mahāsatto mahājanaṃ āmantetvā ``appamattā hotha, dānādīni puññāni karothā''ti tesaṃ ovaditvā pakkāmi. gacchante pana bodhisatte mātā ``putto me dānavittako dānaṃ detū''ti ābharaṇehi saddhiṃ sattaratanapūrāni sakaṭāni ubhosu passesu pesesi. sopi attano kāyāruḷhameva ābharaṇabhaṇḍaṃ omuñcitvā sampattayācakānaṃ aṭṭhārasa vāre datvā avasesaṃ sabbaṃ adāsi. so nagarā nikkhamitvā ca nivattitvā oloketukāmo ahosi. athassa manaṃ paṭicca rathappamāṇaṭṭhāne mahāpathavī bhijjitvā kulālacakkaṃ viya parivattitvā rathaṃ nagarābhimukhaṃ akāsi. so mātāpitūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ olokesi. tena kāraṇena pathavīkampo ahosi. tena vuttaṃ --
[03] sayaṃ ^a^M7.0282^ea^ pana oloketvā maddimpi olokāpetuṃ gāthamāha --

[03] atha ^a^P6.0512^ea^ mahāsatto sahajāte saṭṭhisahassāmacce ca sesajanañca nivattāpetvā rathaṃ pājento maddiṃ āha -- ``bhadde, sace pacchato yācakā āgacchanti, upadhāreyyāsī''ti. sāpi olokentī nisīdi. athassa sattasatakaṃ mahādānaṃ sampāpuṇituṃ asakkontā cattāro brāhmaṇā nagaraṃ āgantvā ``kuhiṃ vessantaro rājā''ti pucchitvā ``dānaṃ datvā gato''ti vutte ``kiñci gahetvā gato''ti pucchitvā ``rathena gato''ti sutvā ``asse naṃ yācissāmā''ti anubandhiṃsu. atha maddī te āgacchante disvā ``yācakā āgacchanti, devā''ti ārocesi. mahāsatto rathaṃ ṭhapesi. te āgantvā asse yāciṃsu. mahāsatto asse adāsi. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``taṃ brāhmaṇā anvagamuṃ, te naṃ asse ayācisuṃ.

[03] assesu pana dinnesu rathadhuraṃ ākāseyeva aṭṭhāsi. atha brāhmaṇesu gatamattesuyeva cattāro devaputtā rohiccamigavaṇṇena āgantvā rathadhuraṃ sampaṭicchitvā agamaṃsu. mahāsatto tesaṃ devaputtabhāvaṃ ñatvā imaṃ gāthamāha --
[03] tattha ^b^dakkhiṇassā^eb^ti susikkhitā assā viya maṃ vahanti.

[03] atha naṃ evaṃ gacchantaṃ aparo brāhmaṇo āgantvā rathaṃ yāci. mahāsatto puttadāraṃ otāretvā tassa rathaṃ adāsi. rathe pana dinne devaputtā antaradhāyiṃsu. rathassa dinnabhāvaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[22] tassa taṃ yācitodāsi, na cassupahato mano..
[03] tattha ^b^athetthā^eb^ti atha tasmiṃ vane. ^b^na cassupahato mano^eb^ti na cassa mano olīno. ^b^assāsayī^eb^ti paritosento niyyādesi.
[03] tato ^a^P6.0513^ea^ paṭṭhāya pana te sabbepi pattikāva ahesuṃ. atha mahāsatto maddiṃ avoca --
[21] ``tvaṃ maddi kaṇhaṃ gaṇhāhi, lahu esā kaniṭṭhikā.
[22] ahaṃ jāliṃ gahessāmi, garuko bhātiko hi so''ti..
[03] evañca pana vatvā ubhopi khattiyā dve dārake aṅkenādāya pakkamiṃsu. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[03] te paṭipathaṃ āgacchante manusse disvā ``kuhiṃ vaṅkapabbato''ti pucchanti. manussā ``dūre''ti vadanti. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] maggassa ubhosu passesu vividhaphaladhārino rukkhe disvā dārakā kandanti. mahāsattassānubhāvena phaladhārino rukkhā onamitvā hatthasamphassaṃ ^a^M7.0284^ea^ āgacchanti. tato supakkaphalāphalāni uccinitvā tesaṃ deti. taṃ disvā maddī acchariyaṃ pavedesi. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] jetuttaranagarato ^a^P6.0514^ea^ suvaṇṇagiritālo nāma pabbato pañca yojanāni, tato kontimārā nāma nadī pañca yojanāni, tato añcaragiri nāma pabbato pañca yojanāni, tato dunniviṭṭhabrāhmaṇagāmo nāma pañca yojanāni, tato mātulanagaraṃ dasa yojanāni. iti taṃ maggaṃ jetuttaranagarato tiṃsayojanaṃ hoti. devatā taṃ maggaṃ saṃkhipiṃsu. te ekadivaseneva mātulanagaraṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. tena vuttaṃ --
[03] upagacchantā ^a^V7.0273^ea^ ca pana jetuttaranagarato pātarāsasamaye nikkhamitvā sāyanhasamaye cetaraṭṭhe mātulanagaraṃ pattā. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] tadā mātulanagare saṭṭhi khattiyasahassāni vasanti. mahāsatto antonagaraṃ apavisitvā nagaradvāreyeva sālāyaṃ nisīdi. athassa maddī ^a^M7.0285^ea^ bodhisattassa pādesu rajaṃ puñchitvā pāde sambāhitvā ``vessantarassa āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpessāmī''ti sālāto nikkhamitvā tassa cakkhupathe sālādvāre aṭṭhāsi. nagaraṃ pavisantiyo ca nikkhamantiyo ca itthiyo taṃ disvā parivāresuṃ. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --

[03] tattha ^b^lakkhaṇamāgata^eb^nti lakkhaṇasampannaṃ maddiṃ āgataṃ. ^b^paridhāvatī^eb^ti evaṃ sukhumālī hutvā pattikāva vicarati. ^b^pariyāyitvā^eb^ti jetuttaranagare vicaritvā. ^b^sivikāyā^eb^ti suvaṇṇasivikāya.

[03] mahājano ^a^P6.0515^ea^ maddiñca vessantarañca dve putte cassa anāthāgamanena āgate disvā gantvā rājūnaṃ ācikkhi. saṭṭhisahassā rājāno rodantā paridevantā tassa santikaṃ āgamaṃsu. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[27] kacci nu deva kusalaṃ, kacci deva anāmayaṃ.
[22] kacci pitā arogo te, sivīnañca anāmayaṃ..
[21] ``ko ^a^V7.0274^ea^ te balaṃ mahārāja, ko nu te rathamaṇḍalaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^disvā^eb^ti dūratova passitvā. ^b^cetapāmokkhā^eb^ti cetarājāno. ^b^upāgamu^eb^nti upasaṅkamiṃsu. ^b^kusala^eb^nti ārogyaṃ. ^b^anāmaya^eb^nti niddukkhabhāvaṃ. ^b^ko te bala^eb^nti kuhiṃ tava balakāyo. ^b^rathamaṇḍala^eb^nti yenāsi rathena āgato, so kuhinti pucchanti. ^b^anassako^eb^ti assavirahito. ^b^arathako^eb^ti ayānako. ^b^dīghamaddhānamāgato^eb^ti dīghamaggaṃ āgato. ^b^pakato^eb^ti abhibhūto.
[03] atha ^a^M7.0286^ea^ nesaṃ mahāsatto attano āgatakāraṇaṃ kathento āha --
[22] atho pitā arogo me, sivīnañca anāmayaṃ..
[27] avaruddhasi maṃ rājā, vaṅkaṃ gacchāmi pabbataṃ.
[22] okāsaṃ sammā jānātha, vane yattha vasāmase''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^tasmiṃ me^eb^ti tasmiṃ kāraṇe mayhaṃ sivayo kuddhā. ^b^upahatomano^eb^ti upahatacitto kuddhova ^a^V7.0275^ea^ maṃ raṭṭhā pabbājesi. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ vane mayaṃ vaseyyāma, tattha vasanokāsaṃ jānāthāti.
[03] tattha ^b^pavedayā^eb^ti kathehi, sabbaṃ paṭiyādetvā dassāma. ^b^bhisa^eb^nti bhisamūlaṃ, yaṃkiñci kandajātaṃ vā.
[27] avaruddhasi maṃ rājā, vaṅkaṃ gacchāmi pabbataṃ.
[22] okāsaṃ sammā jānātha, vane yattha vasāmase''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0287^ea^ ^b^paṭiggahita^eb^nti sabbametaṃ tumhehi dinnaṃ mayā ca paṭiggahitameva hotu, sabbassa tumhehi mayhaṃ agghiyaṃ nivedanaṃ kataṃ. rājā pana maṃ avaruddhasi raṭṭhā pabbājesi, tasmā vaṅkameva gamissāmi, tasmiṃ me araññe vasanaṭṭhānaṃ jānāthāti.
[22] yāva cetā gamissanti, rañño santika yācituṃ..
[27] taṃ taṃ cetā purakkhatvā, patītā laddhapaccayā.

[03] tattha ^b^rañño santika yācitu^eb^nti rañño santikaṃ yācanatthāya gamissanti. ^b^nijjhāpetu^eb^nti tumhākaṃ niddosabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ. ^b^laddhapaccayā^eb^ti laddhapatiṭṭhā. ^b^gacchantī^eb^ti gamissanti.
[21] ``mā vo ruccittha gamanaṃ, rañño santika yācituṃ.
[21] ``accuggatā hi sivayo, balaggā negamā ca ye.

[03] tattha ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ mama niddosabhāvaṃ nijjhāpane rājāpi anissaro. ^b^accuggatā^eb^ti atikuddhā. ^b^balaggā^eb^ti balakāyā. ^b^vidhaṃsetu^eb^nti rajjato nīharituṃ. ^b^rājāna^eb^nti rājānampi.
[22] matiṃ karohi tvaṃ deva, rajjassa manusāsitu''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^M7.0288^ea^ ^b^sace esā pavattetthā^eb^ti sace etasmiṃ raṭṭhe esā pavatti. ^b^rajjassa manusāsitu^eb^nti rajjaṃ samanusāsituṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho.
[21] ``na ^a^V7.0277^ea^ me chando mati atthi, rajjassa anusāsituṃ.
[21] ``atuṭṭhā sivayo āsuṃ, balaggā negamā ca ye.
[22] sivīhi bhaṇḍanaṃ cāpi, viggaho me na ruccati..
[22] ekassa kāraṇā mayhaṃ, hiṃseyya bahuko jano..
[27] avaruddhasi maṃ rājā, vaṅkaṃ gacchāmi pabbataṃ.
[22] okāsaṃ sammā jānātha, vane yattha vasāmase''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^cetā rajjebhisecayu^eb^nti cetaraṭṭhavāsino kira vessantaraṃ rajje abhisiñciṃsūti tumhākampi te atuṭṭhā āsuṃ. ^b^asammodiya^eb^nti asāmaggiyaṃ. ^b^assā^eb^ti bhaveyya. ^b^athassā^eb^ti atha mayhaṃ ekassa kāraṇā tumhākaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ bhavissatīti.

[03] evaṃ mahāsatto anekapariyāyena yācitopi rajjaṃ na icchi. athassa te cetarājāno mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kariṃsu. so nagaraṃ pavisituṃ na icchi. atha naṃ sālameva alaṅkaritvā sāṇiyā parikkhepaṃ katvā mahāsayanaṃ paññāpetvā sabbe ārakkhaṃ kariṃsu. so ekarattiṃ tehi saṅgahitārakkho sālāyaṃ sayitvā punadivase pātova nhatvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā tehi parivuto nikkhami. saṭṭhisahassā khattiyā tena saddhiṃ pannarasayojanamaggaṃ gantvā ^a^P6.0518^ea^ vanadvāre ṭhatvā purato pannarasayojanamaggaṃ ācikkhantā āhaṃsu --
[22] yattha tvaṃ saha puttehi, saha bhariyāya cacchasi..
[22] tattha nhatvā pivitvā ca, assāsetvā saputtake..

[03] tattha ^b^rājisī^eb^ti rājāno hutvā pabbajitā. ^b^samāhitā^eb^ti ekaggacittā. ^b^esā^eb^ti dakkhiṇahatthaṃ ukkhipitvā iminā pabbatapādena gacchathāti ācikkhantā vadanti. ^b^acchasī^eb^ti ^a^P6.0519^ea^ vasissasi. ^b^āpaga^eb^nti udakavāhanadiāvaṭṭaṃ. ^b^girigabbhara^eb^nti girīnaṃ kucchito pavattaṃ. ^b^madhupipphala^eb^nti madhuraphalaṃ. ^b^rammake^eb^ti ramaṇīye. ^b^kimpurisāyuta^eb^nti kimpurisehi āyutaṃ parikiṇṇaṃ. ^b^setasogandhīkehi cā^eb^ti nānappakārehi setuppalehi ceva sogandhikehi ca sañchanno. ^b^sīhovāmisapekkhīvā^eb^ti āmisaṃ pekkhanto sīho viya.

[03] ^b^bindussarā^eb^ti sampiṇḍitassarā. ^b^vaggū^eb^ti madhurassarā. ^b^kūjantamupakūjantī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ kūjamānaṃ pakkhiṃ pacchā upakūjanti. ^b^utusaṃpupphite dume^eb^ti utusamaye pupphite dume nilīyitvā kūjantaṃ upakūjanti. ^b^so dakkhisī^eb^ti so tvaṃ passissasīti attho. ^b^karañjakakudhāyuta^eb^nti karañjarukkhehi ca kakudharukkhehi ca samparikiṇṇaṃ. ^b^appaṭigandhiya^eb^nti paṭikūlagandhavirahitaṃ madhurodakaparikiṇṇaṃnānappakārapadumuppalādīhi sañchannaṃ. ^b^paṇṇasālaṃ amāpayā^eb^ti paṇṇasālaṃ māpeyyāsi. ^b^amāpetvā^eb^ti māpetvā. ^b^uñchācariyāya īhathā^eb^ti atha tumhe, deva, uñchācariyāya yāpentā appamattā īhatha, āraddhavīriyā hutvā vihareyyāthāti attho.

[01] evaṃ te rājāno tassa pannarasayojanamaggaṃ ācikkhitvā taṃ uyyojetvā vessantarassa antarāyabhayassa vinodanatthaṃ ``mā kocideva paccāmitto okāsaṃ labheyyā''ti cintetvā ekaṃ byattaṃ susikkhitaṃ cetaputtaṃ āmantetvā ``tvaṃ gacchante ca āgacchante ca pariggaṇhāhī''ti vanadvāre ārakkhaṇatthāya ṭhapetvā sakanagaraṃ gamiṃsu. vessantaropi saputtadāro gandhamādanapabbataṃ patvā, taṃ divasaṃ tattha vasitvā tato uttarābhimukho vepullapabbatapādena gantvā, ketumatiyā nāma nadiyā tīre nisīditvā vanacarakena dinnaṃ madhumaṃsaṃ khāditvā tassa suvaṇṇasūciṃ datvā ^a^M7.0291^ea^ tattha ^a^V7.0280^ea^ nhatvā pivitvā paṭippassaddhadaratho nadito uttaritvā sānupabbatasikhare ṭhitassa nigrodhassa mūle thokaṃ nisīditvā nigrodhaphalāni khāditvā uṭṭhāya gacchanto nāḷikaṃ nāma pabbataṃ patvā taṃ pariharanto mucalindasaraṃ gantvā sarassa tīrena pubbuttarakaṇṇaṃ patvā, ekapadikamaggena vanaghaṭaṃ pavisitvā taṃ atikkamma girividuggānaṃ nadippabhavānaṃ purato caturaṃsapokkharaṇiṃ pāpuṇi.

[01] tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko āvajjento ``mahāsatto himavantaṃ paviṭṭho''ti ñatvā ``tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti cintetvā vissakammaṃ ^a^P6.0520^ea^ pakkosāpetvā ``gaccha, tāta, tvaṃ vaṅkapabbatakujhacchimhi ramaṇīye ṭhāne assamapadaṃ māpetvā ehī''ti pesesi. so ``sādhu, devā''ti devalokato otaritvā tattha dve paṇṇasālāyo dve caṅkame rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni ca māpetvā caṅkamakoṭiyaṃ tesu tesu ṭhānesu nānāphaladhare rukkhe ca kadalivanāni ca dassetvā sabbe pabbajitaparikkhāre paṭiyādetvā ``ye keci pabbajitukāmā, te ime gaṇhantū''ti akkharāni likhitvā amanusse ca bheravasadde migapakkhino ca paṭikkamāpetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.

[03] mahāsatto ekapadikamaggaṃ disvā ``pabbajitānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī''ti maddiñca putte ca assamapadadvāre ṭhapetvā assamapadaṃ pavisitvā akkharāni oloketvā ``sakkenamhi diṭṭho''ti ñatvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā khaggañca dhanuñca apanetvā sāṭake omuñcitvā rattavākacīraṃ nivāsetvā ajinacammaṃ aṃse katvā jaṭāmaṇḍalaṃ bandhitvā isivesaṃ gahetvā kattaradaṇḍaṃ ādāya paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā pabbajitasiriṃ samubbahanto ``aho sukhaṃ, aho sukhaṃ, pabbajjā me adhigatā''ti udānaṃ udānetvā caṅkamaṃ āruyha aparāparaṃ caṅkamitvā paccekabuddhasadisena upasamena puttadārānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. maddīpi mahāsattassa pādesu patitvā roditvā teneva saddhiṃ assamapadaṃ pavisitvā attano paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā isivesaṃ gaṇhi. pacchā puttepi tāpasakumārake kariṃsu. cattāro khattiyā vaṅkapabbatakucchimhi vasiṃsu. atha maddī mahāsattaṃ varaṃ yāci ``deva, tumhe phalāphalatthāya vanaṃ agantvā putte gahetvā idheva hotha, ahaṃ phalāphalaṃ āharissāmī''ti. tato paṭṭhāya sā araññato phalāphalāni āharitvā tayo jane paṭijaggati.

[03] bodhisattopi ^a^M7.0292^ea^ taṃ varaṃ yāci ``bhadde, maddi mayaṃ ito paṭṭhāya pabbajitā nāma, itthī ca nāma brahmacariyassa malaṃ, ito paṭṭhāya akāle mama santikaṃ mā āgacchāhī''ti. sā ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchi. mahāsattassa mettānubhāvena samantā tiyojane sabbe tiracchānāpi aññamaññaṃ ^a^V7.0281^ea^ mettacittaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu. maddīdevīpi pātova uṭṭhāya pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā mukhodakaṃ āharitvā dantakaṭṭhaṃ datvā assamapadaṃ sammajjitvā dve putte pitu santike ṭhapetvā pacchikhaṇittiaṅkusahatthā araññaṃ ^a^P6.0521^ea^ pavisitvā vanamūlaphalāphalāni ādāya pacchiṃ pūretvā sāyanhasamaye araññato āgantvā paṇṇasālāya phalāphalaṃ ṭhapetvā nhatvā putte nhāpesi. atha cattāropi janā paṇṇasālādvāre nisīditvā phalāphalaṃ paribhuñjanti. tato maddī putte gahetvā attano paṇṇasālaṃ pāvisi. iminā niyāmena te pabbatakucchimhi satta māse vasiṃsūti.

[03] tadā kāliṅgaraṭṭhe dunniviṭṭhabrāhmaṇagāmavāsī jūjako nāma brāhmaṇo bhikkhācariyāya kahāpaṇasataṃ labhitvā ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule ṭhapetvā puna dhanapariyesanatthāya gato. tasmiṃ cirāyante brāhmaṇakulā kahāpaṇasataṃ valañjetvā pacchā itarena āgantvā codiyamānā kahāpaṇe dātuṃ asakkontā amittatāpanaṃ nāma dhītaraṃ tassa adaṃsu. so taṃ ādāya kāliṅgaraṭṭhe dunniviṭṭhabrāhmaṇagāmaṃ gantvā vasi. amittatāpanā sammā brāhmaṇaṃ paricarati. atha aññe taruṇabrāhmaṇā tassā ācārasampattiṃ disvā ``ayaṃ mahallakabrāhmaṇaṃ sammā paṭijaggati, tumhe pana amhesu kiṃ pamajjathā''ti attano attano bhariyāyo tajjenti. tā ``imaṃ amittatāpanaṃ imamhā gāmā palāpessāmā''ti nadītitthādīsu sannipatitvā taṃ paribhāsiṃsu. tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha --
[21] ``amittā nūna te mātā, amitto nūna te pitā.
[22] ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ..
[22] ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ..
[22] ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ..
[22] ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ..
[22] ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ..
[22] ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ..
[22] yā tvaṃ vasasi jiṇṇassa, mataṃ te jīvitā varaṃ..
[21] ``na hi nūna tuyhaṃ kalyāṇi, pitā mātā ca sobhane.
[27] aññaṃ bhattāraṃ vindiṃsu, ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu.
[22] ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ..
[27] sā tvaṃ loke abhisapi, sīlavante bahussute.
[22] yā tvaṃ vasasi jiṇṇassa, evaṃ dahariyā satī..
[21] ``na ^a^V7.0283^ea^ ^a^M7.0294^ea^ dukkhaṃ ahinā daṭṭhaṃ, na dukkhaṃ sattiyā hataṃ.
[22] tañca dukkhañca tibbañca, yaṃ passe jiṇṇakaṃ patiṃ..
[21] ``natthi khiḍḍā natthi rati, jiṇṇena patinā saha.
[22] sabbesaṃ sokā nassanti, ye keci hadayassitā..
[22] gaccha ñātikule accha, kiṃ jiṇṇo ramayissatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ahū^eb^ti ahosi. ^b^vāsī kaliṅgesū^eb^ti kāliṅgaraṭṭhesu dunniviṭṭhabrāhmaṇagāmavāsī. ^b^tā naṃ tattha gatāvocu^eb^nti tattha gāme tā itthiyo nadītitthe udakahārikā hutvā gatā naṃ avocuṃ. ^b^thiyo naṃ paribhāsiṃsū^eb^ti itthiyo na aññaṃ kiñci avocuṃ, atha kho naṃ paribhāsiṃsu. ^b^kutūhalā^eb^ti kotūhalajātā viya hutvā. ^b^samāgantvā^eb^ti samantā parikkhipitvā. ^b^dahariyaṃ sati^eb^nti dahariṃ taruṇiṃ sobhaggappattaṃ samānaṃ. ^b^jiṇṇassā^eb^ti jarājiṇṇassa gehe. ^b^duyiṭṭhaṃ te navamiya^eb^nti tava navamiyaṃ yāgaṃ duyiṭṭhaṃ bhavissati, so te yāgapiṇḍo paṭhamaṃ mahallakakākena gahito bhavissati. ``duyiṭṭhā te navamiyā''tipi pāṭho, navamiyā tayā duyiṭṭhā bhavissatīti attho. ^b^akataṃ aggihuttaka^eb^nti aggijuhanampi tayā akataṃ bhavissati. ^b^abhisapī^eb^ti samaṇabrāhmaṇe samitapāpe vā bāhitapāpe vā akkosi. tassa te pāpassa idaṃ phalanti adhippāyeneva āhaṃsu. ^b^jagghitampi na sobhatī^eb^ti khaṇḍadante vivaritvā hasantassa mahallakassa hasitampi na sobhati. ^b^sabbesaṃ sokā nassantī^eb^ti sabbe etesaṃ sokā vinassanti. ^b^kiṃ jiṇṇo^eb^ti ayaṃ jiṇṇo taṃ pañcahi kāmaguṇehi kathaṃ ramayissatīti.
[03] sā tāsaṃ santikā paribhāsaṃ labhitvā udakaghaṭaṃ ādāya rodamānā gharaṃ gantvā ``kiṃ bhoti rodasī''ti brāhmaṇena puṭṭhā tassa ārocentī imaṃ gāthamāha --
[22] thiyo maṃ paribhāsanti, tayā jiṇṇena brāhmaṇā''ti..
[03] tassattho ^a^V7.0284^ea^ -- brāhmaṇa, tayā jiṇṇena maṃ itthiyo paribhāsanti, tasmā ito paṭṭhāya tava udakahārikā hutvā nadiṃ na gacchāmīti.
[21] ``mā me tvaṃ akarā kammaṃ, mā me udakamāhari.
[22] ahaṃ udakamāhissaṃ, mā bhoti kupitā ahū''ti..
[21] ``nāhaṃ tamhi kule jātā, yaṃ tvaṃ udakamāhare.
[22] evaṃ brāhmaṇa jānāhi, na te vacchāmahaṃ ghare..
[21] ``sace me dāsaṃ dāsiṃ vā, nānayissasi brāhmaṇa.
[22] evaṃ brāhmaṇa jānāhi, na te vacchāmi santike''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^nāha^eb^nti brāhmaṇa, yamhi kule sāmiko kammaṃ karoti, nāhaṃ tattha jātā. ^b^yaṃ tva^eb^nti tasmā yaṃ udakaṃ tvaṃ āharissasi, na mayhaṃ tena attho.
[21] ``natthi me sippaṭhānaṃ vā, dhanaṃ dhaññañca brāhmaṇi.
[27] kutohaṃ dāsaṃ dāsiṃ vā, ānayissāmi bhotiyā.
[22] ahaṃ bhotiṃ upaṭṭhissaṃ, mā bhoti kupitā ahū''ti..
[21] ``ehi te ahamakkhissaṃ, yathā me vacanaṃ sutaṃ.
[22] esa vessantaro rājā, vaṅke vasati pabbate..
[21] ``taṃ tvaṃ gantvāna yācassu, dāsaṃ dāsiñca brāhmaṇa.
[22] so te dassati yācito, dāsaṃ dāsiñca khattiyo''ti..
[01] tattha ^a^V7.0285^ea^ ^a^M7.0296^ea^ ^b^ehi te ahamakkhissa^eb^nti ahaṃ te ācikkhissāmi. idaṃ sā devatādhiggahitā hutvā āha.
